Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on 6 Rajab, the year 1290 [of the Hijrah = 30 August, 1873] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah fī ʻilm al-naḥw / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī al-Miṣrī. -- [17--?].
record.note: On slip pasted inside back cover: "Stevens 29/2/16 ... Arabic manuscript ... from Bukhara".

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī al-Miṣrī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ al-maqām [maqām] al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd, al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah fī ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah / taʼlīf al-shaykh Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1825.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd, al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... nahār al-Sabt <al-Sabt>, fī shahr Safar [Ṣafar], fī sanat iḥdā [iḥdá] wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The transcription of this copy was completed on Saturday, in the month of Ṣafar, 1241 [of the Hijrah = September/October, 1825]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / li ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī. -- 1845.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd, al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red.
Colophon: "Bi-qalam al-faqīr ... ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn al-Shaykh Shākir al-Majdhūb ... fī niṣf Jumād al-Thānī, sanat 1261."
Translation of the colophon: "By the pen of the poor ... ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn al-Shaykh Shākir al-Majdhūb ... in the middle of Jumād al-Thānī of the year 1261 [of the Hijrah = 21 June, 1845]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī. -- 1850.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 238. A note in the manuscript has: Hādhā Kitāb al-Shaykh Khālid.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd, al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu fī sanat 1266, fī shahr Rajab, yawm al-Thalāthah. Tammat ayyām 18.
Translation of the colophon: "Written in the year 1266 [of the Hijrah], fī shahr Rajab, on Tuesday [May/June, 1850]. Completed in 18 days."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / lil-Shaykh Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- 1855.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Crude drawings in colors in the margins.
Marginalia.
Colophon: "Wa-qad tammat ʻalá yad ... al-Muʻallim [...] ibn al-Muʻallim [...] al-Ṭabīb, fī shahr Rajab 21, sanat 1271, nahār al-Jumʻah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the hand of ... al-Muʻallim [...] ibn al-Muʻallim [...] the Physician, on Friday, the 21st of the month of Rajab, 1271 [of the Hijrah = 9 April, 1855]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī. -- 1859.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 238.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azhar[ī] ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabd [al-ʻabīd] al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-qad tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... bi-qalam ... Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-ʻĀmil Hadāyā ... wa-qad wāfaqa tamām kitābatihi sanat 1275, fī shahr Shaʻbān, khalat minhu 19, tisʻata ʻashara yawman ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... by the hand of ... Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-ʻĀmil Hadāyā ... the transcription having been concluded in the year 1275 [of the Hijrah], nineteen days having passed from the month of Shaʻbān [24 March, 1859] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah al-Ājurrūmīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ājurrūm. -- 1892.
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Title from: Brockelmann, II, 237. In manuscript by a later hand: "Kitāb al-naḥw [al-Ājurrūmīyah]."
Also known as: al-Ājurrūmīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ, wa-aqsāmuhu thalāthah: Ism, wa-fiʻl, wa-ḥarf jāʼa li-maʻná ..."
Fair naskhī.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Colophon: "Wa-tamma al-kitāb fī shahr Shawwāl, fī sanat 1309. Katabahu ... al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá Shawkat ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed in the month of Shawwāl of the year 1309 [of the Hijrah = April/May, 1892]. Copied by Muṣṭafá Shawkat ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah al-Ājurrūmīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ājurrūm. -- 1855?.
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Known as: al-Muqaddimah al-Ājurrūmīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ, wa-aqsāmuhu thalāthah: Ism, wa-fiʻl, wa-ḥarf jāʼa li-maʻná ..."
Fair naskhī, on blue, white and pink paper, in black, red, and purple. Leaves 1-2, 9-10 supplied by different hands.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
On slip pasted inside back-cover: "Stevens 15/2/16."
Islamic binding, paper covered.
Colophon: "Tammat shahra Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1271 [?]."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1271 [?] = [1855?]."

record.title: 880-02 Marāḥ al-arwāḥ / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd. -- 1676.
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Incipit: "Qāla ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd ... Iʻlam inna ʻilm al-ṣarf umm al-ʻulūm wa-al-naḥw abūhā ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Profuse interlinear and marginal annotations in the earlier part of the manuscript.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb ... yawm al-Aḥad, muʼarrakhan bi-tārīkh arbaʻata ʻashar min shahr Muḥarram ... wa-qad maḍá min al-Hijrah ... baʻda al-alf sittah wa-thamānūn sanatan, bi-yad al-ḍaʻīf ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ... fī maqām [al-maqām] al-mushtahir bi-Lāhūr ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was transcribed ... on Sunday, dated 14 Muḥarram ... 1086 years having passed after the Hijrah [29 March 1676], by the hand of the feeble ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ... in the location known as Lahore [Pakistan] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Marāḥ al-arwāḥ / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd. -- [18--?].
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Title from: Brockelmann, II, 21. In manuscript: hādhā Kitāb al-marāḥ.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd ... Iʻlam inna al-ṣarf umm al-ʻulūm wa-al-naḥw abūhā ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ibrāhīm al-Zanjānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 283. In manuscript: hādhā Kitāb ʻIzzī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam inna al-taṣrīf fī al-lughah al-taghyīr, wa-fī al-ṣināʻah taḥwīl al-aṣl al-wāḥid ilá amthilah mukhtalifah ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Maqṣūd fī al-taṣrīf / Abū Ḥanīfah?. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, S II, p. 657. In manuscript: Maqṣūd.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wahhāb lil-muʼminīn sabīl al-ṣawāb ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻArabīyah wasīlah ilá al-ʻulūm al-sharʻīyah, wa-aḥad arkānihā al-taṣrīf ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Bināʼ al-afʻāl / ʻAbd Allāh al-Dunquzī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, S II, p. 631. In manuscript: al-Bināʼ.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna abwāb al-taṣrīf khamsah wa-thalāthūn bāban, sittah minhā lil-thulāthī al-mujarrad ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ibrāhīm al-Zanjānī. -- 1733 or 1734.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 283. In manuscript: Hādhā Matn Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam inna al-taṣrīf fī al-lughah al-taghyīr, wa-fī al-ṣināʻah taḥwīl al-aṣl al-wāḥid ilá amthilah mukhtalifah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Muwaṣṣil al-ṭullāb ilá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim li-ḥamdihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Hādhā Sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Muwaṣṣil al-ṭullāb ilá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- [1698 or 1699].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Laid-in 2 leaves.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Allāhumma [al-mulhim] li-ḥamdihi ... fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Hādhā Sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia and illustrations.
With: 1 other title.
"Tamma ... sanat 1110."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the year 1110 [of the Hijrah = 1698/1699."

record.title: 880-01 al-Tarnūj. -- [1698 or 1699].
record.note: The work is ascribed in Brockelmann (I, 287) to a certain al-Tūrajī, whose name may be a misreading of the title.

Cf. also Hitti, 317, which has the same incipit, but is identified as Hadīyat al-ṣibyān of Muṣṭafá al-Awralawī (Brockelmann, II, 424; S III, p. 1212), and is referred to Gotha 196(4a) which has a different incipit, and to Paris 4212. Evidently all a mix up.

Incipit: Bi-ismika Yā fattāḥ al-ḥamd li-man wajaba ʻalaynā thanāʼuhu, wa-li-man lā yazūlu minhu wajb [min ḥasbi] al-niʻam ʻalaynā ghināʼuhu ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lammā raʼayutu al-ṭālibīn yaṭlubūna sharḥan lil-ʻAwāmil lil-Shaykh ... ʻAbd al-Qāhir yaḥullu iʻrābahā aradtu an yubayyina [ubayyina] iʻrābahā bi-qadr ṭāqatī ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Tarnūj ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 1110."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the year 1110 [of the Hijrah = 1698/1699]."

record.title: 880-03 Faṣl maʻqūd fī ʻawāmil al-iʻrāb / Jirmānūs Farḥāt. -- [17--?].
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Also known as: al-Faṣl al-maʻqūd fī maʻānī ʻawāmil al-iʻrāb.
Incipit: "Iʻlam inna al-alif qismān, layyinah wa-hamzah; fa-al-layyinah hiya allatī lā yubdaʼu bi-hā li-annahā lā taqbalu al-ḥarakah ..."
Good modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Fully vocalized; with marginal notations.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Azharīyah / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī. -- 1862.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jamīʻ al-aḥwāl ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī: Qad saʼalanī man aʻtaqidu ṣalāḥahu wa-lā yasaʻunī mukhālafatuhu an ashraḥa Muqaddimatī ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah ṣabḥat yawm al-Arbaʻah, rābiʻ yawm min Jumād al-Thānī ... sant sittah [tisʻah] wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf 1279 ... ʻalá yad ... Ibrāhīm al-shahīr bi-al-Ḥaffār ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on Wednesday morning, 4 Jumād al-Thānī ... 1279 [of the Hijrah = 27 November, 1862] ... by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm, known as al-Ḥaffār ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Azharīyah ʻalá al-naḥw / lil-shaykh Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jamīʻ al-aḥwāl ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Qad saʼalanī man aʻtaqidu ṣalāḥahu wa-lā tasaʻunī mukhālafatuhu an ashraḥa Muqaddimatī al-Azharīyah ..."
Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī; ʻunwāns in colors on leaves 1 verso and 2 recto.

record.title: 880-03 Matn al-Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 al-Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 298. In manuscript in a modern hand: Alfīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
On label pasted inside back cover: "Stevens' 29/2/16."
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-03 al-Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- 1854 or 1855.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 298. In manuscript in a modern hand: Alfīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Fair naskhī.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Partly on greenish blue paper.

record.title: 880-03 al-Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- 1828.
record.note: Known as: al-Alfīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse interlinear and marginal notations.
Colophon: "Sanat 1244 fī shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām."
Translation of the colophon: "In the year 1244 [of the Hijrah] in the month of Muḥarram [= July/August, 1828]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 298. In manuscript in a modern hand: Alfīyah.
Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 al-Nahjah al-marḍīyah fī sharḥ al-Alfīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī. -- 1758.
record.note: Also known as: al-Bahjah al-marḍīyah fī sharḥ al-Alfīyah.
The explicit agrees with Ahlwardt 6654.
Hitti 420 seems to be either an abridgment or a different work (43 leaves only).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá niʻamika wa-ālāʼika ... Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf mazajtuhu bi-Alfīyat Ibn Mālik, muhadhdhab al-maqāṣid wāḍiḥ al-masālik ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal annotations in the beginning of the manuscript.

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh minhu waqt al-ʻaṣr min yawm al-Thulāthā, al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1171, ʻalá yad Mullā Ḥusayn ibn Mullā ʻAlī al-ʻAshshārī al-Shāfiʻī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the afternoon of Tuesday, 25 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1171 [of the Hijrah = 30 August, 1758], by the hand of Mullā Ḥusayn ibn Mullā ʻAlī al-ʻAshshārī al-Shāfiʻī ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Azharīyah fī ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah / li ... Zayn al-Dīn Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- 1576.
record.note: Known as: Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Azharīyah.
The title on leaf 1 recto calls also for the same author's Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah, which however is not present.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jamīʻ al-aḥwāl ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Qad saʼalanī man aʻtaqidu ṣalāḥahu wa-lā tasaʻunī mukhālafatuhu an ashraḥa Muqaddimatī al-Azharīyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yawm al-Aḥad ... sādis ʻashar shahr Ramaḍān ... sanat arbaʻ wa-thamānīn wa-tisʻ miʼah ... ʻalá yad ... [...] ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn Sayf al-Dīn [...] al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Sunday ... 16 Ramaḍān ... 984 [of the Hijrah = 17 December, 1576] ... by the hand of ... [...] ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn Sayf al-Dīn [...] al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Muwaṣṣil al-ṭullāb ilá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- 1879 or 1880.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim bi-ḥamdihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Hādhā Sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat ... ʻalá yad Muḥammad Darwīsh al-Ḥamawī fī sanat 1297."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of Muḥammad Darwīsh al-Ḥamawī, in the year 1297 [of the Hijrah = 1879/1880]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Shudhūr al-dhahab fī maʻrifat kalām al-ʻArab / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ... ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī. -- 1759.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ... ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī ... Awwal mā aqūlu innī aḥmadu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-Akram ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhihi 'al-Muqaddimah' fī ṣabīḥat al-Thulāth al-mubārak, sābiʻ ʻashar yawm maḍá min shahr Shaʻbān al-muḥarram, sanat 1172 [sic!]."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this 'Introduction' was completed in the morning of blessed Tuesday, 17 days having passed from the month of Shaʻbān, of the year 1172 [sic! of the Hijrah = 15 April, 1759]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Shudhūr al-dhahab fī maʻrifat kalām al-ʻArab / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ... ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 459. A note on leaf 1 recto read: hādhā Kitāb ʻilm fī ʻilm kalām ʻArab.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī ... Awwal mā aqūlu innī aḥmadu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-Akram ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) Maghribī, in red and black; leaves 72-73 supplied in a later hand.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Shudhūr al-dhahab fī maʻrifat kalām al-ʻArab / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 459. In manuscript in a modern hand: Shudhūr al-dhahab.
Fair modern (18th century?) Maghribī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, brocade covered.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Shudhūr / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ... Yūsuf ... ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī. -- [1606 or 1607?].
record.note: Known as: Sharḥ Shudhūr al-dhahab fī maʻrifat kalām al-ʻArab.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ... Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī ... Awwal mā aqūlu innī aḥmadu Allāh al-ʻalī al-akram ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black; crude drawings in the margins.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Nukat ʻalá Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ... ibn Hishām. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 450. In incipit: hādhihi Nukat ḥarrartuhā ʻalá muqaddimatī al-musammāt bi-Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā.
The title is also given in the manuscript as: Kitāb Sharḥ al-Qaṭr.
Also known as: Sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ al-darajāt li-man inkhafaḍa al-jalālah [li-jalālih, ṣaḥḥ] ..."
Modern (19th century) coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... Ḥusayn ibn Ḥājj Ḥāmid ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is cpmpleted ... by the hand of ... Ḥusayn ibn Ḥājj Ḥāmid ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mujīb al-nidā ilá sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadá / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Fākihī. -- 1685.
record.note: Title also given in the manuscript as: Kitāb al-Fākihī sharḥ al-Qaṭr li-Ibn Hishām.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-rāfiʻ man inkhafaḍa li-ʻizzihi wa-sulṭānih ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
Colophon: "ʻAlá yad ... Walī ibn Muḥammad al-mashhūr bi-al-Khaṭīb, sādis shahr Ramaḍān al-sharīf, sanat sittah wa-tisʻīn baʻd al-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "By the hand of ... Walī ibn Muḥammad known as al-Khaṭīb, on the sixth of the noble month of Ramaḍān, of the year 1096 [of the Hijrah = 6 August 1685] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mujīb al-nidā ilá sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadá / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Fākihī. -- [before 1806].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-rāfiʻ man inkhafaḍa li-ʻizzihi wa-sulṭānih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīdihi yawm al-Thulāthāʼ fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal [erasure] [ʻalá yad] al-ḥaqīr Zayn ibn al-Shaykh Bāqi ibn Shaykh Zayn al-Najafī."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Tuesday, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal [erasure] [by the hand of] the wretched Zayn ibn al-Shaykh Bāqi ibn Shaykh Zayn al-Najafī."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / ʻAbd al-Ghafūr al-Lārī. -- 1576.
record.note: Title from: Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss, 6577. A note in manuscript: hādhā kitāb ʻAbd al-Ghafūr li-sharḥ al-Kāfiyah wa-huwa al-Jāmī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qawluhu al-ḥamd maṣdar al-maʻlūm wa-al-lām lil-jins aw al-istighrāq, ay kull ḥamd min al-azal ilá al-abad ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Occasional marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā [hādhihi] al-risālah ... fī yawm al-Aḥad min shahr Rajab al-murjib, sanat 984, arbaʻ wa-thamānīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ... katabahā ... Ṣāliḥ ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Khalīl ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this epistle was completed ... on Sunday, in the month of Rajab al-murjib, of the year 984 [of the Hijrah = 10 (?) October 1576] ... written by ... Ṣāliḥ ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Khalīl ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / ʻAbd al-Ghafūr al-Lārī. -- 1675 or 1676.
record.note: Title from: Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss, 6577.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamd maṣdar al-maʻlūm wa-al-lām lil-jins aw al-istighrāq, ay kull ḥamd min al-adhal [al-azal, ṣaḥḥ] ilá al-abad ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Colophon: "Sanat 186, sittah wa-thamānīn baʻd alf."
Translation of the colophon: "In the year 1086 [of the Hijrah = 1675/1676]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadá / Ṣādiq ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥusaynī al-Aʻrajī. -- 1741.
record.note: Title as appears on fly leaf, supplied by a modern hand.
Also known as: Shawāhid al-ʻAjamī ʻalá sharḥ al-Qaṭr.

Brockelmann gives the date of the author's death as 1451, which is an error based on a misreading of Ahlwardt 6742, where this date is quoted for Maḥmūd al-ʻAynī (who is mentioned in the preface of this commentary).
Brockelmann omits the author's surname and calls him simply "al-Ḥusainī"--Again presumably owing to hasty reading of Berlin catalog.
The author's full name is given in the introduction.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa qadr al-ʻulamāʼ ilá asmā [asmá] maḥall, wa-khafaḍa qadr al-juhalāʼ ilá al-darak al-asfal ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm al-Ithnayn ʻinda al-ghurūb fī shahr Shaʻbān al-mubārak, sanat 1154, kitābatan li-nafsihi ... Wa-anā aqall al-ʻibād ... Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān Afandī Raḥbī Zādah, al-maʼdhūn bi-Iftāʼ al-Ḥillah al-fayḥāʼ ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed at sunset, on Monday, in the blessed month of Shaʻbān, of the year 1154 [of the Hijrah = 16 (?) October 1741], written for himself ... by the least of the servants ... I, Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān Afandī Raḥbī Zādah, the authorized person for the Iftāʼ of the fragrant al-Ḥillah ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar ... al-Taftāzānī. -- 1682.
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 398.
Compared with Berlin catalog 6617 and 6619 (first gloss) and 6624 (second gloss); the explicit of the first gloss is on leaf 114 verso; the second gloss begins on leaf 3 recto.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Inna arwá zahr takhruju [yakhruj, ṣaḥḥ] fī riyāḍ al-kalām min al-akmām [al-aḥkām, ṣaḥḥ] ..."
Incipit of the gloss: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá an waffaqanā ḥurūrf [ṣarf, ṣaḥḥ] al-himmah naḥwa al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Leaves numbered with Hebrew numerals.
Profuse marginalia.
Islamic binding, cloth covered.
Colophon: "Tamma ʻalá yad ʻAlī [ibn ʻAbd Allāh], yawm al-Ithnayn, sīhum Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat alf wa-tisʻīn wa-thalāth ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed by the hand of ʻAlī [ibn ʻAbd Allāh], on Monday, 13 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, the year 1093 [of the Hijrah = 13 December 1682] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Natāʼij al-afkār fī sharḥ Iẓhār al-asrār / Muṣṭafá ibn Ḥamzah al-Aṭahʹlī. -- 1734.
record.note: Title completed according to Hitti, 469. In introduction: Natāʼij al-afkār.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-afkār qawālib al-maʻānī wa-faḍḍalahā ʻalá sāʼir al-aṣwāt ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Crude drawings in the margins.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat kitābat hādhā al-kitāb ... ʻalá yaday Abī Bakr aḥqar al-ṭullāb, fī ghurrat Shaʻbān, sanat 1147."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed ... by the hands of Abī Bakr, the most wretched of the students, at the beginning of Shaʻbān, the year 1147 [of the Hijrah = 27 December 1734]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Wāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Kāfiyah : al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Astarābādhī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Aḥmadu Allāh ʻalá ʻaẓamat jalālih wa-umajjid ḥamda gharīq bi-muṭālaʻat jamā[lih] ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 225-250 supplied by a later hand.
Sparse interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 al-Wāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Kāfiyah / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Astarābādhī. -- [1787].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aḥmadu Allāh ʻalá ʻaẓamat jalālih ḥamda gharīq bi-muṭālaʻat jamālih ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations, especially in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Colophon: "Tammat hādhā al-kitāb fī awāsiṭ Muḥarram al-ḥarām, al-yawm Panj Shanbah, sanat ithná [wa-miʼatayn (?)] [wa-]alf ... ʻalá yad ... Madḥamī [?] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This book was completed in the middle of Muḥarram al-ḥarām, on Thursday, of the year 1202 [of the Hijrah = 25 October 1787] ... by the hand of Madḥamī [?] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Wāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Shāfiyah / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Muḥammad. -- 1780.
record.note: The author's name is given on leaf 2 recto, the title (as: Wāfiyah fī sharḥ Shāfiyah) and date of composition (A.H. 813) on leaf 2 verso. Over the author's name the glossator has added something that looks like al-Kāzadatī.
The copyist's name is repeated on leaf 1 recto, but the surname is spelled al-Thūkhī (?).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tanazzaha dhātuhu ʻan al-taʻrīf wa-al-intisāb wa-al-intiqāl, wa-taqaddasa ʻan al-taḥwīl wa-al-ʻuyūb wa-al-iʻtidāl ..."
Fair Maghribī hand.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.

Colophon: "Qad istarāḥa qāmī [qalamī, ṣaḥḥ] min al-intihāḍ ilá sawād hādhā al-qirṭās ... wa-faraghtu ʻan kitābat al-kitāb ... Amīn ibn Muḥammad al-Sūmī ... baʻda ṣalāt al-ẓuhr, fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ min shahr ... Ramaḍān ... fī sanat 1194."

Translation of the colophon: "My pen has rested from the endeavor of the rough draft of these sheets ... having completed the copying of this book ... [I], Amīn ibn Muḥammad al-Sūmī ... after the noon prayer, on Wednesday, in the month of ... Ramaḍān ... of the year 1194 [of the Hijrah = 6 (?) September 1780]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Jāmī. -- 1724.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-Walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādābih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Qad tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī ... 12 shahr Rajab al-murjib, sanat 1136."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on ... the 12th of the month of Rajab al-murjib, the year 1136 [of the Hijrah = 6 April 1724]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar ... al-Taftāzānī. -- [before 1826 or 1827].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Inna arwá zahr yakhruju fī riyāḍ al-kalām min al-akmām [al-aḥkām, ṣaḥḥ] ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Qad furigha min taswīd hādhihi al-risālah fī yakbistam shahr al-Rajab al-murajjab. Katabahu Muḥammad Hādī ibn Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Ḥusaynī."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this epistle was completed on 21 of the month of Rajab al-murajjab. Copied by Muḥammad Hādī ibn Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Ḥusaynī."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / al-Nāṣir al-Laqānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title as appears on fly-leaf.
The author's name is given in a note by a later hand on leaf 1 recto; compared with Gotha 203 (a fragment only).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshin katabtuhā ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī lil-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 37-75 supplied by a later hand.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah / Ibn al-Ḥājib. -- 1871.
record.note: Title also given, on fly-leaf by a modern hand, as: Kāfiyah fī ʻilm al-naḥw.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf ..."
Fair naskhī.
Interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Colophon: "Qad tammat al-Kāfiyah ʻalá yad al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad Amīn, fī yawm al-Ithnayn, fī shahr Dh[ī] al-Ḥijjah, dar sanat 1287."
Translation of the colophon: "al-Kāfiyah was completed by the hand of the wretched Muḥammad Amīn, on Monday, in the month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, the year 1287 [of the Hijrah = 27 February 1871]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah / Ibn al-Ḥājib. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title and the author's name supplied by a modern hand on fly leaf.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah / ʻUthmān ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥājib. -- [1703].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.

Colophon: "Tammat al-Kāfiyah fī al-naḥw yawm al-Ithnayn, waqt al-ḍuḥá ... fī yad al-faqīr ... Mullā Sulṭān Muḥammad ibn Bābā ʻAlī, fī al-tārīkh bīstam hashtum, shahr Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 1114."

Translation of the colophon: "al-Kāfiyah fī al-naḥw was completed on Monday morning ... by the hand of the poor ... Mullā Sulṭān Muḥammad ibn Bābā ʻAlī, on the 28th of the glorious month of Shaʻbān, the year 1114 [of the Hijrah = 17 January 1703]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iṣlāḥ fī sharḥ Sharḥ Dībājat al-Miṣbāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf. -- 1644.
record.note: Ahlwardt (6550, no. 9) has the author's surname: Qarah Pīrī; Brockelmann (S III, p. 1213) has: Qarabīrī.
For al-Taftāzānī's commentary see Berlin catalog 6545; the incipit quoted here agrees (cf. leaf 8 verso).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī la-hu al-kalimah al-ʻulyā wa-al-mathal al-aʻlá ..."
Coarse nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh minhu fī yawm Ramaḍān [?] ... fī sanat lrābiʻ [arbaʻ (?)] wa-khamsīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in a day of Ramaḍān [?] ... in the year 1054 [?] [of the Hijrah = November 1644]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Sharḥ Dībājat al-Miṣbāḥ / Yaʻqūb ibn Sayyid ʻAlī. -- 1644.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.
Incipit same as in Gotha 234.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻraba tarkīb al-kāʼināt min mazj kāf wa-nūn ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Sanat 1054, Rab[ī]ʻ al-Awwal, fī 5, min al-faqīr ... Aḥmad ibn Shaʻbān Afandī al-Kabkabār Rān [?]."
Translation of the colophon: "In the year 1054, 5 Rabīʻ al-Awwal [of the Hijrah = 12 May 1644], by the poor ... Aḥmad ibn Shaʻbān Afandī al-Kabkabār Rān [?]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Dībājat al-Miṣbāḥ / al-mansūb ilá al-Taftāzānī. -- before 1709 or 1710.
record.note: Title and the supposed author supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf; the incipit has: Hādhihi Awrāq li-iʻrāb Dībājat al-Miṣbāḥ.
Same as Ahlwardt, 6545 (with variant explicit).
Hitti 354 lacks the proper incipit, and the explicit varies, but is certainly the same work.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā yablughu kunhahu jādd, wa-lā yuḥṣī ʻadad niʻamihi ʻādd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 1121."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed in the year 1121 [of the Hijrah = 1709/1710]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jāmī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-Walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādābih ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; many leaves supplied in a later nastaʻlīq; crude ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 verso.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawāshī ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / Niʻmat Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusaynī al-Jazāʼirī. -- 1822.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.

Incipit: Beginning missing. Starts with: "... wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá man khaṣṣahu bi-muẓhartih [bi-muẓharāt (?)] asmāʼihi, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá arḍihi wa-samāʼihi, wa-ālihi maṣābīḥ al-ẓalām wa-mafātīḥ al-khayrāt ʻalá al-anām ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Qad ittafaqa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-risālah fī ghurrat shahr Shaʻbān min sanat 1237 fī Madrasat al-Fakhrīyah bi-Ṭahrān, fī yad ... Muḥammad Zamān al-Ḥusaynī al-Tunkābunī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this epistle was completed in the beginning of the month of Shaʻbān of the year 1237 [of the Hijrah = 23 April 1822], by the hand of ... Muḥammad Zamān al-Ḥusaynī al-Tunkābunī ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-ʻAwāmil al-miʼah / ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.
Also known as: Miʼat ʻāmil.
A differently worded version from the one in Ms. Salisbury 21 (leaves 83 verso-93).
The Persian tract seems to be a summary of al-Jurjānī's tract.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá naʻmāʼihi al-shāmilah wa-ālāʼihi al-kāmilah ... Iʻlam inna al-ʻawāmil fī al-naḥw ʻalá mā lafāh [allafahu, ṣaḥḥ] al-Shaykh ... ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī ... miʼat ʻāmil ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-03 al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ibrāhīm al-Zanjānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title as appears in the colophon. Known as: al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī.
Also known as: al-Taṣrīf al-Zanjānī.

Incipit: "... Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam inna al-taṣrīf fī al-lughah al-taghyīr, wa-fī al-ṣināʻah taḥwīl al-aṣl al-wāḥid ilá amthilah mukhtalifah ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Zanjānī fī ʻilm al-ṣarf ... mālikuhu wa-kātibuhu Walad Ḥakīm Najaf Bakhsh Khān Muḥammad Ḥusayn ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book named 'Zanjānī fī ʻilm al-ṣarf' is completed ... Its owner and copyist is Walad Ḥakīm Najaf Bakhsh Khān Muḥammad Ḥusayn ..."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ ʻawāmil ṣāḥib al-Kashshāf. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Title, apparently written by a non-Arab, is given on the cover.

The incipit of al-Zamakhsharī's treatise is apparently not identical with either al-Mufaṣṣal or al-Unmūdhaj, seems to read: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl fī al-ḥurūf. Iʻlam inna al-ḥurūf al-ʻāmilah ʻalá nawʻayn, ʻāmilah fī al-ism wa-ʻāmilah fī al-fiʻl ..."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ marātib al-fuḍalāʼ wa-khāfiḍ ʻadāhum, wa-mufattiḥ abwāb funūn al-ʻulamāʼ wa-nāṣib liwāhum ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah ṣāḥib al-Kashshāf ... Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aqūlu: Badaʼa al-Shaykh ... kitābahu bi-Bismillah al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī.
Interlinear and marginal notations.

record.title: 880-03 Iẓhār al-Birkawī. -- 1744.
record.note: Title given in the colophon as: al-Iẓhār.
Known as: Iẓhār al-asrār.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah fīmā yaḥtāju ilayhi kull muʻrib ashadd al-iḥtiyāj, wa-huwa thalāthat ashyāʼ: al-ʻĀmil wa-al-maʻmūl wa-al-ʻamal ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red, yellow, and black; crude drawings in colors in the margins.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tamma al-Iẓhār ... sanat 1157, Ramaḍān fī 26 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "al-Iẓhār is completed ... on 26 Ramaḍān, the year 1157 [of the Hijrah = 2 November 1744] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah / lil-Birkawī. -- 1744.
record.note: Known as: al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-iʻlam innahu lā budda li-kull ṭālib maʻrifat al-iʻrāb min maʻrifat miʼat shayʼ, sittūn minhā tusammá ʻāmilan, wa-thalāthūn minhā tusammá maʻmūlan, wa-ʻasharah minhā tusammá ʻamalan wa-iʻrāban ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in yellow and black; crude drawings in colors in the margins.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīd [al-jadīdah] li-Birkawī ... sanat 1157, fī 28 Ramaḍān."
Translation of the colophon: "al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīd [al-jadīdah] of al-Birkawī is completed ... on 28 Ramaḍān, the year 1157 [of the Hijrah = 4 November 1744]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Kāfiyah / Ibn al-Ḥājib. -- 1829.
record.note: Title and the author's name supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal annotations on some leaves.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

Colophon: "Wa-qad yassara Allāh ... itmām hādhihi al-nuskhah ... ʻalá yad ... Dārandawī al-Ḥājj Ḥāfiẓ Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ... fī al-yawm [yawm] al-Sabt, bayna al-ṣalātayn, min shahr Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, li-sanat arbaʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf."

Translation of the colophon: "God has facilitated ... the completion of this copy ... by the hand of ... Dārandawī al-Ḥājj Ḥāfiẓ Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ... on Saturday, between the two prayers, in the glorious month of Shaʻbān, the year 1244 [of the Hijrah = 6 (?) February 1829]."

record.title: 880-03 Iẓhār al-asrār / al-Birkawī. -- 1829.
record.note: Title and the author's name supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah fīmā yaḥtāju ilayhi kull muʻrib ashadda al-iḥtiyāj, wa-huwa thalāthat ashyāʼ: al-ʻĀmil wa-al-maʻmūl wa-al-ʻamal ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... ʻalá yad ... Dārandahwī Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, sanat arbaʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of ... Dārandahwī Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, the year 1244 [of the Hijrah = 1829]."

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah / al-Birkawī. -- [1829].
record.note: Title and the author's name supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-iʻlam innahu lā budda li-kull ṭālib maʻrifat al-iʻrāb min maʻrifat miʼat shayʼ, sittūn minhā tusammá ʻāmilan, wa-thalāthūn minhā tusammá maʻmūlan wa-ʻasharah minhā tusammá ʻamalan wa-iʻrāban ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Taftāzānī ʻalá al-Zanjānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Known as: Sharḥ al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Inna arwá zahr yakhruju fī riyāḍ al-kalām min al-akmām [al-aḥkām, ṣaḥḥ] ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī; several leaves supplied by later hands.
On label pasted inside back-cover: "Stevens 29/2/16."

record.title: 880-03 al-Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī / al-Zanjānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title and the author's name supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... wa-iʻlam inna al-taṣrīf fī al-lughah al-taghyīr, wa-fī al-ṣināʻah taḥwīl al-aṣl al-wāḥid ilá amthilah mukhtalifah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black; leaves 1 and 10 supplied by a later hand.
Considerable interlinear and marginal notations.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 al-Maqṣūd fī al-taṣrīf / mansūb ilá al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title and statement of responsibility supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wahhāb lil-muʼminīn sabīl al-ṣawāb ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻArabīyah wasīlah ilá al-ʻulūm al-sharʻīyah, wa-aḥad arkānihā al-taṣrīf ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black; leaves 28, 35-36 supplied by a later hand.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: The Babe Ruth story : typescript / by Babe Ruth as told to Bob Considine, [1948?]
record.note: Includes binder with title stamped in gilt.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ajwibah al-jalīyah fī al-uṣūl al-naḥwīyah / Muḥammad Talḥūq. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ajwibah al-jalīyah fī al-uṣūl al-naḥwīyah. S. Mā huwa al-kalām. J. al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ ..."
Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Judging from the width of the binding, the first half of the manuscript (a majmūʻah) is missing.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in a laid-in note.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Marḥamān [al-Raḥmān] al-Raḥīm. Wa-nahtadī billāh min al-Shayṭān al-rajīm. Allāhumma lā sahlan illā mā jaʻaltahu sahlan ... Qawl al-Ājurrūmī ... al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ. al-Kalām la-hu maʻnayān: Maʻná fī al-lughah, wa-maʻná fī al-iṣṭilāḥ ..."
Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Compared with Ms. Salisbury 13 (minor variants in the text).
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ laṭīf li-alfāẓ al-Ājurrūmīyah fī uṣūl ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Known as: Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah.
Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Many leaves badly corroded by the ink; leaves 102 and 103 almost completely destroyed.
Sparse marginalia.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: Arabic reader. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "al-Maqālah al-ūlá fī ḥurūf al-ʻArabīyah wa-waḍʻihim bi-al-kalām. al-Faṣl al-awwl: Fī ḥurūf al-makān. ʻAlá yad al-yumná: A man dritta. ʻAlá jānib al-shamāl: Alla banda destra. ʻAlá fawq: Sopra. Taḥt: Sotto ... Lammā jiʼtu min Ḥlab ilá Ṭarābulus kāna al-baḥr ʻalá yad al-yumná wa-al-barr ʻalá jānib al-shamāl ..."
Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso and 2 recto.
Lacquered binding, with floral ornamentation inside and outside.

record.title: 880-03 Ḍawʼ al-Miṣbāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Isfarāyīnī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title from: Hitti, 340.
Also known as: Ḍawʼ al-Miṣbāḥ mukhtaṣar al-Miftāḥ.
Incipit: Beginning missing; folio 1a begins with: "... al-taqlīb wa-al-tawṣīf bal al-awṣāf tataḍāʼalu ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 14-25 supplied by a later hand.
Extensive marginalia and interlinear notations throughout, except leaves 14-25.
Compared with Ms. Salisbury 17 (does not have the foreword present in this copy).
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 23. In manuscript inside front-cover in a modern hand: "Qaṭr al-nadā li-Ibn Hishām."
Incipit: Incipit missing; folio 1a begins with: "... istadalla ʻalá ismīyat al-tāʼ fī ḍarabtu ..."
Good naskhī, fairly modern (18th century?), in red and black.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Compared with Arabic MSS 103.

record.title: 880-02 Fatāwá Qāḍī Khān : al-juzʼ al-awwal. -- 1550.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... ḥamdan yuqarribunā ilá marḍāt Allāh taʻālá wa-karāmatih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaves 279-282 (table of contents) supplied by a later hand; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad Jarbīyāt al-Ḥusaynī al-Azharī, khidmatan li-Sayyidī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shihābī al-Qādirī ... bi-taʼarīkh khāmis ʻishrīn shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat sabʻ wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad Jarbīyāt al-Ḥusaynī al-Azharī, as a service for Sayyidī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shihābī al-Qādirī ... on the 25th of the blessed month of Ramaḍān, the year 957 [of the Hijrah = 17 October 1550] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Hidāyah fī sharḥ al-Bidāyah : al-juzʼ al-awwal / ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Marghīnānī. -- [14--?].
record.note: Title supplied on fly-leaf by a modern hand. In incipit: al-Hidāyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlá maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah ..."
Fairly old (15th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia and interlinear notes, especially in the beginning.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Hidāyah fī sharḥ al-Bidāyah / ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Marghīnānī. -- [15--?]-[16--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf. In incipit: al-Hidāyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlá maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah ..."
Volume I: fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black; volume II: several younger (17th century?) naskhī hands, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red.
On leaf 1 recto of volume II is a defaced seal, "declared by Hubîb Ulla to be the seal of Tippo Sultan (whose secty he was) defaced by a person who stole the book" (Ms. note by Thomas Marriott).
In manuscript on leaf 1 recto of volume II: "Thos Marriott Augt. 25th 1800 Serinġputta" (i.e. Seringapatam, Tipu's capital), with his bookplate.

record.title: 880-03 Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUbayd Allāh al-Maḥbūbī. -- 1467.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... ḥamd man jaʻala al-ʻilm ajall al-mawāhib al-hanīyah wa-asnāhā wa-aʻlá al-marātib al-sanīyah wa-asmāhā ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn Khiḍr ... fī awāsiṭ Ramaḍān, sanat aḥad wa-sabʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of ... Aḥmad ibn Khiḍr ... in the middle of Ramaḍān, the year 871 [of the Hijrah = 28 April 1467]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah. -- 1663 or 1664.
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 1744.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh taʻālá bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah Saʻd ... Hādhā ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah min masāʼil al-Hidāyah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.
Colophon: "Kitābat al-matn wa-al-sharḥ bi-al-Sarḥ, sanat 1074."
Translation of the colophon: "The text and the commentary were copied in al-Sarḥ, the year 1074 [of the Hijrah = 1663/1664]."

record.title: 880-03 Durar al-ḥukkām fī sharḥ Ghurar al-aḥkām / Muḥammad ibn Farāmurz Mullā Khusraw. -- 1639.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in red, flap missing.
For Muḥammad al-Wānqūlī (al-Wānī), cf. Brockelmann, S II, p. 317; Ahlwardt, 4799.
For ʻAzmī Zādah, cf. Brockelmann, S II, p. 317; Ahlwardt, 4800, no. 6.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh ʻan taḥrīrihi wa-tanmīqihi ... nahār al-Jumʻah, al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, li-sanat tisʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... ibn al-Shaykh Ḥamzah Muṣṭafā [Muṣṭafá] Dadah ... wa-qad yassar Allāh ... itmāmahu fī muddat thalāth sinīn wa-thamāniyat ashhur ... wa-mā yurá fī aṭrāfihi al-maktūb min ḥāshiyatayhi al-muqaddam lil-ʻĀlim ... Muḥammad al-Wānī [al-Wanqūlī], wa-al-muʼakhkhar lil-ʻAllāmah ... ʻAzmī Zādah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The writing and embellishment of this copy was completed ... on Friday, the 25th of the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 1049 [of the Hijrah = 25 August 1639] ... by the hand of ... ibn al-Shaykh Ḥamzah Muṣṭafā [Muṣṭafá] Dadah ... God facilitated its completion in a span of three years and eight months ... As for the two glosses which are written on the margins, the former is for the learned scholar ... Muḥammad al-Wānī [al-Wanqūlī], and the latter is for the scholar ... ʻAzmī Zādah ..."

record.title: 880-03 Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ / Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Wafāʼī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī. -- 1886.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla ... Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Wafāʼī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī innahu iltamas minnī baʻḍ al-akhillāʼ ... an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-ʻibādāt ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Hitti, 1764 is a commentary on this work by the same author.
"Tamma ... fī Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat alf wa-thalāthmiʼah wa-thalāthah 1303."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... during Rabīʻ al-Thānī, the year 1303 [of the Hijrah = January/February, 1886]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Īḍāḥ fī sharḥ Kanz al-daqāʼiq / Yaḥyá al-Qūjḥiṣārī. -- 1489.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front-cover. In colophon: Sharḥ al-Kanz al-daqāʼiq [sic] al-musammá bi-al-Īḍāḥ.
The author might be Yaḥyá ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Rūmī al-Qūjḥiṣārī (-1460), an Ottoman Ḥanafī faqīh.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī razaqanā dīnan qawīman, wa-hadānā ilayhi sabīlan mustaqīman, wa-ṣayyaranā min ahlihi taʻalluman wa-taʻlīman ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-qad ittafaqa al-farāgh min tanmīq hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa <min> Sharḥ al-Kanz [Kanz] al-daqāʼiq, al-musammá bi-al-Īḍāḥ, ḍaḥwata yawm al-sābiʻ min shahr al-mubārak Shawwāl, fī tārīkh sanat arbaʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah ... ʻalá yad ... Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Mīkāʼīl ibn Shaykh ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The embellishment of this book, that is Sharḥ al-Kanz al-daqāʼiq, named al-Īḍāḥ, was completed on the morning of the 7th day of the blessed month of Shawwāl, the year 894 [of the Hijrah = 12 September 1489] ... by the hand of ... Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Mīkāʼīl ibn Shaykh ..."

record.title: 880-03 Maṣābīḥ al-dujá / Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd al-Farrāʼ al-Baghawī. -- 1530.
record.note: Corpus of traditions.
Known as: Maṣābīḥ al-sunnah (or al-sunan). In colophon also: Kitāb al-maṣābīḥ.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salām ʻalá ʻibādih ... Qāla ... Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd al-Farrāʼ al-Baghawī ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi alfāẓ ṣadarat ʻan ṣadr al-Nubūwah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, in black, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Maṣābīḥ ... wa-qad ḥaṣala al-farāgh min intisākhihi yawm al-Ithnayn, waqt al-ghadāt [al-ghadāh], sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrūn min shahr ... Dhī al-Ḥijjah, ʻalá yad ... Maḥmūd ibn Ḥājjī Sayf al-Dīn ibn Khalīl ibn ʻUthmān ibn Khalīl ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Zaylānī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ṣiddīqī ... al-wāqiʻ fī al-baldah al-maḥrūsah Badlīs, sanat sittah wa-thalāthīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book of al-Maṣābīḥ is completed ... the copy was finished in the early morning, on Monday, the 27th of the month of ... Dhū al-Ḥijjah, by the hand of ... Maḥmūd ibn Ḥājjī Sayf al-Dīn ibn Khalīl ibn ʻUthmān ibn Khalīl ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Zaylānī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ṣiddīqī ... in the protected city of Badlīs, the year 936 [of the Hijrah = 1 September 1530] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Maṣābīḥ al-dujá / Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd al-Farrāʼ al-Baghawī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Corpus of traditions.
Title as appears in incipit. On fly-leaf by a modern hand: Maṣābīḥ al-sunnah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salām ʻalá ʻibādih ... Qāla ... Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd al-Farrāʼ al-Baghawī ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi alfāẓ ṣadarat ʻan ṣadr al-Nubūwah ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Leaves 140 and 200 misplaced, should follow leaves 119 and 180 respectively.
Sparse interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ Mishkāt al-Maṣābīḥ. -- [15--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf. In manuscript on leaf 1 recto in a later hand: hādhā Kitāb sharḥ wāḍiḥ li-Maṣābīḥ al-Mishkāt [sic]. Title on the lower edges, mostly rubbed: Sharḥ wāḍiḥ ʻalá Mishkāt al-maṣābīḥ.
The text does not seem to be identical with any work in Berlin catalog (1280 sqq.), Buhar, Bankipore, and BM supplement. For a list of additional commentaries see: Berlin catalog, 1294.
Incipit: "Kitāb al-buyūʻ. Bāb al-kasb wa-ṭalab al-ḥalāl. Mā akala ṭaʻāman aḥadun, ilá ākhirihi, fīhi ḥathth wa-taḥrīḍ ʻalá ṭalab al-kasb al-ḥalāl idh fīhi fawāʼid ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia in the beginning.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ikhtiyār li-taʻlīl al-Mukhtār : al-juzʼ al-awwal / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Maḥmūd ibn al-Buldājī al-Mawṣilī. -- [14--?].
record.note: The title is so given in the preface. Hitti 1713, has: al-Ikhtiyār fī sharḥ al-Mukhtār.
The division of the volumes is the same as in India Office, 238.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharraʻa la-nā dīnan qawīman, wa-hdānā ilayhi ṣirāṭan mustaqīman ... wa-baʻd, fa-kuntu jamaʻtu fī ʻunfuwān shabābī mukhtaṣaran fī al-fiqh li-baʻḍ al-mubtadiʼīn min aṣḥābī wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Mukhtār lil-fatwá ..."
Old (15th century?) naskhī; leaves 261-263 in a somewhat later hand.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.

record.title: 880-02 al-Madkhal ilá tanmiyat al-aʻmāl bi-taḥsīn al-nīyāt wa-al-tanbīh ʻalá baʻḍ al-bidaʻ wa-al-ʻawāʼid allatī untuḥilat wa-bayān shanāʻatihā wa-qubḥihā : al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-juzʼ al-thānī / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAbdarī. -- 1454.
record.note: Title as given in preface. Known as: Mudkhal al-sharʻ al-sharīf (Brockelmann, II, 83); the reading of the first word of the title varies: al-madkhal (Hitti), and mudkhil (Ahlwardt).
Incipit of volume II same as in Ahlwardt 3519.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAbdarī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-dawām, al-bāqī baʻda fanāʼ al-anām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; some leaves in volume II supplied by a modern Maghribī hand.
Volume I partially worm eaten.
Islamic bindings, in brown (volume II paper covered), with flaps.
Colophon: "Sanat 858."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 858 [of the Hijrah = 1454]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām fī masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām fī ʻilm al-fiqh / lil-Ḥillī. -- 1645.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; also known as: Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Allāhumma innī aḥmaduka ḥamdan yaqillu fī intishārihi ḥamd kull ḥāmid, wa-yaḍmaḥillu bi-ishtihārihi jaḥd kull jāḥid ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes in the beginning.

Colophon: "Tammat kitāb 'Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām wa-fī [fī] masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām' ... Furigha min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Sabt, thalāth wa-ʻishrīn min Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 1055."

Translation of the colophon: ""The book of 'Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām fī masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām' is completed ... The copy of this book was written on the 23rd of the glorious month of Shaʻbān, year 1055 [of the Hijrah = 14 October 1645]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Amn al-wāfī wa-al-tartīb al-kāfī lil-sirr al-khafī / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAzzūz al-Marrākushī al-Sūsī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Faṣl fī al-aṣl alladhī lā budda minhu li-ṭālib ʻilm kharq al-ʻādāt. Iʻlam, arshadanā Allāh wa-īyāka, inna al-aṣl fī kharq al-ʻādāt huwa al-ʻilm bi-al-Ism al-Aʻẓam ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 Majmūʻ al-masāʼil / al-Karakī. -- 1568.
record.note: Title also given in the manuscript (leaf 1 recto) as: Kitāb fatāwá raḥmat Allāh ʻalá muʼallifih; and (leaf 2 recto): Fatāwá al-Fayḍīyah.
The work might not be the same as the Fayḍ mentioned in Brockelmann, II, 83, which has an entirely different incipit; cf. Cairo catalog, III, 98.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā aʻṭānā min ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-ʻarrafanā maʻrifat mā lam naʻlam, wa-huwa al-Malik al-ʻAllām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
In manuscript inside front cover: "S[amuel]. Farman, Damascus, January 1833" (the same is written also in Arabic).
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Najaza al-kitāb ... fī thānī ʻasharī Shawwāl, sanat khams wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, ʻalá yad ... Juwaylī ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Ghumrī al-Shāfiʻī nazīl madīnat Bilbīs min bilād al-Sharqīyah bi-al-aʻmāl al-Miṣrīyah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... on 12 Shawwāl, the year 975 [of the Hijrah = 20 April 1568], by the hand of ... Juwaylī ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Ghumrī al-Shāfiʻī, a resident of the city of Bilbīs, in the region of al-Sahrqīyah, Egypt ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Mirʼāt al-uṣūl / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭarasūsī. -- 1751 or 1752.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf.
On leaf 203 verso, the author's name (doctored?) is given as Aḥmad al-Tarasūsī.
The month Ṣafar (colophon) fell in that year (A.H. 1165) in December/January.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Dalla bi-lāmay al-jins wa-al-mulk ʻalá ikhtiṣāṣ al-maḥāmid kullihā taḥqīqan ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī Qusṭanṭinīyah al-maḥmīyah, fī shahr al-Ṣafar al-khayr, fī sanat khams wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad ... al-sākin fī Madrasat al-Bāyazīd ... al-Sayyid Muḥammad Nūr al-Dīn al-Munīr ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was written ... in protected Qusṭanṭinīyah [Constantinople], during the month of Ṣafar al-khayr, the year 1165 [of the Hijrah = December 1751/January 1752], by the hand of ... the resident at Madrasat al-Bāyazīd ... al-Sayyid Muḥammad Nūr al-Dīn al-Munīr ..."

record.title: 880-03 Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ / Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title on leaf 1 recto given as: Nūr al-īḍāḥ fī ḥayāt al-arwāḥ.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla ... Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī innahu qad iltamasa minnī baʻḍ al-akhillāʼ ... an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-ʻibādāt ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī.
On slip pasted inside back cover: "Stevens 15/2/16."
Colophon: "Qad katabahu ... Maḥmūd al-Mullā Ḥasan al-Mullā ʻAbd Allāh al-Mullā ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Maḥmūd al-Mullā Ḥasan al-Mullā ʻAbd Allāh al-Mullā ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah fī sharḥ al-Manẓūmah al-Raḥbīyah / ʻAbd Allāh al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1701.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... ʻAbd Allāh al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī al-Faraḍī al-Khaṭīb: Qad saʼalanī waladī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ... an ashraḥa al-Manẓūmah al-Raḥbīyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... laylat al-Thalāthah, laylat ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Jumādá al-Awwal ... sanat thalāthat ʻashar wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Ḥusaynī al-ʻAbbāsī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Tuesday night, the night of the 22nd of the month of Jumādá al-Awwal ... the year 1113 [of the Hijrah = 25 October 1701], by the hand of al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Ḥusaynī al-ʻAbbāsī ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī. -- 1651.
record.note: Title as given in preface. On title page: Kitāb Kanz al-daqāʼiq ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻilm fī al-aʻṣārī [al-aʻṣār] wa-aʻlā ḥizbahu fī al-amṣār ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black, fully vocalized.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.
Colophon: "Faragh min kitābatihi ... Yūsuf ibn Sulaymān ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥanafī, yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, sādis ʻishrīn shahr Jumādá al-Awwal ... sanat aḥad wa-sittīn baʻda al-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed by ... Yūsuf ibn Sulaymān ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥanafī, on Wednesday, the 26th of the month of Jumādá al-Awwal ... year 1061 [of the Hijrah = 17 May 1651] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻilm fī al-aʻṣār ʻalá [wa-aʻlá] ḥizbahu fī al-amṣār ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Colophon (folio 135a): The colophon is obscure.

record.title: 880-02 Qayd al-jāmiʻ / Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad al-Mahfanī. -- 1808.
record.note: Also known as: Arkān al-nikāḥ (Brockelmann, S II, p. 628, taken from Ahlwardt, 4681, where it is made up).
The author is a Javanese, and is presumably of the Shafiʻi persuasion (cf. Brockelmann, II, 422).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-Dayyān ... Qāla ... Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad al-Mahfanī ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aḥibbāʼī ... an uṣannifa lahum kitāban mukhtaṣaran nāfiʻan fī arkān al-nikāḥ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb, taʼrīkh yawm al-Khamīs, al-khāmis min shahr Jumād al-Awwal, min sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn baʻd al-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed on Thursday, 5 Jumād al-Awwal of the year 1223 [of the Hijrah = 29 June 1808]."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ḥabīb bi-sharḥ naẓm Ghāyat al-taqrīb : al-niṣf al-thānī / lil-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Ḥijāzī ibn Badīr al-Fashnī. -- 1808.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā kitāb al-niṣf al-thānī min Tuḥfat al-ḥabīb bi-sharḥ naẓm Ghāyat al-taqrīb, lil-Shaykh ... Aḥmad ibn Ḥijāzī ibn Badīr al-Fashnī ... Kitāb al-farāʼiḍ. Hiya jamʻ farīḍah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Part 1 wanting.
1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi ḍaḥwat yawm al-Jumʻah, al-rābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn, min shahr Rajab, fī taʼrīkh alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thalāthah wa-ʻishrīn ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Friday morning, the 24th of the month of Rajab, of the year 1223 [of the Hijrah = 15 September 1808] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādh al-mujtahidīn : al-muqaddimah / lil-Ḥasan ibn Zayn al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutaʻālī fī ʻizz jalālihi ʻan maʻārij al-afhām, fa-lā yuḥīṭu li-kunhi [bi-kunhihi, ṣaḥḥ] al-ʻārifūn ..."
Several modern (19th century) hands, in nastaʻlīq and naskhī.
Volume II (consists of 4 qisms) is wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1748.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-R̄aḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Qāla ... Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyāʼ al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāhu min al-anām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma ... fī yawm al-Aḥad ... fī sharḥ [sharkh] Ṣafar ... sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-wāḥid wa-sittīn ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed ... on Sunday ... the beginning of Ṣafar ... the year 1161 [of the Hijrah = 24 January 1748] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻlīqāt ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Jurjānī / Ḥusayn al-Ḥusaynī al-Khalkhālī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on fly-leaf. In incipit: Taʻlīqāt ʻalá al-Ḥāshiyah sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar.
Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawallahat al-afhām fī kibriyāʼ dhātih wa-taḥayyarat al-awhām fī ʻaẓamat ṣifātih ..."
Modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-nuskhah al-musammá bi-al-Khalkhālī ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥājjī ʻAlī al-Ruhāwī, fī Qalʻat Āmid, fī Madrasat al-Khubayrīyah ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy, titled al-Khalkhālī, was completed by the hand of ... Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥājjī ʻAlī al-Ruhāwī, at Qalʻat Āmid, in Madrasat al-Khubayrīyah ..."

record.title: 880-02 Niʻma al-zād li-yawm al-maʻād / Muḥammad Ṭāhā ibn ... Mahdī Najaf. -- 1891.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad Ṭāhā ibn ... Mahdī Najaf [al-Najafī]: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an umlī lahum risālah fī al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām ..."
Fair naskhī; leaf 21 supplied by a later hand.
Colophon: "Tammat ʻalá yad al-aqall Sharīf ibn Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ṭurayḥī, sanat al-thalāth miʼah wa-al-thamān baʻda al-alf, yawm al-Aḥd, sābiʻ ʻishrīn [ʻashar (?)] Ramaḍān ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the hand of the least Sharīf ibn Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ṭurayḥī, on Sunday, 27 [17 (?)] Ramaḍān, the year 1308 [of the Hijrah = 26 April 1891] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār / taʼlīf ... Abī Shujāʻ. -- 1750 or 1751.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣdiqāʼ ... an aʻmala mukhtaṣaran fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaves 1-2 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār ... bi-khaṭṭ al-faqīr ʻAlī ibn Bakrī, sanat 1264."
Translation of the colophon: "Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār is completed ... in the handwriting of the poor ʻAli ibn Bakrī, in the year 1264 [of the Hijrah = 1751/1752]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah fī sharḥ al-Manẓūmah al-Raḥbīyah / ʻAbd Allāh al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... ʻAbd Allāh al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī ... Qad saʼalanī waladī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ... an ashraḥa al-Manẓūmah al-Raḥbīyah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad kātibihi li-nafsihi ... Ibrāhīm ibn Naṣṣār al-Ṭayrāwī al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed ... by the hand of its copyist for himself ... Ibrāhīm ibn Naṣṣār al-Ṭayrāwī al-Shāfiʻī ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī. -- 1720 or 1721.
record.note: Title as given on title page; in incipit: Sharḥ laṭīf mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Muqaddimah al-Raḥbīyah fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ.
Brockelmann attributed the authorship to Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, the grandson (d. 1527); cf. Brockelmann, I, 391; II, 357.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Sharḥ laṭīf mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Muqaddimah al-Raḥbīyah fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Occasional marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh yawm al-Khamīs, ʻalá yad kātibihi li-nafsihi ... Muḥammad al-ʻAqrabānī, sanat 1133 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed on Thursday, by the hand of its copyist for himself ... Muḥammad al-ʻAqrabānī, the year 1133 [of the Hijrah = 1720/1721] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Ḥawāshī ʻalá al-Muqaddimah al-Raḥbīyah wa-ʻalá sharḥihā / taʼlīf al-shaykh ... Ibrāhīm ibn ... Muḥammad al-Baramāwī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The author's surname given as al-Birmāwī in Brockelmann and Berlin catalog.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manna ʻalá al-ʻulamāʼ min jazīl faḍlih al-fāʼiḍ, wa-arshadahum ilá bayān ṭuruq al-saná [al-sunan, ṣaḥḥ] wa-al-farāʼiḍ ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah / al-Jurjānī. -- 1439.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover. In manuscript on fly-leaf in a later hand: Kitāb sharḥ Farāʼiḍ lil-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Rashīd al-Sajāwandī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Taʻallamū al-farāʼiḍ ... fa-innahā niṣf al-ʻilm, hākadhā riwāyat al-fuqahāʼ, fa-al-farāʼiḍ jamʻ farīḍah ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-qad tayassara al-farāgh min al-kitābah li-yawmayn maḍayā min awwal Ākhir al-Rabīʻayn, sanat 843, ʻalá yaday ... Mīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Qummī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The writing of the copy was facilitated two days having passed from Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 843 [of the Hijrah = 21 September 1439], by the hand of ... Mīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Qummī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Takmīl fī sharḥ Manẓūmat al-Farāʼiḍ / Masʻūd ibn Muḥammad al-Ghujduwānī. -- 1438.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻadda li-warathat jannat al-naʻīm min qism marāḍīhi naṣīban maʻrūḍan ..."
Fair naskhī.
Some leaves near the end appear to be bound out of order.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wa-qad istarāḥa al-qalam ʻan al-taḥrīr waqt ʻaṣr yawm al-Khamīs, akhir Awwal al-Rabīʻayn, ḥijjat ithnatayn wa-arbaʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah ... lil-ʻabd al-faqīr ... Mīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qummī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The pen rested from writing on the afternoon of Thursday, the end of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, year 842 [of the Hijrah = 27 September 1438] ... by the poor servant ... Mīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qummī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-Bazzāzīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Kardarī. -- 1714.
record.note: Legal decisions.
Alternate title: al-Jāmiʻ al-wajīz.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu li-man daʻā ilá Dār al-Salām bi-Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, shāriʻ aḥkām al-Islām, nāhij nahj al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, elaborately gilt, with flap; in slip-case.
Slipcase housed in Box 2.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Shaʻbān ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Barakāt ibn Kamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Shihābī Aḥmad, al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Kayyāl ... Qad ittafaqa al-farāgh min taḥrīrihi fī ghurrat nahār al-Jumʻah al-muʻaẓẓam, li-thamān ʻashrah khalawna min shahr Ramaḍān ... sanat sitt wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ... wa-dhālika bi-madīnat Dimashq ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Shaʻbān ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Barakāt ibn Kamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Shihābī Aḥmad, known as Ibn al-Kayyāl ... It was concluded on the morning of glorious Friday; eighteen days having passed from the month of Ramaḍān ... the year 1126 [of the Hijrah = 28 September 1714] ... in the city of Damascus ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍah al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah : al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-juzʼ al-thānī / Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī al-ʻĀmilī. -- 1680.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥ ṣudūranā bi-lumʻah min sharāʼiʻ al-Islām kāfiyah fī bayān al-khiṭāb ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
