Colophon: "Wa-faragha min taʻlīqihi al-faqīr ... Niẓām al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad Shafīʻ, fī Dār al-Salṭanah Iṣfahān, fī Madrasat al-Bāqirīyah, laylat al-Jumʻah, thāmin shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1091, iḥdá wa-tisʻīn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed by the poor ... Niẓām al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad Shafīʻ, in Dār al-Salṭanah Iṣfahān, at Madrasat al-Bāqirīyah, on Friday night, 8 Muḥarram al-ḥarām, year 1091 [of the Hijrah = 9 February 1680] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Durar al-ḥukkām fī sharḥ Ghurar al-aḥkām / Muḥammad Mullā Khusraw. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥkama aḥkām al-sharʻ al-qawīm bi-muḥkam Kitābihi, wa-aʻlá aʻlām al-dīn al-mustaqīm bi-muʻaẓẓam khiṭābihi ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-Zaynīyah / Zayn al-Dīn ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Nujaym. -- 1599.
record.note: Title so given in a later hand. Also known as: al-Rasāʼil al-Zaynīyah.
Incipit supplied by a later hand, and apparently not genuine; for the correct incipit see Ahlwardt 4831.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ māʼan ṭahūran, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah nūran ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaf 1 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā fī yawm al-Jumaʻah, thānī ʻishrīn shahr Ramaḍān ... sanat 1007 [the two zeros of 1007 are writtn above each other (!)] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Friday, 22 Ramaḍān ... the year 1007 [of the Hijrah = 18th April 1599 (the two zeros of 1007 are writtn above each other!)] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Tarjīḥ al-bayyināt. -- 1879.
record.note: Not identical with any work with this title in Ahlwardt; presumably also not Maḥmūd ibn Ḥamzah al-Dimashqī's work (Brockelmann, S II, p. 775; cf. another work with same title, S II, p. 973, no. 11).
Folio 14a is headed: "Hādhihi fahrasat Mīzān al-mutadāʻiyīn."

Incipit of the first tract: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bayyinat al-wafāʼ awlá min bayyinat al-bātt [al-thabāt (?)], wa-bayyinat al-kurh awlá min bayyinat al-ṭawʻ, wa-bayyinat al-barāʼah awlá min bayyinat al-iqrār ..."

Incipit of the second tract (leaf 40): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá nawālih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-li-nuqaddim amām al-kalām mā lil-muddaʻá ʻalayhi min al-aqsām ... al-Awwal: Man huwa muddaʻá ʻalayhi ẓāhiran wa-ḥaqīqatan wa-ṣūratn wa-maʻnan ..."
Modern cursive hand.
Colophon: "Tamma naskh hādhā al-kitāb ... sanat 1879."
Translation of the colophon: "This book was copied in ... the year 1879."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah / Ibn Nujaym. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title in colophon as: Kitāb al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻam ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-fiqh ashraf al-ʻulūm qadran ..."
Modern (18th century?) cursive hand.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Dhakhīrat al-ʻuqbá fī sharḥ Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah al-ʻuẓmá / Yūsuf ibn Junayd al-Tūqātī. -- 1605.
record.note: Cursive hand, in red and black.
Partially worm eaten.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb ... alladhī summiya al-Dhakhirah [Dhakhīrat] al-ʻuqbá fī sharḥ Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah al-ʻuẓmá, ʻalá yad ... Mūsá [?] ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Khalīl ... yawm al-Sabt al-thālith ʻashar min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻd [al-Qaʻdah], fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, fī tārikh sanat thalāth ʻashar [wa-]alf. 1013."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book ... titled 'Dhakhīrat] al-ʻuqbá fī sharḥ Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah al-ʻuẓmá' ... was completed by the hand of ... Mūsá [?] ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Khalīl ... on Saturday morning, 13 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, the year 1013 [of the Hijrah = 2 April 1605]."

record.title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī. -- 1644.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-Dīn ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black.
Marginalia in the beginning.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm Jumʻah, fī awwal shahr Jumād al-Ākhir ... sanat arbaʻah wa-khamsīn wa-alf, ʻalá yad ... al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn Sayyid Ḥasan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on Friday, the beginning of the month of Jumād al-Ākhir ... the year 1054 [of the Hijrah = 5 August 1644], by the hand of ... al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn Sayyid Ḥasan ..."

record.title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur : al-niṣf al-awwal / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī. -- 1830 or 1831.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ..."
Fair Yamenite hand, in red, green, and black.
On slip pasted inside back cover: "Ste[vens]."
Islamic binding, paper covered.
Colophon: "Intahá ... al-niṣf al-awwal, ʻām alf wa-sittīn wa-sittwa-arbaʻīn [wa-sitt wa-arbaʻīn]. 1246 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed is ... the first half, the year 1246 [of the Hijrah = 1830/1831]."

record.title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī. -- 1566.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black; ʻunwān in blue and gold on leaf 1 verso.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red.
Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī awākhir Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat arbaʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... at the end of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 974 [or the Hijrah = 23 November 1566]."

record.title: 880-02 Durar al-ḥukkām fī sharḥ Ghurar al-aḥkām / Muḥammad Mullā Khusraw. -- [17--?].
record.note: Cursive modern (18th century?) hand, in red and black.
Occasional marginalia.
Partially worm eaten.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 al-Durr al-thamīn wa-al-mawrid al-muʻīn fī sharḥ al-Murshid al-muʻīn ʻalá al-ḍarūrī min ʻulūm al-dīn / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Fāsī ... al-shahīr bi-Mayyārah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh murshid hādhihi al-ummah limā ikhtāra la-hā min al-īmān wa-al-Islām sharʻatan ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghrībī hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah / al-Maḥbūbī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdu man jaʻala al-ʻilm ajalla al-mawāhib al-hanīyah wa-asnāhā, wa-aʻlá al-marātib al-sanīyah wa-asmāhā ..."
Calligraphic modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, in red, flap missing.

record.title: 880-02 Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-Imdād al-fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār ibn ʻAlī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī. -- 1850.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa khulāṣat ʻibādih bi-wirāthat ṣafwatih [ṣafwat, ṣaḥḥ] khayr ʻibādih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma naskh hādhā al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Muḥammad ibn Sharīf al-Ḥillī al-Bānī nisbatan ... wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, li-sanat sitt wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was copied ... by the hand of its copyist ... Muḥammad ibn Sharīf al-Ḥillī al-Bānī nisbatan ... on Wednesday, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1266 [of the Hijrah = 20 (?) February 1850] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb : al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-juzʼ al-thānī / taʼlīf ... Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [before 1856].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyāʼ al-Anṣārī: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu ikhtaṣartu Minhāj al-ṭālibīn ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Loose in Islamic bindings, in brown, with flaps.
Colophon: "Tammat kitābat ... Sharḥ al-Manhaj ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn ... Jalāl ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The writing of ... Sharḥ al-Manhaj was completed by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ... Jalāl ..."

record.title: [al-Lāmīyah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: The fly leaves of the entire majmūʻah (1v and 162r) are a commentary on a poem rhyming in "ā"; the authors of both commentary and poem are unidentified.
Unbound.
No. 1 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Qaṣīdat al-anṣār. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 2 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Duʻāʾ]. -- [17--?].
record.note: With a chart displaying combinations of mystical numbers.
Unbound.
No. 3 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Iʻlam bi-annahu qad tabayyana lī khilāf mā ẓannantuhu minka min al-wafāʾ wa-injāz al-waʻd]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 4 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Followed by 1 page of notes.
Unbound.
No. 5 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Adawāt al-ḥisāb. -- [17--?].
record.note: Interlinear notations.
Followed by a chart.
Unbound.
No. 6 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qāla Ibn al-Wardī]. -- [17--?].
record.note: The identity of the author, mentioned in the manuscript as Ibn al-Wardī, is uncertain.
Followed by 1 leaf with a chart showing combinations of mystical letters and numbers.
Unbound.
Leaf 23 recto blank.
No. 7 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Fāʾidat ṭalab faras ʻinda al-sulṭān yajiduhu sarīʻan]. -- [17--?].
record.note: With chart of mystical letters.
Unbound.
Verso blank.
No. 8 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Koran. -- [17--?].
record.note: North African hand; fully-vocalized in red.
Unbound.
No. 9 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣāʾid]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Followed by 1 leaf of prayers.
Unbound.
No. 10 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Qudūrī / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī. -- [1495].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; in manuscript: hādhā Kitāb al-Qudūrī.
Ahlwardt 4452 has different explicit.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ... fa-faraḍa al-ṭahārah, ghasl al-aʻḍāʼ al-thalāthah ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black, fully vocalized; leaves 1-12 supplied in a later hand.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Qudūrī ... wa-faragha min kitābatihi ... ʼAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan [?] ... al-Ḥanafī, wa-dhālika bi-tārīkh nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, rābiʻ shahr Allāh al-Muḥarram ... sanat wāḥid [?] wa-tisʻimiʼah [?] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book of al-Qudūrī is completed ... the copy was completed by ... ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan [?] ... al-Ḥanafī, on Tuesday, the fourth of the month of God al-Muḥarram ... the year one [?] and nine hundred [?] [0901 (?) of the Hijrah = 3 October 1495] ..."

record.title: Fāʾidat waṣīyat al-Nabī. -- 1880.
record.note: The Sufi ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī is also mentioned (34r).
Charts of combinations of mystical letters and numbers.
Unbound.
No. 11 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī ʻilm al-uṣūl / taʼlīf al-shaykh ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī. -- 1736.
record.note: Known as: al-Badr al-ṭāliʻ fī ḥall Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih ... Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ min sharḥ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Arbaʻā al-mubārak, thālith ʻashar Jumādá Awwal, sanat tisʻah wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on blessed Wednesday, 13 Jumādá Awwal, the year 1149 [of the Hijrah = 19 September 1736]."

record.title: Kitāb al-shihāb fī al-ḥikam wa-al-ādāb wa-al-waṣāyā. -- [17--?].
record.note: Brockelmann gives title as: Shihāb al-akhbār fī al-ḥikam wa-al-amthāl wa-al-ādāb min al-aḥādīth al-marwīyah ʻan al-rasūl al-mukhtār.
North African hand.
Followed by 1 page of notes.
Unbound.
No. 12 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fully vocalized.
Marginalia.
Unbound.
No. 13 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Occasional marginalia and interlinear notations.
Loose leaves, possibly out of order.
No. 14 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 15 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: The metre is indicated at the beginning as fiʻlun fiʻlun mutafāʻilun, but fits no classical norms.
Unbound.
No. 16 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Masʾalah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Unbound.
No. 17 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Farāʾiḍ]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 18 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [al-Lāmīyah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Written in red ink.
Unbound.
No. 19 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Shurūṭ al-ṣalāh]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Preceded and followed by 1 page of notes.
Unbound.
No. 20 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ fī taḥrīr Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Sharīf al-Maqdisī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1854.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Sharīf al-Maqdisī al-Shāfiʻī ... Aḥmadu Allāh ʻalá mā manaḥa lī min al-ihtidāʼ bi-anwār uṣūl al-Sharīʻah ..."
Cursive hand, in red, blue, and black.
Islamic binding, in red.

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah ... ʻalá yad ... Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban wa-al-Naqshabandī ṭarīqatan ... wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Sabt, shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1271."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... by the hand of ... Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban wa-al-Naqshabandī ṭarīqatan ... on Saturday, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1271 [of the Hijrah = 25 November 1854]."

record.title: [Khamsūn ʻaqāʾid]. -- [17--?].
record.note: In various North African hands.
No. 21 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn / ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz. -- [1413].
record.note: Title appears on front cover in a modern hand.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man lā yaḥūṭ kamālahu [kamāl, ṣaḥḥ] kamālihi niṭāq waṣf al-aṣiḥḥāʼ, wa-lā yanūṭ bi-idrāk idrākihi afkār fuḥūl al-fuḍalāʼ ..."
Cursive hand.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red, flap missing.

Colophon: "Min al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf ... ibn [erasure] Yaʻqūb ibn Sayyidī Amīrkhān al-Qaṭmūnī ... fī awākhir al-shahr al-mubārak Dhī al-Ḥijjajh, yawm al-Jumʻah, waqt al-ʻaṣri, tārīkh sanat 8 kw 15 [!]."

Translation of the colophon: "By the feable servant ... ibn [erasure] Yaʻqūb ibn Sayyidī Amīrkhān al-Qaṭmūnī ... at the end of the blessed month of Dhī al-Ḥijjajh, on Friday, in the afternoon, the year 8 kw 15 (!) [of the Hijrah = 9 April 1413]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tawḍīḥ fī ḥall ghawāmiḍ al-Tanqīḥ / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah. -- 1678.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... ḥamidan lillāh awwalan wa-thāniyan, wa-li-ʻinān al-thanāʼ ilayhi thāniyan, wa-ʻalá afḍal rusilihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi muṣalliyan ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Qad tammat al-kitāb fī shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, fī laylat al-Sabt, baʻda al-ʻishāʼayn, fī arbaʻ ʻashar fī al-shahr, wa-khams ʻashar min al-arbaʻīn, fī sanat thamān wa-thamānīn wa-alf."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed in the month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, on Saturday night, after the two evening prayers, on the 14th day of the month, and the 15th day of the 'arbaʻīn' [i.e. the winter forty cold days], of the year 1088 [of the Hijrah = 8 January 1678]."

record.title: 880-02 Bughyat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm / Muḥammad Ḥusayn ibn ... Hāshim. -- 1871 or 1872.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad Ḥusayn ibn ... Hāshim, rh, innahu qad iltamasanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān al-kirām taḥrīr risālah fī masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, khuṣūṣan min al-ṭahārah wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣiyām ..."
Fair naskhī.
Occasional marginalia.
Colophon: "Tammat 1288."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. 1288 [of the Hijrah = 1871/1872]."

record.title: 880-03 Uṣūl al-fiqh / Isḥāq ibn Ibrāhīm al-Shāshī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from the preface; also known as: Kitāb al-Uṣūl, or: Uṣūl al-Shāshī (Brockelmann, I, 174).
Compared with the Delhi edition of 1848.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlá manzilat al-muʼminīn bi-karīm khiṭābih, wa-rafaʻa darajat al-ʻālimīn bi-maʻānī Kitābih ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, in yellow.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-kitāb min uṣūl al-fiqh al-musammá bi-Shāshī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This book on the principles of fiqh (Islamic law), titled Shāshī [al-Shāshī], is completed ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nāsikh wa-al-mansūkh / Abū ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAlī al-Isfarāʼīnī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The identification is not quite certain, and the author's name in the incipit does not quite agree with Brockelmann, S II, p. 205 (Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Isfarāyīnī, 1271-1346).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mustaḥiqq al-ḥamd li-dhātihi wa-ṣifātihi ... Qāla ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAlī al-Isfarāʼinī ... wa-iʻlam inna man arāda an yatakallama fī maʻānī Kitāb Allāh taʻālá, baʻda an yaʻrifahā, fa-yajibu ʻalayhi an yaʻrifa al-nāsikh wa-al-mansūkh ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Occasional marginalia.
Islamic binding, in yellow.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥaqāʼiq al-Manẓūmah / Maḥmūd ibn Dāʼūd al-Luʼluʼī al-Afshanjī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Ziriklī (7: 182) and Kaḥḥālah (12:195) al-Ifsinjī, Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad ibn Dāwūd al-Ifsinjī al-Luʼluʼī al-Bukhārī, Abū al-Maḥāmid, author of Ḥaqāʼiq al-Manẓūmah (Manẓūmat al-khilāfīyat of al-Nasafi)̄, 627-671/1230-1272.
Title given in the incipit as: Ḥaqāʼiq al-Manẓūmah; also konwn as: Ḥuṣūl al-maʼmūl (Brockelmann, I, 428).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Aḥad bi-dhātihi, al-Wāḥid fī ṣifātih, al-wāsiʻ bi-ḥusn raʼfatihi, [al-ḥasan ?] bi-wisʻ raḥmatih ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; a few leaves supplied by a later hand.
Occasional marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: 880-02 Fiqh / Ḥasan ibn Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Darāzī al-Baḥrānī. -- 1809.
record.note: Title on leaf 1 recto in a later hand: Fiqh [al-]Shaykh Ḥasan [al-]Baḥrānī.
For the author, see Kaḥḥālah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faṭara ʻibādahu ʻalá maʻrifatihi wa-hadāhum ilá al-subul al-wāḍiḥah wa-al-mūṣilah ilá jannatih ..."
Coarse hand, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Qad wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-muqaddimah ... ghadāt yawm al-sādis wa-al-ʻashr min shahr Rabīʻ al-Mawlid, min al-sanah 1224, ʻalá yad kātibihā wa-mālikihā ... Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Mahdī al-Baḥrānī aṣlan wamaskanan fī al-Khanāzīr ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this introduction was completed ... on the morning of the 16th day of the month of Rabīʻ al-Mawlid, of the year 1224 [of the Hijrah = 1 May 1809], by the hand of its copyist and owner ... Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Mahdī al-Baḥrānī aṣlan, whose residence is at al-Khanāzīr ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Muwaṭṭaʼ / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Zurqānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand. Known as: Sharḥ al-Zurqānī ʻalá Muwaṭṭaʼ al-Imām Mālik.
Compared with the printed edition of 1863.
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Volumes II and III wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl / al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ darajāt al-ʻārifīn ilá dhurwat al-ʻalāʼ, wa-muhbiṭ manāzil [al-jā]hilīn ilá asfal darak al-saflāʼ ..."
Several fairly modern (18th century?) hands, in red and black.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-01 Fatwá al-mulākhiṣ. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb al-Ṣalāt [al-ṣalāh]. Dhukira fī al-Qunyah: Ikhtalafū fī al-nīyah, qāla baʻḍuhum tajūzu ilá al-taʻawwudh, wa-qāla baʻḍuhum tajūzu ilá al-rukūʻ ..."
19th century coarse angular hand.
The paper seems to be watermarked 1800.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb min yad al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr Yūsuf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the hand of the wretched poor Yūsuf ..."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb / li-Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Compared with Arabic MSS 158; the text of leaf 1 recto corresponds to that of leaf 66 recto.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : al-niṣf al-thānī / lil-Maḥallī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Text of leaf 1 recto corresponds to leaf 191 recto of Ms. Landberg 675. Explicit same as in Ahlwardt 4538.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
The first half wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Ḥilyat al-abrār wa-shiʻār al-akhyār / Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī. -- [13--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title from: Brockelmann, I, 397. In manuscript inside front cover in a modern hand: Ḥilyat al-abrār lil-Nawawī.
The alternate title al-Adhkār [al-Nawawīyah] occurs on leaf 86 recto, upper left corner.
The composition date, A.H. 667, is miswritten 767 in the colophon.
Old (14th century) naskhī. Many leaves supplied by later hands, principally by the same hand as that of the colophon-leaf.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī muntaṣaf shahr al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat thamānīn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed in the middle of the sacred month of al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1080 [of the Hijrah = 6 April 1670] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Badr al-ṭāliʻ fī ḥall Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī. -- [1630].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 89. In manuscript on leaf 1 recto in a modern hand: al-Badr al-ṭāliʻ lil-Maḥallī.
Text of leaf 1 recto corresponds to that of leaf 7 verso (bottom) of Arabic MSS 182.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose leaves.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb ... yawm al-Khamīs, thālith shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ... sanat arbaʻīn [1040 (?)], ʻalá yad ... Saʻīd ibn Qābil, al-shahīr bi-al-Najdī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed ... on Thursday, 3 Rabīʻ al-Awwal ... year forty [1040 (?) of the Hijrah = 10 October 1630], by the hand of ... Saʻīd ibn Qābil, known as al-Najdī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Bidāyat al-hidāyah / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥurr. -- 1719.
record.note: Beginning missing.
The author's name appears in the explicit, leaf 116 recto-verso.
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, on variously colored paper.
Interlinear and marginal notes.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat al-risālah al-mawsūmah bi-Bidāyat al-hidāyah fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Ūlá [al-Awwal], fī yawm al-Jumʻah, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-iḥdá [wa]-thalāthīn ... kātibuhu Saʻīd."

Translation of the colophon: "The epistle titled Bidāyat al-hidāyah was completed in the month of Rabīʻ al-Ūlá [al-Awwal], on Friday, year 1131 [of the Hijrah = 27 January 1719] ... its copyist is Saʻīd."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah wajīzah fī farḍ al-ṣalāh. -- 1719.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Risālah wa-jīzah fī farḍ al-ṣalāh, ijābatan li-iltimās man ṭāʻatuhu ḥatm ..."
Calligraphic naskhī.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat al-risālah ... fī tārikh haftum shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1131."
Translation of the colophon: "The epistle was completed ... on the 7th of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1131 [of the Hijrah = 27 February 1719)."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mukhtaṣar / Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Mālikī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Title from: Brockelmann, II, 84.
Compared in parts with the lithographed edition of 1900.
Compared with Ahlwardt 4599, the last chapter heading is found on leaf 316 recto, so that probably only one or two leaves are missing.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Mālikī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan yuwāfī mā tazāyada min al-niʻam ..."
Two coarse Maghribī hands, fairly modern (18th century?).
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Loose leaves.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-daqāʼiq wa-al-ghawāmiḍ fī sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ / Badīʻ al-Dīn. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title and the author's name given by a modern hand on the cover (apparently taken from Ahlwardt 4707); the incipit has: hādhā kitāb fī sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ fī ḥall al-daqāʼiq wa-al-ghawāmiḍ.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man manna ʻibādahu wa-ʻibādahu [ʻalá ʻibādihi, ṣaḥḥ] bi-irsāl rusulihi wa-hidayat [wa-hidāyat] subulihi ... Hādhā kitāb fī sharḥ al-farāʼiḍ fī ḥall al-daqāʼiq wa-al-ghawāmiḍ ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black; leaf 12 supplied in a later hand.
The explicit differs from the one given by Ahlwardt 4707; perhaps the text of leaf 12 is supplementary, or maybe the leaf does not belong to this tract.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ : al-juzʼ al-thālith wa-al-rābiʻ / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī. -- 1440.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb al-Maghāzī. Ghazwat al-ʻAshīrah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Volumes I and II wanting.

Colophon: "Kamula al-sifr al-rābiʻ min kitāb ... al-Bukhārī ... wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Sabt, li-khams khalawna min Dhī Ḥijjah, sanat thalāth wa-arbaʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah ... wa-katabahu ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad."

Translation of the colophon: "The fourth volume of the book of ... al-Bukhārī ... was completed, on Saturday, five nights having passed from Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 843 [of the Hijrah = 17 May 1440] ... copied by ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : al-jild al-thānī. -- 1719.
record.note: The title appears on the lower edges of the book.
Possibly one of the commentaries listed in Brockelmann II, 441, S II, pp. 655-56.
Apparently not the commentary by Rajab ibn Aḥmad (in Bankipore). For the identification of the matn see Berlin catalog, 8836.
Incipit: "ʻAn Abī Hurayrah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, anna Rasūl Allāh, ʻalayhi al-salām, qāl: al-Ḥayāʼ. Qāla al-Munāwī: al-Ḥayāʼ gharīzī aṣlan ..."
Coarse small nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Occasional marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.
The first half wanting.
Colophon: "Wa-qad ittafaqa ... al-khitām ... fī al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min al-Jumādá al-Ūlá, min sanat wāḥid wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on 25 Jumādá al-Ūlá, the year 1131 [of the Hijrah = 15 April 1719] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr / taʼlīf al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Asyūṭī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Known as: al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr.
Title devised by later hands on title page as: Kitāb al-jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr fī Ḥadīth al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr, and on cover as: Jāmiʻ ṣaghīr fī ʻilm al-Ḥadīth.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha ʻalá raʼs kull miʼat sanah man yujaddidu li-hādhihi al-ummah amr dīnihā ..."
Good fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black. Some leaves, including leaves 1-3, supplied by later hands.
Sporadic marginalia.
In pencil inside front cover: "Bought at Sotheby's 26/7/27 ... "
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr / taʼlīf ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1593.
record.note: Known as: al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha ʻalá raʼs kull miʼat sanah man yujaddidu li-hādhihi al-ummah amr dīnihā ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah qabla al-ẓuhr, yawm al-Thulāth, sādis ʻishrīn Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat aḥad baʻda alf. Wa-katabahā al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān ibn Marʻī ibn Ḥasan al-ʻIrāqī al-Ḥanafī ... Wa-nasakhahu bi-Makkah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on the forenoon of Tuesday, the 26th of the sacred Dhī̄ al-Qaʻdah, year 1001 [of the Hijrah = 24 August 1593]. Copied by the poor Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān ibn Marʻī ibn Ḥasan al-ʻIrāqī al-Ḥanafī ... in Mecca ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mishkāt al-Maṣābīḥ / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Khaṭīb al-Tibrīzī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh naḥmaduhu ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-tamassuk bi-hadyihi lā yastatibbu illā bi-al-iqtifāʼ li-mā ṣadara min mishkātihi ..."
Good fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, red doublure, in striped silk jacket.

record.title: 880-01 Aḥādīth munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād. -- [1738 or 1739].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhihi Aḥādīth munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād, ṣannafahā ṣafī al-wād [al-wadād (?)] muʻtaqid [muʻtaqidan (?)] lil-nuṣḥ wa-al-wādd [wa-al-rasjād (?)], mimmā allafahu Zayn al-Quḍāh, li-wajh Rabb al-ʻIbād ... wa-qad jamaʻtu fīhi Aḥādīth al-Ṣiḥāḥ, maḥdhūfat al-asānīd ... qad jaʻaltuhu abwāb [abwāban], min mathná wa-thulāth wa-rubāʻ. ilá al-ʻasharah bāban ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black.
Crude drawings on the margins.
Colophon: "Sanat 1151 [lil-Hijrah = 1738/1739]."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1151 [of the Hijrah = 1738/1739]."

record.title: Letterbook, 1821-1834.
record.note: Inscribed "Martha W. Cristy" inside front cover.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn / lil-Nawawī. -- [before 1835].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
For the authorship of the explanatory tract see Bankipore catalog, V, no. 279, foll 60a-63, where the incipit of the tract is however different.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, Qayyūm al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn, Mudabbir al-khalāʼiq ajamaʻīn ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-asrār ʻan ḥikam al-ṭuyūr wa-al-azhār / ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī. -- [before 1835].
record.note: Beginning missing.
The title is given in the incipit, leaf 14 verso.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī laylat al-Jumʻah fī al-Ḥaram [Ḥaram] Makkah al-Musharrafah, fī shahr [unfinished]."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Friday night, at the Sanctuary of Noble Mecca, in the month of [unfinished]."

record.title: 880-02 Mufākharat al-layl wa-al-nahār / ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī. -- [before 1835].
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-dhikr al-ḥakīm / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Khashshāb. -- [before 1697].
record.note: This seems to be much shorter than Ms. Landberg 642, but probably the same version as Ahlwardt 452.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī iṭṭalaʻa min āfāq Kitābihi al-ʻAzīz nayyirāt awḍāḥ al-ghurar ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; leaves 107-117 (including colophon-leaf) supplied by a later hand.
Sporadic marginalia.
Loose leaves.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... min yad ... Muṣṭafá ibn Muḥammad ... bi-tārīkh awākhir Rajab al-murjib, sanat thamān wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... by the hand of Muṣṭafá ibn Muḥammad ... at the end of exalted Rajab, the year 1108 [of the Hijrah = 22 February 1697] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-dhikr al-ḥakīm / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Khashshāb. -- 1703.
record.note: Title so given in the incipit; the title-page (leaf 1 recto) has: al-Durr al-naẓīm fī khawāṣṣ al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī iṭṭalaʻa min āfāq Kitābihi al-ʻAzīz nīrān awḍāḥ al-ghurar ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb nahār al-Aḥad, yawm sabʻat ayyām fī shahr Shaʻbān, bayna al-ṣalātayn, fī sanat 1115 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This book was completed on Sunday, 7 Shaʻbān, between the two prayers, in the year 1115 [of the Hijrah = 16 December 1703] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-Masʻadīyah fī ḥall al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah / li ... ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Masʻadī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Apparently a different work from al-Fawāʼid al-Masʻūdīyah by ʻUmar ibn ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Masʻūdī (Brockelmann, S II, p. 274) which is a commentary on another work of Ibn al-Jazarī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa man talā Kitābahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi bi-jazīl al-thawāb ..."
Good modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma fī Rajab 18, sanat 1050."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed on 18 Rajab, year 1050 [of the Hijrah = 3 November 1640]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nāsikh wa-al-mansūkh / Abū al-Qāsim Hibat Allāh ibn Salāmah ibn Naṣr al-Baṣīr al-Baghdādī. -- [1733 or 1734].
record.note: The author's first name is wrongly given as ʻAbd Allāh on title page and in the incipit, and is given correctly on leaves 31 verso and 32 verso.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salāmah ibn Naṣr al-Baṣīr al-Baghdādī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-dīnihi wa-faḍḍalanā bi-mā ʻallamanā min Tanzīlih ..."
Good 18th century naskhī, in green, red, and black; leaf 33 supplied by a later nastaʻlīq hand.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-qiṣāṣ wa-istīfāʼ al-ḥuqūq yawm al-jazāʼ / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah al-Āydīnī. -- 1708 or 1709.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 437, no. 28.
Cairo catalog, VII, 404, no. 47 occupies only two leaves.
Fair nastaʻlīq.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Sanat 1120."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1120 [of the Hijrah = 1708/1709]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-istinjāʼ / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah al-Āydīnī. -- 1708 or 1709.
record.note: Title completed according to Brockelmann, II, 437, no. 26.
Fair nastaʻlīq.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Sanat 1120."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1120 [of the Hijrah = 1708/1709]."

record.title: 880-02 Fī bayān anna dūd al-ṭaʻām ṭāhir / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah. -- 1708 or 1709.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, S II, p. 649, no. 52.
Fair nastaʻlīq.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Sanat 1120."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1120 [of the Hijrah = 1708/1709]."

record.title: 880-01 Ādāb takwīr al-ʻimāmah. -- 1731 or 1732.
record.note: Fair nastaʻlīq.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Fīrruh ibn Khalaf ibn Aḥmad al-Ruʻaynī al-Shāṭibī. -- 1389.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover as: Ḥirz al-amānī; completed here according to Brockelmann, I, 409. Also on title page in a later hand: Kitāb al-Shāṭibīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-bismillāhi fī al-naẓmi awwalan // tabāraka raḥmānan raḥīman wa-mawʼilā ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-qad furigha min taswīd naskhihi fī ākhir ʻushr shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat aḥad wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah, ʻalá yad ... Ismāʻīl ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Sālibī, aḥad khuddām al-Ṣakhrah al-Sharīfah."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed during the last tenth of the blessed month of Ramaḍān, the year 791 [of the Hijrah = 28-30 September 1389], by the hand of ... Ismāʻīl ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Sālibī, one of the servants of the Noble Rock."

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl fī asrār al-taʼwīl : al-juzʼ al-thālith / min taṣānīf ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Qāsim. -- [16--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Known as: Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl.
Fairly modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
The colophon dated A.H. 691 is presumably that of the prototype of this manuscript.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Parts I and II wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl : al-juzʼ al-thānī / lil-Bayḍāwī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover as: Anwār al-tanzīl lil-Bayḍāwī; completed according to Brockelmann, I, 417.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Khyʻṣ. Amāla Abū ʻAmr al-Hāʼ, li-anna alifāt asmāʼ al-tahajjī yāʼāt ..."
Modern (18th century?) coarse hand.
Islamic binding, flap missing.
Volume I wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl : al-juzʼ al-awwal / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻabdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran ..."
Several modern (18th century?) hands, in nastaʻlīq and naskhī.
Extensive marginalia on the first 2 leaves.
Islamic limp binding, in brown.
Volume II wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Tafsīr al-ʻAllāmah al-Qāḍī Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Bayḍāwī : al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ / lil-ʻAllāmah ... al-shahīr bi-Shaykhʹzādah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Sūrat al-Aʻrāf. Qawluhu: Ay huwa Kitāb Allāh ..."
Several modern (19th century) naskhī hands, in red and black.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Tafsīr al-Jalālayn : al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-juzʼ al-thānī / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī wa-Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī. -- 1742.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan li-niʻamih, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih ..."
Three naskhī hands, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma ... bi-tārīkh yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, awāʼil shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat khams wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad ... [erasure] ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥāfiẓ ibn [erasure] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... on blessed Sunday, the beginning of the month of Ṣafar al-khayr, of the year 1155 [of the Hijrah = 8 April 1742], by the hand of ... [erasure] ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥāfiẓ ibn [erasure] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Lubāb al-tafāsīr : niṣf al-kitāb / Abū al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn Ḥamzah ibn Naṣr. -- 1246.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-Qurʼān ghayr muḥdath wa-lā makhlūq, al-khāliq al-rāziq qabla kull makhlūq wa-marzūq ..."
Good naskhī.
Sporadic marginalia.
The second half wanting.
On folio 1a the scribe's prenomen is given as Abū al-ʻAlāʼ.

Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat niṣf kitāb al-tafsīr yawm al-Khamīs, salkha al-Muḥarram, sanat arbaʻ wa-thalāthīn [crossed over] arbaʻīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-baldat Yazd Shahr ... bi-yad ... Ṣāʻid ibn Abī al-Fawāris ibn Mihr [...] ibn al-Ḥasan al-Qaṭrawī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book of the commentary was completed on Thursday, the end of al-Muḥarram, of the year thirty-four [thirty crossed over], of the 644 [of the Hijrah = 21 June 1246], in the town of Yazd Shahr ... by the hand of ... Ṣāʻid ibn Abī al-Fawāris ibn Mihr [...] ibn al-Ḥasan al-Qaṭrawī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Taʼwīlāt al-Qurʼān / li-ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Kāshī. -- [1613].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title supplied by a modern hand.
Two cursive hands.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr al-Taʼwīlāt li-ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Kāshī min yad ... Qāḍīkhān walad Shaykhmalik, muqām baldah-i ḥasanah-i Patnah ... fī yawm al-Jumʻah, dar tārīkh-i nūzdahum shahr-i Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1021 (?)."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of al-Taʼwīlāt of ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Kāshī was completed by the hand of ... Qāḍīkhān walad Shaykhmalik, residing in the beautiful town of Patnah ... on Friday, 19 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, year 1021 (?) [of the Hijrah = 11th January 1613]."

record.title: 880-03 Maʻālim al-tanzīl : al-juzʼ al-ākhir / lil-Baghawī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on title page.
Explicit same as in Ahlwardt 760.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Durar al-aṣdāf fī ḥall ʻuqad al-Kashshāf / lil-Yamanī. -- [15--?].
record.note: The beginning of Sūrah XX (except for the added prefatory words) is the same as in India Office 1095.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mawāhib al-ladunīyah bi-al-minaḥ al-Muḥammadīyah / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Khaṭīb al-Qasṭallānī. -- [before 1714].
record.note: The colophon at end is that of the author.
Explicit same as in Ahlwardt 9592.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa fī samāʼ al-azal shams anwār maʻārif al-nubūwah al-Muḥammadīyah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Shifāʼ fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Qāḍī ʻIyāḍ ṣāḥib al-matn ... Faṣl. Wa-ammā sharaf nasabihi wa-karam baladihi ... al-Sharaf al-qadr al-rafīʻ, wa-al-karam huwa al-jamʻ li-anwāʻ al-khayr ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 al-Aḥādīth fī awṣāf al-Nabī / Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī. -- 1583.
record.note: Title so given in the colophon; known as: Shamāʼil al-Nabī (Berlin catalog), or: Kitāb al-shamāʼil (Brockelmann, Hitti).

Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla ... Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī ... Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Marginalia.
On slip pasted inside back cover: "Stevens' 29/2/16."
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Tammat kitābat al-Aḥādīth fī awṣāf al-Nabī ... fī yawm al-Sabt, ʻishrīn min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ... ʻalá yad Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb ibn ʻUthmān, sākin fī baldat al-Sakn [?] ... Mālikuhu wa-qābiḍuhu Shaykh Ḥusayn ibn Ḥaḍrat Khawājah Muʻīn al-Dīn Jushtī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of al-Aḥādīth fī awṣāf al-Nabī was completed ... on Saturday, the twentieth of the sacred month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 990 [of the Hijrah = 15 January 1583] ... by the hand of Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb ibn ʻUthmān, resident of the town of al-Sakn [?] ... Owned and held by Shaykh Ḥusayn ibn Ḥaḍrat Khawājah Muʻīn al-Dīn Jushtī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-ghummah ʻan jamīʻ al-ummah : al-niṣf al-thānī / lil-Shaʻrānī. -- 1785.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 337. In manuscript, inside front cover, by a modern hand: al-niṣf al-thānī min Kashf al-ghummah lil-Shaʻrānī.
Compared with the printed edition, Cairo, 1864 or 5.

Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-]Raḥīm ... [Kitāb al-bayʻ. Wa-fīhi bayān al-amr bi-al-kas]b wa-ādābih. Kāna Anas ibn Mālik, raḍiya Allāh [ʻanh], yaqūlu: Samiʻtu Rasūl Allāh ... yaqūlu: ʻAllama Allāh ... Ādam ... alf ḥirfah min al-ḥiraf ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
The first half wanting.
Colophon: "Wa-kutibat hādhihi al-nuskhah li-ajl ... ʻĪsá ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭāʼī ... taḥrīran fī yawm al-Jumʻah, fī bīst duvvuhum shahr-i Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1199 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was written for ... ... ʻĪsá ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭāʼī ... dated, Friday, 22 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, year 1199 [of the Hijrah = 4 March 1785] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Futūḥ al-ghayb / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Abī Ṣāliḥ ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jīlī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla wālidī ... Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Abī Ṣāliḥ ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jīlī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn awwalan wa-ākhiran wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 Miftāḥ al-jafr al-jāmiʻ wa-miṣbāḥ al-nūr al-lāmiʻ / Muḥammad ibn Ṭalḥah al-Naṣībī. -- 1739.
record.note: Beginning missing.
The incipit of this manuscript corresponds to leaf 10 recto of Ms. Landberg 517.
The title occurs on leaf 65 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh badīʻ al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-fāṭirihā, wa-sāṭiḥ al-madḥīyāt wa-wāzirihā ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black; copious diagrams. Leaf 1 (diagram) supplied by a later hand.
Badly water-stained, with portions of the text illegible.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi laylat al-Sabt, salkh Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1152 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Saturday night, the end of the sacred Muḥarram, year 1152 [of the Hijrah = 9 May 1739] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Matn al-Jawharah / Ibrāhīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī. -- 1780.
record.note: Known as: Jawharat al-tawḥīd.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ṣilātihi, thumma salām Allāh maʻ ṣalātihi, ʻalá Nabīyin jāʼa bi-al-tawḥīdi ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tammat ... nahār al-Arbaʻ, min al-niṣf al-awwal min Rajab, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Sulaymān al-Dihnah ... sanat 1194 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Wednesday, in the first half of Rajab, by the hand of the poor Sulaymān al-Dihnah ... the year 1194 [of the Hijrah = 24 June 1780] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kashf al-ghuyūbī / Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān al-Shurnūbī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥalla awliyāʼahu dār al-maqāmah ..."
Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Bidāyat al-hidāyah / lil-Imām al-Ghazzālī. -- [before 1633].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-ḥarīṣ ʻalá iqtibās al-ʻilm ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Diagrams and drawings on the margins.

record.title: [Ḥurūf al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-ʻIshrīnīyah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 22 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Ḥirz]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Diagrams.
Unbound.
No. 23 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Koran. -- [17--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Repaired with wool thread.
Unbound.
Verso blank.
No. 24 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [al-Shaqī]. -- [17--?].
record.note: The author is referred to as the "Blind Master" (maʻallim ʻamī).
Variant of the poem found in leaf 103 of this manuscript.
Unbound.
Verso blank.
No. 25 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Dhikr al-ṭayr al-mubārakah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 26 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Muwashshaḥah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 27 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: This poem is repeated in leaf 99 of this manuscript.
Unbound.
No. 28 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb dukhūl al-sanah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Followed by 1 page of notes on Islamic positive law.
Unbound.
No. 29 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Farāʾīḍ]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 30 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb al-dhabḥ. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 31 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Aḥādīth]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fully vocalized.
Rubrics.
Unbound.
Leaf 98 verso blank.
No. 32 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Preceded by some prayer words.
Interlinear notations.
Unbound.
No. 33 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Fī awqāt al-ṣalāh wa-asmāʾihā]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Marginalia.
Unbound.
No. 34 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [al-Shaqī]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 35 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb dukhūl al-sanah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Unbound.
No. 36 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: [Fī al-furūʻ]. -- [17--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Occasional rubrics.
Unbound.
No. 37 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: Kīmiyāʾ al-saʻādah. -- [17--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Rubrics.
Preceded by one page containing a verbal charm (fāʾidah).
Unbound.
No. 38 of 38 items housed together.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd al-ṣughrá / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; the colophon has: al-ʻAqīdah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. Iʻlam inna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī yanḥaṣiru fī thalāthat aqsām ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah / ʻAbd al-Bārī al-ʻAshmāwī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Known as: al-Muqaddimah al-ʻAshmāwīyah fī al-ʻibādāt (Brockelmann).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... ʻAbd al-Bāriʼ al-ʻAshmāwī ... Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣdiqāʼ an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab Mālik ibn Anas ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sanūsī fī al-tawḥīd / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Sharīf al-Ḥasanī. -- 1751.
record.note: Also known as: Tawḥīd ahl al-ʻirfān wa-maʻrifat Allāh wa-rasūlihi bi-al-dalīl wa-al-burhān (Ahlwardt, Brockelmann); supplied by a modern hand inside front cover: Tawḥīd ahl al-ʻirfān.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahida bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi ..."
Coarse naskhī.
Compared with Ahlwardt 2008 (different explicit); the lacuna between leaves 16 and 17 must be quite large.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna farāghuhā yawm al-Thulāthā, min awākhir Jumādá al-Ākhir, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-arbaʻah wa-sittīn ... Wa-kātibuhā ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Bayrūnī baladan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀlī al-shahir̄ bi-al-Qaḥf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on Tuesday, the end of Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 1164 [of the Hijrah = 25 May 1751] ... Copied by ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Bayrūnī baladan, ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀlī, nicknamed al-Qaḥf ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Tawḥīd ahl al-ʻirfān / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Qāsim al-Fajījī. -- 1769.
record.note: Incipit same as Alger 670 (cf. 668).
Probable lacunae in the text; for the identification of the matn see the beginning of the next wrok in this manuscript, leaf 24 verso, and Ahlwardt, 2008, 2009.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī ... Ṣ. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Sh. Badaʼa al-Shaykh, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, taʼlīfahu bi-al-ḥamd, tabarrukan wa-iqtidāʼan bi-Kitāb Allāh al-ʻAzīz ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Tawḥīd ahl al-ʻirfān wa-maʻrifat Allāh wa-Rasūlihi bi-al-dalīl wa-al-burhān / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī. -- 1769.
record.note: Title from: Ahlwardt 2008.
Compared with Ahlwardt 2009 the explicit of which begins on leaf 48 recto of this manuscript.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Sayyid Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ alladhī [shahida] bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.

Colophon: "Kamula al-sharḥ ʻalá yad kātibihi Aḥmad al-Faḍīl ibn Aḥmad ibn Būqulaymis ibn al-ʻĀrif al-sharīf nasaban, al-Wāqiʻī mawṭinan wa-maskanan ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī shahr ... Safar [Ṣafar] baʻdamā khalat minhu arbaʻat ayyām ... ʻām thalāthah wa-thamānīn baʻda al-miʼah wa-al-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The commentary was completed by the hand of its copyist Aḥmad al-Faḍīl ibn Aḥmad ibn Buqulaymis ibn al-ʻĀrif al-sharīf nasaban, al-Wāqiʻī mawṭinan wa-maskanan ... It was completed in the month of ... Safar [Ṣafar], four days having passed from it ... the year 1183 [of the Hijrah = 9 June 1769] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Waṣīyat al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam li-ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib. -- [17--?].
record.note: Ahlwardt 3959 is a somewhat different version.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā kitāb fīhi Waṣīyat al-Nabī ... li-ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib ... wa-fīhi ʻalāmat al-muʼminīn wa-ṣifātuhum ... Qāla Abū Ṭāhir ʻan Saʻīd ibn Waqqāṣ innahu qāl ... Samiʻtu Rasūl Allāh ... yaqūlu li-ʻAlī ... Yā ʻAlī anta minnī bi-manzilat Hārūn wa-Mūsá, wa-lākin [] lā nabī baʻdī ..."
Modern (18th century?) Maghribī, in red and black.
Badly water-stained, with portions of text illegible.
Colophon: "Kamulat ... ʻalá yad kātibihi Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-mukannā [al-mukanná] bi-al-Siklāwī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of its copyist Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, nicknamed al-Siklāwī ..."

record.title: 880-03 Ḥāshiyat al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥabr al-baḥr ... al-Bājūrī ... ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah. -- 1812.
record.note: For the matn, cf. Ahlwardt 2006 (as against 2008) and Arabic MSS 230.
The work is listed in Brockelmann as a gloss to al-Sanūsī's own commentary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawaḥḥada fī dhātihi wa-tanazzaha fī nuʻūtihi ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah ... yawm al-Arbaʻ ... 19 min shahr Rajab ... sanat 1227, alf wa-miʼatayn sabʻah wa-ʻishrīn ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Wednesday ... 19 Rajab ... the year 1227 [of the Hijrah = 29 July 1812] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-sāṭiʻah fī sharḥ al-Farīdah al-jāmiʻah / taʼlīf ... Raḍī al-Dīn ... Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Ṣiddīq al-Namāzī. -- 1675.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu liman wajab la-hu al-wujūd, wa-fāḍa minhu al-karam wa-al-jūd ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Colophon: "Tamma ... yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, ghurrat shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanata sittah wa-thamānīn baʻda al-af [al-alf] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Wednesday, the beginning of the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, of the year 1086 [of the Hijrah = 26 June 1675] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī. -- [1828].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tawfīq hādhihi al-nusakh ʻalá baʻḍihā yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak ... tisʻ khalat min shahr Rabīʻ Ākhir ... sanat 1244 (?) [defaced], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Yūsuf [ibn] Sulaymān Ghunaym Ṣāliḥ al-Minūfī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The collation of these manuscripts was completed on blessed Sunday ... nine [days] having passed from the month of Rabīʻ Ākhir ... year 1244 (?) [defaced] [of the Hijrah = 19th October 1828], by the hand of the poor Yūsuf [ibn] Sulaymān Ghunaym Ṣāliḥ al-Minūfī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Fawāʼid al-amālī wa-farāʼid al-laʼāliʼ / Muḥammad al-Aʻmá. -- [17--?].
record.note: The author's name occurs in the incipit, as well as the name of his teacher Muḥammad Efendi.
The colophon at end, dated A.H. 1068 (A.D. 1658), is probably that of the original autograph.
The authorities quoted are Hanafi.
Neither author nor work seem to be listed in Muḥammad Ṭāhir Brussalī's Osmanleri muallifleri.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻulamāʼ warathat al-anbiyāʼ, wa-jaʻalahum bayna ʻibādihi al-muʼminīn al-muqtadāʼ ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Hitti 1546; in the manuscript by a modern hand inside front cover: Sharḥ al-Taftāzānī ʻalá al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso and leaf 2 recto.
Sporadic interlinear and marginal notes.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yaday [yad] al-ʻĀlim ibn Ḥājjī Ẓahīr."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... by the hand of al-ʻĀlim ibn Ḥājjī Ẓahīr."

record.title: 880-03 Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid / Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Khayālī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Hitti 1550; in the manuscript by a modern hand inside front cover: Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī ʻalá hādhā al-Sharḥ.
Ex-libris in Persian on leaf 85 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-shāriḥ al-niḥrīr, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khaṭīr, baʻdamā tayammana bi-al-Tasmiyah: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaf 84 verso and leaf 85 recto.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī. -- 1753 or 1754.
record.note: Title from: Hitti, 1546.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih ..."
Fair rounded hand, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.
First colophon (folio 91a): "Tamma al-kitāb ... min yad ... Ḥājjī ibn Abkar ... fī sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn baʻda alf wa-miʼah ..."
Translation of the first colophon (folio 91a): "The book is completed ... by the hand of ... Ḥājjī ibn Abkar ... in the year 1167 [of the Hijrah = 1753/1754] ..."

Second colophon (folio 102b): "Qad faragha al-ḥaqīr Yātrimirza min kitābat mā baqiya min ustādhihi Ḥājj ibn Abkar fī yawm al-Aḥad, qubayla al-ʻaṣr, fī Madasat [Madrasat] Mawlānā Shaykh al-Qadafī, fī sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn baʻda alf wa-miʼah ... 1167."

Translation of the second colophon (folio 102b): "The wretched Yātrimirza finished what remained from the copy of his teacher Ḥājj ibn Abkar on the afternoon of Sunday, at the School of Mawlānā Shaykh al-Qadafī, in the year 1167 [of the Hijrah = 1753/1754] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʼid / lil-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī. -- 1488.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; the colophon has: Ḥāshiyat Sharḥ al-ʻaqāʼid al-tajrīd [sic].
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qawluhu: 'Ammā baʻd ḥamd Wājib al-Wujūd', khaṣṣ bi-al-dhikr min ṣifātihi al-ʻulá mā huwa akhaṣṣ bi-hi taʻālá ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 verso.
Considerable marginalia.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... fī baldat Qusṭanṭinīyah ... fī ʻahd Sulṭān Bāyazīd Khān ibn Muḥammad Khān ... ʻalá yad ... al-Mullá Muḥammad ibn Mīr Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... fī yawm khāmis ʻashar min Rajab ... sanat thalāth wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed in the city of Qusṭanṭinīyah [Constantinople] ... during the reign of Sultan Bāyazīd Khān ibn Muḥammad Khān ... by the hand of ... al-Mullá Muḥammad ibn Mīr Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... on the fifteenth day of Rajab ... of the year 893 [of the Hijrah = 4 July 1488] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Sharḥ al-jadīd ʻalá Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʼid : al-maqṣid al-thālith / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qūshjī. -- 1577 or 1578.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit same as in Bankipore, X, 101, no. 602.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Maqṣid al-thālith. Fī ithbāt al-Ṣāniʻ wa-ṣifātihi wa-āthārih ... Istadalla ʻalá wujūd al-Wājib taʻālá bi-annahu lā shakka fī wujūd mawjūd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.
Other volumes wanting.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 985."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the year 985 [of the Hijrah = 1577/1578]."

record.title: 880-01 Daqāʼiq al-akhbār. -- 1666.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 2780 which is ascribed to Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
Incipit: "[Bismillāh] al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-qad jāʼa fī al-khabar anna Allāh taʻālá khalaqa shajarah wa-lahā arbaʻat aghṣān wa-sammāhā shajarat al-yaqīn ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr ibn Māmākhah al-mashhūr bi-Dawādrār ... Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh yawm thalāth min shahr Rajab al-murajjab, sanat 1077."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr ibn Māmākhah, known as Dawādrār ... Copied on the third day of the venerated month of Rajab, of the year 1077 [of the Hijrah = 30 December 1666]."

record.title: 880-03 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn ... Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-Ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid wa-al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid / li-Aḥmad al-Sharjī. -- 1697.
record.note: In the title, the author's surname al-Sharjī is misspelled al-Sarakhsī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jamīl ʻawāʼidihi ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon (folio 90a): "Furigha min taḥrīrihi fī awākhir al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat alf wa-miʼah 8 [wa-thamāniyah], ʻalá yad Muḥammad Amīn Katkhudah, bi-al-Madīnah al-Munawwarah."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed at the end of sacred al-Ḥijjah of the year 1108 [of the Hijrah = 19 July 1697], by the hand of Muḥammad Amīn Katkhudah, at al-Madīnah al-Munawwarah [Medina]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid wa-al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid / Zayn al-Dīn al-Sharjī al-Anṣārī al-Yamanī al-Zabīdī. -- 1755 or 1756.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, naḥmaduhu bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jamīl ʻawāʼidihi ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Sanat 1269."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1269 [of the Hijrah = 1755/1756]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣulḥ bayna al-ikhwān fī ḥukm ibāḥat al-dukhān / ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl al-Nābulusī al-Ḥanafī. -- 1825.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala istiʻmāl dukhān al-tutun nāfiʻan bi-tajfīfihi al-ruṭūbāt al-zāʼidah fī al-ajsām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhihi al-risālah yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, al-sābiʻ ʻashar yawman khalat min shahr Shawwāl al-muḥarram, sanat 1240, arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this epistle was completed on blessed Friday, seventeen days having passed from the sacred month of Shawwāl, of the year 1240 [of the Hijrah = 3 June 1825] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-musāmarah bi-sharḥ al-Musāyarah fī al-ʻaqāʼid al-munjiyah fī al-ākhirah / li-Kamāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf al-Shāfiʻī al-Ashʻarī. -- [1655].
record.note: For the matn see Ahlwardt 1826.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man rasama ʻalá ṣafaḥāt al-kāʼināt dalāʼil tawḥīdih ..."
Good naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Balagha muqābalatan min aṣlihi alladhī kutiba minhu ... fī shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat 1065."
Translation of the colophon: "The collation with its original copy was completed ... during the sacred month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah of the year 1065 [of the Hijrah = September/October 1655)."

record.title: 880-01 Qurrat al-ʻuyūn fī qaḍāʼ al-ḥawāʼij wa-taysīr al-rizq wa-adāʼ al-duyūn wa-tafrīj al-hamm ʻan al-maḥzūn. -- 1568.
record.note: Evidently not identical with the Qurrat al-ʻuyūn (or al-ʻayn) of Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī (Brockelmann, I, 196; S II, p. 348). The work listed in the Dhayl Kashf al-ẓunūn is probably also al-Samarqandī's.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī man tawakkala ʻalayhi kafāhu wa-ḥayyāh, wa-man anāba ʻalayhi alhamahu wa-hadāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir kitāb 'Qurrat al-ʻuyūn fī qaḍāʼ al-ḥawāʼij wa-taysīr al-rizq wa-adāʼ al-duyūn wa-tafrīj al-hamm ʻan al-maḥzūn' ... fa-qad furigha min taḥrīrihi wa-kitābatihi ʻaṣr al-Thulāthāʼ, rābiʻ wa-ʻishrūn min shuhūr [shahr] Jumādá al-Thānī, sanata sittah wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ... ʻalá yad ... Faraj Allāh ibn Hilāl ibn Najm al-Balāsī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of the book 'Qurrat al-ʻuyūn fī qaḍāʼ al-ḥawāʼij wa-taysīr al-rizq wa-adāʼ al-duyūn wa-tafrīj al-hamm ʻan al-maḥzūn' ... edited and copied on the afternoon of Tuesday, 24 Jumādá al-Thāni, of the year 976 [of the Hijrah = 24 December 1568)] ... by the hand of ... Faraj Allāh ibn Hilāl ibn Najm al-Balāsī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Bustān al-ʻārifīn / Abū al-Layth Naṣr ibn Ibrāhīm al-Samarqandī. -- 1689.
record.note: The colophon-date has been doctored to look like 1000.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla ... Abū al-Layth Naṣr ibn Ibrāhīm al-Samarqandī ... Qad jamaʻtu fī kitābī hādhā funūnan min al-ʻilm ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; crude colored drawings in the margins.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... yawm al-Khamīs, waqt al-ḍuḥá, fī shahr Jumādá al-Awwal, tārīkh sanat 1100."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... on the forenoon of Thursday, in the month of Jumādá al-Awwal, of the year 1100 [of the Hijrah = 24 February 1689]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-karāhiyah / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAllāmī. -- 1688.
record.note: Compared with Alger 714 (8) (Cat. gén. des mss. des bibliothèques publiques de France; departements, tome 18, Alger). The regular incipit is apparently omitted in this manuscript.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb al-karāhiyah, yusammá bihā li-anna bayān al-makrūh ahamm li-wujūb al-taḥarruz ʻanhu, wa-sammá baʻḍuhum al-ḥaẓr wa-al-ibāḥah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; crude colored drawings in the margins.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

Colophon: "Intahá ... ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... fī yawm al-Ithnayn, fī waqt bayna al-ẓuhr wa-al-ʻaṣr, fī yawm ʻishrīn min shahr Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, tisʻah wa-tisʻīn baʻda al-alf ... fī baldat ʻĪntāb, fī Madrasat Būstānjī, tārīkh sanat 1099."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ... on Monday, at a time between noon and afternoon, on the twentieth of the glorious month of Shaʻbān, 1099 ... in the city of ʻAyntāb [Gaziantep (Turkey)], at Madrasat Būstānjī, dated in the year 1099 [of the Hijrah = 20 June 1688]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ ṣaghīr ʻalá Unmūdhaj al-labīb fī khaṣāʼiṣ al-Ḥabīb / Ibn al-Munāwī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit of the matn compared with Ahlwardt 2577.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá wa-kafá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ʻujālah sanīyah ʻalá al-khaṣāʼiṣ al-Nabawīyah lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, al-musammá Unmūdhaj al-labīb ... Bismillāh uwallifu, aw, aftatiḥu mutabarrikan, aw, mustaʻīnan ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá al-Sanūsīyah. -- 1802.
record.note: Title also given as: Risālah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd.
The colophon-date has been doctored to look like 1116.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt ..."
Fair naskhī; crude colored drawings in the margins.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb ... nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ, fī sādis wa-ʻishrīn khalā min Shaʻbān ... sanat 1216, ʻalá yad ... al-Sayyid Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥājj Bakrī al-Shiqfah, nasakhahu ilá al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm ibn al-Shaykh Ismāʻīl al-Kīlānī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed ... on Wednesday, twenty-six days having passed from Shaʻban ... of the year 1216 [of the Hijrah = 1 January 1802], by the hand of ... al-Sayyid Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥajj Bakrī al-Shiqfah, copied for al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm ibn al-Shaykh Ismāʻīl al-Kīlānī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarāt wa-muḥāwarāt / Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad. -- 1590 or 1591.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; on first leaf of notes in front, in a later hand: Kitāb Majmaʻ al-durar.
Compared with Manchester (Mingana collection) 674.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan awwalan wa-ākhiran lil-Awwal wa-al-Ākhir ... Fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ... Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad: Lammā kāna ʻilm al-muḥāḍarāt wa-fann al-muḥāwarāt mimmā yarghabu fīhi al-ṭibāʻ ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb fī awāʼil Muḥarram [- fī awāsiṭ Jumādá al-Ākhir], sanat tisʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed the beginning of Muḥarram [- middle of Jumādá al-Ākhir] of the year 999 [of the Hijrah = October 1590-April 1591]."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná. -- 1590 or 1591.
record.note: The work does not seem to be identical with similar tracts in Pertsch.
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Daqāʼiq al-ʻulūm al-rabbānīyah : al-niṣf al-thānī. -- 1870.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qā[la] al-muʼallif ... al-Faṣl al-ḥ[ādī wa-al-ʻishrīn Fī asmāʼ] Allāh al-ḥusná wa-anmāṭihā wa-mā li-kull namaṭ min al-daʻawāt wa-al-taṣrīfāt ..."
Coarse Maghribī, in red, yellow, and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
"Innī hājartu ilá diyār Bayt al-Maqdis" (105a).
"al-Faṣl al-arbaʻūn" (275b).
The first half of the work wanting.

record.title: 880-01 al-Futūwah fī maʻrifat al-ṣanāʼiʻ wa-ḥaqāʼiqihā. -- [before 1848].
record.note: Not identical with the Kitāb al-futūwah of Muḥammad al-ʻAmmār (Brockelmann, S I, p. 690); similar works in Ahlwardt, 3375 ff.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-laṭīf al-khabīr, al-raʼūf al-raḥīm, muʻallim al-insān mā lam yaʻlam ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Sanat 1265."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1265 [of the Hijrah = 1848/1849]."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-majālis wa-muntakhab al-nafāʼis : al-juzʼ al-awwal / taʼlīf ... Zayn al-Dīn ... Abī Hurayrah ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān [sic] ibn ʻUthmān ... al-Ṣaffūrī. -- 1799.
record.note: The date corresponds to January 1, 1799.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qaṣṣa lanā min āyātihi ʻajaban, ḥamdan arghama bi-hi anfa man jaḥada wa-abā ..."
Good naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
The second half wanting.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh ʻalá yad ... al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Kaftānī ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, ḍuḥāt al-nahār, fī shahr Rajab ... ḥ minhu, 23, sanat 1213 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the hand of ... al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Kaftānī ... on the forenoon of Tuesday, the 8th [tenth (?)] of the month of Rajab, the 23rd day of it, of the year 1213 [of the Hijrah = 1 January 1799] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Riyāḍ al-uns fī ʻilm al-raqāʼiq / Abū Muḥammad al-Suhrawardī. -- [before 1747].
record.note: Treatise on ethics.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb Riyāḍ al-uns fī ʻilm al-raqāʼiq, taʼlīf ... Abī Muḥammad al-Suhrawardī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jalla ʻan al-afʻāl al-qabīḥah wa-tafarrada ʻan tashbīh al-khalīqah ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
In manuscript inside front cover: "EWA Drummond Hay 25 Jan y1835."
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Sabt [in a different hand] 16 min al-Muḥarrām [al-Muḥarram] al-ḥarrām, ʻām 1160."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on Saturday [in a different hand], the 16th of the sacred al-Muḥarram, of the year 1160 [of the Hijrah = 28 January 1747]."

record.title: 880-01 Miftāḥ sirr al-ṭarīq li-bulūgh al-murād bi-al-taḥqīq wa-al-wuṣūl ilá Allāh bi-al-ʻināyah wa-al-tawfīq bi-dhikr ismihi taʻālá min ghayr taʻwīq maʻa al-tamassuk bi-al-sharīʻah wa-al-taqwá bi-al-ṭarīq. -- 1755.
record.note: The copyist Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanbalī may be the author.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awdaʻa sirrahu al-maṣūn li-man arāda min ʻibādihi, fa-hum la-hu mukhliṣūn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tabyīḍihā laylat al-Ithnayn, awākhir Rajab al-fard, ʻalá yad ...
