Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanbalī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, fī Dimashq al-Shām ... sanat thamāniyah wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The fair copy was completed on Monday night, at the end of the matchless month of Rajab, by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanbalī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, in Damascus (Syria) ... the year 1168 [of the Hijrah = 11 May 1755] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Khawāṣṣ al-Qurʼān / lil-Tamīmī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title, as above, written in pencil on leaf of notes in front.

Of the two manuscripts of the Manāfiʻ listed by Brockelmann, the Bodleian copy is described in Uri's catalogue without quotations; the Algiers manuscript seems to be a much shorter work, and is perhaps an abridgment.

Chapter 27 begins on leaf 22 recto, but on leaf 37 recto the phrase occurs: "wa-qad taqaddama dhikruhā fī al-bāb al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn ..." which would seem to indicate that there were more than 27 chapters.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Imām al-Tamīmī ... Man arāda al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalá al-ʻulūm al-khafīyah ..."
Good modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: [Duʻāʾ]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hands.
Illustrations and charts of mystical combinations of letters.
No. 1 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Ṣalāh]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Followed by 1 page of notes.
No. 2 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Koran. -- [18--?].
record.note: The titles of some of the sūrahs differ from the standard Mashriq version.
North African hand.
Leaf 10 verso blank.
No. 3 of 34 items housed together.

No. 4 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: al-Maḥabbah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Chart of mystical numbers.
No. 5 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Duʻāʾ]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
No. 6 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [al-Āyāt]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Diagrams, charts and colorful illustrations.
Upper part of manuscript damaged.
No. 7 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Fawāʾid]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Blue modern paper.
Unbound.
No. 8 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Khuṭbah]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Fully vocalized in orange ink.
Leaf 28 verso blank.
No. 9 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Bāb al-khayrāt]. -- [18--?].
record.note: No. 10 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb suʾila mā shiʾta fāʾidatuh. -- [18--?].
record.note: Charts of mystical numbers.
Upper part of manuscript damaged.
No. 11 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Awmiʾat rasūl Allāh li-ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
No. 12 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Khamsūn farīḍatan]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
No. 13 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Ḥadīth]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Followed by 1 page of notes.
No. 14 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Fāʾidat al-dhikr. -- [18--?].
record.note: Diagrams of mystical letters.
No. 15 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Duʻāʾ]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Second part on modern blue paper.
No. 16 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Fawāʾid]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Charts of mystical numbers and letters.
No. 17 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Fāʾidat al-maḥabbah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Chart of mystical expressions.
No. 18 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Ṭarīqat Aḥmad al-Tijjānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand; fully-vocalized in orange ink.
Leaf 99 verso blank.
No. 19 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Maʻnā awwal bi-awwal rubʻ al-dāl]. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Charts.
Leaf 104 verso blank.
No. 20 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Ḥirz. -- [18--?].
record.note: Chart of mystical numbers.
No. 21 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: al-Duʻāʾ li-shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Bound in reverse order: begins with leaf 117a verso and ends with leaf 106 verso.
No. 22 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Ḥirz al-maḥabbah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Diagrams and charts of mystical combinations of letters.
No. 23 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [al-Asmāʾ al-ʻasharah]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Numerous charts showing different combinations of mystical letters and numbers and the names of God.
No. 24 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb al-zabūr. -- [18--?].
record.note: No. 25 of 34 items housed together.

Preceded by 1 page of mystical utterances (āyah).
No. 26 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Sahm Ādam]. -- [18--?].
record.note: No. 27 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻArabshāh al-Asfarāyīnī. -- 1779.
record.note: For the matn see Ahlwardt, 1955.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī daʻānā ilá dār al-salām bi-awḍaḥ sabīl huwa dīn al-Islām ..."
Small crowded slanted naskhī.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Fī taʼrīkh sanat 193 [1193], fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, fī laylat al-Aḥad, fī baldat Arḍ Rūm. al-Faqīr Saʻīd al-Shīrwānī al-Windāmī, li-ajl ustādhī wa-muʻallimī ... Ismāʻīl Afandī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 1193, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, on Sunday night [18 April 1779], at the city of Arḍ Rūm [Erzurum (Turkey)]. The poor Saʻīd al-Shīrwānī al-Windāmī, [copied] for my master and teacher ... Ismāʻīl Afandī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥāshiyah al-Jalālīyah ʻalá Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām. -- 1691 or 1692.
record.note: Title as above appears in the colophon; also knonw as: Sharḥ Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām, tawshīḥuhu bi-dhikr al-mufaḍḍal wa-al-minʻām, wa-tarshīḥuhu bi-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ṣafwat al-Anām ..."
Fair naskhī.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon (folio 45a): "Tammat al-Ḥāshiyah al-Jalālīyah fī baldat ʻĪntāb, fī yad ... Ḥusayan ibn ʻUmar ibn Khalīl ibn Kanjī ... taʼrīkh 1103."

Translation of the colophon: "al-Ḥāshiyah al-Jalālīyah was completed in the city of ʻĪntāb [Gaziantep (Turkey)], by the hand of ... Ḥusayan ibn ʻUmar ibn Khalīl ibn Kanjī ... dated 1103 [of the Hijrah = 1691/1692]."

record.title: 880-02 Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādh al-mujtahidīn / lil-ʻĀmilī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutaʻālī fī ʻizz jalālihi ʻan maṭāriḥ al-afhām, fa-lā yuḥīṭu bi-kunhihi al-ʻārifūn ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq; several leaves supplied by a later hand.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : al-niṣf al-thānī / lil-Birkawī. -- 1680 or 1681.
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title supplied by a modern hand.
Fair naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Marginalia.
The first half of the work wanting.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... fī yawm al-Khamīs. Kātibuhu Manlā Khalīl ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ... Tārīkh sanat 1091."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... on Thursday. Copied by Manlā Khalīl ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ... Dated in the year 1091 [of the Hijrah = 1680/1681]."

record.title: 880-01 Ṣuḥuf Ibrāhīm wa-Mūsá. -- [16--?].
record.note: The incipit of Ahlwardt 10355 is missing in this manuscript; but the explicit is the same. For another copy of this work see Ms. Landberg 108 (leaves 107 verso-122 recto).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ṣaḥīfah al-ūlá. Yaqūlu Allāh tabāraka wa-taʻālá, ʻazza wa-jall: ʻAjibtu li-man ayqan bi-al-mawt kayfa yafraḥu, wa-ʻajibtu li-man ayqan bi-al-ḥisāb kayfa yajmaʻu al-māl ..."
Fairly modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
No. 1 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Sirāj al-muṣallī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Known as: Sirāj al-muṣallī wa-badr al-mubtadiʼ wa-al-muntahī.
Brockelmann, S I, p. 639, has a Sirāj al-muṣallī maʻa shurūṭ al-ṣalāt by ʻAlī al-Simānānī (d. 1100).
The authorities quoted are Hanafi.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam, asʻadaka Allāh taʻālá fī al-dārayn, dhukira fī al-Fatāwá al-kubrá wa-al-Fatāwá al-Nāṣirī ... Man lam yaʻlam farāʼiḍ al-wuḍūʼ lā yajūzu wuḍūʼuhu ..."
Fairly modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
No. 2 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī / lil-Nikusārī. -- 1684.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; in manuscript: Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Yaqūl al-ʻabd (the first line of matn).
The explicit seems to be different from that of Ahlwardt 2420.
Author's date (A.H. 901) from Hitti.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabd fī badʼ al-amālī li-tawḥīdin bi-naẓmin ka-al-laʼālī. al-Murād bi-al-ʻabd nafsuhu. al-Badʼ al-ibtidāʼ. Wa-al-amālī jamʻ al-imlāʼ wa-huwa al-katb ʻan ẓahr al-qalb min ghayr istiʻānah bi-kitāb ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
No. 3 of 6 titles bound together.
"Tammat hādhihi al-nuṣḥah [al-nuskhah] ... fī waqt al-ʻaṣr, min yawm al-Aḥad, fī awākhir Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, tārīkh sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... in the afternoon of Sunday, the end of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, of the year 1095 [of the Hijrah = 15th April 1684] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Muʻaddil al-ṣalāh / lil-Birkawī. -- 1683 or 1684.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī amara ʻibādahu bi-iqāmat al-ṣalāh wa-taʻdīlihā, wa-jaʻalahā raʼs al-dīn ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Marginalia.
No. 4 of 6 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tārīkh sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 1095 [of the Hijrah = 1683/1684]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar / Abū al-Muntahī. -- 1683 or 1684.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ṭarīq Ahl al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
No. 5 of 6 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tārīkh sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 1095 [of the Hijrah = 1683/1684]."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim fī ṭarīq al-taʻallum / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī. -- 1682.
record.note: The author's surname in the colophon is misspelled.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala banī Ādam bi-al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
No. 6 of 6 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... [fī sanat] thalāth wa-tisʻīn [wa-]alf."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... [in the year] 1093 [of the Hijrah = 1682]."

record.title: 880-01 Fawāʼid. -- [17--?].
record.note: Good fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 Faʼl nāmah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-rāwī, raḥimahu Allāh: Idhā aradta an taʼkhudha al-faʼl fa-ḍaʻ iṣbuʻaka al-yumná ʻalá raʼsika, wa-iqraʼ Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm thalāth marrāt wa-anta tudawwir iṣbaʻaka ʻalá raʼsika ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī hand.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah. -- 1614 or 1615.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-fāʼiq fī al-mawāʻiẓ wa-al-raqāʼiq / taʼlīf ... Shuʻayb al-Ḥurayfīsh. -- 1716.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 8808, this manuscript has longer incipit.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamah, wa-yudāfiʻu niqamah, wa-yukāfī mazīdah ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... yawm al-Khamīs, ʻinda ṣalāt al-ẓuhr, al-rābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Shaʻbān al-abrak, ʻām thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad al-Ṭāhir ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-ʻUmarī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... on Thursday, at noon prayer, the 24th of the blessed Shaʻbān, of the year 1128 [of the Hijrah = 13 August 1716] ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad al-Ṭāhir ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-ʻUmarī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-majālis wa-muntakhab al-nafāʼis / taṣnīf ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣaffūrī. -- 1855.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qaṣṣa [lanā] min bābihi [āyātihi, ṣaḥḥ] ʻajaban, ḥamdan arghama bi-hi anfa man jaḥadahu wa-abā ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah ... nahār al-Khamīs ... fī thalāthah khalat min shahr Shaʻbān ... sanat iḥdá wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Thursday ... three days having passed from the month of Shaʻbān ... of the year 1271 [of the Hijrah = 21 April 1855] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Majmūʻah / bi-khaṭṭ Sayyidī Muḥammad al-ʻAydarūs. -- 1902.
record.note: Holograph.
Among the persons mentioned is (e.g. leaf 132 recto) ʻAydarūs ibn ʻUmar al-Ḥabshī, who is listed in Brockelmann, S II, p. 821.
Good South-Arabian hand, in red and black.
Original pagination, 38-303; a few leaves blank except for page number.
In pencil on recto of first leaf of contents: Hādhā al-majmūʻ bi-khaṭṭ Sayyidī Muḥammad al-ʻAydarūs.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, 24 khalat min shahr Rajab ... sanat 1320."
Translation of th colophon: "The copy was completed on blessed Sunday, 24 days having passed from the month of Rajab ... of the year 1320 [of the Hijrah = 26 October 1902]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥikāyat Maḥmūd al-Wardī wa-Ḍawʼ al-Baṣar Yāsmīn / taṣnīf al-Shaykh Dāʼūd al-Zamīr. -- 1785.
record.note: Incipit: "Ḥikāyat Maḥmūd al-Wardī ibn Muṣṭafá al-Sharīf min nasl al-Rashīd suṭān maḥrūsat Baghdād ... wa-mā jará ʻalayhi lammā rāḥ li-madīnat al-Aṣbahān li-yamhur bint Wazīr [al-Wazīr] al-Aʻẓam, wazīr Sulṭān Shāh, wa-kāna ismuhā Ḍawʼ al-Baṣar Yāsmīn ..."
Coarse Maghribī.

Title as above, on folio 1a, preceded by: "Taṣnīf al-Shaykh Dāwūd al-Zamīr fī madīnat Kambrij ... Shahr Muḥarram [Muḥarram] al-aḥrām [al-aḥram], ʻām 1200 [lil-Hijrah = November/December 1785]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Kalīlah wa-Dimnah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Muqaddimah qaddamahā Bahnūd ibn Sayḥawān, wa-yuʻrafu bi-ʻAlī ibn al-Shāt [al-Shāh] al-Fārisī, dhakara fīhā al-sabab alladhī min ajlihi ʻamila Baydabā al-faylasūf al-Hindī, raʼs al-Barāhimah, li-Dayshalīm [li-Dabshalīm] malik al-Hind kitābahu Kalīlah wa-Dimnah ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār : al-niṣf al-awwal / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn ʻArabī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī. -- [before 1664].
record.note: Title also given in title page and colophon as: Kitāb al-musāmarāt.
Compared with Berlin catalog 8365-68 (different incipit; the actual beginning of the text corresponds to leaf 8 recto).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa shams al-fawāʼid fī muḥāḍarat al-abrār, wa-jaʻala niẓām al-qalāʼid fī musāmarat al-akhyār ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
The second half wanting.
Colophon: "Tamma ... fī ghurrat shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1280, thamānīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... at the beginning of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1280 [of the Hijrah = 15 September 1863] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Alf laylah wa-laylah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam wa-aʻraf [wa-]akram, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam min asālīf al-umam, annahu [kāna] malikayn min mulūk al-ʻAjam, min Banī Sāsān, wa-kānū khawayn [akhawayn] shaqīqayn min umm wa-ab ..."
Fair modern (18th century) nastaʻlīq, leaves 1-5 supplied in a later hand.
In manuscript on leaf 1 recto: "Bought by me at Mocha 1805. M. Thoms[on]."
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Bilawhar wa-Būdāsāf. -- [17--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title as above supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Ghazwat al-Sabʻ Ḥuṣūn wa-mā jará lil-Imām ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib maʻa al-Malik Huḍām : al-juzʼ al-awwal / mansūb ilá Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Bakrī al-Baṣrī. -- 1877.
record.note: Also known as: Ghazwat al-Imām ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib maʻa al-laʻīn Huḍām [ibn] al-Ḥajjāf (Brockelmann).
Apparently a different version from Berlin catalog 9006.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad naqalat al-ruwāh, raḥimahum [Allāh], ʻan hādhihi al-ghazwah al-ʻajībah wa-mā jará lil-Imām ... ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib ... min al-mawāqiʻ al-gharībah maʻa al-Malik Huḍām ibn al-Ḥajjāf wa-maʻa ahālī ḥuṣūnih ..."
Fair naskhī.
The remaining volume(s) wanting.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yaday ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad Adīb Hāshim [al-ʻAṭṭār] ... fī 25 Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat 1294 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad Adīb Hāshim [al-ʻAṭṭār] ... on 25 Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 1294 [of the Hijrah = 7 July 1877] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah min al-tawārīkh wa-al-nawādir. -- 1749-1818.
record.note: Title, as above, appears at foot of leaf 1 recto.
Several hands in coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Good modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black; leaf 11 by another smaller hand.

record.title: 880-03 al-Witrīyāt. -- 1767 or 1768.
record.note: Title, as above, appears in the colophon. In title page, by a modern hand: al-Qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah.
Incipit: "Ḥarf al-Alif. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-dhikri Allāhi madḥan muqaddamā // uṣallī ṣalātan tamlaʼu al-arḍa wa-al-samā ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Tammat al-Witrīyāt ... Kātibuhā Sharīf ibn Aḥmad ... Sanat 1181 [lil-Hijrah = 1767/1768] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "al-Witrīyāt are completed ... Copied by Sharīf ibn Aḥmad ... Year 1181 [of the Hijrah = 1767/1768] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tadhkirah / Jabrāʼīl al-rāhib al-Lubnānī. -- [before 1835].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
The author's name appears on leaf 3 verso.
Compared with Ms. Salisbury 61.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat ashʻār. -- [17--?].
record.note: Anthology of poetry.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ʻĀrif bi-Allāh taʻālá Sayyidī ʻUmar ibn al-Fāriḍ. -- 1661.
record.note: Collected poems.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa ḥabībahu al-asná bi-maqām qāb qawsayn aw adná ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī ʻaṣr yawm al-Jumʻah ... sādis ʻasharī [sādis ʻishrīn (?)] Shawwāl, sanat wāḥid wa-sabʻīn wa-alf ... katabahā li-nafsihi ... Muḥammad al-Sharīf al-Ḥusaynī ibn al-marḥūm al-Sharīf Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, al-kāʼin ḍarīḥuhu bi-nāḥiyat al-Jawsaq min Iqlīm al-Sharqīyah, al-Ḥijāzī aṣlan, al-Ḥusaynī nasaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on the afternoon of Friday ... 16 [26 (?)] Shawwāl, year 1071 [of the Hijrah = 24 June 1661] ... wrote it for himself ... Muḥammad al-Sharīf al-Ḥusaynī ibn al-marḥūm al-Sharīf Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, whose tomb is located at the district of al-Jawsaq, in the region of al-Sharqīyah, al-Ḥusaynī nasaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī. -- [before 1768?].
record.note: Title also given (in title page) as: Kitāb al-Sīrah al-zakīyah bi-sharḥ al-Hamzīyah.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-Kitāb akhrasa al-fuṣaḥāʼ ..."
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, cloth-covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah wa-tawajjuʻ al-kaʼābah / taʼlīf al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Abī Ḥajalah. -- 1605.
record.note: Different explicit from Ahlwardt 8373.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lil-ʻāshiqīn bi-aḥkām al-gharām riḍan ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; leaves 1 and 180 supplied by later hands.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi yawm al-Aḥad, rābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat arbaʻata ʻashar baʻda al-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Sunday, 14 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1014 [of the Hijrah = 31 July 1605] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān / Ibn al-Fāriḍ. -- 1721.
record.note: Collected poems.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa ḥabībahu al-asná bi-maqām qāb qawsayn aw adná ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 4 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma ... laylat al-Aḥad, 27 [17 (?)] min Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1133."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on the night of Sunday, 27 [17 (?)] Jumādá al-Ūlá, of the year 1133 [of the Hijrah = 26 [16 (?)] March 1721]."

record.title: 880-02 Muʻashsharāt al-Shaykh al-Akbar / Muḥyī al-Dīn Ibn al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī. -- [1721].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Unẓur ilá al-Ḥaqqi fī madlūli asmāʼi // wa-kawnihi ʻaynu kullī ʻaynu ajzāʼī ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 4 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... ʻalá yad ... Ibrāhīm al-Ḥakīmī al-Ṣāliḥī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm al-Ḥakīmī al-Ṣāliḥī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Muʻashsharāt al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ghanī. -- [1721].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ilá al-Dhāti sīrī fī marātibi asmāʼi // bi-ṣūrati mazji al-nāri fīyā maʻa al-māʼi ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 3 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 al-Nawādir al-ʻaynīyah fī al-bawādir al-ghaybīyah / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jīlī. -- 1721.
record.note: A Sufi poem.
Title from: Brockelmann, II, 206. Alternate title: al-Qaṣīdah al-ʻaynīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Fuʼādun bi-hi shamsu al-maḥabbati sāṭiʻu // wa-laysa li-najmi al-ʻadli fīhi mawāqiʻu ..."
Good naskhī.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 4 of 4 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī ṣabīḥat al-Arbiʻāʼ, 27 min Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1133."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Wednesday morning, 27 Jumādá al-Ūlá, of the year 1133 [of the Hijrah = 26 March 1721]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Qaṣīdah al-Dālīyah / Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn Masʻūd al-Yūsī. -- 1711.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand.
al-Darʻī's son, Aḥmad, is listed in Brockelmann, II, 464.
For Ibn Nāṣir al-Darʻī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ... (See: Ziriklī 7:63-64).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Shaykhunā ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Zākūr: Hādhā mā naẓamahu Shaykhunā ... Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn Masʻūd al-Yūsī fī madḥ Shaykhihi Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Nāṣir al-Darʻī ... ʻArrij bi-munʻaraji al-hiḍābi al-wurdi // bayna al-Liṣābi wa-bayna Dhāti al-Armadi ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.
Colophon: "Intahat ... awāʼil Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, ʻām thalāthah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... at the beginning of glorious Shaʻbān, year 1123 [of the Hijrah = 14 September 1711]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ manẓūmat al-Imām al-Naḥwī al-musammāh bi-al-Munfarijah / lil-Shaykh Yūsuf al-Buṣrawī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [before 1857].
record.note: Title also given (in title page and colophon) as: al-Munfarijah wa-sharḥuhā.
Compared with Escurial 521 (2) and Rabat 90. For the matn see also Berlin catalog 7636.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-faqīr ... ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf al-Buṣrawī al-Shāfiʻī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh fārij al-hamm, wāsiʻ al-karam ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: [Qāla Ādam ubshiru bi ...]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fully vocalized.
No. 28 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Ḥirz al-maḥabbah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Colored charts of mystical numbers.
No. 29 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Fāʾidat asmāʾ Allāh. -- [18--?].
record.note: No. 30 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Ḥirz al-firāq bayna al-rajul wa-al-marʾah. -- [18--?].
record.note: No. 31 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Kitāb ḥisāb al-naym. -- [18--?].
record.note: Includes chart and poems.
No. 32 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Taʾlīm al-ʻaqāʾid]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Preceded by 1 loose leaf.
Charts.
No. 33 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: Fāʾidat al-rizq fī bilād al-kāfirīn. -- [18--?].
record.note: Charts of mystical numbers.
No. 34 of 34 items housed together.

record.title: [Adʻiyah wa-fawāʾid]. -- [17--?].
record.note: A note laid in the manuscript identifying this as al-Zarkashī's al-Takmilah, a manual of Shāfiʻī law, is incorrect.
Unbound.
Laid-in leaves of various sizes.
No. 1 of 2 items housed together.

record.title: [Adʻiyah wa-fawāʾid]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Charts of mystical numbers and letters.
Unbound.
No. 2 of 2 items housed together.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah wa-duʻāʾ]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Silsilat al-wird. -- [18--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Kayfīyat al-wird. -- [18--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Silsilat al-awrād. -- [18--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān / Khalīl ibn Muṣṭafá. -- [before 1879].
record.note: Collected poems.
Ahlwardt, 6784, has a scribe by the name of Khalīl ibn Muṣṭafá in A.H. 1125.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma alhimnī al-Ḥamd ʻalá mā ʻallamta, wa-al-shukr ʻalá mā awlayta wa-anʻamta ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khalīl ibn Muṣṭafá ... Hādhā mā madaḥtu bi-hi Sayyid al-Bashar ..."
Cursive hand.

record.title: Asmāʾ al-awliyāʾ. -- [18--?].
record.note: Leaf 13 verso blank.
Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Sharḥ al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat ashʻār. -- [before 1858].
record.note: Anthology of poetry.
Beginning missing.
Fair naskhī.
Marginalia.

record.title: [al-Qaṣīdah al-Qādirīyah]. -- [18--].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.1.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: [Qaṣāʾid]. -- 1865.
record.note: Chart of mystical numbers.
Housed in folder 545.2.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Tafsīr al-sāʻāt. -- [17--?].
record.note: Chart of mystical numbers.
Housed in folder 545.3.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: 880-03 al-Qāmūs al-muḥīṭ : al-juzʼ al-awwal / Majd al-Dīn Abū Ṭāhir Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb ibn Muḥammad al-Shīrāzī al-Fīrūzābādī. -- 1704.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh munṭiq al-bulaghāʼ bi-al-lughá fī al-bawādī ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.
Remaining volumes wanting.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad ... Saʻd al-Dīn ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qudsī, yawm al-Ithnayn, thānī ʻashar Rajab al-fard, min sanat sittata ʻashar wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... Saʻd al-Dīn ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qudsī, on Monday, the twelfth day of the unique month of Rajab, of the year 1116 [of the Hijrah = 10 November 1704] ..."

record.title: [al-Ruʾyā]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.3.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Taqrīb ḍarūrī [li]l-dīn. -- [17--?].
record.note: Dark red ink.
Housed in folder 545.4.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Tanbīh al-ghāfilīn wa-tanẓīm al-akhbār wa-badīʻ al-āthār. -- [17--?].
record.note: Housed in folder 545.5.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: Bayān al-Tiryāq. -- [17--?].
record.note: Charts and diagrams.
Housed in folder 545.6.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: [Fāʾidah]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Black and pink ink.
Housed in folder 545.7.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: 880-03 al-Qāmūs al-muḥīṭ / lil-Fīrūzābādī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl al-Shīn. al-Shibdaʻ ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) small naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: Kimīyāʾ al-saʻādah li-man arāda al-ḥusn bi-ziyādah. -- [18--?].
record.note: North African hand.
Black, blue and pink ink.
Diagrams.
Leaf 38 verso blank.
Housed in folder 545.7.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: [Naẓm min Ādam ibn ʻĪsá]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Interlinear notations.
Leaf 4 verso blank.
Housed in folder 545.8.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: [Qaṣīdah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fully vocalized.
Housed in folder 545.8.
Formerly in a leather bag with 20 other texts. Bag stored in a separate box.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣurāḥ min al-Ṣiḥāḥ / Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Khālid al-madʻūw bi-Jamāl al-Qurashī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Khālid al-madʻū bi-Jamāl al-Qurashī ... Aḥmadu Allāh, wa-Huwa al-maḥmūd bi-kull al-lughāt wa-jullihā ..."
Fairly old (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 Iʻlām kalimat al-Ṣiḥāḥ wa-aʻlām alsinatihā al-fiṣāḥ / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Sabbāgh al-Ṣāʼigh. -- [before 1710].
record.note: The title appears in the incipit, leaf 1 verso.
The note on leaf 80 verso records the birth of a son to a certain Uways.
Ḥājjī Khalīfah and Berlin catalog read Sabbāʻ for Sabbāgh.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Qāla Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Sabbāgh [Sabbāʻ (?)] al-Ṣāʼigh ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda muṣaddiq bi-mā warada bi-hi al-anbiyāʼ min tawḥīd ʻaẓamatihi ʻalá ikhtilāf al-lughāt ..."
Small nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwī al-Khayrīyah li-nafʻ al-barīyah / Khayr al-Dīn ibn ... Aḥmad ibn ... ʻAlī ibn Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Ayyūbī al-ʻAlqamī al-Fārūqī. -- 1682.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 314.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa man arāda bi-hi al-khayr lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ..."
Small naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, flap missing.
Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... ʻalá ayd[ī] ... Ibrāhīm ibn al-Ḥājj Yūsuf ... fī ṣabīḥat al-Khamīs, thānī ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1093 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm ibn al-Ḥājj Yūsuf ... on Thursday morning, 12 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1093 [of the Hijrah = 12 November 1682] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb taʼrīkh al-khulafāʼ / taṣnīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī. -- 1615.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh alladhī waʻada fa-wafá wa-awʻada fa-ʻafā ..."
Good Yemenite naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Occasional marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 3 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min raqm hādhā al-taʼrīkh ... yawm al-Jumʻah, ghurrat shahr Ramaḍān ... ʻām arbaʻ wa-ʻishrīn baʻda al-alf ... bi-maḥrūs madīnat Ṣanʻāʼ al-Yaman ... bi-rasm ... Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khazrajī ... bi-yad ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUfayr [?] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This history book was completed ... on Friday, the beginning of the month of Ramaḍan ... of the year 1024 [of the Hijrah = 31 January 1615] ... in the protected city of Ṣanʻāʼ of Yemen ... for ... Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khazrajī ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUfayr [?] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Shudhūr al-ʻuqūd fī taʼrīkh al-ʻuhūd / taʼlīf ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jalá ʻalá al-fikr mā jalá min al-ʻibar ..."
Modern (18th century?) Yemenite naskhī, in red and black, sparsely pointed.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Naẓm al-Nuqāyah / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf najl Yaḥyá al-Wāʻiẓ. -- [17--?].
record.note: The title, scrawled in a later hand on leaf 217 recto, confused the author with ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī.
The author's full name is given in the colophon (explicit).
Kâtip Çelebi (ed. Flügel) misprinted ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz as covering fann al-tafsīr only.

Kâtip Çelebi gives the author's surname as al-Zamzamī al-Makkī. Brockelmann, S II, p. 509, lists a Naẓm ʻilm al-tafsīr under ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAlī al-Zamzamī, d. 1568, possibly the same work. (But Hitti, 7, gives his death date as A.H. 963 / A.D. 1556).
Kâtip Çelebi gives the death date as A.H. 963 (A.D. 1555 or 1556).
According to the colophon the author was a pupil of Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī (d. 1565?).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu muḥtāj al-Ghanī al-Ḥāfiẓ ʻAbd al-Raʼūf najl Yaḥyá al-Wāʻiẓ: Aḥmadu man ajāda bi-al-aḥkām ..."
Modern (18th century?) Yemenite naskhī, in red and black, sparsely pointed.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 3 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Futūḥ al-Shām : al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ / Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Wāqidī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) coarse naskhī, in red and black. Several leaves, including colophon leaf, supplied by a later hand.
Other parts wanting.
Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb min kutub al-Ḥājj Aḥmad al-Rabbāṭ al-Ḥalabī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed. It is of the books of al-Ḥājj Aḥmad al-Rabbāṭ al-Ḥalabī ..."

record.title: 880-01 Futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Apparently has no connection with the work attributed to al-Wāqidī (Brockelmann, I, 136; S I, p. 208).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā Futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā al-Kitāb wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá sāʼir al-umam bi-akram anbiyāʼihi ... Ammā baʻd, Hādhā al-kitāb jaʻaltu fīhi fatḥ Ifrīqīyah baʻda an saʼalanī ṣāḥibī, wa-huwa Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Anṭākī ... fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ikhtiṣāṣ min al-fawāʼid al-Qurʼānīyah wa-al-khawāṣṣ / Abū al-Ḥasan al-Shādhilī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Compared with India Office catalog, 1211 (incipit same, but after the 3d chapter the text would seem to differ).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Abū al-Ḥasan al-Shādhilī fī kitābihi al-Ikhtiṣāṣ min al-fawāʼid al-Qurʼānīyah wa-al--khawāṣṣ: Baʻda Ḥamd Allāh subḥānahu ... wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi ... al-qāʼil ... Idhā waqaʻtum fī al-amr al-ʻaẓīm faqūlū Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Modern (19th century?) naskhī, gradually deteriorating into nastaʻlīq.
Charts and diagrams. Marginalia.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muṭawwal / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī. -- 1680.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhamanā ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻānī wa-daqāʼiq al-bayān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Extensive marginal notes.
Laid-in leaf.
Islamic binding, in red, front cover and flap missing.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī awāʼil ... al-Shaʻbān, tārīkh sanat 1091."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the beginning of ... Shaʻbān, of the year 1091 [of the Hijrah = 27 August 1680]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Sharḥ al-muṭawwal / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī. -- 1743.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Compared with Ahlwardt 7191, this manuscript omits the introduction (which is present in Arabic MSS 297).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh [alladhī] iftataḥa Kitābahu, baʻda al-tayammun bi-al-Tasmiyah, bi-ḥamd Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá li-ḥaqq shayʼin mimmā yajibu ʻalayhi min shukr naʻmāʼihi ..."
Several hands, the first (leaves 1-32) in naskhī, in red and black, the others in nastaʻlīq.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 al-Muṭawwal / li-Saʻd al-Dīn al-Taftāzānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhamanā ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻānī wa-daqāʼiq al-bayān ..."
Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu ... Ibrāhīm al-Mawlawī."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Ibrāhīm al-Mawlawī."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muṭawwal / Saʻd al-Taftāzānī. -- 1826 or 1827.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhamanā ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻānī wa-daqāʼiq al-bayān ..."
Good naskhī.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations in earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, in black.
Colophon: "Katabahu Imām Wardī ibn marḥūm Sahsawār [?] sanat alf wa-miʼatayn baʻda thānī arbaʻūn ... 1242."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Imām Wardī ibn marḥūm Sahsawār [?] in the year 1242 [of the Hijrah = 1826/1827] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Sharḥ al-mukhtaṣar / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻūw bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī. -- [before 1755].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī ..."
Fair naskhī.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Shams al-adab fī istiʻmāl al-ʻArab / ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad al-Thaʻālibī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover; completed according to Brockelmann, I, 285.
Corroded by damp, with considerable damage to text.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd Ḥamd Allāh ʻalá ālāʼihi ... fa-inna man aḥabba Allāh taʻālá is[muhu aḥabba Rasūlahu] ... wa-man aḥabba al-Rasūl aḥabba al-ʻArab, wa-man aḥabba al-ʻArab aḥabba al-lughah al-ʻArabīyah ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, fairly modern (17th century?), in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb fī 23 Jumādá [erasure]."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed on 23 Jumādá [erasure]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Naẓm muwajjahāt al-Tahdhīb / Manṣūr al-Azharī al-Manūfī. -- [before 1863].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on the cover.
The author's name, as above, occurs in the matn on leaf 19 verso.
For the author see Ahlwardt, 251.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Inna khayr mā tawajjahat ilayhi al-āmāl ilá taḥṣīl al-maṭālib, wa-awlá mā tawajjahat bi-hi ṣudūr al-aʻmāl fa-balaghat aʻlá al-marātib ḥamd Allāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mūjiz fī al-ṭibb / Ibn al-Nafīs. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qad rattabtu hādhā al-kitāb ʻalá arbaʻat funūn ..."
Good fairly modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.

record.title: 880-03 al-ʻUlūm al-fākhirah fī al-naẓar fī umūr al-ākhirah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Makhlūf al-Thaʻālibī. -- 1789.
record.note: Handbook of eschatology.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Makhlūf al-Thaʻālibī al-Jazāʼirī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-baqāʼ, al-dāʼim alladhī ḥakama ʻalá khalqihi bi-al-mawt wa-al-fanāʼ ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Kamula ... ghadwata yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, fī awāʼil shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, min ʻām thalāthah baʻda al-miʼatayn wa-alf, ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad Marnīkh al-Tilimsānī dāran wa-manshaʼan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Wednesday morning, the beginning of the month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1203 [of the Hijrah = 29 July 1789] by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad Marnīkh al-Tilimsānī in residence and upgrowth ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mawāqif : al-juzʼ al-awwal / al-Jurjānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand. A note in title page: Sharḥ Mawāqif.
Compared with Ahlwardt 1801 (omits the foreword) and India Office catalog 438.
The 4th marṣad of the 2nd mawqif begins on leaf 118 recto; the 5th (and final) marṣad seems to be missing.
Two fairly modern (18th century?) hands, the first naskhī, the second nastaʻlīq.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥāna man taqaddasat subuḥāt jamālihi ʻan samt al-ḥudūth wa-al-zawāl ..."
Remaining volume(s) wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Birjandī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ li-Qāḍīʹzādah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-mashāriq wa-al-maghārib, muzayyin al-samāʼ bi-zīnat al-kawākib al-thawāqib ..."
Modern (19th century?) cursive nastaʻlīq.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.
With a few diagrams.

record.title: 880-01 Tarjamat al-Zabūr. -- 1593.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh walī al-ḥamd wa-mustaḥiqqihi ... Wa-baʻda al-ḥamd ... fa-hādhihi muqaddimah nashraḥu [bi-sharḥ, ṣaḥḥ] Muṣḥaf al-Zabūr al-muʻaẓẓam ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh nahār al-Ithnayn, fī khāmis yawm khalawna min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat iḥdá wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá al-Adhabī [al-Adhanī (?)] al-Shāfiʻī [al-Q]ādirī ... Wa-qad kutiba bi-rasm al-akh al-ʻazīz ... [Muḥamma]d ibn al-marḥūm ... ʻUmar ibn Ṣalāḥ ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed on Monday, five days having passed from the month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, the year 1001 [of the Hijrah = 3 August 1593] ... by the hand of ... Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá al-Adhabī [al-Adhanī (?)] al-Shāfiʻī [al-Q]ādirī ... Copied for the dear brother [Muḥamma]d ibn al-marḥūm ... ʻUmar ibn Ṣalāḥ ..."

record.title: 880-02 Rātib al-Imām al-Mahdī. -- [before 1882].
record.note: Prayers and exhortations.
Title given in the margin of leaf 1 verso, in a later hand.
Apparently a shorter version than the lithographed edition (Ms. Landberg 384).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-jaʻala al-ẓulumāt wa-al-nūr, thumma alladhīn kafarū bi-Rabbihim yaʻdilūn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Hādá [Hādhā] Rātib al-Imām al-Mahdī ... Sanat 1300. Tamma ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Ghifārī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the Rātib [devotional prayer] of al-Imām al-Mahdī ... The year 1300 [of the Hijrah = 1882/1883]. Completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Ghifārī ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Rātib al-Sharīf / al-Mahdī al-Sūdānī. -- 1886.
record.note: Prayers and exhortations.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Wālī al-Karīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-smāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-jaʻala al-ẓulumāt wa-al-nūr thumma alladhīn kafarū bi-Rabbihim yaʻdilūn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Qad ṣāra al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-Rātib bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-barakat Mahdīyihi ... fī yawm al-Sabt ... 22 khalat min shahr Allāh Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1304."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this Ratib [devotional prayer] was completed, by the help of God Almighty and the blessing of His Mahdī ... on Saturday ... 22 days having passed from the month of God Rabīʻ al-Awwal, the year 1304 [of the Hijrah = 19 December 1886]."

record.title: 880-03 Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadī / Sadīd al-Dīn al-Kāshgharī. -- [1766 or 1767].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlamū, waffaqakum Allāh taʻālá wa-īyānā, inna anwāʻ al-ʻulūm kathīrah ..."
Good naskhī.
Sparse marginalia.
Colophon: "Taḥrīran yawm al-Thulāthā [al-Thulāthāʼ] fī laylat al-Mawlid al-thānī, fī sanat 1180, ʻalá yad ... Mullā Maḥmūd."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied on Tuesday, the second night of al-Mawlid [i.e. 12 Rabīʻ al-Awwal], in the year 1180 [of the Hijrah = 18 August 1766], by the hand of ... Mullā Maḥmūd."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Ghunyat al-mutamallī / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī. -- [before 1877].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in front title page.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah mufattiḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Laid-in leaf of notes in Persian.
Islamic binding, in black.

Colophon: "Ḥarrartu hādhihi al-suṭūr ... fī waqt saʻīdah li-Saʻīd ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Niẓām al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad [ib]n al-Qāsim al-Qādirī ... fī tārīkh rābiʻ Rajab, sanat 1294, arbaʻ wa-tisʻūn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "I wrote these lines ... in a happy time for Saʻīd ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Niẓām al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad [ib]n al-Qāsim al-Qādirī ... on 4 Rajab, the year 1294 [of the Hijrah = 15 July 1877] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1878.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Good Maghribī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in colors, colored drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 15 verso and 16 recto.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Jumʻah al-ʻArabī, fī 21 shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, iḥdá wa-ʻishrūn yawman, sanat 1295 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed on the Arab day of Friday, 21 Muḥarram, the year 1295 [of the Hijrah = 25 January 1878] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1862 or 1863.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red, blue, and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors; drawings, in gold and colors, of Mecca and Medina, on leaves 25 verso and 26 recto.
Islamic binding, in maroon, flap missing.
Colophon: "Katabahu Sulaymān Yasārī min talāmīdh ʻAlī al-Waṣfī. 1279."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Sulaymān Yasārī a student of ʻAlī al-Waṣfī. 1279 [of the Hijrah = 1862/1863]."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1826.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh ... Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors, colored drawings of the holy places in Mecca and Medina on leaves 96 verso and 97 recto.
Islamic binding, in red, flap missing.

Colophon: "Katabahu ... Muḥammad al-Zuhdī ibn al-Ḥājjī ʻUthmān al-ʻarīf bi-Khān Zādah, min talāmīdh Muḥammad al-Ḥamdī al-maʻrūf bi-Khabbāzī ... Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh fī awāʼil shahr Ramaḍān ... li-sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn baʻda al-miʼatayn wa-al-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Muḥammad al-Zuhdī ibn al-Ḥājjī ʻUthmān, known as Khān Zādah, a student of Muḥammad al-Ḥamdī, known as Khabbāzī ... completed at the beginning of the month of Ramaḍān ... of the year 1241 [of the Hijrah = 9 April 1826] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1829.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors, colored drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 11 verso and 12 recto.
On slip pasted inside back cover: "Stevens' 29/2/16 ... from a mosque of Bukhara."
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Tamma ... fī shahr Jumādá al-Awwal, fī sanat khams wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, min yad ... Ḥājjī Mardān al-Khaṭīb ... Hādhihi al-jild khams ʻashar jildan baʻda kitābat al-miʼat jildan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the month of Jumādá al-Awwal, of the year 1245 [of the Hijrah = October/November 1829], by the hand of ... Ḥājjī Mardān al-Khaṭīb ... This is the fifteenth volume I copied [of this book] after the one-hundredth volume ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī al-Simlālī al-Sharīf al-Ḥasanī. -- [before 1865].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in colors.
With drawings, in color, of the holy places in Medina on leaves 25 verso and 26 recto.
Marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Tammat ʻalá yad Muḥammad ibn al-Khiḍr Warrād, wa-mālikuhā ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ṭurayghī. Taḥrīr dhālik fī shahr Allāh Dhī al-Ḥijjah, yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, li-thalāth layālī khalat minhu."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the hand of Muḥammad ibn al-Khiḍr Warrād. Owned by ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ṭurayghī. Dated, Wednesday, three nights having passed from the month of God Dhī al-Ḥijjah."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1857 or 1858.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold on leaf 1 verso; colored drawings of the holy places in Medina and Mecca on leaf 13 verso and 14 recto.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 1274."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed in the year 1274 [of the Hijrah = 1857/1858]."

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1851 or 1852.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso; colored drawings of the holy places in Mecca and Medina on leaves 15 verso and 16 recto.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in black.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... bi-dastkhaṭṭ ... Karam ʻAlī walad Miyān Shaykh Muḥammad ʻurif Janjūhān, sanat 1268 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... by the handwriting of ... Karam ʻAlī walad Miyān Shaykh Muḥammad known as Janjūhān, in the year 1268 [of the Hijrah = 1851/1852] ..."

Leaf 1 recto blank.

record.title: [Adʻīyah wa-fawāʾid]. -- [18--].
record.note: Unbound leaves of various sizes originally in a linen bag (folder 81).
The leaves in folders 7, 62 and 79 are repaired with linen or wool thread.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--].
record.note: The title occurs on leaf 59 recto.
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in colors.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red, yellow, green, and black.
With crude drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 17 verso-18 recto.
Loose in Islamic wrapper, in brown.
Colophon: "Kamula ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Muḥammad al-Marjān ibn Sulaymān al-Shaghānīmī nasaban al-Maghribī dāran ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... Muḥammad al-Marjān ibn Sulaymān al-Shaghānīmī nasaban al-Maghribī dāran ..."

record.title: [Fawāʾid wa-adʻīyah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Charts of combinations of mystical numbers and letters.
Unbound.
Laid-in leaves of various sizes.
Bound with 1 other title. Formerly in a fine leather bag with a smaller manuscript. Bag stored in accompanying box.

record.title: Kitāb Sabʻ al-mathānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Interlinear notations.
Bound with 1 other title. Formerly in a fine leather bag with a smaller manuscript. Bag stored in accompanying box.

record.title: [Fawāʾid]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Various North African hands.
Charts of combinations of mystical numbers and letters.
Unbound.
Formerly in a fine leather bag with a larger manuscript. Bag stored in accompanying box.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1852.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Fair Maghribī, in green and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: Fuṣūl al-ḥawāshī li-Uṣūl al-Shāshī. -- 1798.
record.note: Good naskhī.
Extensive interliner and marginal notes in the earlier part of the manuscript.
In very poor condition, wrapped with rope in a badly damaged leather and linen cover.

record.title: Koran. -- [ca. 1700].
record.note: Leaves 1 verso-2 recto illuminated.
Chart of combinations of mystical numbers and letters.
Lacquer binding with flower motif on inner and outer covers.

record.title: 880-03 al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-barīyah / Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd ibn Ḥammād al-Būṣīrī. -- 1852.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 264. Also known as: Qaṣīdat al-burdah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd ibn Ḥammād al-Būṣīr[ī] ... Amin tadhakkuri jīrānin bi-Dhī Salami ..."
Fair Maghribī, in green and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Kamula ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Muḥammad Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad ... Wa-kāna al-fārigh [al-farāgh] minhu yawm al-Aḥad, al-awwal min al-shahr [shahr] Ṣafar al-khayr, ʻām tisʻah wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... Muḥammad Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad ... on Sunday, 1 Ṣafar, the year 1269 [of the Hijrah = 14 November 1852] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1679.
record.note: Prayers.
Compared with India Office catalog 345 and Ahlwardt 3701 (matn).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī ... Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ li-radd al-qaḍāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
No. 1 of 3 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Aḥad, qabla al-ẓuhr al-awwal, al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻashr min al-Shaʻbān, sanat tisʻīn wa-alf, bi-yad al-faqīr al-musammá bi-ʻAbd al-[Raḥmān] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on Sunday forenoon, 17 Shaʻbān, the year 1090 [of the Hijrah = 23 September 1679], by the hand of the poor named ʻAbd al-[Raḥmān] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Shamāʼil al-Nabī / Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī. -- 1670.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover. Also known as: Kitāb al-shamāʼil.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Qāla ... Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī ... Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
No. 2 of 3 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Taḥrīran fī al-taʼrīkh ithnā min shahr al-Shawwāl, sanat alf wa-thamānūn."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied on 2 Shawwāl, the year 1080 [of the Hijrah = 23 February 1670]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn / Muḥammad al-Bukhārī. -- 1683.
record.note: Compared with Ms. Landberg 440. Būhār 59 lacks the beginning.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ʻallāmat ʻaṣrihi wa-waḥīd dahrihi, taghammadahu Allāh bi-ghufrānih wa-askanahu buḥbūḥat jinānih: Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyid al-khalq Muḥammad ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
No. 3 of 3 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... waqt al-ḍuḥá, yawm al-Ithnayn, al-thāmin min Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1094, alf wa-arbaʻ wa-tisʻūn ʻāman, bi-yad al-faqīr ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... in the early morning, on Monday, 8 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, the year 1094 [of the Hijrah = 6 April 1683], by the hand of the poor ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ..."

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Prayers.
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Adʻiyah / ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib. -- [before 1692?].
record.note: Incipit: "Duʻāʼ Qāmūs. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ilāhī qad talāṭamat amwāj qāmūs qudratik fa-ẓaharat fī kull maqdūr āthār qudrah ʻajībah gharībah ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in blue and black; Persian text in red; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic limp binding, covered with brocade.

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Prayers.
Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red, blue, and black; ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 recto.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red, gilt.

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [before 1893].
record.note: Prayers.
Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso. Leaves 41-57 in nastaʻlīq.
Persian lacquer binding.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Divided, like the Dalāʼil al-khayrāt, into thirds and quarters; but incipit different, as is the 2d incipit on leaf 6 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallim wa-bārik ʻalá man ashraf asmāʼihi Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black; crude ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 verso; colored drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 5 verso and 6 recto.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī : al-thulthu al-awwal. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit different from the Dalāʼil al-khayrāt, as is the 2d incipit on leaf 6 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallim wa-bārik ʻalá man ashraf asmāʼihi Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Omits the regular introductory chapter on prayer, but otherwise the same text.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Asmāʼ Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, miʼatān wa-wāḥid, wa-hiya hādhihi: Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic cover, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Prayers.
Incipit (1): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ijʻal afḍal ṣalawātik ʻadadan wa-anmá barakātika sarmadan ..."
Incipit (2. Folio 10b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī daʻānā ilá al-īmān wa-hadānā bi-al-Qurʼān ..."
Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold on leaf 10 verso.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Good modern (19th century) naskhī.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
On white and blue paper.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Haykal al-sharīf al-mubārak. -- 1828 or 1829.
record.note: On leaf 110 recto a certain Muḥammad Shaḥādah ibn ʻUmar al-Ḥimṣī is mentioned; his relationship to this manuscript is not clear.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Nabtadiʼu ʻalá khīrat Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi bi-naql hādhā al-haykal al-sharīf al-mubārak, wa-huwa adʻiyah wa-abwāb wa-aḥjāb nāfiʻah ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black; crude diagrams.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-qad ahdá hādhā al-haykal al-sharīf al-mubārak ilá waladihi Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Murād ibn al-Ḥājj Muṣṭafá al-Darkazī ... fī sanat 1244."

Translation of the colophon: "He presented this noble and blessed great work to his son Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Murād ibn al-Ḥājj Muṣṭafá al-Darkazī ... in the year 1244 [of the Hijrah = 1828/1829]."

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [before 1842].
record.note: Copied before 1842.
Several naskhī hands; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.

In manuscript on last page of several leaves following leaf 207: "Taken at Cabul Oct[obe]r 1842". On leaf following leaf 207: "Presented to Capt[ai]n McDuff by his friend H T Wakefield 31t March 1843."
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap; front cover missing.

record.title: 880-03 Dlāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mkhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 1-2 supplied in a later hand.
Crude drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 7 verso and 8 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown; front cover and flap missing.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī; leaves 31-35 in a larger hand.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥ[mān al-Raḥīm]. Asmāʼ Sayyidinā [wa-Mawlānā Muḥa]mmad, ṣallá [Allāh] ʻalayhi wa-sallam, miʼatān wa-wāḥid, wa-hiya hādhihi: Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī; ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose in rawhide cover, in leather slip-case.

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit of the prayer ascribed to ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib (folios 50b-53b): "Laka al-ḥamdu Yā Dhā al-jūdi wa-al-majdi wa-al-ʻulá ..."
Fair modern (19th century) naskhī; Persian text in fair nastaʻlīq; in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 Ḥijāb. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black; decorated throughout in gold and colors.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Incipit: "[Asmā Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad ... miʼatān wa-wāḥid, wa-hiya hādhihi ...] Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; the bracketed portion of the incipit is written in another hand on leaf 1 recto.
Crude ʻunwāns in colors. Drawings of the holy places in Medina on leaves 9 verso and 10 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Sanat 1270 [of the Hijrah = 1853/1854]."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1270 [of the Hijrah = 1853/1854]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣaḥīfah al-kāmilah / li-Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in front page.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥaddathanā al-Sayyid al-ajall Najm al-Dīn [Bahāʼ] al-Sharaf Abū al-Ḥasan Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Yaḥyá al-ʻAlawī al-Ḥusaynī ..."
Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī; Persian text in nastaʻlīq; in red and black, ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [after 1869].
record.note: Prayers.
Paper water-marked 1869.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Bi-dast-i khaṭṭ-i Mullā ʻAlāʼ Muḥammad īn [ibn] Mullā Nūr Muḥammad ..."
Translation of the colophon: "In the handwriting of Mullā ʻAlāʼ Muḥammad son of Mullā Nūr Muḥammad ..."

record.title: 880-01 Khawāṣṣ al-Qurʼān wa-fawāʼid. -- 1731.
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title supplied by a modern hand in front page.
The label on the spine of the binding bears traces of what may have been a title; the first preserved word looks something like: fatḥ.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi fī shahr Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām, li-iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn yawman khalat minhu ... fī sanat 1143, ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan Dīb al-Ṭarābulusī waṭanan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed twenty-one days having passed from the month of Rajab ... of the year 1143 [of the Hijrah = 30 January, 1731], by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan Dīb al-Ṭarābulusī waṭanan ..."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- 1693 or 1694.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī. Decorated in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in red.
Colophon: "Mashaqahu ʻUthmān al-ḥāfiẓ bi-al-Qurʼān 1105."
Translation of the colophon: "Calligraphed by ʻUthmān, the Qurʼān memorizer, the year 1105 [of the Hijrah = 1693/1694."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- 1852 or 1853.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī. Decorated in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
Colophon: "Nammaqahu al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shafīq 1269."
Translation of the colophon: "Calligraphed by al-Sayyid Shafīq, in 1269 [of the Hijrah = 1852/1853]."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- [18--?].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī. Decorated in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in maroon.
Colophon: "Katabahu al-faqīr al-Sayyid Ḥasan Raʼfat ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Written by the poor al-Sayyid Ḥasan Raʼfat ..."

record.title: 880-01 Mayāmir Āḥād al-Ṣawm al-Kabīr. -- [17--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Fair modern (18th century) hand, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.
No. 1 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Tafsīr Nashīd al-anshād / Gregory of Nyssa, Saint. -- [17--?].
record.note: Compared with Graf's catalog of Christian manuscripts in Cairo, no. 117.
Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds ... Ibtadá al-Qiddīs bi-hādhihi al-muqaddimah qabla an yabdá bi-al-sharḥ ..."
Good modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.
No. 2 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Farāʼid al-ʻuqūd wa-khulāṣat al-nufūd bi-al-radd ʻalá al-Yahūd fī ḥaqīqat ityān al-Sayyid al-Masīḥ. -- [17--?].
record.note: Composed after 1700 (cf. leaf 138 recto, middle, where it is stated that "it has now elapsed more than 1700 years" since the coming of Jesus.

Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds ... Farāʼid al-ʻuqūd wa-khulāṣat al-nufūd bi-al-radd ʻalá al-Yahūd fī ḥaqīqat ityān al-Sayyid al-Masīḥ wa-madhhab al-Masīḥīyah al-ṣaḥīḥ bi-qūwat al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-tarjīḥ ..."
Fair modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.
No. 3 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mukātabāt : bayna ... Ilyās al-Ṭarābulusī Lūghūtātī al-Kursī al-Rasūlī al-Anṭākī wa-bayna aḥad al-ʻulamāʼ al-Inkilīz yusammá Sharman min al-tujjār. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see Graf, Geschichte der christlichen arabischen Literatur, III, 134.
On Euthymius Ṣayfī see Graf, III, 179.

Incipit: "Muḥādharāt bi-wāsiṭat al-mukātabāt waqaʻat fīmā bayna ... al-Shammās Ilyās al-Ṭarābulusī Lūghūtātī al-Kursī al-Rasūlī al-Anṭākī wa-bayna aḥad al-ʻulamāʼ al-Inkilīz yusammá Sharman min al-tujjār al-muʻtabarīn wa-dhālika fī sanat 1734 Masīḥīyah ..."
Fair 18th century naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.
No. 4 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Masāʼil / al-Qiddīs Bāsīliyūs al-Kabīr. -- 1755.
record.note: For al-Anṭākī's version of the Psalms, cf. Graf, I, 116.
For the ethical maxims, cf. Graf, I, 344, 608 (where, however, reference is made to Berlin catalog, 10181 (16), which is a different text).

Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ [al-Quds] ... Masāʼil saʼlahā al-Ab al-Qiddīs Ghirīghūriyūs ilá akhīhi al-Qiddīs Bāsīliyūs al-Kabīr, wa-min Bāsīliyūs ilá Ghirīghūriyūs ayḍan ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.
No. 5 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-naskhnā hādhihi al-mawjūdah fī shahr Tishrīn, sanat 1755 Masīḥīyah."
Translation of the colophon: "We copied this codex in the month of Tishrīn [October or November] of the Christian year 1755."

record.title: 880-01 Mīzān al-zamān wa-qisṭās abadīyat al-insān / by Juan Eusebio Nieremberg ; translated into Arabic by Yūsuf ibn Jirjis ... al-Ḥalabī al-Mārūnī. -- [before 1860].
record.note: Another ex-libris on leaf 168 verso is dated 1745, but the date seems to have been written over another original date, and is probably not genuine.

Incipit: "Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Faylasūf ... Yūsuf ibn Jirjis al-Abūdiyākun al-Ḥalabī al-Mārūnī ... Innanī lammā raʼaytu al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Mīzān al-zamān wa-qisṭās abadīyat al-insān jalīl al-maʻānī ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-02 Mawāʻiẓ / Anṭūniyūs ibn Mubārak al-Mārūnī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Author's colophon at end gives his name, place and date of composition.
Graf, III, 436, composed in 1976, is presumably another collection of sermons.

Of the two manuscripts referred to by Graf, the first (ʻAyn warqah), composed in 1716, contains only 16 sermons; the other contains sermons also by other authors, and the number of Antonius' sermons and the date of composition are not given.
Incipit: "al-ʻIẓah al-ūlá: Fī fāʼidat al-waʻẓ wa-sharafihi wa-fī istimāʻ kalām Allāh wa-ẓarūrīyatih [wa-ḍarūrīyatih] ..."
Fair modern (18th century) Karshūnī/Garshūnī (Arabic in Syriac script), in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.

Author's colophon: "Ḥurrira bi-Rūmiyah al-Kubrá, fī Madrasat al-Mawārinah, fī al-yawm al-thāminʻashar min shahr Kānūn al-Awwal, sanat sabʻimiʼah wa-ʻishrīn baʻda al-alf lil-tajassud al-Ilāhī. Anṭūniyūs ibn Mubārak al-Mārūnī."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Written in Great Rome, at the School of the Maronites, on 18 Kānūn al-Awwal [December], the year 1720 after the Divine Incarnation. Anṭūniyūs ibn Mubārak al-Mārūnī."

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb Yashūʻ ibn Shīrākh. -- 1853.
record.note: Cf. Graf, Geschichte der christlichen arabischen Literatur, I, 128.
Incipit: "Nabtadiʼ bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi bi-kitābat [Kitāb] Yashūʻ ibn Shīrākh ... wa-huwa ʻishrūn iṣḥāḥ. al-Iṣḥāḥ al-Awwal: Kull ḥikmah hiya min ʻamal al-Rabb ..."
Cursive hand.
Colophon: "Khaluṣa al-kitāb ... fī awwal shahr Āb, sanat 1853 Masīḥīyah."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed on the first of the month of Āb [August], of the Christian year 1853."

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb al-Majmaʻ al-Lubnānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds ... Kitāb al-Majmaʻ al-Lubnānī, wa-yashtamilu ʻalá arbaʻat aqsām ..."
Modern (19th century) cursive hand, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-01 Ṭarīqah sahlah yataʻallamu bi-hā al-insān khabarīyat al-Kitāb al-Muqaddas. -- 1804.
record.note: Perhaps identical with one of the Mukhtaṣars (in catechetical form) listed by Graf IV, 268-269.

Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds ... Nabtadiʼu bi-kitābat ṭarīqah sahlah yataʻallamu bi-hā al-insān khabarīyat al-Kitāb al-Muqaddas. Muqaddimah lil-qāriʼ. Innahu yajibu ʻalá kull muʼmin min al-Masīḥīyīn an yakūna ḥāṣilan ʻalá khabarīyat asrār īmānihi ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Bi-yad al-ʻabd al-khāṭiʼ Marʻī al-Daḥdāḥī. Fī sabʻah wa-ʻishrīn yawman min shahr Ḥazīrān, sanat arbaʻah wa-thamānimiʼh wa-alf, 1804."
Translation of the colophon: "By the hand of the sinner servant Marʻī al-Daḥdāḥī. On 27 Ḥazīrān [June], 1804."

record.title: 880-02 Sawāʻī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Similar titles in British Museum catalog of printed Arabic books.
Cf. Greek edition of the Horologion, 28a.66.

Incipit: "Bi-ism Allāh al-Ḥayy al-Azalī al-Abadī ... nabtadiʼu naktubu Sawāʻī barāmūnīyāt al-Mīlād. al-Sāʻah al-ūlá. Nabtadiʼu, ka-al-ʻādah, wa-naqūlu: Quddūs Allāh, wa-mā yatlūhā ..."
Two modern (19th century) hands in naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Ikhtiṣār ʻilm al-majāmiʻ al-muqaddasah al-mukhtaṣṣah bi-dhikr al-Qurbān al-Muqaddas / taʼlīf al-Ab Yūsuf al-Yasūʻī. -- 1680.
record.note: Neither of the two manuscripts catalogues referred to by Graf give quotations, but the work is obviously the same.
A note in French on leaf 91 recto: Dialogue sur le tres st. sacrem[en]t de l'Autel. sur le sacrifice de la Messe et sur la dignité des prestres.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Ḥayy al-Azalī. Kitāb Ikhtiṣār ʻilm al-majāmiʻ al-muqaddasah al-mukhtaṣṣah bi-dhikr al-Qurbān al-Muqaddas ... min taʼlīf al-Ab Yūsuf al-Yasūʻī ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.
Remaining parts wanting.
Colophon: "Sanat 1680."
Translation of the colophon: "In the year 1680."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Maʻūnah ʻalá dafʻ al-hamm / taʼlīf Īlīyā Muṭrān Nuṣaybīn. -- 1802.
record.note: Treatise on ethics.
Author and title are given on leaf 6 verso; also on front title page as: Kitāb al-maʻūnah ʻalá dafʻ al-humūm.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Khāliq al-Ḥayy al-Nāṭiq. Āmīn. Qāla muʼallif al-kitāb: Lammā kānat al-humūm bi-qadr al-himam, wa-al-faraḥ wa-al-surūr bi-qadr al-niʻam ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb shams al-adab wa-qāʻidat al-ḥikmah. -- 1802.
record.note: Apparently not identical with Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq's Ādāb al-falāsifah (Brockelmann, S I, p. 368).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-muʼallif li-hādhā al-kitāb: Inna al-Bārī taʻālá, al-qadīm, dhī al-niʻam al-sābighah wa-al-ḥujaj al-bālighah wa-al-āyāt al-nāfiʻah alladhī qaddara fa-hadā [fa-hadá] wa-khalaqa fa-sawwá ..."
Cursive hand, in red and black.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Qad ʻallaqahu ... Ilyās [ibn?] Yūsuf Dimnī[?], wa-dhālika fī awāʼil shahr Tammūz, sanat alf wa-thamānimiʼah wa-ithnayn ..."
