Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Ilyās [ibn?] Yūsuf Dimnī[?], in the beginning of the month of Tammūz [August], 1802 ..."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Yūsuf. -- [17--?].
record.note: Apparently different from the accounts of al-Kisāʼī and al-Thaʻlabī.
Incipit: Beginning missing. Folio 1a begins with: "... shaybataka idh yaqūlu: Innanā naḥnu wa-anta nasjudu bayna yadayhi, fa-taʼāmarū ʻalá qatlihi fīmā baynahum ..."
Modern (18th century?) hand.

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ al-Ādāb / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Wahhāb al-mannān, al-murshid lil-dalīl wa-al-burhān ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Badly damaged by corrosive ink.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah. -- [17--?].
record.note: The date on 29a is 1705 (AʻH), that of compilation (cf. Brockelmann).
Leaf 96 pasted to back-cover.
Fair 18th century Karshūnī (Garshūnī: Arabic in Syriac script), in red, yellow, green, and black.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat ashʻār Durzīyah. -- [1781].
record.note: The ʻAskarīyah of ʻImād al-Dīn [ibn al-Muqaddam] on leaf 10 is the same as Berlin catalog 4353.
Incipit: "Wa-qāla baʻḍuhum shiʻran: Daʻi al-qawma inna al-qawma ʻanka bi-maʻzili ..."
Good naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.
On folio 2a: "Fī sanat [1]195 (1781). Katabahu Rawḍad."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Shams al-bāzighah / Ḥamd Allāh ibn Shukr Allāh al-Sandīlī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The title is given in the explicit and in a later hand on leaf 1 verso.
Compared with Bankipore, XXI, 2396; same incipit as in India Office 562, where the author is called Aḥmad Allāh (so copied by Brockelmann, II, 420).
India Office catalog and Bankipore catalog attribute al-Shams al-bāzighah to al-Jaunpūrī.
Ziriklī (2:274): "Ibn Shukr Allāh; Ḥamd Allāh ibn Shukr Allāh, ʻālim bi-al-ḥikmah, la-hu fīhā 'al-Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Shams al-bāzighah' lil-Jawnfūrī. -1160/-1747."
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. La-hu al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah, wa-ʻalá Rasūlihi wa-ālihi al-ṣalāh wa-al-taḥīyah ..."
Modern (18th century?) hasty nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 Taʻrīfāt / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī. -- 1844.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm ..."
Small nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.
Colophon: "Kamula ... ẓuhr Thulāthāʼ 23 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1260."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Tuesday noon, 23 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1260 [of the Hijrah = 4 December, 1844]."

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī. -- 1840.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma Ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī assasa qawāʻid al-Islām wa-mahhadahu, wa-hadá ʻibādaka li-dīnaka wa-arshadah ..."
Small naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma ʻujālatan fī al-Masjid al-Wazīrī yawm al-Aḥad, fī Ramaḍān, sanat 1256."
Translation of the colophon: "It was quickly completed at al-Masjid al-Wazīrī on a Sunday in Ramaḍān, 1256 [of the Hijrah = November, 1840."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah. -- 1700-1702.
record.note: Material on leaf 15 ff. repeated on leaf 39 ff.
Fair naskhī, in red and black; diagram on leaf 28 verso.
Colophon: "Tammat ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn Abā Yazīd, fī qaryat Shūr, sanat ... 1112-[1113]."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the hand of ... Aḥmad ibn Abā Yazīd, in the village of Shūr, in the year 1112-[1113] [of the Hijrah = 1700-1702]."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah. -- 1651-1845.
record.note: Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black; with diagrams.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red, blue, and black.
Loose in Oriental canvas wrapper, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, fairly modern (18th century?).

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, fairly modern (18th century?).

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrat al-Aʻrāf. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red, green, and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fair modern (18th century?) Indian naskhī, in red and black.
In manuscript on fly-leaf at end: "Calcutta."
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Coarse modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black.
On printed slip pasted inside front cover: "Manuscript Koran (from Ngelzerma, Western Sudan)."
Loose between cardboard covers.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1851.
record.note: Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap and thong.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Jumʻah baʻda ṣalāt al-ʻaṣr, fī yawm ithnayn wa-al-ʻishrūn, Rabīʻ al-Thānī, ʻām sabʻah wa-sittūn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Hawānī al-Waṭṭāʼ ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on Friday, after the afternoon prayer, on 22 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1267 [of the Hijrah = 24 February, 1851], by the hand of its copier ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Hawānī al-Waṭṭāʼ ..."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs I-XVIII. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī.
On slip pasted inside front cover: "Coran antique du Soudan rapporté par M. Ponty gouverneur général de l'Afrique occidentale ..."
Loose between rawhide boards, with fur on the outside, in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap and thong.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs XVII-XVIII. -- [18--?].
record.note: This fragment was inserted at the end of Arabic MSS 375.
Modern (19th century) Maghribī.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Good naskhī, in red and black, fairly modern (18th century?).
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fairly good modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
On leaf pasted inside front cover: "Lent by Sir Wollaston Knocker. Sent from Tirah, 1897-8, by Capt. Dickson. Loot from the expedition."
Islamic binding, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) Indian naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 1-2 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Good fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 1-2 supplied by a later hand.
In manuscript on leaf 512 recto: "Malakand, Swat-Valley, April 5th 1895. E. McR. Wt "
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [before 1661].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso, 2 recto, 267 recto.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi sanat 1071.
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed in the year 1071 [of the Hijrah = 1660/1661]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [16--?].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, fairly modern (17th century?), in gold, blue, and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1886.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Taḥarrara hādhā ... bi-yawm al-Jumʻah ... 13 Shawwāl, sanat 1303. Mulk Muḥammad Wahbī Ḥusayn."
Translation of the colophon: "Written ... on Friday ... 13 Shawwāl, 1303 [of the Hijrah = 15 July, 1886]. Owned by Muḥammad Wahbī Ḥusayn."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Good modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; leaves 1-2 supplied in a later hand.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Indian (Javanese?) naskhī, modern (19th century?), in red and black; leaves 1-2 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, canvas covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Slip pasted inside back cover calls this "antique Arabic Ms. from the great mosque of Basrah, probably one of the oldest in existence"--Which is either way off, or else belongs to another manuscript.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black. Leaf 1 supplied by a later hand.
The copyist seems to have been a rather illiterate person.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Good naskhī, modern (19th century?), in red and black.
In manuscript on fly-leaf: "Taken by 21st Punjab Infantry in Bunér, January 1898 ... (Found in a house with other books described as belonging to one Sáiad Bāba) - J. K . Christie."
Armorial bookplate: "Ex bibliotheca Car. I. Taboris."
Christie's note says also "Written in Kūfa. Turkey A.D. 1500 (approx.)"--Whence this information was taken is not stated.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 1-2 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Kātib Sayyid Murtaḍá wuld Sayyid Isḥāq."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Sayyid Murtaḍá wuld Sayyid Isḥāq."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: The colophon date, A.H. 1003 (A.D. 1594 or 1595) "at Mecca," has been written in by a later hand and is certainly not genuine.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 1-6 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, in black, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī al-tārīkh <hafdahum> sabʻ ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī yawm al-Arbaʻ, baʻda ṣalāt al-fajr 'fī Makkah sanat 1003' [added above the line, upside down]."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed ... on 17 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, on Wednesday, after the dawn's prayer, 'at Mecca, in the year 1003' [added above the line, upside down] [= 30 November, 1594]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1848 or 1849.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in white and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Bookplate of Elizabeth S. Gould, with inked notation "Cairo 1896."
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu ... al-Sayyid Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Kāmil, min talāmīdh al-Sayyid Ḥāfiẓ ʻUmar al-Wahbī ... sanat 1265."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... al-Sayyid Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Kāmil, a student of al-Sayyid Ḥāfiẓ ʻUmar al-Wahbī ... in the year 1265 [of the Hijrah = 1848/1849]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1788.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Bound in red morocco, gilt with brass clasp.
Colophon: "Katabahu ḥāfiẓ al-Qurʼān Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad ... Qad tamma ... hādhā al-Muṣḥaf al-Sharīf fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat thalāth wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the memorizer of the Qurʼān Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad ... This Noble Muṣḥaf was completed in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1203 [of the Hijrah = November/December, 1788 ..."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [after 1500].
record.note: The colophon date, A.H. 905 (A.D. 1499 or 1500), in a later hand, is probably not genuine.
Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Sanat 905."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 905 [of the Hijrah = 1499/1500]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso and 2 recto.
In manuscript on leaf 1 verso: "R[obert]. M[unro]. Binning E[ast]. I[ndia]. C[ompany]. C[ivil]. S[ervice]. Madras."
Robert Blair Munro Binning is the author of a colloquial Arabic grammar, 1849 (British Museum catalog).
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Good modern (19th century?) naskhī; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red, blue, and black; ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose in Islamic folding binding, in brown, in slip-case with loops for shoulder strap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī (West African?); crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose in leather wrapper, with thong; in leather bag, with shoulder strap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī (West African?), in red and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose between rawhide boards, with fur on the outside; in leather bag, with shoulder strap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Central African), in red, green, blue, and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
2 leaves inserted as: "Report on al-Qurān al-karīm by M.M. Huk esq. 1904. John Stirling, solicitor, Haddington."
According to Huk, this copy "was most probably transcribed in Central Africa (near Lake Chad, where it was found by the present owner)." When Huk examined the manuscript, it was in a leather bag.
Loose in Oriental wrapper, in brown, with thong.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī (West African), in red and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose in brown leather bag, with shoulder strap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrah VI. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap; front cover wanting.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Several leaves supplied by later hands.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs XXXVI-XCVII. -- [18--?].
record.note: Two modern (19th century?) Maghribī hands, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs LI-LVII. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1814.
record.note: Good naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-majmū̄ʻ, al-Qurʼān al-Mubārak, nahār al-Jumʻah ... fī thalāth ʻashar yawm khalat min shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf. Wa-ḥarrarah ... Maḥmūd al-Khaṭīb, al-qāṭin fī qaryat al-Suwaydā bi-Ḥawrān."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this collection of the Blessed Qurʼān was completed on Friday ... 13 Rajab, 1229 [of the Hijrah = 1 July, 1814]. Transcribed by ... Maḥmūd al-Khaṭīb who resides at the village of al-Suwaydā in Ḥawrān [Syria]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs XVIII-CXIV. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) Indian naskhī, in red, gold, and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs XVIII-CXIV. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) Indian naskhī, in red, blue, gold, and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Several modern (19th century?) naskhī hands, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: Ittafaqa al-nassābūn anna al-insān bi-anwāʻihi wa-ajnāsihi yantamī ilá awlād Nūḥ. -- [ca. 1639 or 40].
record.note: With: 9 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Qāmūs al-muḥīṭ : al-Niṣf al-thānī / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in front page.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Ḍād, faṣl al-Hamzah. Abaḍ al-baʻir yaʼbaḍuhu: Shadda rusgh yadihi ilá ʻaḍudih ..."
Fair modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap and metal bosses.
The first half wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title appears in the colophon.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ... Asmāʼ Sayyidinā Muḥammad ... miʼatān wa-aḥad asmāʼ, wa-hiya hādhihi: Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Typewritten on card inserted loose: "Mahomedan holy book, in manuscript, Kano, Northern Nigeria. 1922."
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap and thong.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title given in the explicit.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ... Asmāʼ Sayyidinā Muḥammad ... wa-hiya miʼatān wa-wāḥid. Wa-hiya hādhihi ... Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī, in red and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose between leather boards, with thong, in leather case with shoulder straps.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) Maghribī (West-African), in red and black.
In manuscript, on slip inserted in front: "Looted during massacre of Benin ... near mouth of River Niger, Western Africa."
Loose in Islamic cover, in black; in leather bag.

record.title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl : al-Rubʻ al-ākhīr / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.

Incipit: "Sūrat Ṣ Makkīyah, wa-hiya sitt wa-thamānūn, wa-qīla thamān wa-thamānūn [āyah]. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣād ʻalá al-waqf, wa-hiya akthar al-qirāʼah, wa-quriʼa bi-al-kasr ..."
Good fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.
Volumes I, II, III wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar al-ṣaghīr : al-juzʼ al-awwal / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Kharashī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover as: Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar lil-Kharashī wa-huwa al-sharḥ al-ṣaghīr.
For the author see Brockelmann, II, 318; S II, p. 438.
Incipit same as in Gotha 1056; Alger 1192.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-muḥīṭ bi-khafīyāt al-ghuyūb, al-muṭṭaliʻ ʻalá sarāʼir al-qulūb al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-irādat kull maḥbūb wa-mawhūb ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) Maghribī, in red, blue, and black.
Marginalia.
On label pasted to flap: "Manuscrit arabe. Prise de la Smala".
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: 880-03 al-Hidāyah fī sharḥ al-Bidāyah : al-juzʼ al-awwal / ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Marghīnānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The title of al-Hidāyah supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
The Kitāb al-nikāḥ begins on leaf 110 recto.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu Allāh [lillāh] alladhī aʻlá maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muḥarrar : al-juzʼ al-awwal / lil-Imām ... al-Rāfiʻī. -- 1855 or 1856.
record.note: Incomplete at end.
The author's name and the title are given in the colophon to the first rubʻ, leaf 55 verso.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Wa-anzalnā min al-samāʼ māʼan ṭahūran' al-āyah. Wa-lā yajūzu rafʻ al-ḥadath wa-lā izālat al-najāsah illā bi-al-māʼ ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Other volumes wanting.

Colophon: "Ḥarrartu hādhā al-kitāb li-nafsī, wa-anā ... Shaykh ʻAlī Afandī, al-mudarris fī Aḥmadīyah, al-Shāfiʻī al-madhhab, al-Qādirī al-mashrab, al-Jawān Rūdī al-waṭan, al-Kūraʼī al-maskan ... sanat 1272."

Translation of the colophon: "I wrote this book for myself, I ... Shaykh ʻAlī Afandī, the teacher at Aḥmadīyah, al-Shāfiʻī al-madhhab, al-Qādirī al-mashrab, al-Jawān Rūdī al-waṭan, al-Kūraʼī al-maskan ... in the year 1272 [of the Hijrah = 1855/1856]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Jāmī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu li-walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Fawāʼid wāfiyah bi-ḥall mushkilāt al-Kāfiyah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.

record.title: 880-03 al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah / Ibn al-ʻArabī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The title is found on leaf 57 recto, in a later hand.
Chapter-headings are same as in Berlin catalog 2856.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Badly wormed and mutilated, leaves misbound.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Aḥad ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Sunday ..."

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Calligraphic modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red, green, yellow, and black; leaves 55-81 in later cursive hands.
Islamic binding, in brown, flap missing.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century?) naskhī.
On bluish tinted paper, some leaves misbound.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah. -- 1572.
record.note: The text of the commentary begins (save for a few words) on leaf 2 recto.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Waṣīyah al-muṭlaqah arbaʻat anwāʻ, aḥaduhā an takūna al-waṣīyah bi-qadr al-thulth aw aqall ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.
Colophon: "Tamma ... min yad ... ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Nāṣir Bārikī, mashhūr bi-Yāryalāq, fī sanat tisʻah wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, fī yawm ʻasharah min shahr Shawwāl, fī yaw Yakshanbah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Nāṣir Bārikī, known as Yāryalāq, in the year 979 [of the Hijrah], on Monday, 10 Shawwāl [6 March, 1572] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Ghunyat al-mutamallī / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī. -- 1608.
record.note: Beginning missing.
Title supplied by a modern hand in front page.
Compared with Arabic MSS 312.
The explicit of the commentary proper (quoted in Berlin catalog) is found on leaf 234 verso.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
In manuscript on fly-leaf: "W. A. Blane 1824."

Colophon: "Tammat al-awrāq ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAlī ibn Ḥājjī Muḥammad al-Aydinī, al-sākin fī qaṣabat Kūzilḥiṣār ... fī taʼrīkh ... sanat sitta ʻashar wa-alf, yawm ʻArafah, fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, min al-yawm al-tāsiʻ min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The leaflets were completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAlī ibn Ḥājjī Muḥammad al-Aydinī, who resides in the district of Kūzilḥiṣār [probably "Güzelce Hisar (Istanbul, Turkey)" ... dated ... in the year 1016 [of the Hijrah], on the forenoon of the day of ʻArafah, 9 Dhī al-Ḥijjah [= Wednesday, 26 March, 1608] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Nūr al-anwār fī sharḥ al-Manār / Aḥamd Jīwan al-Laknawī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Leaves misbound; the concluding part of the incipit, with the title, appears on leaf 278 recto.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1848.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso and 2 recto.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.

Colophon (floio 308b): "Katabahu ... al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Ḥilmī [al-maʻrūf] bi-Ḥāfiẓ al-Qurʼān, min talāmīdh al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Amīn, al-maʻrūf bi-ʻIzzatī ... sanat 1264, fī 5 Sh [Shaʻbān, aw, Shawwāl]."

Translation of the colophon: "Written by ... al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Ḥilmī [known as] the Qurʼān Memorizer, a student of Ḥājj Muḥammad Amīn, known as ʻIzzatī ... on 5 Sh [Shaʻbān, or, Shawwāl] of the year 1264 [7 July 1848, or, 4 September 1848]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1261 or 1262.
record.note: On the scribe, cf. Huart, Les calligraphes et les miniaturistes de l'Orient Musulman, Paris, 1908, p. 84 ff.
Pasted in is an ALS by Richard J.H. Gottheil in October 29, 1931 to Henry Fletcher describing this manuscript.
Calligraphic microscopic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in blue and gold on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, much younger, gilt, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu Yāqūt al-Mustaʻṣimī sanat sittīn wa-sittimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "Written by Yāqūt al-Mustaʻṣimī in the year 660 [of the Hijrah = 1261/1262]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Qaṣīdah al-Muḥammadīyah / lil-Imām al-Būṣīrī. -- 1878.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Muḥammadun ashraf al-Aʻrābi wa-al-ʻAjami // Muḥammadun khayru man yamshī ʻalá qadami ..."
Copied in the form of a primer of calligraphy; calligraphic hand.
Islamic binding, in maroon.
Colophon: "Tammat al-Qaṣīdah al-Muḥammadīyh lil-Imām al-Būṣirī [al-Būṣīrī] ... Nammaqahu al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shafīq ... sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "al-Qaṣīdah al-Muḥammadīyah of al-Imām al-Būṣirī [al-Būṣīrī] is completed ... Calligraphed by al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shafīq ... in the year 1295 [of al-Hijrah = 1878] ..."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- 1864 or 1865.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī.
Islamic binding, in maroon.
Colophon: "Bandah-ʼi Al ʻAbā Sayyid ʻIzzat Muṣṭafá. Sanat 1281."
Translation of the colophon: "Servant Al ʻAbā Sayyid ʻIzzat Muṣṭafá. The year 1281 [of the Hijrah = 1864/1865]."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) naskhī.
Colophon: "Sawwadahu ... ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ḥamdī. Katabahu ... Muṣṭafá al-shahīr bi-Kūtāhī."
Translation of the colophon: "Created by ... ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ḥamdī. Written by ... Muṣṭafá known as Kūtāhī."

record.title: Arabic primer of calligraphy. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern (19th century) calligraphic hand.
Colophon: "Katabahu ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd Allāh ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Written by ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd Allāh ..."

record.title: 880-02 Khulāṣat al-ḥisāb / Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-ʻĀmilī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Manual of arithmetic.
The author's surname is misspelled "al-Nāʼilī" in the incipit.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man lā yuḥīṭu bi-jamīʻ niʻamih ʻadad ..."
Fair modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
With mathematical diagrams on the margins.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī al-hayʼah / Mūsá ibn Muḥammad Qāḍīʹzādah. -- [15--?].
record.note: Incomplete at end.
No. 1 of 2 items bound together.
End of leaf 50 corresponds to leaf 162 recto (numbered 166) of Ms. Landberg 361; probably only one leaf is missing.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-shams ḍiyāʼan wa-al-qamar nūran ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) hasty nastaʻlīq, almost entirely unpointed.
With copious diagrams, some with background-pictures representing the constellations in the form of human and animal figures.
In manuscript on fly-leaf: "Comprado en el Cairo 27/12/28. T[eodoro] B[ecu]." With Becu's bookplate.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 al-Tadhkirah al-Nāṣirīyah : al-bāb al-thānī / Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī. -- [15--?].
record.note: The chapter-headings agree exactly with those given by Berlin catalog, 5681.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
The date A.H. 809 (A.D. 1406 or 1407) is supplied at end by a later hand and is obviously not genuine.
With diagrams, some with background-pictures representing the constellations in the form of human and animal figures.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1845.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors; bird's eye views in gold and colors of the holy places in Mecca and Medina on leaves 16 verso-17 recto.
Islamic binding, in maroon, flap missing.
Colophon: "Sanat 1261."
Translation of the colophon: "The year 1261 [of the Hijrah = 1845]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1611.
record.note: Small calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi shahra Muḥarram sanat 1020."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed during the month of Muḥarram of the year 1020 [of the Hijrah = March/April, 1611]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1869 or 1870.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Qad tamma ... min yad ... Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Ṣiddīqī ka-mā ajāzanī ustādhī Ḥāfiẓ Ibrāhīm Kamāl [...] sanat 1286."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Ṣiddīqī, as I was approved/authorized by my master Ḥāfiẓ Ibrāhīm Kamāl [...] in the year 1286 [of the Hijrah = 1869/1870]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaf 271 supplied by a later hand.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Alfīyah / Muḥammad ibn Mālik. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in front page.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Fair modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
Stamp on leaves 1 recto and 31 verso: "Kasim Vidjen trgovac Trebinje."
Laid-in leaves.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qarābādhīn al-ṣaghīr / Muḥammad al-mulaqqab bi-ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn al-ṭabīb. -- [17--?].
record.note: The original title is given in the preface, but has been washed out by a water-stain (leaf 2 recto). The conjectured title, as above, has been suggested by the reference on leaf 72 recto to "qarābādhīnī al-kabīr alladhī dawwantuh ..."

Perhaps this has some connection with the Baḥr al-jawāhir, a similar pharmacopoeia in Arabic with occasional Persian, by Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-ṭabīb al-Harawī (Berlin catalog, 6239; although the quotations given there do not seem to agree with this work; or is the Baḥr al-jawāhir the larger pharmacopoeia, "al-Qarābādhīn al-kabīr," referred to?).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mubdiʻ lil-mujarradāt, al-fāṭir [lil-mujassamāt, al-mukhtariʻ lil-mufradāt, al-khāliq lil-murakkabāt, al-mūjid] li-mawādd al-kāʼināt wa-ṣuwar al-mawjūdāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu [...] Muḥammad al-mulaqqab bi-ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn al-Ṭabīb: Lammā kāna al-insān al-makhlūq ashraf al-makhlūqāt ..."
Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in gold, red, and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Naskh qarmah sī qāʻidah sīlah Chamshīr Ḥāfiẓ Ṣāliḥ Afandīnik khaṭṭīdar."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ Khulāṣat al-Kaydānī. -- 1700.
record.note: For the matn, compared with Berlin catalog, 3524.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Maʻná al-tasmiyah bi-al-Fārisīyah ʻalá al-taḥqīq bi-Nāme Khudā bī hamtā aghāz mīkunam ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in red.
Colophon: "Tamām shad Sharḥ-i Khulāṣah-i Kaydānī bi-waqt-i dū pahar-i rūz-i Yakshanbah 18 hazduhm-i shahr-i Ṣafar ... sanat-i 1112 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The commentary on al-Kaydānī's Khulāṣah was completed at two O'clock on Sunday, 18 Ṣafar, 1112 [of the Hijrah = 4 August 1700]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣurāḥ min al-Ṣiḥāḥ : maʻ dhayl / lil-Qurashī. -- [13--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in note.

The colophon on leaf 281 recto is the original one (mentioned in the Bankipore catalogue, IX, p. 46), and the wording "katabahu muʼallifuhu" at the foot of the page evidently does not refer to this manuscript. The copy seems to have been made not far from the author's time.
Old (14th century?) cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Laid-in leaves.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black. The Persian introduction in nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-01 Muʼayyid al-khawf wa-al-rajāʼ. -- [1749 or 1750].
record.note: A theological tract.
No. 1 of 5 items bound together.
The title (tasmiyah) appears on leaf 2 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamd jamīl bī ghāyah wa-thanāʼ jazīl bī nihāyah awwal khāliq kawnayn wa-rāziq thaqalayn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black, fully vocalized.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Wajīz fī uṣūl al-dīn / Yūsuf ibn Ḥusayn al-Kirmāstī. -- 1749 or 1750.
record.note: No. 2 of 5 items bound together.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Rabbanā ātinā min ladunka raḥmatan wa-hayyiʼ la-nā min amrinā rashadan ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Tārīkh al-taḥrīr sanat 1163."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied in the year 1163 [of the Hijrah = 1749/1750]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taḥīyah al-Muḥammadīyah / ʻAbd al-Razzāq ibn Muṣṭafá al-Anṭākī. -- [1749 or 1750].
record.note: No. 3 of 5 items bound together.
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 973; al-Baghdādī, Hadīyat al-ʻārifīn, col. 568.
Incipit: "Laka al-ḥamd yā man ṣallá bi-akmal al-taḥīyāt ʻalá Sayyid al-Wará ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Tartīb al-ʻulūm / Muḥammad al-Marʻashī al-madʻūw bi-Sājaqlīzādah. -- 1750.
record.note: A concise encyclopedia.
No. 4 of 5 items bound together.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad al-Marʻashī al-madʻū bi-Sāchaqlī Zādah ... Iʻlamū maʻāshir al-ṭalabah ... innahu kāna yūjadu fī kull qarn ... ṭāʼifah min al-ʻulamāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Qad tamma al-farāgh min yad ... Muṣṭafá ibn Ḥusayn Ādhanī ... fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ min shahr Jumādá al-Ākhir, min sanat thalāth wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, sanat 1263."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed by the hand of ... Muṣṭafá ibn Ḥusayn Ādhanī ... on Wednesday, in the month of Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 1163 [of the Hijrah = 13 (?) May, 1750]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī faḍīlat al-ʻimāmah / Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá al-Bukhārī. -- [1749 or 1750].
record.note: Treatise on turbans.
No. 5 of 5 items bound together.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kawwara wujūdanā bi-ḥikmatih, wa-sharrafa ruʼūsanā bi-sharf qudūm khayr barīyatih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥizb al-aʻẓam wa-al-wird al-afkham / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Prayers.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī daʻānā lil-īmān, wa-hadānā bi-al-Qurʼān, wa-ajāba daʻwatanā bi-al-faḍl wa-al-iḥsān ..."
Good modern (19th century) naskhī, fully vocalized.
Islamic binding, covered with brocade.

record.title: 880-01 Taṣānīf fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ. -- [1720 or 1721].
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Intahat ... ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā li-nafsihi ... Mūsá ibn Qāsim al-Maghribī ... wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā ṣabīḥat yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, sābiʻ ʻashar shahr Allāh al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, bi-al-Zāwiyah al-Qādirīyah min madīnat Bayt al-Maqdis ... sanat iḥdá wa-miʼah wa-alf [1101] ... Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... ʻalá yad kātibihā li-nafsihi ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAdwān al-ʻAqrabānī ... sanat 133 [1133]."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of its compiler, for himself ... Mūsá ibn Qāsim al-Maghribī ... It was concluded on the morning of Wednesday, the seventeenth of God's sacred month Muḥarram, at al-Zāwiyah al-Qādirīyah in Bayt al-Maqdis [Jerusalem] ... in the year one thousand one hundred and one [1101 of the Hijrah = 31 October, 1689] ... This copy was completed ... by the hand of its copyist, for himself ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAdwān al-ʻAqrabānī ... in the year 133 [1133 of the Hijrah = 1720/1721]."

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-Qaṣīdah al-Muḍarīyah / Muṣṭafá ibn Ibrāhīm. -- [1734].
record.note: For the matn see Ahlwardt, 7840.

Incipit (folio 2a): "Hādhā Takhmīs al-Muḍarīyah li-kātibih al-faqīr Muṣṭafá ibn Ibrāhīm, khādim Ibrāhīm al-Khalīl ... Yā Rabbanā bi-ismika al-aʻlā wa-bi-al-suwar // ḥaqqan wa-bi-al-Fātiḥah Yā Khāliqa al-bashar ..."
Fair naskhī.
Another holograph of the same author is in Ms. Landberg 416 (leaves 65-75); larger hand.

On leaf 1 recto is the explicit of al-Suyūṭī's Itmām al-dirāyah li-qurrāʼ al-Nuqāyah (Brockelmann, II, 156; S II, p. 195), with the colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī ākhir yawm al-sittah ... min shahr Shawwāl, min shuhūr [sanat] sittah wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... Ṭāhā Abū al-Suʻūd ... [The copy was completed at the end of the sixth day ... of Shawwāl, 1146 [of the Hijrah = 12 March, 1734] ... by the hand of ... Ṭāhā Abū al-Suʻūd ...]"

record.title: 880-02 al-Muqaddimah al-ʻAshmāwīyah / ʻAbd al-Bārī al-ʻAshmāwī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on the front cover.
Apparently longer text than Arabic MSS 230 (leaves 17-50).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-ʻAshmāwī ... Saʼalatnī [Saʼalanī] baʻḍ al-ṭalabah an aʻmala <fī> muqaddimah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab Imām [al-Imām] Mālik ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Shurūṭ al-ṣalāh / Abū Zayd ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻĀmir al-Akhḍarī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on the front cover.
Incipit same as in Munich catalog 143 (leaves 12 verso-36).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Zayd Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān [ibn Muḥammad] ibn ʻĀmir al-Akhḍarī ... Awwal mā yajibu ʻalá al-mukallaf taṣḥīḥ īmānih ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Colophon: "Kamula al-kitāb al-Akhḍarī qabla al-zawāl, yawm al-Khamīs, iḥdá min Jumādá al-Awwal ... fī balad Ghabṭū, fī al-dihlīz [dihlīz] ʻAbd Allāh ibn Sulaymān ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book 'al-Akhḍarī' was completed before sunset, on Thursday, 1 Jumādá al-Awwal ... in the town of Ghabṭū, in the hallway of ʻAbd Allāh ibn Sulaymān ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-masāʼil / ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Fūdī. -- [18--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 894.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-masāʼil. Suʼila ʻan Shaykhinā ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Fūdī mā yajūzu wa-mā lā yajūzu minhā ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tammat ... bayna al-ẓuhr wa-al-ʻaṣr, yawm al-Aḥad, khamsat ʻashar min shahr Ramaḍān ... Anʻim al-makātib [lil-Kātib] Abū Bakr ibn Muḥammad ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... between noon and afternoon, on Sunday, 15 Ramaḍāb ... by the 'excellent copyist' (?) ... Abū Bakr ibn Muḥammad ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-masāʼil / ʻUthmān ibn Fūdī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Kitāb al-masāʼil suʼila ʻan Shaykhinā ʻUthmān ibn Fūdī ... mā yajūzu wa-mā lā yajūzu ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 894.
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAsharīyāt / ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Fūdī. -- [18--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann S II, p. 894.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā Kitāb ʻAsharīyāt Shaykhinā ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-maʻrūf Ibn Fūdiyū. Ayā man la-hu aʻlá al-ʻulā mutabawwaʼu ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tammat ... kānīhi [kātibuhu] Muḥammad Ghaṭaṭū ism ibn Muḥammad Mīnah."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... Copied by Muḥammad Ghaṭaṭū ibn Muḥammad Mīnah."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah fī madhhab Mālik ibn Anas / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hanb on fly-leaf.
One more leaf at end is presumably missing and contained the colophon, as well as the end of the invocation upon the Prophet.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ibtadaʼa al-insān bi-niʻmatih wa-ṣawwarahu fī al-arḥām bi-ḥikmatih ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-Qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Warrāq. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Warrāq ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa bi-al-faṣāḥah ulī al-albāb ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tammat ... Kātibuhu Saʻd ṣāḥib Muḥammad ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... Copied by Saʻd ṣāḥib Muḥammad ..."

record.title: Textes pour Max Ernst : sept poèmes / de Jean Tardieu.
record.note: Holograph, signed, of Déserts plissés and the poems published under the title: Le parquet se soulève. Inscribed by the author to Dorothea Tanning and Max Ernst. Bookplate of Dorothea Tanning.

"Ces sept poèmes, consacrés à des frottages et lithographies originales de Max Ernst, ont été composés ... le premier en juillet 1972, les six autres à Pâques 1973. Achevé de copier à la main, par l'auteur, à Paris ... le 6 juin 1973"--Leaf [24].

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah al-Ājurrūmīyah / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Dāwūd al-Ṣinhājī ʻurifa bi-Ibn Ājurrūm. -- [18--?].
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Also known as: al-Ājurrūmīyah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad [ibn Muḥammad] ibn Dāwūd al-Ṣinhājī ʻurifa bi-Ibn Ajurrūm: al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Loose leaves.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd al-ṣughrá / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on front page.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ... Iʻlam inna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī yanḥaṣiru fī thalāthah aqsām ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.
Loose leaves.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jawharī / Abū Madyan <ibn> Shuʻayb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Anṣārī al-Tilimsānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: A poem.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Madyan ibn [!] Shuʻayb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Anṣārī al-Tilimsānī ... Hādhihi maqṣūrah sammaytuhā bi-al-Jawharī ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.
Loose leaves.

record.title: 880-01 Takhmīs al-qaṣīdah al-mashhūrah bi-Bānat Suʻād. -- [after 1832].
record.note: Not identical with any checkable takhāmīs of the ode. Possibly the author is Usuman dan Fodio (Ibn Fūdī), the Nigerian author.
"Qaṣīdah" crossed off to be uniform with al-Khalīlī's takhmīs in Ms. Landberg 416.
Modern Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Paper water-marked 1832.
Interlinear and marginal notes.
Loose leaves.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... fa-innī lammā waqaftu ʻalá al-qaṣdah [al-qaṣīdah] al-mashūrah bi-Bānat Suʻād li-Kaʻb ibn Zuhayr ibn Abī Sulmá [ʻamadtu] ilá tadhyīlihā wa-takhmīsihā ... fa-qultu ... Damī bi-sayfi al-hawá wa-al-hajri maṭlūlu ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhaj al-farīd fī maʻrifat ʻilm al-tawḥīd / Muḥammad al-Wālī ibn al-Shaykh Sulaymān ibn Abī Muḥammad al-Fullānī. -- [18--?].
record.note: The matn is the same (with longer titulature) as in Berlin catalog 2006.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-faqīr ... Muḥammad al-Wālī ibn al-Shaykh Sulaymān ibn Abī Muḥammad al-Fullānī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa ʻilm al-tawḥīd ʻalá kull ʻilm wa-jaʻala maʻrifatahu ʻalá kull mukallaf ḥatman ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.
Loose leaves.

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-Qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Warrāq. -- [18--?].
record.note: Compared with Arabic MSS 456, the prose incipit is here omitted.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Badaʼtu bi-dhikri Allāh madḥan muqaddaman // wa-uthnī bi-ḥamdi Allāh shukran muʻaẓẓaman ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations.
Loose leaves.
Colophon: "Tamma al-khaṭṭ yawm Thulāth waqt bayna ẓuhr [al-ẓuhr] wa-al-ʻaṣr ... katabahu [katabtuhu] li-nafsī. Ismī Hārūn, wa-ism abī ʻAbd Allāh ṣāḥib al-ʻulamāʼ ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Tuesday, between noon and after noon ... I wrote it for myself. My name is Hārūn and the name of my father is ʻAbd Allāh, colleague of the ulama ..."

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs ʻAshrīyāt al-Fazāzī / Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Mahīb. -- [18--?].
record.note: The identification of the author is uncertain.
Munich catalog 526 does not give the incipit of the poem proper, which might identify this definitely as Ibn Mahīb's work. Brockelmann lists also an anonymous takhmīs.
For the incipit of the matn (4th and 5th half-lines of the first stanza) see Ahlwardt 7709.
On al-Fazāzī's popularity in the Sudan see Brockelmann, S I, p. 482.
The several titles listed by Brockelmann are probably used indiscriminately for the same matn.
The matn is also known as: al-Qaṣāʼid al-ʻishrīnīyāt.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Khalīlayy ʻūjā b l-Maḥṣabi [bi-al-Muḥṣṣabi] wa-inzilā // wa-lā tabqayā ʻan ḥayfihi mutaḥawwalā. Wa-akrim bi-hi maʻnan taḥarrāhu manzilan // aḥaqqu ʻibādi Allāh bi-al-majdi wa-al-ʻulā. Nabīyun la-hu aʻlá al-jinān mubawwaʼu ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 al-Qaṣīdah al-Mīmīyah / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī al-Waʻīẓī. -- [18--?].
record.note: A poem on exhortation.
The order of the half-lines is somewhat different in Ahlwardt 8088 (5), and his explicit does not occur here.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī al-Waʻīẓī ... Laysa al-muqāmu bi-dāri al-dhulli min shiyamī // wa-lā muʻāsharatu al-awbāshi min himamī ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-01 Bayān al-tiryāq. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-innī qad raʼaytu fī [anna] baʻḍ al-ikhwān yamīlūna ilá ṭalab nafʻ hādhā al-fann, wa-hiya [wa-huwa fann] ghāmiḍ jiddan ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt / Ḥallāl ibn Muḥammad. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā Kitāb ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt. Ḥaddathanā Ṣāliḥ ibn Ayyār ... Ḥaddathanā Ḥallāl ibn ʻArīb ... Wa-Allāh khalaqa kull dābbah ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (Sudanese) hand.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Asmāʼ Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad miʼatān wa-wāḥid, wa-hiya hādhihi: Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid, Maḥmūd ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (West African?) hand, in red and black.
In Oriental shoulder case, in brown, trimmed with green.

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb fī al-Ḥadīth. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī.

record.title: 880-02 Aḥkām al-wuqūf / li ... Abī Bakr Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Khaṣṣāf. -- [before 1464].
record.note: These two members of the Ibn al-Shiḥnah family are not in Brockelmann.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Mā ruwiya fī ṣadaqāt Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Ḥaddathanā Abū Bakr Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar wa-qāla: Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Wāqidī ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrah IX. -- [8--?].
record.note: Fair Kufic hand.
Mounted on a square of cardboard, so that the verso of the leaf is covered over.
On vellum.

record.title: 880-02 Jawāhir al-fiqh / Ṭāhir ibn Salām ibn Qāsim al-Anṣārī al-Khuwārizmī. -- 1696.
record.note: Brockelmann spells the author's name ibn Islām, but Hitti and this manuscript (incipit) have ibn Salām (Sallām?).
Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-maʻrifatihi wa-akramanā bi-taqwāhu wa-ṭāʻatihi ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
In manuscript on lining paper: "M. Sprengling, Dec. 4, 1937. Purchased from O. Reşer, of Ankara."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah 'al-Jawāhir' laylat al-Sabt al-mubārakah, sābiʻat Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat thamān wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad musawwidihi al-dāʻī al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Jalīl."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy, i.e., 'al-Jawāhir', was completed, on the blessed night of Saturday, 7 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1108 [of the Hijrah = 4 October, 1696], by the hand of its copyist, the despised supplicant, the poor to the mercy of his Glorious Lord."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān / Muṣṭafá Afandī ibn [Abī] ʻUthmān [ʻAbd al-Mālik] al-Bābī. -- 1872.
record.note: Collected poems.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Muṣṭafá Afandī ibn ʻUthmān al-Bābī, min shuʻarāʼ 'Nafḥat al-rayḥānah', yamdaḥu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Qaḍá ʻajaban min ḥālihi al-mutaʻajjibu // yajiddu ishtiʻālan raʼsuhu wa-huwa yalʻabu ..."
Cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Written mostly on blue paper.

Colophon: "Tamma naskhuhu ... ghudwata yawm al-Jumʻah, li-thalāth layālin maḍayna min shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat tisʻ wa-thamānīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, bi-qalam ... Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-Aḥdab al-Ṭarābulusī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed ... on the early morning of Friday, 3 Rajab, 1289 [of the Hijrah = 6 September, 1872], by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-Aḥdab al-Ṭarābulusī ..."

record.title: 880-01 Adʻiyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Prayers.
Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic limp leather binding, in brown, with inlaid panels of brocade on outside covers.
Kraus stated that this manuscript was not an item from the Wellcome-Kraus collection.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-julasāʼ bi-ruʼyat Allāh lil-nisāʼ / lil-Shaykh ... al-Suyūṭī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 2704; the explicit is the same as in Ms. Spr. 1960.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu: Masʼalat ruʼyat Allāh taʻālá Yawm al-Qiyāmah fī al-mawqif ḥāṣilah li-kull aḥad al-rijāl wa-al-nisāʼ bi-lā nizāʻ ..."
Fair modern (18th century) naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iḥtifāl fī suʼāl al-aṭfāl / Jalāl al-Dīn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ukhtulifa fī al-aṭfāl, hal yuftanūna fī qubūrihim wa-yasʼaluhum Munkar wa-Nakīr aw lā ʻalá qawlayn mashhūrayn ..."
Fair modern (18th century) naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Aṣīl al-Dīn fī al-ṭibb : al-faṣl al-thāmin ... [wa-]al-faṣl al-tāsiʻ. -- [17--?].
record.note: The numbering and the headings of these chapters correspond exactly to those in Ahlwardt 6321 (a medical work, and an imperfect copy with the beginning missing, and author and title unknown).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā fawāʼid min Kitāb Aṣīl al-Dīn fī al-ṭibb, al-Faṣl al-thāmin fī al-awzān wa-al-makāyīl ... al-Faṣl al-tāsiʻ fī qānūn taḥwīl wazn al-darāhim ilá wazn al-mathāqīl wa-taḥwīlihā ilá al-darāhim ..."
Fair modern (18th century) naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī. -- 1570.
record.note: Title, as above, is supplied by a modern hand on lining paper (Brockelmann: al-Manḥ al-azhar, and Hitti: Minaḥ al-azhar); on leaf 1 recto in a 19th century hand: Kitāb al-ḥujjah al-murtafiʻah fī al-radd ʻalá al-mubtadiʻah.
Compared with Berlin catalog 1931 (longer appendix?).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-wujūd, dhū [dhī] al-karam wa-al-faḍl wa-al-jūd ..."
Hasty coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma fī niṣf shahr Shawwāl sanat 977."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the middle of the month of Shawwāl, 977 [of the Hijrah = 2 April, 1570]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-laʼāliʼ fī sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī / taʼlīf ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Nūbī. -- 1846.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥayy al-qadīr al-qadīm bi-dhātihi wa-ṣifātihi ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah fī shahr Shawwāl, li-sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn maḍat minhu alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1262, alf wa-miʼatayn ithnayn wa-sittīn ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... ʻAlī Sālim ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on 27 Shawwāl, 1262 [of the Hijrah = 5 September 1850] ... by the hand of its copyist ... ʻAlī Sālim ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Khayr al-bāqī fī jawāz al-wuḍūʼ min al-fasāqī / taʼlīf ... Zayn [al-Dīn] ibn Nujaym al-Ḥanafī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title also given (on title page) as: al-Khayr al-bāqī fī jawāz al-wuḍūʼ min al-ḥīḍān wa-al-fasāqī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ māʼan ṭahūran bi-faḍlihi ..."
Coarse modern (19th century) naskhī.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Tilimsānīyah / taʼlīf ... ʻAlī ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Ṣāliḥ al-ʻAṣnūnī al-Maghīlī. -- 1672.
record.note: The surname al-Burrī is misspelled on leaf 2 verso as ibn al-Bannāʼ.
Compared with Alger 1318 (al-ʻAṣnūnī, fl. A.H. 816).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Ṣāliḥ al-ʻUṣnūnī [so pointed] al-Maghīlī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jūd wa-al-karam, al-mufīḍ ʻalá ʻibādihi sawābigh al-niʻam ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma ... fī yawm al-Khamīs ... sādis ʻasharī [ʻishrīn] Shawwāl ... sanat ithnayn wa-thamānīn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Thursday ... 16 [26] Shawwal, 1082 [of the Hijrah = 25 February, 1672]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Miftāḥ / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī. -- 1423.
record.note: Incipit same as in Escarial (Derenbourg) no. 26.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Khayr khabar yuwashshaḥu bi-hi ṣadr al-kalām, wa-aḥsan ḥadīth yurashshaḥu li-muqtaḍá al-maqām ḥamd Allāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Qad inkharaṭa ... bulūgh ... taḥrīr bi-hādhihi al-nuskhah ... lil-ʻabd al-muftaqir al-jānī Ṣadr ibn Jalāl al-Muzaynānī ... waqt al-ḍaḥwah al-kubrá min al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah al-wāqiʻah fī raḥb al-muḥtaram Dhī Ḥijjah [al-Ḥijjah], sitt wa-ʻishrīn wa-thamānimiʼah bi-Harāt."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy ... was completed ... by the poor and sinner servant, Ṣadr ibn Jalāl al-Muzaynānī ... on the forenoon of blessed Friday, during the esteemed month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 826 [of the Hijrah = 14 November, 1423] in Harāt."

record.title: 880-02 Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm / lil-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-ʻArabī al-Ṭāʼī al-Ḥātimī al-Andalusī. -- 1862.
record.note: A Sufi tract.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, ʻidah li-liqāʼih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah ... Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Ḥayy al-Qayyūm, al-muqsim bi-mawāqiʻ al-nujūm ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Sanat 1279. Ghurrat B."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1279, beginning of B [Ṣafar (?) of the Hijrah = 29 July, 1862]."

record.title: 880-02 Shujūn al-masjūn wa-futūn al-maftūn / Ibn al-ʻArabī. -- 1863.
record.note: A Sufi tract.
The title given by Brockelmann and Ahlwardt as: Shujūn al-mashjūn wa-futūn al-maftūn.
Compared with Ahlwardt 2933 (lacks incipit).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān min ṭīn, thumma jaʻala naslahu min sulālah min māʼ mahīn ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
First colophon (folio 53a): "Sanat 1279, 15 B."
Translation of the first colophon: "Year 1279, 15 B [15 Ṣafar (?) = 12 August (?), 1862]."
Second colophon (folio 57a): "Katabahu al-faqīr al-Sayyid Aḥmad Shukrī, min talāmīdh Amīn al-Dhihnī [al-maʻrūf] bi-Takfūrṭāghī ... fī sanat tisʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf."
Translation of the second colophon: "Copied by the poor al-Sayyid Aḥmad Shukrī, a student of Amīn al-Dhihnī [known as] Takfūrṭāghī ... in the year 1279 [of the Hijrah = 1862/1863]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-Miṣbāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Isfarāyīnī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, is supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in note. In manuscript, it is given twice (on title page) as: Kitāb ḍawʼ min al-naḥw.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh, 'Ammā' kalimah fīhā maʻná al-sharṭ, fa-li-dhālika kānat al-Fāʼ lāzimah la-hā ..."
Hasty modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations in the first half of the manuscript.
Stamp inside flap: "Dr. Clemens Pumb, Innsbruck."
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Fī al-lūghāridhmāt. -- [18--?].
record.note: Treatise on logarithms.
Incipit: "al-Faṣl al-awwal. Fī ḥaqīqat al-ansāb. (1) Qad taqaddama fī Kitāb ʻIlm al-jabr wa-al-muqābalah, faṣl 8, ʻad 88, ilkh. anna al-qūwāt tuḍrabu li-jamʻ dalāʼilihā ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī.
Stamp on leaf 1 recto: "J. Khadder, Jerusalem."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah / ʻUthmān ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥājib. -- [15--?].
record.note: Beginning missing.
Compared with Ahlwardt 6557 and Ms. Salisbury 21; only 1 leaf is missing at the beginning.
Hasty fairly modern (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, with front cover and flap missing.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Iẓhār al-asrār / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Birkawī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah fīmā yaḥtāju ilayhi kull muʻrib ashadd al-iḥtiyāj, wa-huwa thalāthat ashyāʼ: al-ʻĀmil wa-al-maʻmūl wa-al-ʻamal ..."
Hasty fairly modern (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, with front cover and flap missing.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Birkawī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-iʻlam innahu lā budda li-kull ṭālib min maʻrifat al-iʻrāb min maʻrifat miʼah shayʼ, sittūn minhā tusammá ʻāmilan, wa-thalāthūn minhā tusammá maʻmūlan, wa-ʻasharah minhā tusammá ʻamalan ..."
Two modern (18th century?) naskhī hands.
Islamic binding, with front cover and flap missing.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-miṣbāḥ / Nāṣir ibn ʻAbd al-Sayyid al-Muṭarrizī. -- 1530.
record.note: Treatise on syntax.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh dhī al-inʻām, jāʻil al-naḥw fī al-kalām ka-al-milḥ fī al-ṭaʻām ... fa-inna al-wald al-aʻazz, lā zāla ka-ismihi masʻūdan ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, with front cover and flap missing.
With: 4 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... Kātibuhu [...] ṣāḥibuhu [...] wa-itmāmuhu fī awāʼil Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat sabʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... Copied by [...] owned by [...]. Completed in the beginning of Jumādá al-Ūlá, 937 [of the Hijrah = 31 December 1530]."

record.title: 880-03 Miʼat ʻāmil / ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Alternate title: al-ʻAwāmil al-miʼah (Brockelmann).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻawāmil fī al-naḥw ʻalá mā allafahu al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī ... miʼat ʻāmil, wa-hiya tanqasimu ilá qismayn: Lafẓīyah wa-maʻnawīyah ..."
Fair modern (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, with front cover and flap missing.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Muwaṭṭaʼ al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas ibn Mālik ibn Abī ʻĀmir : min riwāyat Yaḥyá ibn Yaḥyá ... al-Laythī. -- 1808.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb Wuqūt al-ṣalāh. Ḥaddathanī Yaḥyá ibn Yaḥyá ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Ibn Shihāb anna ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz akhkhara al-ṣalāh yawman ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black, generously vocalized.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... ʻAlī al-ʻAmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Nabī ... al-ʻAdwī baladan, al-Mālikī madhhaban. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, iḥdá ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat 1223 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... ʻAlī al-ʻAmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Nabī ... al-ʻAdwī baladan, al-Mālikī madhhaban. Copied on blessed Friday, 11 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1223 [of the Hijrah = 29 December, 1808] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Awḍaḥ al-masālik ilá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh Jamāl al-Dīn ... [ibn] Yūsuf ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī. -- 1682.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh Jamāl al-Dīn [ibn] al-Shaykh Jamāl al-Dīn Yūsuf ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī ... Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh mustaḥiqq al-ḥamd wa-mulhimihi, wa-munshiʼ al-khalq wa-muʻdimihi ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notes in the beginning of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Ḥarrarahu fī shahr Dhī al-ʻQʻdah, min yawm al-ʻishrīn, sanat thalāth wa-tisʻīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied in the month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, the twentieth day, in the year 1093 [of the Hijrah = 20 November 1682]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikar / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Harawī al-Qārī. -- 1699.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ṣaḥḥaḥa kalāmahu al-qadīm alladhī huwa aḥsan al-ḥadīth farʻan wa-aṣlan, wa-ḍaʻʻafa ajra qārīhi fī kull ḥarf minhu ʻashr ḥasanāt ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-tamma naskh hādhā al-kitāb ʻalá yad ... kātibihi Muḥammad ibn Ḥijāzī al-Zarqānī baladan al-Mālikī madhhaban, fī yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, ḥādī ʻashar shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, min shuhūr sanat ʻasharah wa-mā[ʼih] wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥijāzī al-Zarqānī baladan al-Mālikī madhhaban, on blessed Monday, 11 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1110 [of the Hijrah = 11 May, 1699 ...]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥirz al-thamīn lil-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Harawī. -- 1729.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala dhikrahu ḥiṣnan ḥaṣīnan min kull bāb, wa-duʻāʼahu ḥirzan amīnan lil-thawāb ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Tamma ... Qāla kātibuhu: Katabtu wa-ḥarrartu hādhihi al-nuskhah allatī [hiya] maktūbah min khaṭṭ al-muʼallif ... wa-anā ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥājjī Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn ʻAnṭābī, sākin fī Jāmiʻ Būyājī ... faraghtu min taḥrīrihi fī awākhir Shawwāl, fī yawm al-Thulāthah, fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼah baʻda alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... Its copyist said: I transcribed and edited this copy from a copy in the handwriting of the author ... I ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥājjī Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn ʻAnṭābī, resident at Jāmiʻ Būyājī ... I finished the copy on the forenoon of Tuesday, the end of Shawwāl, of the year 1141 [of the Hijrah = 24 May, 1729] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Bayān al-asrār lil-ṭālibīn / [ʻUmar al-Mīlānī al-Rawshanī]. -- 1789.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in leaf of notes.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qādir al-ʻalīm, al-fāṭir al-ḥakīm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻilm ashraf manqabah wa-ajall martabah wa-abhá mafkharah ..."
Coarse naskhī and nastaʻlīq.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.
"Tammat ... fī shahr Jumād al-Ākhir. Katab ... Darwīsh Ibrāhīm ibn Darwīsh Ḥasan khādim Shaykh Ḥasan Afandī Ḥaḍratdar, sanat thalāthah miʼatayn wa-alf 1203."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... in the month of Jumādá al-Ākhir. Copied by Darwīsh Ibrāhīm ibn Darwīsh Ḥasan servant of Shaykh Ḥasan Afandī Ḥaḍratdar, in the year 1203 [of the Hijrah = February/March 1789]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar / Abū al-Muntahá Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maghnīsāwī. -- 1793 or 1794.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ṭarīq al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah bi-faḍlihi al-ʻaẓīm ..."
Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 1208."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed in the year 1208 [of the Hijrah = 1793/1794]."

record.title: 880-03 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim fī ṭarīq al-taʻallum / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī faḍḍala banī Ādam bi-al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻālam ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-ʻAqāʼid / ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Nasafī. -- [before 1795].
record.note: Principles of faith.
Title given in manuscript (leaf 106 recto) as: hādhā Kitāb risāl[at] al-ʻaqāʼid.
Compared with Berlin catalog 1953 (Hitti 1545 seems to be a different work).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ahl al-ḥaqq: Ḥaqāʼiq al-ashyāʼ thābitah, wa-al-ʻilm bi-hā mutaḥaqqiq, khilāfan lil-Sufusṭāʼīyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.
Colophon (Added in a later hand): "Tamma tamām shad sanat ʻashr miʼatayn [wa-]alf. 1210]."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed in the year 1210 [of the Hijrah = 1795/1796]."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥāshiyat jāmiʻ ghayra munṣarif. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, in a later hand on leaf 111 recto.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna asbāb al-mawāniʻ min al-ṣarf hiya al-kayfīyāt wa-al-ṣifāt al-mutakayyifah bi-hā al-asmāʼ, lā dhawāt al-asmāʼ kamā yatabādaru min akthar al-asbāb al-maʻdūdah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Wuṣūl al-taqwá bi-uṣūl al-fatwá / Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad al-shahīr bi-Khurāsānīʹzādah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Perhaps a holograph.
In the introduction, the Sultan Maḥmūd ibn Muṣṭafá of Turkey is mentioned as living (i.e. prior to 1754).
Incipit: "Aqūlu bismillāh miftāḥ kull shayʼ, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, miṣbāḥ kull musīʼ ḥāmidan li-man manna min kamāl faḍlihi bi-fayḍ, isḥaq ʻalayya maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻadl ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar fī bayān al-iʻtiqād / Yaḥyá ibn Abī Bakr al-Ḥanafī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title from: Dresden (Fleischer), 93, 95.
Compared with Ahlwardt 10310 (which is this work, and not the work on the law of inheritance, as Brockelmann states).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-azalī [bi-azalīyat] al-wujūd wa-al-dhāt, al-mutafarrid bi-qidam al-nuʻūt wa-al-ṣifāt ..."
Good modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Text same as Arabic MSS 416.

Incipit: "Faṣl fī al-asmāʼ [asmāʼ] Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, miʼatayn wa-wāḥid, wa-hunna hādhihi asmāʼ [al-asmāʼ]: al-Ūlá Muḥammad, Aḥmad, Ḥāmid, Maḥmūd ..."
Modern (19th century) Maghribī (West-African), in red and black; crude ʻunwāns in colors.
Loose between paper boards, in leather case, with loops for shoulder straps.

record.title: 880-02 Rushd al-labīb ilá muʻāsharat al-ḥabīb / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Falītah. -- 1657.
record.note: Manual of erotics.
Compared with Landberg MSS 114.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh iʻtirāfan bi-niʻmatih, wa-astaghfiru Allāh istiʻādhan min niqmatih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innī naẓartu fī kathīr min kutub al-bāh fa-raʼaytuhā khāliyah min ashyāʼ kathīrah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Stamp on leaves 1 recto and 83 recto: "Bibliotheque de Mr Barbier de Meynard."
Islamic binding, in brown; flap missing.

Colophon (folio 74a): "Wa-lammā kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah fī nahār al-Khamīs al-mubārak, fī thāmin ʻashar khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat sabʻah wa-sittīn wa-alf ... wa-dhālika fī nafs ʻAkkār, ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAkkārī mawlidan wa-manshaʼan al-Qādirī ṭarīqatan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on blessed Thursday, 18 days having passed from the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1067 [of the Hijrah = 4 January, 1657] ... in ʻAkkār itself, by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAkkārī mawlidan wa-manshaʼan al-Qādirī ṭarīqatan ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mafātīḥ al-jinān wa-maṣābīḥ al-janān / Yaʻqūb ibn Sayyid ʻAlī al-Burūsawī. -- [1565].
record.note: A later hand has written the date 979 below the colophon, but the remnant of the unit word looks more like "ithnayn" than like "tisʻah".
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man manna ʻalá ʻibādihi niʻmat al-Islām, wa-jaʻalahu shirʻatan wa-minhājan ..."
Cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon (defaced): "... Fī awāʼil shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat ithnayn [?] wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼh ..."
Translation of the colophon: "... In the beginning of the blessed month of Ramaḍān, of the year 972 [of the Hijrah = 12 April, 1565] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Luʼluʼ al-naẓīm fī maʻrifat ḥall al-taqwīm / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Dallāl al-Wafāʼī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī. -- 1531.
record.note: Holograph.
Title also given on front page in a later hand as: Kitāb luʼluʼ al-naẓīm fī aḥwāl ḥall al-taqwīm.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu muʼallifuhu ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Dallāl al-Wafāʼī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān fī aḥsan taqwīm, wa-anʻama ʻalayhi bi-daqāʼiq al-ʻulūm al-fikrīyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Charts.
Leaves numbered [1], [1]-18, 1-53.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Dallāl al-Wafāʼī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī, fī ʻāshir Ramaḍān, sanat 937 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Its author said: It was completed by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Dallāl al-Wafāʼī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī, on 10 Ramaḍān of the year 937 [of the Hijrah = 7 May, 1531] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nujūm al-shāriqāt fī dhikr baʻḍ al-ṣanāʼiʻ al-muḥtāj ilayhā fī ʻilm al-mīqāt / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khayr al-Urmayūnī al-Ḥasanī. -- 1845.
record.note: Title also given on front page as: al-Nujūm al-shāriqāt fī istikhrāj al-alwān.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bi-niʻmatihi tatimmu al-ṣāliḥāt ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tammat al-nuskhah ... Wa-kān al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, shahr Rajab al-fard alladhī min shuhūr sanat 1261."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed ... on blessed Thursday, in the month of Rajab, of the year 1261 [of the Hijrah = 10 July, 1845]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-mukhtār fī sharḥ Tanwīr al-abṣār : al-juzʼ al-awwal / Muḥammad ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ḥaṣkafī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ḥamdan laka yā man sharaḥta ṣudūranā bi-anwāʻ al-hidāyah sābiqan ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) Maghribī hands, in red and black.
In manuscript on leaf 1 recto: "[Name defaced] officier aux Spahis de Bône a son cher oncle [name defaced]. Souvenir d'Afrique. 1839."
Slip with description of this codex, signed "Reinaud membre de l'Institut," pasted to leaf 2 recto.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
The second half wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Alfīyah / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAqīl. -- 1708.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on front page.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ... al-Kalām al-muṣṭalaḥ ʻalayhi ʻinda al-naḥwīyīn ʻibārah ʻan al-lafẓ al-mufīd fāʼidah yaḥsunu al-sukūt ʻanahā ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia in the beginning of the manuscript.

Colophon: "Qad ittafaqa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Jumʻah, thānī [?] wa-ʻishrīn shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, min shuhūr al-sanah al-muʼarrakhah hākadhā 1119, ʻalá yad aqarr [aḥqar (?)] al-ṭalabah Muḥammad Qāsim [...] al-Astrābādī, lil-walad al-aʻazz Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qā[dir] [...] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on Friday, 22 [?] Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year such dated, 1119 [of the Hijrah = 15 March, 1708], by the hand of the most [despised (?)] of the students Muḥammad Qāsim [...] al-Astarabādī, for the dearest son Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qā[dir] [...] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Iʻrāb al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī madḥ khayr al-barīyah al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Burdah al-Nabawīyah / lil-Shaykh ... Khālid al-Azharī. -- [before 1841].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd Ḥamdu Allāh mustaḥiqq al-taḥmīd wa-al-tahlīl wa-al-takbīr wa-al-tasbīḥ ... fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Qad saʼaltanī ayyuhā al-akh al-najīḥ an aḍaʻa sharḥan laṭīfan ʻalá Burdat al-madīḥ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Manuscript foliation: [1], 1-132.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Laṭāʼif akhbār al-uwal fī man taṣarrafa fī Miṣr min arbāb al-duwal / taʼlīf al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Muʻṭī al-Isḥāqī. -- 1858.
record.note: History of Egypt.
