Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻazīz fī mulkihi wa-iqtidārih alladhī malaka al-wujūd bi-qūwatih wa-awjadahu bi-irādatihi wa-ikhtiyārih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Intahá tilka al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAlī Katkūt ... taḥrīran fī ʻāshir Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1275."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAlī Katkūt ... on 10 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1275 [of the Hijrah = 18 October 1858]."

record.title: 880-02 Ṭibb al-fuqarāʼ wa-al-masākīn / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qurashī al-Qalṣādī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Title, as above, is given on leaf 5 recto.
Compared with Leyden catalog 1378; extracts are found in Ahlwardt 6260 (note) and 8464 (6), where the title of the work is given as above.
Brockelmann has the title as: Muntakhab al-Ḥāwī.
On leaf 1 recto a later owner has identified the author as al-Nafīsī (i.e. presumably Ibn al-Nafīs), which is an obvious error.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad qāla ... Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qurashī ... Bāb fī maʻrifat tashrīḥ al-aʻḍāʼ wa-tarkīb jasad al-insān ... [folio 5a:] Qāla muʼallif hādhā al-kitāb: Qad aḥbabtu an adhkura ṭarafan min khawāṣṣ mā intakhabtuhu min kitāb yusammá al-Ḥāwī, wa-jamaʻtu dhālika ʻalá sabīl al-ikhtiṣār, wa-huwa 'Ṭibb al-fuqarāʼ wa-al-masākīn' ..."
Fair modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Tafṣīl ʻiqd al-fawāʼid bi-takmīl Qayd al-sharāʼid / ʻAbd al-Barr ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd ibn Ghāzī ibn Ayyūb ibn Maḥmūd ibn Āl Khalaṭū al-Ḥanafī al-Ḥalabī thumma al-Qāhirī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Shiḥnah. -- 1587.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ [fī al-hāmish: muḥkim] al-sharʻ al-sharīf wa-muʼayyidih, wa-rāfiʻ al-madhhab al-Ḥanafī wa-mushayyidih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaf 1 supplied in a later hand.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī al-yawm al-sābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá, min shuhūr sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on 17 Jumādá al-Ūlá of the year 995 [of the Hijrah = 25 April, 1587] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī. -- 1638.
record.note: Perhaps a holograph.
Author's autograph? or has the copyist merely copied the original colophon, without adding his own?
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Qāla kātibuhu wa-jāmiʻuhu al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī: Faraghtu min jamʻihi yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, li-ʻishrīn khalat min Ramaḍān ... min shuhūr al-sābiʻah wa-al-arbaʻīn baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ..."

Tanslation of the colophon: "Its author and compiler the despised ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī said: I completed its compilation on blessed Thursday, twenty days having passed from the month of Ramaḍān ... of the year 1047 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [5 February, 1638] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Insān al-kāmil fī maʻrifat al-awākhir wa-al-awāʼil / taʼlīf al-Imām ... ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jīlī. -- 1575.
record.note: A Sufi tract.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu li-man qāma bi-ḥamdih ismuhu Allāh, fa-tajallá fī kull jamāl istaḥaqqahu wa-iqtaḍāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah fī awākhir Rabīʻ al-Awwal, tārīkh: Kamul khaṭṭ insān 983."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble copy was completed at the end of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, dated: 'Kamula khaṭṭ insān' [in "Ḥisāb al-jummal" (Alphabetical reconning)] 983 [of the Hijrah = 18 July, 1575]."

record.title: 880-02 ʻAqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd al-ṣughrá / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī. -- 1822.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in slip. In manuscript on leaf 1 recto: hādhā matn al-Sanūsīyah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Iʻlam inna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī yanḥaṣiru fī thalāthat aqsām: al-Wujūb, wa-al-istiḥālah, wa-al-jawāz ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 Bughyat al-bāḥith ʻan jumal al-mawārīth / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Raḥbī. -- 1822.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in slip. In manuscript on leaf 17 recto: hādhā matn al-Raḥbīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Awwalu mā nastaftiḥu al-maqālā // bi-dhikri ḥamdi Rabbinā taʻālá ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 Jawharat al-tawḥīd / Ibrāhīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī. -- 1822.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ṣilātihi // thumma salāmu Allāh maʻ ṣalātihi, ʻAlá Nabīyin jāʼa bi-al-tawḥīdi ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 3 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ājurrūmīyah / Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Dāʼūd al-Ṣanhājī al-shahīr bi-Ibn Ājurrūm. -- 1822.
record.note: Arabic grammar.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Dāwūd al-Ṣanhājī, al-shahīr bi-Ibn Ājurrūm ... al-Kalām huwa al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ, wa-aqsāmuhu thalāthah: Ism, wa-fiʻl, wa-ḥarf ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 4 of 4 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Ḥaṣala bayāḍuhā ʻalá yad ... Ḥasan al-mashhūr bi-al-Qārī, fī thamāniyat shahr Rabīʻ 2, sanat 1237."
Translation of the colophon: "The fair copy was completed by the hand of ... Ḥasan, known as al-Qārī, on 8 Rabīʻ 2, of the year 1237 [of the Hijrah = 2 January, 1822]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iʻlām bi-nuzūl ʻĪsá ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām / lil-Shaykh ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī. -- 1651.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 2539 (different explicit).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad warada suʼāl fī yawm al-Khamīs, sādis Jumādá al-Awwal, sant thamān wa-thamānimiʼah ..."
Hasty naskhī.
No. 1 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Katabahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Azharī, laylata niṣf Shaʻbān al-mukarram, min shuhūr sanat aḥad wa-sittīn [wa-alf] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Azharī, in the night of the middle of the honored month of Shaʻbān, of the year 61 [i.e., 1061 of the Hijrah = 3 August, 1651]."

record.title: al-Badīʻīyah / al-Suyūṭī. -- 1651.
record.note: Alternate title: Naẓm al-badīʻ fī madḥ al-Shafīʻ.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-badīʻ ṣunʻuhu wa-iḥkāmuh, al-rafīʻ shaʼnuhu wa-aḥkāmuh ..."
Hasty naskhī.
No. 2 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Katabahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī ... fī ʻishrīn Shaʻbān al-mukarram, sanat aḥad wa-sittīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī ... on the twentieth of the honored month of Shaʻbān of the year 1061 of the Hijrah [8 August, 1651]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Khabar al-dāll ʻalá wujūd al-quṭb wa-al-awtād wa-al-nujabāʼ wa-al-abdāl / taʼlīf al-ʻAllāmah al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī. -- 1651-1908.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fāwata bayna khalqihi fī al-marātib ..."
Leaves 10-12 verso, hasty naskhī; leaves 12 verso-16, good naskhī.
No. 3 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-tamma takmīl hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Aḥad, 16 Rabīʻ Thānī, sanat 1326."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was supplemented on Sunday, 16 Rabīʻ Thānī, 1326 [of the Hijrah = 18 May, 1908]."

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻīyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḥamawī. -- 1652.
record.note: For the author see also Brockelmann, S II, p. 19.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtāra min al-nawʻ al-insānī Rasūlan jaʻalahu lil-mursalīn khitāman ..."
Hasty naskhī.
No. 4 of 5 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, ākhir Ṣafar al-khayr, min shuhūr sanat ithnayn wa-sittīn wa-alf ... Katabahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on blessed Friday, the end of the month of Ṣafar, of the year 1062 [of the Hijrah = 9 February, 1652] ... Copied by the poor ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Batanūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Tanzīh al-iʻtiqād ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-ittiḥād / taʼlīf al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī. -- 1646.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Hādhā juzʼ sammaytuhu Tanzīh al-iʻtiqād ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-ittiḥād ..."
Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
No. 5 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-katabahu ... ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn ... ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ... Marʻī al-Batanūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ... fī awākhir Ṣafar al-khayr, min shuhūr sanat sitt wa-khamsīn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn ... ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ... Marʻī al-Batanūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ... at the end of the month of Ṣafar, of the year 1056 [of the Hijrah = 16 April, 1646]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Qurʼān al-Karīm. -- 1750.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwāns in gold and colors.
In manuscript on leaf 216 verso: "Gilbert Ironside." Armorial bookplate of Walter Thomas Wallace.
Persian lacquer binding in black and gold, with red leather doublure.

Colophon: "Qad tasharraftu wa-faraghtu min kitābat hādhā al-Muṣḥaf al-Majīd ḍaḥwat al-Thulāthāʼ, sādis ʻashar Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat thalāth wa-sittīn baʻda al-miʼah wa-al-alf. Wa-anā al-ʻabd al-khāṭiʼ Ibn Ḥājjī ʻAzīz Allāh, luṭifa ʻalayya. Wa-hādhā al-Muṣḥaf al-rābiʻ ʻashar ..."

Translation of the colophon: "I was honored to have completed the copy of this Glorious Book, on Tuesday morning, 16 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1163 [of the Hijrah = 16 November, 1750], I the sinning servant Ibn Ḥājjī ʻAzīz Allāh, may I be treated with mercy. This is the fourteenth Muṣḥaf [to be copied] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1816 or 1817.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic hand, in red and black.
ʻUnwāns in gold and colors.
Persian lacquer binding, with pictures of flowers and birds, dated A.H. 1233 (A.D. 1817 or 18).
Colophon: "Qad faragha min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb al-ʻabd al-ʻājiz Riḍá al-Shirāzī, fī sanat 1232 [of the Hijrah = 1816/1817]."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed by the feeble servant Riḍá al-Shirāzī in the year 1232 [of the Hijrah = 1816/1817]."

record.title: 880-03 Akhbār al-duwal wa-āthār al-uwal / taʼlīf Aḥmad Jalabī al-Qaramānī. -- 1771.
record.note: Universal history.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá taṣārīf al-ʻibar ʻinda samāʻ al-tawārīkh wa-al-siyar ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Laid-in leaves of notes.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihā ṣabīḥata yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, ʻalá yad ... Darwīsh Maḥmūd ... fī sanat 1185 [lil-Hijrah = 17 July 1771."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Wednesday morning, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, by the hand of ... Darwīsh Maḥmūd ... in the year 1185 [of the Hijrah = 17 July 1771."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Wiqāyah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Qarābāghī. -- 1556.
record.note: Provenance: Everard Scheidius (bibliographical note on fly-leaf); Silvestre de Sacy (Catalogue, no. 56); "Le ch. Ferraõ de Castelbranco" (visiting card pasted on front cover).
Title, as above, appears in the colophon.
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 307; for the matn cf. Berlin catalog 4548.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man huwa walī al-tawfīq wa-mulhim al-ṣawāb wa-musahhil al-umūr al-ṣaʻbah wa-mufattiḥ al-abwāb ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah fī thāmin ʻishrīn min Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thalāth wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, wa-anā al-faqīr Muḥammad al-ḥaqīr al-shahīr bi-Ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This gloss was completed on the 28th of glorious Shaʻbān, of the year 963 [of the Hijrah = 17th July 1556], by me, poor and wretched Muḥammad, known as Son of ʻAbd al-Karīm ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥujjah sharʻīyah / al-Qāḍī ʻUmar ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān. -- 1927-1939.
record.note: The author was the qāḍī at Harar, Ethiopia.

Incipit: "al-Faqīr ilá raḥmat Allāh ... al-Qāḍī ʻUmar ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻazza shaʼnuhu. Hādhihi ḥujjah sharʻīyah muḥarrarah ṣadarat bi-Maḥkamat Madīnat Harar ... Maḍmūnuhā: Ishtará al-mukarram Atū Bāyah bustānan ... min al-mukarram Muḥammad ʻAbd L Barī [ʻAbd al-Bārī] baʻda akhdhihi al-idhn min ṭaraf Dajāz Māj Amrū ... Ḥurrirat fī 19 Muḥarram sanat 1346 [lil-Hijrah = 19 July, 1927] ..." With added codicil: "Intaqala mulk mā fī ... hadhihi al-ḥujjah ilá al-ḥukūmah Īṭāliyā bi-al-shirāʼ ... bi-tārīkh 12 Muḥarram, sanat 1358 [lil-Hijrah = 4 March, 1939]."
Fair naskhī.

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhaj al-sawī wa-al-manhal al-rawī fī al-ṭibb al-Nabawī / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1810 or 1811.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda al-shākirīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb jamaʻtu fīhi al-Aḥādīth al-wāridah fī al-ṭibb ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Sanat 1225."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1225 [of the Hijrah = 1810/1811]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fikr wa-al-iʻtibār / taʼlīf al-Shaykh ... Darwīsh ibn Jumʻah al-Maḥrūqī. -- 1934.
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, II, 409; S II, p. 893.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal wa-al-ākhir, al-ẓāhir wa-al-bāṭin alladhī jalla wa-taqaddasa ʻan al-ashyāʼ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaḥtawī, in shāʼa Allāh, ʻalá ʻalá shayʼ min al-tawḥīd ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
No. 1 of 3 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wa-anā aḥqar al-ʻibād ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥamīd ibn Suwayf ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥumays ibn Mubārak al-Kharūṣī al-Azdī al-Ibāḍī ... Yawm 24 shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1352."

Translation of the colophon: "[Copied by] me, the most wretched servant ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥamīd ibn Suwayf ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥumays ibn Mubārak al-Kharūṣī al-Azdī al-Ibāḍī ... on the 24th day of the month of Shawwāl, of the year 1352 [of the Hijrah = 9 February, 1934]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sīrah / Darwīsh ibn Jumʻah. -- 1934.
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, II, 409; S II, p. 893.
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
No. 2 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Waṣīyat Rasūl Allāh al-Nabī Muḥammad ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam li-Abī Hurayrah. -- 1934.
record.note: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
No. 3 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Hidāyat al-ḥikmah / Ḥusayn ibn Muʻīn al-Dīn al-Maybudī. -- [after 1800].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover.
Paper watermarked 1800.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Hidāyah amr min ladayh, wa-kull shayʼ yaʻūdu ilayh, la-hu al-ḥamd ʻalá mā anʻama [ʻalaynā] sawābiq al-niʻam ..."
Fair naskhī.
Bookplate of "Tho[ma]s Marriott."
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 Ward al-juyūb fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī / taʼlīf al-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz. -- 1780.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn alladhī nawwara qulūb awliyāʼihi bi-maʻrifatihi wa-hadāhum ilá dhikr ḥabībihi ..."
Coarse Maghribī hand, in red, blue, and black.
The text points the first word of the title "warad" (not: ward).
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 708.
Baghdādī gives the title: Wardat al-juyūb, but no author's name.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Kamula al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥanafī ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu ʻashīyat yawm al-Thalāthah, ʻām 1194 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥanafī ... Copied on Tuesday evening, year 1194 [of the Hijrah = 1780]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Wird al-sattār / Shams al-Dīn al-Khalwatī al-Ḥanafī al-shahīr bi-Naṣūḥīʹzādah. -- 1802 or 1803.
record.note: Perhaps a holograph.
Main text in Arabic, marginal texts and notes in Turkish.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla afqar al-barāyā ... Shams al-Dīn al-Khalwatī al-Ḥanaf [al-Ḥanafī] al-shahīr bi-Naṣūḥī Zādah ... inna baʻḍ ikhwānī min al-sālikīn iltamasūnī an ashraḥa li-Wird al-sattār bi-Sayyid [li-Sayyidī] Yaḥyá Shirwānī ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Faraghtu min taswīd hādhā al-sharḥ fī waqt al-ʻishā fī al-Rajab, li-sanat sabʻah [fawq al-saṭr: thamāniyah] wa-ʻashr wa-miʼatayn [fawq al-saṭr: wa-alf] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "I finished writing this commentary in the evening, in Rajab, 1217 (1218) [of the Hijrah = 1802 (1803)] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Fawāʼid al-ṭarīqah / al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Shams al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Faḍl Allāh ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Naṣūḥī al-Khalwatī al-Junaydī al-Iskadārī. -- [before 1841].
record.note: Sufi tract.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man ʻajaza al-wāṣifūn ʻan awṣāfih ... fa-yaqūlu ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Shams al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Faḍl Allāh ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Naṣūḥī ... al-Khalwatī al-Junaydī al-Iskadārī ... iltamasa minnī aḥad min ṭullāb al-ḥaqq an aktuba awrāqan fīhā baʻḍ al-fawāʼid al-ṣādirah min kibār al-ṭarīqah al-ʻalīyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Lughat al-Akhtarī / Muṣṭafá ibn Shams al-Dīn al-Qarah Ḥiṣārī al-shahīr bi-al-Akhtarī. -- 1565.
record.note: Arabic-Turkish dictionary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafanā bi-al-nuṭq wa-al-bayān, wa-faḍḍalanā al-ihtidāʼ bi-al-faṣāḥah wa-al-tibyān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb fī awākhir shahr Ramaḍān, fī waqt al-ẓuhr, tārīkh sanat 972 ... ʻan yad ... Ibrāhīm ibn Muẓaffar, fī shahr Qasṭamūnī, fī Madrasat Yaʻqūb Āghā ... wa-ḥurrira min nuskhat al-muṣannif allatī kutib[at] bi-khaṭṭih ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed at noon, the end of the month of Ramaḍān, of the year 972 [of the Hijrah = 10 May 1565] ... by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm ibn Muẓaffar, in the city of Qasṭamūnī [Kastamonu (Turkey)], at the School of Yaʻqūb Āghā ... it was transcribed from the copy of the author that was written in his own handwriting ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawāshī mawlānā ʻIṣām al-Dīn ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kāfiyah. -- 1611-1612.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 6579 (explicit somewhat different).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā hādiyan li-sālik masālik maḥāmidik, wa-Yā sāmiʻan li-jāmiʻ masāʼil ḥāmidik ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min tanmīq hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī awāsiṭ Dhī al-Ḥijjah, waqt al-ḍuḥá, fī yawm al-Khamīs bi-qaṣabat Birkī al-maḥrūsah, fī tārīkh sanat ʻishrīn wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... Sabaq Allāh ibn Mamī [?] al-Ḥājj ... wa-kāna waqt al-itmām minhu fī yawm al-Khamīs, waqt al-ḍuḥá, min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, bi-qaṣabat Barkūr al-maḥrūsah ... fī tārīkh sanat ʻishrīn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... in the middle of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, on Thursday morning, in the protected town of Birkī [Birgi (Turkey)], in the year 1020 [of the Hijrah = 16 February 1612] ... by the hand of ... Sabaq Allāh ibn Mamī (?) al-Ḥājj ... having started (?) on Thursday morning, in the month of Muḥarram, in the protected town of Barkūr ... in the year 1020 [of the Hijrah = 17 March 1611] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iṣlāḥ wa-al-Īḍāḥ / Ibn Kamāl Pāshā. -- 1540 or 1541.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aḥmaduhu fī al-bidāyah wa-al-nihāyah ʻalá al-hidāyah wa-al-wiqāyah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʼunwān in gold and blue on leaf 1 verso.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... 947."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... 947 [of the Hijrah = 1540/1541]."

record.title: 880-02 Fatāwá Qāḍī Khānah : jild awwal. -- [16--?].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a later hand on front page.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... ḥamdan yuqarribunā ilá marḍāt Allāh taʻālá wa-karāmatih ..."
Fair modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Remaining volume(s) wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn min al-fiqh al-sharīf / ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Amīn al-Dīn. -- 1442 or 1443.
record.note: Title appears on the lower edge.
Compared with Arabic MSS 184.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yā man lā yaḥūṭu kamāluhu [kamāl] kamālihi niṭāq waṣf al-fuṣaḥāʼ, wa-lā yanūṭu bi-idrāk idrākihi afkār fuḥūl al-fuḍalāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Laid-in leaves.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... min yad ... Darwīsh Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Rūmī, tārīkh sanat sittah wa-arbaʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... by the hand of ... Darwīsh Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Rūmī, dated in the year 846 [of the Hijrah = 1442/1443]."

record.title: 880-02 Jāmiʻ al-fatāwá / lil-Shaykh Qirq Amr Allāh al-Ḥamīdī al-Ḥanafī. -- 1567.
record.note: Legal decisions.
Title supplied by a later hand on front page.
Compared with Ahlwardt 4827 (ends with Kitāb al-waṣāyā; in this copy this chapter is on leaves 121 recto-123 recto, and ends differently).
Compared with Arabic MSS suppl. 175, 227.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻam ʻallama min [min ʻilm] al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-hadānā ʻalá [ilá] maʻrifat mā lam yuʻlam ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Faraghtu min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm al-Sabt, fī tārīkh 9 shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī sanat 975 ... katabahu ... Mawlānā Walī ibn Shuʻayb khaṭīb qaryat Shará ..."

Translation of the colophon: "I completed the transcription of this copy on Saturday, 9 Rabiʻ al-Awwal, of the year 975 [of the Hijrah = 23 September 1567] ... copied by ... Mawlānā Walī ibn Shuʻayb, the "khaṭīb" (preacher) of the village of Shará ..."

record.title: 880-02 Majmūʻat al-fatāwá / lil-Samarqandī. -- 1566.
record.note: Legal decisions.
The title is written in a later hand on title page and lower edge.
Possibly the same work as Kâtip Çelebi, IV, 8769 (Fatāwá al-Samarqandī ... Muḥammad ibn al-Walīd al-Ḥanafī).
Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Kitāb al-Ṭahārāt. Masāʼil hādhā al-bāb mushtamilah ʻalá sabʻat fuṣūl ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah fī al-yawm al-ḥādī ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, fī yawm al-Jumʻah, fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, min shuhūr [sanat] arbaʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, ʻalá yad ... Darwīsh Muḥammad ibn Mūsá ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble copy was completed on Friday morning, 11 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, of the [year] 974 [of the Hijrah = 5 November, 1566], by the hand of ... Darwīsh Muḥammad ibn Mūsá ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Bāriʻ fī aḥkām al-nujūm : al-juzʼ al-thāmin / taʼlīf ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Rijāl. -- [17--?].
record.note: Compared with Ms. Landberg 454 which lacks precisely this last chapter.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
The previous 7 chapters wanting.
al-Juzʼ al-thāmin: Fī taḥwīl sinī al-ʻālam.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Juzʼ al-thāmin: Fī taḥwīl sinī al-ʻālam, min Kitāb al-Bāriʻ fī aḥkām al-nujūm, taʼlīf ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Rijāl. Qāla Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Rijāl: Hādhā kitāb jamaʻtu fīhi min aqāwīl al-ʻulamā fī taḥwīl sinī al-ʻālam ..."

record.title: 880-03 Ḍawʼ al-Miṣbāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Isfarāyīnī. -- 1541.
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand inside front cover. In manuscript on leaf 1 recto in a later hand: Sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ.
For the introduction see British Museum Suppl. 932 and Leipzig catalog (Vollers) 420.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Inna aḥaqq mā tatawashshaḥu bidhikrihi ṣudūr al-kutub wa-al-dafātir, wa-tatawaffaru ʻalá nashrihi alsinat al-bādī wa-al-ḥāḍir ḥamd Allāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.

Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Baklarkhān ... Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr al-nuskhah ... min [fī] awāsiṭ al-Thafar [Ṣafar], fī waqt al-ʻaṣr, min yawm thalāthat ʻashar, fī tārīkh sanat thamān wa-arbaʻīn wa-tisʻah [wa-tisʻimiʼah] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Baklarkhān ... The copy was concluded ... in the middle of Ṣafar, in the afternoon of the thirteenth day, in the year 948 [of the Hijrah = 18 June 1541] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-awqāt / taʼlīf Sahl ibn Bishr al-Isrāʼīlī. -- 1912.
record.note: The author's name is given on folio 1a as Bishr ibn Sahl al-Isrāʼīlī.
An astrological tract.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna al-awqāt takhtalifu bi-ikhtilāf al-ḥarakāt ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Sahl ibn Bishr al-Isrāʼīlī fī ʻilm al-falak wa-al-burūj wa-al-aḥkām al-falakīyah. -- 1912.
record.note: Treatise on astrology.
Also known as: al-Majmūʻ fī al-aḥkām (Brockelmann).
Agrees exactly with Leipzig catalog (Vollers) 799, as described in detail by V. Stegemann, Dorotheos von Sidon und das sogenannte Introductorium des Sahl ibn Bisr, Prag, 1942, pp. 15-25.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, bi-hi al-iʻānah badʼan wa-khatman ... Qāla Sahl ibn Bishr al-Isrāʼīlī: Iʻlam inna al-burūj al-ithná ʻashar, minhā sittah dhukūr wa-sittah ināth ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
With diagrams.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Qad tamma ... bi-khaṭṭ kātibihi Maḥmūd Ḥamdī ʻalá dhimmat Ḥaḍrat al-Sayyid Afandī Khaḍrāwī. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu muwāfiqan yawm al-Sabt, 22 Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat 1330 [lil-Hijrah = 8 Ḥazīrān/Yūniyū 1912] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... in the handwriting of its copyist Maḥmūd Ḥamdī for Ḥaḍrat al-Sayyid Afandī Khaḍrāwī. Completed on Saturday, 22 Jumādá al-Ākhirah, the year 1330 [of the Hijrah = 8 June 1912] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī. -- 1724.
record.note: Also known as: al-Minaḥ al-fikrīyah (Brockelmann, S II, p. 276).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awdaʻa jawāhir al-maʻānī al-ḍiyāʼīyah fī qawālib zawāhir al-mabānī min al-ḥurūf al-hijāʼīyah ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Qad tamma ... ʻan yad ... Khalīl ibn Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan ... sanat sitt wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ghurrat <fī> shahr Ramaḍān Sharīf, fī yawm al-Arbiʻā, fī waqt al-ẓuhr."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of ... Khalīl ibn Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan ... on Wednesday noon, the beginning of the noble month of Ramaḍān, of the year 1136 [of the Hijrah = 24 May 1724]."

record.title: 880-02 ʻAdad suwar al-Qurʼān wa-āyātihi wa-kalimātihi wa-ḥurūfih / ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Kāfī. -- 1723.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna wāḥidan min aṣḥābī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh, saʼalanī an adhkura ʻadad suwar al-Qurʼān wa-āyātih wa-kalimātih wa-ḥurūfih wa-takhlīṣ Makkīyihi min Madanīyih ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 118 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Tammat Hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah fī waqt al-Shāfiʻī, qabla al-ṣubḥ, fī laylat al-Sabt, fī yawm sitt wa-ʻishrūn, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat sitt wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ... katabahu ... Khalīl ibn Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble copy was completed, according to the Shāfiʻi timing, before the morning [prayer], on Saturday night, 26 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1136 [of the Hijrah = 24 December 1723] ... Copied by ... Khalīl ibn Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-asrār ʻammā khafiya ʻan al-afkār / taʼlīf al-Shaykh ... Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī. -- [14--?].
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 1816-1819. The poem by al-Dīrīnī (Berlin 1817) begins on leaf 104 recto. The explicit does not seem to agree with any of the Berlin copies.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn al-mūjid lil-ashyāʼ bilā muʻīn, alladhī khalaqa al-insān min ṭīn ..."
Good old (15th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 al-Thimār al-yawāniʻ ʻalá uṣūl Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ / lil-Shaykh Khālid al-Azharī. -- 1705.
record.note: Brockelmann lists only one manuscript.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá inʻāmih wa-ifḍālih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ [fī] uṣūl al-fiqh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Sabt [al-Arbiʻāʼ (?)] al-mubārakah, rābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, min shuhūr sanat miʼah wa-ʻashrah wa-sabʻah baʻda alf, ʻalá yad kātibihi ... ʻAbd al-Wārith Abū Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn Badr ibn Ḥujayrīd al-Mālikī madhhaban, al-Bārūkī baladan, al-Minshāwī mawlidan, al-Saʻdī ṭarīqatan, al-Qādirī ḥaqīqatan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Saturday [Wednesday (?)], 14 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 1117 [of the Hijrah = 5 August 1705], by the hand of its copyist ... ʻAbd al-Wārith Abū Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn Badr ibn Ḥujayrīd al-Mālikī madhhaban, al-Bārūkī baladan, al-Minshāwī mawlidan, al-Saʻdī ṭarīqatan, al-Qādirī ḥaqīqatan ..."

record.title: 880-03 Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-muṭawwal fī imtiḥān al-amānī / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī. -- 1669.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh, fī al-yawm al-awwal min Rajab, sanat thamānīn wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed ... by the hand of the poor to God, on the first day of Rajab, of the year 1080 [of the Hijrah = 25 November 1669] ..."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah. -- 1549 or 1550.
record.note: Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh taʻālá bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah, saʻuda jadduhu ... Hādhā ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma 956."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in [the year] 956 [of the Hijrah = 1549/1550]."

Below the colophon and to the right of it are some Turkish verses, signed: "Taḥrīran fī Rajab al-murjib, sanat 979. Kataba hadhā al-kitāb [i.e., the manuscript], wa-hādh[ihi] al-abyāt ʻAlī ibn Yaḥyá." [= Dated, Rajab, of the year 979 (of the Hijrah = November/December 1571). This book (i.e., the manuscript), and these verses were written by ʻAlī ibn Yaḥyá.]

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Jazarīyah fī makhārij al-ḥurūf / lil-shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title is given on front cover as: al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah.
Title is given on folio 1a as: Kitāb al-Jazarīyah fī makhārij al-ḥurūf.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbin sāmiʻi // Muḥammadu ibn al-Jazarīyi al-Shāfiʻī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Nabīyihi wa-Muṣṭafāh ..."
Good modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Marginalia.
No. 1 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 al-Muhadhdhab fī rasm al-Muṣḥaf al-ʻUthmānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The manuscript cited by Brockelmann is now Hitti 1248 (title: al-Muhadhdhab fī al-hijāʼ min dhayl Shifāʼ al-qurrāʼ), hence Brockelmann's title (Risāla fī rasm al-maṣāḥif) must be a made up one.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā min al-muttabiʻīn lā al-mubtadiʻīn ... Iʻlam inna ittibāʻ Muṣḥaf al-Imām ʻUthmān ibn ʻAffān, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī hijāʼihi wājib ..."
Good modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 4 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Rasm al-burhān fī hijāʼ al-Furqān / Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar al-Jaʻbarī. -- [17--?]-[19--?].
record.note: al-Baghdādī presumably saw a manuscript in which the work was assigned to al-Jaʻbarī, the author of a more extensive commentary on the same Rāʼīyah of al-Shāṭibī (Ms. Landberg 619).
Bankipore catalog (XII, 706; Brockelmann, II, 134) has a list of al-Jaʻbarī's works, more than 100 of them.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arsala Muḥammadan fātiḥata abwāb al-hudá lil-anām, wa-anṭaqa bi-faḍlihi baqarat Banī Isrāʼīl bi-al-kalām ..."
Leaves 16-57, fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 58-85, modern (20th century) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 4 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Nammaqahu ... al-Ḥāfiẓ ʻUthmān Nasīm ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... al-Ḥāfiẓ ʻUthmān Nasīm ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah tashtamilu ʻalá bayān aḥkām al-hamzatayn fī kalimah wa-fī kalimatayn / ʻAlī al-Ḥākimī al-Baṣīr. -- 1615.
record.note: Presumably a holograph.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... ʻAlī al-Ḥākimī al-Baṣīr, khādim al-qurrāʼ bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar: Qad saʼalanī man aʻtaqidu ṣalāḥahu ... an ajʻala la-hu risālah tashtamilu ʻalá bayān aḥkām al-hamzatayn fī kalimah wa-fī kalimatayn ..."
Fair naskhī.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 4 of 4 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Qāla dhālika bi-famihi afqar ʻibād Rabbihi ... ʻAlī al-Ḥākimī ... wa-kāna intihāʼuhā ʻalá yad aḥqar ʻibād Allāh wa-afqarihim ilayh, fī al-yawm al-mubārak, fī rābiʻ ʻashar Jumādá al-Ākhir min shuhūr sanat arbaʻah wa-ʻishrīn wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This was said by the mouth of the poorest of the servants to his Lord ... ʻAlī al-Ḥākimī ... It was completed by the hand of the most wretched of God's servants and the neediest to Him, on the blessed day, the fourteenth of the month of Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 1024 [of the Hijrah = 11 July 1615] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī. -- 1744.
record.note: Prayers.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī ... Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ sababan li-radd al-qaḍāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations throughout.
No. 1 of 3 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna farāghī bayna al-ʻaṣr wa-al-ẓuhr, yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, 1157, fī shahr Jumād al-Awwal ..."
Translation of the colophon: "I completed it between afternoon and noon, on Wednesday, in the month of Jumād al-Awwal, 1157 [of the Hijrah = 17 (?) June 1744] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs Qaṣīdat al-Burdah lil-Būṣīrī. -- 1744.
record.note: Title, as above, is given on front page of the majmūʻ in a later hand.
The takhmīs is Ahlwardt 7811 (5th paraphrase) and 7812 (middle, or d, paraphrase).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Mā bālu qalbika lā yanfakku dhā alami // mudh bāna ahlu al-Ḥimá wa-al-Bāni wa-al-ʻalami. Wa-inhalla madmaʻuka al-qānī bi-munsajimin // Amin tadhakkuri jīrānin bi-Dhī Salami. Mazajta damʻan jará min muqlatin bi-dami ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive intrelinear and marginal notations.
No. 2 of 3 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wa-qad faragha al-ḥaqīr ... Ḥājj Ḥasan ibn Shaykh Junayd al-Ḥarqī ... min kitbat hādhihi al-qaṣīdah al-Burdah ... yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, fī shahr Jumādá 2 [al-Thāniyah], sanat 1157."

Translation of the colophon: "The wretched ... Ḥājj Ḥasan ibn Shaykh Junayd al-Ḥarqī ... completed copying this poem, al-Burdah, on Wednesday, in Jumādá 2 [al-Thāniyah], the year 1157 [of the Hijrah = 15 (?) July 1744]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Qaṣīdat al-Burdah / lil-Maḥallī. -- 1744.
record.note: Title, as above, is given on front page of the majmūʻ in a later hand. Also known as: al-Anwār al-muḍīʼah fī madḥ khayr al-barīyah (Brockelmann, Ahlwardt).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf malīḥ ʻalá Burdat al-madīḥ, yufhamu bi-hi maqāṣid nāẓimihā ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notations.
No. 3 of 3 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, min shahr ... Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1157 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "On Wednesday, in the month of ... Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 1157 [of the Hijrah = 14 (?) May 1744] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Muḥammad Mullā Ḥanafī. -- 1769.
record.note: Title, as above, is supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in slip. Also known as: al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah (Brockelmann).
Compared with Ahlwardt 5296; this copy has an additional paragraph (beginning "wa-Iʻlam") at end.
Items 1-3 in this majmūʻah are in the same hand, and the colophon-date appears at end of item 3.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-Ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh taʻālá mukhāṭaban, tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓa al-maḥmūd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī. -- 1769.
record.note: Title, as above, is supplied by a modern hand on a laid-in slip.
Items 1-3 in this majmūʻah are in the same hand, and the colophon-date appears at end of item 3.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [Qawluhu] fa-al-dalīl, ay, fa-yuṭlabu minka al-dalīl ʻalá tilka al-daʻwá, wa-dhālika al-dalīl murakkab min muqaddimatayn ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah. -- 1679 or 1680-1769.
record.note: Manual of dialectics.
Also known as: Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth (Brockelmann) or Ādāb al-baḥth.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-Ḥamdu wa-al-minnah, [wa] ʻalá Nabīyika al-ṣalāh wa-al-taḥīyah. Idhā qulta bi-kalām in kunta nāqilan fa-yuṭlabu al-ṣiḥḥah aw muddaʻiyan fa-al-dalīl ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophons: 1. "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh fī yawm thalāth, fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, fī thamāniyata ʻashar min Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1183." 2. "Tammat ... sanat 1090."

Translation of the two colophons: 1. "Completed on Tuesday morning, 18 Jumādá al-Ūlá, the year 1183 [of the Hijrah = 19 September 1769]. 2. "It is completed ... the year 1090 [of the Hijrah = 1679/1680]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālah fī Ādāb al-baḥth / Muḥammad Mullā Ḥanafī. -- 1678 or 1679.
record.note: Also known as: al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah (Brockelmann).
Compared with Ahlwardt 5296; this copy has an additional paragraph at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Laka al-Ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh taʻālá mukhāṭaban tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓa al-maḥmūd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notes in the earlier part of the text.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 4 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... tārīkh sanat 1089."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... dated in the year 1089 [of the Hijrah = 1678/1679]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Mīr Abū al-Fatḥ Muḥammad ibn Amīn Tāj al-Saʻīdī al-Ardabīlī. -- 1679 or 1680.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ifhām al-khiṭāb, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mabʻūth li-iẓhār al-ṣawāb ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes throughout.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 5 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... sanat tisʻīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... the year 1090 [of the Hijrah = 1679/1680]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Saʻīdī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Yaḥyá ibn ʻUmar Minqarīʹzādah. -- [1679 or 1680].
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 5300 (the preface is not present in this copy).
For the author see Brockelmann, II, 435; S II, p. 647.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qawluhu: Aw al-ḥāṣil bi-al-maṣdar aʻamm min an yakūna al-ḥāṣil bi-al-maṣdar min al-mabnī lil-fāʻil aw min al-mabnī lil-mafʻūl ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 6 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Saʻīdī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / ʻUmar ibn Aḥmad al-Chillī. -- 1679.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 5301; the introduction (present also in Hitti, 896) is not in this copy.
The author's dates given in Brockelmann and Hitti, A.H. 1112 (A.D. 1710), for the composition of this work, is that of the copying of the Berlin manuscript, and is obviously too late.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qawluhu: Maʻnayān mashhūrān, al-ẓ[āhir] anna al-taqyīd ishārah ilá wajh al-ikhtiṣār ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 7 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh fī yawm Jār [Chahār (?)] Shanbah, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī waqt al-ẓuhūr [al-ẓuhr], min yad Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Aḥmad, sanat 1090."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed on Wednesday [?], in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, at noontime, by the hand of Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Aḥmad, in the year 1090 [of the Hijrah = 12 (?) April 1679]."

record.title: 880-03 ʻUqūd al-jumān fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / lil-Imām al-Suyūṭī. -- 1803 or 1804.
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 296. In manuscript (table of contents) in a later hand: Naẓm al-Talkhīṣ al-musammá bi-ʻUqūd al-jumān.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīr ʻābid al-Raḥmān: al-Ḥamdu laka ʻalá al-bayān, wa-afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī afṣaḥ al-anām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in balck, flap missing.
No. 1 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ʻalá yad kātibihā Saʻīd fī 1218 [lil-Hijrah = 1803/1804]."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the hand of its copyist Saʻīd in 1218 [of the Hijrah = 1803/1804]."

record.title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam / Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī. -- [1800].
record.note: Copied about 1800.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim lil-ṣawāb wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-nāṭiq bi-al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 2 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 ʻIqd al-durr al-manẓūm fī munāsabat al-Basmalah li-mā ishtahara min al-ʻulūm / lil-Shaykh ... Sulaymān al-ʻAzīzī al-shahīr bi-al-Zayyāt. -- 1793.
record.note: Neither the incipit nor the explicit, composed in A.H. 1110 (A.D. 1698 or 1699), given by al-Baghdādī are in this copy. Perhaps this is only an extract from the work.
The poem on leaf 43 recto may be part of ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻĀmilī's Manẓūmat al-manṭiq (Ahlwardt, 5207).
Incipit: "Iʻlam waffaqaka Allāh taʻālá inna kull mutakallim shāʻiran kāna aw kātiban yanbaghī la-hu an yataʼannaqa fī al-ibtidāʼ wa-al-takhalluṣ wa-al-intihāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 3 of 9 titles bound together.

"Katabahu ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Salṭī, min khaṭṭ al-Fāḍil Saʻīd, fī Jāmiʻ Harkān, fī Jumādá al-Ulá [al-Ūlá], sanat 1208 [lil-Hijrah = Kānūn al-Awwal (Dīsambir) 1793-Kānūn al-Thānī (Yanāyir) 1794]."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Salṭī from the handwriting of the Honorable Saʻīd, at Jāmiʻ Harkān, in Jumādá al-Ūlá of the year 1208 [of the Hijrah = December 1793-January 1794]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-ḥādiyah ʻashar fī al-maqūlāt. -- [1800].
record.note: Copied about 1800.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-idhā faraghnā min dhikr al-sittah al-alfāẓ allatī dhakarahā Īsāghūjī wa-bayyanā māhīyat al-maʻānī allatī tadullu ʻalayhā ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 4 of 9 titles bound together.
Compared with the Cairo 1928 edition, I, 322-330.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Jihat al-waḥdah / Muḥammad Amīn. -- 1807.
record.note: Title given on the margin of leaf 41 recto as: Risālah mawsūmah bi-Jihat al-waḥdah, which may be incorrect.
Compared with Ahlwardt 2474, which seems to be the same work as Hitti 1514, although Hitti implies that it is the matn only.

Ahlwardt titles this commentary: Taʻlīq ʻalá baḥth Jihat al-waḥdah; but the explicit says that were it not for various hindrances that author would have commented upon (sharaḥtu) the whole of the matn, instead of only a part of it.
For the identification of the author see Hitti 1514 (attributes the Jihat al-waḥdah to Muḥammad Amīn), and leaf 183 verso of this manuscript.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Inna aḥsan mā yuftataḥu bi-hi al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām ḥamd Allāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 5 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Najaza fī salkh Ramaḍān, ʻalá yad Saʻīd, fī 1222 [lil-Hijrah = 30 November 1807] ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed at the end of Ramaḍān, by the hand of Saʻīd, in 1222 [of the Hijrah = 30 November 1807] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām / ʻAbd Allāh al-Yazdī. -- 1807.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Q[awluhu]: al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Iftataḥa bi-ḥamd Allāh baʻda al-tasmiyah ibtidāʼan bi-khayr al-kalām wa-bi-Ḥadīth Khayr al-Anām ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 6 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Faragha min kitābatihi al-ʻabd al-faqīr Saʻīd, fī Shaʻbān, fī 1222 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed by the poor servant Saʻīd in Shaʻbān, 1222 [of the Hijrah = September/October 1807] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Īsāghūjī / Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Tālishī. -- [1800].
record.note: Copied about 1800.
Title supplied by two later hands on front page of the majmūʻah.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5234; the explicit as in Ahlwardt 5235 (3), with some variations.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib wujūduhu. Aqūlu: Iftataḥa kitābahu awwalan bi-al-ḥamd la-hu baʻda al-ibtidāʼ bi-al-Basmalah, li-anna adāʼ al-wājib min shukr naʻmāʼihi wājib ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 7 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-itmām ʻalá yad ... Amīr Ḥājj al-Charkī, li-ṣadīqihi Shamūwīl al-Kamrī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed by the hand of ... Amīr Ḥājj al-Charkī, for his friend Shamūwil al-Kamrī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shamsīyah / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī. -- 1828.
record.note: Title given in manuscript (front page of the majmūʻah), in a later hand, as: Ḥāshiyat Mīr ʻalá al-Quṭb Sharḥ al-Shamsīyah.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5260; the explicit is that of Ahlwardt 5261 (1).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Q[awluhu]: Warattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāth maqālāt wa-khātimah. Hākadhā wujida fī kathīr min al-nusakh. Wa-al-ṣawāb anna lafẓat thalāth hā hunā zāʼidah, waqaʻat sahwan min qalam al-nāsikh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 8 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... bi-yad ... Shamūwīl, fī Ramaḍān, sanat 1243."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of ... Shamūwīl, in Ramaḍān, of the year 1243 [of the Hijrah = March/April 1828]."

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-ghālib ʻalá al-mubtadī al-ṭālib / ʻUmar al-Kudālī al-Dāghistānī. -- [1800].
record.note: Yāqūt mentions (IV, 240) a Kudāl in Africa.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... ʻUmar al-Jānī al-Kudālī [al-Kudālī]: Lammā raʼaytu al-kitāb al-nafīs, muṣannaf al-Imām ... al-madʻū Muḥammad Amīn ... ʻallaqtu ʻalayhi ḥawāshī ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, in black, flap missing.
No. 9 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat kitābatuhu wa-muqābalatuhu ... bi-yad ... Muḥammad Saʻīd al-Harkanī."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied and collated ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad Saʻīd al-Harkanī."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth / Muḥammad ibn Ashraf al-Samarqandī. -- 1553 or 1554.
record.note: Manual of dialectics.
Known also as: al-Risālah al-Samarqandīyah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Minnah ʻalaynā li-wāhib al-ʻaql. Hādhihi Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth yaḥtāju ilayhā kull mutaʻallim ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
No. 1 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... tārīkh sanat 961."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... in the year dated 961 [of the Hijrah = 1553/1554]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī / Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Dawwānī. -- 1554 or 1555.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip. In manuscript (leaf 8 recto): "Hādhihi Risālah min risālāt ādāb al-baḥth".
Compared with Manchester catalog (Mingana), 390 (C).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-muṣa[nnif]: al-Minnah ʻalaynā li-wāhib al-ʻaql, ʻadal ʻammā huwa al-mashhūr, wa-huwa al-ḥamd lillāh, wa-aḥmadu Allāh, wa-ghayr dhālik ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
No. 2 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... tārīkh sanat 962."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... dated in the year 962 [of the Hijrah = 1554/1555]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth / Masʻūd ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Shirwānī al-Rūmī. -- 1550.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip. In manuscript on front cover: Sharḥ-i Masʻūd.
Known also as: al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī.
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 326.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad qāla al-Imām ... Muḥammad al-Samarqandī ... al-Minnah ʻalaynā, man munna ʻalayhi, li-wāhib afḍal al-niʻam, alladhī huwa niʻmat al-ʻaql ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
No. 3 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma ... tārikh sanat 957."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... dated in the year 957 [of the Hijrah = 1550/1551]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī / lil-Kāshānī. -- 1551.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip. In manuscript on front cover: Ḥāshiyat ʻImād ʻalá al-Masʻūd.
Ascribed also to Muḥammad al-Saʻīdī al-Ardabīlī.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5277 and Manchester catalog (Mingana) 389 (C + D).

Brockelmann dates the author ca. 1350 (S I, p. 849) and 1343 (S II, p. 295), which is obviously chronologically impossible. Ahlwardt dates him ca. 1475. Hitti (note to 870) dates him in the 10th (A.D. 16th) century, on the basis of Ḥājjī Khalīfah, I, 208.
Ahlwardt 5278, containing the same Ḥāshiyah, was copied in 1483.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla: al-Minnah ʻalaynā. Aqūlu: Salaka ṭarīq al-ʻamal bi-al-Ḥadīth maʻnan, li-anna ḥaqīqat al-ḥamd ʻinda al-muḥaqqiqīn iẓhār al-ṣifāt al-kamālīyah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
No. 4 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... fī Liwāʼ Qusṭanṭanīyah, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat thamāniyah wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Tamma sanat 958."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... in Liwāʼ Qusṭanṭanīyah [Constantinople], in the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 958. Completed in the year 958 [of the Hijrah = April/March 1551]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Kāshī ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī / Luṭf Allāh ibn Mawlānā Shujāʻ al-Dīn. -- 1551.
record.note: Title given on the front cover as: Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-ʻImād li-Ibn Shujāʻ.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5281 and Manchester catalog (Mingana) 390 (A).
Author's date from: Ahlwardt, 5281.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ... Luṭf Allāh ibn Mawlānā Shujāʻ al-Dīn ... Lammā kāna baʻḍ min aʻizzat al-ikhwān ... yaqraʼ ʻalayya Sharḥ al-Fāḍil Masʻūd ... maʻa ḥāshiyatihi [al-mansūbah] ilá al-Mawlá al-ʻImād ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
No. 5 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tārīkh sanat 958 ... Thamāniyah wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 958 [of the Hijrah = 1551/1552]."

record.title: 880-03 Ādāb al-baḥth / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Ījī. -- 1773.
record.note: Manual of dialectics.
Known also as: al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-Ḥamdu wa-al-minnah, wa-ʻalá Nabīyika al-ṣalāh wa-al-taḥīyah. Idhā qulta bi-kalām, in kunta nāqilan fa-yuṭlabu al-ṣiḥḥah, aw, muddaʻiyan fa-al-dalīl ..."
Fair naskhī.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Muḥammad Mullā Ḥanafī. -- 1773.
record.note: Also known as: al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5296; this copy has an additional paragraph at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-Ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh mukhāṭaban tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓ al-maḥmūd ..."
Fair naskhī.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1187."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... in the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 1187 [of the Hijrah = June/July 1773]."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah fī al-ʻuhūd. -- [1900].
record.note: For al-Shaʻrānī's work see Brockelmann, II, 337; S II, p. 465. Also Ahlwardt, 3102, where the exposition of each duty likewise begins with the formula: "Ukhidha ʻalaynā al-ʻahd al-ʻāmm".

Authorities mentioned are, e.g.: Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Khawwaṣ (folios: 2a, 3a, 9a-b, 26b, 27a; Cf. Brockelmann II, 337); Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī (8a); Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī (3a, 12a); Akhī Afḍal al-Dīn (18b); Maʻrūf al-Karkhī (13a); Ibrāhīm ibn Adham (26b); Muḥammad ibn ʻInān and Muḥammad al-ʻAdl (27a); Ibrāhīm al-Matbūlī (27a); Cf. Brockelmann II: 338.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ukhidha ʻalaynā al-ʻahd al-ʻāmm min Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, an nudmina min muṭālaʻat kutub al-ʻilm wa-taʻlīmih lil-nās laylan wa-nahāran, mā ʻadā al-ʻibādāt al-muwaqatah wa-al-ḥawāʼij al-ḍarūrīyah, wa-madhhab Imāminā al-Shāfiʻī ... Inna ṭalab al-ʻilm ʻalá wajh al-ikhlāṣ afḍal min ṣalāt al-nāfilah ..."
Fair modern (ca. 1900) Maghribī.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-Murshidīyah / lil-Shaykh al-muḥaqqiq Barzakh al-barāzikh Ṣadr al-Dīn al-Qūnawī. -- 1886.
record.note: A Sufi tract.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munʻim ʻalá al-ṣafwah min ʻibādihi bi-mazīyat al-ijtibāʼ, al-bādhil lahum jazīl al-minaḥ wa-sawābigh al-naʻmāʼ ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīrih bi-yad ... Yūsuf Ākāh ibn Muḥammad Darwīsh ... fī awākhir Rajab al-khayr, sanat thalāth wa-thalāth miʼah wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed by the hand of ... Yūsuf Ākāh ibn Muḥammad Darwīsh ... at the end of Rajab, the year 1303 [of the Hijrah = 3 May 1886]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Nāsikh wa-al-mansūkh / min taʼlīf Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Azharī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Azharī al-Faqīh, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Mansūkh min al-Qurʼān miʼat āyah aw naḥwuhā ..."
Good modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṭibb al-Nabawī / li-Dāʼūd ibn Abī al-Faraj. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title and author supplied by a modern hand on front page of the manuscript.

Ascribed by Ḥājjī Khalīfah (no. 7877) and in one of the Berlin manuscripts (Ahlwardt 6297) to Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, which is chronologically impossible, since some manuscripts are dated before his time.

Of the two manuscripts (A32 and A79) in the Army Medical Library (Schullian's catalogue), the former, dated 1550, is ascribed to Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī (d. 1599 [Brockelmann, II, 364], likewise chronologically impossible); the latter, dated 1464, is assigned to Dāʼūd ibn Abī al-Faraj, who is also the author of the other Berlin manuscript (Ahlwardt 6298), dated 1391.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻṭá kull nafs khalqahā wa-madāhā, wa-alhamahā fujūrahā wa-taqwāhā ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Irshād / lil-Birkawī. -- 1695 or 1696.
record.note: Principles of faith.
Compared with Gotha catalog 711 (for author) and Berlin catalog 1889 (anonymous).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-hādī ilá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man khaṣṣahu Allāh bi-al-khulq al-ʻaẓīm ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Limp Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Tammat sanat 1107."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed in the year 1107 [of the Hijrah = 1695/1696]."

record.title: 880-02 Kāshif al-qināʻ wa-al-niqāb bi-izālat al-shabīh ʻan wajh qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Muḥammad ibn ... ʻAbd al-Karīm. -- 1699 or 1700.
record.note: Compared with Cairo catalog, IV, 91 (no incipit given).

The work (with slightly different wording: "Kāshif al-qināʻ wa-al-niqāb bi-izālat shubhah ʻan wajh qawāʻid al-iʻrāb". OCLC: 223534303) is also attributed to: Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kāfiyajī, died 1474.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-naḥwa masāʼil ilá taḥṣīl ʻilm al-Sharīʻah wa-al-Qurʼān ..."
Hasty naskhī, in red and black, on variously colored paper.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, flap missing.
Colophon: "Kātib al-ḥurūf Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī, sākin Istānbūl ... sanat 1111.
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī, resident in Istanbul ... the year 1111 [of the Hijrah = 1699/1670]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-farāʼiḍ / al-Jūrlawī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand on leaf 1 recto.
The Berlin manuscript lacks the beginning, and starts with the middle of leaf 2 recto of this copy.
Hitti 1883 may be a commentary on this tract.
Incipit: "Iʻlam innahu idhā māta al-insān awwal mā yabdaʼ min al-tarikah takfīnuhu wa-tajhīzuhu wa-mā yaḥtājuhu min dhālika, thumma tuqḍá duyūnuhu ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī. -- 1846.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 3919; this copy has an additional prayer at end, before the colophon.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī; ʻunwāns in gold and colors, crude colored drawings of the holy places in Mecca and Medina on leaves 16 verso-17 recto.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu al-faqīr ... ʻUthmān al-Bahsanawī sanat 1262."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor ... ʻUthmān al-Bahsanawī in the year 1262 [of the Hijrah = 1845/1846."

record.title: 880-01 Rasāʼil min al-zāyirjah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a later hand on leaf 1 recto.

The pieces are as follows: Folios 1-5a, begins: "Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām Shams al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Ṣadr al-Dīn ibn al-Imām al-Dandīlī ʻan Sayyidī Ibn al-ʻAbbās al-Sabtī al-muʻtamad ʻalayhi fī kashf al-asrār ...". Folios 5b-6b, begins: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Fāʼidah tudhkaru ʻan al-Shaykh Shams al-Dīn ibn Ṣadr al-Dīn al-Dandīlī min zāyirjah al-Quṭb ... Abū al-ʻAbbās al-Sabtī ...". Folios 6b-9b: "Qāʻidah jafrīyah dāʼirah al-tashīlīyah lil-Sayyid Ḥasan al-Akhlāṭī ...". Folios 9b-10a: "Zāyirjah laṭīfah. Iʻmal 44 jadwalan ...". Folios 10a-16b: "Kitāb anwār al-bahīyah fī zāyirjah al-Sabtīyah." Folios 16b-18b: "Ṣifat al-zāyirjah min ʻilm al-ḥurūf murakkabah ʻalá al-awfāq." Folios 18b-28b (incomplete at end): "Kitāb al-ṣuʻūd fī ʻilm al-gharbīyah."
For the spelling "zāyirjah" see Hitti, 949.
For Aḥmad ibn Jaʻfar al-Sabtī, the supposed founder of the zāyirjah-method see Ahlwardt, III, p. 551.
Fair nastaʻlīq, fairly modern (18th century?), in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Ijāzah / Aḥmad Rāmiz. -- 1891.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻallamanā mā lam naʻlam wa-asʻadanā bi-taʻlīm al-ʻulūm ..."
On folio 7a: "Shīlah lī Muṣṭafá Fahmī Afandīnik ijāzatnāmah sī."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Raqamah ... al-Sayyid al-Ḥājj Aḥmad Rāmiz ... fī awāsiṭ Jumādá al-Ukhrá li-sanat thamān wa-thalāthmiʼah wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Written by ... al-Sayyid al-Ḥājj Aḥmad Rāmiz ... in the middle of Jumādá al-Ukhrá of the year 1308 [of the Hijrah = 26 January 1891 ..."

record.title: 880-02 Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb / lil-Suyūṭī. -- 1714.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá ... Hādhā juzʼ sammaytuhu Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... min yad ... Ḥasan ibn ʻUmar ibn Ilyās Afandī ... sanat 1126."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of ... Ḥasan ibn ʻUmar ibn Ilyās Afandī ... in the 1126 [of the Hijrah = 1714/1715."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-ghazalīyah fī alqāb al-ḥadīth. -- 1663.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip. In manuscript on leaf 55 verso: [Sharḥ] al-Qaṣīdah fī uṣūl al-ḥadīth lil-ḥāfiẓ Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Faraj [sic] al-Ishbīlī al-Andalusī al-Shāfiʻī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Ḥāfiẓ Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad ibn Faraḥ al-Ishbīlī ... Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥun // wa-al-rajā fīka muʻḍalun. Wa-ḥuznī wa-damʻī mursalun wa-musalsalu. al-Ḥadīth al-ṣaḥīḥ al-muttafaq ʻalá ṣiḥḥatih huwa al-Ḥadīth al-musnad alladhī ittaṣala isnāduhu bi-naql al-ʻadl al-ḍābiṭ ilá muntahāh ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 4 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh fī yawm al-Arbiʻā, waqt al-ḍaḥwah al-ṣughrā [al-ṣughrá], rābiʻ Shaʻbān, sanat 1073 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed on Wednesday, in the early morning, 4 Shaʻbān, the year 1073 [of the Hijrah = 14 March 1663] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah fī al-asṭurlāb. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan yalīqu bi-jalālih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah mukhtaṣarah adhkuru fīhā asmāʼ al-rusūm al-marsūmah ʻalá al-ālah al-musammāt [al-musammāh] bi-al-asṭurlāb ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq and naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.
With two diagrams.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 5 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Zawāl al-taraḥ fī sharḥ Manẓūmat Ibn Faraḥ / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn Jamāʻah. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 111.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn Jamāʻah: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kammala nawʻ al-insān bi-jalal [bi-ḥulal] jamāl al-bayān ..."
Good modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 6 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Muzīlat al-ishkāl al-thābit fī natāʼij al-ashkāl / Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān al-Arzan al-Rūmī al-mushahhar bi-Panbahʹzādah. -- [17--?].
record.note: The author may possibly be identical with Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān al-Jūrjānī (Ḥājjī Khalīfah 7667 and Berlin catalog 5271 (1); Istanbul edition of Ḥājjī Khalīfah reads al-Jūzajānī).
Panbah, "cotton," means in Turkish also "rosy-faced," according to Redhouse.
In the preface, al-Kātibī is misnamed Abū Bakr ibn ʻUmar.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-makhlūqāt mukhtalifat al-ashkāl wa-al-ṣuwar ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, cloth covered, with flap.
No. 7 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Muntakhab min Ighāthat al-lahfān fī maṣāʼid al-Shayṭān / lil-Shaykh ... Ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah. -- 1700 or 1701.
record.note: Title according to preface: hādhihi awrāq intakhabtuhā min Ighāthat al-lahfān fī maṣāʼid al-Shayṭān. Also given in a later hand on leaf 1 verso as: Kitāb mukhtaṣar Ighāthat al-lahfān.
Compared with Ahlwardt, 2657 (explicit as in 2659).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān min nuṭfat amshāj wa-jaʻalahu samīʻan baṣīran ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 7 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻan yad Ḥusayn ibn ʻUmar, sanat 1112, ithnā ʻashar wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of Ḥusayn ibn ʻUmar, in the year 1112 [of the Hijrah = 1700/1701] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Min Kitāb mā rawāhu al-asāṭīn fī ʻadam al-majīʼ ilá al-salāṭīn / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ... al-Suyūṭī. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Akhraja Abū Dāwūd wa-al-Bayhaqī ʻan Abī Hurayrah, raḍh, ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Man badā fa-qad jafá ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in blue and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Min Unmūdhaj al-labīb fī khaṣāʼiṣ al-Ḥabīb / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ... al-Suyūṭī. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: For the complete work see Ahlwardt 2577.
Incipit: "Wa-habaṭa Isrāfīl ʻalayhi wa-lam yahbiṭ ʻalá nabī qablah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim / Ibrāhīm ibn Ismāʻīl. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 126 (gives the date of composition as 1558).
Forename given in Brockelmann Supplement only; I, 462 and Hitti give only the patronymic.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anʻama ʻalaynā bi-anwāʻ al-niʻam wa-laṭāʼif al-iḥsān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 4 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam li-Yūsuf ibn Khālid / Abū Ḥanīfah. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: Ahlwardt 3968 is a shorter version (starting at foot of the third page and ending at foot of the sixth page of this manuscript).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kafá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-huwa waṣīyah nāfiʻah mansūbah ilá Abī Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh, li-Yūsuf ibn Khālid al-Samtī ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 5 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam li-ibnihi Ḥammād / Abū Ḥanīfah. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Abū Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu li-ibnihi Ḥammād: Yā bunayya, arashdaka Allāh taʻālá wa-ayyadak, ūṣīka bi-waṣāyā in ḥafiẓtahā wa-ḥāfaẓta ʻalayhā rajawtu laka al-saʻādah fī dīnika wa-dunyāk ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 6 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam li-Abī Yūsuf / Abū Ḥanīfah. -- [1700 or 1701].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Hādhihi Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam li-Abī Yūsuf ... baʻda an ẓahara la-hu minhu al-rushd wa-ḥusn al-sīrah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 7 of 7 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ʻilm ādāb al-baḥth / Aḥmad ibn Muṣṭafá Ṭāshkubrīʹzādah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Hitti 907 does not contain the commentary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā māniʻ li-ʻaṭāʼih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu katabtu ʻiddah min al-suṭūr ... wa-qad qaṣadtu al-ān sharḥahā ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb ... ʻan yad ... ʻAbd al-Ghafūr ibn Muḥammad [surname defaced], fī waqt al-ḍuḥá ... fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī yawm Dū Shanbah [rest defaced]."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAbd al-Ghafūr ibn Muḥammad [surname defaced], in the forenoon ... in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, on Monday [rest defaced]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī / Dunqūz. -- 1621 or 1622.
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Inna aḥsan mā yustaʻānu bi-hi fī al-umūr al-ḥisān ḥamd Allāh al-Malik al-Mannān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 9 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... fī sanat 1031."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed ... in the year 1031 [of the Hijrah = 1621/1622]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ ʻIṣām al-Dīn lil-Qāḍī ʻAḍud al-Dīn. -- 1621 or 1622.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Naḥmaduka Yā man lā nāqiḍ limā ʻaṣayta [aʻṭayta] wa-lā muʻāriḍ limā qaḍayta ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 9 titles bound together.
"Tammat al-risālah ... fī sanat 1031."
Translation of the colophon: "The epistle is completed ... in the year 1031 [of the Hijrah = 1621/1622]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Aḥmad al-Janadī. -- [1621 or 1622].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Bi-ismika Allāhumma yā wajib al-wujūd wa-yā wāhib al-khayr wa-al-jūd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 4 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Kāshī ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-Masʻūdī / Shāh Ḥusayn al-ʻAjamī. -- [1621 or 1622].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip. In manuscript, it is given in a later hand in the table of contents in front of the volume (in Turkish) as: Ḥanafīyah Ḥāshiyah sī Shāh Ḥusayn, and (leaf 37 verso) as: al-Kitāb minhu al-Risālah al-Ḥanīfīyah, and in the colophon (leaf 39 recto) as: al-Risālah li-Shāh Ḥusayn al-wāqiʻah ʻalá al-Risālah al-Ḥanīfīyah, perhaps confused with Mullā Ḥanafī's al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah, a commentary on ʻAḍud al-Dīn al-Ījī's Ādāb al-baḥth.
Berlin catalog 5279, containing the complete work, agrees neither in incipit nor in explicit, hence this copy presumably represents extracts from the body of the work.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qawluhu: Li-anna gharaḍahu iẓhār al-ṣawāb, lā yataqaḍḍá an lā yaṭluba ṣiḥḥatan, maʻa ʻilmihi bi-hā, idh rubbamā yakūnu al-nāqil ghayra muʻtaqid ṣiḥḥat al-naql ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 5 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālah al-ʻaqīdīyah / ʻAḍud al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ījī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Manual of dialectics.
Also known as: al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-Ḥamdu wa-al-minnah, wa-ʻalá Nabīyika al-ṣalāh wa-al-taḥīyah. Idhā qulta bi-kalām khabarī, in kunta nāqilan fa-yuṭlabu minka al-ṣiḥḥah, aw muddaʻiyan fa-al-dalīl ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq.
Profuse interlinear and marginal notes.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 6 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth / Muḥammad ibn Ashraf al-Samarqandī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Manual of dialectics.
Beginning missing.
Title and author supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Also known as: al-Risālah al-Samarqandīyah.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 7 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah / ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Nasafī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Principles of faith.
Compared with Ahlwardt 1953 (Hitti 1545 seems to be a different work).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla ahl al-ḥaqq: Ḥaqāʼiq al-ashyāʼ thābitah, wa-al-ʻilm bi-hā mutaḥaqqiq, khilāfan lil-Sūfisṭāʼīyah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 8 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / Muḥammad al-Tibrīzī Mullā Ḥanafī. -- [17--?].
