record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Compared with Ahlwardt 5296; this copy has an additional paragraph at end.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Laka al-ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh taʻālá mukhāṭaban tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓa al-maḥmūd ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Extensive interlinear and marginal notations.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 9 of 9 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat fawāʼid. -- 1790 or 1791.
record.note: Includes two larger pieces, viz. Maʻrifat al-nujūm (leaves 8 verso-12) and al-Ḥadīth al-Qudsī (leaves 20-33), containing 30 sermons (mawʻiẓah).
The incipit of Maʻrifat al-nujūm is similar to, but not identical with, the incipit of Abū Maʻshar's work of the same title; see Brockelmann, S I, p. 395; Rivista degli studi orientali, VII, 617.
In the explicit of the "Mawāʻiẓ" it is stated that they have been: "... al-majrūʻah (?) min arbaʻat kutub: al-Tawrāt, wa-al-Injīl, wa-al-Zabūr, wa-al-Fruqān ..."
For the correct spelling of the copyist's name see his seal on leaf 170 recto of the manuscript; the name is evidently African.
Brocklemann (S II, p. 523) lists an al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah (no contents given) by the Sudanese author Ṣāliḥ al-Fulānī.
Fair (East-African?) naskhī, in red and black.
No. 1 of 6 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Kamulat ... bi-yad [al-]ʻabd al-faqīr Malj Lū ibn Qurbān ʻAlī ... fī sanat 1205."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... by the hand of the poor servant Malj Lū ibn Qurbān ʻAlī ... in the year 1205 [of the Hijrah = 1790/1791]."

record.title: 880-02 Unmūdhaj al-labīb fī khaṣāʼiṣ al-Ḥabīb / taṣnīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ibn al-Imām Kamāl al-Dīn al-Asyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī. -- [1790 or 1791].
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 2577; the last chapter in this copy seems to be shortened, and the explicit does not agree with the Berlin manuscript.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī atqana kulla shayʼ bi-ḥikmatihi fa-iḥtabak, wa-baʻatha Ḥabībahu Muḥammadan fa-anāra bi-hi kulla ḥalak ..."
Fair (East-African?) naskhī, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
No. 2 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat fawāʼid. -- [1790 or 1791].
record.note: The Sirr al-rabbānī fī ʻālam al-jismānī (leaf 52 verso) is a different work from the work so titled of ʻAlī Bek al-Iznīqī (Brockelmann, S II, pp. 668, 1034).
Fair (East-African?) naskhī, in red and black.
No. 3 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mujarrabāt / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Snanūsī. -- 1790 or 1791.
record.note: Magical remedies.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh <ibn> Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jūd wa-al-karam al-mufīḍ ʻalá ʻibādihi sawābigh al-niʻam ..."
Fair (East African?) naskhī, in red and black.
The copyist's seal is on leaf 170 recto of the manuscript.
Extensive marginalia.
No. 4 of 6 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tamma Mujarrabāt al-Sanūsī bi-yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr Malj Lū ibn Qurbān ʻAlī ... fī yawm al-Aḥad, fī sanat 1205."

Translation of the colophon: "Mujarrabā al-Sanūsī 'Tested remedies' of al-Sanūsī are completed by the hand of the poor servant Malj Lū ibn Qurbān ʻAlī ... on Sunday, in the year 1205 [of the Hijrah = 1790/1791]."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat fawāʼid. -- [1790 or 1791].
record.note: Includes "al-Wasīlah al-ʻalīyah li-dāʼirat al-Shādhilīyah" by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbbād/ʻAyyād (leaves 101-109 recto).
Fair (East-African?) naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
No. 5 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah / Mahdī ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣanawbarī. -- 1790 or 1791.
record.note: Treatise on medicine.
End missing.
The work is wrongly ascribed to al-Suyūṭī and others.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaraʻa min al-ʻulūm [al-ʻadam] al-mawjūdāt, wa-aẓhara ilá al-wujūd al-kāʼināt ..."
Fair (East African?) naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Considerable marginalia.
No. 6 of 6 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Dawr al-aʻlá / lil-Imām ... Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn ʻArabī. -- [18--?].
record.note: A Sufi prayer.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhuma ṣalli ʻalá al-dhāt al-muṭalsam wa-al-nūr al-muṭamṭam, lāhūt al-jamāl wa-nāsūt al-wiṣāl ..."
Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, on rose colored paper; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in maroon.
No. 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Iʻānat al-rāghibīn fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Afḍal al-Mursalīn / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Mashīsh. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, I, 440.
Incipit: "Ṣalāt al-ghawth al-ṣamadānī Mawlānā ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Mashīsh ... Wa-hiya hādhihi: Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá man minhu inshaqqat al-asrār wa-infalaqat al-anwār ..."
Modern (19th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, on rose colored paper.
No. 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar fī al-furūʻ / Abū al-Ṭayyib. -- 1638.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Bāb fī al-ʻulamāʼ. Qāla Abū al-Ṭayyib, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: al-ʻUlamāʼ sabʻah: Awwaluhā rajul faqīh, wa-al-thānī rāwī al-Ḥadīth, wa-al-thālith mufassir al-Qurʼān ..."
For the supposed author see Brocklemann, S II, p. 428.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi fī al-yawm al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1047, ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Azharī al-Mālikī al-Nashartī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on 29 Shawwāl, of the year 1047 [of the Hijrah = 16 March 1638], by the hand of its copyist the poor Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Azharī al-Mālikī al-Nashartī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Baḥr al-kalām / Abū al-Muʻīn al-Nasafī. -- 1569 or 1570.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Tawakkaltu ʻalá al-Ḥayy alladhī lā yamūtu abadan. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū al-Muʻīn al-Nasafī ... Iʻlamū innī aʻtaqidu maʻrifat Allāh taʻālá wa-al-tawḥīd ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Considerable marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 1 of 5 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Tammat al-awrāq ... ʻalá yad ... Sulaymān ibn Dīndāl al-musammá thāniyan Ibrāhīm ... fī waqt ṣalāt al-ṣubḥ, fī yawm Dū Shanbah, fī shahr Rajab al-murjib, tārīkh sanat 977, fī shahr Ṣūfīyah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The leaflets were completed ... by the hand of ... Sulaymān ibn Dīndāl, who is also called Ibrāhīm ... during the morning prayer, on Monday, in the month of Rajab, the year 977 [of the Hijrah = 1569/1579], in the city of Ṣūfīyah ..."

record.title: 880-01 Waṣīyat al-Nabī li-Abī Hurayrah. -- [1569 or 1570].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Akhbaranā Ḥammād ibn ʻUqbah qāl ... Kunnā maʻa al-Ḥasan ibn Saʻīd al-Baṣrī fa-dakhala ʻalaynā rajul min ahl Khurāsān ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 2 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Nathr al-laʼāliʼ min kalām Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib. -- 1568 or 1569.
record.note: Incipit: "Kitāb Nathr al-laʼāliʼ, min kalām Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib ... murattab ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ. Ḥarf al-alif: Īmān al-marʼ yuʻrafu bi-aymānih ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 3 of 5 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tārīkh sanat 976."
Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 976 [of the Hijrah = 1568/1569]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālat Ibn Kamāl fī bayān al-mashrūʻ wa-ghayr al-mashrūʻ. -- [1568 or 1569].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a later hand in a slip pasted inside the front cover.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam bi-anna al-ʻabd mubtalā [mubtalá] bayna an yuṭīʻa Allāh taʻālá fa-yuthāb, wa-bayna an yaʻṣiyahu fa-yuʻāqab ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 4 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī mabāḥith al-sabb wa-takfīr ahl al-khusrān / Yūsuf ibn Junayd Akhī Chalabī. -- 1568 or 1569.
record.note: Beginning missing; folio 1a begings with: "... wa-hādhā kulluhu ijmāʻ min al-ʻulamāʼ wa-aʼimmat al-fatwá ..."
The text corresponds to that of Arabic MSS 172, leaf 72 recto ff. The missing beginning probably occupied only 1 page.
Title, as above, supplied by a later hand in a slip pasted inside the front cover.
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 5 of 5 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-shufʻah / Walī Qāḍī al-Manṣūrah. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the date of the author see leaf 35 verso of the volume.

Incipit: "Qāla ṣāḥib al-Durar wa-al-ghurar Munlā Khusrū fī Kitāb al-Shufʻah ... Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Aqūlu fī baḥth, fa-inna qawluhu wa-kadhā tathbutu lil-muwakkil wa-tathbutu ayḍan lil-sharīk al-ākhar zāʼid aw sahw min al-kātib ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 1 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jaʻālah lil-ikhwān fī ḥaqq al-muftarī al-bāṭil / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-qāḍī bi-thaghr Dimyāṭ. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit of the Turkish part (folio 1b): "Ḥamd bī ḥadd va s̲anāyi bī ʻadd ..."

Incipit of the Arabic part (folio 6b): "Fa-hādhihi dafʻ li-iʻtirāḍ al-sāʼil, bal radd al-kalām al-maʻhūd al-qāʼil ... fa-sammaytuhā al-Jaʻālah lil-ikhwān fī ḥaqq al-muftarī al-bāṭil ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 2 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-shufʻah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-munfaṣil ʻan qaḍāʼ Bilbays bi-al-Sharqīyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: It is not clear whether ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, kadi in Damietta, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, kadi in Bilbeis, and ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, kadi in Mansura (leaf 48 verso), are different persons or one and the same person.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa sabʻ samāwāt ṭibāqan wa-zayyanahā bi-al-kawākib ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
No. 3 of 3 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻAqīdah al-Sanūsīyah / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAmr ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mallālī al-Tilimsānī. -- [1737].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar [ʻAmr] ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mallānī al-Shamlānī [al-Mallālī al-Tilimsānī] ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutafarrid bi-al-waḥdānīyah fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt wa-al-afʻāl ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 1 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAqīdat al-tawḥīd / Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Abī ʻAlī al-Maghribī al-Fīlānī al-Mālikī. -- [1737].
record.note: Title on leaf 29 recto: Muqaddimat [al-tawḥīd]; the title ʻAqīdat al-tawḥīd is found in the explicit, where "ʻAqīdat" appears to be a correction, presumably from the original "Muqaddimat."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Abī ʻAlī al-Maghribī al-Fīlālī al-Mālikī madhhaban ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ... Iʻlam inna ẓahr al-kufr al-mujmaʻ ʻalayhi fī al-ʻāmmah wa-al-nisāʼ ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 2 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 al-Maqāmāt al-arbaʻūn fī al-taṣawwuf / li-baʻḍ al-mashāʼikh. -- [1737].
record.note: A Sufi tract.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlam, asʻdaka Allāh taʻālá fī al-dārayn, inna al-ṭuruq ilá Allāh taʻālá bi-ʻadad anfās al-khalāʼiq, wa-inna arbāb al-taḥqīq ikhtārū minhā arbaʻat marātib ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 3 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 al-Aḥādīth al-mawḍūʻah / ʻAlī ibn al-Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī. -- 1737.
record.note: Title, as above, appears in explicit (leaf 91 recto); also given (leaf 64 recto) as: Mawḍūʻāt ʻAlī ibn al-Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... ʻAlī ibn al-Sulṭān [Sulṭān] Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā raʼaytu jamāʻah min al-ḥuffāẓ jamaʻū al-Aḥādīth al-mashhūrah ʻalá al-alsinah ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 4 of 15 titles bound together.
Colophon: "ʻAlá yad ʻAlī al-Maghribī, baʻda ṣalāt al-ʻishā, laylat al-Arbiʻā, min shahr Allāh Jumādh [Jumād] al-Ākhir ... sanat 1150."

Translation of the colophon: "By the hand of ʻAlī al-Maghribī, after the evening prayer, on Wednesday night, in the month of Jumād al-Ākhir ... the year 1150 [of the Hijrah = 21 (?) September 1737]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Nāsikh wa-al-mansūkh / Abū al-Qāsim Hibat Allāh ibn Salāmah ibn Naṣr ibn ʻAlī. -- 1737.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 473; the explicit there is on leaf 135 recto of this copy.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Akhbaranā ... al-Shaykh Abū al-Qāsim Hibat Allāh ibn Salāmah ibn Naṣr ibn ʻAlī al-Ḍarīr al-Mufassir ... Qāl: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-dīnih wa-jaʻalanā min ahlih, wa-faḍḍalanā bi-mā ʻallamanā min Tanzīlih ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 5 of 15 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Wa-katabahu ... ʻAlī al-Maghribī, wa-huwa bi-qaryat Qarjah Yaḥwá min qurā [qurá] Dirāsah [?], sanat 1150, wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu ʻashīyata yawm al-Arabaʻā, baʻda al-ẓuhr fī khamsata ʻashar khalat min Jumād al-Ākhir ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... ʻAlī al-Maghribī, from the village of Qarjah Yaḥwá, one of the villages of Dirāsah [?], in the year 1150 [of the Hijrah], completed on the afternoon of Wednesday, 15 nights having passed from Jumād al-Ākhir [10 October 1737] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ḥaqīqat al-Shayṭān wa-wujūdihi wa-waswasatih / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah al-Fanārī. -- [1525].
record.note: The text is presumably identical with, or part of, the author's Risālah fī māhīyat al-shayāṭīn wa-al-jinn, likewise extracted from the Tafsīr al-Fātiḥah.
Title according to the first sentence of the treatise. On the top margin (leaf 137 recto): Tafsīr Fātiḥah li-Mawlānā Fanārī.
Leyden catalog does not give any citations from the work, but states that it is an extract from the Tafsīr al-Fātiḥah, a fact which Brockelmann does not mention.

Incipit: "al-Khāmis. Fī ḥaqīqat al-Shayṭān wa-wujūdihi wa-waswasatih. Ammā ḥaqīqatuhu, fa-ʻinda man lam yaqul bi-al-mujarradāt, hiya ajsām hawāʼīyah, wa-qīla nārīyah, qādirah ʻalá al-tashakkul bi-ashkāl mukhtalifah la-hā ʻuqūl wa-afhām ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 6 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-istithnāʼ / Sayyidī ʻAlīʹzādah. -- [1525].
record.note: The text corresponds to leaves 225 verso-226 verso of Arabic MSS 120.
Incipit: "Wa-mabāḥith al-istithnāʼ ṭawīlah, lā yalīqu dhikruhā fī hādhihi al-awrāq, lākin fīhā, ay, fī mabāḥth al-istithnāʼ masʼalah laṭīfah min al-istithnāʼ al-mukarrar ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 7 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-01 al-Sharḥ lil-Risālah al-waḍʻīyah. -- [1525].
record.note: The ḥamdalah is the same as in Berlin catalog 5311 (7) (variant form of al-Qūshjī's commentary) but the incipit is different.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá nabīyihi. Qawluhu: Qad yūḍaʻu li-shakhṣ bi-ʻaynihi ilkh, kamā idhā taṣawwarat dhāt Zayd wa-wuḍiʻa lafẓ Zayd bi-izāʼihā ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 8 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālah al-waḍʻīyah / ʻAḍud al-Millah wa-al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Ījī. -- [1525].
record.note: Incipit: "Hādhihi risālah afādahā ... ʻAḍud al-Millah wa-al-Dīn ... mushtamilah ʻalá muqaddimah wa-tanbīh wa-khātimah. Ammā al-muqaddimah: al-Lafẓ qad yūḍaʻ li-shakhṣ bi-ʻaynihi ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 9 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Shawākil al-ḥūr fī sharḥ Hayākil al-nūr / lil-fāḍil al-Dawwānī. -- 1525.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man naṣaba rāyāt āyāt qudratihi ʻalá kawāhil hayākil al-mumkināt ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 10 of 15 titles bound together.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah wa-tanmīqihā ... fī baldat Qusṭanṭanīyah ... waqt al-ʻaṣr min awwal al-Jumādhayn, sanat iḥdá wa-thalāthīn wa-tisʻimaiʼah 931. Katabahu Muḥammad ibn Murād ibn ʻAlī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed and ornamented ... in the city of Qusṭanṭanīyah (Constantinople) ... on the afternoon of 1 Jumād al-awwal, the year 931 [of the Hijrah = 6 March 1525]. Copied by Muḥammad ibn Murād ibn ʻAlī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Rasāʼil / lil-Dawwānī. -- [1525].
record.note: Incipit of 1. 'Abḥāth fī al-ʻillah wa-al-maʻlūl': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Maʻāshira al-ʻālimīn. Salāmun ʻalaykum, lā nabtaghī al-jāhilīn. Hādhihi ʻiddat abḥāth mimmā lam yatayassar lil-dhihn al-kalīl kashf al-qināʻ ʻan wujūh tawjīhātihā, wa-lam yaẓfar al-naẓar al-ʻalīl bi-ḥall mughlaqātihā naẓamtuhā fī silk al-taḥrīr ..."
Incipit of 2. 'Risālah fī mawḍūʻ al-kalām': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-aʻẓamuhu. Mawḍūʻ ʻalá al-kalām. In jaʻalnāhu dhāt Allāh, ilkh ..."

Incipit of 3. 'Risālah fī nisbat al-baṣīrah': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna nisbat al-baṣīrah ilá mudrakātihā ka-nisbat al-baṣar ilá al-maḥsūsāt [maḥsūsātihā, ṣaḥḥ], ilkh ..."

Incipit of 4. 'Risālah fī al-tashkhkhuṣ': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ikhtalafa al-ʻulamāʼ fī anna al-tashakhkhuṣ juzʼ min al-shakhṣ, am huwa khārij ʻanhu, ilkh (min Sharḥ al-Mawāqif, li-muʼallif majhūl) ..."

Incipit of 5. 'Risālah ukhrá fī al-tashakhkhuṣ': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qawluhum: Law furiḍa Zayd mathalan mushtarikan lam yakun kullīyan bi-khilāf al-Kāshī, ilkh (min Risālah Juzʼīyah, li-muʼallif majhūl) ..."
Hasty nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia in the beginning.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 11 of 15 titles bound together.
Colophon (folio 20a): "Tammat ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Murād al-Qāḍī ... bi-baldat Qusṭanṭanīyah ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Murād al-Qāḍī ... in the city of Qusṭanṭanīyah [Constantinople] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Masʼalat dukhūl walad al-bint fī al-mawqūf ʻalá awlād al-awlād / Kamāl Pāshā Zādah. -- [1525].
record.note: Title from the preface.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-Walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-masʼalah al-sāfirah fī al-bilād ... wa-hiya masʼalat dukhūl walad al-bint fī̄ al-mawqūf ʻalá awlād al-awlād qad dhukirat fī ḥaḍrat ... Sulṭān Salīm Khān ..."
Hasty nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 12 of 15 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Katabahu Muḥammad ibn Murād ibn ʻAlī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Muḥammad ibn Murād ibn ʻAlī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-qalamīyah / Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Dawwānī. -- [1525].
record.note: Alternate title: Risālat al-yarāʻah.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Nūn wa-al-qalam wa-mā yasṭurūn. Inna hādhihi tadhkirah li-qawm yaqtulūn [yaʻqilūn]. Yā man fāqa fī al-barāʻah saʼaltanī ʻan waṣf al-yarāʻah ..."
Hasty nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 13 of 15 titles bound together.
Colophon: "ʻAlá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Murād bi-baldat Qusṭanṭanīyah ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Murād in the city of Qusṭanṭanīyah [Constantinople] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-ḥawrāʼ / lil-Dawwānī. -- [1525].
record.note: Title supplied by a modern hand in laid-in slip.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-Dhātihi, li-Walīyihi bi-dhātihi. al-Ḍamīr al-awwal rājiʻ ilá al-ḥamd ..."
Hasty nastaʻlīq.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 14 of 15 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawāshī ʻalá al-Kashshāf / Ibn Kamāl Pāshā. -- [1525].
record.note: The authorship is uncertain. The first note is dedicated to Selim I, who ascended the throne in 1512 (cf. Ibn Kamāl Pāshā's other tract in this volume, leaf 281 verso, which is dedicated to the same); hence the author could unlikely be al-Dawwānī (died 1512 or 1513). Ibn Kamāl Pāshā was mufti in Istanbul.
The third note is dedicated to an unnamed sultan, presumably again Selim I.
Incipit of al-Ḥāshiyah (note) 1: "[al-Ḥamdu] lillāh al-Fard al-Ṣamad alladhī rafaʻa al-samāʼ bi-ghayr ʻamad wa-afāḍa al-naʻmāʼ bilā amad ..."
Incipit of al-Ḥāshiyah (note) 2: "Ḥamdan li-Karīm idhā suʼila ajāb ..."
Incipit of al-Ḥāshiyah (note) 3: "Ḥamdan li-Man iftataḥa Kitābahu al-majīd bi-al-tasmiyah wa-al-taḥmīd ..."
Hasty nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in brown.
No. 15 of 15 titles bound together.
Colophon: "Tammat ... Taḥrīr al-faqīr al-shahīr bi-Maḥmūd al-Ṣaghīr."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed ... Copied by the poor known as Maḥmūd al-Ṣaghīr."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī al-hayʼah / Mūsá ibn Muḥammad Qāḍīʹzādah. -- [1929 or 1939].
record.note: The colophon gives the dates as A.H. 1258 (A.D. 1929, A.M. 5700) which is evidently an error; if A.M. 5700 is correct, then the corresponding dates should be A.H. 1358 (A.D. 1939).
The colophon of the prototype, given on leaf 116 recto, is dated A.H. 1066 (A.D. 1655 or 1656), hence it could not have been a lithographed edition but a handwritten copy.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-shmasa ḍiyāʼan wa-al-qamara nūran, wa-basaṭa ʻalá basāʼiṭ al-basīṭ ẓillan wa-ḥarūran ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
With copious diagrams.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Intahaytu min naql hādhā al-kitāb ʻan ṣūrah khaṭṭīyah bi-Maktabat al-Amīr Fārūq Bū Hāj. Wa-al-nuskhah al-madhkūrah maktūbah bi-khaṭṭ Fārisī, lā yumkinu an yuktaba khaṭṭ abdaʻ minhu, ḥaythu ishtabahnā anā wa-jamīʻ ikhwānī bi-anna hādhihi al-nuskhah al-madhkūrah maṭbūʻah ʻalá al-ḥajar, wa-lākin lā yumkinu dhālik, ḥaythu yūjad sharḥ bayna al-suṭūr bi-al-aḥmar wa-al-aswad, ka-khaṭṭ al-nuskhah ṭibqa al-aṣl. Fī tārīkh yawm al-Ithnayn, 9 Shawwāl, sanat 1258 H, al-muwāfiq 20 Nūfambir sanat 1929 M, 10 Hātūr, sanat 1656 Q, 7 Tishrīn Thānī, sanat 2251 Rūmīyah, 8 Kislū 5700 ʻIbrīyah. Ṭāhā Yūsuf Maḥmūd Muḥammad, min nāḥiyat Durunkah, Asyūṭ."

Translation of the colophon: "I finished copying this book from a manuscript housed at the Library of Prince Fārūq Bū Hāj. This copy was written in a Farsī script, the like of which cannot be more admirable, to the extent that I and all my colleagues thought that this copy was a lithograph, but this is impossible, because there are interlinear commentaries in red and black, written exactly with the same script as that of this copy. Dated on Monday, 9 Shawwāl, 1258 of the Hijrah [13 November 1842], corresponding to 20 November, 1929 M, 10 Hātūr 1656 Q [Coptic], 7 November, 2251 of the Greek year, and 8 Kislev, 5700 of the Hebrew year. Ṭāhā Yūsuf Maḥmūd Muḥammad, from the region of Durunkah, Asyūṭ."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻdīl al-ʻulūm / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Part 2 begins on leaf 128 verso; the last chapter heading in part 2 is on leaf 179 verso is: "Taʻdīl mabāḥith mā fī al-ʻālamīn min al-jawāhir."
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala madīnat al-ʻilm ʻalīyan bābuhā, manīʻan jiyābuhā [janābuhā, ṣaḥḥ], mutawassisan bunyānuhā ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Kashshāf / lil-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title, as above, supplied by a modern hand inside the front cover.

Compared with Ahlwardt 796; Ahlwardt suggests that this incipit, as distinct from the incipit of Ahlwardt 794, indicates a later redaction by another person. The marginal annotator of this copy has however supplied in the margin the incipit of Ahlwardt 794. Perhaps two versions were current.
The Bankipore (XVIII, 2, 1356) copy combines both.
Hitti 1271 covers sūrahs 1-3:182 -- perhaps all after 2:23 is, as Hitti suggests, by another author.
The last quotation from the Kashshāf (leaf 169 verso) corresponds to the Lees edition, I, 57, last line.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh Jār Allāh al-ʻAllāmah, aḥsana Allāh taʻālá ikrāmahu fī dār al-maqāmah: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān kalāman muʼallafan minaẓẓaman, waṣafa Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, baʻda al-dalālah ʻalá inḥiṣār jins al-ḥamd fīhi, bi-inzāl al-Qurʼān wa-tanzīlih ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Extensive marginalia.

record.title: 880-03 Min Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Corpus of traditions.
Cf. Krehl edition, III, 13-30.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb Tazwīj al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Khadījah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhā, wa-faḍlahā ..."
Fair modern (19th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Marginalia.
Remaining parts wanting.

record.title: 880-01 Miʻrāj al-Nabī al-mukarram. -- [1900].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qarraba man ikhtāra min ʻibādihi ilá ḥaḍrat widādih, wa-iṣṭafá wa-ijtabá min aḥbābih min ṣaluḥa li-ḥaḍrat iqtirābih ..."
Good modern (ca. 1900) naskhī.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb mukhtaṣar fī dhikr ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah / ʻAlī Chalabī ibn Amr Allāh Qinālīzādah al-Ḥinnāʼī. -- 1555 or 1556.
record.note: Compared with Ahlwardt 10026 and Bankipore catalogue XII, 761 (the 7th ṭabaqah listed by Bankipore begins, without rubric, on leaf 7 recto, bottom).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb mukhtaṣar fī dhikr ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah, dhakartu fīhi al-mashāhīr min al-aʼimmah ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Colophon: "Ḥarrarahu Muḥammad Ḥiṣrī [?] Zajrī [?] Rūmī al-Manāstīrī, sanat 963."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Muḥammad Ḥiṣrī [?] Zajrī [?] Rūmī al-Manāstīrī, in the year 963 [of the Hijrah = 1555/1556]."

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah wa-al-ʻArabīyah. -- 1731.
record.note: For Ibn Muḥammad Ṣālih's work see also British Museum, Turkish Mss., pp. 150-51; and Munich catalog 768, which agrees with the British Museum copy.
The incipit is the same as in Ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ's work, but the latter is divided into 4 rukns, not faṣls, and has an extensive introduction, etc.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah wa-al-ʻArabīyah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa al-insān wa-zayyanahu bi-al-nuṭq wa-al-lisān ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-khāmis ʻashar min shahr Kānūn al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat wāḥid wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah wa-alf, al-muwāfiq li-niṣf Rajab, sanat 1143."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed on 15 January, 1731, corresponding to the middle of Rajab, 1143 [of the Hijrah]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī sulūk khāṣṣat al-sādah / Tāj al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā al-ʻAbshamī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 419.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Iʻlam, waffaqaka Allāh taʻālá, inna muʻtaqad al-Sādāt al-Naqshabandīyah, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá asrārahum, huwa muʻtaqad Ahl al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah ..."
Fair modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Barīyah / Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Also known as: Qaṣīdat al-Burdah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Amin tadhakkuri jīrānin bi-Dhī Salami // mazajta damʻan jará min muqlatin bi-dami ..."
Only leaves 21-23, 26-28 are in manuscript: good modern (19th century) naskhī, fully vocalized. The rest of the text is in lithograph; the date A.H. 1222 (A.D. 1807) appears on leaf 48 verso.
Interlinear notes.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat fawāʼid Fārisīyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Several fair modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq hands, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red.
With: 3 other titles.

1. (1a). Min Durr-i manẓūm az Mawlavī Ghulām Jīlānī Rāmpūrī mutakhalliṣ bih Rifʻat. 2. (13a). "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥaqāʼiq al-ashyāʼ thābitah wa-al-ʻālam ḥādith ..." 3. (17a). Dar Ziyārat-i Madīnah-i Muqaddasah. 4. (22a). Fawāʼid muntakhabah min Nafaḥāt al-uns (lil-Jāmī). 5. (29a). Min Maʻmūlāt awrād Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ḥayy (al-Ḥaqq) Muḥaddith Dihlawī. 6. (53b). Sharḥ dū faqrah avval-i Nikāt-i Muḥaqq Kāmil Mīrzā ʻAbd al-Qādir Bīdil.

record.title: 880-01 al-Silsilah al-dhahabīyah al-Naqshabandīyah. -- [18--?].
record.note: Perhaps a holograph.
Cf. Ahlwardt 2206, which seems to be a similar work.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yā ḥayy yā qayyūm ... Innī asʼaluka bi-maḥbūbīyat ghawth al-ʻibād wa-quṭb dāʼirat al-irshād ... Ḥaḍrat Abī al-Bahāʼ Muḥammad Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻUthmānī al-mushtahir ... bi-Mawlānā al-Shaykh Khālid al-Baghdādī ..."
Hasty modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq, with numerous excisions and corrections.
Islamic binding, in red.
With: 3 other titles.

record.title: Miscellaneous Sufi pieces in prose and verse. -- [before 1965].
record.note: Incipit: "Fī madḥ al-maḥbūb ... Qaṣīdat ʻizz warqāʼīyah fī jawhar rūḥ qudsīyah ..."
Modern (20th century) hasty nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Limp Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Ḥizb al-baḥr / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad Zarrūq. -- 1592.
record.note: Beginning missing.

Points of identification: The identifying sentence of the matn (wa-sakhkhir lanā hādhā al-baḥr kamā sakhkharta al-baḥra li-Mūsá), quoted in Ahlwardt 3868, is found on leaf 2 recto. The khātimah, in three faṣls, mentioned in the British Museum Suppl. 244 (II), begins on leaf 8 verso.
For the author see Brockelmann, II, 253; S II, p. 360.
Beginning missing. Folio 1a begins with "Wa-qad yakūnu al-ḥifẓ min al-ʻiṣmah fī ʻilm Allāh, wa-lākin lā sabīla lanā ilayh ..."
Cursive nastaʻlīq.

Colophon: "Najaza hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak fī waqt maghrib yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, al-thālith ʻashar min shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá <al-Ūlá>, min shuhūr sanat alf, ʻalá yad ... Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Aqshahrī mawlidan wa-al-Qusṭanṭinī tawaṭṭunan ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed commentary was completed on Wednesday evening, 13 Jumādá al-Ulá, of the year 1000 [of the Hijrah = 26 February 1592] by the hand of ... Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Aqshahrī mawlidan wa-al-Qusṭanṭinī tawaṭṭunan ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifāʼ fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá / Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī. -- 1749 or 1750.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfard bi-ismihi al-asmá al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min tarqīm hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá. Tammat al-kitāb ... 1163."
Translation of the colophon: "This noble book was copied by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá. The book is completed ... 1163 [of the Hijrah = 1749/1750."

record.title: 880-02 Tabyīḍ asmāʼ al-Badratayn / Khalīl al-Kuraydī. -- 1780.
record.note: The author's surname is also vocalized as al-Karīdī (cf. Hitti, 1863).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lammā aradtu an uṣaḥḥiḥa asmāʼ al-Badratayn ... qāla liya al-fāḍil ... Shaykhunā al-shahīr bi-Mudurnī ... Ijamʻhum min 'al-Iṣābah fī tamyīz al-Ṣaḥābah' lil-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Ibn Ḥajar ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
With charts.

Colophon: "Qad istarāḥ qadam qalam al-ḥaqīr Khalīl al-Kuraydī al-faqīr min taʻab tabyīḍ al-asmāʼ [asmāʼ] al-Badratayn ... Katabah al-faqīr Maḥmūd al-Waṣfī ... Ḥarrarahu fī al-yawm al-rābiʻ min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, li-sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf."

Translation of the colophon: "The foot of the pen of the wretched poor Khalīl al-Kuraydī has now rested from the toil of correcting the names of the participants in the two battles of Badr ... Written by the poor Maḥmūd al-Waṣfī ... Copied on 4 Muḥarram, the year 1195 [of the Hijrah = 31 December 1780] ..."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān : Sūrahs XIX-CXIV, 1. -- [17--?].
record.note: Cf. Vienna catalog (Flügel), 1579.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Qurʼān. Sūrat Maryam to Sūrat al-Nās.
Islamic binding, in maroon, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Zahr al-kimām fī qiṣṣat al-Sayyid Yūsuf / taʼlīf ... Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Anṣārī al-Awsī. -- 1610.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Iʻlamū, raḥimakum Allāh, inna qiṣaṣ al-anbiyāʼ ... ʻiẓah li-man samiʻahā, wa-tadhkirah li-man jamaʻahā ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

Colophon: "Wa-kutiba bi-rasm ... al-Amīr Ramaḍān Jalabī ibn ... al-Amīr Murād ... Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi fī awākhir shahr Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat tisʻa ʻashrata wa-alf, ʻalá yad ... Yaḥyá sibṭ al-Marṣifī."

Translation of the colophon: "Written for ... al-Amīr Ramaḍān Jalabī ibn ... al-Amīr Murād ... The copy was completed at the end of Jumādá al-Ākhirah, the year 1019 [of the Hijrah = 18 September 1610], by the hand of ... Yaḥyá sibṭ al-Marṣifī."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tawḍīḥ fī sharḥ Muqaddimat Abī al-Layth / Muṣṭafá ibn Zakarīyā ibn Aydughmush al-Qaramānī. -- 1697.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ... Muṣṭafá ibn Zakarīyāʼ ibn Aydughmush al-Qaramānī ... Lammā raʼaytu Mukhtaṣar Muqaddimat al-ṣalāh al-mansūb taʼlīfuhu ilá al-Shaykh ... Naṣr ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Faqīh Abī al-Layth al-Samarqandī ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

Colophon: "Faraghat minhu yad kātibihi ... Mūsá ibn Dāwūd Ḥamá [?] Dá [?] nasaban, wa-al-Ḥanafī madhhaban ... tārīkh sanat thamān [wa] miʼah wa-alf waqaʻa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-mubārak, fī yawm al-Ṣālī ... sanat 1108."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed by the hand of ... Mūsá ibn Dāwūd Ḥamá [?] Dá [?] nasaban, wa-al-Ḥanafī madhhaban ... in 'Yawm al-Ṣālī' [literally 'the blazing day', probably the 8th day] ... of the blessed month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1108 [of the Hijrah = 28 June 1697]."

record.title: 880-02 Nukhbat al-manāqib al-fākhirah fī madḥ al-dhurrīyah al-ṭāhirah / ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ... Muḥammad Darwīsh al-Ḥusaynī al-shahīr bi-Ibn Ḥamzah. -- 1857.
record.note: A holograph.

The author is called Ibn Ḥamzah in the incipit, al-Ḥamzawī in the colophon, and Ḥamzahʹzādah in the commendatory letter (? mostly faded out) by ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥalabī (or al-Chalabī?) on leaf 20 verso.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā afāḍ min al-jūd ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min jamʻ hādhihi al-risālah al-sharīfah ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Ḥusaynī al-shahīr bi-al-Ḥamzāwī ... wa-dhālika fī iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn khalat min Dhā al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1273 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble epistle was completed by the hand of its compiler ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Ḥusaynī al-shahīr bi-al-Ḥamzāwī ... on 21 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, the year 1273 [of the Hijrah = 13 July 1857] ..."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Risālah al-Ḥusaynīyah. -- 1776 or 1777.
record.note: Possibly identical with al-Dārandī's or al-Nūrī's or the anonym (Brockelmann, b, d and e), not al-Qayṣarīyawī's (Ahlwardt 5335; Hitti 916) or al-Marʻashī's (Hitti 915) commentary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu li-man qaddara al-waẓāʼif ʻalá aḥsan al-niẓām ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Sawwadahu Ḥusayn al-Khulūṣī sanat tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, sanat 1190."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Ḥusayn al-Khulūṣi in the year 1190 [of the Hijrah = 1776/1777]."

record.title: 880-03 Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm / taʼlīf al-Shaykhayn ... Jalālay al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī wa-Abī al-Faḍl ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan la-hu, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold on leaf 1 recto and verso.
Laid-in leaf.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb al-lughah. -- [15--?].
record.note: Arabic-Turkish dictionary.
The Berlin copy has no title; and is dated 1528.
The watermark (anchor within circle under star) seems to be Briquet 490, recorded in 1511-1533.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih ʻalá kull niʻam masbūghah li-ʻibādihi, akramuhā al-ʻaql wa-fahm kitābihi al-munzal ilá Rasūlihi ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
The Turkish equivalents are written below the lines, in nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Tarjumān al-Ṣiḥāḥ. -- [before 1564].
record.note: A note on leaf 1 recto identifies this work with al-Rāzī's al-Mukhtār, and is dated A.H. 972 (A.D. 1564 or 1565).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Furqān li-yubayyina al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-īmān bi-lisān ʻArabī mubīn ʻalá Muḥammad imām al-muttaqīn ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, silk covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1813.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in brown, elaborately gilt, in Oriental slip-case. In brown morocco case.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitāb hādhā al-Muṣḥaf al-Sharīf ... fī waqt min al-awqāt al-sharīfah li-sanat thamān wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [lil-Hijrah = 1813] ... Istansakhtu hādhā al-Muṣḥaf lil-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī al-qāḍī sābiqan bi-Filbah, al-muftī ḥālan bi-Ṣūfīyah. Wa-anā al-faqīr ... al-Shaykh Sayyid ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Ṣāliḥ bi-ṭarīq al-Rifāʻī al-Ṣūfawī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This Noble Muṣḥaf was completed ... on one of the noble occasions, in the year 1228 [of the Hijrah = 1813] ... I copied this Muṣḥaf for al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī, the former qāḍi (judge) in Filbah, and the current muftī in Ṣūfīyah. I, the poor ... al-Shaykh Sayyid ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Ṣāliḥ of the Rifāʻīyah Sufī order ..."

record.title: 880-02 Rujūʻ al-shaykh ilá ṣibāh fī al-qūwah ʻalá al-bāh / Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Tīfāshī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Tract on erotics.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-ashyāʼ bi-qudratih, wa-abqāhā [wa-atqanahā, ṣaḥḥ] bi-luṭf ṣanʻatih, wa-dabbarahā bi-ḥikmatih ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Majmūʻah fiqhīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sulaymān al-shahīr bi-Khiṣālī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-muʻīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad jamaʻa ... al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sulaymān al-shahīr bi-Khiṣālī ... hādhihi al-majmūʻah min al-kutub al-maqbūlah ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: [al-Qurʼān]. -- [7--?].
record.note: Kufic script. Black letters pointed in red.
Cut off at one side.
Vellum.

record.title: [Map of the world] / [Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Qazwīnī]. -- [15--?].
record.note: Tempera and ink.
Removed from a bound volume.

record.title: [Dhikr mulūk al-Furs wa-al-ʻArab qabla al-Islām]. -- [15--?].
record.note: The manuscript was probably copied not long after the date of composition of the final treatise, A.H. 982 (A.D. 1574 or 75).
Fair naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 1 verso. Leaves 1-2 with gold rectangular borders.
A note pasted in the front cover lists the contents of the volume in French.
Islamic binding, in contemporary brown calf.
Bookplate of Le Ch. Ferrão de Castelbranco.
Bookplate of Thomas E. Marston.
Unidentified bookstamp in Turkish on title page.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: [Kharīdat al-ʻajāʾib wa-farīdat al-gharāʾib] / [ʻUmar ibn al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Wardī]. -- [15--?].
record.note: Title from: Brockelmann, II, 131. In manuscript on title page: ʻAjāʾib-i makhlūqāt.
Fair naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 10 verso. Leaves 10-13 with gold rectangular borders. Rubricated.
Illustrated with a map of the world related to the group known as the "Seven Seas" maps, and a chart giving the qiblah to Mecca (leaf 12 verso).
Islamic binding, in contemporary brown calf.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: Tārīkh-i binā-yi Āyā Ṣūfiyah. -- [15--?].
record.note: The manuscript was probably copied not long after the date of composition of the treatise, A.H. 982 (A.D. 1574 or 75).
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 229 verso; leaves 229-230 with gold rectangular borders.
Islamic binding, in contemporary brown calf.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Milal wa-al-niḥal : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥazm.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1298 (A.D. 1881).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Imām Abū Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥazm, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh kathīran, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ʻabdihi wa-Rasūlih, khātim anbiyāʼihi, bukratan wa-aṣīlan, wa-sallama taslīman ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna kathīran min al-nās katabū fī iftirāq al-nās fī diyānātihim wa-maqālātihim kutuban kathīratan jiddan, fa-baʻḍun aṭāla wa-ashab wa-akthara wa-ahjar, wa-istaʻmala al-aghālīṭ wa-al-shaghab, fa-kāna dhālika shāghilan ʻan al-fahm, qāṭiʻan dūna al-ʻilm ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black; with ʻunwāns in gilt and colors at the beginning of each volume.
Binding: In red leather binding, Type II (with flaps); cover and flaps embossed with central medallion and gold decoration ; in slipcases.

Colophon (volume 3): "Tamma al-sifr al-thālith in shāʼa Allāh bi-tamām jamīʻ al-dīwān min al-Fiṣal fī al-milal wa-al-ārāʼ wa-al-niḥal, bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-shukrihi ʻalá ḥusn taʼyidihi wa-ʻawnih. Wāfaqa al-farāgh minhu fī thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn khalat min shahr Shawwāl, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn thamāniyah wa-tisʻīn baʻda al-alf [23 September 1881] min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, Muḥammad al-Qammāsh Jād al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nasākhat hādhā al-dīwān. Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." To the left of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlih." Volume 1 was copied on the fifteenth of Shaʻbān, and volume 2 on the the fifth of Dhū al-Qaʻdah.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Minhāj al-Sunnah al-Nabawīyah fī naqḍ kalām al-Shīʻah wa-al-Qadarīyah. Al-Juzʼ al-thānī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Taymīyah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Faṣl. Qāla al-Rāfiḍī: Wa-dhahaba jamīʻ man ʻadda al-Imāmīyah wa-al-Ismāʻīlīah ilá anna al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-aʼimmah ghayr maʻṣūmīn ..."
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: In marbled paper covered cardboard with brown leather spine, Type II (with flap); in deteriorated slipcase.
Other volume(s) wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Awḍaḥ al-ishārāt fī man tawallá Miṣr al-Qāhirah min al-wuzarāʼ wa-al-bāshāt : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Aḥmad Shalabī ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ḥanafī al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1210 (A.D. 1795).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālhi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh bāriʼ al-nasam wa-mukhrij al-ʻālam min al-ʻadam, wa-fātiḥ bi-faḍlihi ʻalá man yashāʼu abwāba mā inghalaqa min kull sīratin wa-inbaham, wa-sayuʻīdu al-khalāʼiqa bi-qudratihi baʻda al-fanāʼ, fa-subḥānuhu min ʻadlin ḥakam, ḥamdan yuwāfī kulla al-niʻam, wa-shukran la-hu ʻalá mazīd al-faḍl wa-al-karam ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muftaqir li-luṭf Rabbihi al-mubdī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī Afandī: Hādhā kitābun qad saʼalanī fīhi baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb, fīman tawallá Miṣra al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah min al-wuzarāʼ wa-al-bāshāt dhawī al-rutab al-ʻalīyah, sammaytuhu bi-Awḍaḥ al-ishārāt fīman waliya Miṣr al-Qāhirah min al-wuzarāʼ wa-al-bāshāt, wa-laqqabtuhu bi-al-Tārīkh al-ʻaynī li-Ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-bāb, rājiyan min Allāh al-thawāb ..."
The word "tawallá" in the title (leaf 1 recto) is given as "wallá (waliya)" in the preface (leaf 1 verso). Alternate title: al-Taʼrīkh al-ʻaynī.
According to C. Landberg, this work is unknown both in Europe and in the East.
Script: Coarse Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Binding: Type II (with flap), cover embossed with central medallion, brown leather on spine. Deteriorated cover.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir mā katabahu muʼallifuhu al-faqīr li-raḥmat Mawlāhu al-laṭīf al-khabīr, Sayyidī Aḥmad Jalabī ibn al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī, wa-qad adrakahu kaʼs al-manūn, wa-innā lillāh wa-innā ilayhi rājiʻūn, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-qad katabahu al-ān al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-dhalīl al-ḥaqīr, al-Kātib Muṣṭafá Khūjah ibn Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh Qarajī al-nasab, Ṭarābulusī al-dār, Ḥanafī al-madhhab, Ashʻarī al-ṭarīq, li-nafsihi wa-liman yashāʼu Allāh min baʻdihi, ṭāliban lil-ajr wa-jazīl al-dhukhr, fī awākhir thānī al-Rabīʻayn, min sanat 1210 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [12 November 1795]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Wujūh wa-al-naẓāʼir : manuscript / taʼlīf al-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Dāmaghānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1273 (A.D. 1857).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Muḥammadin wa-ālihi. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Dāmighānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Innī taʼammaltu wujūh Kitāb al-Qurʼān li-Muqātil ibn Sulaymān wa-ghayrihi fa-wajadtuhum aghfalū aḥrufan min al-Qurʼān lahā wujūhun kathīrah ʻamadtu ilá ʻamal kitāb mushtamil ʻalá mā ṣanaʻūhu wa-mā tarakū minhu wa-jaʻaltuhu mubawwaban ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam li-yashula ʻalá al-nāẓir fīhi muṭālaʻatuhu, wa-ʻalá al-mutaʻallim ḥifẓuhu, wa-ʻalá Allāh al-ittikāl fī itmāmihi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl wa-niʻma al-naṣīr. Bāb al-Alif ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather binding, Type II (with flap); in slipcase; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and geometric design.

Colophon: "Intahá ākhir kitāb al-Wujūh wa-al-naẓāʼir ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl lil-Dāmighānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb thamāniyat ʻashar Shawwāl alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat thalāthah wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [11 June 1857]. M. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Rabīʻ al-abrār. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī istaḥmada ʻibāduhu bi-mūjibāt al-maḥāmid mimmā asbagha ʻalayhim min niʻamihi al-bawādī wa-al-ʻawāʼid, ḥamdan malaʼa dhāt al-rajʻ wa-ṭilāʻ dhāt al-ṣadʻ, ilá an yablugha mabāligh riḍāh, wa-yaqḍī mūjib ḥaqqihi wa-muqtaḍāh. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-mursal raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn ... Wa-hādhā kitābun qaṣadtu bi-hi ijmām khawāṭir al-nāẓrīn fī al-kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl, wa-tarwīḥ qulūbihim al-mutʻabah bi-ijālat al-fikr fī istikhrāj wa-dāiʼʻ ʻilmihi wa-khabāyāh ..."
Binding: In red leather binding, Type II (with flaps); cover and flaps embossed with central medallion.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon (volume 1): "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Aḥad al-ḥādī ʻashar min shahr Shaʻbān, min sant thalāth wa-sittīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [13 June 1362] aḥsana Allāh khātimatahā fī khayr wa-ʻāfiyah, ʻalá yad afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmatihi, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Aʻzāzī, sāmaḥahu Allāh bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAzīz al-Ḥakīm."

Colophon (volume 2): "Intahá al-mujallad al-thānī wa-huwa ākhir al-rābiʻ min al-aṣl. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min naskhihi ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Khalīl ibn Muḥammad al-Aʻzāzī, sāmaḥahu Allāh bi-mannihi wa-karamih fī ḥādī ʻashar shahr Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat arbaʻ wa-sittīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [6 March 1363]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 Khabāyā al-zawāyā fī mā fī al-rijāl min al-baqāyā : manuscript / al-Shihāb al-Khafājī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1274 (A.D. 1857 or 1858).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan laka Allāhumma yuṭawwiqu jīda al-balāghah naẓīmu ʻuqūdihi, wa-yansuju banān al-banān [al-bayān] ʻalá minwāl al-barāʻah raqīq burūdih, wa-shukran tadāfaqat mawāriduhu wa-maṣādiruhu, wa-ghariqat fī sawāḥilihi min kull wārid fikar khawāṭirihi, ʻalá niʻamika allatī lā tafná min maʻdin al-wujūd jawāhiruhā, wa-lā tadhwī fī ḥadāʼiq al-jūd azāhiruhā ..."
Title, as above, appears on the upper edge of the slipcase.
Binding: In red leather binding, Type II (with flap); in slipcase.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Bi-qalam al-faqīr Maḥmūd al-Nābulusī sanat 1274 [1857 or 1858]."

record.title: Sharḥ Ḥikmat al-ishrāq / lil-imām ... Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad al-Shahrazūrī. -- 1879.
record.note: Good naskhī, in red, blue, and black.
Sporadic marginalia.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap; in slip-case.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṭabaqāt. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Abī Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Subkī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ... Shaykh al-Islām Tāj al-Dīn ... Abū Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ... al-Subkī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh, naḥmaduhu wa-nastaʻīnuhu wa-nastaghfiruhu wa-nastahdīhi wa-nuʼminu bi-hi wa-natawakkulu ʻalayhi wa-nasʼaluhu al-khayr kullah, wa-naʻūdhu billāh min shurūr anfusinā wa-min sayyiʼāt aʻmālinā. Man yahdihi Allāh fa-lā muḍilla la-hu wa-man yuḍlil fa-lā hādiya la-hu ..."
Script: Large calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; title in gold and colors.
Binding: In brown leather doublure, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Other volume(s) wanting.
Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal min al-ṭabaqāt bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Yatlūhu al-juzʼ al-thānī. Awwaluhu: Wa-min al-masāʼil ʻan Abī Thawr wa-al-fawāʼid."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf ahl al-ṣidq wa-al-wafāʼ bi-sharḥ Intiṣār azhār al-ṣafāʼ fī ikhtiṣār Kitāb al-Shifāʼ : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Nāṣir al-Salāwī al-Shādhilī al-Mālikī al-Ṣāwī.
record.note: Supposedly a holograph, written in A.H. 1257-1258 (A.D. 1842).
Leaves 211-212 are blank.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma idh baʻthta fīnā Nabīyaka al-Karīm maṣḥūban bi-al-nūr al-mubīn, wa-jaʻalta kullan minhumā shifāʼan limā fī al-ṣudūr wa-hudan wa-raḥmatan lil-muʼminīn, wa-nashkuruka idh azalta ẓulumāt al-jahl wa-al-ḍalāl, wa-ayyadta dīnaka wa-Rasūlaka, fa-shafayta bihimā al-wabāʼ wa-al-wabāl, fa-man arāda an yuṭfiʼa nūr Allāh akhzāhu wa-adhāqahu alīm al-nikāl ..."
The title page, added in another hand, adds that the author was qāḍī at Khartum, and that he died in A.H. 1265 (A.D. 1849).

Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, who seems not to know of this work, lists (S II, p. 743) an Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣāwī al-Shādhilī al-Khalwatī al-Mālikī, who died in A.H. 1241 (A.D. 1825).
Script: Hasty coarse hand.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); in slipcase; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna khitāmuhu fī al-yawm al-rābiʻ min shahr Rajab al-aṣamm, min shuhūr sanat thamān wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [11 August 1842], wa-ibtidāʼ al-shurūʻ fīhi wa-fī ikhtiṣār al-matn fī awākhir shahr al-Ḥijjah, khitām sanat sabʻ wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [31 January 1843] min Hijrat man la-hu mazīd al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, wa-kull man dakhala ḥimāhu wa-tasharraf, mā dāma jalāl Allāh wa-luṭfuhu fī kull jihatin wa-ṭaraf. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān Abī Nuwās : manuscript / Abū Nuwās.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1292 (A.D. 1875).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Katab Ḥamzah ibn al-Ḥasan al-Iṣbahānī ilá baʻḍ ruʼasāʼ baladih: Saʼalta aṭāla Allāh baqāʼka, wa-aʻlá qadraka, wa-ballaghaka aqṣá amalika, wa-zādaka min afḍal mā khawwalaka, wa-aḥsan mā manaḥaka, wa-lā aʻdamaka jamīl mā ʻawwadaka, an aṣrifa ʻināyatī ilá ʻamal majmūʻ min shiʻr Abī Nuwās yashtamilu ʻalá kull ashʻārih wa-jull akhbārih, wa-qad asʻaftuka, ayyadaka Allāh, bi-ṭilbatika, wa-ajabtuka ilá multamasika, fa-jamaʻtu laka dīwān shiʻrihi fī hādhā al-kitāb mushtamilan ʻalá alf wa-khamsimiʼah wa-kasr min qaṣāʼidihi wa-arājīzihi wa-muqaṭṭaʻātihi ..."
Binding: Modern library binding.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Sparse marginalia.

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak khalat min shahr Shawwāl sanat 1292 [2 November 1875], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Khalīl al-Jūbakshī. Laqad ṭālaʻtu hādhā al-dīwan wa-aṣlaḥtu mā fīhi min khaṭaʼ wa-nisyān ʻalá nuskhatihi al-aṣlīyah allatī hiya bi-al-ṣawāb ḥarīyah, wa-ḍabaṭtu mā yalzamu la-hu al-ḍabṭ, wa-bayyantu faqarātihi bi-waḍʻ al-nuqaṭ, fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamdi Allāh ʻalá aḥsan minwāl, mutaḥalliyan bi-ḥulal al-kamāl. Katabahu rājī al-imtinān ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Sulaymān al-shahīr bi-al-Sibāʻī, aḥsan Allāh al-masāʻī."

record.title: 880-02 ʻAyn al-nabʻ fī mukhtaṣar Ṭard al-sabʻ : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻ al-samāwāt al-sabʻ wa-zayyanahā bi-al-kawākib al-nayyirāt, wa-basaṭ al-arḍ wa-fajjara minhā ʻayn al-nabʻ, wa-akhraja minhā al-nabāt, wa-khalaqa al-insān wa-rakkabahu min sabʻ, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-ḥayawānāt ..."
For al-Ṣafadī's work see Brockelmann, S II, p. 29.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, with ʻunwān in gilt and colors at the beginning.
Binding: In red leather, with impressed gilt medallion, Type II (with flap); in slipcase.

Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yad ... Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Nabī baladan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Ashʻarī muʻtaqadan ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi ṣabīḥata yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak 28 Rabīʻ al-Thānī fī ʻām 1300 [8 Marh 1883] ..."
Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).

record.title: Daraj al-faḍāʾil wa-daraj al-wasāʾil / taʾlīf ... Quṭb al-Dīn Abū [sic] Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Naṣr ibn Sabʻīn. -- 1382.
record.note: Presumably not the same as the author's Kitāb al-daraj (Brockelmann, I, 466).
Brockelmann gives the author's honorary title as Muḥyī al-Dīn (S I, p. 844); the manuscript gives it as Quṭb al-Dīn.
Cairo catalog, VII, 682 does not give the incipit for the Kitāb al-daraj. Nor in Ḥājjī Khalīfah.
The manuscript vocalized "darj" for "daraj" in the beginning of the work, but has "daraj" on leaf 131 recto.
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, generously vocalized.
Title page in gold and colors.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Yanābīʻ fī maʻrifat al-uṣūl wa-al-tafārīʻ : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ramaḍān al-Shiblī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awḍaḥa al-sabīl lil-sālikīn, wa-nawwara bi-nūrihi qulūb al-shākirīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭāhirīn, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn ..."
The author's name is given in the incipit as Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ramaḍān.
For al-Qudūrī's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 175; S I, pp. 295-96.
Script: Coarse Maghribī hand, in red and black. Leaf 1 supplied by a later hand.
The ink used was highly corrosive, with resulting heavy damage to the paper, making the text illegible in part.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Copied in A.H. 999 (A.D. 1591).

Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb bi-qudrat Allāh al-muqtadir al-tawwāb ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAlī al-Marʻaqāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man tasabbaba fī naskhihi wa-nafʻihi bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī ākhir yawm min Shaʻbān ʻām tisʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [22 June 1591]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Iklīl fī istinbāṭ al-Tanzīl : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1131 (A.D. 1719).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ʻalá ʻabdihi al-Kitāba tibyānan li-kull shayʼ, wa-jaʻalahu shifāʼn li-kull ghay, wa-hudan li-kull ʻay, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi al-mabʻūth min ashraf qabīlah wa-akram ḥayy, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi mā lajā ẓāmī li-rayy, wa-awá ḍāḥin ilá fayy. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad qāla Allāh taʻālá: Wa-anzalnā ilayka al-Kitāb tibyānan li-kulli shayʼ. Wa-qāla: Mā farraṭnā fī al-Kitābi min shayʼin ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Leaf 1 damaged. Leaves 3-5 supplied by another hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min dhālika yawm al-Khamīs, sābiʻ wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat aḥad wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah baʻda al-alf [19 March 1719], ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá ʻafw al-Malik al-Jawwād, faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-ṣafūḥ ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Santamīhī Abū al-Futūḥ, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥujjah fī sariqāt Ibn Ḥijjah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn [sic] ibn ʻAlī al-Nawājī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, al-rājī minhu ghufrāna dhanbihi, Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī al-Nawājī al-Shāfiʻī, ballaghahu Allāh taʻālá masʼūlahu, wa-nawwalahu fī al-dārayn maʼmūlahu, wa-kātibahu, wa-al-nāẓira fīhi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī amaranā an nuʼaddiya al-amānāti ilá ahlihā, wa-idhā ḥakkamanā bayna al-nās an naḥkuma bi-al-ʻadl, wa-naḍaʻa al-ashyāʼ fī maḥāllihā ..."
Copied from a copy copied in A.H. 1190 (A.D. 1776).
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark red leather on spine, Type III (without flap).
On leaf 147 verso: "Fini selon les autres copies que j'ai collationnées. L[and]b[er]g."

Colophon (floko 142a): "Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr kifāyah, wa-li-naḥīs ʻinān al-qalam, wa-nastaghfiru Allāh min ṣarf al-nafs fī mithl hādhā al-gharaḍ al-danī wa-al-qadr al-khasīs, wa-Allāh yuqīlu ʻatharātinā yawm al-ḥisāb, wa-yatajāwazu ʻammā saṭṭarahu al-qalam fī Umm al-Kitāb. Wa-qad tamma taswīduhu fī al-yawm al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1190 [7 December 1776], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muṣṭafá Naṣr, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥujjah fī sariqāt Ibn Ḥijjah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn [sic] ibn ʻAlī al-Nawājī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883) from a copy made in A.H. 1190 (A.D. 1776).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, al-rājī minhu ghufrān dhanbihi, Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī al-Nawājī al-Shāfiʻī, ballaghahu Allāh masʼūlahu, wa-nawwalahu fī al-dārayn maʼmūlahu, wa-kātibahu wa-al-nāẓira fīhi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī amaranā an nuʼaddiya al-amānāti ilá ahlihā, wa-idhā ḥakamnā bayna al-nās an naḥkuma bi-al-ʻadl, wa-naḍaʻa al-ashyāʼ fī maḥallihā ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

First colophon (folio 112b): "Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr kifāyah wa-li-naḥīs ʻinān al-qalam. Wa-nastaghfiru Allāh min ṣarf al-nafs fī mithl hādhā al-gharaḍ al-danī wa-al-qadr al-khasīs. Wa-Allāh yuqīlu ʻatharātinā yawma al-ḥisāb, wa-yatajāwazu ʻammā saṭṭara al-qalam fī hādhā al-kitāb. Wa-qad tamma taswīduhu fī al-yawm al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1190 [7 December 1776] ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muṣṭafá Naṣr, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi. Āmīn."

Second colophon (folio 117b): "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-qūwatih, ʻalá yad kātibihi, al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, Muḥammad Jād al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī, khalat 22 ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn Jumād al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-thalāthmiʼah [31 March 1883]. Allāhumma ighfir Yā Rabb li-nāsikhihi, wa-qārīhi, wa-li-man ṣaḥḥaḥahu, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nisākhat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb."

record.title: 880-02 Marātiʻ al-ghizlān fī waṣf al-ḥisān min al-ghilmān : manuscript / Shams al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Nawājī.
record.note: An owner's note on leaf 1 recto is dated A.H. 1170 (A.D. 1756).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻda ḥamdi Allāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān fī aḥsan taqwīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-khalq al-ḥasan wa-al-manʻūt bi-al-khuluq al-ʻaẓīm, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ajmaʻa la-hu nubdhatan fī al-ḥisān min al-ghilmān, tazhū jawāhir naẓmihā al-farīdah ʻalá durar al-nuḥūr, wa-tuzrī ʻaqāʼil maʻānīhā al-badīʻah bi-rabbāt al-khudūr, fa-imtathaltu amrah al-ʻālī ..."
Script: Fairly good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.
Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi ḥusn al-maʼāb. Tamm." To the right of the colophon: A reader's note: "Ṭālaʻahu jamīʻahu al-faqīr Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah ʻufiya ʻanhu."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 617 (A.D. 1220).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-Imām al-awḥad Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī, adāma Allāh saʻādatahu: Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh alladhī ʻamma ʻibādahu bi-waẓāʼif al-ʻawārif, wa-khaṣṣa man shāʼa minhum bi-laṭāʼif al-maʻārif, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-ʻāqib, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-manāqib, fa-innī raʼaytu kathīran mimman tasannamū asnimat al-rutab ..."
Script: Large calligraphic naskhī, in black only, generously vocalized.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mawsūm bi-Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ajall Abī Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻafā ʻanhu wa-ghafara la-hu, bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-mannihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi wa-ʻawnihi, wa-dhālika fī Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat sabʻ ʻashrah wa-sittimiʼah [August/September 1220], wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh kathīran, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-azwājihi wa-al-salām. Katabahu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Naṣr ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-ʻafā ʻanhu."
At the end of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balaghat al-muqābalah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."

To the left of the colophon: A reader's statement, dated Jumādá al-Ūlá of the year 822 of the Hijrah (June/July 1419): "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Anhāhu muṭālaʻatan al-ʻabd al-faqīr lillāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan ibn Maḥmūd Shā (?) al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, fī shahr Jmādá al-Ūlá sanat ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn wa-thamānimiʼah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Qānūn al-wazīr wa-siyāsat al-mulk : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb al-Māwardī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1289 (A.D. 1872).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Qāḍī al-Imām, aqḍá al-quḍāh Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb al-Māwardī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā hadá wa-arshad (wa-la-hu al-shukr ʻalá mā waffaqa wa-saddad, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá rusulihi al-ṭāhirīn, wa-awliyāʼihi al-bararah) al-muntakhabīn, wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad iltazama al-ṭāʻah man daʻā ilayhā, wa-faʻala al-khayr man arshada ilayhi ..."
Alternate title: Qawānīn al-wuzarāʼ.
Script: Hurried naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Sporadic marginalia.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi, yawm al-Ithnayn, thamāniyah maḍat min Jumād Awwal, sanat 1289, tisʻah wa-thamānīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [14 July 1872] min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-adʻū Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, an yaghfira lī wa-lakum, wa-li-ummat Muḥammad ajmaʻīn, bi-ḥurmat Sayyid al-Rusul, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-bi-ḥurmat al-Ṣaḥābah, wa-bi-ḥurmat awliyāʼihi al-ṣāliḥīn ajmaʻīn."

record.title: 880-02 Taḥrīr al-taḥbīr fī al-badīʻ : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn Ẓāfir ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Iṣbaʻ.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi, al-mustaghfir min dhanbihi, ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn Ẓāfir ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Iṣbaʻ, ʻafá Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan yastaʻdhibu al-ḥāmid masāghah, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man kānat aʻẓam āyātihi al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, mā zāna ḥulá al-kalām man ṣīgha la-hu wa-man ṣāghahu. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu al-alqāb maḥāsin al-kalām allatī nuʻitat bi-al-badīʻ ..."
Script: Small naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tasṭīrihi wa-kitābatihi ḍuḥá yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, ghurrata shahr Jumād al-Ākhir, sanat 1297 [11 May 1880], uḥsina khitāmuhā, ʻalá yad kātibihi, man bi-faḍl Rabbihi rāḍī, al-faqīr Ḥusayn Ḥasan al-Qāḍī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Iḥkām al-Asās fī al-lughah : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1192 (A.D. 1778).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī asbagha ʻalá hādhihi al-ummah al-minnah bi-maʻrifat al-lughah allatī hiya al-asās li-fahm al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá mālik azimmat al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah wa-al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān, al-mustall min ṣamīm khulāṣat ʻAdnān, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna kitāb Asās al-balāghah, li-imām funūn al-adab wa-al-barāʻah, shaykh mashāyikh ahl al-taḥqīq, al-ʻAllāmah al-Zamakhsharī, kitābun yudhishu al-albāba ḥusnan, wa-yudhhilu al-ʻuqūl lafẓan wa-maʻnan ..."
For author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 305; S II, p. 417.
For al-Zamakhsharī's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 292; S I, p. 511.
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb Iḥkām al-asās, bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, fī ghurrat shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat alf wa-miʼah ithnayn wa-tisʻīn Hilālīyah [1 March 1778] aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā ilá khayr. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Allāhumma irḥam al-muʼallif wa-al-kātib wa-al-mālik wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī tarājim al-Sādah al-Ṣūfīyah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1082 (A.D. 1672).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī saqá awliyāʼahu wa-aʻāẓima ʻibādihi min kaʼs widādih mā adhhalahum ʻan al-suhād wa-al-karā, wa-shaghalahum bi-hi ʻammā siwāhu, fa-hāmū limā istahāmū, wa-mā kānat al-aghyār ʻindahum illā ḥadīthan yuftará, wa-anālahum min ʻawāṭifihi, wa-manaḥahum min mawāhibihi, mā ghayyabahum ʻan al-wará, wa-tawaʻʻada man nāwaʼahum, wa-adhina man ʻādāhum bi-ḥarbin min Allāh wa-Rasūlih, fa-yā la-hu min waʻīd, wa-mā ashaddahu li-man ʻaqil wa-dará ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaves 221-27 supplied by a later hand.
Sporadic marginalia.
Binding: Sheets loose, in red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Wa-kutiba bi-rasm afqar al-ʻibād, al-muftaqir li-maghfirat al-Malik al-Jawwād, rājiyan min Allāh al-khalāṣ Yawm al-Tanād, innahu min faḍlihi wa-karamihi lā yukhlifu al-mīʻād, ʻAlī ibn Ḥamad ibn Ḥasan ibn Ḥamad ibn ʻUmar, raḥima Allāh salafahu, wa-abqá khalafahu, innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr, wa-bil-ijābah jadīr. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ al-mubārak, thālith ʻashar shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam qadruhu, sanat ithnayn wa-thamānīn wa-alf [13 January 1672], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr Muḥammad Nūr al-Dīn, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man naẓara fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-khayr. Tamma wa-kamula." To the left of the colophoh: An owner's statement: "Bi-ḥamd Allāh. Mimmā manna Allāh bi-hi ʻalá ʻabdihi Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Saqqāf, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhum. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-albāb al-jāmiʻah li-funūn al-ādāb : manuscript / taʼlīf ʻIzz al-Dīn [sic] ibn al-Kamīlī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1270 (A.D. 1853).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man zayyana maḥāfil al-khulafāʼ bi-maḥāsin al-udabāʼ, wa-anhaḍa himamahum li-iktisāb al-maʻālī fa-iktasabū min ḥulalihā dībajan mudhahhaban, wa-aḥyá bihim rubūʻ al-adab wa-marāsimahu, wa-ashād bihim fī kull waqt ʻumudahu wa-maʻālimahu, wa-ikhtaṣṣa bi-aʻlá al-mafākhir wa-asná al-maʼāthir Ḥaḍrata Mawlānā al-Imām, al-ʻAlawī al-humām, tāj al-mafraq, wa-mafkhar al-Maghrib ʻalá al-Mashriq, al-Malik al-jalīl, Abī al-Fidā, Mawlānā Ismāʻīl ..."
The title, as above, appears in the incipit (leaf 3 recto); the title given in the title page, in a later hand, has "al-jāmiʻ" (so does Brockelmann) for "al-jāmiʻah."
The name ʻIzz al-Dīn appears on the title page in a later hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black; leaves 31-50 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi fī laylat al-Arbiʻāʼ al-mubārak, sabʻat ayyām khalat min Ṣafar alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1270, sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [9 November 1853] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah, ʻalá yad afqar al-wará, wa-aḥwajihim ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī, al-rājī ḥusn al-masāʻī, Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Sibāʻī, wa-ffaqahu Allāh li-ṭāʻatihi wa-riḍāh, bi-ḥurmat al-Nabī wa-man wālāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Balagha muqābalatan, min awwalihi ilá ākhirihi, maʻa ghāyat al-ḍabṭ wa-al-taḥrīr, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Ḥusayn Abū al-ʻUlā, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-man aʻānahu ʻalá dhālik, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min muqābalatihi fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, 6 shahr Rabīʻ Awwal, sanat 1270 [7 December 1853]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Waʼwāʼ al-Dimashqī al-Ghassānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1298 (A.D. 1881).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū al-Faraj Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Waʼwāʼ al-Dimashqī al-Ghassānī, raḥimahu Allāh. wa-la-hu mutaghazzilan: Wa-muhafhafin ka-al-ghuṣni hazzathu al-ṣabā // fa-ṣabā ilayhi mina al-qulūbi hawāʼī. Yazhīhi ḥamlu wishāḥihi fa-tarāhu min // tarafi al-naʻīmi yaʼinnu fī ikhfāʼi. Tūmī sawālifuhu idhā lāḥaẓtahā // bi-khafīyi karri al-laḥẓi wa-al-īmāʼi ... "
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in black, red, and blue.
Binding: In dark blue cardboard with red leather on spine, Type III (without flap).

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tasṭīr hādhihi al-nuskhah laylat al-Thulāth, al-muwāfiqah ʻashrah khalat min shahr Rajab al-sharīf, min shuhūr sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda alf [8 June 1881] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-salām wa-azká al-taḥīyah. Tamm. M.M."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Īmān : manuscript / Taqī al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 952 (A.D. 1545).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥāfiẓ al-mutqin, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, rukn al-sharīʻah, nāṣir al-millah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi, Shaykh al-Islām wa-muftī al-anām, baḥr al-ʻulūm, Taqī al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah, raḥimahu Allāh wa-raḍiya ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh naḥmaduhu wa-nastaʻīnuhu wa-nastaghfiruhu wa-natūbu ilayhi, wa-naʻūdhu billāh min shurūr anfusinā wa-min sayyiʼāt aʻmālinā, man yahdī Allāh fa-lā muḍilla lah, wa-man yuḍlil fa-lā hādiya lah ...
