Iʻlam anna al-Islām wa-al-īmān yajtamiʻu fīhimā al-dīn kulluhu, wa-qad kathura kalām al-nās fī ḥaqīqat al-Islām wa-al-īmān wa-nizāʻuhum wa-iḍṭrābuhum, wa-qad ṣunnifa fī dhālika mujalladāt ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); light brown leather on spine.
Sparse marginalia.

Colophon (folio 181b-182a): "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min nuskhat hādhā al-kitāb, biʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḍaʻīf, al-muqirr ʻalá nafsihi bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, Rāshid ibn Saʻd ibn Rāshid, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-liman ʻulliqa li-ajlihi wa-li-wālidayh, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, Innaka qarībun mujīb al-daʻawāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhatihi yawm al-Aḥad, yawm khāmis min Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 52, tisʻimiʼah 9, ithnayn wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [27 May 1545], aḥsana Allāh khitāmahā, wa-bāraka fīmā baqā min ayyāmihā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Sharḥ al-Manhaj al-muntakhab fī al-uṣūl : manuscript / lil-ʻĀlim al-fāḍil al-mashhūr bi-al-diyār al-Gharbīyah bi-al-Manjūr.
record.note: An ex-libris on leaf 1 recto is dated A.H. 1143 (A.D. 1730 or 1731).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-al-shukr la-hu ʻalá mā awlānā min al-ifḍāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi khayr ṣuḥbin wa-āl. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-gharaḍ an aḍaʻa ʻalá al-Manhaj al-muntakhab ilá qawāʻid al-madhhab sharḥan yubayyinu al-ʻasīr wa-yukmilu bi-hi, in shāʼ Allāh taʻālá, al-taqrīr, wa-qad iḥtawá hādhā al-naẓm min al-fiqh ʻalá al-ghazīr, wa-huwa li-ṣighar ḥajmihi, wa-katharat ʻilmihi, wa-suhūlat ḥifẓihi wa-fahmihi, lā yūjadu la-hu fī bābihi fīmā ʻalimtu naẓīr ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, the text of al-Manhaj in red; leaves 317-20 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Wa-hunā inqaḍá al-sharḥ bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamd lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-al-salāmu khitām."

record.title: 880-02 Taqshīr al-tafsīr : manuscript / Abū ʻAlī ʻĀlī ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Ismāʻīl al-Ghaznawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 558 (A.D. 1163).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-sayyir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥa qulūb aṣfiyāʼihi bi-rawāʼiḥ unsihi, wa-aḍāʼ ṣudūr awliyāʼihi bi-maṣābiḥ qudsihi, wa-kasāhum malābis al-balāghah wa-al-barāʻah, wa-ḥallāhum bi-jawāhir al-farāghah wa-al-qanāʻah, wa-lam yajʻal ʻilamahum wa-ḥukamahum tijāratan wa-ṣināʻah, wa-ṣāna ḍamāʼirahum ʻāṭifan ʻan al-aḍālīl al-muḥarrafah bi-ḥirs ʻiṣmatihi, wa-zāna baṣāʼirahum ṣārifan ʻan al-abāṭīl al-muzakhrafah bi-nafas raḥmatihi, wa-arshadahum bi-luṭfihi ilá lawāḥib ṭarīq al-ḥaqq, wa-aṭlaʻahum bi-ʻaṭfihi ʻalá masārib ḥaqāʼiq al-ṣidq, ḥattá adhinū la-hu, wa-fahimū ʻanhu, wa-istamaʻū ilayhi wa-luqqinū minhu ..."

The author's name ʻĀlī is given both in the incipit and in the ijāzah on leaf 1 recto, dated A.H. 559 (A.D. 1164). Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, gives the name as Ghālib (939, no. 28); Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, as ʻAlī.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Marginalia.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); light brown leather on spine; cover embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Wa-faragha min naskhihi al-ʻabd al-mudhnib al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī raḥmat Rabbihi, Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salīm al-Sulamī, ḥāmidan lillāh taʻālá, wa-muṣalliyan ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, fī al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Ḥijjah, min sanat thamān wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah [3 December 1163]. Raḥim Allāh man naẓara fīhi, wa-daʻā li-ṣāḥibihi wa-muṣannifihi wa-kātibihi bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-ruḍwān, la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, min Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Katāʼib aʻlām al-akhyār min fuqahāʼ madhhab al-Nuʻmān al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-shahīr bi-al-Kaffawī.
record.note: Copied in Constantinople in A.H. 996 (A.D. 1588).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arsala Rasūlahu bi-al-hudá wa-dīn al-ḥaqq, wa-anzala ʻalayhi al-Kitāb fa-ballagha mā unzila ilayhi wa-ḥaqqaq, wa-jaʻala ʻulamāʼ ummatihi ka-anbiyāʼ Banī Isrāʼīl fī sharḥ kull mushkil wa-fatḥ kull mughlaq, wa-kull minhum bi-ʻawn Allāh fī umūr al-sharʻ khayr mudabbir wa-jall muwaffiq, fa-ṣāra bābuhum bi-khuṣlatay al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal malādhan tajammaʻa fīhi kull ḥizbin mufarraq ..."
Script: Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Ittafaqa al-farāgh min tanmīq (hādhā wa-huwa min) kitāb Katāʼib aʻlām al-akhyār fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah wa-al-mashāyikh al-kibār, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ʻĀrifī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-karamihi al-wafī, tilmīdh al-muṣannif al-Shaykh Maḥmūd ibn Sulaymān al-Kafawī, naʻʻamahu Allāh al-Malik al-qadīr al-qawī. Wa-waqaʻa hādhā al-ikhtitām fī Dār al-Salṭanah al-ʻAlīyah Qusṭanṭīnīyah al-maḥmīyah, laylat al-Thulāthāʼ, al-khāmisah wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Awwal al-Rabīʻayn, ʻām sitt wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [23 February 1588] min tārikh Hijrat man buʻitha ilá kull fiʼah, ʻalayhi afḍal al-salām, mā marra al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām. M."

record.title: 880-02 Laṭāʼif al-ishārāt fī al-qirāʼāt. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal [wa-]al-thānī : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Qasṭallānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1040 (A.D. 1631).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Yā barakah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah, imām al-qurrāʼ wa-ḥāmil liwāʼ al-iqrāʼ, Sayyidī Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Qasṭallānī, aḥmada Allāh taʻālá ʻawāqibahu, wa-ballaghahu min khayray al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah maʼāribahu, wa-amtaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl baqāʼihi, wa-jaʻalahu quṭba dāʼirat awliyāʼihi, wa-fasaḥ lil-Muslimīn fī muddatihi, wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi wa-barakatihi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala Kitābahu al-ʻazīz bi-al-sabʻat al-aḥruf tashīlan ʻalaynā wa-taysīran, wa-fahhamanā wujūh qirāʼatihi fa-himnā fī ṭuruq riwāyātihi muntashifīn min nashrihā al-arīj ʻabīran, aḥmaduhu ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Sparse marginalia.

Colophon (volume 2, folio 411a): "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-takmilah al-mubārakah nahār al-Ithnayn, ākhir shahr al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1040 [30 June 1631], ʻalá yad afqar al-wará Ḥasan ibn Aḥmad al-Ghuṣayn, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn." To the left of the colophon (in a different hand) a collation statement: "Tammat muqābalatuhu bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-tawfīqih ʻalá nuskhatin bihā suqm, ʻalá qadr al-ṭāqah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

record.title: 880-02 Maḥāsin al-ghurar wa-masāwiʼ al-ʻurar : manuscript / taʼlīf Mawlānā ... al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmh Muḥammad ibn Jānī Bik al-Sayfī Āqbāy khādim al-Sajjādah al-Sharīfah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1103 (A.D. 1692).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-lisān ʻunwān ʻaql al-insān wa-ālatan tuẓhiru sirr al-jinā[n] bi-faṣīḥ al-ʻibārah wa-ṣarīḥ al-tibyān. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mujtabá min sirrat ʻadnān, al-mabʻūth bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim al-shāmilah li-anwāʻ al-bayān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi furūʻ al-shajarah al-bāsiqat al-afnān ṣalātan dāʼimah mādāma ṭaraf al-qalam muqādan bi-ʻinān al-banān. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ʻanna lī an ajmaʻa kitāban fī al-maḥāmid wa-al-madhām mimmā warada ʻan al-fuḍalāʼ al-aʻlām ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Maḥāsin al-ghurar wa-masāwiʼ al-ʻurar', wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat abwāb wa-khātimah. Wa-anā asʼalu Allāh ḥusn al-khātimah li-Mawlānā al-Sulṭān ... Qāyitbāy al-Malik al-Ashraf ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhatihi yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, qarīb min ghāyat shahr Rajab al-fard, min shuhūr sanat thalāthah wa-miʼah baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [17 April 1692], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-ʻalá ālihi. Nammaqahu bi-yadihi al-fāniyah al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad Fāḍil al-Barīdī al-Ṭaʻʻānī al-Mālikī al-Burhānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Zājirah li-ṣāliḥī al-ummah ʻan isāʼat al-ẓann bi-al-Aʼimmah : manuscript / waḍaʻahā Amīr al-Muʼminīn al-Mahdī li-Dīn Allāh Abī al-Ḥasan Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Qāsim ibn Rasūl Allāh.
record.note: A theological tract.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu [lillāh] alladhī jaʻala al-anbiyāʼ umanāʼ waḥyihi wa-al-khulafāʼ umarāʼ amrihi wa-nahyihi wa-[al-ʻulamāʼ] ḥafaṭat ʻilmihi wa-tarājimat ithbātihi wa-nafyihi, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi [amīn?] tibyānihi wa-hadyihi Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ḥāmīn ʻan dīnihi ..."
For the author's dates see Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 9741.
Brockelmann has, in title: al-Zājir lil-ummah ʻan "ishāʻat" for "isāʼat."
Script: Good Yemenite hand, partly unpointed.
Binding: In dark red buckram, Type III (without flap).
With: 1 other title: Kitāb al-ʻInāyah al-tāmmah bi-taḥqīq masāʼil al-imāmah / ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Hādī ilá al-Ḥaqq.

Ends as follows: "... wa-hādhihi al-risālah ilá ikhwāninā al-Muslimīn ʻalá wajh al-ijmāl wa-al-ishārah <ʻalá> limā naḥnu ʻalayhi min tarākum al-ashghāl wa-taḍāyuq al-aḥwāl, fa-li-yantafiʻū bihā, wa-li-yaḥmilūnā ʻalá aḥsan mā yuḥmalu ʻalayhi mithlunā min mithlihim, ayyadahum Allāh bi-hidāyatihi wa-asbala ʻalayhim sitr riʻāyatihi wa-ḥimāyatihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi al-kirām wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻInāyah al-tāmmah bi-taḥqīq masāʼil al-imāmah : manuscript / taʼlīf Mawlānā ... ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn al-Ḥasan.
record.note: Copied before A.H. 952 (A.D. 1545).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam]. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin, yā karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-imāmah dhurwatan lil-dīn, wa-sanāman wa-ṣalāḥan li-amr al-ʻālam wa-niẓāman, wa-nāṭa bihā qawāʻid min al-sharāʼiʻ wa-aḥkāman ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 822.

Landberg understood the date A.H. 952 (A.D. 1545) on leaf 75 recto to be that of the collation (muqābalatan wa-taṣlīḥan); the wording of the note is however not quite clear; possibly the date is rather that of the prototype.
Script: Good Yemenite hand, partly unpointed.
Binding: Modern library binding.
With: 1 other title: al-Zājirah li-ṣāliḥī al-ummah ʻan isāʼat al-ẓann bi-al-Aʼimmah / al-Mahdī li-Dīn Allāh Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn.

Colophon: "Balagha muqābalatan wa-taṣlīḥan ʻalá al-nuskhah al-manqūl ʻanhā wa-laysat bi-jayyidah al-taṣḥīḥ. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Nusikha ghurrata shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal min sanat 952 [23 May 1545]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

record.title: Futūḥ al-buldān / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá al-Balādhurī. -- [11--?].
record.note: Ex-libris on leaf 1 recto dated A.H. 974 (A.D. 1566 or 67) and 1067 (A.D. 1656 or 57).
Fair naskhī, unpointed, but with the verses fully vocalized.
Leaves loose, in brown Islamic binding, with flap.
Paper brittle, with many leaves damaged.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Saʻd al-Dīn ibn ... Muḥyī al-Dīn al-ʻArab[ī].
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. ʻAfá Allāhu ʻan ʻaynika kam safakat daman // wa-kam farraqat naḥwa al-jawāniḥi ashumā ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In marbled cardboard, Type III (without flap); dark red leather on spine.
Colophon: "Qad tamma hādhā al-dīwān al-mubārak."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ʻilm al-mizāj : manuscript / lil-Fārābī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-jalāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-tashbīh wa-al-tarkīb wa-al-mithāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-jāmiʻ li-khiṣāl al-kamāl al-mufarriq bayna al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-luyūth al-kawāsir, wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujūm al-zawāhir. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Risālah fī al-mizāj wa-al-awzān, ʻalá mā dhahaba ilayhi al-jumhūr wa-sāqanī al-dalīl ilayhi wa-qawiya iʻtimādī ʻalayhi ..."
Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection 794 (5) has a different incipit.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In indigo cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on spine.
With: 1 other title: al-Naṣīḥah al-īmānīyah fī faḍīḥat al-millah al-Naṣrānīyah / Naṣr ibn Yaḥyá al-Muhtadī.

Colophon: "Tamma dhālika bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī wa-lā rasūl baʻdah, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan. Āmīn. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Naṣīḥah al-īmānīyah fī faḍīḥat al-millah al-Naṣrānīyah : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Yaḥyá ibn Saʻīd al-Mutaṭabbib al-Muhtadī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala dīn al-Islām ʻalá sāʼir al-adyān, wa-jaʻalahu dīnan qayyiman lā naskha yaʻtarīhi ilá ākhir al-zamān, wa-arshada fīhi limā yurḍīhi min aʻmāl al-badan wa-al-jinān ..."
The author was a Christian convert to Islam.
Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection 1537 has a different incipit.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In indigo cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on spine.
With: 1 other title: Risālah fī ʻilm al-mizāj / al-Fārābī.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak fī yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak 27 [sabʻah] wa-ʻishrīn min Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn sabʻah wa-tisʻīn [8 April 1880]. Wa-al-ḥamd lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Mutammimāt al-Taʻrīfāt al-Jurjānīyah : manuscript / lil-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah mutammim al-Māhīyāt Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
A holograph probably written in 18th century.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih, Muḥammad wa-ālih. Fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif ilá al-Yāʼ, tashīlan tanāwuluhā, ay ittikhādhuhā lil-ṭālibīn, wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn, wa-Allāh al-hādī, wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mubtadaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif ..."
For al-Jurjānī's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 216; S II, p. 305; and Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 1578.
Script: Small calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh ʻan istijmāʻ al-taʻrīfāt al-zāʼidah ʻalá mā istajmaʻa al-Sayyid al-sanad min al-Taʻrīfāt, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutammim al-Māhīyāt, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, yawm muqaddam al-ḥisāb Mutammimāt al-Taʻrīfāt. M.M.M."

record.title: 880-02 Dār al-ṭirāz fī ʻamal al-muwashshaḥāt : manuscript / taʼlīf al-Qāḍī ... Abī al-Qāsim Hibat Allāh ibn Jaʻfar ibn Sanāʼ al-Mulk.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn, wa-kafá bi-hi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh istiftāḥan bi-ḥamdihi wa-istinjāḥan bi-dhikrihi, wa-raḥmat Allāh wa-barakātuhu, wa-salāmuhu wa-ṣalātuhu, ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-sayyid al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-al-ākharīn wa-al-awwalīn, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-aqrabīn al-aṭyabīn, wa-ṣaḥābatihi al-muntakhabīn al-muntajibīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inn al-muwashshaḥāt mimmā taraka al-awwal lil-ākhar ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In green cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on spine.

Colophon (folio 34b): "Hādhā mā sanaḥa taʻlīquhu wa-amkana takhrījuhu. Wa-anā asʼalu Allāh al-ʻāfiyah wa-al-ʻafw, wa-an yaʻṣimanī min laghw al-qawl wa-qawl al-laghw, wa-Huwa walī al-ijābah bi-raḥmatih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran. Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim ilá yawm al-dīn. Āmīn. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Muqaddimat Fatḥ al-Bārī li-sharḥ al-Bukhārī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-ʻAbbās Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ātinā min ladunika raḥmatan, wa-hayyiʼ lanā min amrinā rashadan, wa-ṣallá Allāhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥa ṣudūra ahl al-Islām bi-al-Sunnah fa-inqādat li-ittibāʻihā wa-irtāḥat li-samāʻihā, wa-amāt nufūs ulī al-ṭughyān bi-al-bidʻah baʻda an tamādat fī nizāʻihā wa-taghālat fī ibtidāʻihā ..."
Copied in A.H. 852 (A.D. 1448).
Script: Hasty naskhī.
Binding: In decorated colored cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on spine and the edges.
Several leaves wanting, and supplied by a later hand.

On folio 316a (in the author's hand): "al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad samiʻa ʻalayya ṣāḥibuhu al-Shaykh Shams al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī mā uʻallimuhu la-hu fī al-hawāmish ... ... (?) fī hādhihi al-nuskhah wa-al-majlis al-akhīr minhu bi-qirāʼat al-Shaykh Burhān al-Dīn al-Biqāʻī, laylat al-Aḥad, al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn, min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat ithnayn wa-khamsīn wa-thamānimiʼah [11 June 1448], wa-ajaztu la-hu an yarwiyahu ʻalá mā tajūzu ʻannī riwāyatuhu wa-al-salām (?). Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-ʻAsqalānī al-shahīr bi-Ibn Ḥajar al-Shāfiʻī ... ... (?)."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Lumaʻ al-qawānīn al-muḍīyah fī dawāwīn al-diyār al-Miṣrīyah : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Ibrāhīm al-Nābulusī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1308 (A.D. 1891).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa ʻibādahu bi-mukhāṭabatihi wa-dhikrihi, wa-manaḥahum al-tawfīq li-wājib ḥamdihi wa-shukrihi, wa-sayyarahum kayfa shāʼa min barrihi wa-baḥrihi, wa-razaqa kullan minhum ʻaqlan yahtadī bi-hi ilá tadbīr amrihi ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Nuqilat hādhihi al-nuskhah min nuskhat al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah, numrah 133 Tārīkh, wa-qūbilat ʻalá al-nuskhah al-aṣlīyah bi-kull diqqah, wa-dhālika fī 20 B [Rajab], sanat 1308 Hijrīyah, muwāfiq ghurrat Marth, sanat 1891, ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-muṣaḥḥiḥihi Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-naḥwīyah : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1309 (A.D. 1891).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Subḥān Allāh al-munazzah ʻan al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Wa-tārīkh al-nuskhah allatī nuqilat minhā hādhihi al-nuskhah, wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, thānī ʻishrīn Shaʻbān, min shuhūr sanat 1122, ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah [16 October 1710]. Nuqilat min nuskhah bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah, numrah 27 naḥw, wa-qūbilat ʻalayhā bi-ghāyat al-diqqah, ʻalá ḥasb al-ṭāqah, ʻalá yad mukammilihā wa-mutammimihā Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu, wa-ghafara li-uṣūlihi wa-furūʻihi. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā ʻishrīn yawman maḍat min Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1309, tisʻ wa-thalāthmiʼah wa-alf min Hijrat man la-hu al-majd wa-al-sharaf [23 November 1891]. M."

record.title: 880-02 Tarassul : manuscript / Abū al-Futūḥ Naṣr Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Makhlūf ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qawī ibn Qalāqis al-Lakhmī al-Azharī al-Iskandarī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1301 (A.D. 1884) by Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Kataba al-Shaykh al-adīb al-aʻazz Abū al-Futūḥ Naṣr ibn ʻAbd al-Qawī al-Lakhmī, al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Qalāqis, ilá al-Faqīh Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Khulayf, wa-qad saʼalahu taʻlīq shayʼ min rasāʼilihi ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 262; S I, p. 461.
For the copyist Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah see Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 72, 2013 (12).
Script: Cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir mā dūwina min tarassul al-aʻazz Abī al-Futūḥ ibn Qalāqis, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Katabahu al-faqīr Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah, ʻufiya ʻanhu, 17 Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1301 min Hijrah al-Muṣṭafá [15 March 1884], ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ahl al-wafā."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Tanbīhāt ʻalá aghālīṭ al-ruwāh : manuscript / taʼlīf Abī al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn Ḥamzah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1308 (A.D. 1890).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan yablughu riḍāh wa-yūjibu mazīdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad bashīr thawābihi wa-nadhīr ʻiqābih, wa-ʻalá abrār ʻitratihi al-aṭhār al-muntakhabīn al-akhyār wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla Abū al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn Ḥamzah al-Baṣrī: Hādhā Kitāb al-Tanbīhāt ʻalá aghlāṭ al-ruwāt fī kutub al-lughah al-muṣannafāt ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Qad ṣāra muqābalat hādhā al-kitāb wa-taṣḥīḥuhu ʻalá al-nuskhah allatī nuqila minhā bi-ḥasb al-ṭāqah wa-al-ijtihād, wa-yuʻlamu min al-fahrasah allatī fī awwal al-kitāb annahu naqiṣ shayʼan qalīlan, li-anna ākhir al-fahrasah al-tanbīh ʻalá aghālīṭ Abī al-ʻAbbās ibn Muḥammad ibn Wallād, wa-ākhir al-maktūb fī hādhā huwa dhālika al-tanbīh ʻalá aghālīṭ Abī al-ʻAbbās ibn Muḥammad ibn Wallād, wa-li-ajl yakūnu maʻlūman taḥarrara hādhā. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Kātibuhu Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, 11 Ṣ [Ṣafar], sanat 1308, 25 Sibtambir 1890; Kātibuhu Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-ʻAṭṭār."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb shajar al-durr : manuscript / Abū al-Ṭayyib al-Lughawī.
record.note: Copied in Damascus (Syria) in A.H. 1308 (A.D. 1890).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad sayyid al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-rusul wa-al-hādī ilá aqṣad al-subul, wa-ʻalá ālihi shumūs al-hudá wa-maṣābīḥ al-dujá. Qāla Abū al-Ṭayyib al-Lughawī: al-ʻIlm sahlun wa-ʻawīṣ, wa-dhalūlun wa-jamūḥ, lā yustaghná bi-iḥtiwāʼ sahlihi ʻan maʻrifat ʻawīṣihi, bal lā yutawaṣṣalu ilá taqaṣṣī dhalūlihi illā bi-istinbāṭ jāmiḥihi ..."
On leaf recto, in C. Landberg's hand: "Copie d'un ms. de Damas".
Script: Cursive naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Colophon: "Katabahā Aḥmad Samīr al-Miṣrī fī 28 Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat 1307 = 15 Tammūz, sanat 1890, wa-dhālika bi-Madīnat Dimashq al-Shām."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Khaṣāʼiṣ al-ʻArabīyah. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / taʼlīf Abī al-Fatḥ ʻUthmān ibn Jinnī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1308 (A.D. 1891).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-ʻadl al-qadīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá ṣafwatihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-muntakhabīn, wa-ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim al-salām ajmaʻīn ..."

That this is the first juzʼ only is clear from leaf 299 verso and from the colophon on leaf 309 verso; the colophon, mentioning the end of the 2d juzʼ, is taken from another manuscript in which this first juzʼ was divided into two parts.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, blue, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Other juzʼs wanting.

Colophon: "Ṣāra taṣḥīḥ hādhihi al-nuskhah wa-muqābalatuhā ʻalá al-nuskhah allatī nuqilat minhā awwalan, wa-ṣuḥḥiḥat wa-qūbilat ʻalá nuskhah aqdam min al-nuskhah al-ūlá, tārīkhuhā sanat 430, thalāthīn wa-arbʻmiʼah, kiltā al-nuskhatayn bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah, jaʻalahā Allāh ʻāmirah ilá muntahá al-zamān, wa-ḥafiẓahā min kull sūʼ fī kull waqt wa-awān, mā tajaddada al-ʻaṣr wa-taʻāqaba al-malawān. 1308, 22 Sh [Shaʻbān], 1891, ghurrat Abrīl. Kātibuhu Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah. M."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ mā yaqaʻu fīhi al-taṣḥīf wa-al-taḥrīf. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal [wa-]al-thānī : manuscript / taʼlīf Abī Aḥmad al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻīd al-ʻAskarī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1308 (A.D. 1890).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl niʻamihi wa-jamīl ṣunʻihi, ḥamdan yablughu riḍāhu wa-yamtarī mazīdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Sharaḥtu fī kitābī hādhā al-alfāẓ wa-al-asmāʼ al-mushkilah allatī tatashābahu fī ṣūrat al-khaṭṭ fa-yaqaʻu fīhā al-taṣḥīf wa-yadkhuluhā al-taḥrīf mimmā yaʻruḍu fī alfāẓ al-lughah wa-al-shiʻr wa-fī asmāʼ al-shuʻarāʼ ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir mā wujida min hādhā al-kitāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi 6 Ṣafar sanat 1308 Hijrīyah wa 20 Sibtambir sanat 1890. Nuqila min nuskhah bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah, waqāhā Allāh kull sūʼ wa-balīyah, ʻalá yad kātibihi Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Kātibuhu Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Wahhāb."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb jamharat al-ʻArab wa-nukhbat al-adab : manuscript / Abū Zayd Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khaṭṭāb al-Qurashī.
record.note: Copied in A.D. 1849.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻan al-abṣār iḥtajab, al-mutajallil bi-bahāʼ al-haybah min ghayr shakk wa-lā rayb, al-mutafarrid bi-al-ʻizzah wa-al-kibriyāʼ, fa-lā tudrikuhu al-awhām wa-al-ṭulab, subḥānuhu mā aʻẓama tadbīruhu fī maṣnūʻātihi wa-mā aʻjab. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb Jamharat al-ʻArab wa-nukhbat al-adab fī al-Jāhilīyah wa-al-Islām alladhīn nazala al-Qurʼān bi-alsinatihim, wa-ushtiqat al-ʻArabīyah min alfāẓihim, wa-ittukhidhat al-shawāhid min ashʻārihim ..."
Hitti gives Abū Zayd's dates as 1000-1064, but these are really the dates of Ibn Rashīq, who quotes the Jamharah (cf. Brockelmann, S I, p. 38 and I, 307).
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Colophon: "Qad tamma naskh hādhā al-kitāb bi-yad [al-]ʻabd al-faqīr Anṭūn ibn Jabbūr Khayyāṭ fī al-nahār al-awwal min shahr Naysān, sanat 1849."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Jamharat al-ʻArab : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī Zayd Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khaṭṭāb al-Qurashī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Hādhā Kitāb Jamharat al-ʻArab fī al-Jāhilīyah wa-al-Islām alladhīna nazil al-Qurʼān bi-alsinatihim, wa-ishtuqqat al-ʻArabīyah min alfāẓihim, wa-ittukhidhat al-shawāhid fī maʻānī al-Ḥadīth min ashʻārihim ..."
Incomplete at end.
Hitti gives Abū Zayd's dates as 1000-1064, but these are really the dates of Ibn Rashīq, who quotes the Jamharah (cf. Brockelmann, S I, p. 38 and I, 307).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Modern (19th century) copy.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with a poem attributed to Abū Ṭālib, as follows: "... Fa-ʻAbda Manāfin antumu khayru qawmikum // wa-lā tushrikū fī amrikum kulla wāghili. La-ʻamrī laqad awhantumu wa-ʻajiztumu // wa-jiʼtum bi-amrin mukhṭiʼin lil-mafāṣili. Wa-kuntum ḥadīthan ..."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Zayyāt.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Zayyāt yamdaḥ al-Ḥasan ibn Sahl: Kaʼannahā ḥīna tanāʼá khaṭwuhā // akhnasu mawshīyu al-shará yarʻá al-qulal. Bātat la-hu min shuraṭīyin laylatun // jādat ʻalayhi sabalan baʻda sabal. Aljaʼahu al-laylu ilá ḥiqfi tharan // wa-fīhi ṣirrun dhātu ḥatfin wa-wajal ..."
Script: Good naskhī. Modern (19th century) copy, made, according to C. Landberg, from an old manuscript in Damascus.
Binding: Modern library binding.

The "Dīwān" ends as follows: "Qāla wa-huwa fī al-tannūr alladhī ʻudhdhiba fīhi, wa-kāna ittakhadhahu li-yuʻaddiba fīhi baʻḍ al-kuttāb, fa-ʻudhdhiba fīhi wa-māta, wa-huwa ākhir mā sumiʻa minhu: Huwa al-sabīlu fa-min yawmin ilá yawmi // kaʼannahu mā turīka al-ʻaynu fī al-nawmi. Lā taʻjalanna ruwaydan innahā duwalun // dunyā tanaqqalu min qawmin ilá qawmi."
Colophon: "Najaza Shiʻr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Zayyāt bi-asrihi."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Fuḥūlat al-shuʻarāʼ : manuscript / riwāyat Ibn Durayd ʻan Abī Ḥātim ʻan al-Aṣmaʻī.
record.note: On leaf following leaf 11, in C. Landberg's hand: "Copié par Samir à Damas juillet 1890 sur une copie vieille de 200 ans ... Collationné avec moi."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Durayd al-Azdī, qāla Abū Ḥātim Sahl ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Sijzī samiʻtu al-Aṣmaʻī ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Qurayb ghayra marratin yufaḍḍilu al-Nābighah al-Dhubyānī ʻalá sāʼir al-shuʻarāʼ al-Jāhilīyah, wa-saʼaltuhu ākhira mā saʼaltuhu qubayla mawtihi man awwal al-fuḥūl, qāla al-Nābighah al-Dhubyānī, thumma qāl mā ará fī al-dunyā li-aḥadin mithla qawl Imriʼ al-Qays: Waqāhum jadduhum bi-banī abīhim // wa-bi-al-ashqayni mā kāna al-ʻiqābu ..."
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Unbound. Leaves wrapped in a thick folded sheet of paper.
"Samir" is probably Aḥmad Samīr al-Miṣrī, the copyist of Landberg MSS 43.

Colophon: The text ends as follows: "... Ḥaddathanā al-Aṣmaʻī, qāl: al-Kumayt ibn Zayd laysa bi-ḥujjah li-annahu muwallad, wa-kadhālika al-Ṭirimmāḥ, qāl wa-Dhū al-Rimmah ḥujjah li-annahu Badawī, wa-lākin laysa yushbihu shiʻruhu shiʻr al-ʻArab, thumma qāl illā wāḥidah allatī tushbihu shiʻra al-ʻArab, wa-hiya allatī yaqūlu fīhā: Wa-al-bābu dūna Abī Ghassāna masdūdu. Tamma. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. M."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Jirān al-ʻAwd al-Numayrī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Saʻīd al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Sukkarī al-Baṣrī qaraʼtu ʻalá Abī Jaʻfar Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb, qāala Abū Jaʻfar qāla Jirān al-ʻAwd al-Numayrī, qāla Abū ʻAmr, wa-kāna Jirān al-ʻAwd wa-al-Raḥḥāl khidnayn tabīʻayn, thumma innahumā tazawwaja kull wāḥid minhumā, fa-lammā ijtamaʻā qāla Jirān al-ʻAwd: Alā lā yaghurrana amraʼn nawfalīyatun // ʻalá al-raʼsi baʻdī aw tarāʼibu wuḍḍaḥu ..."
Script: Modern naskhī.
Binding: Unbound.
Copied (by C. Landberg?) after a manuscript in Cairo.
Note on leaf 1 recto: "Collationné avec moi et la vraie leçon inscrite en marge La[ndber]g".
Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-sallam, wa-sharrafa wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Intahá al-sharḥ."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salāmah al-muʼadhdhin al-shahīr bi-al-Udkāwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1295 (A.D. 1878) by Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 2b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-tawfīq wa-al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqanā wa-razaqanā, wa-shaqqa samʻanā wa-baṣaranā wa-anṭaqanā wa-aqāmanā lil-saʻyi fī marḍātihi ḥattá laḥiqnā bi-faḍlihi man sabaqanā, wa-ṣarrafanā fī aʻinnat al-balāghah, wa-ilá al-tamassuki bi-ahlihi waffaqanā, wa-nashkuruhu an jaʻalanā mimman ḥalla ʻuqdat lisānihi ḥattá afṣaḥa bi-bayānihi ʻan ḍamīr janānih ..."
Alternate title (leaf 2 verso): Biḍāʻat al-arīb min shiʻr al-gharīb.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Marginalia.

Colophon: "Qāla kātibuhu: Faraghtu min naskh hādhā al-dīwān ʻaṣra yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, 25 shahr al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1295 min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf [20 November 1878] naqaltuhā min khaṭṭ ibn muʼallifihā al-mūmá ilayhi, wa-aṣlaḥtu mā ẓahar lī, wa-ashartu ilá al-baʻḍ bi-hāmishihi. Wa-Allāh yahdī ilá tamām al-maqṣūd. Katabahu al-faqīr Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah, ʻufiya ʻanhu wa-ʻan wālidayhi [wa-]mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. M."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Jāmī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī zayyana khawātim qulūb ulī al-himam bi-fuṣūṣ nuṣūṣ al-ḥikam, wa-khatama bihā bāb al-nubūwah marratan wa-bāb al-wilāyah al-khāṣṣah ukhrá, wa-sa-yakhtumu bihā al-wilāyah al-muṭlaqah ʻalá man huwa aḥaqq bihā min awliyāʼihi. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá mahbiṭ kalimihi [kalimatihi. ṣaḥḥ] al-tāmmah al-kāmilah, wa-muqassim niʻamihi al-ʻāmmah al-shāmilah, wa-ʻalá man āla min ʻitratihi amruhu ilayh, wa-fāza fī ṣuḥbatihi bi-al-muthūl bayna yadayh. Ammā baʻd ..."
Incipit same as in Berlin catalog: Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 2883.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Sparse marginal comments.

Author's colophon (folio 238a): "Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi: Laqad wuffiqa lil-farāgh ʻan fakk khitām hādhihi al-fuṣūṣ wa-kashf ibhām hādhihi al-nuṣūṣ al-ʻabd al-mutadhallil bi-al-shukhūṣ bayna yaday ʻumūm ahl al-khuṣūṣ, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad al-Jāmī, tajāwaza Allāh subḥānuhu ʻan mazāll aqdāmihi wa-mazāliq aqlāmihi, ghurrata Jumādá al-Ūlá, al-muntaẓimah fī silk shuhūr sanat sitt wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [21 March 1491]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon of the former copyist (folio 238b): "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min ramz hādhā al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, buʻayda ṣalāt al-Jumʻah, al-khāmis ʻashar min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, min shuhūr sant sitt baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [19 June 1598], ʻalá yad afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilayhi ʻAlī ibn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Dāwūd al-Ṭūkhī al-Mālkī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Colophon of the copyist of the present copy (folio 234b): "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb yawm al-Thulāth, al-muwāfiq khamsat ayyām fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat alf wa-thalāthimiʼah [13 February 1883], ʻalá yad afqar ʻibād Allāh Muḥammad ʻArafah Ḥammād al-Bardīnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Nihāyat sayr al-afkār fī al-mabāḥith ʻan Kashf al-asrār : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Bundahī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Badīʻ.
record.note: Copied in the A.H. 13th (A.D. 19th) century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā thanānī al-qadar ilá ṣarf baʻḍ zamān al-taḥṣīl fī al-kitāb al-mawsūm bi-Kashf al-asrār fī ʻilm al-manṭiq wajadtuhu mushtamilan ʻalá mulakhkhaṣ abḥāth al-mutaqaddimīn wa-muḥaṣṣal afkār al-mutaʼkhkhirīn, maʻa ikhtiṣāṣihi bi-tadqīqāt lam yusbaq ilayhā wa-taqrīrāt lam yuʻthar ʻalayhā, mukhālifan lil-qawm fī jumal al-uṣūl wa-mujāniban lahum fī kathīr min al-fuṣūl ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Nihāyat al-afkār fī al-mabāḥith ʻan kashf al-asrār ..."
For al-Khūnajī's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 463; S I, p. 838.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Sporadic marginal comments.

Colophon: "Hādhā mā intahá ilayhi taʻlīq al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Fakhr al-Millah wa-al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Bundahī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Badīʻ, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Katabahu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Khalīl Ibrāhīm. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī yawm al-Arbaʻ, min shahr [blank space] alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn [blank space] al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-salām."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Tadhkirat al-gharīb : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah ... Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Wardī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Waṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, jāmiʻ ashtāt al-faḍāʼil, awḥad al-mutaʼkhkhirīn, Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Wardī al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi al-ṭālibīn: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-muṭṭaliʻ ʻalá al-gharāʼib, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-makhṣūṣ bi-al-raghāʼib al-mubarraʼīn min ʻayb kull ʻāʼib ..."
Script: Coarse modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Author's colophon: "... fa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥsana al-khalaf, wa-ʻawwaḍa bi-khayrin ʻammā salaf, wa-min hāhunā khatamtu al-kitāb ḥāmidan muṣalliyan ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-musalliman taslīman kathīran. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
On the lower right margin of the author's colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥusn al-daʻwah lil-ijābah ilá al-qahwah : manuscript / jamʻ kātibihā ... ʻAbd Allāh al-Idkāwī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah intaqaytuhā min qiṭʻah jamaʻahā baʻḍ al-afāḍil fīmā yataʻallaqu bi-al-qahwah al-bunnīyah al-majlūbah ilá al-aqṭār min al-bilād al-Yamanīyah, musammiyan lahā bi-Ḥusn al-daʻwah lil-ijābah ilá al-qahwah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Kamulat hādhihi al-nubdhah ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāhu ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Idkāwī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-raḥimahu wa-raḥima abāhu wa-al-Muslimīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā ṣabīḥata yawm al-Jumʻah al-anwar, rābiʻ ʻishrī Jumādá al-Ūlá, min sanat sitt wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [11 December 1762]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman."
Under the colophon: The following two verses praising coffee: "Anā al-maʻshūqatu al-samrā // wa-ujlá fī al-fanājīni. Wa-ʻūdu al-Hindi lī ṭībun // wa-dhikrī shāʻa fī al-Ṣīni."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghammāz ʻalá al-lammāz : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Samannūdī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1292 (A.D. 1875).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ ʻalá man fī Allāh jāhada wa-ijtahada, wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi al-ḥāmid Muḥammad. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Samannūdī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Lammā raʼaytu man raʼytu man lā yakhāfu min kull jilfin ḥāfin yakhluṭu al-Aḥādīth al-ṣaḥīḥah bi-al-wāhiyah wa-lam yulqi li-waʻyihi bi-jaʻlihi al-bāṭil ṣaḥīḥan udhunan wāʻiyah, fa-istakhartu Allāh taʻālá ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran wa-bāṭinan wa-ẓāhiran. Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn Ramaḍān, sanat 1292 [29 October 1875]. M. In tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻabun wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻaddud al-jumaʻ wa-hal fīhi muttasaʻ : manuscript / taṣnīf ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Kāfī ibn ʻAlī ibn Tamām al-Subkī.
record.note: Holograph.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Masʼalat iqāmat jumʻatayn fī balad lam ara lahā dhikran fī kalām al-Ṣaḥābah, raḍiya Allāh ʻnahum, illā mā rawāhu Abū Bakr ibn Abī Shaybah fī muṣannafihi, qāl: Ḥaddathanā ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ḥarb ʻan al-Qāsim ibn al-Walīd qāl Qāla ʻAlī Lā jumʻah yawma Jumʻah illā maʻa al-Imām ..."
Script: Hasty naskhī, entirely unpointed.
Binding: Modern library binding.
C. Landberg's notes on the flyleaf.
Colophon: "Katabahu ʻAlī al-Subkī fī yawm al-Ithnayn, mustahall Shaʻbān aw salkh Rajab abʻad al-shakk fī al-Hilāl sanat thamān wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻ miʼah [2 March 1338]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Fāʼiq fī al-lughah : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
record.note: Volume II was copied on Wednesday, 22 Shaʻbān, of the year 1301 of the Hijrah (17 June 1884).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh. Qāla ʻabd Allāh al-faqīr ilayhi, Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataqa lisān al-Dhabīḥ bi-al-ʻArabīyah al-bayyinah wa-al-khiṭāb al-faṣīḥ, wa-tawallāhu bi-atharihi al-taqaddum fī al-nuṭq bi-al-lughah allatī hiya aṣaḥḥ al-lughāt, wa-jaʻalahu abā ʻudhr al-taṣaddī lil-balāghah allatī hiya atamm al-balāghāt, wa-istalla min sulālatihi ʻAdnān wa-abnāʼahu ..."
Script: Volume I composed of several old hands, in fair vocalized naskhī. Volume II written in a good modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Volume I is in brown leather, Type II (with flap). Volume II is unbound.
Extensive marginalia in volume I.

Colophon of volume I: "Tammat kitābat baʻḍ hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah waqt al-ʻishāʼ al-akhīr, sādis ʻashar Ṣafar, khutima bi-al-khayr wa-al-ẓafar, sanata arbaʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [21 January 1392]. Kutiba li-Jāmiʻ [al-]Madrasah al-mubārakah al-Mustanṣirīyah, innahā bi-ḥurmat Muḥammad wa-ālih."

Colophon of volume II: "IH [Intahá] al-juzʼ al-awwal bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá. Wa-yalīhi al-juzʼ al-thānī, wa-awwaluhu Kitāb al-Ḍād maʻa al-Hamzah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M."

Under the colophon of volume II (to its right) the copyist wrote: "al-Sittata ʻashar kurrās min al-juzʼ al-awwal bi-qalam al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻĪsá Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihim yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, al-muwāfiq 22 wa-ʻishrīn shahr Shaʻbān alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1301, alf wa-thalāthimiʼah wa-wāḥid min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [17 June 1884], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā azká al-taḥīyah. Wa-hādhā al-kurrās huwa ākhir al-sittata ʻashar kurrās allatī hum bi-khaṭṭī, katabtuhum ḥarfan bi-ḥarf min nuskhatin kathīrat al-taḥrīf jiddan, mushtamilah ʻalá ʻiddat khuṭūṭ. Fa-raḥim Allāh imraʼan iṭṭalaʻa ʻalayhā wa-waqafa ʻalá ʻuyūbihā, fa-li-yaltamis lī ʻudhran, lianna al-ʻudhr maqbūl, wa-baʻda dhālika yaqraʼu Umma al-Kitāb wa-yahdī thawābahā lil-ladhī tasabbaba fī kitābat hādhā al-kitāb al-jalīl al-qadr alladhī huwa andar min al-kibrīt al-aḥmar. Fa-raḥima Allāh muʼallifahu wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-ṣināʻatayn : al-kitābah wa-al-shiʻr. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / min taṣnīf Abī Hilāl al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Sahl al-ʻAskarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh walī kull niʻmah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi al-hādī min kull ḍalālah, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-muntakhabīn al-akhyār wa-ʻitratihi al-muṣṭafayn al-abrār. Inna aḥaqq al-ʻulūm bi-al-taʻallum wa-awlāhā bi-al-taḥaffuẓ baʻda al-maʻrifah billāh jall thanāʼuhu ʻilm al-balāghah wa-maʻrifat al-faṣāḥah alladhī bi-hi yuʻrafu iʻjāz kitāb Allāh taʻālá, al-nāṭiq bi-al-ḥaqq, al-hādī ilá sabīl al-rushd, al-madlūl bi-hi ʻalá ṣidq al-risālah wa-ṣiḥḥat al-nubūwah allatī rafaʻat aʻlām al-ḥaqq ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) cursive naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Remaining volume(s) wanting.
Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal min Kitāb al-ṣināʻatayn."

record.title: 880-02 Nubdhah min Dīwān al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Masīrī al-Iskandarī : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Masīrī al-Iskandarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "... wa-asná maṭliʻ tushriqu fīhi al-ṣaḥāʼif min jihat al-yamīn lā min jihat al-shamāl mā tarakkabat al-faḍāʼil min maʼāthirihim allatī laysa lahā ḥadd wa-lā nihāyah, wa-tuliyat ʻalaynā min mafākhirihim al-muṭlaqah ʻan quyūd al-ḥaṣr kull āyah wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna min al-wājibāt fī kull ummah ijarāʼ ʻamalīyāt al-ʻqal fīmā khuliqa la-hu min al-ḥikmah limā fīhi min al-imtithāl al-mafrūḍ ʻalá al-aʻyān wa-al-taḥaqquq bi-qawlihi taʻālá 'Khalaqa al-insān ʻallamahu al-bayān', wa-al-taraqqī ilá al-darajāt al-awlá bi-al-taḥallī bi-ṣifāt al-ḥaqāʼiq maʻa al-takhallī ʻan shubuhāt al-shahawāt al-nafsānīyah ..."

Evidently not identical with Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá al-Maswarī (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 899; cf. Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, ca. 1082 A.H.).
Seems to be a different collection from Landberg MSS 710.
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with a poem sent to al-Shaykh Jaʻfar al-Shaybī, as follows: "... Lā zāla bābuka kaʻbatan maḥjūjatan // bi-bahāʼihā kull al-wará tastaẓhir. Mā gharradat wurqu al-madāʼiḥi fī rubá // awṣāfikum wa-zahá al-thanāʼu al-akhḍaru. Tammat hādhihi al-abyāt."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-ʻUmdah fī maḥāsin al-shiʻr wa-ādābihi wa-ṣināʻatih. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal [wa-]al-thānī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī ʻAlī Ḥasan ibn Rashīq al-Azdī al-Qayrawānī al-Maghribī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū ʻAlī Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Rashīq al-Qayrawānī al-Maghribī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustaḥiqqihi, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá ṣafwatihi min khalqihi, Muḥammad khīratihi, wa-ʻalá abrār ʻitratihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna aḥaqq man janá thamar al-albāb wa-iqtaṭafa zahr al-ādāb ... rajul al-khuṭab wa-fāris al-kutub Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Rijāl al-Kātib, zaʻīm al-karam wa-wāḥid al-fiham ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon of volume 1: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal min Kitāb al-ʻUmdah fī maḥāsin al-shiʻr wa-ādābihi wa-ṣināʻatih fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, li-ʻishrīn khalat min shahr Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat 1298 [20 May 1881], wa-yalīhi al-juzʼ al-thānī min bāb al-tarwīd [al-tardīd], nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-ikmāl, kamā aʻāna ʻalá al-ibtidāʼ wa-al-iftitāḥ. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon of volume 2: "Tamma Kitāb al-ʻUmdah fī maḥāsin al-shiʻr wa-ādābih, taʼlīf Abī ʻAlī Ḥasan ibn Rashīq al-Qayrawānī al-Azdī, wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat ithnayn wa-miʼah baʻda al-alf [January/February 1691]. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naql hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq tisʻah khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻah wa-tisʻīn, min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [29 January 1882], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taḥīyah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-nufūs al-zakīyah, ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Qadīr, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, al-maʻrūf bi-al-Fayyūmī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. M." To the right of the colophon: "Qad qūbila hādhā al-kitāb bi-tamāmihi, al-juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī, ʻalá yad Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Dayrūṭī, ʻufiya ʻanhu wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Nihāyat al-arab fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻArab : manuscript / ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Miṣrī ... al-Makkī.
record.note: Copied from the author's autograph in A.H. 1250 (A.D. 1834).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa al-bulaghāʼ bi-wurūd mawārid al-adab fa-fāzū bi-ghāyah min al-maʼmūl wa-nihāyat min al-adab wa-al-ṣāḥah [wa-al-faṣāḥah], wa-salāmun ʻalá Sayyid Sādāt al-ʻAjam wa-al-ʻArab, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá, al-muṣaffá al-muhadhdhab, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-sādah al-ṭayyibīn al-nukhab, wa-aṣḥābihi al-qādah al-akramīn al-nujub, mā tarannama ṭāʼirun ʻalá ghuṣnin wa-aṭrab, wa-ihtazza jahbadhun li-ḥall ʻawīṣihi wa-aṭnab. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīqun laṭīf wa-tanmīqun sharīf ʻalá al-qaṣīdah ... al-mashhūrah bi-Lāmīyat al-ʻArab ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / lil-Shanfará. 2. Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / li-ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad. 3. Nashr al-ʻalam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / li-Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.

Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Wa-qad tamma kitābunā hādhā muḥarrarn muhadhdhaban, wa-muqarraran murattaban, sārran li-kull wadūd wa-ḍārran bi-kull ḥasūd, nahār al-Sabt al-mubārak, al-yawm al-rābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1173 [7 October 1759]."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-qad tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá yad aḥqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat Rabbih al-Jawwād, al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad Murād al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimyāṭī al-Ashʻarī al-Khalwatī, al-mujāwir Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām, ṣabīḥat al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah, thāmin ʻashar shahr Rabīʻ al-Ūlá sanat 1250 [25 July 1834], min nuskhat al-muʼallif, bi-ḥasb al-ṭāqah, kāna Allāh la-hu, wa-laṭufa bi-hi fī al-dārayn, wa-ikhwānihi al-Muslimīn, bi-ḥurmat Sayyid al-Mursalīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn." To the left of the Colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-03 Lāmīyat al-ʻArab : manuscript / al-Shanfará.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aqīmū banī ummī ṣudūra maṭīyikum // fa-innī ilá ahlin siwākum la-amyalu. Fa-qad ḥummati al-ḥājātu wa-al-laylu muqmirun // wa-shuddat li-ṭīyātī maṭāyā wa-arḥulu. Wa-fī al-arḍi manʼan lil-karīmi ʻani al-adhá // wa-fīhā li-man khāfa al-qilā mutaḥawwalu ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Nihāyat al-arab fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad. 2. Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / li-ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad. 3. Nashr al-ʻalam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / li-Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Fa-alḥaqtu ukhrāhu bi-ūlāhu mūfiyan // ʻalá qunnatin uqʻī mirāran wa-amthulu. Tarūdu al-arāwī al-ṣuḥmi ḥawlī ka-annahā // ʻadhārá ʻalayhunna al-mulāʼu al-mudhayyalu. Wa-yarkudna bi-al-āṣāli ḥawlī ka-annanī // min al-ʻuṣmi adhfá yantaḥī al-kayḥa aghfalu. Tammat bi-ḥamdi Allāh wa-ʻawnih."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam : manuscript / ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad.
record.note: Copied from the author's autograph in A.H. 1250 (A.D. 1834).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ʻalá ʻabdihi al-Furqān muḥtawiyan ʻalá asrār lā yuḥīṭu bihā insun wa-lā jān, munṭawiyan ʻalá ghāyatin min al-ījāz wa-nihāyatin min al-tibyān, wa-askata bi-hi al-maharah min fuṣaḥāʼ Qaḥṭān, wa-abhata bi-hi al-saḥarah min bulaghāʼ ʻAndnān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afṣaḥ man naṭaqa bi-al-Ḍād, wa-afṣaḥ man abāna lil-nās amra al-maʻāsh wa-al-maʻād ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

With: 3 other titles. 1. Nihāyat al-arab fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / li-ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad. 2. Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / lil-Shanfará. 3. Nashr al-ʻalam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / li-Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.

Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā īrādahu, wa-awḍaḥnā bi-hi murādahu, wa-fīhi tabṣirah li-man yatabaṣṣar wa-tadhkirah li-man yatadhakkar, fa-khayr al-kalām mā qalla wa-dall, dūna mā ashaba wa-amall. Wa-ʻalá Allāh al-karīm iʻtimādī, wa-ilayhi tafwīḍī wa-istinādī. Wa-qad tamma kitābunā hādhā ʻalá ghāyatin min al-taḥrīr wa-nihāyatin min al-taqrīr, jāmiʻan lil-qawāʻid al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-fawāʼid al-naqlīyah, khāmis Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-sabʻīn [26 January 1757], ʻalá yad muʼallifihi ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-lil-Muslimīn."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-qad tammat hadhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Jawwād, Muḥammad Aḥmad Murād al-Dimyāṭī al-Shāfiʻī al-Khalwatī al-Ashʻarī, al-mujāwir bi-Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām, wa-dhālika li-sabʻ ʻashar yawman maḍayna min shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1250, khamsīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda al-alf, min al-Hijrah [25 June 1834]. Wa-hādhihi al-nuskhah manqūlah min nuskhat al-muʼallif, raḥimahu Allāh. Fa-in tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Nashr al-ʻalam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq al-Ḥaḍramī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1175 (A.D. 1762).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mudabbir al-karīm al-mannān, al-munʻim bi-ījād [bi-al-ījād] wa-al-iḥsān, alladhī atqana al-ashyāʼ ghāyat al-itqān, ḥattá innahu laysa fī al-imkān abdaʻ mā [mimmā] kān, khalaqa al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-bayān, wa-anzala al-Tawrāta wa-al-Injīl min qablu hudan lil-nās, wa-anzala al-Furqān, wa-huwa al-Qurʼān alladhī aʻjaza bi-hu bulaghāʼ al-ins wa-al-jān, bi-afṣaḥ lughah, wa-aʻjab uslūb, wa-aqwam lisān, ʻalá Nabīyihi al-muṣṭafá min Hāshim, al-muṣṭafá min Quraysh, al-muṣṭafá min Kinānah, al-muṣṭafá min ʻAdnān ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Sporadic marginalia.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Nihāyat al-arab fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / li-ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad. 2. Lāmīyat al-ʻArab / lil-Shanfará. 3. Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam / ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Aḥmad.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihā yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, thāmin shahr Shawwāl, alladhī min shuhūr sanat 1175, alf wa-miʼah khamsah wa-sabʻīn [2 May 1762], ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, Muḥammad Hilāl al-Sharqāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn, bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidi[nā] Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-sallam. M."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Manẓūmat al-ʻAṭṭār : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī Quwaydir.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1293 (A.D. 1876).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Title supplied by a modern hand on flyleaf.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah badʼan wa-khatman. Ḥamdan li-man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-iltiqāṭ hādhihi al-laʼālī al-manẓūmah, wa-naṣabanā li-fatḥ khizānat al-ʻAṭṭār wa-qad kānat bi-al-misk makhtūmah. Aḥmaduhu idh fataḥa lanā kanz hādhihi al-jawāhir, wa-rafaʻa ʻan ḍamāʼirinā ṭillasm hātīka al-dhakhāʼir ..."
For al-ʻAṭṭār's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 720.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Considerable marginalia.

Author's Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi fī thālith Jumādá al-Ūlá, ʻām alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thamāniyah wa-khamsīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [12 June 1842], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-ashraf al-salām."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah ʻaṣr yawm al-thulāthāʼ, thālith shahr Shaʻbān al-mukarram, sanat 1293, alf wa-miʼatayn thalāthah wa-tisʻīn min Hijrat Sayyidinā Muḥammad [24 August 1876] ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Katabahu li-nafsihi wa-li-man shāʼa Allāh baʻdahu, rājī ʻafwa al-Malik al-Jalīl, Khalīl ʻUmar Ballāṭ ibn ʻUmar Khalīl ... naqalahu min nuskhat Ḥasan Rajab sibṭ al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah ... al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-shahīr bi-al-Saqqā ..."

record.title: 880-02 Jadhwat al-iṣṭilāʼ wa-ḥaqīqat al-ijtilāʼ : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Ibn ʻArabī al-Ṣūfī.
record.note: Copied in Damascus in A.H. 606 (A.D. 1209).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī minhu badʼ al-kull wa-bi-hi qiyāmuhā, wa-ʻalayhi kifāyatuhā, wa-ilayhi maṣīruhā. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tāba ʻalá al-tāʼibīn wa-jamaʻahum ʻalayhi, wa-aqbala ʻalá al-murtaddīn wa-jadhaba qulūbahum ilayhi, wa-satara aḥwāl al-ʻārifīn ʻan khalqihi wa-ʻan malāʼikatihi, wa-salaba al-muwaḥḥidīn min baynihim wa-akramahum ladayh, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waʻada fa-wafā itmāman li-niʻamihi, wa-awʻada fa-ʻafā iẓhāran li-karāmatihi, li-yaṣila al-muḥsin bi-riḍwānihi wa-yunjiʼ al-musīʼ bi-ghufrānihi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī. Leaves 1-8 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābatihi laylat al-Ithnayn, al-sābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanata sitt wa-sittimiʼah [26 October 1209], fī Ribāṭ Sumaysāṭī li-madīnat Dimashq, ḥamāhā Allāh taʻālá, ʻalá yad al-ḍaʻīf al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi wa-ghufrānih, Abū al-Faraj Yaʻqūb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Nahāwandī, tadhkiratan li-ṣāḥibihi al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-zāhid Najīb al-Dīn Jamāl al-Ṭāʼifah, muʻizz al-ghurabāʼ al-Abharī, dāma tawfīquhu, nafaʻahu Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn, wa-raḍiya ʻanhu wa-ʻan wālidayhi, wa-ʻan jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-raḥima Allāh man naẓara fīhi, wa-daʻā li-kātibihi, wa-li-ṣāḥibihi, wa-li-qārīhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt. [Wa-al-ḥamdu] lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn." On the left margin of the colophon: A collation statement: "Qābaltu wa-ṣaḥḥaḥtu ʻalá ḥasb ṭāqatī."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhaj al-sālik fī al-kalām ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / li-Abī Ḥayyān al-Naḥwī al-Andalusī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-Ustādh al-awḥad, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmh, shaykh al-nuḥāh wa-al-udabāʼ, nasīj waḥdihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi, Athīr al-Dīn Abū Ḥayyān Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAlī (alladhī fī Dustūr al-aʻlām baʻda ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf ibn) Ḥayyān al-Nafzī al-Andalusī al-Jayyānī maḥtidan al-Gharnāṭī manshaʼan wa-mawlidan, muqīm al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn: Ḥamd Allāh min awjab mā iftataḥa bi-hi al-insān, wa-aʻdhab mā naṭaqa bi-hi al-lisān ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Marginalia.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Wa-rafʻuhu al-ẓāhiru nizrun wa-matá // ʻāqaba fiʻlan fa-kathīran thabatā. Ka-an tará fī al-nāsi min rafīqin // awlá bi-hi al-faḍlu mina al-ṣadīqi. Yaqūlu yaqillu rafʻ afʻal al-tafḍīl al-ẓāhir, wa-hiya lughayyah ḥakāhā Sībawayh, fa-taqūlu marartu ..." On the left margin: "Intahá wa-kamulu mā wujida min al-kitāb ilá hunā."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-Būṣīrī : manuscript / Yāsīn ibn Zayn al-Dīn al-Shāmī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-bāqī al-qadīm, al-fattāḥ al-ʻalīm, alladhī madaḥa ḥabībahu Muḥammadan fī al-Qurʼān al-Karīm, wa-naʻatahu fīhi bi-annahu ʻalá khuluqin ʻaẓīm, arsalahu raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-manna bi-hi subḥānuhu, wa-la-hu al-niʻam allatī lā tuḥṣá ʻalá al-muʼminīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr li-raḥmat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, Yāsīn ibn Zayn al-Dīn al-Shāmī ..."
Title supplied by a modern hand on the flyleaf.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

The Lāmīyah of al-Būṣīrī starts with: "Ilá matá anta bil-ladhdhāt mashghūlu // wa-anta ʻan kulli mā qaddamta masʼūlu ..." and ends with: "... Mā lāḥa ḍawʼu al-ṣabāḥi fa-istatarra bi-hi // min al-kawākibi qindīlun fa-qindīlu."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-sharḥ yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, khamsat ayyām maḍat min Jumād al-Ākhir, sanat alf wa-thalāthmiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Muḥammadīyah [13 April 1883], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taḥīyah, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh taʻālá, wa-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, Muḥammad Jād al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nasākhat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-lil-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." To the right of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."
Foliation (every five leaves) in modern pencil.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Ḥadaq al-muqlatayn fī sharḥ baytay al-Raqmatayn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Wayghilān ibn Ghāzī ibn Mūsá al-Bijāʼī al-Maghribī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Wayghilān ibn Ghāzī ibn Mūsá al-Bijāʼī al-Maghribī: Waffaqanā Allāh wa-hadānā limā yurḍīh, wa-jaʻalanā min muktasibī al-ḥamd wa-muqtanīh, wa-kafānā min al-ḥasad wa-banīh, wa-ʻaṣamanā min al-zaygh wa-tawakhkhīh, wa-waqānā mā lam nakun nakhtashīh wa-natawaqqīh, wa-saddadanā limā naḥnu natakallamu fīh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lam azal mutaraddidan bayna yaday baytay al-Raqmatayn: Raʼat qamara al-samāʼi fa-adhkaratnī // layālī waṣlihā bi-al-Raqmatayni. Kilānā nāẓirun qamaran wa-lākin / raʼaytu bi-ʻaynihā wa-raʼat bi-ʻaynī ... Wa-sammaytu hādhā al-kitāb 'Ḥadaq al-muqlatayn fī sharḥ baytay al-Raqmatayn' ..."
The author's name is spelled ibn Waghīlān on leaf 1 recto, and as Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Zighlān in Brockelmann.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of blind-tooled green colored cloth.
Decoration: rubricated.

Author's colophon: "Qāla Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad: Wa-hunā jaffa al-qalam wa-janaḥ al-qawl lil-silm. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-sharrafa wa-karram, wa-ʻaẓẓama wa-majjad."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī tisʻat ayyām khalat min shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1300 min al-Hijrah al-Muṣṭafawīyah [18 March 1883], ʻalá muhājirihā azká al-taḥīyah." To the right of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Maghnāṭīs al-durr al-nafīs : manuscript / lil-Shihāb Aḥmad ibn Abī Ḥajalah al-Tilimsānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1302 (A.D. 1885).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Ammā baʻda al-ḥamd lillāh alladhī jaʻala min udabāʼ al-kuttāb man idhā suʼila ajāba wa-dakhala min buyūt shiʻrihi min bāb wa-kharaja min bāb mā inhalla al-saḥāb wa-tamassaka al-adīb bi-ahdāb al-ādāb ... Wa-sammaytuhā 'Maghnāṭīs al-durr al-nafīs' ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of green cloth.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Author's colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā waqaʻa ʻalayhi al-ikhtiyār, wa-ṭābat bi-hi li-Ibn Abī Ḥajalah ḥīna saqaṭa awṭār, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, shahr Shaʻbān al-mubārak, tisʻat ʻashar yawman khalat minhu, sanat thalāthimiʼah wa-ithnayn [wa-alf] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [3 June 1885], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-salām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-burhān fī maʻrifat ʻaqāʼid ahl al-adyān : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī al-Faḍl ʻAbbās ibn Manṣūr ibn ʻAbbās al-Saksakī al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awḍaḥa li-awliyāʼihi al-dalīl, wa-hadāhum bi-al-ḥujaj ilá aqwam sabīl, wa-jannabahum takhālīṭ ahl al-ahwāʼ, wa-aqāmahum ʻalá al-Sunnah al-bayḍāʼ, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad khātim al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-nujabāʼ al-atqiyāʼ. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lammā raʼaytu ahl al-ʻilm wa-al-Sunnah yaʼkhudhūna fī al-nuqṣān, wa-ahl al-ahwāʼ wa-al-madhāhib (al-fāsidah) yakthurūn fī al-aqṭār wa-al-buldān wa-yastamīlūna kathīran min al-juhhāl wa-al-ʻawāmm, wa-yahdumūna bi-talbīsihim qawāʻid al-Islām, aḥbabtu an ajmaʻa mukhtaṣaran adhkuru fīhi ʻaqāʼid al-thalāthah wa-al-sabʻīn firqah allatī dhakarahā Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Script: Coarse modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of green cloth (same binding as Landberg MSS 69).
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Fa-asʼalu Allāh ʻazza wa-jall al-ʻiṣmah wa-al-tawfīq, wa-an yahdiyanā limā yuḥibbuhu wa-yarḍāh, wa-yujannibanā al-ahwāʼ wa-al-bidaʻ wa-jamīʻ al-fitan, mā ẓahara minhā wa-mā baṭun, wa-an yuḥabbiba ilaynā al-īmān wa-yukarriha ilaynā al-kufr wa-al-fusūq wa-al-ʻiṣyān, innahu bi-al-ijābah jadīr, wa-Huwa ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn." On the left lower margin: A collation statement (in a different hand): "Balagh muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Maqqarīyah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Aḥmad al-Sandūbī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880) by Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa min māʼ al-ḥayāh insānan, wa-jaʻalahu li-ʻayn hādhā al-zamān insānan, wa-mallakahu arfaʻ al-marātib, wa-ballaghahu aqṣá al-maʼārib, wa-jaʻala la-hu min al-khawāṣṣ aʻwānan, wa-aqāma la-hu min al-qalb amīran, wa-min al-fikr wazīran, wa-min al-lisān tarjumānan, wa-min al-ḥiss ḥājiban, wa-min al-khayāl kātiban, wa-min al-quwá al-mudrikah khuzzānan ..."
For the author see Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 7965 (2).
Script: Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding in artificial brown leather. Spine label with manuscript number 71 and other descriptions.
Decoration: sparsely rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma naskhuhu ʻalá yad al-faqīr Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah ʻaṣr yawm al-Aḥad, 18 Shaʻbān, sanat 1297 [26 July 1880] min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Zurq al-asinnah fī al-dhabb ʻan al-Sunnah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq al-Qūṣī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻAbdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, kitābun uḥkimat āyātuhu thumma fuṣṣilat, wa-law kāna min ʻind ghayr Allāh la-wajadū fīhi ikhtilāfan kathīran. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá hidāyat ṣirāṭihi al-mustaqīm wa-iqtifāʼ qabīlih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá ḥimāyat al-subul al-mufarriqah ʻan sabīlih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā arād al-faʻʻāl limā yurīdu ityānan [ityānī] madīnat Khāʼīyah min Jazīrat Jarīd mārran ilá Iskandarīyah lam ajid ʻinda wuṣūlihā safīnatan bi-al-marām ḥarīyah, fa-awjaba dhālika al-iqāmah bi-hā ayyāman ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of green cloth.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-fī al-ākhir, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadiya lawlā an hadānā al-Qādir." To the left of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah al-shāfiyah lil-intiṣār lil-firqah al-nājiyah : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Shams al-Dīn ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah.
record.note: The date A.H. 1289 (A.D. 1872) is found on leaf 1 recto.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat la-hu bi-al-rubūbīyah jamīʻ makhlūqātihi, wa-aqarrat la-hu bi-al-ʻubūdīyah jamīʻ maṣnūʻātih, wa-addat la-hu al-shahādah jamīʻ al-kāʼināt. Innahu alladhī lā ilāha illā Huwa bi-mā awdaʻahā min laṭīf ṣanʻatih wa-badīʻ āyātih. Wa-subḥān Allāh wa-bi-ḥamdihi ʻadad khalqihi wa-zinat ʻarshihi wa-riḍá nafsihi wa-midād kalimātih. Wa-lā ilāha illā Allāh al-aḥad al-ṣamad alladhī lā sharīka la-hu fī rubūbīyatih, wa-lā shabīha la-hu fī afʻālihi, wa-lā fī ṣifātihi, wa-lā fī dhātihi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of blind tooled green cloth. Spine title gold tooled: I. Qayyim El Ganzīyeh Matn El Kafiyah etr.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Wa-laka al-maḥāmidu kulluhā ḥamdan kamā // yurḍīka lā yafná ʻalá al-azmāni. Milʼa al-samāwāti al-ʻulá wa-al-arḍi wa-al- // mawjūdi baʻda muntahá al-imkāni (laʻallahu al-akwāni). Mimmā tashāʼu warāʼa dhālika kullihi // ḥamdan bi-ghayri nihāyatin bi-zamāni. Wa-ʻalá Rasūlika afḍalu al-ṣalawāti wa-al- // taslīmi minka wa-akmalu al-īmāni. Wa-ʻalá Ṣaḥābatihi jamīʻan wa-al-ulá // tabiʻūhumu min baʻdu bi-al-iḥsāni. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi." Under the colophon: A collation statement: "Qābaltuhā ʻalá ḥasb al-imkān. Wa-anā al-faqīr ilá ʻawn Allāh al-Mannān, Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Sharḥ ʻUyūn al-ḥikmah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Rāzī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh. Qāla Mawlānā afḍal al-ʻālam, ustādh al-bashar, Fakhr al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, nāṣir al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, al-dāʻī ilá Allāh, al-hādī ilá al-ḥaqq, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Rāzī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: Allāhumma yā khāliq al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-yā fāṭir al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-yā nūr al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-yā qayyūm al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ ... wa-yā arḥam al-rāḥimīn asʼaluka suʼāl miskīnin mustakīn dhalīlin mahīn bi-ḥaqq ḥaqqika ʻalá kull aḥad, wa-bi-ḥaqq luzūm ʻubūdīyatika li-kull aḥad ..."
Script: Good modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding; artificial brown leather over pasteboards. Spine label with manuscript number 74 and further description.
Decoration: rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Qāla al-mufassir: Lammā bayyana fīmā sabaq anna maʻrifat al-ḥaqq tūjibu al-ladhdhah al-ʻaẓīmah, qāla fī hādhā al-mawḍiʻ inna fuqdān hādhihi al-maʻrifah sabab al-alam al-ʻaẓīm, wa-iḥtajja ʻalayhi bi-qawlihi inna fuqdān kull qūwat fiʻlahā al-khāṣṣ bi-hā min muʼlimātihā, wa-hādhā iʻādt al-maṭlūb bi-ʻibārah ukhrá, fa-yakūnu al-istidlāl bi-hi ʻalá ithbāt al-maṭlūb ithbātan lil-shayʼ bi-nafsihi, wa-huwa ..." At the right margin: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Ḥaydah : manuscript / li-ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Kinānī al-Makkī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 509 (A.D. 1116).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Dhikr mā jará bayna ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Yaḥyá al-Kinānī wa-Bishr ibn Ghiyāth al-Marīsī bayna yaday Amīr al-Muʼminīn al-Maʼmūn. Akhbaranā Abū ʻAlī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Sarīḥī al-Shamsār fī Darb al-Zaʻfarān bi-Baghdād, wa-al-Shaykh Abū al-Ḥusayn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Mukhlif al-nāsikh, qāl anā Muḥammad ibn al-Razzāz, qāl thanā Abū ʻUthmān Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Yazīd al-Daqqāq al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Sammāk ... Qāla ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz Yaḥyá al-Kinānī: Ittuṣila bī wa-anā bi-Makkah mā qad aẓhara Bishr bi-Baghdād min al-qawl bi-khalq al-Qurʼān wa-duʻāʼihi al-nās ilá muwāfaqatihi ʻalá qawlihi, wa-tashbīhihi ʻalá Amīr al-Muʼminīn al-Maʼmūn wa-ʻāmmat al-nās ..."
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Spine label with manuscript number 75.
Decoration: rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Fa-man aḥabb an yaʻlama annahu mā baqiya ʻalayya shayʼ illā qad ataytu ʻalayhi fa-li-yaqraʼ risālatī fī faḍl Banī Hāshim al-kabīrah, wa-yaqraʼ Kitāb al-Sunan wa-al-aḥkām, wa-Kitāb al-Iʻtidhār, fa-innahu yaqifu ʻalá diqqat fahmī wa-ḥusn intizāʻī wa-faḍl ʻilmī, jaʻala Allāh jamīʻ dhālika khāliṣan li-wajhihi wa-fī sabīl marḍātihi, innahu samīʻ al-duʻāʼ, faʻʻālun li-mā yashāʼ, lā ilāha illā huwa, al-ʻazīz al-ḥakīm. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Āmīn." Under it (in a different hand): "Bi-tārīkh thālith ʻashar Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam qadruhu, sanat tisʻ wa-khamsimiʼah [6 February 1116], wa-al-ḥmadu lillāh waḥdah." On the right margin (in a different hand): A collation statement: "Balaghat muqābalatan ḥasba al-ṭāqah ʻalá nuskhat al-muʼallif."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taqrīb fī ʻilm al-gharīb : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ... Maḥmūd ibn ... Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ... Khaṭīb al-Dahshah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1286 (A.D. 1869).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn.
