Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-arīb, al-fāḍil al-Faqīh al-Muḥaddith, Nūr al-Dīn, barakat al-Muslimīn, Abū al-Thanāʼ Maḥmūd ibn Sayyidinā al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻĀlim al-arīb al-bāriʻ, Shihāb al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī, Khaṭīb al-Dahshah, bi-Ḥamāh al-maḥrūsah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-athābahu al-Jannah, wa-lanā wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, bi-mannihi wa-karamih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ʻadīd naʻmāʼihi allatī lā tuḥṣá, wa-madīd ālāʼihi allatī lā tustaqṣá ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library half-binding of marbled blue and brown paper over red leather.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, arbaʻat ʻashar khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn sittah wa-thamānūn [24 June 1869] min Hijrat Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. M."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Wāḍiḥ al-mubīn fī man ustushhida min al-muḥibbīn : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī al-shahīr bi-Mughalṭāy.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 941 (A.D. 1535).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda al-shākirīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn. Shaká ilayya man athrat shakwāhu ithārat himmatī fī jamʻ hādhā al-kitāb min balāʼin ubtuliya bi-hi, wa-hawan hawá fīhi, wa-saʼalanī al-mubālaghah fī waṣf dawāʼ dāʼihi, fa-ahdaytu la-hu naṣīḥat wadīd li-awuddāʼihi, wa-qad ataytu bihā ʻalá ablagh tartīb, wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unīb ..."
Script: Minute naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library half-binding of green and pink patterned paper over red led leather. Modern paper label with manuscript label 77 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, rābiʻ shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat aḥad wa-arbaʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [19 March 1535]."

record.title: 880-02 ʻUqūd al-jumān fī akhbār al-zamān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Shāṭibī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, muḥaqqiq al-zamān al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn al-Maqqarī al-Fāsī, taʻahhadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs al-jinān, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-ʻulūmihi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn, wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsānin ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lammā raʼaytu kutub akhbār al-zamān kathīrah ikhtaṣartu minhā baʻḍ mā amkananī li-yakūna fīhi waʻẓ lil-muʻtabirīn wa-tadhkirah lil-muttaqīn wa-tabṣirah lil-mutakabbirīn, wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq wa-al-muʻīn ..."
Title from: Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 263.
Alternate title: al-Jumān fī mukhtaṣar akhbār al-zamān.
Compared with Landberg MSS 540. Wrongly identified by C. Landberg with al-Maqqarī's Katf al-mukhtaṣar fī akhbār al-mukhtaṣar (al-Baghdādī, Dhayl Kashf al-ẓunūn, II, 236).
Script: Modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black; leaves 1-10 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library half-binding with vellum over brown leather.
Decoration: Sparse rubrication.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... fa-qāma al-Ḥasan ibn Kannūn ibn al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim ibn Idrīs ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, fa-thāra bi-Qalʻat al-Ḥajar bayna Sabtah wa-Aṣīlah, fa-arsala ilayhim al-Ḥakam min al-Andalus min Qurṭubah fa-hazamahum al-Ḥasan, fa-jaddada al-Ḥakam jayshan wa-akthara la-hu al-amwāl, wa-qāla li-Ghālib mawlāhu sir bi-hādhā al-jaysh wa-man [sāra?] lā idhna la-hu fī al-rujūʻ illā manṣūran aw maytan, thumma radafahu Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Hāshim al-Tujaybī min Saraqusṭah bi-jaysh ākhar wa-ḥāṣara al-Ḥasan ibn Kaffūn ḥiṣāran ʻaẓīman ..."

record.title: 880-02 Niẓām al-gharīb : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... ʻĪsá ibn Ibrāhīm al-Rabaʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1298 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mukhrij al-ashyāʼ min al-ʻadam ilá al-wujūd, wa-jāʻilihā fī al-ikhtilāf wa-al-taghāyir jāriyatan ilá ajalin maḥdūd, wa-mufaḍḍil al-insān ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt min al-ḥayawān wa-al-jamādāt, bimā khaṣṣahu bi-hi min al-fikar al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-fiṭar al-fahmīyah, al-mumayyazah bayna rutbātihā, al-nāẓirah fī badāʼiʻ taṣawwurātihā, wa-mā faḍḍalahu bi-hi min al-nuṭq al-muʻabbir ʻan al-ḥaqāʼiq, wa-ibānat rutbat al-makhlūq ʻan al-khāliq, iẓhāran lil-ḥikmah wa-farqan bayna al-nūr wa-al-ẓulmah, wa-al-lisān adāt iẓhārihā ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Blind tooled green cloth over pasteboards. Title gold-tooled on spine: Niẓâm El-Ṛarie.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Karīm al-Wahhāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Ithnayn, al-muwāfiq [blank space] khalat min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1298 [(?) December 1880] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. M. ʻAlá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Khalīl Ibrāhīm, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi jamīʻ al-khaṭāyā wa-al-āthām bi-ḥurmat Walad ʻAdnān, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn." Under the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Risālat al-Sayyid al-Jalīl ʻAlī al-Qūṣī al-shahīr bi-Abī al-Ḥasan al-Baghdādī al-Mālikī ibn ʻAbd al-Sattār fī Masʼalat Qawlihi taʻālá Wa-ʻaṣá Ādamu Rabbahu fa-ghawá : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi [nastaʻīn]. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu rājī al-taḥrīr min riqq al-aghyār, al-faqīr Abū al-Ḥasan al-Baghdādī al-Mālikī ibn al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Sattār: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-nūr al-hādī al-mubīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Mawlānā Muḥammad al-nūr al-hādī al-mubīn, wa-ʻalá al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb al-rāddīn mutanāzaʻahum ilá muḥkam al-Sunnah wa-al-Kitāb mā saṭaʻat fī ufuq al-ḥaqq shumūs al-adillah ..."
The date A.H. 1260 (A.D. 1844) is mentioned in the preface.
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library half-binding of marbled brown paper over black cloth. Spine is gold tooled with title: Alî el-Qûsî Abu el-Ḥasan el-Baṛdâdî. All edges speckled.
Decoration: sparsely rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Qadīr, Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Ḥajjāj Muḥarram al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-ʻafá ʻanhu, wa-al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M." To the left of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-02 Talāqī al-arab fī marāqī al-adab : manuscript / dīwān ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣafatī al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1266 (A.D. 1850).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Min mumidd al-kawn astamiddu al-ʻawn. Inna aḥsan mā inʻaqadat ʻalá ikhtiṣārihi al-balāghah niṭāqan, wa-abhaj mā aḥāṭat bi-jīdihi qalāʼid al-faṣāḥah aṭwāqan ... ḥamd man ṣawwara al-adab shakhṣan sawīyan, wa-rafaʻahu ladayhi makānan ʻalīyan, fa-aṭlaʻahu fī samāʼ al-makārim badran, wa-naẓamah fī ʻiqd al-mafākhir durran ... Wa-sammaytuhu Talāqī al-arab fī marāqī al-adab ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound; quires held together by string. Modern paper used as front and back covers.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated.
Colophon: "Qad tamma hādhā al-kitāb fī sanat 1266, fī sādis ʻashar Dhī al-Ḥijjah [23 October 1850]. M.M.M."

record.title: 880-02 Talāqī al-arab fī marāqī al-adab : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣafatī al-Sharqāwī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Inna aḥsan mā inʻaqadat ʻalá ikhtiṣārihi al-balāghah niṭāqan, wa-abhaj mā aḥāṭat bi-jīdihi qalāʼid al-faṣāḥah aṭwāqan ... ḥamd man ṣawwara al-adab shakhṣan sawīyan, wa-rafaʻahu ladayhi makānan ʻalīyan, fa-aṭlaʻahu fī samāʼ al-makārim badran, wa-naẓamahu fī ʻiqd al-mafākhir durran ... Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Talāqī al-arab fī marāqī al-adab ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Patterned blue, yellow, and black paper three-quarter binding over red leather.
Decoration: rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Lisān al-falak : manuscript / [Ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻĪsá al-Rimmiyāwī].
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1299 (A.D. 1882).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adāra al-aflāk al-dāʼirāt wa-aṭlaʻa fīhā al-nujūm al-zāhirāt, wa-aẓhara min maknūn sirrihi laṭāʼif al-ishārāt, wa-jaʻala fī al-ḥurūf al-ḥarfīyah mawārid asrārihi al-ẓāhirāt, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-ʻadad, wa-aqāma bi-hā al-ṭabāʼiʻ al-basharīyāt, wa-aqranahā bi-kawākib muḍīʼāt, wa-khalaqa fīhā sirran li-yuẓhira lil-ʻārif dalāʼil al-wāqiʻāt fī ṭawāliʻ al-sinin wa-al-awqāt ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of green blind tooled cloth. Gold tooled spine title: Lisân El Jalak.
Decoration: Rubricated. With copious manuscript diagrams in the margins.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi ʻalá yad kātibihi Suwayfī Aḥmad al-Jabal al-ʻAdawī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, wa-wālidayhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, bi-tārīkh 23 Rabīʻ al-Thāniyah, sanat 1299 [14 March 1882] min Hijratihi, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-salām."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻaṣá : manuscript / taʼlīf ... al-amīr Abī al-Muẓaffar Usāmah ibn Murshid ibn ʻAlī ibn Muqallid ibn Naṣr ibn Munqidh.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1882).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-ʻalá aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-muttaqīn, wa-azwājihi al-ṭāhirāt ummahāt al-muʼminīn, ṣalātan dāʼimah ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-nafs tartāḥu limā samiʻat, wa-tuliḥḥu fī al-ṭalab idhā muniʻat ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library three-quarter binding. Brown marbled paper over artificial leather. Gold tooled spine title: Usâmah İ. Murśid, Le livre des batons.
Decoration: rubricated.

Colophon: "Qāla Mūʼayyad al-Dawlah, muʼallif hādhā al-kitāb, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Hādhā ākhir mā qultuhu wa-jamaʻtuhu, wa-allaftuhu wa-raṣaftuhu, fī dhikr al-ʻaṣá, wa-bi-hi najaza al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi bi-ḥamd Allāh yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq ghurrat shahr Allāh al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1300, alf wa-thalāthimiʼah [12 November 1882] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá muhājirihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn." To the left of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá al-ʻAqāʼid : manuscript / jumiʻat min taqrīr Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid, jumiʻat min taqrīr al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī. Qawluhu al-mutawaḥḥid, min al-tawaḥḥud, wa-min al-maʻlūm anna al-tawaḥḥud ʻalá wazn tafaʻʻul, wa-ṣifat al-tafaʻʻul taʼtī li-maʻānin, fa-taʼtī lil-istiqlāl, yuqālu tawaḥḥada bi-raʼyihi, ay, istaqalla bi-raʼyihi, wa-taʼtī lil-ṣayrūrah, min ghayr madkhalīyah lil-ghayr aṣlan, aw bilā madkhalīyah lil-ḥādith aṣlan, wa-in kāna al-qadīm la-hu madkhal ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 319; S II, p. 439.
Script: Coarse modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of artificial brown leather over pasteboards. Spine label with manuscript number 83 and further descriptive information.
Decoration: sparse rubrication.
Leaves 50-70 damaged by water.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Qawluhu thumma lā qāʼil bi-al-faṣl huwa bi-al-ṣād al-muhmalah, ay, bi-al-farq. Qawluhu lā aba la-hu, bayān li-kawnihi mujarradan. Qawluhu bi-annahu lā yastankifu min dhālika, ay min kawnihi ʻabdan lillāh, wa-qawluhu wa-lā man huwa aʻlá minhu fī hādhā al-maʻná, aʻnī kawnahu mujarradan. Qawluhu fa-lā dalālah, ilakh fī al-āyah, ʻalá mā iddaʻawhu min afḍalīyat al-malāʼikah ʻalá al-anbiyāʼ. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tamyīz : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Fakhr al-Dīn al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Maʻn.
record.note: Copied in Constantinople in A.H. 1097 (A.D. 1686).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻṭá kull shayʼ khalqahu thumma hadá, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Nabī al-raḥmah wa-al-hudá, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi maṣābīḥ al-dujá, mā ghāba najmun wa-badá. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat Allāh al-raʼūf, Ḥusayn ibn Fakhr al-Dīn al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Maʻn: Lammā kāna al-ʻilm bi-al-khayr lil-iktisāb, wa-bi-al-sharr lil-ijtināb, wa-istibānat al-khayr āmirah bi-hi, wa-istibānat al-sharr nāhiyah ʻanhu, wa-bi-ḥusn al-akhlāq wa-qubḥihā yakūn al-madḥ wa-al-dhamm wa-mā yatarattabu ʻalayhi ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap), flap missing; cover embossed with gilded central medallion. Modern paper label with manuscript number 84 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Two parallel series of foliation: one in modern pencil, one using Arabic numbers in red ink.

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min jamʻihi wa-taḥrīrih, wa-waḍʻihi wa-tasṭīrih, fī awāsiṭ shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, li-sanat sabʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-alf [November 1686]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qad tamma hādhā al-mukhtaṣar al-marghūb, baʻda tanmīq muʼallifihi, min nuskhatihi al-ṣaḥīḥah, min yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Ghanī, Ḥasan ibn ʻUthmān al-Banālaqawī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-al-jalī, fī al-Qusṭanṭīnīyah, fī awāʼil ʻushr al-akhīr min Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-madhkūrah, wa-lillāh al-minnah."

record.title: 880-02 Bulghat al-jāḥiẓ fī balāghat al-lāfiẓ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1023 (A.D. 1614).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaraʻa al-khalāʼiq bi-laṭīf ḥikmatih, wa-asbagha ʻalayhim sawābigh niʻmatih, wa-jaʻala arzāqahum wa-ājālahum jāriyatan ʻalá wifq mā sabaqa min irādatih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā alhama min maʻrifatih ḥamda man waqafa maʻa mashīʼatih wa-iʻtarafa bi-rubūbīyatih, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr khalqihi wa-barīyatih alladhī arshadanā li-ittibāʻ millatihi, wa-anqadhanā bi-hi min hūwat al-bāṭil wa-ẓulmatih, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurrīyatih. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb mimman albasanī min jamīl ṣanīʻihi aḥsana jilbāb an aḍaʻa la-hu rusūman min al-murāsalāt wa-nubadhan min al-mukātabāt ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Bulghat al-jāḥiẓ fī balāghat al-lāfiẓ' ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 534.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 1-8 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Loose in brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with dark brown central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi ḍuḥá yawm al-Jumʻah, ʻāshir shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn baʻda al-alf [22 March 1614] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá sākinihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-ashraf al-salām, wa-dhālika bi-manzil Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Qāḍī Aḥmad al-Nūbī, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, ʻAlam al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Shams al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Kūmī baladan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Azharī waṭanan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam, kullamā dhakarahu al-dhākirūn wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 al-Taqyīd wa-al-īḍāḥ li-mā uṭliqa wa-ughliqa min kitāb Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ : manuscript / Abū al-Faḍl ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-ʻIrāqī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 792 (A.D. 1390).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah, ḥāfiẓ ʻaṣrihi, amīr al-muʼminīn fī al-Ḥadīth, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-ʻIrāqī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhama li-īḍāḥ mā ubhima wa-afhama abī al-iṣṭilāḥ, wa-law shāʼa lam yufhim, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, al-kāshif limā yanūb min al-khuṭūb wa-yudhʹim. Wa-ashhadu anna muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-Rasūluhu afḍalu man anjada wa-atʹham, wa-aʻdal man anqadha wa-asʹham, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aḥsan mā ṣannafa ahl al-Ḥadīth fī maʻrifat al-iṣṭilāḥ kitāb ʻUlūm al-Ḥadīth li-Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ ..."
Script: Hasty naskhī, in red and black; a number of leaves supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript 86 and further information.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā tayassara jamʻuhu ʻalá kitāb ʻUlūm al-Ḥadīth, wa-Allāh taʻālá yanfaʻu bi-hi jāmiʻahu wa-qāriyahu, wa-man naẓara fīhi, wa-yublighunā min raḥmatihi mā nuʼammiluhu wa-nartiajīh, innahu ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr. Qāla muʼallifuhu ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tabyīḍ hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm al-Aḥad al-ḥādī wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat ithnayn wa-thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [24 February 1381]. Hādhā ākhir mā raʼytu bi-khaṭṭ al-muʼallif, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Wa-najaza hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak ʻalá yad aqall ʻabīd Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá ʻafwihi wa-maʻrifihi [wa-maghfiratih (?)] ʻUthmān ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad al-Barmāwī, fī yawm al-Khamīs, rābiʻ ʻashar shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat ithnayn wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [10 March 1390]. Wa-ḥasbiya Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 Jadhwat al-iqtibās fī nasab Banī al-ʻAbbās : manuscript / imlāʼ ... Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Ḥusaynī al-Zabīdī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1182 (A.D. 1769).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa qarābat Nabīyihi wa-faḍḍalahum ʻalá sāyir al-nās, wa-mayyazahum bi-mazāyā ʻalīyah wa-manāqib sanīyah, wa-khaṣṣa bihā ʻammahu al-ʻAbbās, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan tuzīlu al-ilbās wa-tūjibu al-īnās, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad ʻabduhu wa-Rasūluh, al-Nabī al-ṭāhir al-muṭahhar min daran al-arjās ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah waṣaltu fīhā jumlatan min nasab Banī al-ʻAbbās mimmā kuntu jamaʻtuhu sābiqan ... wa-sammaytuhā Jadhwat al-iqtibās fī nasab Banī al-ʻAbbās ..."
Script: Cursive hand.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label with manuscript number 87 and title information on back cover: Jad̲wat al-Iqtibās by Muḥammad Murtaḍā.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Edges of many pages folded.

Colophon: "Wa-ʻalá hādhā al-qadr waqaʻa al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-ikhtiyār min nasab ʻamm al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, fa-man arād al-ziyādah ʻalá dhālik fa-ʻalayhi bi-al-muṭawwalāt. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bi-niʻmatihi tatimmu al-ṣāliḥāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-barīyāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Faragha minhā muʼallifuhā fī majlisayn muftariqayn, ākhiruhumā al-ḍaḥwah min nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ, 26 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, khitām sanat 1182 [3 May 1769], khutimat bi-khayr wa-ilá khayr. Wa-raqamahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Ḥusaynī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taḥrīrāt al-Naṣrīyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Risālah al-Zaydūnīyah : manuscript / ṣannafahā ... Naṣr al-Hūrīnī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1279 (A.D. 1862).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī lammā ṭālaʻtu sharḥ Ibn Nubātah ʻalá al-Risālah al-musammá Sarḥ al-ʻuyūn fī sharḥ Risālat Ibn Zaydūn wajadtuhu kitāban yastaḥiqqu an yaʻtaniya bi-hi al-adīb, wa-yabdhula fīhi al-nafāʼis man la-hu fī ḥubb al-tārīkh naṣīb, li-kawnihi ḥawá ṭarāʼif al-adab, mā huwa ḥarīyun an yuktaba bi-al-dhahab, fa-naqashtu ʻalá wajanāt hāmish al-nuskhah allatī ṭālaʻtuhā baʻḍ ruqūm yaḥtāju ilayhā muṭāliʻuhā min taqyīdāt nāfiʻah wa-iṣlāḥāt ... wa-sammaytuhā 'al-Taḥrīrāt al-Naṣrīyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Risālah al-Zaydūnīyah' ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 726.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh al-masʼūl an yurḍiya ʻannī man la-hu qibalī ḥaqq, wa-an yusāmiḥanī ḥīna lā yanfaʻu al-ʻabd mālun wa-lā banūn. Wa-qad tamma yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, fī 25 Muḥarram, sanat 1279 [23 July 1862] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. In tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Talkhīṣ al-adillah : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Abī Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn Isḥāq al-Ṣaffār al-Bukhārī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh kamā huwa ahluhu, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Rasūlihi kamā huwa mustaḥiqquhu. Qāla al-ʻabd Abū Isʹḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn Isʹḥāq al-Ṣaffār al-Bukhārī: Bi-ḥamd Allāh abtadī wa-īyāhu astahdī limā fīhi min zalaf al-ʻājil wa-al-ājil. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Ammā baʻd, fa-inna ākhir mā ṣurifat ilayhi al-iʻānah wa-balaghat fī maʻrifatihi al-ghāyah ʻilm al-dīn alladhī irtaḍāhu Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-huwa dīn al-Islām, kamā qāla ʻazza wa-jall: Wa-raḍīytu lakumu al-Islāma dīnan, wa-qāla ayḍan: In al-dīn ʻinda Allāh al-Islām ..."
Script: Fair modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript number 89 and further title information.
Decoration: Rubricated. Text frame outlined in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb. Wa-Rabbunā al-maḥmūd, wa-la-hu al-makārim wa-al-ʻulā wa-al-jūd. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā alhama wa-ʻallama min al-ʻilmi mā lā naʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Yūsuf al-Ṣarṣarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir bi-khayr. Yā Karīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-fāḍil al-kāmil, al-ʻārif al-mukāshaf, lisān al-adab, ḥujjat al-ʻArab, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā, Yaḥyá ibn Yūsuf al-Mutabannī (bal al-Ṣarṣarī al-Baghdādī), qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu, yamdaḥu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Qāfiyat al-Hamzah. Subḥān man lil-wará fī arḍihi dharaʼa // wa-aḥsana al-ṣunʻa bi-al-itqāni idh baraʼa. Lā yakhtafī ʻanhu jamʻu al-khalqi qāṭibatan // ʻan ʻilmihi man ʻarāhu al-suqmu aw baraʼa ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Leaf 91 mutilated.

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." Under the colophon a collation statement (in a different hand): "Qūbilat ḥasba al-ṭāqah wa-al-qudrah. Qābalahā al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn (Sakar?) tārīkh thānī ʻashar Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [10 April 1330] lil-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan azwājihi, wa-aṣḥābihi, wa-tābiʻīhi, wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

record.title: 880-02 Riḥlah : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Shāmī.
record.note: Holograph. Unfinished.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Yā mufattiḥ al-abwāb ijʻal khayran ʻāqibat hādhā al-kitāb. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi riḥlah tataḍammanu al-akhbār allatī waqaʻat lanā fī muddat al-safar fī al-baḥr wa-al-barr bi-al-tadqīq, wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Innahu lammā arāda Allāh al-Karīm bi-tawzīʻinā li-ajl al-ʻaysh wa-al-naṣīb ilá al-tawajjuh lil-maḥallāt allatī jaʻala irādatahu fīhā sabab al-asbāb. Innahu karīmun tawwāb, fa-jarat al-maqādīr bi-idhn Allāh al-Qadīr, wa-inḥaṭṭat ārāʼ al-mashāhīr ..."
Script: Modern cursive.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript number 91 and title information.
Decoration: A folding drawing of the skeleton of a prehistoric animal is attached to leaf 85 verso.
Foliation in modern pencil. Pagination in modern pencil with Arabic numbers.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly as follows: "... wa-qad kunnā sābiqan akhbarnāhu ʻalá annanā nurīdu lanā wakīlan yaqīnā ḥaythu inna ibn al-wakīl muqīman bi-Trīstā baʻīdan ʻannā, wa-lā ʻalaynā al-rāḥah bi-dūn wakīl, wa-mā kunnā ikhtarnāh an yakūna wakīlan ʻalaynā huwa al-shahīr al-farīd fī jamīʻ Ūrūbā bi-al-nisbah ilá al-sharʻ (?) al-marḍī al-musammá Ūkītānskī, fa-awʻadnā annahu arsala jawāban ilá Miṣr bi-khuṣūṣ dhālika fa-lam (shāʼū?) illā baʻda rujūʻihi wa-al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalá ḥaqīqat al-akhbār, fa-tarajjaynānu an lā yansá dhālika, fa-ajābanā ʻalá mā qulnā la-hu, wa-ittafaqa ʻalá dhālika, wa-qad kunnā jahhaznā la-hu baʻḍ ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fayḍ al-mamnūḥ fī aḥkām al-rūḥ : manuscript / jamʻ ... ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-arwāḥ wa-al-ajsād thumma amāta wa-aḥyā, al-bāqī al-wārith alladhī lā yabīdu wa-lā yafná, al-khāliq al-bārī, al-muṣawwir alladhī khalaqa fa-sawwá, al-qāhir al-qādir alladhī aḍḥaka wa-abká, al-muḥyī al-mumīt, man minhu al-mubtadā wa-ilayhi al-muntahá, al-awwal bilā ibtidā wa-al-ākhir bi-lā intihá ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Fayḍ al-mamnūḥ fī aḥkām al-rūḥ ..."
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 317; S II, p. 437.
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 66-67 supplied by another hand.
Binding: Modern library binding in red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with 92 and title information.
Decoration: First four folios rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Text ends as follows: "... Khāmisuhā inna al-badan yaḍʻufu bi-al-riyāḍāt wa-al-rūḥ <wa-al-rūḥ> taqwá bihā, wa-kullamā zādat qūwat al-rūḥ ḍaʻufa ḥīnaʼidhin al-jasad wa-ʻaksuhu, wa-hādhā yūjibu al-maghāyarah baynahumā, idh law kānā muttaḥidayn la-ḥukima ʻalayhimā maʻan, bi-al-ḍaʻf aw al-qūwah, bi-ḥasb taghāyur al-muqtaḍayāt li-dhālika."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā jamʻahu fī hādhihi al-awrāq. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdahu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tanbīh ʻalá ghalaṭ al-khāmil wa-al-nabīh : manuscript / Ibn Kamāl Pāshā.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā min zumrat man ʻalim, wa-lam yajʻalnā min alladhīna yuḥarrifūn al-kalim, naḥmaduhu ʻalá mā sharrafa alsinatanā bi-al-lasan al-faṣāḥah, wa-ʻaṣamahā ʻan al-ityān bimā yūjibu al-faḍāḥah, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī afḥama bayānuhu al-badīʻ kulla khaṭīb, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi mā nāḥa al-ḥamām wa-gharrada al-ʻandalīb. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna awwal mā yajibu an yuʻlama, wa-awlá mā yubdhalu fīhi al-himam iqāmat al-lisān wa-ṣawnuhu ʻan al-hadhayān ..."
Attributed also to Muḥammad al-Birkawī.
Title appears (leaf 2 verso) as: al-Tanbīh ʻalá ghalaṭ al-ḥāmil (obviously an error for "al-khāmil") wa-al-nabīh.
Script: Fair 16th century nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown (maroon) leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with gilded central medallion.
Written on white and bluish-grey paper.
Considerable marginalia.
With: 1 other title. Collection of small pieces and notes on various subjects. Beginning with a Risālat raṣf al-ʻalam fī waṣf al-qalam (on reed pen) by ʻAlī Chalabī, known as Qinālī Zādah.
Colophon: "Tammat al-risālah al-sharīfah li-Ibn Kamāl Pāshā raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻah : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-ḥamdu yā man akrama al-insāna baʻdamā // hadāhu ilá al-taqwá wa-ʻallama bi-al-qalam. Tuʼllifu bayan al-Kāfi wa-al-Nūni āmiran // wa-tanqushu lawḥa al-kawni min dhālika al-raqam. Wa-suḥbun mina al-taslīmi yaskubu wabluhā // ʻalá marqadin fīhi al-murūʼatu wa-al-karam. Tajāfá ʻani al-aqlām ṭarfu banānihi // wa-qad nusikhat min dīnihi kutubu al-umam ..."
The date A.H. 987 (A.D. 1579) is found on leaves 14 recto and 15 recto.
For ʻAlī Chalabī see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 433; S II, p. 644.
Script: Fair 16th century nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown (maroon) leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with gilded central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Written on white and bluish-grey paper.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Jawāb al-kāfī fī suʼāl al-dawāʼ al-shāfī : manuscript / Shams al-Dīn ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin. Suʼila Shaykh al-Islām Shams al-Dīn ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah: Mā taqūlu al-Sādah al-ʻUlamāʼ aʼimmat al-dīn, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn, fī rajulin ubtuliya bi-balīyatin wa-ʻalim annahā in istamarrat bi-hi afsadat ʻalayhi dunyāhu wa-ākhiratahu, wa-qad ijtahada fī dafʻihā ʻan nafsihi bi-kull ṭarīq, fa-mā tazdādu illā taʻaqqudan wa-shiddatan, fa-mā al-ḥīlah fī dafʻihā, wa-mā al-ṭarīq ilá kashfihā ..."
Script: Good 14th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻawnihi wa-maʻūnatih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá ..."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat wāhib al-mawāhib fī bayān al-maqāmāt wa-al-marātib : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-ʻĀlamī al-Qudsī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-kāmil al-mukammal, muẓʹhir anwār al-kamāl, muẓʹhir asrār al-istikmāl bi-aṣdaq al-maqāl fī kull maqāmin wa-ḥāl, kahf al-ṭālibīn, dhukhr al-wāṣilaīn, Shaykh ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-ʻĀlimī [al-Ghānimī(?)] al-Qudsī, mattaʻanā Allāh wa-sāyir al-ṭālibīn al-ʻāshiqīn bi-fayḍ anwāʻ tajalliyātihi al-dhātīyah al-ikhtiṣāṣīyah al-barqīyah al-Muḥammadīyah, wa-abqāhu li-irshād al-mustarshidīn al-ṣādiqīn, bi-ḥaqq Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn ajmaʻīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī salaka bi-awliyāʼihi subul al-rashād ..."
Script: Modern (17th century) cursive hand, leaf 1 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label with manuscript number 95 and: 'Abd al-Laṭîf: Tuḥfat Wâhib al-Mawâhib.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb."

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-anīs fī ajnās al-takhāmīs : manuscript / li-wālid kātibihi, al-Shaykh ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salāmah al-Idkāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1186 (A.D. 1772).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla wālidī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-anzala ʻalá qabrihi saḥāʼib raḥmatih wa-wālá, al-maḥfūf bi-luṭf Rabbihi al-Salām al-Muʼmin, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salāmah al-Shāfiʻī al-Udkāwī al-Muʼadhdhin, saqá Allāh tharāhu shaʼābīb al-ruḍwān. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shaqqa lanā khamsan, wa-waḍaʻa ʻannā al-iṣr fa-jaʻala al-khamsīn khamsan, wa-jaʻala daʻāʼim al-Islām khamsan ... sammaytuhu bi-al-Rawḍ al-anīs fī ajnās al-takhāmīs ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding in red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript number 96 and title information.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Najaza al-Rawḍ al-anīs fī ajnās al-takhāmīs ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-jāmiʻihi wa-murattibihi min dīwān wālidihi, al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Qadīr, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salāmah al-Muʼadhdhin al-Shāfiʻī al-Udkāwī, lā zāla fayḍ Rabbihi al-Samāwī ʻalá jadathin ḍammahu thāwī, al-musammá dhālika al-dīwān Biḍāʻat al-arīb min shiʻr al-gharīb, wa-min dhayl al-dīwān al-madhkūr wa-min musawwadah bi-khaṭṭ wālidī ayḍan, afāḍ Allāh ʻalá qabrihi sijāl raḥmatihi fayḍan, wa-dhālika fī ṣabīḥat yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, ghurrata Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām al-mubārak, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah sittah wa-thamānīn [28 September 1772], aḥsana Allāh taqaḍḍiyahā, wa-bāraka fīmā baqiya min ayyāmihā wa-layālīhā, wa-anālanā al-khayr fīhā wa-al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Talkhīṣ al-talkhīṣ min tanāfī al-tanṣīṣ li-ʻiṣmat al-takhṣīṣ : manuscript / al-Shaykh al-Qūṣī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Bi-ḥamdika nastabṣiruka ṣirāṭ al-dīn, wa-bijjidika nastanṣiruka li-hidāyat al-dīn, muṣallīn ʻalá khulāṣat al-khulāṣah wa-ikhwānihi alladhīna faṭartahum ʻalá al-kamāl, wa-ijtabaytahum bimā takbū dūnahum jiyād al-ʻuqūl min taʻrifāt al-jalāl wa-al-jamāl ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad kuntu jamaʻtu risālatan bi-al-Balad al-Ḥarām fī wāqiʻat al-ṣafī Ādam, ʻalayhi al-salām, allatī ḍammanahā al-Mudabbir al-Ḥakīm kulla qurbah wa-zāda bihā qurbah, wa-qāla fīhā, kamā yuʻlamu, wa-ʻaṣá Ādamu Rabbahu, bi-al-wuqūf ʻalayhā yuʻlamu al-dāʻī ilayhā ... wa-sammaytuhu Talkhīṣ al-talkhīṣ min tanāfī al-tanṣīṣ li-ʻiṣmat al-takhṣīṣ ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Red leather binding, covered with black paper. With flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Wa-ufawwiḍu amrī ilayhi fa-aslam, wa-astaghfiruhu min kull maʼtham, innahu al-jawwād al-akram, wa-asʼaluhu hidāyata ṣirāṭihi al-aqwam, wa-aʻūdhu bi-wajhihi al-aʻẓam, an aqūla ʻalayhi, sīyamā fī Kitābihi al-Ḥakīm, mā lā aʻlam, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Asad wa-al-ghawwāṣ : manuscript : muʻāraḍat bāb al-asad wa-al-thawr min Kitāb Kalīlah wa-Dimnah / taṣnīf ... Abī al-Barakāt Naṣr ibn Salāmah al-Dimashqī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī taʻjazu al-alsun ʻan waṣfihi, kamā taʻjazu al-ʻuqūl ʻan kunhihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man daʻānā ilá mā yuḥyīnā bi-hi, wa-ʻarrafanā mā qaṣurat ʻuqūlunā ʻan maʻrifatihi, Muḥammad wa-ālihi, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Iʻlam inna al-ḥukamāʼ jaʻalat al-ḥikmah fī ḍimn al-akhbār, wa-ʻalá alsun al-ḥayawānāt, wa-fī athnāʼ al-ḥikāyāt, li-takhuffa ʻalá al-qulūb wa-tahushsha ilayhā al-asmāʻ, wa-zakhrafūhā bi-al-ṣuwar al-mūniqah wa-al-aṣbāgh al-rāyiqah, istijmāman li-nufūs al-ḥukamāʼ ʻinda al-malik, wa-tarwīḥan li-qulūb al-ʻulamāʼ ʻinda al-ḍajar, li-anna maḥmal al-jidd thaqīl wa-ṭarīquhu shāqqun baʻīd, wa-kāna dhālika minhum ka-fiʻl al-ṭabīb al-rafīq ..."
Copied in A.H. 950 (A.D. 1543).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: red leather binding covered in marbled paper. Type II (with flap). Manuscript number 98 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Asad wa-al-ghawwāṣ bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-mannih, wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Khamīs sādis ʻishrīn Rajab min sanat khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [4 November 1543]. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taṣrīḥ fī sharḥ al-Talwīḥ : manuscript / lil-Ṭabīb Luṭf Allāh al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Sporadic manuscript marginalia.
Copied in A.H. 954 (A.D. 1547).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-shāfī bi-luṭfihi min miʻḍilāt al-adwāʼ, al-muʻāfī bi-mannihi min al-ʻilal abdāna al-aḥyāʼ, al-muqaddir fī al-azal ajyāl al-bashar qabla kawnihim fī aṣlāb al-ābāʼ, al-mudabbir bimā sakhkhara min al-quwá bunyata dhawāt al-aʻḍāʼ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-sharaf al-ʻulūm bi-sharaf mawḍūʻātihā wa-wathāqat bunyānihā wa-jadwá ghāyātihā ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Taṣrīḥ fī sharḥ al-Talwīḥ ..."
Script: Fair small naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In light brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion. Modern paper label with manuscript number 99 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Sparse foliation in modern pencil.

At the back of the flyleaf: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Taṣrīḥ fī sharḥ al-Talwīḥ ilá asrār al-Tanqīḥ." "Kitāb al-Taṣrīḥ lil-Ṭabīb Luṭf Allāh al-Miṣrī fī sharḥ Kitāb al-Talwīḥ ilá asrār Tanqīḥ mughlaq al-Maknūn, li-ustādh al-aṭibbāʼ Fakhr al-Dīn al-Khujandī."
At the head of folio 1a: "Yā Kubaykij, yā ḥafīẓ."

On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs Luṭf Allāh al-Miṣrī, al-musammāh bi-al-Taṣrīḥ fī sharḥ al-Talwīḥ ilá asrār al-Tanqīḥ, lil-Shaykh al-Raʼīs Fakhr al-Dīn al-Khujandī, wa-mukhtaṣar hādhā min kitāb Tanqīḥ mughlaq al-Maknūn, wa-Tanqīḥ al-Mughlaq mukhtaṣar min al-Maknūn. Tamm."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi fī awākhir shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 954 [23 November 1547], aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Wa-kataba Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Qūṣūnī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-al-Muslimīn. Wa-al-multamas min al-nāẓir fī hādhā al-kitāb tamhīd al-ʻudhr fa-innahu kutiba min nuskhatin [space] jiddan, wa-lam yatayassar muqābalatuhu bi-aṣl muʻtamad. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-01 al-ʻIqd al-nafīs wa-nuzhat al-jalīs : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1124 (A.D. 1712).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-samīʻ al-baṣīr, al-qawī al-qadīr, al-ʻalīm al-khabīr, mubdī kull shayʼ wa-muʻīdih, mubdiʻ kull makān wa-mawjūdih, wa-muḥdith kull zamān wa-mubdīh, fa-lā taḥwīhi al-amākin wa-al-aqṭār, wa-lā tudrikuhu al-ʻuyūn wa-al-abṣār, wa-huwa yudriku al-abṣār, naḥmaduhu ʻalá mā awlānā min jamīl al-karam, wa-nashkuruhu ʻalá mā ātānā min jazīl al-niʻam ..."
On the title page the work is wrongly attributed to Plato.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black. Leaf 1 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.
With: 2 other titles. 1. Waṣīyah lil-imām ʻAlī karrama Allāh wajhahu li-waladihi al-Ḥusayn / ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib. 2. ʻUnwān al-saʻādah.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Ḍaʻf al-ʻayn yūrithu al-ʻathār wa-ḍaʻf al-raʼy yūlidu al-damā[r]. ʻAtharat al-rijl tuzill al-qadam wa-ʻatharat al-lisān tuzīlu al-niʻam. Īyāka wa-al-qabīḥ fa-innahu yuqabbiḥu dhikraka wa-yukthiru wizraka. Man al-rajul an yashkura sulṭānahu wa-in asāʼa ilayhi, wa-yunṣifa ṣadīqahu wa-in taḥāmala ʻalayhi. Man dāna taḥṣīn wa-man ʻadala tamkīn, fa-ijʻal al-dīn kahfaka wa-al-ʻadl sayfaka tanjaḥ min kull sūʼ wa-taẓfar ʻalá kull ʻadw. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Waṣīyah lil-Imām ʻAlī karrama Allāh wajhahu li-waladihi al-Ḥusayn : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Yā bunayy. Ūṣīka bi-taqwá Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall, fī al-ghayb wa-al-shahādah, wa-kalimat al-ḥaqq fī al-riḍá wa-al-ghaḍab, wa-al-qaṣd fī al-ghiná wa-al-faqr, wa-al-ʻadl fī al-ʻadw wa-al-ṣadīq, wa-al-ʻamal fī al-nashāṭ wa-al-kasal, wa-al-riḍá ʻan Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ ..."
Copied in A.H. 1124 (A.D. 1712).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
With: 2 other titles. 1. al-ʻIqd al-nafīs wa-nuzhat al-jalīs. 2. ʻUnwān al-saʻādah.
Colophon: "Tammat al-Waṣīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-01 ʻUnwān al-saʻādah : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-fāḍil ṭawluhu, al-shāmil faḍluhu, al-bāhir burhānuhu, al-qāhir sulṭānuhu, al-ʻamīm iḥsānuhu, al-ʻaẓīm imtinānuhu, al-jazīl ʻaṭāʼuhu, al-jamīl tilāduhu [?], al-mujbir karamuhu, al-mubīn niʻmatahu, alladhī tafarrada bi-dawām al-baqāʼ, wa-tawaḥḥada bi-al-thanāʼ al-mujāwiz ḥadd al-iḥṣāʼ, ḥamdan lā yablughu al-fahm madāh, wa-lā yudriku al-wahm muntahāh ..."
Copied in A.H. 1124 (A.D. 1712).
Of leaf 54 only a small stub remains.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label with manuscript 100 and further title information.
Decoration: Rubricated. Text frame outlined in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil.
With: 2 other titles. 1. al-ʻIqd al-nafīs wa-nuzhat al-jalīs. 2. Waṣīyah lil-Imām ʻAlī karrama Allāh wajhahu li-waladihi al-Ḥusayn / ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, sādis ʻishrīn Shaʻbān, sanat alf wa-miʼah arbaʻah wa-ʻishrūn [28 September 1712]. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Ibn Fahd al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1274 (A.D. 1857).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit. Text starts as follows: " ... Waṣalnā al-surá wa-hajarnā al-diyārā // wa-jīnāka naṭwī ilayka al-qifārā. Ataynāka naḥdū al-bukā wa-al-rikāba // wa-nabʻathu ithra al-qiṭāri al-qiṭārā. Idhā akhadhat hādhihi fī al-rubā // ṣuʻūdan abá dhāka illā inḥidārā. Wa-in fāḍa māʼun li-farṭi al-ḥanīn // wa-rajjaʻa ḥādī al-surá ʻāda nārā ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 42.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding in red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript title: Dîwân of Ibn Fahd al-Ḥalabî. 101.
Decoration: Rubricated and text frame outlined in red ink.

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu [lillāh] ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-niʻma al-naṣīr. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi fī yawm al-Khamīs, thānī yawm fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1274 [21 October 1857]. M." Under the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá al-manqūl minhu ḥarfan bi-ḥarf, wa-lā aḍmanu al-ṣiḥḥah idhā lam yuqābal ʻalá aṣlin thānin. Katabahu ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Nāfiʻ, sanat 1274 Hijrīyah."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Ifṣāḥ ʻan al-rūḥ : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn [ʻAbd] Allāh al-Jabbāb al-Tamīmī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 554 (A.D. 1159).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir amrī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh, al-Imām al-Awḥad, Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jabbāb al-Tamīmī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhama qulūbanā[?] niʻamahu fa-nahaḍat bi-ḥamdihi wa-al-thanāʼ ʻalayhi, bal al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī [...] lanā fī aʻmāl jawāriḥinā wa-alsinatinā ʻalá mā iqtaraftahu bi-al-shukr la-hu wa-al-taqarrub ilayhi, bal al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā tafaḍḍala bi-hi min al-mazīd ʻalá al-shukr maʻa mā jará minnā min al-taqṣīr fīhi, bal al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá tasmiyatihi lanā bi-al-shākirīn li-anʻumihi ..."
Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, gives the author's name as: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī al-Ḥasan ibn Ḥubāb, and the title as: Kitāb al-rūḥ.
Some leaves, including title, damaged; lacuna between leaves 39 and 40.
Occasional marginal notes.
Script: Fair Yemenite naskhī, partly unpointed.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with decorative design; dark red leather on the spine of the flap.
Decoration: None.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Furigha min naskhihi, wa-lillāh al-minnah, wa-dhālika ṣabīḥata yawm al-Aḥad, al-rābiʻ ʻashar min Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat arbaʻ wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah [12 April 1159]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn wa-aṣḥābihi al-muntajibīn, wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim kathīran."

record.title: 880-02 Nukhbat al-fikar fī tathqīf al-naẓar : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sālim ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sālim ibn Wāṣil.
record.note: Copied in Ḥamāh (Syria) in A.H. 680 (A.D. 1281).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī afāḍa ʻalá qulūb dhawī al-albāb nūr hidāyatih, wayassara lahum bimā manaḥahum min al-barāhīn al-wuṣūl ilá maʻrifatih ḥattá taḥaqqaqū bi-qawāṭiʻ al-adillah wujūb dhātih fī abadīyatih wa-azalīyatih, wa-tayaqqanū bi-fardihi bi-al-ulūhīyah, wa-annahu lā mumāthila la-hu fī waḥdānīyatih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā asdāhu ilaynā min niʻmatih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá mā khaṣṣanā bi-hi maʻshar al-bashar min karāmatih, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu shahādata muqirrin bi-aḥadīyatih wa-ṣamadīyatih ..."
Script: Fair cursive naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); front cover missing; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Sparsely rubricated.

Author's colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā naqṣudu īrādahu fī hādhā al-mukhtaṣar, fa-fīhi al-ghāyah li-man la-hu istiʻdād wa-akhadhat al-faṭānah bi-yadihi, wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb bi-mannihi."

Copyist's colophon: "ʻAllaqahu li-nafsihi aḍʻaf ʻabīd Allāh, al-muḥtāj ilá ʻafwihi wa-karamih, Yūsuf ibn Ghanāʼim ibn Isḥāq al-Sāmirī al-Isrāʼīlī al-Yūsufī. Wa-intahá min taʻlīqihi yawm al-Khamīs, ḥādī ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat thamānīn wa-sittimiʼah [6 August 1281], min nuskhatin nuqilat min musawwadāt al-muṣannif, fasaḥa Allāh ajalah, wa-ballaghahu fī al-dārayn amalah, bi-mannihi wa-luṭfihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá sāʼir rusulih, bi-Ḥamāh al-maḥrūsah."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ mā istaghlaqa min alfāẓ Kitāb al-Jumal : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sālim ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sālim ibn Wāṣil.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. ʻAwnuka Allāhumma. Aḥmadu Allāh ḥamdan yalīqu bi-jalālih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī kuntu ʻazamtu ʻalá ṣarf ʻinān al-ʻināyah ilá sharḥ Kitāb al-Jumal li-Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Afḍal al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Nāmāwar ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Khūnajī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-barrada maḍjiʻahu, li-taʻassur fahmihi wa-istighlāq naẓmihi, wa-iḥtiwāʼihi maʻa farṭ ījāzihi ʻalá al-maʻānī al-kathīrah wa-al-fawāʼid al-jammah al-ghazīrah, wa-wajdtu ʻulamāʼ ʻaṣrinā ʻājizīn ʻan taṣawwur maʻānīhi ..."
Copied apparently by the same scribe as Landberg MSS 103 which is dated A.H. 680 (A.D. 1281).
Considerably worm-eaten.
Script: Fair cursive naskhī.
Binding: Modern library three quarter binding of marbled brown paper over brown/red cloth. Paper label with manuscript number 101.
Colophon: No colophon. Script is illegible at the end of the text.
Decoration: None.
Certain pages foliated in modern pencil.

record.title: 880-02 al-Faḍāʼil al-bāhirah fī maḥāsin Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah : manuscript / li-Mawlānā ... Ibn Ẓahīr[ah].
record.note: Copied about 1700.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fāwata bayna al-bilād fī faḍlihā wa-ṣifātihā, wa-jaʻala li-kullin minhā mazāyā mukhtaṣṣah bi-hā dūna akhawātihā, wa-dhālika min badīʻ ḥikmatihi al-bāhirah fī dhātihā li-allā tujmiʻu al-nās ʻalá baldatin wāḥidah bi-taʻṭīl akhawātihā, fa-awdaʻa fī qulūbihim ḥubb al-awṭān li-ʻimāratihā, wa-jaʻalahu al-Shāriʻ min al-īmān li-ʻināyātihā ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Faḍāʼil al-bāhirah fī maḥāsin Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah ..."
Brockelmann calls this an extract from Ibn Iyās, but Gotha catalog and India Office catalog say nothing about it (the Gotha manuscript is a holograph).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 1 verso.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated and text frame outlined in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "Wa-hādhihi qaṭratun min baḥr, wa-nasʼalu Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, al-tawfīq li-marḍātihi, wa-natūbu ilayhi min jamīʻ al-dhunūb wa-al-zallāt, wa-nasʼaluhu al-ʻafw wa-al-ʻāfiyah, wa-dukhūl al-jannāt, wa-al-naẓar ilá wajhihi al-karīm, wa-an yakhtuma lanā bi-khayr fī ʻāfiyah, bilā miḥnah, wa-an yumītanā ʻalá al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah, innahu ʻalá dhālika qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-bāṭinan wa-ẓāhiran. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Tamm. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Mughrib : manuscript / lil-Muṭarrizī.
record.note: Copied in Medina about 1700.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-aḥmaduhu ʻalá an khawwala jazīl al-ṭawl wa-saddada al-iṣābah fī al-fiʻl wa-al-qawl, fa-arshada ilá manāhij al-hudá, wa-anqadha min madārij al-radá, ḥamda man waffaqa li-iṣlāḥ mā fasada, wa-tanfīq mā kasada, wa-raqʻ mā kharaqat aydī al-taḥrīf, wa-raqʻ mā fataqat alsun al-taṣḥīf. Wa-uṣallī ʻalá man darrat la-hu ḥalūbat al-balāghah, wa-ghurizat fī ʻahdihi akhlāf al-faṣāḥah ..."
Script: Minute calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 1 verso.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with decorative design.
Decoration: Rubricated. Text frame outlined in blue ink and gold.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb, wa-al-ḥamd li-Rabb al-Arbāb, wa-qad ittafaqa al-farāgh min naskhihi wa-taṣḥīḥihi, baʻda al-ʻuthūr ʻalá kināyātihi wa-ṣarīḥihi, fī shuhūr sanat thamān wa-sabʻīn wa-khamsimiʼah [1182/1183]. Tamma taḥrīruhu fī al-Madīnah al-Nabawīyah, maḥaṭṭ al-Hijrah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalawāt, ʻalá yad dhalīl ḥaqīr, khādim ʻilm sharīf, Saʻīd ibn Muḥammad al-Mahmāʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-man kutiba la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhimā, wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. al-Khaṭṭu yabqá zamānan baʻda kātibihi, wa-kātibuhu ramīmun fī al-turāb."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Mufaḍḍalīyāt : manuscript / Mufaḍḍal ibn Muḥammad al-Ḍabbī.
record.note: Copied by a Persian scribe in A.H. 1097 (A.D. 1686).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Qāla taʼabbaṭa Sharran, wa-ismuhu Thābit ibn Jābir ibn Sufyān ibn ʻAdī ibn Kaʻb ibn Ḥarb ibn Taym ibn Saʻd ibn Fahm ibn ʻAmr ibn Qays ibn Ghaylān ibn Muḍar ibn Nizār ibn Maʻadd ibn ʻAdnān: Yā ʻaydu mā laka min shawqin wa-īrāqi // wa-marra ṭayfun ʻalá al-ahwāli ṭarrāqi ..."
Inserted in front is Charles Lyall's "A projected edition of the Mufaddaliyat," reprinted from Journal of the Royal Society, April 1904. Lyall misread the date of this manuscript as A.H. 1067.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Marbled paper half binding over brown leather.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Najazat jumlat al-Mufaḍḍalīyāt wa-al-Aṣmaʻīyāt bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad wa-ālihih, wa-salāmuhu ... ʻan yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād ʻAbd al-Laṭīf Luṭfī, fī sanat sabʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-alf [1685/1686]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Jawāhir al-qulūb fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad al-Baghawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1059 (A.D. 1649).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāfiyah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla ḥaddathanā al-Shaykh al-ajall jamāl al-Sunnah, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Baghawī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, akhbaranā Abū Naṣr ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Khāqānī, raḥimahu Allāh, qāla akhbaranā al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ Ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAṭṭār al-Rāzī, qāla ḥaddathanā Marzabān Abū ʻAlī ..."

The title, as above, appears on leaf 1 recto; the sub-title "fī al-taṣawwuf", however, is erroneous, and the work is identical with the Kitāb fī al-Ḥadīth (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 625).
al-Mawāʻiẓ al-majmūʻah is identical with the Ṣuḥuf Ibrāhīm wa-Mūsá, cf. Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 10355.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title. al-Durr al-thamīn al-manẓūm fī mā warada fī Miṣr wa-aʻmālihā bi-al-khuṣūṣ wa-al-ʻumūm / ʻAlī ibn Dāʼūd al-Jawharī al-Ḥanafī.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Durr al-thamīn al-manẓūm fīmā takhtaṣṣu bi-hi Miṣr bi-al-khuṣūṣ wa-al-ʻumūm : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Dāʼūd al-Jawharī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1059 (A.D. 1649).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Min mumidd al-kawn astamiddu al-tawfīq wa-al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal al-ākhir, al-bāṭin wa-al-ẓāhir, wa-huwa bi-kull shayʼin ʻalīm, khāliq kull shayʼ wa-mufnīhi, wa-muʻīdu kull shayʼ wa-mubdīhi, wa-huwa al-hādī ilá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, qaddara mā kāna wa-mā yakūn, wa-dabbara khalqahu fī kull ḥarakah wa-sukūn, wa-huwa al-Ilāhu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa, la-hu al-ḥamd fī al-ūlá wa-al-ākhirah, wa-la-hu al-ḥukm wa-ilayhi tarjiʻūn ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather with paper label on spine. Manuscript note on bottom edge.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title. Jawāhir al-qulūb / Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Baghawī.

Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-ʻalá aṣḥābihi al-ʻiẓām, wa-ālihi al-kirām, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn bi-ṭūl al-dawām. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak fī sādis ʻasharī shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, iftitāḥ ʻām 1059 [30 January 1649] khutimat bi-al-khayr. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Lubāb al-ṭālibīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Suḥaymī al-Azharī al-Ḥusaynī.
record.note: Holograph, written, according to the colophon, in A.H. 1101 (A.H. 1690).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa lil-Ḥadīth ʻibādahu al-abrār, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-akhyār. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Suḥaymī al-Azʹharī al-Ḥusaynī: Hādhā sharḥun mukhtaṣar ʻalá Arbaʻīn al-quṭb al-Nabawī Ibn Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Dīn al-Nawawī saʼalanī fīhi ibn al-ʻamm al-nabīl fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālika, ṭāliban min Allāh al-ikhlāṣ wa-al-tasʹhīl, wa-sammaytuhu 'Lubāb al-ṭālibīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn', wa-ʻalá Allāh al-ittikāl, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 328; S II, p. 456.
The date may be an error; the author may have omitted the cipher for tens.
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In decorated paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-sharḥ ʻalá yad muʼallifihi Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Suḥaymī al-Qurashī fī Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat iḥdá́ wa-miʼah wa-alf [March/April 1690] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-salām, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Jiwār al-akhyār fī Dār al-Qarār : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Abī Ḥajalah al-Tilimsānī.
record.note: Copied about 1700.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala ḥusn al-jiwār min shiyam al-akhyār, wa-aqarra bihim ʻuyūn man jāwarahum fī Dār al-Qarār, wa-ṭarada ʻan qubūrihim al-waḥshata mā ṭarada al-layl al-nahār, kamā warada fī ḥaqq ṣaghīrihim wa-kabīrihim, laysa ʻalá ahl Lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥshatun fī qubūrihim ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Jiwār al-akhyār fī dār al-qarār' ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In light brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication throughout. Text frame outlined in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil on every five leaves.

Colophon: Text ends with a panegyrical poem in praise of the Prophet, as follows: "... Hādhī al-makārim lā qaʻbāni min labanin // wa-al-jūdu lā mā ruwī ʻan Kaʻbin aw Harami. ʻAlayhi minnī salāmun dāʼiman abadan // mā zāna naẓma qaṣīdī ḥusnu mukhtatami. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman abadan."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-sārī li-maʻrifat khabar Tamīm al-Dārī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1018 (A.D. 1609).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá naʻmāʼihi, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Nabīyinā Muḥammad khātim anbiyāʼihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-tābiʻī hadyihim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi maqālah wajīzah, wa-tuḥfah sanīyah ʻazīzah, sammaytuhā 'Ḍawʼ al-sārī li-maʻrifat khabar Tamīm al-Dārī', raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, wa-Allāh asʼalu al-tawfīq ilá sawāʼ al-ṭarīq, bi-mannihi wa-karamih ..."
Collated by Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah about A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1882 or 1883).
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.

With: 2 other titles. 1. al-Dhahab al-masbūk fī dhikr man ḥajja min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-mulūk / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī. 2. Kitāb al-Nizāʻ wa-al-takhāṣum fīmā bayna Banī Umayyah wa-Banī Hāshim / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-kataba hādhihi al-nuskhah faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-Fattāḥ, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Mallāḥ, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, bi-Muḥammadin wa-ālihi. Āmīn. Min nuskhatin muṣaḥḥaḥah bi-khaṭṭ muʼallifihā. Wa-hādhihi wa-mā qablahā katabahum al-faqīr khams mirār, wa-dhālika fī thāmin Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat thamāniyah ʻashar wa-alf [9 August 1609]." To the right of the colophon: A collation statement: "Ṭālaʻahā faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah, ʻufiya ʻanhu."

record.title: 880-02 al-Dhahab al-masbūk fī dhikr man ḥajja min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-mulūk : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn al-Maqrīzī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1018 (A.D. 1609).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-bi-hi al-mustaʻān ʻalá kull mā ʻazza wa-hān. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Nabīyinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn, ṣalātan bāqiyah ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-asʼlu Allāh mubtahilan ilayhi, māddan yadayya la-hu, an yutbiʻa ayyām al-maqarr al-makhdūm bi-akhawātihā al-bāqiyāt al-ṣāliḥāt wa-al-ziyādāt al-fāriṭāt, li-yakūna kull dahrin yastaqbiluhu wa-amalin yastaʼnifuhu mūfiyan ʻalá <ʻalá> al-taqaddum la-hu, qāṣiran ʻan al-mutaʼkhkhir ʻanhu, wa-yuʼtiyahu min al-ʻumr aṭwalahu wa-abʻadahu ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Dhahab al-masbūk fī dhikr man ḥajja min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-mulūk' ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Unbound.

With: 2 other titles. 1. Ḍawʼ al-sārī li-maʻrifat khabar Tamīm al-Dārī / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī. 2. Kitāb al-Nizāʻ wa-al-takhāṣum fīmā bayna Banī Umayyah wa-Banī Hāshim / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Katabahu faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-Fattāḥ, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Mallāḥ, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, bi-Muḥammadin wa-ālihi. Āmīn. Fī yawm al-Jumʻah, khāmis Jumādá al-Thānī, sanat thamāniyah ʻashar wa-alf [5 September 1609]. Wa-hādhihi wa-mā qablahā katabahum al-faqīr bi-khaṭṭihi khams mirār. Raḥima Allāh man qaraʼa wa-daʻá la-hu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Nizāʻ wa-al-takhāṣum fīmā bayna Banī Umayyah wa-Banī Hāshim : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Maqrīzī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1018 (A.D. 1609).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-muʻṭī mā shāʼa man shāʼa, lā māniʻa li-ʻaṭāʼihi wa-lā rādda li-murādihi wa-qaḍāʼihi, aḥmaduhu bimā Huwa ahluhu min al-maḥāmid, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá faḍlihi al-mutazāyid. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu wa-lā muʻānid ... Ammā baʻd, fa-innī kathīran mā kuntu ataʻajjabu min taṭāwul Banī Ummayah ilá al-khilāfah, maʻa buʻdihim min jadhm Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-qurb Banī Hāshim, wa-aqūlu kayfa ḥaddathathum anfusuhum bi-dhālika ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Unbound.

With: 2 other titles. 1. Ḍawʼ al-sārī li-maʻrifat khabar Tamīm al-Dārī / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī. 2. al-Dhahab al-masbūk fī dhikr man ḥajja min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-mulūk / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maqrīzī.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Katabahu faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-Fattāḥ, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Mallāḥ, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu bi-Muḥammadin wa-ālihi. Āmīn. Fī awāʼil Shaʻbān, sanat 1018 [30 October 1609]. Wa-hādhihi wa-mā qablahā min al-rasāʼil katabahum al-faqīr khams mirāra." On the left margin: An annotation statement: "Ṭālaʻahu al-faqīr Ramaḍān Ḥalāwah min awwalihi ilá ākhirihi."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb fī Marsūm khaṭṭ al-Muṣḥaf : manuscript / ikhtiṣār ... al-muqriʼ al-naḥwī Ibn [sic] al-Ṭāhir Ismāʻīl ibn Ẓāfir al-ʻUqaylī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Awwal mā abdaʼu baʻda ḥamd Allāh taʻālá ʻalá niʻamihi allatī lā tuḥṣá bi-ʻadd wa-lā taqifu ʻinda ḥadd, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi al-Muṣṭafá al-Mukhtār wa-ālihi al-Sādah al-aṭhār wa-ṣaḥbihi al-akramīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn, al-taslīm li-man taqaddamanā bi-al-faḍl wa-al-shahādah bi-al-siyādah wa-al-nubl ..."

C. Landberg suggested that the author may possibly be identical with Ismāʻīl ibn Khalaf al-Muqriʼ (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 591; Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 407; S I, p. 720).
Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur (S I, p. 721) lists a Mukhtaṣar mā rusima fī al-Qurʼān al-Sharīf (Cairo catalog, I, 27), perhaps the same work.
Marginalia.
Script: Old (13th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper-covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamma wa-kamula bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."

record.title: 880-02 al-Muqtaḍab min Kitāb al-shuʻab. Al-Mujallad al-thānī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Hilāl al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 760 (A.D. 1358-1359).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl fī taʻallum al-Qurʼān. ʻAn ʻUthmān qāla, qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Afḍalukum man taʻallama al-Qurʼān wa-ʻallamahu. Akhrajahu al-Bukhārī. Wa-fī riwāyah: Inna afḍalakum. Wa-fī riwāyah: Khayrukum man taʻallama al-Qurʼān wa-ʻallamahu. Akhrajahu al-Bukhārī ..."
Script: Cursive naskhī, in red and black, partly unpointed.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label on spine with manuscript number 113.
Foliation in modern pencil every 10 leaves.
Volume I wanting.
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 130-131.

Colophon: "Ikhtiṣār kātibihi, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. ʻAllaqahu fī muddatin awwaluhā al-ʻishr al-awwal min Muḥarram wa-ākhiruhā al-thālith ʻashar min Ṣafar, min shuhūr sanat sittīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [20 December 1358-22 January 1359] bi-al-Madrasah [... ... ...] wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl." Under the colophon (in another hand): "Ikhtiṣār kātibihi Abī Maḥmūd Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Maqdisī al-Shāfiʻī ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Wa-katabahu Ibrāhīm waladuhu [... ... ...] ghafara Allāh la-hu. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Fī khāmis ʻashar shahr Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thalāth wa-sabʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [29 February 1372]."

record.title: 880-02 Rushd al-labīb ilá muʻāsharat al-ḥabīb : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Falītah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1269 (A.D. 1853).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-salāmuhu. al-Ḥamdu lillāh istiftāḥan bi-dhikrihi, wa-istinjāḥan bi-shukrihi, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad muballigh amrihi wa-nahyihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī taṣdīqihi wa-naṣrihi, wa-sharrafa wa-karram, wa-majjada wa-ʻaẓẓam. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī lammā naẓartu ilá wujūb shukr al-munʻim wa-tikrār iḥsānihi ʻalá al-muqill al-muʻdam, istaʼdhant sayyid mulūk al-arḍ wa-hizabrahā, wa-majmaʻ al-faḍāʼil wa-baḥrahā, bi-an ataqarraba ilá wujūdihi bi-jiddī wa-hazalī ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated. Text frame outlined in red ink.
Pagination in Arabic numbers in ink. Second series of pagination in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻalá yad ʻabdihi al-muḥtāj ilá karamihi wa-ghufrānih al-ʻamīm, wa-al-rājī Rabbahu al-Mannān al-Karīm, al-Sayyid Muḥammad ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm al-Miṣrī mawlidan wa-manshaʼan, al-muqīm bi-Ṭarābulus al-Gharb ḥālan, wa-dhālika fī awāsiṭ Rabīʻ al-Thānī, min sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻah wa-sittīn [26 January 1853], ghafara Allāh li-muʼallifihi, wa-li-kātibihi, wa-qāriʼihi, wa-kull man qāla Āmīn, bi-jāh Imām al-Anbiyāʼ wa-al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, mā ibtalaja al-iṣbāḥ wa-ashraqa al-badr wa-lāḥ, wa-sallama taslīman. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Adab al-dīn wa-al-dunyā : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-Ḥasan al-Māwardī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 708 (A.D. 1309).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh, ʻlayhi tawakkulī, wa-ilayhi unīb. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-ṭawl wa-al-ālāʼ, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-rusul wa-al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-anqiyāʼ. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna sharaf al-maṭlūb bi-sharaf natājihi, wa-ʻiẓam khaṭarihi bi-kathrat manāfiʻihi, wa-bi-ḥasbi manāfiʻihi yajibu al-ʻināyah bi-hi, wa-ʻalá qadr al-ʻināyah yakūnu janā thamaratihi, wa-aʻẓam al-umūr khaṭaran wa-qadran, wa-aʻammuhā nafʻan wa-rifdan mā istaqāma bi-hi al-dīn wa-al-dunyā, wa-intaẓama bi-hi ṣalāḥ al-ākhirah wa-al-ūlá ..."
C. Landberg's catalog card gives the date of the manuscript as 708; however, the colophon is entirely unpointed and difficult to read.
Script: Fair Yemenite naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (flap missing); cover embossed with central medallion. Abbreviated title written on the bottom edge.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi. Katabahu li-nafsihi ... Muḥammad ibn ... ... al-Thaʻlabī (?) ʻurifa bi-Ibn al-ʻAwwām, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Jumʻah, thālith sāʻah min al-nahār, sādis li-Dhī al-Qaʻdah, min sanat thamān wa-sabʻimiʼah (?) [25 April 1309]."

record.title: Kitāb al-gharīb al-muṣannaf / li-Abī ʻUbayd al-Qāsim ibn Sallām. -- 1096.
record.note: Good Maghribī hand, in red (faded) and black, fully vocalized.
Considerable marginalia.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Bāʻith al-nufūs ilá ziyārat al-Quds al-maḥrūs : manuscript / mimmā ʻuniya bi-jamʻihi wa-taʼlīfihi ... Burhān al-Dunyā wa-al-Dīn Ibrāhīm ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sabāʻ al-Fazārī al-Badrī al-Anṣārī ʻurifa bi-Ibn al-Firkāḥ.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 882 (A.D. 1477).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-Rasūluhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalyhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi ajmaʻīn, wa-sallama taslīman dāʼiman abadan, ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥābihi wa-anṣārihi wa-al-tābiʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā muntakhab fī faḍāʼil al-Bayt al-Muqaddas, wa-qabr al-Khalīl Ibrāhīm, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ghālibuhu min kitāb al-Mustaqṣá, lil-Ḥāfiẓ Bahāʼ al-Dīn Ibn ʻAsākir, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-al-qalīl minhu min kitāb al-Shaykh Abī al-Maʻālī al-Musharraf ibn al-Murajjā al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: modern paper half binding over dark brown leather. With flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Two series of foliation: one using Arabic numbers in ink and one in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-waqaʻa al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi, baʻda ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, fī ʻashīyat nahār al-Khamīs, sābiʻ shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat ithnayn wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah [28 June 1477]. Allāhumma ikhtim bi-khayr wa-iftaḥ bi-khayr. Innaka ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Baḥr al-ansāb al-musammá bi-al-Mushajjar al-kashshāf li-uṣūl al-Sādah al-Ashrāf : manuscript / taʼlīf Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAmīd al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Ḥusaynī al-Najafī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rafīʻ al-darajāt, al-wāḥid fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt, alladhī atqana bi-ḥikmatihi al-maṣnūʻāt, wa-faḍḍala al-nawʻ al-insānī ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt, wa-jaʻala minhu shuʻūban wa-qabāʼil, li-yataʻārafa al-awākhir wa-al-awāʼil, wa-ikhtāra min al-qabāʼil Qurayshan bi-lā khilāf, wa-ikhtāra min Quraysh Banī ʻAbd Manāf, wa-ikhtāra min Banī ʻAbd Manāf Hāshiman, wa-ikhtāra min Hāshim man jaʻalahu lil-anbiyāʼ khātiman ..."
Original foliation: [13bis] not counted; 46 omitted.
Date assigned by C. Landberg ("X. Jahrh.").
Script: Good fairly modern (16th century?) Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with gilded central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Copious genealogical tables.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends on folio 146 recto, as follows: "... fa-tabāraka Allāh aḥsan al-khāliqīn, wa-ikhtāra min al-bashar Aḥmad al-ṣādiq al-amīn, wa-jaʻalahu Khātim al-Nabīyīn, thumma qāla: Wa-mā arsalnāka illā raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Amālī : al-majlis al-thālith wa-al-ʻishrūn baʻda al-thalāthimiʼah : manuscript / Abū al-Fatʹḥ Naṣr ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Naṣr al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Akhbarakum al-Shaykh Abū al-Nadá Ḥassān ibn Tamīm ibn Naṣr al-Zayyāt qirāʼatan ʻalayhi wa-anā asmaʻ, fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Ramaḍān sanat thamān wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah, qāla thanā al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām Abū al-Fatʹḥ Naṣr ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Naṣr al-Maqdisī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat iḥdá wa-thamānīn wa-arbʻimiʼah, qāl anbā al-Faqīh Abū al-Fatʹḥ Salīm ibn Ayyūb ibn Salīm al-Rāzī, raḥimahu Allāh, qāl anbā Abū al-Qāsim Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Hishām al-Ṣarṣarī, qāl ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 603.
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication used once.
Colophon: Text ends (leaf 5 recto) as follows: "Ākhir al-majlis. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Manāqib wa-al-mathālib : manuscript / Hibat Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Khuwārizmī.
record.note: Copied in 1889.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Bāb al-awwal. Fī faḍl al-ʻaql wa-ahlihi. Ruwiya ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāla: Mā tamma īmān umruʼin wa-lā istaqāma qalbuhu ḥattá yakmula ʻaqluhu. Wa-mā khalaqa Allāh shayʼ aḥsan min al-ʻaql, bi-hi yaʼkhudh, wa-bi-hi yuʻṭī, wa-bi-hi yuʻāqib, wa-bi-hi yujāzī, wa-ʻalayhi ʻuhdat banī Ādam ..."
Script: Cursive hand, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Two series of foliation: one using Arabic numbers in ink, the other in modern pencil.
In manuscript on lining-paper: "L'original se trouve à la Bibliothèque de Damas où je l'ai fait copier. Juin 1889. L[and]b[er]g."
