Colophon: "Tamma naskhat hādhā al-kātib bi-ghāyat al-ʻajalah, wa-yūjad fī al-aṣl arbaʻ aw khams abwāb mashṭūb ʻalayhā li-anna maʻāniyahā mukarrarah wa-ghayr mā aradtu sardahā, wa-ittabaʻtu al-abwāb ʻalá ḥidah. Fī 1 Ḥazīrān Sharqī, sanat 89. bi-yad al-ḥaqīr Ḥabīb ibn Sirrī (?) Hawādinī."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Īḍāḥ al-waqf wa-al-ibtidāʼ : manuscript / taʼlīf Abī Bakr Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim al-Anbārī al-Naḥwī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma Yassir bi-faḍlika. Qāla al-Shaykh Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim al-Anbārī al-Naḥwī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal bi-lā ibtidāʼ, wa-al-ākhir bi-lā intihāʼ, wa-al-ẓāhir al-fāʼit nawāfidh al-abṣār, wa-al-bāṭin al-mudrak bi-wujūd al-āthār, wa-al-kāʼin min ghayr ḥudūth, wa-al-bāqī ilá ghayr madá wa-lā waqt, wa-al-qadīm al-sābiq lil-azminah, wa-al-qāʼim al-dāʼim qabla al-amkinah, wa-al-ʻalī al-mutaʻālī ʻan kull shayʼ ʻaẓẓamah ..."
Script: Three fair hands, of the 12th-13th centuries.
Binding: In marbled paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather of the spine of the cover and the flap.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb fī al-waqf wa-al-ibtidāʼ bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-mannih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn awwalan wa-ākhiran. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn al-ṭayyibīn, wa-sallama kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

record.title: 880-02 Nukhbat al-badīʻ fī madḥ al-Shafīʻ : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣalāḥī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1228 (A.D. 1813).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī atqana bi-barāʻat istihlāl jūdihi ibdāʻ sāʼir al-mawjūdāt, wa-aḥyā bi-ḥusn maṭlaʻ dhikrihi qulūb al-wāṣilīn ilayhi bi-anwāʻ al-mujāhadāt fī al-ʻibādāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣalāḥī, kāna Allāh li-dhunūbihi min ṣaḥāʼif al-ḥāfiẓīn māḥī: Innī iṭṭalaʻtu ʻalá qaṣīdah badīʻīyah min naẓm farīd al-adab fī ʻaṣrihi ... al-Sayyid Aḥmad Afandī al-Barbīr ... fa-istaʻantu billāh ... wa-sharaḥtuhā sharḥan mutawassiṭan bayna al-ījāz wa-al-iṭnāb ... wa-qad sammaytu hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak Nukhbat al-badīʻ fī madʹḥ al-Shafīʻ ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Two series of foliation: one in ink in Arabic numbers, the other in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīdihi wa-taḥrīrihi fī ʻaṣr yawm al-Jumʻah, sābiʻ ʻashar shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, ʻām sanat 1228, thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [11 December 1813], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā alf alf ṣalāh wa-alf alf taḥīyah, fī kull bukūr wa-ʻashīyah. Āmīn. Wa-dhālika ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-jāmiʻihi aḥqar al-anām Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Saʻīd ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣalāḥī al-Ṣāliḥī, khatama Allāh taʻālá la-hu bi-al-khayrāt, wa-ṣafaḥa ʻan sayyiʼātihi, wa-ʻāmalahu wa-jamiʻ al-Muslimīn bi-al-alṭāf al-khafīyah, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-bararah al-taqīyah. Āmīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 al-Mustaqṣá fī amthāl al-ʻArab : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
record.note: Copied in the 18th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-bāriʻ, fakhr Khuwārizm, raʼīs al-afāḍil, Abū al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī, muṣannif hādhā al-kitāb: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā ablaja bi-hi ṣudūranā min bard al-yaqīn, wa-kasāhu aʻṭāfan min tashrīf al-Islām, wa-athbata ʻalayhi aqdāmanā min ṣirāṭihi al-mustaqīm, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muṣṭafāhu min khalīqatihi Muḥammad wa-ʻitratihi al-abrār. al-Taṣnīf miḍmār tanṣabbu ilayhi khayl al-sibāq min kull awb ... sammaytuhu al-Mustaqṣá fī amthāl al-ʻArab ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Paper label on spine with manuscript number 123 and title information.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Laqṭ al-marjān fī aḥkām al-jānn : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 985 (A.D. 1577). Leaves 91-92 supplied in a later hand.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥannān al-mannān. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá al-ins wa-al-jānn. Hādhā talkhīṣ kitāb Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-jānn, lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-Qāḍī Badr al-Dīn al-Shiblī, raḥimahu Allāh, sammaytuhu Laqṭ al-marjān, lakhkhaṣtuhu ʻalá wajh irtaḍaytuhu, wa-akthartu min al-ziyādāt fīhi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown stained paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine and edges of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-mudhnib ... ibn al-Qāḍī Abī al-Naṣr ibn al-Qāḍī Abī al-Faḍl Muḥammad, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhum, fī mustahall Jumādá [?] 985 [July/August 1577]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb adwār al-īqāʻ fī maʻrifat al-naghm : manuscript / li-ʻAbd al-Muʼmin al-Baghdādī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1275 (A.D. 1859).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Imām al-fāḍil Ṣafī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Muʼmin al-Baghdādī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá anbiyāʼihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad amaranī man yajibu ʻalayya imtithāl amrihi wa-awāmirh, wa-al-yumn wa-al-tabarruk bi-al-saʻyi fī marāmī khawāṭirihi an aḍaʻa la-hu mukhtaṣaran fī maʻrifat al-nagham wa-nusab abʻādihā wa-adwārihā wa-adwār al-īqāʻ wa-anwāʻihi, ʻalá nahjin yufīdu al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal, fa-bādartu ilá mā amara bi-hi mumtathilan, wa-bayyantu mā sanaḥa al-khāṭiru fīhi mā idhā amʻana al-nāẓiru fīhi ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Copious diagrams.

Colophon: "Nuqila hādhā al-kitāb min nuskhatin qadīmah lā takhlū min al-taḥrīf, wa-qūbila ʻalá aṣlihi ʻalá qadr al-ṭāqah. Kātibuhu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bīk Nāfiʻ, fī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1275 [June 1859]. M."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Īḍāḥ : manuscript / li-ṣāḥib al-Talkhīṣ [Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qazwīnī Khaṭīb Dimashq].
record.note: Copied in Damascus (Syria) in A.H. 715 (A.D. 1315).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun fī ʻilm al-balāghah wa-tawābiʻihā, tarjamtuhu bi-al-Īḍāḥ, wa-jaʻaltuhu ʻalá tartīb mukhtaṣarī alladhī sammaytuhu Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ, wa-basaṭtu fīhi al-qawl li-yakūna ka-al-sharḥ la-hu, fa-awḍaḥtu mawāḍiʻahu al-mushkilah, wa-faṣṣaltu maʻāniyahu al-mujmalah, wa-ʻamadtu ilá mā khalā ʻanhu al-Mukhtaṣar mimmā taḍammanahu Miftāḥ al-ʻulūm wa-ilá mā khalā ʻanhu al-Miftāḥ min kalām al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAbd al-Qāhir al-Jurjānī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī kitābayhi Dalāʼil al-iʻjāz, wa-Asrār al-balāghah, wa-ilá mā tayassara al-naẓar fīhi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Paper label with manuscript number 126 and title information on spine.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Ittafaqat al-farāghah min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb wa-tabyīḍ ṣafḥat al-awrāq bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻashr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, ʻammat barakatuhu, sanat khams ʻashar sabʻimiʼah [16 December 1315] bi-baldah al-maʻmūrah al-fākhirah Dimashq, ṣānahu ʻan al-ḥadathān, maʻa bilād al-Muslimīn, yā subḥān, ʻalá yadī al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-gharīb al-ḍaʻīf al-mudhnib al-khāṭī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, al-mulaqqab [erasure] mawlidan wa-maḥtidan. Raḥima Allāh taʻālá ʻalá man yarḥam ʻalá kātibihi bi-duʻāʼ al-khayr, ḥāmidan wa-muṣalliyan, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭāhirīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Ṭabaqāt al-khawāṣṣ ahl al-ṣidq wa-al-ikhlāṣ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Zayn al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī.
record.note: A poem on leaf 130 verso is dated A.H. 1106 (A.D. 1695).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mufaḍḍal bi-jazīl al-mawāhib wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, al-mutaṭawwil bi-qabūl al-ṭāʻah mimman aṭāʻ, wa-bi-al-ghufrān ʻamman asāʼ, al-mubtadī bi-al-niʻam qabla istiḥqāq al-jazāʼ, alladhī ikhtaṣṣa bi-raḥmatihi man yashāʼ, wa-waffaqa li-maʻrifatihi man ijtabá min ʻibādihi al-awliyāʼ wa-khawāṣṣihi al-aṣfiyāʼ ..."
Script: Good Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion. Paper label with manuscript 127 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Author's colophon (folio 127a): "Qāla muʼallifuhu Shaykhunā al-ʻAllāmah al-awḥad, Zayn al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī: Tamma dhālika bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn taysīrihi, bi-tārīkh shahr Shawwāl al-mubārak, sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamānimiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [June/July 1463], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh kathīran awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamahu wa-yukāfī mazīdahu, kamā yanbaghī li-jalāl wajhihi al-karīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Risālat al-ṭayf : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah ... al-Irbilī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1006 (A.D. 1597 or 1598).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. Yā khalīlayya min dhuʼabati Qaysin // fī al-taṣābī riyāḍat al-akhlāqi. Mimmā aʻrifu bi-hi ikhwānī, jādathum al-anwāʼ, wa-ṣābathum al-samāʼ, wa-ḥallat al-suḥub bi-afʼidatihim afwāh ʻazālīhā, wa-haraqat māʼ madāmiʻihā min maʼāqīhā, wa-rawwaḍa al-qaṭru dārahum wa-nammaqahā, wa-jaddada rusūmahum wa-lā akhlaqahā, wa-aṣfá mashāriʻahum wa-lā rannaqahā, wa-malaʼa ḥiyāḍahum bi-namīr al-māʼ wa-annaqahā ..."
Script: Hasty and not very legible naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Paper label with manuscript 128 and title information.
Decoration: Rubricated. Text frame outlined in red ink only on title page.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tammat ʻalá yad kātibihā al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Qadīr, Shihāb al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah, al-baḥr al-muḥīṭ al-fahhāmah, ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn al-Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wa-ʻumdat al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-mudarrisīn, Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Anṣārī al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻallaqahā ʻajilan, wa-min ghalaṭihā khajilan. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā fī yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, min shuhūr sanat sittah baʻda al-alf [1597/1598]."

record.title: 880-02 Dhikrá mass al-ṭāʼif fī laṭāʼif tuqawwī shārib al-shāy bi-al-Ṭāʼif : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq al-Qūṣī.
record.note: Copied at al-Azhar Mosque in A.H. [12]68 (A.D. 1852).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka bi-al-ʻajz ʻan ḥamdika, yā ḥakīm, yā nāfiʻ, wa-nastadīmu fuyūḍāt raḥamātika al-ātiyah ʻalá maṭar sirrika al-hāmiʻ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna ʻaffū ʻan kull mushtahá yūhimu malāmatan, wa-mā ʻāfū fī al-ḥayāh al-dunyā ṭayyibāt al-rizq al-khāliṣah lahum Yawm al-Qiyāmah. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad istanshaʼa sābiqan min banāt fikrī qaṣīdah fī nabāt al-shāy ṣadīq ṣadīqī Bakrī, sammaytuhā Naghmat al-nāy fī niʻmat al-shāy ... wa-istawrá li-īḍāḥ maʻānīhā zanda qarīḥatī ṣafīyunā al-Jalāl al-Māwardī, fa-ajabtuhu ilá sharḥihā ... sammaytuhā Dhikrá mass al-ṭāʼif fī laṭāʼif tuqawwī shārib al-shāy bi-al-Ṭāʼif ..."
Script: Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In light brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi fī muntaṣaf shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá sanat 68 [i.e. 1268 of the Hijrah = 7 March 1852], ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá al-Ghanī al-Qadīr, ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jawharī al-Māzinī, bi-al-Azʹhar al-anwar, ʻammarahu Allāh bi-dhikrihi."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-labīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tarjumān.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1244 (A.D. 1828).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-rājī karīm al-ṣafḥ ʻan dhanbihi al-ʻaẓīm, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tarjumān, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, Āmīn, bi-mannihi wa-faḍlihi wa-karamihi, Āmīn: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-khayr al-adyān, wa-jaʻalanā min ummat Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-ʻAdnān, wa-akramanā bi-tilāwat al-Qurʼān, wa-ṣawm shahr Ramaḍān ..."
The author was a Christian convert from Majorce.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); light brown leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb waqt adhān al-ẓuhr, yawm al-Sabt, laylat al-Aḥad, 8, li-thamān layālin maḍat min shahr Allāh al-ḥarām, iftitāḥ ʻām 1244 [21 July 1828], ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Saqqā, khādim al-fuqarāʼ, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi." To the right of the colophon: An ownership statement: "Mimmā manna Allāh taʻālá al-ʻAlī ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAlī." To the left of the colophon: "In raʼayta ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // tabqá ʻinda al-nāsi fī ʻayn al-malā. Wa-lā tuʻāyir man fīhi ʻaybun // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá Ahl al-Ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm [sic].
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1269 (A.D. 1853).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhā Kitāb Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá Ahl al-Ṣalīb. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munazzah ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-ittiḥād, al-muqaddas ʻan al-tathlīth wa-al-mawlūd wa-al-awlād, wa-al-munqidh lil-ḥaqq baʻda al-ḍalālah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-khātim lil-risālah, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-rāshidīn fī kull ḥālah, mā ḥaqqa al-ḥaqq wa-zuhiqa al-bāṭil, wa-mā anṣafa ʻinda samāʻ al-ḥaqq kull ʻāqil. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Karīm, al-faqīr ilayhi ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm: Qad aṭlaʻanī Allāh ʻalá hādhihi al-risālah, wa-hiya tusammá 'Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá Ahl al-Ṣalīb' ..."
The author was a Christian convert from Majorce.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-musammá bi-'Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá Ahl al-Ṣalīb'. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdahu. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Wa-qad tamma al-risālah ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād, wa-aḥwajihim ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Sayyid Aḥmad ibn Sayyid Ṣāliḥ ibn Sayyid al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn Sayyid al-Ḥājj Bākīr ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad Afandī, ghafara Allāh lahum wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻá la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, waqt al-ḍaḥwah al-ṣughrá, fī shahr Jumādá al-Awwal, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻah wa-sittīn min baʻd al-Hijrah al-Muḥammadīyah [February/March 1853], ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm. Sanat 1269. Sanat 1269."

record.title: 880-03 Sāniḥāt dumá al-qaṣr fī muṭāraḥāt banī al-ʻaṣr : manuscript / Darwīsh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭāluwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1065 (A.D. 1655).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yā mujrī rakhā ṭibāʻ al-insān mustannatan fī ṭarāʼiq al-bayān, wa-mujzī raḥā ṣunnāʻ al-adhhān mufannanah bi-raqāʼiq al-iftinān, yā muṭliʻ sawāniḥ fikr al-afhām ṭulūʻ kunūz al-khabāyā, wa-mūdiʻ bawāriḥ fiqh al-aqlām khulaʻ rumūz al-mazāyā, yā mursil sarḥ al-khawāṭir tartaʻu fī riyāḍ al-maʻārif wa-al-ʻulūm, wa-munhil sawām al-ḍamāʼir takraʻu min ḥiyāḍ al-laṭāʼif wa-al-fuhūm ..."
Script: Small flat naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated, text frame outlined in red.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, sādis shahr Allāh al-muʻaẓẓam Ramaḍān, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat khams wa-sittīn wa-alf [10 July 1655], ʻalá yad rājī luṭf Allāh taʻālá al-khafī, ʻabduhu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr Ramaḍān ibn Mūsá al-Muṭayyifī al-Ḥanafī, ghafar Allāh taʻālá dhunūbahu wa-satara fī al-dārayn ʻuyūbahu. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Taysīr fī ʻilm al-tafsīr : manuscript / taʼlīf ... ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Dīrīnī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1285 (A.D. 1869).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi. Yā Rabbi anta al-mustaʻānu al-kāfī // al-wāḥidu al-fardu al-raḥīmu al-shāfī. al-Khāliqu al-muṣawwiru al-qadīru // al-ʻālimu al-muyassiru al-khabīru. Munazzilu al-Kitābi lil-shifāʼi // ʻalá lisāni al-ʻArabi al-ʻArbāʼi. Muʻjizatun lil-Muṣṭafá Muḥammadi // wāḍiḥatun taqmaʻu kulla muʻtadi. Idh ʻajizū fīhi ʻani al-muʻāraḍah // wa-lam yaraw bāban ilá al-munāqaḍah ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with geometric design.
Decoration: Rubricated, text frame outlined in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Laqd waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Arbaʻ al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq khamsah wa-ʻishrūn yawman khalat min shahr al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, khitām ʻām sanat khamsah wa-thamānūn wa-miʼatān baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [8 April 1869] ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muddaʻī bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Jalāl al-Dīn, al-Mālikī madhhaban, al-Bayyūmī ṭarīqatan, al-Suyūṭī baladan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-khwānihi, wa-aḥbābihi, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Khālid ibn Yazīd.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Wa-qāla min ḥarf al-Hamzah: Kayfa lī an amūta minka bi-dāʼi // inna fī al-mawti rāḥatī wa-shifāʼī. Minka mā aqūlu sal ʻabarātī // wa-tafahham idhā saʼalta baṭāʼī. Bi-abī anta man aqūlu la-hu ay // na dawāʼī fa-qad ʻarafta dawāʼī. Lastu ashkū illā ilayka wa-ḥasbī // anta yā ghāyatī wa-aqṣá rajāʼī ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) cursive hand, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-qāla ayḍan: Kayfa yahnā li-ʻayni man ilfuhu // ʻindahu wa-huwa mashūqun ilayhi. Ṣirtu lā amlaʼu ʻaynī minhu ḥadharan // min ʻayni ghayrī ʻalayhi. Bi-abī man kullu ṭarfin ghaḍiḍin // akhadha al-fatrata min muqlatiayhi. Kullu man abṣarahu fī ʻilmihi // annahu raḥmatun yafná fī yadayhi."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Ḥikmat al-ʻayn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Mubārakshāh al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Copied in Qazvīn, Iran in A.H. 892 (A.D. 1487).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh fāṭir dhawāt al-ʻuqūl al-nūrīyah, wa-muẓʹhir khafīyāt al-asrār al-Rubūbīyah, al-mubdiʻ bi-nūrihi al-mushriq muḥarrikāt al-ajrām al-ʻulwīyah, al-mukhtariʻ bi-ʻilamihi al-kāmil musakkināt al-ajsām al-suflīyah, al-muḥyī mawāt al-mawādd bi-yanābīʻ (?) al-ṣuwar al-nawʻīyah, al-munīr li-qawābil al-ʻulūm bi-maṣābīḥ al-fikr wa-al-rawīyah ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 297.
Extensive marginalia.
Script: Fair cursive naskhī, in red and black, with diagrams.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb wa-tanmīqihi, bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, waqt ḍuḥá yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, fī sanah muʼarrakhah bi-ithnayn wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [1 November 1487] min Hijrat Khayr al-Barīyah, fī baldat Qazwīn, ʻalá yad al-mutawakkil ʻalá Allāh al-Malik al-Bārī, Ḥāmid ibn Burhān ibn Abī Dharr al-Ghifārī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahum bi-ḥaqq man lā nabī baʻdah."

record.title: 880-02 Mirʼāt al-zamān. Al-Juzʼ al-thāmin : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī Muḥammad Yūsuf sibṭ ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Copied, according to the colophon, in A.H. 794 (A.D. 1392).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Sanah al-khāmisah wa-al-tisʻūn wa-arbaʻmiʼah. Wa-fīhā kānat akhbār al-Shām. Wa-ammā akhbār al-Shām, fa-nazala Ibn Ṣuḥayl al-Firanjī ʻalá Ṭarābulus, fa-kataba ilá Dimashq yastanjidu bihim, fa-sāra ʻaskaruhā maʻa Janāḥ al-Dawlah, ṣāḥib Ḥimṣ, ilá Anṭarṭūs, wa-iltaqaw, fa-inhazama Janāḥ al-Dawlah ilá Ḥimṣ qabla al-Muslimīn fī Jumādá al-Ākhirah, wa-māta al-Mustaʻlī, ṣāḥib Miṣr, wa-qāma waladuhu, Abū ʻAlī makānahu ..."
C. Landberg evidently had no doubts about the colophon-date; the manuscript, however, seems much younger.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion. The textblock is mistakenly bound upside down, with the flap on the right rather than on the left side. Title written on the binding's front cover in black ink indicates that this binding belonged to volume two or three of the same title originally.
Decoration: Rubricated throughout.
Volumes 1-7 wanting.

Colophon: "Tamma al-tārīkh al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Ashraf Khalqih, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi fī thānī ʻasharī Ṣafar, sanat arbaʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [17 January 1392], aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatihā ... ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Aḥmad ibn Ṣalʻāy al-Sayfī ... ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-lil-Muslimīn."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Mirʼāt al-zamān. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith ʻashar : manuscript / Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Yūnīnī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 869 (A.D. 1465) by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Qurashī al-Nastarāwī.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... al-nās wa-surra bi-wafātihi li-annahu kāna munḥarifan ʻalá Malik Shāh, wa-fī baytihi al-khilāf ʻalayhi, fa-qāla la-hu Niẓām al-Mulk lā tuẓʹhir al-shamātah bi-hi wa-uqʻud fī al-ʻazāʼ, fa-faʻala wa-aẓʹhar al-ḥuzn ʻalayhi. Wa-fī thānī Ṣafar jalasa al-Khalīfah, wa-wald waladihi ʻUddat al-Dīn qāʼim ʻalá raʼsihi, wa-la-hu thamānī ʻashrah sanah, wa-awṣala ilayhi Saʻd al-Dawlah al-Kūharānī wa-al-jamāʻha al-ḥāḍirīn wa-aʻṭāhu ʻahd Malik Shāh bi-al-salṭanah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Volumes 1-12 wanting.

Colophon: "Faragha al-juzʼ al-thālith ʻashar min Mukhtaṣar Mirʼāt al-zamān, yatlūhu al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ ʻashar, Jaʻfar ibn Sharaf Abū al-Faḍl al-Andalusī. Wa-wāfaqa dhālika fī yawm al-Jumʻah, thālith shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat tisʻ wa-khamsīn wa-thamānimiʼah [10 March 1465], ʻalá yad aqall ʻabīd Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá maghfiratihi wa-ruḍwānih, faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Qurashī al-Nastarāwī baladan, ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-lil-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Mirʼāt al-zamān wa-dhayluh. Al-Juzʼ al-khāmis ʻashar : manuscript / Quṭb al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Baʻlabakkī.
record.note: Copied ca. 1500.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Sannah al-tisʻūn wa-khamsumiʼah. Fīhā zādat Dajlah, wa-waṣala al-māʼ ilá sūr Baghdād al-ʻatīq al-Gharbī alladhī banāhu al-Manṣūr ..."
The work is identified in a later hand on leaf 2 recto as the 9th volume of the Taʼrīkh mirʼāt al-zamān.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather with spine label. Leather of earlier flap binding has stained recto first leaf.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Other volumes wanting.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-Juzʼ al-khāmis ʻashar, yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, fī awwal al-juzʼ al-sādis ʻashar, al-Sanah al-sābiʻah wa-al-khamsūn wa-sittumiʼah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Dhayl Mirʼāt al-zamān. Al-Juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar min al-Taʼrīkh maʻa al-Dhayl : manuscript / Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Yūnīnī.
record.note: According to C. Landberg, who evidently saw the colophon page of this manuscript, it was copied by Muḥammad al-Nastarāwī (same copyist as in Landberg MSS 137) in A.H. 871 (A.D. 1466 or 1467).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... wa-la-hu mimmā naqalahu bi-khaṭṭihi, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Raḥalta wa-qalbī fī hawāka muqīmu // fa-ʻindī li-hādhā maqʻadun wa-muqīmu. Fa-dhikrāka lī zādun wa-wajdī muwāfiqun // wa-ḥuzniya ḥuznī wa-al-gharāmu gharīmu. Ayā ghāʼiban ʻannī ilayhi mashūquhu // wa-mathwāhu mā bayna al-ḍulūʻi ṣamīmu ..."
At the head of folio 1a (in a different hand): "Hādhā al-juzʼ min Dhayl Mirʼāt al-zamān, wa-huwa al-juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar maʻa al-Dhayl."

A note in a later hand (same hand as that on title page of Landberg MSS 138) on leaf 1 recto calls this the 11th volume of the whole work (i.e., including the Mukhtaṣar Mirʼāt al-zamān, by the same author); but this numeration does not square with that of Landberg MSS 137-138.
C. Landberg gives the dates A.H. 687-702, one more proof that he saw the concluding leaves of this manuscript.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Other volumes wanting.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... fa-qālat la-hu Umm al-Dardāʼ lam taqul dhālik, fa-qāla hal taʻlamīna yā ḥamqāʼ anna al-rajul yuṣbiḥu muʼminan wa-yumsī munāfiqan, qālat wa-kayfa, qāla suliba īmānuhu wa-lā yashʻuru, li-anna hādhā bi-al-mawt aghbaṭ minnī fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣiyām. Akhbaranā Jaʻfar, thanā Ṣafwān ibn Ṣāliḥ, nā Ḍamrah ibn Rabīʻah, thanā ʻAbd Allāh ibn Shawdhab, ʻan al-Ḥasan ibn Ṣāliḥ, qāla lā yalqā al-muʼminu illā shāḥiban wa-lā yalqā al-munāfiqu illā waṣāban. Akhbaranā Jaʻfar, nā ʻUthmān ibn Abī Shaybah, nā Jarīr ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd, ʻan al-Aʻmash, ʻan ..."

record.title: 880-02 Tashḥīdh al-adhhān bi-sīrat bilād al-ʻArab wa-al-Sūdān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻUmar al-Tūnisī ibn Sulaymān.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1275 (A.D. 1859).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Sayyar aqdām al-anām bi-irādatihi al-sanīyah, wa-jaʻala Riḥlat al-Shitāʼ wa-al-Ṣayf bi-ḥikmatihi al-bahīyah, ḥamda man taladhdhadha bi-ḥalāwat al-rāḥah baʻda marār mashaqqat al-safar, wa-nashkuruka shukra man tanaʻʻama bi-al-iqāmah baʻda kadd al-riḥlah wa-al-kadar ..."
Script: Fair naskhī. Small crude drawings in the text on leaves 58 verso, 63 verso, 64 recto, 220 verso; in the margin on leaf 175 recto.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak 7 Shawwāl sanat 1275 [10 May 1859]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ikhtilāfāt wa-al-ijtimāʻāt : manuscript / li-Mawlānā ʻAwn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Hubayrah.
record.note: An ex-libris on leaf 1 recto is dated A.H. 1154 (A.D. 1741 or 1742).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Ajmaʻū ʻalá anna al-ṣalāh lā taṣuḥḥu illā bi-ṭahārah, idhā wujida al-sabīl ilayhā, li-qawlihi ʻazza wa-jall: Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, pp. 687-88; possibly identical with one of two works on the same subject cited by Brockelmann.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors at the beginning. Considerable marginalia.
Binding: Modern library binding of red artificial leather. Paper label with manuscript number 141 and title information on the spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in black and red ink.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá."

record.title: 880-02 al-Falak al-dāʼir ʻalá al-Mathal al-sāʼir : manuscript / li-Ibn Abī al-Ḥadīd al-Muʻtazilī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1298 (A.D. 1881).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fāwata bayna ʻuqūl al-bashar wa-akhlāqihim, kamā fāwata bayna aʻmārihim wa-arzāqihim, fa-kāna min khafāyā tadbīrihi, wa-laṭāʼif ḥikmatihi wa-taqdīrihi, an raḍiya kullun minhum bi-ʻaqlihi wa-khuluqih, lā bi-ʻumrihi wa-rizqih, fa-lasta tará minhum illā al-rāḍī bi-ʻaqlihi wa-ārāʼih, al-muʻjab bi-mā yarshaḥu min ināʼih, al-ḥāmid li-sajīyatih, al-zārī ʻalá al-nākibīn ʻan ṭarīqatih ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In green paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated throughout.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak 13 min shahr Ṣafar, thalāthat ʻashar yawm maḍat min tārīkhihi, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn thamāniyah wa-tisʻīn [15 January 1881]. Allāhumma ighfir li-man qaraʼ wa-ṣllaḥa khalalan wa-daʻā lil-kātib wa-li-man kāna sababan, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Khamrat Bābil wa-ghināʼ al-balābil : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Nābulusī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1206 (A.D. 1792).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ʻalá kamālihi ḥaythu ʻan waṣf al-jamīʻ ʻalā, fa-subḥānuhu min ilāhin tafarrada bi-al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-jalāl, wa-tawaḥḥada bi-nuʻūt al-mahābah wa-al-kibriyāʼ, wa-ittaṣafa bi-al-jamāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-mamdūḥ bi-li-sān kull shayʼ, li-anna al-ashyāʼ jamīʻahā makhlūqatun min nūrihi, wa-al-mushār ilayhi fī kull rutbah ʻalīyah li-annahu al-mumidd li-kull ẓāhir min ḥaqīqat ẓuhūrih, Muḥammad al-Muṣṭafá, wa-al-maḥmūd al-muqtafá, wa-ruḍwān Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-tābiʻīhi wa-anṣārihi wa-aḥzābihi ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors at the beginning. On variously colored paper.
Binding: Marbled paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated throughout. Text frames outlined in red ink. Highly decorated opening frame.

Colophon: "Hādhā mā wujida min Dīwān al-ghazal, li-Shaykhī wa-ustādhī wa-ʻumdatī wa-malādhī, ṣāḥib al-maqām al-qudsī, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī, fī musawwadatihi bi-khaṭṭihi, wa-la-hu kalām kathīr lam taḥawīhi al-awrāq min wārid al-ilhām, wa-lā tuḥīṭu bi-hi al-afhām, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātihi. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad, raʼīs al-ṭibb, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn, nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, khalā ʻishrīn Rajab, sanat 1206 [14 March 1792]. M. M. M."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Ahwāl al-qubūr wa-aḥwāl ahlihā ilá al-nushūr : manuscript / taʼlīf ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn Naṣr al-Ḥanbalī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn Rajab.
record.note: Copied after A.H. 786 (A.D. 1384).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī askana ʻibādahu hādhihi al-dār wa-jaʻalahā lahum manzilata safarin min al-asfār, wa-jaʻala al-Dār al-Ākhirah dār al-qarār, wa-jaʻala bayna al-dunyā wa-al-Ākhrah barzakhan yadullu ʻalá fanāʼ al-dunyā bi-al-iʻtibār, wa-huwa fī al-ḥaqīqah illā rawḍatun min riyāḍ al-Jannah, aw ḥufratun min ḥufar al-nār, fa-subḥāna man yakhluqu mā yashāʼu wa-yakhtār, wa-yarfuqu bi-ʻibādihi al-abrār fī jamīʻ al-aqdār ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper (decorated with floral motif) covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); light brown leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. ʻAlá al-umm al-manqūl minhā mā mithāluhu: Balagha qirāʼatan ʻalá nuskhatihi hādhihi muqābilan la-hā bi-aṣlī, wa-huwa maʻī ṣāḥib al-nuskhah wa-kātibuhā al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ, al-ʻābid al-qudwah, al-ʻārif, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥajjār al-Madanī al-Ḥanbalī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi, wa-dhālika fī majālis, ākhiruhā rābiʻ ʻashar Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat sitt wa-thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [7 November 1384] bi-Dimashq al-maḥrūsah. Qālahu wa-katabahu muʼallifuhu ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn Naṣr al-Ḥanbalī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-laṭufa bi-hi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá al-umm al-mansūkh minhā ẓuhr yawm al-Khamīs [the rest is cut away]."

record.title: Papers of John Geddie, 1844-1877 (inclusive) [microform].
record.note: Reel 1 filmed by the Public Archives of Nova Scotia for the Pacific Manuscripts Bureau in 1973.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar min Kitāb Bughyat al-murtāḥ fī ṭalab al-arbāḥ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abū [sic] ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-shahīr bi-al-Zarandī al-Madanī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1089 (A.D. 1678).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Muʼmin al-Salām, dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, khāliq al-ayyām [al-anām] wa-musakhkhir al-anʻām, aḥmaduhu idh hadānā lil-Islām, wa-ʻaṣamanā ʻan ʻibādat al-aṣnām, wa-manna ʻalaynā bi-ittibāʻ al-nabīyīn wa-al-aḥkām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan uʻidduhā li-Yawm al-Qiyām ..."

The title Mukhtaṣar appears only on the title-page in another hand; the preface gives the impression that this is the Bughyat al-murtāḥ itself, and not an abridgment of it. But C. Landberg evidently believed the title-page.
Script: Small poorly legible naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardbiard, Type II (with flap); light brown leather on the spine of the cover and flap.
Decoration: Sparse rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī nahār al-Khamīs, thālith ʻashar yawm min shahr Rajab al-murjib, sanat tisʻah wa-thamānīn wa-alf [31 August 1678], ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá Allāh al-Hādī, Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Darāqī, raḥima Allāh ʻabdan naẓara ... bi-hādhihi al-Aḥādīth al-sharīfah al-nūrānīyah, wa-qaraʼ al-Fātiḥah li-kātibihi ... wa-aḍāfa jamīʻ amwāt al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-lā yansá al-wālidayn bi-duʻāʼ. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mafāḥiṣ min al-ʻulūm al-ilāhīyah : manuscript / Ṣāʼin al-Millah wa-al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Turkah.
record.note: Copied probably in the 15th century.
The author's biography is given on leaf 179 verso.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻadda ʻadīd ʻibādihi li-fahm kamāl murādihi bi-inzāl aʻdād bayyināt al-kitāb, wa-jaʻalahu al-ʻuddah al-muʻtaddu bihā li-maʻrifat maʻādihi Yawma al-Ḥisāb, wa-abāna bi-maʻdūdāt ayyāmihi mīʻād aʻyād qurbihi, wa-nafá biʻadihi [?] ʻalá nahj al-ṣawāb, wa-bayyan bihā madārij ʻabīdihi fiʼah bi-ḥasb mā lahā min al-aḥsāb, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad khayr man ūtiya al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi hudāt shawāriʻ al-īqān al-qāʼidīn ilá manāhil awrād ulī al-albāb ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black, with diagrams.
Binding: In marbled paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of the the cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated (every 10 leaves) in modern pencil.

Author's Colophon (folio 179a): "Qāla al-muṣannif al-fāḍil wa-al-muʼallif al-kāmil, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu al-muṭahharah al-munawwarah: Waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīdihi yawm al-Jumʻah [crossed out] al-Aḥad, thānī ʻishrīn [crossed out], ʻasharah Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 823 [Sunday, 10 September 1420 (?)]." To the left of the colophon: A collation statement: "Qūbila wa-ṣuḥḥiḥa maʻa al-nuskhah al-ṣaḥīḥah bi-qadr al-wusʻ wa-al-imkān."

Author's supplementary note (folio 179b): "Qāla al-muʼallif li-hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Mafāḥiṣ, aʻnī Ṣāʼin al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Turkah, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-afāḍa ʻalaynā futūḥahu: Qad ittafaqa al-murājaʻah ilayhi wa-istilḥāq shayʼ min shawārid al-ḥaqāʼiq maʻa al-Janāb, mattaʻanī Allāh bi-ṭūl baqāʼihi wa-iltiqāʼihi, sharafan lil-millah wa-al-dīn, ʻAlī al-Yazdī, fī jamʻ min al-khillān wa-ṭāʼifah min al-ṭullāb wa-al-wildān, waffaqanā Allāh taʻālá wa-īyāhum lil-bulūgh ilá aqāṣī al-marām, bi-Muḥammadin wa-ālihi, ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, sanat 828 [1424/1425]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Riyāḍ al-ṣāliḥīn : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Muḥyī al-Dīn ... Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf ibn Murī ibn Ḥusayn al-Ḥarāmī al-Nawāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: An ex-libris on leaf 188 verso is dated A.H. 717 (A.D. 1317).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, mukawwir al-layl ʻalá al-nahār, tadhkiratan li-ulī al-qulūb wa-al-abṣār, wa-tabṣiratan li-dhawī al-albāb wa-al-iʻtibār, alladhī ayqaẓa min khalqihi man iṣṭafāhu fa-zahhadahum fī hādhihi al-dār, wa-shaghalahum bi-raʼfatihi wa-idāmat al-afkār wa-mulāzamat al-ittiʻāẓ wa-al-adhkār, wa-waffaqahum lil-duʼūb fī ṭāʻatihi wa-al-taʼahhub li-Dār al-Qarār, wa-al-ḥadhar mimmā yuskhiṭuhu wa-yūjibu dār al-bawār, wa-al-muḥāfaẓah ʻalá dhālik, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lahu, al-barr al-karīm al-raʼūf al-raḥīm ..."
Sporadic marginalia.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black, title in gold.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (flap missing).
Decoration: Rubricated throughout; opening frame heavily decorated with gold leaf.
Foliated in Arabic numbers; also foliated in modern pencil every five leaves.
Colophon: "Ākhir al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu."

record.title: 880-03 Muʻtarak al-aqrān fī iʻjāz al-Qurʼān : manuscript / lil-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1106 (A.D. 1695).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Nabīyinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Karīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran kathīran kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Yaqūlu ʻubayd Allāh subḥānuhu, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, innahu arḥam al-rāḥimīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala muʻjizāh [muʻjizāt] hādhihi al-ummah ʻaqlīyatan li-farṭ dhakāʼihim wa-kamāl afhāmihim wa-faḍlihim ʻalá man taqaddamahum, idh muʻjizātuhum ḥissīyah li-balādatihim wa-qillat baṣīratihim, naḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu, ʻalá qawlihi li-Rasūlihi: Wa-anzalnā ilayka al-Dhikra li-tubayyina lil-nās mā nuzzila ilayhim ..."
Script: Fair Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Binding: In green leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil every five leaves.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak al-maymūn al-musammá bi-Muʻtarak al-aqrān fī iʻjāz al-Qurʼān, lil-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī ... ʻalá yad kātibihi, al-muqirr bi-dhanbihi, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḍayf Allāh al-Munādī laqaban al-Ḥasanī nasaban, al-Mālikī al-Ashʻarī madhhaban, al-Jazīrī waṭanan wa-maktaban ... wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu li-tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn maḍat, min shahr Allāh al-muʻaẓẓam Dhī al-Qaʻdah, ʻām 1106 [11 July 1695] ... Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Mabāhij al-ummah bi-manāhij al-aʼimmah : manuscript / lil-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Ḥamawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Rabbi zidnī ʻilaman wa-imnaḥnī qūwatan wa-ʻazman bi-faḍlika al-ʻamīm, tadhkiratan li-iḥkām al-aḥkām wa-tabṣiratan li-ifhām al-afhām, ilá amtan mulūk al-Islām dīnan, wa-aḥsanihim yaqīnan, wa-awsaʻihim ʻilman, wa-awqaʻihim ḥilman, wa-abharihim sīratan, wa-aṭharihim sarīratan, wa-atammihim wafāʼan, wa-aʻammihim sakhāʼan, wa-aʻẓamihim qadran, wa-afkhamihim dhikran ..."
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 315; S II, p. 433.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of brown marbled paper half-binding over pasteboards. Gold-tooled spine. Red spickled edges.
Decoration: Rubricated throughout.
Foliated in modern pencil every five leaves.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nasākhat hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq 2, ithnayn Jumād al-Awwal, sanat thalāthmiʼah min al-Hijrah [1300 = 11 March 1883] ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-ʻalá yad kātibihi, al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rbbihi, Muḥammad Jād al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī. Allāhumma ighfir la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nasākhat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Alfāẓ al-mutarādifah aw al-mutaqāribah al-maʻná : manuscript / li-ʻAlī ibn ʻĪsá al-Rummānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1306 (A.D. 1889).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Waṣaltuhu wa-rafadtuhu wa-ḥabawtuhu wa-ajdaytuhu wa-aʻṭaytuhu wa-khawwaltuhu wa-manaḥtuhu wa-awlaytuhu wa-aṣfaytuhu wa-asʻaftuhu wa-asdaytu ilayhi wa-analtuhu wa-ajraytu ʻalayhi wa-naḥaltuhu wa-rashaytuhu wa-asaytuhu wa-atḥaftuhu wa-naqaltuhu [wa-nafaltuhu (?)] wa-jabartuhu wa-azlaltu ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated heavily.
Foliated in modern pencil on leaves 5 and 8.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir Kitāb al-Alfāẓ li-ʻAlī ibn ʻĪsá al-Rummānī manqūlan min khaṭṭ baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min naskhihi fī yawm al-Ithnayn, 28 Rajab, sanat 1306 [30 March 1889] bi-qalam aḍʻaf al-ḍuʻafāʼ, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Salām, al-rājī ʻafwa Mawlāhu. M."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Safarjalānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-Rasūl al-Akram, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam taslīman. Hādhā mā qālahu al-Fāḍil Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Safarjalānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Qāla: Shādinun ʻanna min ẓibāʼi Taymāʼi // dhū jufūnin taṣīdu bi-al-īmāʼi. Layyinu al-ʻaṭfi ka-al-qaḍībi wa-lākin // qalbuhu mithlu ṣakhratin ṣammāʼi. ʻArabīyu al-nijāri in nasabūhu // nasabūhu ilá Ibni Māʼi al-Samāʼi ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil every five leaves.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with the following verses: "... Yā āla bayti al-Muṣṭafá shiʻrī ḥalā // fīkum wa-ṭābat bi-al-madīḥi ladhāʼidhī. Wāfaytukum abghī ḥimākum munshidan // hādhā maqāmu al-mustajīri al-ʻāʼidhi. Khālastuhu naẓaran wa-kāna muwarradan // fa-izdāda ḥattá kāna [kāda] an yatalahhabā. Unẓur ilayhi kaʼannahu mutanaṣṣilun // bi-jufūnihi min ṭūli mā qad adhnabā. wa-kaʼanna ṣafḥata khaddihi wa-ʻidhārihi // tuffāḥatun rumiyat li-taqtula ʻaqrabā."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fāḍil min inshāʼ al-Fāḍil : manuscript / wa-huwa al-mukhtār li-jāmiʻihi al-Shaykh Ibn Nubātah al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala min al-bayān siḥran, wa-istakhraja durar al-ʻibārāt min aṣdāf al-alsinah lammā kānat al-qarāʼiḥ baḥran, wa-naẓama jawāhir al-maʻānī fī aslāk al-alfāẓ fa-law tajassadat la-kānat aḥrá an tuzayyina naḥran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-makhṣūṣ bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim nuṭqan, al-manṣūṣ ʻalá annahu zubdat al-khalq wa-khayruhum khalqan wa-khuluqan, al-muʻjiz bi-balāghatihi, allatī minhā mā qālahu li-ibn ʻammihi ʻAlīyan, ʻalayhi al-salām: Yā ʻAlī qaṣṣr thawbaka fa-innahu atqá wa-anqá wa-abqá, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-ṣaḥābatihi, wa-dhawī qurbihi wa-qarābatih ..."
Sporadic marginalia.
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of brown marbled paper half-binding over black cloth. Gold-tooled spine with title.
Foliation every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: The text ends with selections from the poetry of al-Qāḍi al-Fāḍil, as follows: "... Yā laylatan bāta fīhā al-badru muʻtanaqī // wa-al-nāsu bi-al-badri wa-al-ẓalmāʼi fī shughuli. Bitnā naquḍḍu ʻuqūdan lil-ḥadīthi fa-in // faṣṣaltuhā fa-bi-tashdhīrin min al-qubali. Qul fī al-zulāli idhā wāfá ʻalá ẓamaʼin // fa-qad dalalta ʻalá al-tafṣīli bi-al-jumali. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ajwibah al-ʻIrāqīyah lil-asʼilah al-Īrānīyah : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī al-Thanāʼ Shihāb al-Dīn al-Sayyid Maḥmūd Afandī al-Ālūsī al-Baghdādī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1301 (A.D. 1883 or 1884).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa bi-al-jawāb ṣudūr al-sāʼilīn, wa-saraḥa fī riyāḍ al-ṣawāb qulūb al-sālikīn. Wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá Nabīyika alladhī ḥalla fī ḥall al-mushkilāt al-maḥall al-asmá, wa-jalla fī jull al-makrumāt, fa-lawlāhu mā ʻalim Ādam al-asmāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi riwāq adhwāq sirrihi al-maktūm, wa-rāwūq raḥīq ʻilmihi al-makhtūm. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad rufiʻat ilayya waraqāt wuḍiʻat fīhā ʻiddat suʼālāt, shāʻa annahā waradat min Īrān, wa-dhāʻa annahā waradat mawrid al-imtiḥān ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding of brown marbled paper half-binding over black cloth. Gold-tooled spine with title.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

Author's colophon (folio 97a): "Wa-qad ṣādafa naqluhā ilá al-bayāḍ marrah rābiʻah mustahall Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-sabʻīn min Hijrat man unzilat ʻalayhi al-Sabʻ al-Mathānī [30 January 1854]."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi. Balaghat kitābatan sanat 1301 [1883/1884]. Kamulat al-Ajwibah al-ʻIrāqīyah li-ʻAllāmat al-dunyā Ālūsī Zādah, Muftī Baghdād, Quddisa sirruhu."

record.title: 880-03 Shawāhid al-tawḍīḥ wa-al-taṣḥīḥ li-mushkilāt al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Ṭāʼī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, ḥujjat al-ʻArab, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Ṭāʼī al-Jayyānī, raḥimahu Allāh, ḥāmidan lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, muṣallīyan ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn: Wa-hādhā kitābun sammaytuhu 'Shawāhid al-tawḍīḥ wa-al-taṣḥīḥ li-mushkilāt al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ', fa-minhā qawl Waraqah ibn Nawfal: Yā laytanī akūnu ḥayyan idh yukhrijuka qawmuka ..."
Script: Good modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Brown marbled paper half binding over black cloth. Spine title gold-tooled.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, al-ʻAzīz al-Wahhāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man ūtiya al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman." To the left of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha ʻalá aṣ[lihi]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Siyāsah al-sharʻīyah fī iṣlāḥ al-rāʻī wa-al-raʻīyah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn ibn Taymīyah al-Ḥarrānī.
record.note: Copied in 1879.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Shaykhunā wa-qudwatunā ... Ibn Taymīyah al-Ḥarrānī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arsala rusulahu bi-al-bayyināt wa-anzala maʻahum al-Kitāb wa-al-Mīzān li-yaqūma al-nās bi-al-qisṭ, wa-anzala al-ḥadīd fīhi baʼsun shadīd wa-manāfiʻ lil-nās ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah mukhtaṣarah fīhā jawāmiʻ min al-siyāsah al-Ilāhīyah wa-al-iyālah al-Nabawīyah, wa-lā yastaghnī ʻanhā al-rāʻī wa-al-raʻīyah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Risālah mushtamilah ʻalá ruʼūs al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-dafʻ al-shubuhāt al-shayṭānīyah. 2. Risālah tuqawwī iʻtiqād ḍaʻafat al-Ḥanafīyah fī madhhab Imāmihim. 3. al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif wa-al-sāʼir / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Fa-nasʼalu Allāh al-ʻAẓim [al-ʻAẓīm] an yuwaffiqanā wa-sāyir ikhwāninā wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn bi-mā yuḥibbuhu lanā wa-yarḍāhu min al-qawl wa-al-ʻamal, fa-innahu lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. M. M. M."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah mushtamilah ʻalá ruʼūs al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-dafʻ al-shubuhāt al-Shayṭānīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in A.H. [12]97 (A.D. 1879).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻilm marfūʻ al-miqdār, wa-jaʻala ahlahu fariḥīna bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-fī Dār al-Qarār, wa-ʻaẓẓamahum bi-qawlihi: Qul hal yastawī alladhīn yaʻlamūn wa-alladhīna lā yaʻlamūn, fa-iʻtabirū yā ulī al-abṣār. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi al-Mukhatār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-akhyār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi Risālah mushtamilah ʻalá ruʼūs al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-dafʻ al-shubuhāt al-Shayṭānīyah wa-bayān ṭarīq al-ʻilm wa-al-naẓar al-kāfī fī maʻrifat Allāh taʻālá, al-murattab ʻalayhi natāʼijuhu, ʻalá mā jará bi-hi ʻādatan Allāh taʻālá ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

With: 3 other titles: 1. al-Siyāsah al-sharʻīyah fī iṣlāḥ al-rāʻī wa-al-raʻīyah / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn Taymīyah. 2. Risālah tuqawwī iʻtiqād ḍaʻafat al-Ḥanafīyah fī madhhab Imāmihim. 3. al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif wa-al-sāʼir / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Thulāth, 9 M [Muḥarram], sanat 97 [1297 = Tuesday, 23 December 1879]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah tuqawwī iʻtiqād ḍaʻafat al-Ḥanafīyah fī madhhab Imāmihim : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in 1879.
L. Nemoy reads "ḍiʻfat" for "ḍaʻafat" in the title.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ittibāʻ al-millah al-Ḥanafīyah, wa-arshadanā ilá sulūk ṭarīqah al-ʻulamāʼ al-Ḥanafīyah, wa-jaʻalanī mimman ʻarafa marātib adillat al-sharʻ wa-kayfīyat dalālātihā, wa-jannabanī ʻan al-taʻaṣṣub li-mujtahidin kāna qurūn [laʻallahu kāna mujtahid qurūn] ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-zamān lammā intahá ilá waqt taḍaʻḍaʻa fīhi arkān ribāʻ al-ʻulūm ... wa-dāʻin daʻā anna Abā Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh, alladhī huwa aqdam al-mujtahidīn, lam yaʻlam Aḥādīth al-Bukhārī wa-khālafa Ḥadīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn ... ashār ilayya baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an aktub risālatan tuqawwī iʻtiqād ḍaʻafat al-Ḥanafīyah fī madhhab Imāmihim ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

With: 3 other titles: 1. al-Siyāsah al-sharʻīyah fī iṣlāḥ al-rāʻī wa-al-raʻīyah / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn Taymīyah. 2. Risālah mushtamilah ʻalá ruʼūs al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-dafʻ al-shubuhāt al-Shayṭānīyah. 3. al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif wa-al-sāʼir / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq wa-al-muʻīn, wa-al-iʻtiṣām bi-ḥablihi al-matīn, wa-Huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif wa-al-sāʼir : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
record.note: Copied in 1879.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa khazāʼin al-ashbāḥ bi-mafātīḥ al-ṣalāḥ, wa-kasara abwāb khabīr al-nufūs bi-ʻulá al-arwāḥ, wa-raqqá muʼadhdhin al-himam al-ḍiʻāf ʻalá manāʼir al-qulūb al-ṣiḥāḥ, ḥayya ʻalá al-falāḥ, ḥayya ʻalá al-fallāḥ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām min al-jism fī al-masāʼ wa-min al-rūḥ fī al-ṣabāḥ, ʻalá ṣāḥib maqām al-tamkīn fī aḥwāl al-talwīn, al-ṭāʼir fī faḍāʼ al-wujūd bilā janāḥ ... wa-qad sammaytuhu al-Shams ʻalá janāḥ ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif al-sāʼir ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

With: 3 other titles: 1. al-Siyāsah al-sharʻīyah fī iṣlāḥ al-rāʻī wa-al-raʻīyah / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn Taymīyah. 2. Risālah mushtamilah ʻalá ruʼūs al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-dafʻ al-shubuhāt al-Shayṭānīyah. 3. Risālah tuqawwī iʻtiqād ḍaʻafat al-Ḥanafīyah fī madhhab Imāmihim.

The colophon of a text on folio 56b reads as follows: "al-Farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Sabt, 6 Muḥarram, sanat 97 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [1297 = Saturday, 20 December 1879]. Tamm."

The text of "al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif wa-al-sāʼir" ends as follows: "... Wa-al-Ḥīnāwī huwa Ibn Jaʻdūn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Akbar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah, fī al-Bāb al-thālith wa-al-sabʻīn minhu: Wa-minhum al-awtād, wa-hum arbaʻah fī kull zamān, lā yazīdūn wa-lā yanquṣūn, raʼaynā minhum shakhṣan bi-madīnat Fās, yuqāl al-dānī Jaʻdūn, kāannahu yanqulu al-ḥinnā bi-al-ujrah. IH. Fa-innahu bayān li-sharaf maqām al-sitr ʻalá maqām al-ẓuhūr, wa-innamā kamula ḥattá lā yarāhu ghayruhu, fa-inna al-ghayr huwa al-ḥijāb."

record.title: Tahdīm al-arkān min Laysa fī al-imkān abdaʻ mimmā kāna : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh Burhān al-Dīn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar ibn Ḥasan al-Biqāʻī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥamīd al-majīd al-faʻʻāl li-mā yurīd alladhī lā tatanāhá maqdūrātuhu, li-annahu lā tuḥṣaru bi-ḥaddin min al-ḥudūd maʻlūmātuhu, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh alladhī mā shāʼa ṣanaʻ, wa-mā arāad aʻṭá, wa-mā arāda manaʻ [ṣaḥḥ], wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu alladhī atá bi-awḍaḥ al-bayyināt, wa-Rasūluhu alladhī ayyadahu bi-badāʼiʻ al-muʻjizāt, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-sallam, kullamā awjada shayʼan abdaʻ mimmā kāna wa-aʻẓam. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun sammaytuhu 'Tahdīm al-arkān min Laysa fī al-imkān abdaʻ mimmā kān' ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Brown marbled half-binding over black cloth. Label with manuscript number and title on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

Author's colophon: "Furigha min musawwadatihi baʻda ʻishāʼ laylat al-Thulāthāʼ, tāsiʻ shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat thalāth wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah [15 October 1478], wa-kāna al-ibtidāʼ fīhi yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ thālithuhu [9 October 1478], wa-furigha naqluhu ilá hunā baʻda ẓuhr al-Ithnayn, thānī ʻishray shahr Rajab al-madhkūr [28 October 1478], kull dhālika fī manzilihi, fī Dimashq al-maḥrūsah, al-mujāwirah lil-Madrasah al-Bādhirānīyah [al-Bādirāʼīyah], qurb al-Jāmiʻ al-Umawī, adāma Allāh taʻmīrahu bi-dhikrihi, wa-zāda fī ijlālihi wa-rifʻat qadrihi. Āmīn. Qāla dhālika jāmiʻuhu al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, wa-al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, dhī al-dīn al-matīn wa-al-waraʻ wa-al-yaqīn, nāṣir al-Sunnah wa-qāmiʻ al-bidʻah, Burhān al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar ibn Ḥasan al-Biqāʻī al-Shāfiʻī, amtaʻa Allāh al-wujūd bi-wujūdihi, wa-naṣarahu wa-aʻānahu, wa-laṭufa bi-hi, wa-khatama la-hu bi-khayr, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi wa-bi-muṣannafātihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn." To the left of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Manẓūmat al-ʻAllāmah al-Raʼīs Ibn Sīnā fī ʻilm al-ṭibb : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Rushd al-Mālikī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. Qāla al-Faqīh al-ajall al-amjad al-Qāḍī, al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-Walīd Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Rushd, adāma Allāh ʻulāh wa-waṣala nuʻmāh: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-munʻim bi-ḥayāt al-nufūs wa-ṣiḥḥat al-ajsām, wa-al-shāfī min al-adwāʼ al-muʻḍilah wa-al-asqām mimmā rukkiba fī al-bashar min al-qiwá al-ḥāfiẓah lil-ṣiḥḥah, al-mubriʼah min al-ālām, wa-fahmin min ṣināʻat al-ṭibb wa-ḥīlat al-burʼ man kāna min dhawī al-albāb wa-al-afhām ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Wa-hunā inqaḍá al-qawl fī sharḥ hādhihi al-urjūzah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-mannihi. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1297, sabʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [4 March 1880], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tammat."

record.title: 880-03 Risālah fī qalb Kāfūrīyāt al-Mutanabbī min al-madīḥ ilá al-hijāʼ : manuscript / li-Shaykh al-Islām ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī al-shahīr bi-Ḥusāmźādah.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻibād, khāliq al-ashyāʼ min al-aḍdād li-yakūna mirʼātan li-tanzīh al-Bārī ʻan al-andād. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man naṭaqa bi-al-Ḍād, al-shafīʻ al-mushfiʻ Yawm al-Tanād, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-amjād wa-aṣḥābihi al-awtād. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ʻarāʼis abkār afkār, lam yaṭmithhunna insun qablahum wa-lā jānn, wa-lā ḥāma ḥawluhā jiyād al-adhhān, wa-lam tasmaʻ bi-mithlihā al-adhhān, yamīlu ilayhā qulūb fursān maydān al-dhawq wa-al-ʻirfān ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Sparse rubrication.
Foliation every five pages in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Intahá. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Nuqilat min nuskhatin bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Miṣrīyah, fī yawm al-Aḥad, li-thalāth ʻashrah baqīna min shahr Shaʻbān, sanat 1297 [25 July 1880] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taḥīyah, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Maqāmāt : manuscript / inshāʼ ... Abī al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi anʻamat fa-zid, wa-aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā adraja min ālāʼihi fī taḍāʻīf ibtilāʼihi, wa-mā razaqanī min dark al-ghibṭah bi-mā adhāqanī min mass al-sukhṭah, wa-mā tahaddala ʻalayya min thamar alṭāfihi ḥattá istamkantu bi-aṣābiʻī min iqtiṭāfihi, wa-astaʻīnuhu fī al-istiqāmah ʻalá sawāʼ sabīlihi, wa-astaʻīdhu bi-hi min al-istināmah ilá al-Shayṭān wa-taswīlih, wa-uṣalī ʻalá al-mubtaʻath bi-al-Furqān al-sāṭiʻ wa-al-burhān al-qāṭiʻ, Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Hādhihi Maqāmāt anshaʼahā ʻAbd Allāh, al-faqīr ilayhi, Abū al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī ..."
Alternate title: al-Naṣāʼiḥ al-kibār.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in black, red, blue, and green.
Binding: Modern library binding. Gold-tooled spine title.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Najazat al-Maqāmāt lil-Zamakhsharī ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu, fī 9 Jumād Awwal, sanat 1300 [18 March 1883], wa-nuqilat min nuskhatin tārīkhuhā sanat 1093 [1682], wa-tilka manqūlah min nuskhatin tārīkhuhā sanat 660 [1261/1262] min Hijrat faṣīḥ al-lisān wa-Sayyid walad ʻAdnān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, fī kull waqt wa-awān. M. Tamma al-kitāb takāmalat // niʻamu al-surūri li-kātibih. Wa-ʻafā al-Ilāhu bi-faḍlihi // wa-bi-mannihi ʻan kātibih."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-Shihābīyah fī al-ṣināʻah al-mūsīqīyah : manuscript / Mikhāʼīl ibn Jirjis Mashāqah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala qānūn al-ṭarab ḍilʻan min dāʼirat al-ʻulūm al-adabīyah, wa-akhraja min ʻīdān al-uṣūl thimāran tartāḍu bihā al-nufūs, fa-taṭīru ilayhā bi-janāḥ al-nakhwah al-ʻArabīyah, ḥamdan yushannifu al-samāʻ bi-dirzān al-anghām al-muqābalah al-munazzahah ʻan al-mukhālafah al-zūrīyah, wa-yufīḍu rāḥat al-arwāḥ ʻalá nādī al-ʻushshāq fī tilka al-ḥaḍrah al-ṭāhirah al-unsīyah ..."
Ronzevalle's edition of the text (al-Mashriq, volume 2) compared and found the same; it is listed by Brockelmann, S II, p. 780 under Risālah fī al-mūsīqī.
Sporadic marginalia.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title: Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-mūsīqá / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Juwaynī.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīdihā bi-Dimashq, bi-qalam muʼallifihā, fī 26 Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1256 [26 July 1840]. Wa-nuqilat fī 4 Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1300 [13 March 1883], ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Aḥmad ʻAbd Rabb al-Nabī al-Ghurayybī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. H."
Number 1 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-mūsīqá : manuscript / [Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Juwaynī].
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-mūsīqá, alladhī huwa ashraf al-ṣināʻāt al-nafsānīyah, li-sharaf masmūʻihā wa-badīʻ mawḍūʻihā, fa-ḥadduhu ṣināʻatun mawḍūʻuhā al-nufūs al-insānīyah, li-annahu ʻilmun yuʻrafu bi-hi aḥwāl al-nufūs, ka-ṣināʻat al-ṭibb, fa-inna mawḍūʻahā badan al-insān, li-annahu ʻilmun yuʻrafu bi-hi aḥwāl dhālika al-badan, wa-afʻāl al-badan tābiʻatun li-aḥwāl al-nafs fī al-ḥaqīqah ..."
Authorship uncertain.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding; spine label with title.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title: al-Risālah al-Shihābīyah fī al-ṣināʻah al-mūsīqīyah / Mikhāʼīl Mishāqah.

Colophon: "Ruqima bi-rasm kutubkhānat al-Janāb al-mubajjal Ḥaḍrat ʻAbd al-Ghanī Afandī Abī Akmal, adāma Allāh rifʻatahu wa-aʻlá maḥallahu, wa-anzalahu manāzil al-saʻd wa-aḥallahu. Āmīn. Bijāh al-Nabī al-Amīn." To the left of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."
Number 2 of 2 titles bound together.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Ṣifat al-dhawq : ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān, wa-ʻallamahu al-bayān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá jamīʻ al-ḥayawān bi-nuṭq al-lisān, wa-khalaq kulla shayʼin fa-qaddarahu taqdīran, wa-jaʻalahu samīʻan baṣīran, thumma hadāhu al-sabīl, immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran, kawwara al-nahār ʻalá al-layl, wa-kawwar al-layl ʻalá al-nahār, wa-khalqa al-khalq aṭwāran, wa-jaʻala al-thaqalayn farīqayn, fa-la-hu al-ḥukm wa-al-tadbīr, farīqun fī al-jannah wa-farīqun fī al-saʻīr ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding; spine label with title.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻAzīz al-Wahhāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Tajrīd al-tawḥīd al-mufīd : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah al-Maqrīzī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1240 (A.D. 1824).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Nabīyinā Muḥammad, khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun jamm al-fawāʼid, badīʻ al-farāʼid, yantafiʻu bi-hi man arāda Allāh wa-al-Dār al-Ākhirah, sammaytuhu 'Tajrīd al-tawḥīd al-mufīd', wa-Allāh asʼalu al-ʻawn ʻalá al-ʻamal bi-hi bi-mannihi ..."
Script: Minute cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding with spine label.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma fī 3 shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1240 [27 September 1824]. Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi fī yawm al-Khamīs, ʻishrīn shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1240 [14 October 1824]. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshada hādhihi al-ummah ilá ādāb lā tuḥṣá, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-faḍāʼil wa-mazāyā lā tustaqṣá ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-multajī ilá karam al-Raʼūf al-Laṭīf, Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharr al-munāwī wa-al-muʻādī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm ilá maʻrifat adāb al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jamāʻ wa-al-malbas wa-al-manām wa-dukhūl al-ḥammām wa-ʻishrat al-nisāʼ wa-tarbiyat al-awlād wa-al-khuddām wa-mā yaḥtājuhu al-musāfir al-hājir lil-waṭan wa-al-manām ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb', wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-ithnay ʻashar maqṣadan ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Mufaṣṣal fī sharḥ al-Muḥaṣṣal : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻUmar al-Kātibī al-Qazwīnī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī afāḍa bi-jūdihi al-ʻāmm wujūd al-ḥaqāʼiq, wa-anshaʼa bi-qudratihi al-tāmmah anwāʻ al-khalāʼiq, wa-iṣṭanaʻa bi-laṭāʼif ṣunʻihi aṣnāf al-maṣnūʻāt, wa-iṭṭalaʻa bi-ʻilmihi al-kāmil ʻalá sāʼir al-maknūnāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-anbiyāʼ al-makhṣūṣīn bi-al-nufūs al-qudsīyah ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna Kitāb al-Muḥaṣṣal alladhī ṣannafahu al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Rāzī ... yaḥtawī ʻalá jull kalām al-mutakallimīn wa-adillatihim ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 466.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.
Leaves trimmed inconsistently.

Colophon: "Najaza al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf alladhī allafahau Mawlānā al-Imām al-kāmil, al-muḥiqq al-muḥaqqiq, burhān al-mudaqqiqīn, afḍal al-mutaqaddimīn wa-al-mutaʼkhkhirīn, najm al-millah wa-al-dīn, ḍiyāʼ al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, ʻAlī ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Kātibī al-Qazwīnī, adāma Allāh ayyāmah, wa-asbagha ʻalá al-ṭālibīn iḥsānahu. Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb, bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻalá dhimmat Maktabat Ḥaḍrat ʻAbd al-Ghanī Afandī Fikrī, aʻānahu Allāh, fī yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq arbaʻah wa-ʻishrīn yawman khalat min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat 1297 Hijrīyah [28 October 1880]. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Afānīn al-balāghah : manuscript / al-Rāghib al-Iṣfahānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh muʻṭī al-insān faḍīlat al-lisān taqwiyatan li-iʻjāz al-Qurʼān. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Nabīyihi al-mukhtār Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-akhyār. Saʼaltum, adāma Allāh al-imtāʻ bikum, an umliya mā yujʻalu amāratan fī naqd al-ashʻār, wa-fāriqan bayna al-nufāyah minhu wa-al-mukhtār, fa-al-mutaʻāṭī li-qarīḍ al-shiʻr wa-naqdihi, wa-in ḥaṣṣala jull adawātihi min al-lughah wa-al-ʻArabīyah wa-al-akhbār wa-al-amthāl wa-ghayr dhālika, wa-yakūnu dhā ṭabʻin māʼilin ilá ʻuyūn al-ashʻār, fa-lā budda la-hu min ālāt al-naqd ilá mā yurshiduhu wa-yaʻḍudhu li-yakūna mujīdan fīmā yansujuhu wa-yanquduhu ..."
Title, as above, supplied by C. Landberg; leaf 1 recto reads: "Kitāb min kalām al-Rāghib fī al-badīʻ."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 288-89.
Script: Old (14th century?) calligraphic naskhī.
Binding: Modern decorated paper library binding.
Foliation on every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with part of "Faṣl fī al-sariqāt" (Chapter on plagiarisms), as follows: "... Wa-al-sariqāt ʻalá aḍrub: al-Intiḥāl, wa-al-ighārah, wa-al-ilmām, wa-al-iftinān fī al-maʻná al-wāḥid, wa-al-naql, wa-al-qalb, wa-al-tabdīl wa-huwa akhd al-ṭarīqh, wa-tanāwul al-lafẓ ..."

record.title: 880-01 al-Fuṣūl : manuscript / lil-Ḥakīm al-Faylasūf Aūṭūqinūs.
record.note: C. Landberg's card refers to Fihrist, 268.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Fuṣūl lil-Ḥakīm al-Faylasūf Ūṭūqnūs, mufassar min kutub Baṭilmiyūs, wa-hiya miʼatā faṣl. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭaybīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qāla Ūṭūqiyūs mufassir kutub al-Ḥakīm al-ʻĀlim Baṭilmiyūs al-arbaʻah wujidat fī hayākil al-Hind kullamā satartahu ʻan al-nās wa-katamtahu ʻanhum fuṣūl marmūzah, fassarahā ṭālib al-ʻilm baʻda farāghihi min al-ḥisāb al-Hindī, fa-yakūnu li-taqaddum mufradātihi [ṣaḥḥ] ʻindahu manfaʻah ʻaẓīmah wa-fassarahā ibtighāʼ thawāb Allāh taʻālá wa-jazīl ʻaṭāʼihi ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Spine label with title.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Kamulat al-Asrār al-nujūmīyah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-Allāh aʻʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillah Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Munṣif fī al-dalālāt ʻalá sariqāt al-Mutanabbī : manuscript / li-Abī Muḥammad al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Wakīʻ.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn. Qāla Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Wakīʻ. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-Karīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-muṣṭafīn al-akhyār al-ṭayyibīn al-abrār, fa-innahu waṣala ilayya kitābuka al-jalīl al-mawḍiʻ al-laṭīf al-mawqiʻ, tadhkur ifrāṭ ṭāʼifah min mutaʼaddibī ʻaṣrinā fī madḥ Abī al-Ṭayyib al-Mutanabbī, wa-taqdīmahu, wa-tanāhiyahum fī taʻẓīmih wa-tafkhīmih, wa-annahum qad afnaw fī dhālika al-awṣāf, wa-tajāwazū al-isrāf, ḥattá laqd faḍḍalūhu ʻaká man taqddama ʻaṣrahu ʻaṣruhu, wa-abarra ʻalá qadrihi qadruhu ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 92.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Hādhā mā wujida min nuskhat al-ktiāb. Wa-lillāh al-ḥamd. Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah li-sabʻin wa-ʻishrīn khalawna min Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat 1297, sabʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf [30 November 1880], ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalayhi, wa-zādahu sharafan wa-karaman ladayhi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
