To the left of the colophon: "Qad nuqilat hādhihi al-nuskhah min nuskhatin bi-khaṭṭ Masʻūd ibn ʻAbbās ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī ʻAmr, wa-allatī najaza taḥrīruhā bi-qalamihi yawm al-Sabt, li-sitt layālin baqīna min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, min sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-khamsimiʼah [18 January 1192]."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Taflīs arbāb al-nawāmīs : manuscript / lil-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Iʻlam inna al-nāmūs muftaqarun ilayhi fī baʻḍ al-aḥyān ka-al-dawāʼ, li-kay yakshifa sharḥ shinat al-aḥwāl ʻinda al-ʻawām, fa-inna ṣāḥib al-sharʻ khāṭaba al-nās ʻalá qadr ʻuqūlihim, wa-al-munazzah dhikruhu khāṭiba kull aḥadin bi-mā yastaḥiqquhu wa-yafʻaluhu, fa-li-qawmin wildān mukhalladūn, wa-li-qawmin sidrun makhḍūd wa-ṭalḥun manḍūd, wa-li-arbāb al-himam al-ʻāliyah wujūhun yawmaʼidhin nāḍirah, wa-al-munshid qad nabbaha fī naẓmihi: Immā dhunābā fa-lā taʻbaʼ bi-manqiṣatin // aw qimmatu al-raʼsi wa-iḥdhar an taqaʻ wasaṭā ..."
Compared with Berlin catalog. Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin 4095, which ends exactly as this manuscript.
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated every five leaves in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-maḥjūb ʻan ladhdhat al-maʻrifah inna aḥbāb Allāh taʻālá yatadallalūna ʻalayhi ka-tadlīl al-maʻshūq ʻalá ʻāshiqi, kamā qālat Rābiʻah: Bi-ḥaqq mā kāna baynī wa-baynika al-bāriḥah ijmaʻ al-yawm baynī wa-bayna Shaykhinā Yūnus ibn ʻUbayd." On the left margin: A collation statement: "Balagha ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 al-Zanjabīl al-qāṭiʻ fī waṭʼ dhāt al-barāqiʻ : manuscript / naẓm ... Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Kindī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhihi al-qaṣīdah al-musammāh bi-'al-Zanjabīl al-qāṭiʻ fī waṭʼ dhāt al-barāqiʻ', min naẓm baʻḍihim, hākadhā wujida ʻalá al-nuskhah bi-khaṭṭ al-Jamālī Yūsuf sibṭ al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām Ibn Ḥajar, wa-wujida ʻalá nuskhah ukhrá naẓm al-Ustādh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Kindī, wa-fīhā ziyādah ʻalá dhālika, wa-hiya hādhihi: Wa-laylun ṭawīlun musbilu al-layli musawaddu // hadānī ilá ṭūli al-taʼarruqi wa-al-suhdi. Fa-baynā anā ubdī al-taḥaddutha sāhiran // ḥadīthan wa-mā qad kāna min sālifi al-ʻahdi. Idh ijtāzanī min jānibi al-dāri nasmatun // muḍawwaʻatun nashran min al-miski wa-al-niddi ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Spine label with Landberg call numbers.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every five leaves in modern pencil.
Bound with 2 other titles (Landberg MSS 170 and 171): 1. Fawāʼid wa-akhbār / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Silafī. 2. al-Durar al-muntathirah fī al-Aḥādīth al-mushtahirah / al-Suyūṭī.

Colophon: "Tammat al-qaṣīdah al-musammāh bi-'al-Zanjabīl al-qāṭiʻ fī waṭʼ dhāt al-barāqiʻ' ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-qad kutibat min nuskhatin saqīmatin jiddan, fa-li-tuqābal ʻalá ghayrihā in wujidat. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Fawāʼid wa-akhbār : manuscript / ʻallaqahā al-Shaykh ... al-Silafī al-Iṣfahānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

On title page: "Juzʼun fīhi Fawāʼid wa-akhbār, ʻallaqahā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Silafī al-Iṣfahānī, ʻan Shaykhihi, min kitābihi al-mutarjam bi-Nathr al-durr, wa-ghayr dhālika, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. M."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qīla li-Abī Muslim ṣāḥib al-dawlah: Innā la-narāka taʼraqu kathīran wa-lā tanāmu, ka-annaka muwakkalun bi-raʻyi al-nujūm aw bi-mawāqiʻ al-waḥyi min al-samāʼ, fa-qāla, Wallāhi, mā huwa dhāka, wa-lākin lī fīhā raʼyun jawwāl, wa-gharīzatun tāmmah, wa-dhihnun ṣāfin, wa-himmatun baʻīdah tatūqu ilá maʻālī al-umūr maʻa ʻayshin ka-ʻayshi al-hamaj al-ruʻāʻ, wa-ḥālatin mutanāhiyatin fī al-ittiḍāʻ ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Bound with 2 other titles (Landberg MSS 169 and 171: 1. al-Zanjabīl al-qāṭiʻ fī waṭʼ dhāt al-barāqiʻ / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shihāb al-Ḥijāzī. 2. al-Durar al-muntathirah fī al-Aḥādīth al-mushtahirah / al-Suyūṭī.

Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-mubārak. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi, wa-ʻitratihi al-ṭāhirīn, wa-salāmuhu. Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Āmīn. M."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Durar al-muntathirah fī al-Aḥādīth al-mushtahirah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻẓīman li-shaʼnihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-anṣārihi wa-aʻwānihi. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna min al-muhimm bayān al-Aḥādīth allatī ishtaharat ʻalá alsinat al-ʻāmmah wa-man ḍāhāhum min al-fuqahāʼ alladhīna lā ʻilma lahum bi-al-Ḥadīth, wa-bayān mā la-hu aṣl min dhālika min ghayrihi. Wa-qad allafa al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn al-Zarkashī fī dhālika kitāban laṭīfan ghayra annahu muḥtājun ilá tanqīḥ wa-ziyādah wa-tankīt wa-ifādah, fa-lakhkhaṣtuhu hunā maʻa ziyādat al-jamm al-ghafīr ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Durar al-muntathirah fī al-Aḥādīth al-mushtahirah' ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Bound with 2 other titles (Landberg MSS 169 and 170): 1. al-Zanjabīl al-qāṭiʻ fī waṭʼ dhāt al-barāqiʻ / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shihāb al-Ḥijāzī. 2. Fawāʼid wa-akhbār / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Silafī.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... thumma qāla: Yā ghulām utrubhu wa-ṭunhu. Thumma ṣallá bi-nā al-ʻishāʼ, thumma qāla li-khādimihi tablughu maʻahu ilá al-Faḍl, fa-ataytuhu, fa-lammā qaraʼ al-kitāb, qāla yā Naḍir inna Amīr al-Muʼminīn qad amar laka bi-khamsīn alf dirham, mā kāna al-sabab, fa-akhbartuhu wa-lam akdhibhu, qāla laḥḥanta Amīr al-Muʼminīn, fa-qultu Kallā, innamā laḥan Hushaym, wa-kāna Hushaym laḥḥānah, wa-qad ittabaʻa alfāẓahu al-fuqahāʼ, fa-amar lī al-Faḍl min ʻindihi bi-thalāthīn alf dirham, fa-aḥraztu thamānīn alf dirham bi-ḥarf istafādahu minnī. Intahá min Sharḥ al-Shaykh al-Bahnasī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, ʻalá al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Tibyān fī mā yaḥillu wa-yaḥrumu min al-ḥayawān : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 855 (A.D. 1451).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir Yā Karīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻImād al-Aqfahsī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manaḥanā bi-karamihi al-hidāyah ilá al-Islām, wa-anzala Kitābahu ʻalá Nabīyaihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, muḥkam al-āyāt mufaṣṣal al-aḥkām, fa-shafá bi-hi waḥar al-ṣudūr, wa-dafaʻa ʻannā bi-hi khaṭarāt al-shukūk wa-al-awhām, wa-aḥalla lanā al-ṭayyibāt tafaḍḍulan, fa-qāla: Wa-uḥilat lakum bahīmat al-anʻām ..."
Marginalia.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Mukhtaṣar al-Tibyān limā yaḥillu wa-yaḥrumu min al-ḥayawānāt, taʼlīf Sayyidinā wa-Shaykhinā wa-qudwatinā, al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻāmil, al-qudwah al-muḥaqqiq, Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh ʻImād al-Dīn ʻImād al-Afqahsī [al-Aqfahsī], nafaʻa Allāh bi-barakatihi al-Muslimīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi yawm al-Thulāthāʼ al-mubārak, thālith shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 855 [14 May 1451]. Wa-katabahu aqall ʻabīd Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Marmalātī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

record.title: 880-02 Naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Abī ʻAbd Allāh Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Mālik al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā ʻallamā // wa-jāda iḥsānan bi-hi wa-anʻamā. Ḥamdan yukāfī mā ʻalā min shaʼnihi // wa-yūjibu al-mazīda min iḥsānihi. Wa-baʻdahu akhuṣṣu khayra al-bashari // Aḥmadan al-shafīʻ yawma al-maḥshari. Bi-khayri mā ṣallá ʻalayhi aḥadu // mā lāḥa fī jawwi al-samāʼi farqadu ..."

Gotha catalog conjectures that the Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ is the work so titled of Ibn al-Ajdābī (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 308); but the contents of that work given in Berlin catalog 7043 (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) are quite differently chapter-headed.
The attribution to Ibn Mālik is fictitious.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī thamāniyat ayyām min shahr Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām, sanat alf wa-thalāthimiʼah [15 May 1883], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, Muḥammad al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī, Allāhumma ighfir la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nasākhatihi, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam." To the left of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-03 Mirʼāt al-murūwāt : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abū Manṣūr ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Thaʻālibī al-Nīsābūrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. [1]300 (A.D. 1883).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall Abū Manṣūr ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Thaʻālibī al-Nīsābūrī: Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh, jalla dhikruhu, ʻalá ālāʼihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr anbiyāʼihi, thumma ḥamd Allāh taʻālá ʻalá baqāʼ al-Ṣadr al-ajall al-Sayyid al-Ṣāḥib, akfá al-kufāh, walī al-niʻam, kahf al-malādh, mawlá al-karam, adāma Allāh Sulṭānahu, wa-ḥarasa ʻizzahu wa-makānahu, fa-inna al-murūʼah lammā kānat lafẓan li-maʻānin kathīrah, wa-isman wāqiʻan ʻalá maḥāsin jammah min makārim al-akhlāq ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Spine label with call number.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb Mirʼāt al-murūwāt lil-Thaʻālibī, bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, wa-dhālika nahār al-Arbaʻ, sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn Rabīʻ Ākhir, sanat 300 [1300 H = 7 March 1883], khutimat bi-khayr, bi-ḥurmat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf <wa-al-sharaf>. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad <Muḥammad>, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Risālat al-Ṣāḥib al-jalīl Abī al-Qāsim Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAbbād ibn al-ʻAbbās ... fī masāwiʼ shiʻr Abī al-Ṭayyib al-Mutanabbī : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd, aṭāla Allāh muddataka, wa-adāma fī al-ʻulūwi raghbataka, fa-al-hawá markabun yahwī bi-ṣāḥibihi, wa-ẓahr baʻīr bi-rākibihi, wa-laysa min al-ḥazm an yuzriya al-ʻālim ʻalá nafsihi bi-al-maʻṣiyah, wa-yaḍaʻa min ʻilmihi bi-al-ḥamīyah, fa-al-nās maʻa ikhtilāfihim wa-tabāyun aṣnāfihim muttafiqūn ʻalá anna taghlīb al-ahwāʼ yaṭmusu aʻyun al-ārāʼ, wa-anna al-mayl ʻan al-ḥaqq yubhimu sabīl al-ṣidq ..."
Also known as: al-Kashf ʻan masāwiʼ shiʻr al-Mutanabbī (Brockelmann).
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Nuqilat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Thulāth, li-thalāthin baqīna min Rajab, sanat 1297, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻah [6 July 1880] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-salām wa-atamm al-taḥīyah."

record.title: 880-02 Qāʻidah fī al-radd ʻalá al-Ghazzālī fī al-tawakkul : manuscript / li-Shaykh al-Islām ... Taqī al-Dīn Ibn Taymīyah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Suʼila, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, ʻammā qālahu Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī fī kitābihi al-maʻrūf Minhāj al-ʻābidīn fī dār al-ākhirah, min al-ʻaqabah al-rābiʻah, wa-hiya al-ʻawāriḍ, baʻda kalāmin taqaddama fī al-tawakkul bi-anna al-rizq al-maḍmūn, qāla fa-in qīla hal yalzamu al-ʻabd ṭalab al-rizq bi-ḥāl, fa-iʻlam inna al-rizq al-maḍmūn huwa al-ghidhāʼ wa-al-qawām, fa-lā yumkinunā ṭalabuhu, idh huw shayʼ min fiʻl Allāh bi-al-ʻabd, ka-al-ḥayāh wa-al-mawt, lā yaqdir al-ʻabd ʻalá taḥṣīlihi wa-lā dafʻihi ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: None.
Foliation in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Nuqilat hādhihi al-risālah min khaṭṭ al-ʻAllāmah Baydakīn al-Turkumānī al-Ḥanafī, wa-huwa min talāmīdh Shaykh al-Islām Ibn Taymīyah, muʼallif hādhihi al-risālah."

record.title: 880-02 al-Farīdah fī ʻilm al-naḥw : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Aqūlu baʻda al-ḥamdi wa-al-salām // ʻalá al-Nabīyi afṣaḥi al-anāmi. al-Naḥwu khayru mā bi-hi al-marʼu ʻunī // idh laysa ʻilmun ʻanhu ḥaqqan yaghtanī. Wa-hādhihi alfīyatun fīhi ḥawat // uṣūlahu wa-nafʻu ṭullābin nawat. Fāʼiqatun Alfīyata Ibni Māliki // li-kawnihā wāḍiḥatu al-masāliki. Wa-jamʻuhā min al-uṣūli mā khalat // ʻanhu wa-ḍabṭu mursalātin ahmalat ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Naẓmtuhā naẓman badīʻa al-nahjati // sahlan wa-wāfá al-khtmu fī Dhī al-Ḥijjati. Min ʻāmi khamsin wa-thamānīna // baʻda thamānimiʼatin lil-Hijrati [February/March 1481]. Tammat bi-ḥamdi Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqihi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam." To the left of the colophon: Collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-radd ʻalá man iddaʻá al-tanāquḍ fī kalām Allāh ʻazza wa-jalla min al-zanādiqah : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad Ḥayāt al-Sindī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-Kitābihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man sharrafahu bi-khiṭābihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi. Ammā baʻd, fa-al-Qurʼān kitābun ʻazīz lā yaʼtīhi al-bāṭil min bayna yadayhi wa-lā min khalfihi, tanzīlun min Ḥakīmin Ḥamīd. Wa-al-tanāquḍu fī maʻānīhi fī nafs al-amr muḥāl, wa-kadhā fī maʻānī Ḥadīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-kadhā mā baynahumā, li-anna dhālika innamā yataʼattá mimman lā yuḥīṭu bi-kull shayʼ ʻilman, wa-mimman lam yuʻṣam min dhālika ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 522; S III, p. 1305.
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Sparse rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Muʼallif hādhihi al-awrāq Muḥammad Ḥayāt al-Sindī al-Madanī. Allāhumma, mā kāna min ṣawāb fa-laka al-ḥamd ʻalá dhālika, wa-mā kāna min khaṭaʼ fa-ighfirhu, Yā Allāh. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Nafḥat al-rayḥānah wa-rashḥat ṭilāʼ al-ḥānah. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī : manuscript / lil-Adīb Muḥammad Amīn al-Dīn ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Muḥibbī al-Dimashqī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 1279-1281 (A.D. 1863-1865).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Unazzihu Allāh wa-usabbiḥuhu, wa-astanīluhu al-tawfīq wa-astamniḥuhu, ḥāmidan la-hu taʻālá bi-asmāʼihi, ʻalá jalāʼil ālāʼihi wa-daqāʼiq naʻmāʼihi, ḥamdan tataʻaṭṭaru majārī al-anfās bi-nafḥatin min nafaḥātihi, wa-tatadaffaqu biḥār al-afkār bi-rashḥatin min rashaḥātihi, wa-aṣilu dhālika mā dumtu anṭuqu bi-kalām, bi-ṣilāh [bi-ṣilāt] ṣalāh wa-atamm salām, ʻalá man abdaʻa munshiʼ al-wujūd inshāʼahu ʻalá aḥsan fiṭratin wa-ajmalihā, wa-naẓama bi-hi ʻiqd al-dīn baʻda nathrihi, fa-daʻá li-atamm millatin wa-akmalihā, alladhī ūtiya jawāmiʻ al-kalim, wa-lam yanṭiq ʻan al-hawá ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap).
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon of volume 1: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Ḥayy al-Qayyūm. Yalīhi al-juzʼ al-thānī, awwaluhu al-Bāb al-thālith, fī nawābigh bulaghāʼ al-Rūm, wa-dhālik min kitāb Nafḥat al-rayḥānah wa-rashḥat ṭilāʼ al-ḥānah, lil-Adīb Muḥammad Amīn al-Dīn ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Muḥibbī al-Dimashqī al-Ḥanafī, al-mutawaffá sanat Thamān wa-miʼah wa-alf Hijrīyah [1696/1697], bi-qalm ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Afandī ibn ʻUthmān ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Ḥājj Aḥmad ibn Yāsīn al-Jāqūjī Zādah al-Kharbuṭlī mutawaṭṭin al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah, min awwalihi ilá awākhir tarjamat al-Sayyid ʻAlī akhū al-Sayyid Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī. Wa-kāna tamām naskhihi fī awākhir al-tarjamah al-madhkūrah ʻaṣr yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, li-ʻashrin maḍayna min shahr Shaʻbān al-mukarram, ʻām tisʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [21 January 1863], wa-min baʻdihi ilá tamām hādhā al-juzʼ bi-qalam al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Rashwān ibn ʻUthmān ibn ʻAlī al-Kharbuṭlī mutawaṭṭin al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah, aṣīl yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, li-arbaʻata ʻasharah maḍayna min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, fī al-sanah al-madhkūrah [3 May 1863], bi-rasm al-Amīr ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bik Nāfiʻ ibn Khalīl Afandī Qawālah Lī, Mudīr al-Daqahlīyah sābiqan, min umarāʼ Muḥammad ʻAlī Bāshā, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. M."

Colophon of volume 2: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, wa-kāna ākhir intihāʼihā yawm al-thulāth, al-muwāfiq sittah wa-ʻishrūn yawman maḍat min shahr Shaʻbān al-mukarram alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1281 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [24 January 1865], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Tafsīr al-Bayḍāwī : manuscript / Muḥammad Afandī ibn Ḥamzah.
record.note: Holograph (identified by C. Landberg).
The date A.H. 1081 (A.D. 1670) is found on leaf 201 verso.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā sabīl Kitābihi, wa-awradanā salsabīl sharābihi, wa-waffaqanā li-sunan man khaṣṣahu bi-iqtirābihi, wa-sharrafahu bi-mazāyā khiṭābihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu, khayr nabīyin arsalah, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mūfīn bi-ʻahdihi min baʻdihi, al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādābihi, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn dāʼibayn mā taḍallaʻa mumtāḥun min ʻadhb ʻubābihi. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna aḥsan al-ḥadīth kalām Allāh al-muʻjiz li-kull muṣqaʻin mubarriz, wa-khayr al-hady hady Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
For the author cf. Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 437.
On the lower edge: "Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Bayḍāwī li-Muḥammad Afandī."

On folio 201b: "... Hādhā mā sharaʻtu fī tanmīqihi maʻa taḥqīqihi ʻalá mawāqiʻ al-mudhākarah fī Tafsīr al-Qāḍī al-muḥaqqiq al-Bayḍāwī awwal shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, ʻāma aḥad wa-thamānīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-fākhirah [21 May 1670] bi-Madrasat al-Taqawīyah, bi-Dimashq al-Shām al-maḥmīyah ..."
Script: Cursive hand.
Binding: In brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: Text ends as follows: "... Wa-lā yakhfá ʻalayka anna jaʻl al-ishārah lil-taṣdīr, wa-in ṣaḥḥa, fī ghāyat al-buʻd. Wa-ammā al-ʻaṭf alladhī irtaḍāhu khabar ṣaḥīḥ bi-ḥasb al-ʻArabīyah, wa-lā bi-ḥasb al-maʻná, wa-li-dhā lam yaltafitū ilayhi maʻa ẓuhūrihi, wa-hiya jumlah iʻtirāḍīyah lā maḥalla lahā min al-iʻrāb, wa-fīhā kamā fī al-Kashshāf nawʻ min al-iʻjāz, wa-dalīl ākhar ʻalá ithbāt al-nubūwah limā fīhā min al-ikhbār bi-ghayb lā yaʻlamuhu illā Allāh. Intahá."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-ʻasjadīyah fī al-maʻānī al-Muʼayyadīyah, : manuscript / ʻAbbās ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣanʻānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 991 (A.D. 1583).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... lil-Qurʼān al-Karīm, fa-ḥīnaʼidhin warada al-rasm al-sharīf wa-al-amr al-ʻālī bi-an ūrida lumaʻan mimmā dhakarahu ahl al-ʻilm wa-al-adab min al-farq bayna al-sariqāt wa-al-muʻāraḍāt wa-al-tabdīlāt wa-al-iḥtidhāʼāt, wa-al-istishhād ʻalá dhālika bi-mulaḥin min aqwāl al-qudamāʼ wa-al-muḥdathīn, maʻa īrād mā yūhimu annahu muʻāraḍah ... wa-sammaytuhā bi-al-Risālah al-ʻasjadīyah fī al-maʻānī al-Muʼayyadīyah ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, black, and brown.
Binding: Modern library binding of black textured paper over red leather.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in Arabic numbers.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min zabr hādhihi al-risālah ḍaḥwat nahār al-Jumʻah, thāmin wa-ʻishrīn shahr Shaʻbān al-karīm, sanat 991 [16 September 1583], bi-rasm Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, al-sharīf al-ḥasīb al-nasīb, al-maqām al-karīm al-ʻālī, ḥāʼiz mazāyā al-majd wa-al-rutab al-ʻawālī, Abā ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Abī Numayy ibn Barakāt, adāma Allāh taʻālá ayyāmahu al-zāhirah, wa-jamaʻa la-hu khayriay al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, bi-khaṭṭ afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilayhi, ʻAbd al-Hādī ibn Saʻīd al-Ḍiyāʼī, sāmaḥahu Allāh taʻālá."

record.title: 880-02 al-Maqāmah al-Rūmīyah wa-al-mudāmah al-rawmīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ṣiddīqī sibṭ Āl al-Ḥasan.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1152 (A.D. 1739).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man jaʻala al-adab ghidhāʼ al-rūḥ, wa-fākihat al-qalb al-majrūḥ, wa-āsī al-fuʼād al-maqrūḥ, wa-ṭabīb al-jism al-maṭrūḥ. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá sayyid al-udabāʼ, ṣāḥib al-naṣr wa-al-futūḥ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādābihi, mā uḥsiya ghabūqun wa-ṣabūḥ. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-wará, wa-aḥqar man barā, Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ṣiddīqī sibṭ al-Ḥasan, waffaqahu Allāh li-kull fiʻlin ḥasan, wa-bi-kull jamīlin la-hu aḥsan: Lammā waqaftu ʻalá al-Maqāmah al-Rūmīyah lil-ʻālim al-ʻāmil wa-al-humām al-kāmil, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Khafājī ... wa-anā ubayyiḍu fī al-raḥlah al-Rūmīyah al-musammāt [al-musmmāh] bi-Tafrīq al-humūm wa-taghrīq al-ghumūm fī al-riḥlah ilá bilād al-Rūm, khaṭara lī an aḍaʻ maqāmatan usammīhā al-Maqāmah al-Rūmīyah wa-al-muʻāmah [al-mudāmah] al-rawmīyah ..."
For the author cf. Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 348.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Nuqilat min al-nuskhah al-muḥarrarah bi-qalam muʼallifihā, ḥafiẓahu Allāh taʻālá, ʻalá yad tilmīdh muʼallifihā wa-aḥqar khuddāmihi, al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Tamīmī al-Dārī, fī awāʼil shahr Rajab al-murjib, sanat 1152 [4 October 1739], aḥsana Allāh taʻālá minhā al-khitām, bi-jāh Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Qawāʻid al-sanīyah fī qirāʼat Ḥafṣ ʻan ʻĀṣim min ṭarīq al-Shāṭibīyah : manuscript / li-kātibihi ... Ibrāhīm al-ʻAdawī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1087 (A.D. 1676).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm raḥmatan lil-ummah wa-taysīran, wa-fahhamanā ṭuruq qirāʼatihi, fa-humnā fī wujūh riwāyātihi muntashiqīn ʻabīran. Aḥmaduhu an manna fī qirāʼatihi bi-al-ihtidāʼ al-ḥasan al-adāʼ, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ʻabdihi wa-Rasūlihi, al-makhṣūṣ bi-al-Qurʼān al-mubīn wa-al-Kitāb al-mustabīn, al-jadīd ʻalá taqādum al-aʻṣār, wa-al-ladhīdh ʻalá tawālī al-takrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna talaqqawhu min fīhi al-karīm ghaḍḍan, wa-wāẓabū ʻalayhi tilāwatan wa-ʻarḍan ..."
For date of the author's death see Bankipore catalog (Catalogue Of The Arabic And Persian Manuscripts in The Oriental Public Library at Bankipore), XVIII, no. 1271.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min jamʻihā yawm al-Jumʻah, sādis ʻishrīn khalat min Jumādá al-Ūlá min shuhūr sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-alf [6 August 1676]. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihā ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā Ibrāhīm al-ʻAdawī, aḥsana Allāh khitāmahu wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Futūḥ al-ghayb : manuscript / lil-Imām ... ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlī.
record.note: An ex-libris on leaf 1 recto, apparently by the author's grandson, is dated A.H. 681 (A.D. 1282).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim, al-ḥabr al-kāmil, Shaykh Shuyūkh al-Islām, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Abī Ṣāliḥ ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jīlī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, ʻadada khalqihi, wa-midād kalimātihi, wa-zinat ʻarshihi, wa-riḍá nafsihi, wa-ʻadad kull shifʻ wa-witr, wa-raṭib wa-yābis, wa-jamīʻ mā khalaqa Rabbunā, wa-dharaʼa wa-barā, dāʼiman, abadan, sarmadan, ṭayyiban, mubārakan ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap; multiple layers of manuscript waste exposed.
Decoration: Decorative designs on title page and colophon. Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih."

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawhar al-maḥbūk fī ʻilm al-sulūk : manuscript / taʼlīf ... ʻAlī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-mulaqqab bi-al-Shaykh ʻUlwān al-Ḥamawī thumma al-Hītī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1094 (A.D. 1683).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Jawhar al-maḥbūk fī ʻilm al-sulūk, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAlī ibn ʻAṭīyah, al-mulaqqab bi-al-Shaykh ʻUlwān, al-Ḥamawī, thumma al-Hītī, raḥimahu Allāh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīru ilá Mawlāhu dhī al-karami // ʻUlwān dhū al-dhanbi wa-al-ʻiṣyāni wa-al-jarami. Bismi al-Ilāhi atá fatʹḥī wa-mukhtatamī // wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi Rabbī bāriʼi al-nasami. Thumma al-ṣalātu maʻa al-taslīmi mā ṣadaḥat // warqāʼu daʼban ʻalá al-Mukhtāri fī al-qidami. Wa-al-āli wa-al-ṣaḥbi wa-al-azwāji qāṭibatan // wa-man yalūdhu bihim min sāʼir al-khadami ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Blue marbled paper over paper pasteboards.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Qad raqamahu zayn al-kuttāb wa-arhab al-aḥbāb, al-mulaqqab ʻAlī Akhī al-Bāb, al-mansūb ilá Khalīfat Rasūl Allāh ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilayhi, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, al-ʻāʼish bi-dunyāh makrūb, al-ḥaqīr ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥājj Ayyūb, al-Tikrītī nasaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Qādirī ṭarīqatan. Allāhumma ighfir zallātihi, wa-umḥu sayyiʼātihi, wa-tub ʻalayhi. Innaka anta al-tawwāb al-raḥīm, bi-jāh Ṭāha wa-Yāsīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh khāmis ʻashar min shahr Shawwāl al-mubārak, sanat arbaʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-alf baʻda al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [7 October 1783], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kanz al-manshūr fī al-tahniʼah bi-al-aʻyād wa-al-aʻwām wa-al-shuhūr : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Sukkarī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1288 (A.D. 1871).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala ayyām al-ʻīdayn faraḥan wa-surūran, wa-ḥarrama ṣawmahā, wa-jaʻalahu bayna al-nās mashhūran, wa-nadaba lanā fīhā an nalqá al-ikhwān bi-wajh ṭalq masrūran, wa-naqūlu lahum taqabbala Allāh minnā wa-minkum qawlan layyinan maysūran. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā asbagha ʻalá ʻibādihi min ʻawāṭir ālāʼihi wa-ghawāmir ʻaṭāʼihi ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-ʻAlī, ʻAbd Allāh al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Sukkarī, min dhurrīyat Banī Shyabah wa-Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayn, al-Qādirī al-Ḥanafī ... wa-sammaytuhā: al-Kanz al-manshūr fī al-tahniʼah bi-al-aʻyād wa-al-aʻwām wa-al-shuhūr ..."
The title, as above, is given in the preface and in the colophon; on leaf 1 recto, it is given as al-Durr al-manshūr fī al-tahniʼah bi-al-aʻyād wa-al-aʻwām wa-al-shuhūr.
Script: Small, not very legible, naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Two series of foliation: one in modern pencil, another in Arabic numbers in ink.

Colophon (folio 13a): "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min jamʻ hādhihi al-awrāq, al-musammāh bi-'al-Kanz al-manshūr fī al-tahniʼah bi-al-aʻyād wa-al-aʻwām wa-al-shuhūr', ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā, rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-ʻAlī, ʻAbd Allāh al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Sukkarī ... fī yawm al-Khamīs, wa-huwa yawm al-thānī ʻashar min shahr Shaʻbān al-mubārak, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thamānī wa-thamānīn [27 October 1871] ... (folio 13b): Tammat kitābatan fī yawm al-Thulāthah, wa-huwa yawm al-thālith wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak [6 December 1871]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. M.M.M."

record.title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-wuṣūl ilá sharḥ Lubb al-uṣūl : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā Zayn al-Dīn al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Date of copying, 10th century A.H., supplied by C. Landberg.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā, Shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, sulṭān al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-uṣūlīyīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā Zayn al-Dīn al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, fasaḥ Allāh muddatahu, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatihi: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara badāʼiʻ maṣnūʻātihi ʻalá aḥsan niẓām, wa-khaṣṣa min baynihā man shāʼa bi-mazīd al-ṭawl wa-al-inʻām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ li-mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Lubb al-uṣūl alladhī ikhtaṣartu fīhi Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ ... wa-sammaytuhu Ghāyat al-wuṣūl ilá sharḥ Lubb al-uṣūl ..."

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Qawāʻid fī al-fiqh. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Lādhiqī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhumā, ḥāmidan muṣallīyan musalliman muḥasbilan. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. M."
Script: Fair 16th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover deteriorated; flap missing.
Decoration: Rubrication.

record.title: 880-02 Qurrat al-ʻayn fī misāḥat ẓarf al-qullatayn : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAjamī al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1002 (A.D. 1594).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn wa-al-Mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAjamī al-Shinshawrī al-Shāfiʻī al-Faraḍī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-laṭafa bi-hi, wa-tafaḍḍala ʻalayhi: Qad kuntu fī kull zamān wa-ḥīna uḥaddithu nafsī bi-al-kalām ʻalá misāḥat al-qullatayn shāriḥan ʻibārat Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām ... Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... fī Sharḥ al-Rawḍ ... sammaytuhu 'Qurrat al-ʻayn fī misāḥat ẓarf al-qullatayn', wa-ḥaṣartuhu fī muqaddimah wa-bāb wāḥid wa-khātimah ..."
Script: Cursive naskhī, in red and black, with diagrams.
Binding: Modern library binding of decorated paper over pasteboards.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Katabahu al-muftaqir ilá Rabbihi al-hādī Abū Bakr ibn Muḥammad al-Kurd[ī] al-ʻImādī khāms ʻashar Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat ithnayn baʻda al-alf [1 September 1594]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Jawāhir al-muḍīyah fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Muḥyī al-Dīn Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sālim ibn Abī al-Wafāʼ al-Ḥanafī al-Qurashī.
record.note: Copied in the 15th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu wa-al-ʻaẓmah wa-al-kibriyāʼ li-man la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná, al-ḥayy al-dāʼim al-bāqī, alladhī lā yabīd wa-lā yafná, al-khāliq al-bārī al-muṣawwir, alladhī khalaqa fa-sawwá, al-Rabb al-ʻazīz al-ḥakīm alladhī aḍḥaka wa-abká, al-qādir al-jabbār al-qahhār alladhī amāta wa-aḥyā, al-mubdī al-muḥyi al-mumīt, ilayhi al-muntahá ..."
Partial title on the lower edge: "Fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah."
C. Landberg's catalogue states that this copy was made by Ibn Fahd ʻUmar.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black; some leaves supplied in a later hand.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion; cover deteriorated; part of flap missing.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Qīla kāna naqsh khātim al-Imām Mālik 'Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl', fa-qīla la-hu fī dhālik, fa-qāla innī raʼytu qawman qālū ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, fa-inqalabū bi-niʻmatin min Allāh wa-faḍl, wa-ittabaʻū riḍwān Allāh, wa-Allāh dhū faḍlin ʻaẓīm. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-arab fī funūn al-adab : al-fann al-awwal [wa-]al-fann al-thānī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Dāʼim al-Bakrī al-Taymī al-Qurashī al-maʻrūf bi-al-Nuwayrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 973 (A.D. 1566).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh ʻalayhi tawakkaltu. Qāla al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi wa-jamīl afḍālihi, al-rājī maghfirat Rabbihi wa-jazīl nawālihi, al-mustaghfir min khalalihi wa-zalalihi, al-wāthiq bi-amalihi lā bi-ʻamalihi, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Dāʼim al-Bakrī al-Taymī al-Qurashī al-maʻrūf bi-al-Nuwayrī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa al-samāʼ wa-fātiq ratqihā, wa-munshiʼ al-saḥāb wa-mūkif wadqahā, wa-mujrī al-aflāk wa-mudabbirihā, wa-muṭliʻ al-nayyirāt wa-mukawwirihā ..."
Part II begins on leaf 115 recto.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf (or so) in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Kamula al-Juzʼ al-thānī min kitāb Nihāyat al-arab fī funūn al-adab, wa-naqaltuhu min nuskhatin kutibat min khaṭṭ al-muṣannif, taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih. Yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, fī awwal al-Juzʼ al-thālith, al-Qism al-thānī, min al-Fann al-thānī fī al-Amthāl. Min kitābat al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-dhalīl, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Ghafūr al-Mannān, Abū al-Yusr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qūṣī al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu, wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, wa-ballaghahu fī al-dārayn amālahu, wa-khatama bi-al-ṣāliḥāt aʻmālahu, wa-faʻala Allāh bi-wālidayhi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-aqāribihi wa-al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-mawt ʻalá al-īmān. Yā Arḥam al-Rāḥimīn. Wa-kutiba bi-rasm Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, al-Maqarr al-Karīm al-ʻĀlī al-Mawlá ibn al-Amīr al-Kabīr ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rajab al-murjib al-aṣab al-aṣamm al-fard al-ḥarām, min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [27 February 1566], aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā fī khayr wa-ʻāfiyah wa-salāmah. Wa-in tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-03 ʻUmdat al-aḥkām : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Taqī al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAlī ibn Surūr al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 791 (A.D. 1389).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ḥāfiẓ al-ʻallāmah, Muḥaddith al-Shām, Shaykh al-Islām, Taqī al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Surūr al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh wa-raḍiya ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-Jabbār, al-Wāḥid al-Qahhār ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna baʻḍ ikhwānī saʼalanī ikhtiṣār jumlatin fī Aḥādīth al-aḥkām, min mā ittafaqa ʻalayhi al-Imāmān Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Ibrāhīm wa-Muslim ibn al-Ḥajjāj, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼālihi, rajāʼ al-manfaʻah bi-hi, wa-asʼalu Allāh an yanfaʻanā bi-hi, wa-man katabahu, aw samiʻahu, aw ḥafiẓahu wa-naẓara fīhi, wa-an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi, mūjiban lil-fawaz ladayhi, fa-innahu ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Title, as above, appears in the colophon; title on leaf 1 recto (in a later hand) as: Kitāb al-ʻUmdah fī al-aḥkām ʻan al-Nabī ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, generously vocalized. Leaves 1-25 supplied by a later hand.
Binding: In green leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Two series of foliation: one every fifth leaf in modern pencil, another in Arabic numbers in ink.

Colophon: "Tammat ʻUmdat al-aḥkām bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻwnihi. Qūbilat ʻalá ḥasb al-istiṭāʻah, wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Allāhumma infaʻ bihā kātibahā wa-mālikahā bayna yadayka. Wa-tawfīqihi, ʻalá yad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Saʻdī al-Gharsī al-ʻImādī al-ʻAfīfī, ḥāmidan lillāh wa-muṣalliyan ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran, wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Khamīs, al-thānī ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, min shuhūr sanat aḥad wa-tisʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [18 April 1389]."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Masāʼil fī al-ṭibb lil-mutaʻallimīn : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Ṣādiq al-Nīsābūrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1192 (A.D. 1778).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbī tammim. Bi-ʻawnika wa-luṭfika waʻʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda muʻtarifin bi-ālāʼih, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá jamīʻ anbiyāʼihi. Qāla al-Shaykh Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Ṣādiq al-Nīsābūrī, raḥimahu Allāh: In arbāb al-maʻrifah bi-ṣināʻat al-ṭibb qad tawāṭaʼū ʻalá anna al-rāghib fī hādhā al-ʻilm yajibu an yaftatiḥa taʻallumahu bi-Kitāb al-Masāʼil li-Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq, li-annahu ʻimlahu madkhalan lil-mutaʻallimīn ilayhi, li-dhālika lam yūdiʻhu shayʼan min al-maṭālib al-ghāmiḍah, wa-li-hādhā ʻamilahu ʻalá ṭarīq al-masʼalah wa-al-jawāb ..."
Title from: Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 1097.
On folio 1a: An oval stamp of the bookstore "al-Maktabah al-Ḥalabīyah N.H. Naʻūm Ḥāyik".
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In black leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with gold-tooled central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication. Large opening title.
Foliation every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi tammat al-khātimah, bi-tamāmihā tamma al-kitāb bi-asrihi. Tamma bi-maʻūnat Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi [... ... ...] dūna ghayrihi, fī 5 Ṣafar 1192 [5 March 1778]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Masāʼil al-ṣaghīr : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṣādiq.
record.note: Copied in Damascus in A.H. 692 (A.D. 1293).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá rusulihi wa-anbiyāʼihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṣādiq: Qaṣdunā fī hādhā al-kitāb an nastathmira mā yaḥtāju ilayhi al-mubtadī bi-Kitāb al-Masāʼil li-Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq fī tafhīmihi mā dhakarnā fī sharḥinā li-hādhā al-kitāb min ghayr an ūrida min al-ʻawīṣ shayʼan, fa-inna fī īrādihi iḍāʻah li-zamān al-mubtadī bimā lā yujdī ʻalayhi fāʼidah ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover deteriorated exposing manuscript waste; flap missing.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-asrihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-ʻāshir min shahr Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat ithnayn wa-tisʻīn wa-sittimiʼah lil-Hijrah [25 April 1293] bi-Dimashq al-maḥrūsah. Katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi Zayd ibn Manṣūr ibn Zayd al-Kūfī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Zāhir fī maʻānī kalimāt al-nās : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim ibn al-Anbārī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Qadīm al-Dāʼim alladhī laysa li-qidamihi ibtidāʼ wa-lā li-daymūmatihi intihāʼ alladhī ḥajjat al-albāb badāʼiʻ ḥikamih, wa-khaṣamat al-ʻuqūl laṭāʼif ḥujajih, wa-qaṭaʻat ʻudhr al-mulḥidīn ʻajāʼib ṣunʻih, wa-kallat al-alsun ʻan tafsīr ṣifatih, wa-inḥasarat al-ʻuqūl ʻan kunh maʻrifatih, lā taḥwīhi al-amākin, wa-lā taḥudduhu li-kibriyāʼih al-fikar ..."
The title "Kitāb al-Zāhir li-Ibn al-Anbārī" appears on the lower edge.
Marginalia.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī (ca. 18th century), in red and black; gold borders, ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 10 verso.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with gilded central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication. Gilt frames throughout.
Two series in foliation: one in modern pencil, the other in Arabic numbers in ink.
Colophon: "Najaza al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-luṭfihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn."

record.title: Ms., [after 1812].
record.note: Refers to the cultivation of the Arts in England.
Transcription in object file.

record.title: 880-03 Khulāṣat al-Tanwīr wa-dhakhīrat al-muḥtāj wa-al-faqīr : manuscript / Mūsá ibn Asʻad al-Maḥāsinī.
record.note: Holograph. Colophon dated A.H. 1159 (A.D. 1746) at al-Madrasah al-Bayānīyah, Damascus; the date A.H. 1161 (A.D. 1748) appears on leaf 190 recto.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
For Khaṭīb al-Tamartāshī cf. Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 311; S II, p. 427.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla faqīr ʻafw Rabbihi al-Ghanī, Mūsá al-ḥaqīr al-ʻājiz al-Maḥāsinī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad waffaqā // lil-fiqhi fī al-dīni wa-zādahu irtiqā. Thumma al-ṣalātu maʻa salāmin ʻaṭiri // ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-ṭāhiri al-muṭahhari. Wa-ālihi man salakū khayra sanan // wa-ṣaḥbihi man awḍaḥū nahja al-sunan ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black, with gilt ʻunwāns. (?)
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication. Gilt frames on the first two leaves, red frames throughout.

Colophon (leaf 198 recto) : "Wa-kāna ifrāghuhā fī qālab al-jamʻ baʻda al-tafrīq laylat al-niṣf [min Shaʻbān?], sanat tisʻ wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [1 September 1746], maʻa ishtimāl al-ḥāl ʻalá al-ḍīq. Ullifat bi-rasm khizānat muḥarrir al-maʻqūl wa-al-manqūl, ʻallāmat ʻaṣrihi fī kull fann, sīyamā ʻilm al-uṣūl, Janāb Mawlānā wa-Sayyidinā Ḥaḍrat Shaykh al-Islām, Muftī al-Mamlakah al-ʻAlīyah wa-al-bilād al-Islāmīyah, li-takūna tadhkirah li-radʻ man yuʻāriḍu al-awāmir al-sulṭānīyah. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh, fa-innahā bihā tudfaʻu kull balīyah. Qālahu bi-famihi wa-raqamahu bi-qalamihi, faqīr ʻafw Rabbihi al-Ghanī, Mūsá ibn Asʻad al-Maḥāsinī, al-mudarris bi-al-Madrasah al-Bayānīyah bi-Dimashq al-maḥmīyah."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Nūr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūd wa-al-Ḥabash : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abū al-Faraj ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Copied presumably in the 14th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtāra min jamīʻ al-makhlūqāt al-insān thumma iṣṭafāhu min ahl al-tuqá wa-al-īmān, thumma jaʻala maḥalla naẓarihi al-qulūb lā al-abdān, fa-huwa yanẓuru ilá ṣarfāʼ al-asrār lā ilá naqāʼ al-abdān, fāwata bayna al-Ādamīyīn, fa-minhum malikun wa-minhum sulṭān, yukhriju al-ḥayy min al-mayt, fa-al-khalīl man āzara dhī al-kufrān, wa-yukhriju al-mayt min al-ḥayy ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black, fully vocalized.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Tamm al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdihi, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá khayr khalqihi, Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-azwājihi wa-tābiʻīhi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Īwān al-ghabash fī faḍāʼil al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtāra min jamīʻ al-makhlūqāt al-insān, thumma iṣṭafá minhu ahl al-tuqá wa-al-īmān, thumma jaʻala maḥalla naẓarihi al-qulūb lā al-abdān, fa-Huwa yanẓuru ilá ṣafāʼ al-asrār lā ilá baqāʼ al-alwān, fāwata bayna al-Ādamīyīn, fa-minhum malakun wa-minhum sulṭān, yukhriju al-ḥayya min al-mayt, fa-al-khalīl man āzara dhī al-kufrān, wa-yukhriju al-mayta min al-ḥayy, fa-min Nūḥ Kanʻān, jará qadaruhu fa-kafara Abū Ṭālib wa-aslama ʻUthmān, wa-ḍalla Abū Lahab wa-udhina li-Bilāl fī al-adhān ..."
Script: Fair (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black. Lower outer corners frayed.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Text ends as follows: "... Wa-iḥdhar min mukhālaṭat akthar ahl hādhā al-zamān, fa-inna al-ṭabʻa yasriqu ʻādāt al-muʻāshirīn, wa-li-takun mukhālaṭatuka lil-salaf bi-al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalá aḥwālihim, wa-ḥādith al-Qurʼān bi-al-fikr fīhi fī al-khalawāt, wa-taṣaffaḥ jihāz al-raḥīl qabla an tufājá [tufājaʼa] baghtatan fa-lā yurá ʻindaka ghayr al-tadabbur."
Colophon: "Tamma. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Akhbār al-ʻilmīyah fī ikhtiyārāt Shaykh al-Islām Taqī al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah : manuscript / taṣnīf ... ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbbās al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Laḥḥām al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Yā Karīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah, Bāb al-miyāh al-ṭāhirah tāratan takūnu min al-aʻyān al-najisah, wa-tāratan min al-aʻmāl al-khabīthah, wa-tāratan min al-aḥdāth al-māniʻah, fa-min al-awwal qawluhu taʻālá 'Wa-thiyābaka fa-ṭahhir', ʻalá aḥad al-aqwāl, wa-qawluhu taʻālá 'fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū' al-āyah, wa-min al-thānī qawluhu taʻālá 'Innamā yurīdu Allāhu li-yudhhiba ʻankumu al-rijsa ahla al-bayt, wa-min al-thālith qawluhu taʻālá 'wa-in kuntum junuban fa-iṭṭahharū' ..."
Laoust has the title as: al-Qawāʻid al-uṣūlīyah wa-al-akhbār al-ʻilmīyah.
Brockelmann gives the author's name as: ʻAlī ibn ʻAbbās ibn al-Lajjām.
Script: Coarse naskhī (ca. 1800).
Binding: Modern library binding with marbled paper over pasteboards. Paper label on front cover.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... wa-law kāna qādiran ʻalá adá [adāʼ] al-dayn wa-imtanaʻa, wa-raʼá al-ḥākim manʻahu min fuḍūl al-akl wa-al-nikāḥ, fa-la-hu dhālika, idh al-taʻzīr lā yakhtaṣṣu bi-nawʻin muʻayyan, wa-innamā yurjaʻu fīhi ilá ijtihād al-ḥākim fī nawʻihi wa-qadrihi, idhā lam yataʻadda ḥudūd Allāh. Wa-man ḍāqa māluhu ʻan abawayhi ṣāra maḥjūran ʻalayhi bi-ghayr ḥukm al-ḥākim bi-al-ḥajr, wa-huwa riwāyah ʻan Aḥmad, wa-man ʻalayhi nafaqah wājibah fa-lā yamluku al-tabarruʻ bimā yukhillu bi-al-nafaqah al-wājibah, wa-kalām Aḥmad yadullu wa-in nūziʻa al-maḥjūr."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Niẓām al-mudhahhab fī mufradāt al-madhhab : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī al-maʻrūf bi-al-Qāḍī ʻIzz al-Dīn al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 1241 (A.D. 1826).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qadīm al-aḥad // al-wāḥidi al-fardi al-ʻaẓīm al-ṣamad. Dhī al-jūdi wa-al-ifḍāli wa-al-inʻāmi // subḥānuhu min malikin ʻallāmi. Ṣifātuhu jallat wa-qad taʻālá // ʻan an yakūna shibhuhu mithālā. Aḥmaduhu ḥamdan kathīran ṭayyibā // mubārakan kāfiyahu ʻalá mā wahabā ..."
C. Landberg identified the author as the son of the elder Ibn al-Laḥḥām (the author of Landberg MSS 199).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-manẓūmah al-sharīfah bi-qalam al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Walī, ʻabduhu Ḥamad ibn Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad al-Qirṭāsī al-Najdī al-Ḥanbalī, wa-dhālika bi-Miṣr al-Qāhirah, nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ, alladhī huwa thālith wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Jumād al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 1241, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-iḥdā wa-arbaʻīn min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf [2 February 1826], ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Muqaddimah al-muḥassanah fī ʻilm al-naḥw : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-Ḥasan Ṭāhir ibn Aḥmad ibn Bābashādh al-Kalāmī al-Naḥwī.
record.note: Copied in Sanʻa, Yemen in A.H. 1064-1065 (A.D. 1654-1655).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah fī fann al-ʻArabīyah (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh Abū al-Ḥasan Ṭāhir ibn Aḥmad ibn Bābashādh al-Naḥwī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi wa-riḍwānuh: al-Naḥw ʻilmun mustanbaṭ bi-al-qiyās wa-al-istiqrāʼ min Kitāb Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall, wa-min faṣīḥ kalām al-ʻArab, wa-al-ʻarḍ bi-hi maʻrifat ṣawāb al-kalām min khaṭaʼihi, wa-fahm maʻānī Kitāb Allāh taʻālá, wa-fawāʼiduhu wa-al-ṭarīq al-muʼaddīyah ilá taḥṣīlihi takūnu bi-iḥkām uṣūlihi, wa-taqdīm al-ahamm fa-al-ahamm min fuṣūlihi ..."

Incipit of Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah (folio 30b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi ḥamdan ilqāḥuhu al-ilhām wa-natījatuhu al-tamām wa-al-dawām, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man ikhtaṣara la-hu al-kalim al-Qurʼān, wa-sudda bi-hi min al-dīn mā thulima, wa-ḥufiẓa bi-hi manār al-sharʻ wa-khutim, Muḥammad, khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi anṣār ḥaqqihi ajmaʻīn, wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh Abū al-Ḥasan Ṭāhir ibn Aḥmad ibn Bāhashādh [Bābashādh] al-Naḥwī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Ammā baʻd, Ayyuhā al-Shaykh Abā al-Qāsim Khalaf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Muqrī ..."

Incipit of ʻUmdat dhawī al-himam ʻalá al-Muḥsibah fī ʻilmay al-lisān wa-al-qalam (folio 151b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl ʻaṭāʼihi wa-nabīl mawāhibihi wa-ālāʼihi, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Khātim Anbiyāʼihi, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi mudhākarah wajīzat al-lafẓ basīṭat al-maʻná laffaqtuhā ʻalá Muqaddimat al-Shaykh al-Ustādh Abī al-Ḥasan Ṭāhir ibn Aḥmad ibn Bāb Shādh, ʻalá rakadin fī ḥālī wa-ishtighālin min bālī, li-yantafiʻa bihā al-ṭālib, wa-yatawaṣṣala bi-fahmihā ilá ghayrihā al-rāghib, wa-sammaytuhā bi-ʻUmdat dhawī al-himam ʻalá al-Muḥsibah fī ʻilmay al-lisān wa-al-qalam, wa-Allāh walī tawfīqī fī talfīqī, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unīb ..."
Brockelmann gives the title as: al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah; Berlin catalog has: al-Muqaddimah al-maḥassibah (al-muḥassabah).
The colophon (?) on leaf 150 recto has been cut out; the colophon on leaf 233 recto, also partly cut out, is dated A.H. 1065.
Script: Calligraphic Yemenite naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in colors on leaf 1 verso.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion; red leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication. Gilt frame on the first leaf, outlined in red frames throughout.
Two series of foliation: one on every fifth leaf in modern pencil, another using Arabic numbers in ink.

Colophon of al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah fī fann al-ʻArabīyah (folio 29a): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min zabrihā, bi-ḥamd Allāh, niṣf laylat al-Thulāthāʼ, sābiʻ shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, min shuhūr sanat arbaʻ wa-sittīn wa-alf Hijrīyah [22 July 1654], bi-maḥrūs[at] Ṣanʻāʼ al-Yaman. Katabahu afqar al-khalq ilá Khāliqhi, Ṣāliḥ ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Muhallā, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhumā. Āmīn. Āmīn" The rest of the colophon is obliterated.

Colophon of Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah (folio 150a). The colophon has been cut out. Text ends as follows: "Tamma. Qāla: Fa-hādhā al-qadr kāfin fī maʻrifat al-khaṭṭ min hādhihi al-Muqaddimah al-muḥsibah al-mukhtaṣarah li-man arād al-iqtiṣār wa-maʻrifat mā lā yasaʻu jahluhu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-mannihi, fa-la-hu al-ḥamd kathīran, wa-la-hu al-shukr bukratan wa-aṣīlan."

Colophon of ʻUmdat dhawī al-himam ʻalá al-Muḥsibah fī ʻilmay al-lisān wa-al-qalam (folio 233a). The colophon is partly cut out: "Fa-hādhā al-qadr kāfin fī maʻrifat al-khaṭṭ min hādhihi al-Muqaddimah al-mukhtaṣarah li-man arād al-iqtiṣār wa-maʻrifat mā lā yasaʻu jahluhu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh al-ʻAzīz al-Wahhāb. Wa-kān al-farāgh min raqmihi fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, salkh shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, ghurrata sanat 1065 [8 January 1655] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kawkab al-Rawḍah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ... Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Tawakkaltu ʻalá Allāh. Subḥāna Allāh fātiq al-anhār, wa-fāliq al-azhār, wa-khāliq al-layl wa-al-nahār, wa-muzayyin al-khaḍrāʼ min al-Shams bi-al-ward min al-kawākib bi-al-bahār, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼi māʼan fa-aḥyá bi-hi al-arḍ baʻda al-mamāt, wa-akhraja bi-hi anwāʻa kulli shayʼin min al-nabāt ... Hādhā majmūʻun ḥasan fī tārīkh jazīrat Miṣr al-musammāh bi-al-Rawḍah ... sammaytuhu Kawkab al-Rawḍah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī (ca. 1700), in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Two series of foliation: one on every fifth leaf in modern pencil; another in Arabic numbers in ink.
On folio 1a of the index: A plea to "Kubaykij" to protect the book from worms: "Yā Kubaykij. Kubaykij. Baykij. Yakij. Kij. J. Iḥfaẓ kitābī min al-araḍah."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradtu īradahu fī hādhā al-kitāb, wa-qad qultu fīhi hādhayn al-baytayn: Kitābī al-Kawkabu al-mufaddá // daqqat maʻānin bi-hi ghazīrah. Alfāẓuhu al-mushtahātu taḥkī // min ḥusnihā rawḍatan wa-jazīrah. Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥmatu Allāh ʻalayhi: Faraghtu min taʼlīfihi fī Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat 895, khams wa-tisʻīn wa-thamāni miʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [May 1490], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ li-ahl al-qarn al-tāsiʻ. Al-Juzʼ akhīr : manuscript / Muḥammad Shams al-Dīn ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakhāwī al-Qāhirī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in Mecca in A.H. 941 (A.D. 1535).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Muḥibb Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf al-Anṣārī al-Zarandī al-Madanī. Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī Abū Bakr al-Khawāfī al-Harawī al-Ḥanafī wa-yuʻrafu bi-Zayn wālid Ibrāhīm ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap).
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.
Volumes 1-4 wanting.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Jumʻah, sādis ʻashar Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [28 June 1535], wa-dhālika bi-Makkah al-Musharrafah, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥyī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ fī taʼrīkh aʻyān al-qarn al-tāsiʻ. Al-Niṣf al-awwal [wa-]al-niṣf al-thānī min al-juzʼ al-thānī : manuscript / lil-Ḥ̣āfiẓ Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1276 (A.D. 1859).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume 1: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Ḥarf al-Bāʼ al-muwaḥḥadah. Bābá Sanqar ibn Shāh Rakh ibn Tīmūrlank, ṣāḥib Mamlakat Kirmān, wa-akhū Muḥammad al-ātī, māta fī Dhī al-Ḥijjah sanat tisʻ wa-thalāthīn, wa-qīla māta qablahā, wa-kāna walī ʻahd abīhi, wa-fīhi shajāʻah mawṣūfah wa-jurʼah ʻaẓīmah, dhakarahu Shaykhunā bi-ikhtiṣār ..."

Incipit of volume 2: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr ibn Muḥammad (ibn Abī Bakr. Ṣaḥḥ) ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khalīl ibn Naṣr ibn al-Khaḍir ibn al-Humām al-Jalāl ibn al-Kamāl ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-aṣl al-Ṭūlūnī al-Shāfiʻī, al-ātī abūhu, wa-yuʻrafu bi-Ibn al-Usyūṭī ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion; in slipcases.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Other volumes wanting.

Colophon of volume 1: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal [crossed over] al-thālith min tārīkh al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh al-Sakhāwī, wa-yalīhi al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ, wa-awwaluhu tarjamat al-Jualāl al-Suyūṭī, fī 27 Muḥarram, sanat 1276 [26 August 1859], wa-Allāh aʻlam. Qābalahu Muḥammad al-Ṣabbāgh al-Dimyāṭī ʻalá nuskhah muʻtamadah ḥasb al-imkān, ʻalayhā khuṭūṭ al-Afāḍil, ka-al-Sayyid Murtaḍá shāriḥ al-Qāmūs, wa-Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-ʻAṭṭār, li-Saʻādat ṣāḥib al-iḥsān, ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bik, asdá Allāh ilayhi jamīl niʻamihi. Āmīn."

Colophon of volume 2: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ min al-juzʼ al-thānī min al-niṣf al-awwal min tārīkh al-ʻAllāmah al-Sakhāwī lil-Qarn al-tāsiʻ, wa-kāna dhālika baʻda ṣalāt yawm al-Thulāthāʼ al-mubārak, 12 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1276 [8 November 1859], ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa al-Qadīr, Muḥammad al-Khuḍayrī al-Usyūṭī, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Āmīn. Qābalahu Muḥammad al-Ṣabbāgh al-Dimyāṭī ʻalá nuskhah muʻtamadah ḥasb al-imkān, ʻalayhā khuṭūṭ al-Afāḍil, ka-al-Sayyid Murtaḍá shāriḥ al-Qāmūs, wa-Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-ʻAṭṭār, li-Saʻādat ṣāḥib al-iḥsān, ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bik, asdá Allāh ilayhi jamīl niʻamihi. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ li-ahl al-qarn al-tāsiʻ. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / li-Shaykhinā ... Shams al-Dīn ibn Abī al-Khayr ... al-Sakhāwī al-Qāhirī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1273 (A.D. 1857).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. ʻAtīq ibn ʻAtīq ibn Qāsim Abū Bakr al-Kilāʻī Khaṭīb Gharnāṭah wa-nawāḥīhā, māta fī thānī ʻasharī Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat ithnatay wa-khamsīn, arrakhahu Ibn ʻAzm ..."
Other volumes wanting.
On the cover of the slipcase: "al-Juzʼ al-thālith min al-Sakhāwī."
Annotated by Naṣr al-Hūrīnī.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion; in slipcase.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Wa-kānat ākhir kitābat hādhā al-mujallad fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, rābiʻ ʻashar al-Ḥijjah, sanat thalāth wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, min Hijrat man la-hu mazīd al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf [5 August 1857], ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Nuqilat hādhihi al-nuskhah min nuskhah bi-qalam Abī al-Khayr wa-Abī Fāris ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī, dhakara annahu khaluṣa min taḥrīrihā yawm al-Sabt, thāmin ʻasharay Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [22 July 1493] bi-manzilihi, raḥimahu Allāh." Under it: "Wa-al-ẓāhir anna manzilahu fī Makkah, ḥasbamā fahimahu al-faqīr Naṣr al-Hūrīnī."

On the lower left margin of folio 331a: A collation statement: "Balaghah [Balaghat] muqābalatan ʻalá ḥasb al-ṭāqah ʻalá al-nuskhat alladhī nuqilat minhā sanat arbaʻah wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf Hijrīyah [1857/1858]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ li-ahl al-qarn al-tāsiʻ. Al-Niṣf al-awwal min al-rubʻ al-awwal : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1279 (A.D. 1862).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Ibrāhīm ibn Sulṭān ibn Aḥmad al-Burhān Abū Isʹḥāq [... ... ...] qadima al-Qāhirah fī awwal sanat tisʻīn fa-samiʻa minnī wa-ajaztu la-hu [... ... ...]. Ibrāhīm ibn Sulaymān ibn Sālim al-Burhān al-Farārī [... ... ...] sanat iḥdá wa-sabʻīn wa-ḥaḍara ʻindī hunāka baʻḍ al-majālis wa-kāna sākinan bal kāda al-Amshāṭī [... ... ...] bi-al-khayr wa-māta qabla al-thamānīn aw baʻdahā ..."
With a manuscript note on leaf 189 recto by Naṣr al-Hūrīnī whose handwriting was attested by C. Landberg.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound; in slipcase.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir al-niṣf al-awwal min al-rubʻ al-awwal min tārīkh al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Sakhāwī al-musammá bi-al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ li-ahl al-qarn al-tāsiʻ, wa-yalīhi al-niṣf al-thānī, wa-awwaluhu fī tarjamat al-ʻAllāmah Aḥmad al-Maqrīzī ṣāḥib al-Khuṭaṭ wa-ghayrihā. M. Wa-qad tamma ḍuḥá yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, tāsiʻ ʻasharay Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1279 [24 October 1862], ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Usyūṭī, wa-dhālika bi-rasm ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bik Nāfiʻ."

On the upper left margin of folio 189a a note attested by C. Landberg by Naṣr al-Hūrīnī: "Qawluhu Yaḥyá al-ātī, kadhā qāla fī tarjamat abīhi ayḍan, ay fī al-qism al-awwal min kitāb al-Ansāb fī al-Maḥraqī min ḥarf al-Mīm, fa-li-yutafaṭṭan la-hu, fi-innahu lā dhikra la-hu fī Yaḥyá. N. kadhā bi-hāmish al-aṣl."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Zuhayr ibn Abī Sulmá.
record.note: Copied by C. Landberg from a copy in Dār al-Kutub al-Miṣrīyah, Cairo, after A.H. 1287 (A.D. 1870).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Akhbaranā al-Shaykh Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn al-Nāṣir al-Salāmī qirāʼatan ʻalayhi wa-anā ḥāḍirun asmaʻu fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-khamsimiʼah, qāla akhbaranā Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn ʻAlī al-Khaṭīb al-Tibrīzī al-Lughawī qirāʼatan ʻalayhi wa-anā asmaʻu fī Rajab sanata khamsin wa-tisʻīn wa-arbaʻimiʼah fa-aqarra bi-hi, qāla akhbaranā Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Dahhān al-Lughawī bi-qirāʼatī ʻalayhi fī shuhūr sanat sabʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-arbaʻimiʼah ..."
Leaves numbered 1-132, 135-180.
Note on leaf 135 recto states that the irregularity in foliation does not imply any break in text.
The colophon, dated A.H. 1287 (A.D. 1870), is presumably that of the Cairo prototype (Dār al-Kutub, Adab 590), cf. also the corrections (made by C. Landberg?) within the text of the colophon.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Unbound (loose leaves).
No decoration.

Colophon: "Yaqūlu kātibuhu qaṣīr al-bāʻ qalīl al-iṭṭilāʻ wa-in yakun hādhā al-kitāb bimā dhakar ḥaqīq (ṣawābuhu ḥaqīqan) lākinnahu bi-khaṭṭin saqīm wa-fīhi ṭalʻāt (kadhā) kathīrah ʻalá al-hawāmish wa-taṣḥīḥāt, wa-qad quṭiʻat ḥawāshīhi wa-dhahaba min al-aṣl kalāmun kathīr, fa-idhā wujid bi-hi khalal fa-hādhā ʻudhrī, wa-lākin qad amʻantu al-naẓar wa-ṣaḥḥaḥtu mā qadirtu ʻalayhi bi-ḥasb ṭāqatī, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-anā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muṣṭafá ibn al-Sayyid Ismāʻīl al-Imām al-Dimashqī, kāna Allāh lī wa-li-uṣūlī wa-lil-Muslimīn. Sanat 1287, fī awākhir Jumād al-Thānī (ṣawābuhu Jumādá al-Thāniyah) [26 September 1870]. Nuqila min nuskhatin maḥfūẓah bi-Dār al-Kutub al-Miṣrīyah, numratuhā al-khuṣūṣīyah 590 Adab, wa-al-ʻumūmīyah 18725."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṭirāzāt al-muʻlamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Dāʼim ibn ʻAlī al-Azharī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 898 (A.D. 1493).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān mutashābihan wa-ghayr mutashābih, wa-khaṣṣa man talāhu wa-ʻamila bi-hi bi-jazīl thawābih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-awlá mā ihtamma bi-hi aṣḥāb al-himam al-ʻalīyah, wa-irtaqá bi-hi dhaww al-nufūs al-abīyah kalām Allāh al-Malik al-Jawwād wa-al-mutaʻālī ʻan al-andād wa-al-aḍdād ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Ṭirāzāt al-muʻlamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah, jaʻalahu Allāh taʻālá khāliṣan li-jalālih wa-aʻāna ʻalá ikmālih, bi-Muḥammadin wa-ālih. Qāla al-nāẓim ..."

A note on leaf 1 recto, in a later hand, identifies the author with Ibn al-Jazarī's son, Aḥmad; the quotations from the latter's commentary, however, given by Berlin catalog (511), do not agree with this manuscript.
Some other commentaries listed in Berlin catalog resemble somewhat this commentary, but none is near enough to be identical.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Aḥad, sābiʻ ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [8 September 1493]. Tamma wa-kamula. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Dhamm al-hawá : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-awḥad al-amīn Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jawzī al-wāʻiẓ, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ḥamda al-shākirīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn, wa-sallam. Shaká ilayya man aththarat shakwāhu ithārata hammī fī jamʻ hādhā al-kitāb ..."
Script: Coarse modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf with modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Faṣl. Fa-in qāla qāʼil fa-mā taqūlu fīman ṣabara ʻalá ḥabībihi wa-bālagh fī istiʻmāl al-ṣabr, ghayra anna ḥāl al-ḥabīb fī al-qalb lā yazūlu, wa-wiswās al-nafs bi-hi lā yanqaṭiʻ. Fa-la-jawāb, innka idhā kafafta jawāriḥaka fa-qad qaṭaʻta mawādd al-māʼ al-jārī, wa-sayanḍabu mā ḥaṣala fī al-wādī maʻa al-zamān, khuṣūṣan in ṭalaʻat ʻalayhi shams ṣayf al-khawf wa-marrat bi-hi sumūm al-murāqabah li-man yará al-bāṭin fa-mā aʻjala dhahābahu ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Ḥulal fī sharḥ abyāt al-Jumal : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Sīd al-Baṭalyawsī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. ʻAwnaka Yā Allāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻallamanā mā lam nakun naʻlam, wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá kathīrin min khalqih wa-qaddam, wa-jaʻalanā mimman yuqtadā bi-hi wa-yuʼthar. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Qāla Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Sayyid al-Baṭalyawsī: Lammā faraghtu min al-kalām fī al-khalal al-wāqiʻ fī Kitāb al-Jumal aradtu an atbaʻa dhālika al-kalām fī ighrāb abyātihi wa-maʻānīhā wa-mā yaḥḍurunī min asmāʼ qāʼilīhā, wa-gharaḍī an aṣila bi-kull bayt minhā mā yattaṣilu bi-hi li-yakūna abyan li-gharaḍ qāʼilīhi ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 758.
Script: Good Maghribī hand of the 12th century (date assigned by C. Landberg).
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: none.
Foliated in Arabic numbers in ink.
Colophon: "Najaza Sharḥ abyāt al-Jumal al-musammá bi-Kitāb al-Ḥulal ṣanʻat al-Faqīh al-Ustādh Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Sayyid al-Baṭalyawsī, raḥimahu Allāh."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ikmāl fī al-mukhtalaf wa-al-muʼtalaf min asmāʼ al-rijāl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Hibat Allāh ibn Mākūlā.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jaʻfar ibn Udhayn, rawá ʻan Abī ʻAmr wa-Saʻīd ibn Muḥammad ibn Naṣr wa-Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Mahruwayh, rawá ʻanhu Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbdūs al-Hamadhānī, wa-Ibn Udhayn nadīmun li-Abī Nuʼās, wa-fīhi yaqūlu: Isqinī Yā Ibna Udhayn // min sharābi al-Zarajūn ..."
Title from: Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 355; S I, p. 602.
Corrected copy, annotated by Muḥammad ibn Nuqṭah (cf. leaves 86 recto, 151 recto).
Some leaves bound out of order.
Other volume(s) wanting.
Script: Good naskhī of the 13th century.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-juzʼ al-awwal, wa-yatlūhu fī al-thānī Bāb al-Ruʻaynī wa-al-Zughaynī. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá khayri khalqihi, Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. Hādhā al-kitāb kāna mujalladan wāḥidan fa-thaqula ḥamluhu, fa-jaʻalahu ṣāḥibuhu ithnayn, wa-kataba hādhihi al-qāʼimah wa-al-ukhrá allatī fī awwal al-thānī baʻda al-tārīkh, fa-li-yuʻlam dhālika wa-lā yunkar. Wa-lillāh al-minnah wa-al-faḍl, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: Dīwān Abī Ruʼbah ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAjjāj maʻa sharḥih : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ruʼbah al-ʻAjjāj.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 1289 (A.D. 1872).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

On the title page: "Hādhā Dīwān Abī [i.e. Ibn] Ruʼbah ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAjjāj maʻa sharḥih. Kān istinsākh al-nuskhah al-manqūl minhā hādhihi al-nuskhah fī Dār al-Saʻādah min Kutubkhānat al-marḥūm al-Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Fātiḥ, min kitāb qad wujida ʻalayhi muḥarraran mā ṣūratuhu: Qad intahá muṣaḥḥaḥan ʻalá Ibn Ukht al-Aṣmaʻī, wa-khaṭṭ al-kitāb huwa qarīb min al-khaṭṭ al-Kūfī, lākin bidūn tārīkh, wa-laʻallahu urrikha ʻinda tamām al-juzʼ al-thānī min kalām walad al-ʻAjjāj, li-annahu waʻada bi-ityānihi fī juzʼ ʻalá ḥidatihi, wa-lam yura, wa-laysa mawjūdan fī al-Kutubkhānah, wa-li-gharābatihi ḥarrartuhu. Hādhā mā huwa maktūbun ʻalá ṭurrat al-aṣl." After in in a different hand: "IH. Ḥarrarahu ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Baghdādī."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-ʻArabī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-ʻAjjāj, wa-ismuhu ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ruʼbah ibn Labīd ibn Ṣakhr ibn Kathīf ibn ʻUmayrah ibn Ḥunayy ibn Rabīʻah ibn Saʻd ibn Mālik ibn Saʻd ibn Zayd Manāt ibn Tamīm ibn Murr ibn Udd ibn Ṭābikhah ibn Ilyās ibn Muḍar ibn Nizār ibn Maʻadd ibn ʻAdnān, wa-innamā summiya al-ʻAjjāj li-baytin qālahu fī urjūzatin la-hu ḥaythu yaqūlu: Ḥattá yaʻujju thakhanan man ʻajʻajā. Ḥaddathanā al-Aṣmaʻī annahu luqqiba bi-hi li-dhālika ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamma rajaz al-ʻAjjāj bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi bi-qalam al-faqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Nuqilat min nuskhat al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah, wa-hiya manqūlah min nuskhah bi-Kutubkhānat al-Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Fātiḥ, ʻalayhi al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, bi-maḥrūsat al-Qusṭanṭīnīyah, wa-maktūbun bi-hā annahā ṣuḥḥiḥat ʻalá ibn akhī al-Aṣmaʻī, wa-tārīkhuhā 9 JA, sanat 1289 [15 July 1872]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi bi-ghāyat al-ṣiḥḥah. Wa-al-nuskhah al-aṣlīyah fīhā baʻḍ waqfāt, wa-ṣuḥḥiḥat ʻalá qadr al-imkān."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Adab al-kātib : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi, wa-al-thanāʼ ʻalayhi bimā huwa ahluhu, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-Muṣṭafá wa-ālihi, fa-innī raʼaytu akthara ahl zamāninā hādhā ʻan sabīl al-adab nākibīn, wa-min ismihi mutaṭayyirīn wa-li-ahlihi kārihīn. Ammā al-nāshiʼ minhum fa-rāghib ʻan al-taʻlīm ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in colors on leaf 2 verso. Leaves 91-135 in another less careful hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Frames outlined in red and blue ink. Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern ink.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir kitāb Taqwīm al-lisān. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. M."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ shawāhid al-Tuḥfah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / li-ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Baghdādī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1299 (A.D. 1881).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Afḍal al-Mursalīn, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn.
