Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Hādī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻUmar al-Baghdādī: Hādhā Sharḥ shawāhid sharḥ al-Tuḥfah al-Wardīyah, lil-ʻĀlim al-fāḍil wa-al-mutqin al-kāmil, Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Wardī, wa-huwa sharḥ bālagha fī tahdhīb maʻānīhi, wa-intakhal kutub ʻilm al-naḥw fa-akhadha al-lubāb fa-waḍaʻahu fīhi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated in modern pencil.

Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā sharḥ ākhir abyāt al-Tuḥfah al-Wardīyah, tamma fī laylat al-Jumʻah, al-tāsiʻah wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rajab al-fard, min shuhūr sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [7 October 1676], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā azká salām wa-afḍal taḥīyah, wa-kāna al-ibtidāʼ fī sharḥihā fī al-yawm al-sādis min al-shahr al-madhkūr [14 September 1676], wa-min Allāh al-tasʹhīl fī jamīʻ al-umūr, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-khitām ʻalá hādhā al-niẓām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal Rusulihi al-kirām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ʻiẓām, mā taʻāqabat al-sāʻāt wa-al-ayyām, wa-tarādafat al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām."

Copyist's colophon: "Hādhā ākhir lafẓ muʼallifihi al-ʻAllāmah ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Baghdādī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa Sharḥ shawāhid al-Tuḥfah al-Wardīyah, min khaṭṭ muʼallifihi al-madhkūr, yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, shahr ithnayn Muḥarram, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn tisʻah wa-tisʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [24 November 1881], ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qammāsh Jād al-Ushmūnī al-Mālikī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nisākhat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn." To the right of the colophon: "Fī al-khizānah al-fikrīyah." To the left of the colophon: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá aṣlihi."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū Bakr al-ʻUṣfūrī.
record.note: Manuscript, on paper, containing Abū Bakr ibn Muḥammad ʻUṣfūrī's Dīwān, a work of collected poems. Preceded by 1 leaf of notes.
Copied probably in the 18th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man aṭlaʻa thimār al-ādāb ʻalá afnān al-alsinah al-ʻArabīyah, wa-shannafa bi-jumān al-niẓām wa-inshād [wa-al-inshād] adhān al-fityah al-adabīyah, fa-malaʼ ḥuqāq ādhānihim bi-al-durar al-maʻnawīyah, wa-kaḥḥala ajfānahum bi-marāwid al-muʻāyanah al-manṭūqīyah wa-al-mafhūmīyah, wa-ḥallāhum bi-ḥulī al-bayān wa-al-ḥikam, wa-labasahum ḥulal al-tibyān muʻlamat al-ruqam ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black, on white and yellow paper.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Frame outlined in red ink. Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdahu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb mā bi-iqlīm Miṣr min al-buldān wa-ʻibrat kull baldah : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Shākir ibn al-Jayʻān.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1275 (A.D. 1859).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī la-hu mā fī al-samāwāt wa-mā fī al-arḍ, al-ʻālim bi-mā fī ṭūlihā wa-al-ʻarḍ, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun adhkuru fīhi mā bi-iqlīm Miṣr min al-buldān wa-ʻibrat kull balad, wa-kam misāḥatuhā faddān, abtadiʼi awwalan bi-dhikr al-aqālīm ʻalá wajh al-ijmāl, wa-adhkuru ʻibrat al-aqālīm al-madhkūrah ʻalá mā istaqarra ʻalayhi al-ḥāl fī al-ayyām al-Ashrafīyah Shaʻbān, wa-in taghayyarat ʻibrat kull balad ʻammā kānat ʻalayhi dhakartu ʻibratahā al-ān ..."
With marginal notes by ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Nāfiʻ and Naṣr al-Hūrīnī (cf. leaves 8 verso, 130 recto, 192 recto).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Frame outlined in red ink. Rubrication.
Foliated using Arabic numbers.

Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir al-aqālīm al-Miṣrīyah, wa-bi-tamām hādhā tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Yaqūlu kātibuhu al-faqīr ilayhi subḥānuhu, ʻAlī ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Muḥammad Muṣṭafá al-Khuḍayrī al-Shāfiʻī al-Usyūṭī: Naqaltu tilka al-nuskhah min nuskhatin qadīmah tārīkhuhā 19 J, sanat 970 [24 March 1563], lākin akthar kalimātihā ghayr mustaqīmat al-iʻrāb al-naḥwī ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nasākhatihā qubayl iṣfirār shams yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak 18 Shawwāl, sanat 1275, khamsah wa-sabʻīn, ilkh [21 May 1859]. Wa-kāna dhālika bi-rasm Saʻādat ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Bīk Nāfiʻ."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Ajnās min kalām al-ʻArab wa-mā ishtabaha fī al-lafẓ wa-ikhtalafa fī al-maʻná : manuscript / li-Abī ʻUbayd al-Qāsim ibn Sallām.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. al-Bayẓ al-qishr al-raqīq alladhī yakūnu dākhil qishrat al-bayḍah, wa-al-bayẓ māʼun qalīl yakūnu fī al-nuqrah allatī takūnu fī asfal al-biʼir, wa-al-bayẓ khayāl al-wajh fī al-sayf, wa-al-bayẓ bayẓ al-naml, wa-al-bayẓ māʼ al-rajul ..."
Script: Good modern (19th century) naskhī.
Binding: Unbound (loose leaves).
Decoration: None.

Colophon: "Tamma wa-kamula, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi, wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-nabāt wa-al-shajar wa-anwāʻihimā : manuscript / li-ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Qurayb al-maʻrūf bi-al-Aṣmaʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Saʻīd ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Qurayb al-Aṣmaʻī: Yuqālu ariyat arḍ banī fulān ghibba al-maṭar wāʻidatan ḥasanah idhā rujiya khayruhā wa-tamām nabtihā fī awwal mā yaẓharu al-nabt. Wa-yuqālu awshamat al-arḍ idhā raʼayta fīhā shayʼan min al-nabāt, wa-anshada: Kam min kiʻābin ka-al-mahāt al-mūshami. al-Mūsham allatī qad nabata lahā washmun min al-nabāt, ay shayʼ tarʻá fīhi ..."
Script: Good modern (19th century) naskhī.
Binding: Unbound (loose leaves)
Decoration: none.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh kathīran. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Nuqilat min khaṭṭ Abī Sahl Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Harawī al-Lughawī, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmatan wāsiʻah. Nuqila min nuskhatin maḥfūẓah bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Miṣrīyah ḍimna majmūʻ numrah 122 majāmiʻ, wa-huwa al-kitāb al-thāmin min al-majmūʻ, unẓur Ṣ. 173, J. 7, Qism awwal."

record.title: 880-02 Tashyīd al-mamālik bi-taʼyīd Ibn Mālik : manuscript / taḥrīr kātibihi mufassir Kitāb Allāh bi-Ḥaram Allāh Muḥammad ʻAlī ʻAllān al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1053 (A.D. 1643).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kammala li-man shāʼa min ʻibādihi al-adab, fa-anālahu min faḍlihi maʻa khāṣṣatihi, subḥānuhu, kamāl al-adab, wa-razaqahu ḥusn al-baṣīr, wa-luṭf al-taghyīr, fa-balagha al-suʼl wa-al-ṭalab ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ḥakama baʻḍun bi-al-ishkāl ʻalá kull wajh ʻalá bayt tarjumān al-adab wa-jamāl al-ʻArab, Muḥammad ibn Mālik fī al-Khulāṣah: Wa-jāyizun rafʻuka maʻṭūfan ʻalá // manṣūbi inna baʻda an tastakmilā ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 390.
The preface calls Ibn Mālik's work al-Khulāṣah (the full title: al-Khulāṣah al-alfīyah).
Script: Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In colored cardboard cover on the inside of which is pasted a printed sheet of an unidentified text in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-bi-ʻulūmihi fī al-dārayn: Wa-kāna intihāʼ taswīdihi ḍaḥwata yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, awwal shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat 1053 [13 November 1643]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Irshād al-sāʼil ilá uṣūl al-masāʼil : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Rajab ibn al-Majdī.
record.note: Badly damaged at the beginning, with the text supplied on 17 leaves (25 x 17 cm) in a modern hand; followed by 2 leaves of notes (in volume 2).
Copied in A.H. 976 (A.D. 1568).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (from volume 1): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī afāḍa ʻalá al-qulūb mawāhib ʻirfānih, wa-sharrafa al-insān bi-madārikihi wa-bayānih, wa-zayyanahu bi-aṣgharayhi qalbihi wa-lisānih, wa-yassarahu li-iqtināṣ al-maʻārif bi-ʻilmihi wa-jinānih, wa-amarahu bi-al-tafakkur fī ʻajāʼib ikhtirāʻ imtinānih, min samāʼihi wa-arḍihi wa-jinnihi wa-insānih ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 128; S II, p. 158.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black. With copious diagrams.
Binding: Volume 1: Unbound (in two quires; in an envelope); volume 2: In modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication. Diagrams in red ink.

Colophon (volume 2, folio 156a): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min dhālika yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, thānī ʻishrīn Jumādá al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat sitt wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [22 November 1568], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

record.title: 880-02 Riḥlah : manuscript / Ibn Yaḥyá al-ʻIrāqī Ṣaḥīḥ al-Dīn Abū al-Fayḍ Muḥammad Ṭāhā ibn Yaḥyá ibn Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Kurdī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1204 (A.D. 1789 or 1790).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lil-Ṣāniʻ al-badīʻ, mutqin kull shayʼ sharīf wa-waḍīʻ, nisbat mā yurá min naqāʼiṣ al-ashyāʼ min kamālih, wa-laysa thamma naqṣ li-ḥamīd fiʻālih, wa-kull mā lā yuwāfiq ṭabʻ al-insān fa-huwa ʻindahu nuqṣān, wa-li-dhālika infarada al-Ḥaqq bi-rafīʻ al-darajāt, wa-siwāh bi-al-naqṣ min al-makhlūqāt ..."

On title page: A reader's note: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Qad ṭālaʻa hādhihi al-Riḥlah al-mubārakah al-maymūnah fī majlis wāḥid, iʻtināʼan bi-shaʼn jāmiʻihā wa-istildhādhan bi-ḥalāwat alfāẓihā wa-tabarrukan bi-akhbār ṣāḥibihā, Janāb Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhinā al-Imām ʻAllāmat al-Shām, al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Kuzbarī, ḥafiẓahumā Allāh wa-ḥafiẓanā bihimā. Āmīn. Wa-dhālika nahār al-Sabt, 26 Shawwāl, sanat 1206 [17 June 1792]
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon (folio 109a): "Intahá taḥrīruhu bi-ʻawnihi taʻālá, khāmis ʻashar shahr al-mubārak Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat arbaʻ wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [4 November 1789] bi-Khāniqāh al-Samīsāṭīyah, laṣīq Jāmiʻ Banī Umayyah, fī Dimashq al-Shām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad muḥarririhi, al-nāẓim la-hu bi-nafsihi, wa-li-man shāʼa Allāh taʻālá min ʻibādihi fī ḥayātihi wa-baʻda mamātihi, al-faqīr Ṭāhā ibn Yaḥyá ibn al-Amīr Sulaymān ibn al-Amīr Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī Bik ibn al-Amīr Muḥammad ibn Shaykh Mīr ibn Shams al-Dīn ibn Ambīrz ibn ʻUthmān Khān ibn Subḥān Wīrdī Khān, maʻnāhu bi-al-ʻArabīyah ʻAṭīyat Allāh ibn Aḥmad Khān ibn ʻAbd al-Mūmin Khān al-Māmawī al-Kurdī al-Yamanī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, wa-al-Qādirī ṭarīqatan, wa-Ibrāhīmī millatan, wa-Muḥammadī ummatan, wa-Bālīsānī baladan, wa-Khūshnāwī ʻashīratan, wa-al-Shāmī mahājiran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, kamā yanbaghī li-ʻaẓamat jalāl kibriyāʼihi ... wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-kabīr : manuscript / min taʼlīf Abī Yaʻlá al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... ilá waqt wujūb mithlihā ka-al-ṣalāh, wa-li-annahā min aḥad al-ʻibādāt al-khams fa-lam yajuz taʼkhīr adāʼihā ilá waqt wujūb mithlihā, ka-al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣiyām wa-al-ḥajj. Fa-in qīla lā yaslamu lakum hādhā al-aṣl, wa-naqūlu inna al-zakāh tajibu wujūban muwassaʻan, wa-la-hu taʼkhīr zakāt al-amwāl al-ṭāhirah ilá an yuṭālibuhu bihā al-imām, fa-ḥīnaʼidhin yalzamuhu dafʻuhā ilayhi, wa-in imtanaʻa baʻda al-muṭālabah, wa-ammā zakāt al-amwāl al-bāṭinah fa-la-hu taʼkhīruhā abadan ..."
Title, as above, supplied on leaf 1 recto by a later hand.
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 686.
Script: Fair 12th century naskhī, scantily pointed.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap).
Decoration: None.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Qāla in shāʼa ṣāma wa-in shāʼa afṭara, wa-lā yakūnu al-ifṭār illā baʻda al-dukhūl fī al-ṣawm. Qawluhum in bi-al-khiyār in shāʼa afṭara wa-qaḍā, fa-lā yaṣuḥḥu ʻalá aṣlihim, li-anna ʻindahum yajibu ʻalayhi al-itmām wa-lā yajūzu la-hu al-khurūj, fa-in kharaja minhu kāna ʻalayhi al-qaḍāʼ. Wa-al-khabar ..."

record.title: 880-02 Lawāmiʻ al-anwār : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī al-Mawṣilī.
record.note: Copied in Damascus in A.H. 760 (A.D. 1359).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Muḥammadu fatá Muḥammadi // al-Shāfiʻīyu al-Mawṣilīyu al-baladi. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá naʻmāʼihi // ḥamdan yaḍūʻu al-misku min arjāʼihi. Wa-yūjadu al-qabūlu min habbātihi // wa-yuʻdamu al-ʻudmu ladá hibātihi. Wa-tanzilu al-raḥmatu min jannātihi // yāniʻata al-thumri ladá junātihi ... Yaḥkī al-ḥadāʼiqa min al-nūwāri // sammaytuhu Lawāmiʻa al-anwāri ..."
Title also given on leaf 1 recto as: Kitāb Naẓm al-mashāriq.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Cover missing; remnant of dark brown leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubrication.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī mustahall Jumādá al-Ākhirah, min sanat sittīn wa-sabʹʻmiʼah [8 May 1359], bi-Dimashq al-maḥrūsah, ʻalá yad al-Qāḍī Ḥasan ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥasan al-Baʻlī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

record.title: 880-02 Majmūʻ qaṣāʼid shiʻr : manuscript / bi-khaṭṭ al-Qāḍī Ismāʻīl al-Ḥijāzī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Date of birth and death of the compiler, A.H. 950-1001, given by C. Landberg from the Khulāṣat al-āthār, I, 406.

Incipit: "Abū Miḥjan al-Thaqafī al-Ṣaḥābī. ʻAsá farajun yaʼtī bi-hi Allāhu innahu // la-hu kulla yawmin fī khalīqatihi amru. ʻAsá mā tará an lā yadūma wa-an tará // la-hu farajan mimmā alaḥḥa bi-hi al-dahru. Idhā ishtadda ʻusrun fa-urju yusran fa-innahu // qaḍá Allāhu anna al-ʻusra yatbaʻuhu al-yusru ..."
Script: Fair 16th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with gilded central medallion.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.
On the upper left corner of folio 1a: An ownership note by the compiler's son with his signature: "Min kutub al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn al-Qāḍī Ismāʻīl al-Ḥijāzī [signature]."

On folio 1a: A reader's note, followed by an ownership note, as follows: "Naẓara fīhi aḥqar al-ʻibād ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm Zaytūnah, ʻufiya ʻanhumā. Fī 21 Sh [Shaʻbān], sanat 1254 [9 November 1838]." Under it: "Ṣāra fī nawbat afqar al-wará wa-aḥwajihim ilá ʻafw Rabbihi Muḥammad Amīn ibn al-marḥūm al-Sayyid ʻUmar Afandī al-Zuhdī ibn al-marḥūm al-Sayyid al-Ḥājj Ibrāhīm Aghā Zaytūnah, kāna Allāh lahum wa-la-hu fī al-maʻūnah. Āmīn. Fī ghurrat [...], sanat 1260(?) [1863(?)]."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with a poem by al-Mutanabbī, as follows: "Man al-jaʼādhiru fī zīyi al-Aʻārībi // ḥumru al-ḥulá wa-al-maṭāyā wa-al-jalābībi. In kunta tasʼalu shakkan fī maʻārifihā // fa-man balāka bi-tashīdin wa-taʻdhībi ... Layta al-ḥawāditha bāʻatnī alladhī akhadhat // minnī bi-ḥilmī alladhī aʻṭat wa-tajrībī. Fa-mā al-ḥadāthatu min ḥilmin bi-māniʻatin // qad yūjadu al-ḥilm fī al-shubbāni wa-al-shībi."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taḥqīqāt al-Qudsīyah wa-al-nafaḥāt al-Raḥmānīyah al-Ḥasanīyah fī madhhab al-Sādah al-Ḥanafīyah. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal [wa-]al-juzʼ al-thānī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1137 (A.D. 1725).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume 1: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutafaḍḍil ʻalá al-mawjūdāt bi-al-ījād wa-al-imdād wa-al-tabyīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad al-amīn al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-al-ʻulamāʼ al-rāshidīn, wa-al-awliyāʼ al-ʻārifīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī qad amaranī Ustādhī al-Shaykh al-Imām ... Shams al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Muḥibb al-Ḥanafī ... bi-an ajmaʻa mā yassarahu Allāh taʻālá min al-rasāʼil fī taḥqīq ʻazīz al-masāʼil, fa-imtathaltu amrahu al-sharīf ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Taḥqīqāt al-Qudsīyah wa-al-nafaḥāt al-Raḥmānīyah al-Ḥasanīyah fī madhhab al-Sādah al-Ḥanafīyah' ..."

Incipit of volume 2: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-Islām wa-ahlahu, wa-adhalla al-kufra wa-baddada shmalahu, wa-rafaʻa manār al-dīn, wa-hadama rukn al-kufr al-mahīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-rājī dawām al-madad al-mutawālī, Ḥasan al-Ḥanafī al-Shurunbulālī: Hādhihi ʻujālah bi-ḥasb ḍaʻf al-ḥālah, lakhkhaṣtuhā min risālah sammaytuhā 'Qahr al-millah al-kufrīyah bi-al-adillah al-Muḥammadīyah li-takhrīb dayr al-Maḥallah al-Jawwānīyah' lammā warada suʼāl fī shahr Shaʻbān, sanat thalāth wa-sittīn wa-alf, ʻan ḥukm bināʼ ittukhidha dayran, fī maḥallah dākhil Bāb al-Naṣr, bi-al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah, qarīban minhu, bi-maḥallah tudʻá al-Jawwānīyah ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black; with diagrams.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon of volume 1: "Wa-kāna intihāʼ kitābat hādhā al-juzʼ al-mubārak fī yawm al-Ithnayn, al-ʻishrīn min shahr Jumādá al-Akhīr alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1137 [6 March 1725], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr li-raḥmat Rabbihi al-Raḥīm, al-ḥaqīr Ibrāhīm ibn al-marḥūm ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Darājīnī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman. Āmīn."

Colophon of volume 2: "Wa-ḥaṣala al-taḥrīr, wa-bi-al-faḍl ṣadara, fī muntaṣaf shahr al-khayr Ṣafar, junḥa al-layl, waqta al-tajallī bi-al-saḥar, sanat sitt wa-sittīn wa-alf [14 December 1655]. Wa-kāna intihāʼ kitābat hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ al-mubārak, thāmin ʻashar Shaʻbān, sanat sabʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah baʻda al-alf [2 May 1725], ʻalá yad kātibihi, al-faqīr li-raḥmat Rabbihi al-Raḥīm, al-mʻtarif bi-al-dhanb, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Darājīnī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn." ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Tibyān fī ʻilm al-bayān al-muṭliʻ ʻalá iʻjāz al-Qurʼān : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Zamlakānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anṭaqa alsinah al-aqlām bi-iḥkām al-aḥkām, wa-fataqa aghshiyat al-afʼidah li-ifhām al-afhām, wa-awdaʻa khazāʼin al-ṣudūr jawāhir al-kalām, wa-dhallalahā li-al-alsun al-lasinah, fa-intaẓamat ayya intiẓām, wa-asfarat al-faṣāḥah ʻan wajhin ka-al-badr al-tamām, wa-ashrafa tanāsubuhā ʻalá al-sharaf fa-ḥallat minhu fī dhirwat al-sanām ..."
Script: Good 14th century naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Sparsely rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil.
On folio 1a: A plea to Kubaykij (Kabīkaj): "Yā Kubaykij (Kabīkaj) Iḥbis."

The colophon at end (dated A.H. 641 (1244)) is that of the author's autograph ijāzah in the manuscript from which this manuscript was copied: "Ṣūrat khaṭṭ al-muṣannif ʻalá al-aṣl al-manqūl minhu nuskhat Ibn al-Majd. Qūbilat hādhihi al-nuskhah bi-aṣlī wa-anā asmaʻu wa-ajaztu li-mālikihā Mawlāy wa-Sayyidī al-Faqīh al-imām al-ʻālim al-mutqin al-bāriʻ al-wariʻ sayyid al-ʻulamāʼ tāj al-fuḍalāʼ Abī al-Ḥajjāj Jamāl al-Dīn Yūsuf ibn al-Shaykh Yaʻqūb ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥanafī adām Allāh saʻādatahu wa-ayyada siyādatahu an yarwiya ʻannī hādhā al-kitāb wa-ghayrahu kamā taṣuḥḥu riwāyatuhu wa-an yanfaʻa bi-hi al-Muslimīn wa-yajʻaluhu fī darajāt al-ṣāliḥīn bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Wa-kataba muʼallifuhu ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Khalaf al-Anṣārī al-Simākī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻurifa bi-Ibn al-Khaṭīb, wa-dhālika fī al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Qaʻdah sanat 641 [14 May 1244]."

record.title: 880-03 Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār : manuscript / Abū Shujāʻ Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 690 (A.D. 1291).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Khayr al-Nabīyīn, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-Qāḍī al-ajall al-Imām Abū Shujāʻ Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad aḥsan Allāh tawfīqahu: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣdiqāʼ, ḥafiẓahum Allāh, an aʻmala mukhtaṣaran fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār wa-nihāyat al-ījāz, yaqrubu ʻalá al-ʻālim darsahu, wa-yashulu ʻalá al-mubtadī ḥifẓuhu ..."

On folio 31b: A statement dating the birth of a child named Yaḥyá, the night of Saturday, 5 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 676 of the Hijrah (13 August 1277), as follows: "Wulid al-walad al-aʻazz al-afḍal khalaf al-quḍāh wa-al-afāḍil wa-al-aʼimmah wa-al-ʻulamāʼ, Jalāl al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Yaḥyá, abqāhu Allāh taʻālá, waqt nawmat al-nās, laylat al-Sabt, ṣabāḥuhā, al-khāmis min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sant sitt wa-sabʻīn wa-sittimiʼah."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover deteriorated.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Tamm bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi fī al-thāmin ʻashar min Rajab, sanat tisʻīn wa-sittimiʼah [24 July 1291], bi-yad Sulaymān ibn Maḥmūd ibn Abī al-Fatḥ, ḥāmidan lillāh wa-muṣallīyan ʻalá Nabīyihi."

record.title: 880-02 Masāʼil naḥwīyah : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 952 (A.D. 1545).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī, raḥimahu Allāh: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān wa-anā ʻalá janāḥ safar ʻan tawjīh al-naṣb fī naḥw qawl al-qāʼil fulānun lā yamliku dirhaman faḍlan ʻan dīnār, wa-qawluhu al-iʻrāb lughatan al-bayān, wa-al-iʻrāb iṣṭilāḥan taghyīr al-ākhir li-ʻāmil, wa-al-dalīl lughatan al-murshid, wa-al-ijmāʻ lughatan al-ʻazm, wa-al-sunnah lughatan al-ṭarīq ..."

On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitābun yataḍammanu al-jawāb ʻan iʻrāb qawlihim 'Fulānun lā yamliku dirhaman faḍlan ʻan dīnārin' wa-qawlihim 'al-Iʻrābu lughatan al-bayānu' wa-naḥwihi, wa-qawlihim 'Yajūzu kadhā khilāfan li-fulān', wa-qawlihim 'Halummā jarran', taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-yalī dhālika muʼallaf la-hu ayḍan fī iʻrāb 'Ḍarbī Zaydan qāʼiman'. Nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In bluish paper cover, exposing manuscript waste.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Colophon: "Tammat fī awāsiṭ Jumādá al-Ākhirah, min shuhūr sanat ithnayn wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [3 September 1545]."

record.title: 880-02 Tarājim al-ṣawāʻiq fī Wāqiʻat al-Ṣanājiq : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn Ibrāhīm ibn Abī Bakr al-Ṣāliḥī al-ʻAwfī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1174 (A.D. 1760).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥakam al-ʻādil, al-laṭīf al-khabīr, mālik al-mamālik, al-qādir al-qahhār ... wa-iʻlam annahu qad ḥadatha bi-Miṣr wāqiʻah, kānat li-man ghawá qāmiʻah ... fa-lammā ḥaṣalat hādhihi al-ḥādithah ... saʼalanī baʻḍ al-sādah al-kirām ... an aḍbiṭa wa-uḥarrira hādhihi al-wāqiʻah mimmā shūhida min al-umūr al-khāriqah, wa-urajjiḥ min al-aqwāl al-ṣādiqah ... wa-sammaytuhā 'Tarājim al-ṣawāʻiq fī Wāqiʻat al-Ṣanājiq', wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat abwāb wa-khātimah ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered, Type II (with flap); dark brown leather with gilded rim on cover and flap with green decorated paper in the center.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, by a father and a son, as follows: "Min wadāʼiʻ al-dahr ʻindī, lam adrī li-man baʻdī, istaktabahu al-faqīr Ibrāhīm Katkhadāá Tufikchiyān, fī ghurrat Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1174 [13 August 1760]." "Fī nawbat al-faqīr al-Sayyid Ḥusayn al-Kamālī al-Shādhilī ibn al-marḥūm Ibrāhīm Katkhadā Tufikchiyān, fī ākhir shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1179 [17 August 1765]. [Signature]."

Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu wa-jāmiʻuhu wa-wāḍiʻuhu, al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Ibrāhīm ibn Abī Bakr al-ṣāliḥī al-ʻAwfī, ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min jamʻ hādhā al-muʼallaf, wa-min taḥrīr hādhā al-muṣannaf, sādis ʻashar Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām, min shuhūr sanat iḥdá wa-sabʻīn wa-alf [17 March 1661]. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻUmar walad ʻUmar walad ʻUmar, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-man naẓara li-kitābatihi, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi bi-al-maghfirah, wa-li-man raʼá ʻayban fī kitābatihi aw khalalan wa-saddahu, fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, thālith shahr Muḥrram al-ḥarām, iftitāḥ sanat 1174 baʻda al-alf [15 August 1760], khutimat bi-al-khayr wa-al-sharaf. Wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Āmīn."

record.title: Journal of an Indian Scouting Expedition in the Sierra Diablo : holograph, [1854 or 1855] Nov 7-19.
record.note: Includes transcript.

record.title: Memoranda of my voyage to Lower California : holograph, 1864-1865.
record.note: Includes partial typescript.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb bi-man malaka Miṣr min al-mulūk wa-al-nūwāb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥallāq.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Karīm al-Wahhāb, al-Ḥakīm al-Tawwāb, alladhī tafarrada bi-al-baqāʼ, wa-ḥakama ʻalá mā siwāhu bi-al-fanāʼ, lā ilāha illā Huwa, la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná ... Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā kāna ʻilm al-tārīkh min anfas mā yuḥāḍaru bi-hi wa-yutanāfasu fī ṭalabihi ... khaṭar lī an ajmaʻa tārīkhan laṭīfan wa-mukhtaṣaran ẓarīfan adhkuru fīhi aḥwāl Miṣr al-Qāhirah wa-mā ishtamalat ʻalayhi min al-awṣāf al-bāhirah, wa-man waliyahā min baʻd al-Ṭūfān, wa-man nāba fī wilāyatihā ʻan al-khalaf al-aʻyān ..."
Leaves numbered by a later hand 1-99, leaf 58 missing.
Script: Good 18th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose in dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Frame outlined in red ink. Rubrication.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: Unfinished; text ends as follows: "... wa-kānat hazīmat al-kuffār ʻaẓīmah, istaʼṣalahum al-Muslimūn qatlan wa-asran, wa-aṣābahum al-qaḥṭ ḥattá halakat dawābuhum, wa-fātū al-ʻarabāt allatī yaḥmilu dhakhāʼirahum li-ʻadam mā yajurruhum, wa-wajadū fī khazīnat al-Ghazāl sabʻan wa-ʻishrīn kīsan fa-tanāhabahā al-ʻaskar. Wa-fī thāmin al-shahr rajiʻa ʻaskar al-Islām min al-ghazāt, wa-fī thāmin ʻasharah waqt al-ʻaṣr jāzū Nahr Barūt bi-ālātihim wa-ʻudadihim, wa-ḥuṣiya man qutila min al-Muslimīn mā yanūfu ʻan al-miʼatayn, wa-injaraḥa minhum mā yanūbu [yanūfu] ʻalá al-alfayn, wa-ammā qatlá al-Naṣārá al-kuffār fa-lā yumkinu ḥaṣdaruhum [ḥaṣruhum] ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt wa-al-fawāʼid wa-al-furūq : manuscript / li-Ismāʻīl al-Ḥaqqī al-Brūsawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1197 (A.D. 1783).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Inna aḥsana shiyatin ṣanaʻahā banān al-yarāʻah, wa-abyan ḥāshiyah saradahā unmulat al-barāʻah, wa-azyan ghāshiyah nasajahā al-musajjil kulla sāʻah, maḥāmid Allāh al-Karīm ʻazza wa-jall, wa-awlá tarjīʻ ghurrida bi-hi ʻandalīb al-lisān, wa-aʻlá tasjīʻ nāḥa bi-hi ḥamāmat al-bayān, wa-aʻlá taṭrīb naghama bi-hi ṭāʼir al-jinān ṣalāt al-Nabī al-Amīn al-Ajall, Muḥammad, wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālihi, mimman iqtabasa min mishkāt jamālih, wa-ightarafa min māʼ nawālih, ilá intihāʼ al-amad wa-inqiḍāʼ al-ajal. Wa-baʻd ..."
On the author cf. Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 652.
Script: Good Turkish nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Two series of foliation: one in red ink using Arabic numbers; the other on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb, bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻan yad ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf Muḥammad Ṣafwat ibn Yūsuf ibn Mīr Ḥasan al-Shahīd al-shahīr bi-Rajab Zādah, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahum wa-satara ʻuyūbahum. Āmīn. Bi-ḥurmat al-Nabī al-Amīn. Qad tamma fī al-yawm al-thālith ʻashar min Rajab al-fard, sanat sabʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [14 June 1783]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nuzʹhah al-zahīyah fī dhikr wulāt Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Surūr al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī al-Shāfiʻī sibṭ Āl al-Ḥasan.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1063 (A.D. 1653).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī amadda al-diyār al-Miṣrīyah bi-al-ʻaṭāʼ al-midrār, wa-ajrá bi-fayḍ faḍlihi Nīlahā al-midrār, fa-intafaʻat bi-hi sāʼir al-aqṭār ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-ghafūr al-shakūr, Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Surūr al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī al-Shāfiʻī sibṭ al-Ḥasan ... Lammā atmamtu tārīkhī al-kabīr al-musammá bi-Nuzʹhat al-abṣār wa-juhaynat al-akhbār, wa-atmamtu tārīkhī al-ṣaghīr al-musammá bi-al-Minaḥ al-Raḥmānīyah fī al-Dawlah al-ʻUthmānīyah, khaṭar lī an ulakhkhiṣa tārīkhan adhkuru fīhi mulūk al-diyār al-Miṣrīyah wa-al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah min qabl al-Ṭūfān maʻa dhikr dawlat Āl ʻUthmān ..."
Also known as: al-Rawḍah al-zahīyah fī dhikr wulāt Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Loose, in red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Frame outlined in red ink. Rubrication. Marginal notes in red ink.
Foliation in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-kitāb, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-Karīm al-Wahhāb. Wāfaqa al-farāgh min naskhihi fī yawm al-Jumʻah, ghurrat Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat, sanat thalāth wa-sittīn wa-alf [30 January 1653], khutimat bi-al-khayrāt [?]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh taʻālá ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālih wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam [?]."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzʹhat al-nāẓirīn fī taʼrīkh man waliya Miṣr min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-salāṭīn : manuscript / taʼlīf al-Shaykh Marʻī ibn Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Yūsuf al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-bāqī wa-kull man ʻalayhā fān, al-dāʼim sulṭānuhu baʻda kull sulṭān, alladhī ʻallama bi-al-qalam ʻallama al-insān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá mālik azimmat al-khilāfah wa-al-majd bi-arfaʻ ʻanān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-ʻazm wa-al-tārīkh wa-al-ʻirfān. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-nufūs lam tazal tatashawwaqu li-akhbār al-māḍīn, wa-tatashawwafu li-aḥwāl al-khulafāʼ wa-al-salāṭīn, fa-fī āthārihim ʻibrah lil-muʻtabirīn ..."
Script: 18th century calligraphic naskhī, in red, yellow, green, and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (flap missing); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: ʻUnwān in colors on leaf 1 verso. Frame outlined in red ink. Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

On the flyleaf: 1. Two black oval stamps: "al-Faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Ṣamad ʻabduhu ʻIwaḍ". The second stamp is illegible. 2. A reader's note: "Naẓara fīhi al-faqīr Ṣāliḥ al-Saqaṭī dāʻiyan li-mālikihi bi-ṭūl al-baqāʼ wa-ʻulū al-irtiqāʼ". 3. Some scribbles and calculations.

On the title page: Two ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Tamallakahu min faḍl Rabbihi al-Mannān Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Saʻdāwī, fī 27 Rajab, sanat 1199 [5 June 1785]." 2. "Qad tamallaka hādhā al-kitāb min faḍl Rabbihi al-Ḥannān al-Mannān. Wa-anā al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-rājī ʻafā Rabbī al-Karīm, al-Ḥājj Ḥāmid Rajab ibn ʻAbbās Rajab, nisbatuhu Qādirīyah, ṭarīqatuhu Rifāʻīyah, madhhabuhu al-Shāfiʻī, fī sanat 1280 [1863/1864]. Fa-billāh ʻalayka yā qurrāʼ hādhā al-kitāb iqraʼ al-Fātiḥah al-Kitāb, wa-ihdihi ilá rūḥ ṣāḥibihi al-Ḥājj Ḥāmid Rajab al-Rifāʻī, ghafara Allāh lanā wa-laka wa-lī kull al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly as follows: "... Wa-fī Ḥadīth Abī Dāwūd: Man ḥālat shafāʻatuhu dūna ḥaddin min ḥudūd Allāh fa-qad ḍādda Allāh fī amrihi. Wa-man khāṣama fī bāṭilin wa-huwa yaʻlamu lam yazal fī sakhaṭi Allāh ḥattá yanzaʻa. Wa-lammā shanaʻū ʻinda al-Nabī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Izālat al-ʻubūs ʻan wajh Manḥ al-Quddūs : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Muḥammad al-Fullānī al-Kishnāwī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-tawfīq. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī naṭaqat maṣnūʻātuhu bi-Rubūbīyatihi, wa-afāḍa ʻalá anwāʻ al-ʻawālim ajnās al-niʻam wa-khawāṣṣ al-mazāyā bi-luṭfihi wa-ḥikmatih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt wa-al-dalāʼil al-qāṭiʻāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqaddamīn ʻalá sāʼir al-awliyāʼ, wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum min al-atqiyāʼ. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kāna bi-ittifāq ahl al-ʻaql wa-iṭbāq dhawī al-faḍl anna al-ʻulūm, lāsīyamā al-yaqīnīyah, aʻlá al-maṭālib wa-abhá al-manāqib, wa-anna ṣāḥibahā ashraf al-ashkhās al-basharīyah ..."
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 366; S II, p. 494.
5 laid-in leaves, in a modern hand.
Script: Fair 18th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose binding, paper covered, Type II (with flap).
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliation on every fifth leaf in modern pencil.

Colophon: "Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, ʻadad mā dhakarahu al-dhākirūn wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn. Wa-qaʻa al-farāgh min kitābatihi ḍuḥá al-Khamīs."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat Shaykh Mashāʼikh al-Islām al-Nawawī : manuscript / taʼlīf Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Syyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallim. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manaḥa rijālan bi-sulūkihim al-minhāj dhikran bi-hi al-majālis tuʻaṭṭaru wa-al-qalb yaḥyá, wa-fataḥa bi-taysīrihi lahum aqfālan zāda bi-infāqihim min kunūzihā al-ibtihāj, fa-hum fī rawḍatin, bal riyāḍin fī al-ākhirah wa-al-dunyā, wa-jaʻala al-ʻumdah ʻalayhim fī al-taṣḥīḥ wa-al-īḍāḥ, wa-al-mafzaʻ fī al-shiddah ilayhim fī al-ghudw wa-al-rawāḥ ..."
The title on leaf 1 recto is written in the author's hand, as are some of the marginal notes.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black, of the 15th century.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawābb. 2. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 3. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 4. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 5. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Wa-nuqilat min nuskhat jāmiʻihā bi-khaṭṭihi al-mushār ilayhi ʻalá yad kātibihā afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá maghfirat Allāh, Abū Bakr ibn Rajab al-Ḥusaynī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-Huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi."

record.title: 880-02 Juzʼ fīhi Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawābb : manuscript / lil-faqīr ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied by ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd in Mecca in A.H. 887 (A.D. 1482).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh alladhī wasiʻat raḥmatuhu kull shayʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf khalqihi al-mabʻūth raḥmatan li-kull maytin wa-ḥayy, fa-hādhā juzʼun ajabtu fīhi ʻan masʼalat ḍarb al-dawābb, wa-asʻaft bi-hi man saʼala ʻanhā min al-fuḍalāʼ dhawī al-barāʻat wa-al-intikhāb, nafaʻanī Allāh bi-hi wa-īyāhu wa-sāʼir al-Muslimīn, wa-khatama lanā bi-khayrin ajmaʻīn, fa-aqūlu: Qad jāʼa al-ḍarb fī Aḥādīth ..."
Title and ijāzah (leaf 69 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 3. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 4. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 5. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Hādhā lafẓ al-muʼallif bi-ḥurūfihi, wa-min khaṭṭihi, amtaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-ḥayātihi, naqaltu dhālika fī yawmayn mutawāliyayn, thānīhimā yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, thālith ʻashar Jumād al-Thānī, sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah [8 August 1482] bi-manzilinā fī Makkah al-Musharrafah. Qālahu wa-kataba Abū al-Khayr wa-Abū Fāris Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī al-Atharī, Alhamahu Allāh rushdahu wa-laṭufa bi-hi wa-bi-wālidayhi wa-bi-ikhwānihi wa-bi-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman." After the colophon an "Ijāzah" by al-Sakhāwī for several people, dated "Fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, sādis ʻashar al-Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [2 July 1472], bi-Jāmiʻ al-Ghamrī, yaʻnī fī al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah, ʻaqib majlisay al-imlāʼ, wa-ajazt lahum lafẓan. Wa-katabahu muʼallifuhu Muḥammad ibn al-Sakhāwī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, wa-min khaṭṭihi naqala kātibuhu ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Atharī, laṭufa Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-wālidayhi wa-bi-ikhwānihi wa-bi-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan Lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ : manuscript / li-kātibihi Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Copied by ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd in Mecca in A.H. 900 (A.D. 1495).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-ḥāfiẓ al-kabīr Shaykh al-Islām Shams al-Dīn Abū al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Zayn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī, adāma Allāh ḥayātahu wa-fawāʼidah: Laqad suʼltu ʻammā ʻuziya li-Adab al-Kātib li-Ibn Qutaybah, fīmā nasabahu lil-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam 'Lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ wa-lā murran fa-tuʻqá' aw yuʻqá, ahuwa Ḥadīth, wa-mā maʻnāhu ..."
Title (leaf 81 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawābb. 3. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 4. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 5. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā fataḥa Allāh bi-hi al-ān min al-kitābah ʻalá hādhā al-suʼāl. Wa-fawqa kull dhī ʻilmin ʻalīm. Intahá fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, thāmin Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat tisʻimiʼah [15 January 1495], bi-manzil kātibihi min Makkah al-Musharrafah, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī, laṭufa Allāh bihim. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-02 Rujḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah : manuscript / lil-faqīr ... al-Sakhāwī Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied by ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd in Mecca in A.H. 900 (A.D. 1495).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qāla Shaykhunā, al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, Shaykh al-Islām, khātimat al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām, Shams al-Dīn Abū al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Zayn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakhāwī al-Qāhirī al-Shāfiʻī, mattaʻanā Allāh bi-ḥayātihi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh mūsiʻ al-khalāʼiq faḍlan wa-ifḍālan, wa-mubdiʻ al-sawābiq wa-al-lawāḥiq ʻalá ghayr mithāl ʻadlan wa-iʻtidālan ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā juzʼun fīhi asmāʼ man waqaftu ʻalayhi min ahl al-Ṣuffah ..."
Title (leaf 86 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawābb. 3. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 4. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 5. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Wa-intahá kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah min khaṭṭ muʼallifihi, fasaḥa Allāh fī muddatihi, fī laylatin tusfiru ʻan yawm al-Sabt, khāmis Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat tisʻimiʼah [12 January 1495], bi-manzil kātibihi min Makkah al-Musharrafah, al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá luṭf al-Khabīr, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī al-Atharī, laṭufa Allāh bihim. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-02 Juzʼ fīhi Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym : manuscript / lil-faqīr ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Copied by the same hand (ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd) as in the preceding work (leaves 86-127), about 1495.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh mālik al-mulk, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-munqidh min al-hulk, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, al-fāʼiqīn fī al-zuhd wa-al-nusk, fa-hādhihi kurrāsatun takallamtu fīhā ʻalá al-Aḥādīth allatī afradahā al-Ḥāfiẓ Abū Nuʻaym fī faḍīlat al-ʻādilīn, li-yantafiʻa bihā al-kāffah min al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-muḥaddithīn, khatama Allāh lī wa-lahum bi-khayr ajmaʻīn ..."
Title (leaf 128 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawāb 3. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 4. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 5. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with the "takhrīj" of Ḥadīth "Mā ʻadala wālin tajara fī raʻīyatih".

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / li-kātibihi ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 876 (A.D. 1471).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā juzʼun kharrajtu fīhi Aḥādīth al-arbaʻīn al-Ṣūfīyah, li-Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sulamī, imtithālan li-baʻḍ al-sādah mimman ʻurifa bi-al-tafannun fī al-ʻulūm, maʻa al-waraʻ wa-al-ʻibādah, nafaʻanī Allāh bi-barakatihi, wa-ballagha kullan minnā fī al-dārayn nihāyat qaṣdihi wa-bughyatih ..."

Script: Leaves 144 verso-145 verso, good naskhī, in red and black; same hand (ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd) as in the preceding work (leaves 128-143). Leaves 144 recto and 146 recto-165 recto (author's handwriting), hasty naskhī, very sparsely pointed.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawāb. 3. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 4. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 5. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 6. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-takhrīj. Wa-intahá fī thānī ʻashar Ṣafar, sanat sitt wa-sabʻīn wa-thamānī miʼah [9 August 1471]. Wa-naqaltuhu min khaṭṭī ilá [... ...] aḥbābihi li-sāʼilin bāraka Allāh fī ḥayātihi. Katabahu mukhrijuhu, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-al-Muslimīn, wa-khatama lahum bi-khayrin ajmaʻīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah : manuscript / li-kātibihi Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied by ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd in Mecca in A.H. 900 (A.D. 1495).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, Shaykh al-Islām wa-ḥāmil liwāʼ Sunnat Sayyid al-Anām, Shams al-Dīn Abū al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Zayn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakhāwī, amtaʻanā Allāh bi-ḥayātihi. Āmīn. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh ʻazza wa-jall, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī arshada li-kull faḍlin wa-dalla ... Fa-hādhihi ajwibah ʻan Aḥādīth bi-yaqīn, tazīdu ʻalá al-khamsīn, warada ʻalayya min thaghr Dimyāṭ al-maḥrūs, al-bahīj al-maʼnūs, al-suʼāl ʻanha,̄ min baʻḍ al-aʼimmah al-ʻulamāʼ al-nubahāʼ ..."
Title (leaf 166 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawāb. 3. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 4. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 5. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 6. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 7. al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat Salmān.

Colophon: "Ākhir Ajwibat al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah li-Shaykhinā, Shaykh al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah, al-dhābb ʻan al-āthār al-Nabawīyah, Shams al-Dīn Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn al-Zayn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhāwī, zāda Allāh fī irtiqāʼih. Wa-intahá min khaṭṭihi bi-ḥurūfih fī baʻḍ yawmayn, thānīhimā yawm al-Jumʻah, ḥādī ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat tisʻimiʼah [18 January 1495], bi-manzil kātibihi, min Makkah al-Musharrafah, al-faqīr ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī al-Atharī, laṭufa Allāh bihim. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Taḥṣīl wa-al-bayān fī siyāq qiṣṣat al-Sayyid Salmān : manuscript / taṣnīf ... al-Sakhāwī Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān.
record.note: Copied by ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd in Mecca in A.H. 900 (A.D. 1495).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qāla Shaykhunā, Shaykh al-Islām, ḥujjat al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Shams al-Dīn Abū al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Zayn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakhāwī al-Qāhirī al-Shāfiʻī, zāda Allāh fī irtiqāʼihi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa man shāʼa fa-adrakatʹhu al-saʻādah, wa-arshadahu ilá al-faḥṣ ʻan al-millah al-Ḥanīfīyah wa-al-raghbah fī al-ʻibādah ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad warada ʻalayya min Makkah al-Sharīfah asʼilah (?) ʻan (?) qiṣṣat Salmān al-munīfah, wa-jamʻ ṭuruqihā juhd al-imakān, wa-bayān hal hiya min al-ṣiḥāḥ wa-al-ḥisān, fa-ajabtu al-ṭālib li-qaṣdihi al-jamīl ..."
Title (leaf 183 recto) written in the author's hand.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication.

With: 7 other titles by al-Sakhāwī: 1. al-Manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī fī tarjamat quṭb al-awliyāʼ al-Nawawī. 2. Taḥrīr al-jawāb ʻan ḍarb al-dawāb. 3. al-Jawāb alladhī inḍabaṭ ʻan lā takun ḥulwan fa-tustaraṭ. 4. Rajaḥān al-kiffah fī bayān nubdhah min akhbār ahl al-Ṣuffah. 5. Takhrīj Aḥādīth al-ʻādilīn li-Abī Nuʻaym. 6. Takhrīj al-arbaʻīn al-Sulamīyah fī al-taṣawwuf. 7. al-Ajwibah al-ʻalīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-Dimyāṭīyah.

Colophon: "Wa-intahá kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm al-Khamīs, sādis ʻasharay Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat tisʻimiʼah [3 January 1495], ʻalá yad afqar al-khalāʼiq, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-ʻAlawī al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī al-Atharī, laṭufa Allāh bihim. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Tuḥfat al-nās bi-khabar ribāṭ Sayyidinā al-ʻAbbās : manuscript / jamʻ kātibihi ... Muḥammad al-madʻūw Jār Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 940 (A.D. 1533 or 1534).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Yaqūlu kātibuhu al-faqīr ilá luṭf Allāh wa-karamih, al-multajī ilá Baytihi wa-Ḥaramihi, Muḥammad al-madʻū Jār Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ... ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-ʻAlawī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī, khādim al-Ḥadīth al-Sharīf bi-Ḥaram Allāh al-muṭahhar al-munīf, laṭufa Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá, wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā jawābun li-suʼāl baʻḍ al-nās ʻan ʻimārat al-ribāṭ al-mansūb li-Sayyidinā al-ʻAbbās ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ibn ʻAbd Manāf al-Qurashī al-Hāshimī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, ʻamm al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, al-kāʼin bi-al-Masʻá al-Sharīf bi-Makkah al-Musharrafah, wa-man awqafahu wa-waliya mashyakhatahu, min awwal ʻimāratihi ilá waqt zamāninā fī al-arbaʻīn min al-qarn al-ʻāshir ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 393.
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In marbled paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap).
Decoration: Rubrication.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Tuḥfat al-nās bi-khabar ribāṭ Sayyidinā al-ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, jamʻ kātibihi al-faqīr ilá luṭf Allāh wa-karamihi, al-multajī ilá Baytihi wa-Ḥaramihi, Muḥammad al-madʻū Jār Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī, laṭufa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Wa-yalīhi al-Khabar al-marfūʻ fī ayyām al-usbūʻ, li-muʼallifihi bi-khaṭṭihi."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Min anʻum Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr Ibrāhīm, al-banādiqī ṣināʻatan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Rifāʻī khirqatan, al-khalwatī ṭarīqatan, al-Wafāʼī, al-mukanná Abā Mufliḥ ibn al-marḥūm al-faqīr Aḥmad al-Ḥallāq, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Sanat 1147 [1734/1735]." 2. "Fī nawbat Sharaf al-Dīn ibn Shaykh al-Islām, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."
With: 1 other title: al-Khabar al-marfūʻ fī ayyām al-usbūʻ / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... wa-ashraktu maʻī shaqīqī al-muqrī al-ṣūfī Muḥyī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd al-Makkī, kāna Allāh la-hu wa-lī, fī mashyakhat al-ribāṭ wa-al-naẓar ʻalá al-awqāf, wa-lam yubāshirhā, lākinnahu yaʼkhudhu maʻlūmahā lil-rifq wa-al-isʻāf. Wa-Allāh taʻālá yuʻāmilunī wa-īyāhu bi-khafī al-alṭāf wa-yuʼminunā mimmā yukhāf yawma al-makhāf, bi-jāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-sharrafa wa-karram."

record.title: 880-02 al-Khabar al-marfūʻ fī ayyām al-usbūʻ : manuscript / li-kātibihi ... Muḥammad al-madʻūw Jār Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Holograph, written about A.H. 940 (A.D. 1533 or 1534).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu kātibuhu al-faqīr ilá luṭf Allāh wa-karamih, al-multajī ilá Baytihi wa-Ḥaramih, Muḥammad al-madʻū Jār Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn Taqī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Hāshimī al-Makkī al-Shāfiʻī, laṭufa Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb min al-ʻulamāʼ al-anjāb ʻan ayyām al-usbūʻ wa-mā warada fīhā min khabar marfūʻ aw maqṭūʻ, wa-hal yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ yawm naḥsin mustamirr, wa-mā dhukira fīhi min qawlin mushtahir, fa-qultu la-hu hādhā al-jawāb, wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Khabar al-marfūʻ fī ayyām al-usbūʻ' ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In marbled paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap).
Decoration: Rubrication.
With: 1 other title: Tuḥfat al-nās bi-khabar ribāṭ Sayyidinā al-ʻAbbās / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Fahd.
On folio 8a: An ownership statement: "Fī nawbat Sharaf al-Dīn ibn Shaykh al-Islām ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."

On folio 11b: An ownership statement: "Malakahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Dayyān, al-Shihāb Aḥmad Riḍwān, al-Ḥanafī madhhaban, al-Shādhilī ʻaqīdatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi. Allāh Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." Followed by miscellaneous verses of poetry in a different hand.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly as follows: "... Wa-qāla baʻḍuhum mughayyiran al-bayt al-akhīr wa-zāda baʻdahu baytan ākhar. Wa-yawma rabūʻin lā yadūrr fa-innahu // nahaytuka ʻanhu fa-huwa naḥsun mustamirr. Rawaynāhu fī Baḥr al-ʻulūm bi-ṣiḥḥatin // kadhā ṣaḥḥati al-akhbāru ʻan Sayyidi al-Bashar. Wa-qāla al-ʻAllāmah al-muʻabbir Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥusayn al-Dimyāṭī [...] al-maʻrūf ..."

record.title: Kitāb al-ḥayawān : al-juzʼ al-awwal / lil-Jāḥiẓ. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit same as in the printed edition.
Title supplied by a modern hand inside the front blank paper.
Calligraphic modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Other volume(s) wanting.

record.title: 880-03 Fatāwá. Jild thānī : manuscript / Qāḍī Khān.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 748 (A.D. 1348).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr. Kitāb al-Buyūʻ. Qāla al-bayʻ munʻaqid bi-al-ījāb wa-al-qabūl idhā kānā bi-lafẓ al-māḍī mithl an yaqūla aḥaduhumā biʻtu wa-al-ākhar ishtaraytu, li-anna al-bayʻ inshāʼ taṣarruf, wa-al-inshāʼ yuʻrafu bi-al-sharʻ, wa-al-mawḍūʻ lil-ikhbār qad istuʻmila fīhi fa-yanʻaqid bi-hi ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In marbled cardboard, Type III (without flap); dark brown leather on spine and the edges.
On the lower edge: "Qāḍī Khān".
Decoration: Rubrication.
Extensive marginalia in the earlier part of the manuscript.
Volume I wanting.
Recto second leaf censored with black ink.
Foliation on every fifth leaf.

Colophon: "Qad taḥarrara saṭr suṭūr al-Hidāyah bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Fattāḥ al-Kabīr, wa-faraghat yad muʻalliqihi al-ḍaʻīf al-faqīr al-naḥīf al-musīʼ al-ḥaqīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-khabīr wa-karam Mawlāy al-Mawlá al-Naṣīr, wa-Huwa ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Ibrāhīm ibn Sulaymān al-Ḥamawī, nawwar Allāh maḍjiʻuhumā, fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, waqt al-ḍaḥwah al-kubrá, fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat thamān wa-arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [March/April 1348]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdihi."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mudhhabah fī al-ḥulá wa-al-shiyāt : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad ibn Aṣbagh al-Azdī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 621 (A.D. 1224).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit same as in Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) 5370, and Bankipore (Catalogue of the Arabic and Persian Manuscripts in the Oriental Public Library at Bankipore) XX, 1989.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-ajal, al-Qāḍī al-aʻdal, al-Azdī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad ibn Aṣbagh al-Azdī, adāma Allāh tawfīqahu, mujīban li-man saʼalahu min ikhwānihi, ḥafiẓahum Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāhi taʻālá munʻiman // ʻallama min jahlin wa-jallá min ʻamā. Naḥmaduhu subḥānahu wa-nashhadu // an lā ilāha ghayrahu wa-naʻbudu ..."

Brockelmann (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur) spells mudhahhabah, but Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) has mudhhabah, and the meter requires this spelling in the prefatory verses on leaf 1 recto (verse 5, 2d half), and in the verses on leaf 40 recto and in the colophon (which also spell ḥulá, Brockelmann: ḥilā). Also al-muʻaqqibah so spelled on leaf 40 recto (Brockelmann: al-muʻaqqabah).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black. Badly worm-eaten.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubrication.
Foliated on each fifth leaf.

On folio 1a: A seven-line poem in praise of the book, starts with: "Hādhā kitābun mumtiʻun muḥtafilu // ʻalá al-shiyāti wa-al-ḥulá mushtamilu. Munaẓẓamun mujawwadu al-ḥurūfi // mujazzaʼun juzʼayni fī al-taʼlīfi", and ends with: " Mustamlaḥun yuʼannisu al-jalīsā // allafahu Muḥammadu ibn ʻĪsá. Wa-yasʼalu Allāha jamīla al-ghafri // wa-al-ʻafwi wa-al-najāti yawma al-ḥashri."
Colophon of the first part (folio 39a): "Kamulat al-Urjūzah al-Mudhhabah, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn."

Colophon of the second part "Abwāb Naẓm al-jumal al-muʻaqqibah min al-ṣifāt li-Kitāb al-Mudhhabah": "Intahá al-qawl fīmā umila min hādhihi al-ziyādah al-muʻqibah fī al-ṣifāt lil-Mudhhabah min al-ḥulá wa-al-shiyāt, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, wa-Huwa ḥasbunā, bi-hi nastaʻīnu wa-ʻalayhi natawakkalu, Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naqlihā fī ākhir yawm min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah [27 May 1224]. Wa-shāhadtu bi-khaṭṭ kātib al-nuskhah allatī nuqilat hādhihi al-nuskhah minhā wa-sumiʻat ʻalá muṣannifihā wa-ʻalayhā khaṭṭuhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min inshāʼihā fī shahr Ramaḍān, sanat arbaʻ ʻashrah wa-sittimiʼah [December 1217/January 1218]."

record.title: 880-02 Thabat : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimashqī al-shahīr bi-al-Kuzbarī.
record.note: Holograph, written in Damascus in A.H. 1243 (A.D. 1827).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Raḥmān alladhī sharrafa ʻabdahu bi-khidmat khadamat al-Ḥadīth al-Nabawī, wa-anhalahu shurbatan min manhalihim al-ʻadhb al-sāʼigh al-rawī, wa-manaḥahu al-juthūwa bayna aydīhim li-iqtināṣ farāʼidihim, wa-atḥafahu bi-al-tamassuk bi-ʻurāhum al-wuthqá, wa-al-ittiṣāl bi-asānīd shuyūkhihim wa-fawāʼidihim, thumma imtanna ʻalayhi baʻda iṣṭifāʼihim li-barzakh al-ākhirah bi-al-julūs fī biqāʻihim al-karīmah al-munīrah al-zāhirah lil-taḥdīth bimā ʻanhum ḥaṣalat bi-hi al-riwāyah, wa-al-taḥdīth bi-niʻam Allāh taʻālá al-karīm ʻalá hādhihi al-ʻnināyah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: None.
Foliated.
There is a two-line erasure after the name of al-Madanī on leaves 1 verso-2 recto, and some tampering may have been done.

Colophon (folio 6a): "Qālahu wa-katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, muḥibb al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, wa-maḥsūb al-sādah al-fuqarāʼ wa-al-ṣāliḥīn, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimashqī al-shahīr bi-al-Kuzbarī, al-munʻam ʻalayhi bi-al-julūs fī buqʻat al-Muḥaddithīn taḥt al-qubbah bi-Jāmiʻ Banī Umayyah, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-khatama la-hu bi-al-ḥusná bi-ʻāfiyah bilā miḥnah. Āmīn. Wa-tamma kitābatuhā ʻashīyat nahār al-Ithnayn, thāmin ʻasharay shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá, min sanat thalāth wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [17 December 1827]." Under the colophon the stamp of the author ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Kuzbarī.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Kināyāt al-udabāʼ wa-ishārāt al-bulaghāʼ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan laka Allāhumma an jaʻalata al-lughah al-ʻArabīyah aḥsan al-lughāt wa-afṣaḥahā, wa-ʻibārātihā adall al-ʻibārāt ʻalá al-maqṣūd wa-awḍaḥahā, wa-anzala (wa-anzalta) bi-hā al-Qurʼān al-ʻArabī wa-al-muʻjiz al-Nabawī al-Aḥmadī, fa-ḥatmun ʻalá al-Muslimīn iqtifāʼ kalām al-ʻArab wa-istiqrāʼ andiyat al-adab, li-yatadarrajū li-maʻrifat iʻjāz al-Qurʼān, wa-istikhrāj mā ūdiʻa min sirr al-bayān ..."

On title page: "Kitāb Kināyāt al-udabāʼ wa-ishārāt al-bulaghāʼ taʼlīf al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī al-Shāfiʻī, al-mutawaffá sanat 482, jamaʻa fīhi maḥāsin al-naẓm wa-al-nathr, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Green blind-tooled paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubrication; ʻunwān in color on leaf 1 verso; text framed in purple.
Foliated on every fifth leaf.
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-tawfīqihi hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Kināyāt al-udabāʼ, lil-ʻAllāmah al-Jurjānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mufaṣṣal fī sharḥ al-Muḥaṣṣal : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Kātibī al-Qazwīnī.
record.note: Copied about 1750.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī afāḍa bi-jūdihi al-ʻāmm wujūd al-ḥaqāʼiq, wa-anshaʼa bi-qudratihi al-tāmmah anwāʻ al-khalāʼiq, wa-iṣṭanaʻa bi-laṭā̄ʼif ṣunʻihi aṣnāf al-maṣnūʻāt, wa-aṭlaʻa bi-ʻilmihi al-kāmil ʻalá sāʼir al-maknūnāt ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap). Label on front cover.
Decoration: Sparsely rubricated.
Foliated on every fifth leaf.

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā aradnā īrādahu fī hādhā al-ijrāʼ, wa-li-wāhib al-ʻaql al-ḥamd bilā nihāyah, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad wa-ʻitratihi bi-ghayr ʻadad wa-ghāyah. Wa-qad najaza al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf alladhī allafahu Mawlānā al-Imām al-kāmil, al-muḥiqq al-muḥaqqiq, burhān al-mudabbijīn (?), afḍal al-mutaqaddimīn wa-al-mutaʼkhkhirīn, najm al-millah wa-al-dīn, ḍiyāʼ al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, ʻAlī ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Kātibī al-Qazwīnī, adāma Allāh ayyāmah, wa-asbagha ʻalá al-ṭālibīn iḥsānahu ... wa-li-Wāhib al-ʻaql al-ḥamd, wa-li-Rasūlihi al-ruḍwān. Bi-yad al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-muḥtāj Yaḥyá ibn Isḥāq ibn Harārsab."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muḥaṣṣal : manuscript / Fakhr al-Millah wa-al-Dīn al-Rāzī.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 1296 (A.D. 1879).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Muḥaṣṣal lil-Imām al-ʻĀlim Fakhr al-Millah wa-al-Dīn al-Rāzī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutaʻālī bi-jalāl aḥadīyatihi ʻan mushābahat al-aʻrāḍ wa-al-jawāhir, al-mutaqaddas bi-ʻulū ṣamadīyatihi ʻan munāsabat al-awhām wa-al-khawāṭir, al-munazzah bi-sumū sarmadīyatihi ʻan muqābalat al-aḥdāq wa-al-nawāẓir, al-mustaghnī bi-kamāl qudratihi ʻan musāʻadat al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated on every fifth leaf.

On folio 1a: "Li-muṣannif al-kitāb fī maraḍ mawtihi, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn. Nihāyatu iqdāmi al-ʻuqūl ʻiqālu // wa-aktharu saʻyi al-ʻālimīn ḍalālu. Wa-arwāḥunā fī waḥshatin min jusūminā // wa-khidmatu dunyānā adhan wa-wabālu. Wa-lam nastafid min baḥthinā ṭūla ʻumrinā // siwá an samiʻnā mā qīla wa-qālū."

Colophon: "Tamma wa-kamula. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq 14 Rabīʻ Awwal, sanat 1296 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [8 March 1879], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah, wa-sallama taslīman, ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Sālim, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhih, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-kāna naskhuhu min al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah al-kāʼinah bi-Sarāy Darb al-Jamāmīz."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī manāqib al-mujtahid Ibn Taymīyah : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1027 (A.D. 1618).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, wa-al-aʼimmah al-mujtahidīn, wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsānin ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi fawāʼid laṭīfah wa-farāʼid sharīfah fī manāqib Shaykh al-Islām, wa-baḥr al-ʻulūm, wa-muftī al-firaq, al-mujtahid Aḥmad Taqī al-Dīn ibn Taymīyah, lakhkhaṣtuhā min manāqibihi lil-Shaykh al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Imām Shams al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī (ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī ibn Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad [ṣaḥḥ]) ibn Qudāmah al-Maqdisī ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); dark red leather on spine and the edges; cover deteriorated.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated.
Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Faraghtu min jamʻihi baʻda ṣalāt al-ʻishāʼ laylat al-Jumʻah, thālith Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1027 [30 March 1618]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shahādah al-zakīyah fī thanāʼ al-aʼimmah ʻalá Ibn Taymīyah : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Holograph, written at al-Azhar Mosque, Cairo in A.H. 1030 (A.D. 1621).
Lacuna between leaves 19 and 20.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī, laṭufa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, wa-qāmiʻ ahl al-zaygh al-māʼilīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal al-khalq ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn, wa-tābiʻ al-tābiʻīn bi-iḥsānin ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi kalimāt munīrah wa-ʻibārāt mustanīrah, fī thanāʼ al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām ʻalá Shaykh al-Islām ... Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Taqī al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām Shaykh al-Islām Majd al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Khiḍr ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Khiḍr ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Taymīyah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding. Label with title on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated.
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Waqf bi-al-Azhar bi-Riwāq Ibn Yaʻmur (?)."

Colophon: "Tamma bi-khaṭṭ muʼallifihi. Qāla muʼallifuhu, sāmaḥahu Allāh: Faraghtu min jamʻ hādhihi al-farāʼid, wa-raqm hādhihi al-fawāʼid, bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar, nahār al-Jumʻah, waqt al-khuṭbah, sādis ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat thalāthīn wa-alf [2 October 1621]."

Under the colophon selections from a poem by Ibn Abī Ḥajalah (Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá, 1325-1374 or 1375) refuting the doctrines of "Ahl al-Ittiḥād" (Sufis who believe in the doctrine of 'Unity of Existence'), starts with: "Fa-yā wayla Ahli al-Ittiḥādi fa-innahum // aḍallū wa-ḍallū fī al-layālī al-muḍīʼati" and ends with: "Aqāmū bi-ʻAbd al-Ḥaqqi bāṭila qawlihim // wa-amsū bi-bulyānihm fī balīyati".

record.title: 880-02 Bahjat al-rasāʼil ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil : manuscript / Naṣrī ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥuṣarī al-Ḥasanī al-Bakrī.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1083 (A.D. 1672).
The work ends on leaf 233 verso, and is followed by commendatory certificates by several eminent scholars, in their own hands.
The title, as above, is given in the preface; the title on leaf 1 recto reads: Ijābat al-sāʼil bi-Wird al-wasāʼil.
For al-ʻUsālī's work see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 471.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāʼir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā huwa maḥjūb, wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd, fa-man fahima al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá Naṣrī ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥuṣrī al-Ḥasanī al-Bakrī ... wa-kāna mimmā tadhākartu fīhi maʻa baʻḍ al-ikhwān fī Allāh wa-al-muḥibbīn lillāh Wird al-wasāʼil li-kull qāṣid wa-sāʼil alladhī jamaʻahu al-Imām ... Sayyidī al-Shaykh Aḥmad (al-Khalwatī) al-ʻUsālī ... fa-istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī taʻlīqah laṭīfah ʻalayhi ... wa-sammaytuhu Bahjat al-rasāʼil ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in black and red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
On folio 1a: A plea to the paper protector "Kākam".
On folio 1a: A request by a reader/owner: "Raḥima Allāh man qaraʼa al-Jāmiʻah al-Fātiḥah wa-ahdá thawābahā lī wa-li-wālidayhi."
On folio 1a: "Taʻlīqah laṭīfah ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil, li-muḥarririhā al-faqīr Naṣrī al-Ḥasanī, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Wa-ismuhā Ijābat al-sāʼil bi-Wird al-wasāʼil."
On folio 1a: Several other titles, in different hands: "Ward al-khamāʼil ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil"; "Bughyat al-sāʼil ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil"; "Aw Dhakhīrat al-ajal ʻalá Wird al-wasāʼil".
Decoration: Rubricated. Framed in red ink throughout.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah al-sharīfah nahār al-Sabt, tāsiʻ Muḥarram al-ḥarām, min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-thamānīn wa-alf [7 May 1672], ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf Naṣrī ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥuṣrī al-Ḥasanī al-Bakrī, bayyaḍa Allāh ṣaḥāʼif aʻmālihi, wa-awraqa aghṣāna āmālihi bi-jāh Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

The author wrote under the colophon: "Innahā khaṭṭu faqīrin mudhnibin // min khaṭā ghadin irtaʻabā. Ghafara Allāhu li-ʻabdin qāriʼin // ghafara Allāh li-ʻabdin katabā"; "Wa-iʻlam anna kull mā dhakartuhu fī hādhā al-kitāb min qawlī. Wa-hādhā al-duʻāʼ kāna duʻāʼa fulān, fa-huwa min risālat al-Imām (Abī ʻAbd Allāh) al-Kharkūshī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, in aradtahu fa-rājiʻhu. Intahá. Ḥarrarahu al-faqīr Naṣrī al-Ḥasanī."

record.title: 880-02 Muʻīd al-niʻam wa-mubīd al-niqam : manuscript / Tāj al-Dīn Abū al-Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ... ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Kāfī al-Subkī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah ... Tāj al-Dīn Abū al-Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Imām Shaykh al-Islām ... Taqī al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Kāfī al-Subkī ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad warada ʻalayya suʼālun maḍmūnuhu: Hal min ṭarīqin li-man suliba niʻmatan dīnīyah aw dunyawīyah idhā salakahā ʻādat ilayhi wa-ruddat ʻalayhi ..."
Script: Modern (17th century) calligraphic naskhī, in black and red.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the book and the flap, and the edges. Paper label with call number 246 on front cover.
Decoration: Rubricated; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso. Framed in red ink throughout.
Foliated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Fa-hādhihi nubadhun mimmā ḥaḍaranā min fawāʼid al-balwá, wa-naḥnu [nasʼalu] Allāh al-ʻafwa wa-al-ʻāfiyah fī al-dīn wa-al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, fa-lasnā min rijāl al-balwá, wa-ffaqanā Allāh taʻālá lil-ʻamal al-ṣāliḥ bimā yuḥibbu wa-yarḍá, wa-barānā Allāh min al-miḥan wa-al-razāyā. Allāhumma ṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi ʻawdan ʻalá badʼ, mukhtataman ʻalá muftataḥ, wa-sallim taslīman dāʼiman bāqiyan ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, niʻma al-mawlá wa-niʻma al-naṣīr, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
