record.title: 880-02 Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ : manuscript / li-Shaykhinā ... Shams al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Jābir al-Hawwārī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā saddadah // wa-Huwa alladhī alhamanā an naḥmadah. Sharrafanā bi-al-ʻilmi baʻda al-jahli // wa-anna ahla al-ʻilmi khayru ahli. Wa-anṭaqa al-ʻUrba bi-khayri al-alsuni // fa-fahmuhu shīmatu kulli muḥsini. Fa-innahu miftāḥu kulli ʻilmi // wa-huwa al-dalīlu li-iqtibāsi al-fahmi. Idh wāḍiḥu al-Sunnati wa-al-Qurʼāni // qad warada bi-dhālika al-lisāni ..."
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm Qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 2. al-Urjūzah al-Marrākushīyah (Ḍiyāʼ al-arwāḥ al-muqtabas min al-Miṣbāḥ) / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 3. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān (Miʼat al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān) / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 4. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Marzūq. 5. Ṣiyānat al-ʻaqāʼid / by Manṣūr sibṭ Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭablāwī. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On folio 1a: "Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ li-Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah Shams al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Jābir al-Hawwārī al-Muzanī al-Andalusī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu. M."

On Folio 1a: A poem in 6 verses praising both authors Ibn Jābir and Thaʻlab: "Li-baʻḍihim. Aṭnabta fī al-talwīḥi wa-al-ṣarīḥi // wa-ṣuntahu yā nāẓima al-Faṣīḥi. Min ghalaṭin ka-dhāka min taṣḥīfi // ḥallaytahu bi-naẓmika al-ẓarīfi ... Wa-jud bi-ʻafwin minka li-Ibn Yaḥyā // fa-innahu min dhanbihi fī istiḥyā. al-Ṭayyibīyi al-mudhnibi al-faqīri // wa-al-aṣghari al-dhalīli wa-al-ḥaqīri."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Hādhā tamāmu Ḥilyati al-faṣīḥi // wāfiyatun bi-al-naẓmi lil-Faṣīḥi. Abyātuhā alfun wa-sittumiʼatin // tazīdu sabʻīna ilá arbaʻatin ... Akmaltuhu jamʻan fa-tamma naẓman // wa-dhāka sharqīya al-Furāti al-ʻUẓmá. Bi-thaghri Albīrata thaghri al-Shaʼāmi // dāma li-ʻizzi al-naṣri dhā ibtisāmi. Fī ʻāmi sabʻatin wa-arbaʻīna // min baʻdi sabʻatin mini al-miʼina. Awwal shahrin min shuhūri al-ʻāmi // fī yawmi al-Ithnayni min al-ayyāmi. Muntaṣafa al-shahri awāna al-ʻaṣri // musahhalan laysa bi-hi min ʻusri. Fa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá an sahhalā // itmāmahu kamā ḥamadnā awwalā ... Muḥammadin khayri Nabīyin fī al-umam // wa-man bi-hi Allāhu al-Nabīyīna khatam. Wa-ālihi thumma al-kirāmi al-ʻashrah // wa-sāʼiri al-ṣaḥbi al-hudāti al-bararah."

record.title: 880-03 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻImād ibn ʻAlī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Hāʼim.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-taʻlīmi // wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-taslīmi. ʻAlá al-Rasūli al-Muṣṭafá Muḥammadi // wa-ālihi wa-al-ṣuḥbi ṭūla al-abadi. Wa-hādhihi maqāṣidu al-iʻrābi // manẓūmatan min dūni mā ishābi. Fa-Allāha astaʻīnu fī al-takmīli // wa-artajī fī al-nafʻi wa-al-tashīli. Sharḥ al-jumlah wa-aqsāmuhā ..."
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. al-Urjūzah al-Marrākushīyah (Ḍiyāʼ al-arwāḥ al-muqtabas min al-Miṣbāḥ) / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 3. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān (Miʼat al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān) / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 4. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Marzūq. 5. Ṣiyānat al-ʻaqāʼid / by Manṣūr sibṭ Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭablāwī. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-qad taqaḍḍat Tuḥfatu al-ṭullābi // mūdaʻatan qawāʻida al-iʻrābi. Naẓmu al-faqīri Aḥmada ibni al-Hāʼimi // yarjū bi-hā thawāba Rabbin Rāḥimi. Lillāhi ḥāmidan ʻalá al-tamāmi // wa-murdifa al-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi. ʻAlá al-Rasūli al-Muṣṭafá al-Mukhtāri // wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-aṭhāri."

record.title: 880-02 al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad al-Marrākushī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Ḍarīr.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Yaqūlu rājī Rabbihi dhī al-raḥmah // Muḥammadu al-Marākishīyu al-Akmah. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi dhī al-iḥsāni // muʻallimi al-Qurʼāni wa-al-bayāni ... Wa-baʻdu fa-al-naẓaru fī al-bayāni // tudrá bi-hi muʻjizatu al-Qurʼāni. Fa-li-naqtabis nūran min al-Miṣbāḥi // wa-ghayrihi yunīru lil-arwāḥi. Fī rajazin aw min alladhī ẓahar // min qablu ʻannā fī al-bayāni wa-ishtahar. Wa-Allāhu kāfī man tawakkala ʻalayhi // Fa-ḥasbiya Allāhu wa-tafwīḍī ilayhi ..."
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
With: 10 other titles.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān (Miʼat al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān) / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 4. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Marzūq. 5. Ṣiyānat al-ʻaqāʼid / by Manṣūr sibṭ Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭablāwī. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with the section: "Alfāẓ multaqaṭah min ghayr al-Miṣbāḥ", as follows: "... Wa-rakkabū al-jumala bi-istiqlāli // wa-hādhihi nihāyatu al-maqāli. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh kamā yarḍāhu // wa-ṣalawātuhu li-Muṣṭafāhu."

record.title: 880-03 Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Ibn al-Shiḥnah al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-ṣallá Allāhu // ʻalá Rasūlihi alladhī iṣṭafāhu. Muḥammadin wa-ālihi wa-sallamā // wa-baʻdu qad aḥbabtu an anẓumā. Fī ʻilmay al-bayāni wa-al-maʻānī // urjūzatan laṭīfat al-maʻānī. Abyātuhā ʻan miʼatin lam tazid // fa-qultu ghayra āminin min ḥasad. Faṣāḥatu al-mufradi fī salāmatih // min nafratin fīhi wa-min gharābatih ..."
Also known as: al-Urjūzah al-bayānīyah (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 177).
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Marzūq. 5. Ṣiyānat al-ʻaqāʼid / by Manṣūr sibṭ Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭablāwī. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with the section on "al-Sariqāt al-shiʻrīyah" (Plagiarism) as follows: "... Barāʻat istihlālin intiqālu // ḥusnu ikhtitām wa-intahá al-maqālu. Tammat bi-ḥamdi Allāh wa-ʻawnihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Maghribī al-Tilimsānī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻamā // bi-hi min al-faḍli al-muthīri al-ḥikamā. Thumma ṣalātuhu ʻalá al-nūri al-mubīn // Muḥammadi al-hādī ilá al-ḥaqqi al-mubīn. Wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallamā // wa-baʻdu fa-al-manṭiqu lil-ʻaqli ḥimā. Mumayyizun khaṭaʼahu min al-ṣawāb // fa-niʻma ālatin tajūlu kulla bāb ... Fa-khudhhu min Kanzi al-amānī wa-al-amal // fī naẓmi Manṭiqi al-Khūnajīyi fī al-ʻamal ..."
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 345; for his commentary on al-Jumal see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 838.
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Ṣiyānat al-ʻaqāʼid / by Manṣūr sibṭ Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭablāwī. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Rafʻun bilā ʻaksin wa-māniʻu al-khulūwi // bi-ʻaksi manʻi al-jamʻi fa-ighnami al-dunūwi. Qadi intahá wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá // mā khaṣṣa aw ʻamma min al-fiʻli ʻulā. Thumma ṣalātuhu ʻalá al-Hādī al-Imām // Muḥammadin wa-ṣaḥbihi maʻa al-salām. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid : manuscript / Sibṭ al-Nāṣir al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Yaqūlu Sibṭu al-Nāṣir al-Ṭablāwī // Manṣūru al-rājī al-ḥanāna al-thāwī. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi waḥīdi al-dhāti // al-fardi fī al-afʻāli wa-al-ṣifāti. Wa-ashrafu al-ṣlāti wa-al-salāmi // ʻalá shafīʻi al-ḥashri fī al-anāmi ... Wa-baʻdu fa-al-ʻilmu bi-aṣli al-dīni // ʻaẓīmu faḍlin kāmilin mubīni. Li-annahu farḍun rafīʻu al-sharafi // min khayri kutubihi kitāb al-Nasafī ... Wa-baʻḍu mā yaḥtājuhu qad zidtuhu // wa-mā yurá ʻanhu ghinan ḥadhaftuhu. Lākin maʻa al-takmīli lil-maqāṣidi // sammaytuhu Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼidi. Fī miʼatin wa-naḥwihā nuẓim // ʻasá yakūnu bi-al-duʻāʼi qad khutim. Wa-asʼalu Allāha ʻalá al-dawāmi // nafʻan maʻa al-kamāli fī al-kalāmi ..."
Script: Modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsmīnīyah / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi al-Karīmi al-Wāḥidi // dahran ʻalá Ṣiyānati al-ʻAqāʼidi. Fa-hiya ʻarūsun anʻamat bi-al-waṣli // li-man tajallá bi-kamāl al-aṣli. Jalwatuhā tamām shahri al-Ḥijjati // khitām tisʻīna wa-tisʻimiʼati [24 January 1583]. Wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-mabdaʼi al-khitām. Wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ulī al-karam // mā Allāhu bi-al-ḥusná li-ʻabdin qad khatam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1137 (A.D. 1725).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥṣá kull shayʼ ʻadadan, wa-jaʻala al-amwāl liman aʻṭá wa-ittaqá wa-ṣaddaqa bi-al-ḥusná saʻādatan sarmadā, wa-ʻalá man bakhula wa-istaghná wa-kadhdhaba bi-al-ḥusná kuʻūb shuʼmin tūqiʻu fī al-radā, aḥmaduhu wa-ashkuruhu an jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭā, li-nakūna ʻalá al-nās shuhadā ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī: Hādhā taʻlīqun ʻalá al-Urjūzah al-Yasamīnīyah fī ʻilm al-jabr wa-al-muqābalah mukhtaṣaran jiddan ... wa-laqqabtuhu bi-'al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah' ..."
This is the longer commentary; for the shorter see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 471, and Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 1050.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid / Manṣūr al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr. 7. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā qaṣadnāhu min hādhā al-taʻlīq, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Tamma naskhuhā bi-yad kātibihā Ibrāhīm ibn (?) al-Abṣalī (?) al-Shāfiʻī, fī 26 al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1137 [5 September 1725]. M."

record.title: 880-02 Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Bahnasī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Yā Karīm. Yā mūlaʻan bi-al-ghaḍabi wa-al-hajri wa-al-tajannubi // ḥubbuka qad barraḥa bī fī jiddihi wa-al-laʻibi. Inna dumūʻiya ghamrun wa-laysa ʻindiya ghimrun // fa-anta mithlu al-ghumri aqṣir ʻan al-taʻab. Tafsīr. al-Ghamr bi-al-fatḥ huwa al-māʼ al-kathīr, wa-bi-al-kasr al-ḥiqd, wa-bi-al-ḍamm al-shābb al-jāhil ..."
Copied about 1725.
For a longer commentary on this, see Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 246.
Incipit same as in Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin), 7074.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid / Manṣūr al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr. 7. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah / by Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 8. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Safara ʻan ʻayni ṭalā // wa-rīquhu yaḥkī al-ṭilā. Wa-ṭulyatun mina al-ṭulā // ghaydāʼ lam taḥtajb. al-Ṭalā bi-al-fatḥ ʻayn al-ghazāl, wa-bi-al-kasr al-khamrah, wa-bi-al-ḍamm al-jāriyah al-ṭawīlat al-ʻunq. Wa-ḥsbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab : manuscript / al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhihi Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab mimmā ʻuniya bi-jamʻihi al-Shaykh al-ajall Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī, raḥimahu Allāh. al-Ḥabb bi-al-fatḥ maʻrūf, wa-bi-al-kasr al-maḥbūb, wa-bi-al-ḍamm al-maḥabbah wa-al-zīr (?) ayḍan. al-Qaṭr bi-al-fatḥ al-maṭar, wa-bi-al-kasr al-nuḥās, wa-bi-al-ḍamm al-nāḥiyah wa-al-jānib. al-Karā bi-al-fatḥ al-nawm, wa-bi-al-kasr ujrat al-shayʼ, wa-bi-al-ḍamm al-kurah ..."
Copied about 1725.
Authorship uncertain.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid / Manṣūr al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr. 7. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah / by Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 8. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 9. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭabarī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon. No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... al-Raqq bi-al-fatḥ al-jild alladhī yuktabu fīhi, wa-bi-al-kasr al-milk, wa-bi-al-ḍamm huwa walad al-nūq, wa-al-khalf al-radī min al-qawl, yuqālu sakat alf wa-naṭaqa khalf, ay, sakata ʻan alf kalimah thumma takallama bi-khaṭaʼ. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama dāʼiman. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ : manuscript / lil-ʻĀlim ... Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Ṭabarī al-ḥākim bi-Makkah.
record.note: Copied about 1725.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Muqtadiri // Muḥammadu ibnu Aḥmada al-Ṭabarī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh muʻizzi al-adabi // wa-mūdiʻi al-faḍla lisān al-ʻArabi. Muʼahhili al-insāna lil-bayāni // li-naẓmihi jawāhira al-maʻānī ... Wa-baʻdu, fa-hādhihi al-Kifāyah // fī al-lughati al-mashhūratu al-riwāyah. Naẓamtuhā li-wāḥid al-zamān // wa-dhī al-maqāmi al-aḥadi al-sulṭānī. Aʻnī bi-dhāka wāritha al-Tabābiʻah // lāʼima shamli al-makrumāti jāmiʻah. al-Malika al-Muẓaffara al-humāmā // al-kāmila al-muhadhdhaba al-Imāmā ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid / Manṣūr al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr. 7. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah / by Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 8. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 9. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 10. Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād / by Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Ruʻaynī.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly wiht the section on the synonyms for "al-Khamr" (Wine), as follows: "... Wa-iṣrif ilá al-khamri hunā al-kalāmā // wa-sammihā al-raḥīqa wa-al-mudāmā. Ayḍan wa-min asmāʼihā al-sulāfu // wa-al-rāḥu wa-al-qahwatu yā wuṣṣāfu. Kadhālika al-shamūlu wa-al-khurṭūmu // kadhālika al-isfinṭu yā fahīmu ... Ammā nabīdhu ʻasalin fa-al-bitʻu // wa-min shaʻīri jiʻatin lā yuṣnaʻu. Wa-in yakun min ḥinṭatin fa-mizru // sukrukatun min dharatin yā ḥabru. Ammā al-ṭilāʼu ṭabakhathu al-nāru // wa-ḥāmiḍu al-khamr huwa al-muṣṭāru. Muzzāʼu ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād : manuscript / Abū Jaʻfar Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf ibn Mālik al-Ruʻaynī al-Andalusī al-Gharnāṭī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of 'Kitāb Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Rabbunā ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla Shaykhunā al-adīb al-ruḥalah al-Muḥaddith al-Shihāb Abū Jaʻfar Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf ibn Mālik al-Ruʻaynī al-Andalusī al-Gharnāṭī al-Mālikī, raḥimahu Allāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa al-ʻArab bi-al-faṣāḥah, wa-jaʻalanā min baʻdihim fursān tilka al-sāḥah, fa-lahum al-faḍl al-sābiq wa-lanā al-sharaf al-lāḥiq ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna jamāl al-insān faṣāḥat al-lisān, wa-al-tafrīq bayna al-ḥurūf al-mushtabihāt dākhilun fī hādhā al-shaʼn, lāsīmā al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād ..."

Incipit of the poem of Ibn Jābir 'Fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ḥamdu al-Ilāhi ajallu mā yutakallamu // badʼan bi-hi fa-lahu al-thanāʼu al-adwamu. Wa-ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-Hāshimīyi wa-ālihi // azká ṣalātin ʻarfuhā mutanassamu. Wa-ʻalá ṣaḥābatihi maṣābīḥu al-hudá // mā aʻqaba al-iṣbāḥ laylun muẓlimu. Wa-aqūlu baʻda dhālika annahu // lil-ẓāʼi bi-al-ḍādi iltibāsun yuʻlamu. Fa-raʼytu ḥaṣra al-ẓāʼi ākada wājibin // li-yabīna anna al-ghayra ḍādun tursamu ..."

Incipit of 'Qaṣīdah fī muthallath al-kalām': The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "Wa-hādhihi Qaṣīdah fī muthallath al-kalām yanquṣu awwaluhā qalīlan. Fanāʼun halāku wa-al-nabāt bi-qaṣrihi // tharāʼun ghinan wa-al-turbu bi-al-qaṣri fī al-dhikri. Wa-mudda ḥayāʼ al-wajhi lā al-ghaytha wa-uqṣurū // ḥalā li-inkishāfi al-shaʻri lā al-baʻdi wa-al-hajri ..."
Script: Modern (18th century) small naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose leaves, in brown leather cover, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Bound with: 10 other titles: 1.Ḥilyat al-faṣīḥ fī naẓm al-Faṣīḥ / by Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jābir. 2. Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb fī naẓm qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim. 3. al-Marrākushīyah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-al-badīʻ / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḍarīr. 4. Manẓūmah fī al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shiḥnah. 5. Naẓm Jumal al-Khūnajī fī al-manṭiq (Kanz al-amānī wa-al-amal fī naẓm manṭiq al-Khūnajī fī al-Jumal) / by Muḥammad ibn Marzūq al-Ḥafīd. 6. Ṣiyānat al-ʻAqāʼid / Manṣūr al-Ṭablāwī Manṣūr. 7. al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah / by Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad sibṭ al-Māridīnī. 8. Naẓm Muthallathāt Quṭrub / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Ḥasan al-Bahnasī. 9. Jumlah min al-kalimāt al-muthallathah fī lughat al-ʻArab / by Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī. 10. ʻUmdat al-mutalaffiẓ fī naẓm Kifāyat al-mutaḥaffiẓ / by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭabarī.

Colophon of 'Kitāb Rafʻ al-ḥijāb ʻan tanbīh al-kuttāb fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād': No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Yuqālu inna al-ḍād lā tūjadu fī lafẓin fīhi shīn, wa-istathná min dhālika shayʼayn, aḥaduhumā mā fīhi rāʼ baʻda al-shīn, wa-ilayhi ashāra bi-qawlihi siwá mā fīhi rāʼ baʻda shīn, wa-al-ukhrá taʼtī fī awwal al-bayt al-thānī, wa-jumlat mā fīhi al-rāʼ baʻda al-shīn thalāthat alfāẓ, al-awwal al-sharẓ limā ghaluẓa min al-arḍ, wa-al-thānī al-sharfaẓ wa-huwa al-jamal al-ḍakhm, mithl ḥirwāẓ, wa-al-jamʻ sharāwīẓ, wa-al-thālith al-sharẓarāẓ, wa-qad talakhkhaṣa laka min hādhā al-ḍābiṭ, kull lafẓ fīhi shīn yuktabu bi-al-ḍād, illā hādhihi al-thalāthah, wa-al-lafẓ al-madhkūr fī awwal al-bayt alladhī yaʼtī 'Shamaẓatka Hindun bi-al-hawá // wa-al-ḍādu baʻda al-lāmi layst tudhkaru."

Colophon of 'Qaṣīdah fī muthallath al-kalām': No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Fa-yā man huwa al-mujību li-man daʻā // wa-yā sāmiʻa al-shakwá wa-yā kāshifa al-ḍurri. Wa-nawwir bi-nūri al-ʻilmi qalbiya wa-ihdinī // li-khayrin wa-lā tashṭuṭ lisānī ilá al-hajri. Wa-ṣallī ʻalá Khayri al-Anāmi wa-ṣaḥbihi // ṣalātan tunīlu al-fawza fī mawqifi al-ḥashri. Tammat."

Colophon of the poem of Ibn Jābir 'Fī al-farq bayna al-ẓāʼ wa-al-ḍād': No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-al-ḍādu maʻ ʻaynin wa-nūnin lāzimun // min qablihā aw baʻdihā lā tuʻlamu. Wa-al-ẓāʼu ḥaythu al-lāmu fāʼun ʻindahum // wa-al-fāʼu wāwun ḥukmuhā mustalzamu. Illā al-wḍīfu li-kulli mawqūfin kadhā // awẓaftu rāḥilatī li-man yatafahhamu. Wa-uḥkum bi-nafyi al-ḍādi in taku ʻaynuhu // rāʼun wa-lāmu al-lafẓi fāʼun tursamu. Wa-istathni minhu al-ḍarfa lil-shajari allatī // lil-tīni fa-huwa bi-ḍādihi yastalzimu. Wa-istathni yaḍma al-zarʻi yaʻnī annahu // abdá imtilāʼan fa-huwa zarʻun yaʻẓumu. Wa-al-ẓāʼu mayyizhā bi-lāmin ukhkhirat // ʻanhā wa-ḥāʼun qablahā tataqaddamu. Wa-istathni aḥḍālan wa-man yalʻab bihā // yaḥḍal ... ʻāj (?) yaḥkumu." "ʻIddatuhā miʼat bayt wa-bayt."

record.title: 880-02 al-Futūḥāt al-Ilāhīyah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muḍīyah fī ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah : manuscript / Abū al-ʻIzz ibn ʻAlī ibn Khalīl al-Bustānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1043 (A.D. 1634).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa maqām al-ʻulamāʼ wa-jaʻalahum lil-nās sādāt, wa-khafaḍa maqām al-jahalah wa-jaʻalahum fī aḥaṭṭ al-darajāt, fa-tarāhum muḥaqqarīn ṣighāran fī majālis al-ʻulamāʼ ʻinda al-mukhāṭabāt, wa-law malaka aḥaduhum kunūz al-arḍ wa-nāla bi-yadihi abwāb al-samāwāt, kasāhum al-jahl thawb ihānah wa-tawwajahum bi-tījān al-madhallāt ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Abū al-ʻIzz ibn ʻAlī ibn Khalīl al-Bustānī al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Alternate title: Muẓhir al-mudassas fī alfāẓ al-Mukhammas.
The work was composed in 1620.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-'al-Futūḥāt al-Ilāhīyah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muḍīyah fī ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah', wa-summiya ayḍan bi-'Muẓhir al-mudassas fī lafẓ al-Mukhammas, lil-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Abū al-ʻIzz, al-baṣīr bi-qalbihi, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi, al-Shāfiʻī al-shahīr bi-al-Qūṣūnī, ʻāmalhu Allāh bi-al-ʻafw wa-al-ghufrān, wa-ḥaffahu bi-al-luṭf wa-al-iḥsān. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation on every fifth leaf.

Author's Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min imlāʼihi fī yawm al-sādis min Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat ʻishrīn baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [9 February 1612], wa-asʼalu Allāh al-Karīm al-Mannān an yaghfira li-muʼallifihi wa-wālidayhi, wa-mashāyikhihi, wa-kātibihi, wa-qāriʼihi, wa-sāmiʻihi, wa-al-nāẓir fīhi, wa-al-sāʻī fī takhlīṣihi, wa-li-man raʼá fīhi ʻayban wa-aṣlaḥahu, wa-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Nabīyihi al-mukarram, wa-ḥabībihi al-muʻaẓẓam, Sayyid walad Ādam, man jaʻalahu Allāh lil-rusul wa-al-anbiyāʼ khātiman, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn, ʻalá mamarr al-ayyām wa-al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām, daʻwāhum fīhā subḥānaka Allāhumma, wa-taḥīyatuhum fīhā salām, wa-ākhir daʻwāhum an al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min raqm hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, rābiʻ ʻishrīn Shaʻbān al-mubārak, sanat thalāthah wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf [23 February 1634], ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Qūṣūnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-i[n] tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Man ghāba ʻanhu al-muṭrib : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī Manṣūr ʻAbd al-Malik ibn [Muḥammad ibn] Ismāʻīl al-Thaʻālibī.
record.note: Lacunae between leaves 2 and 3, 4 and 5; missing text supplied on slips of paper.
Copied in A.H. 950 (A.D. 1543).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī abdaʻa fī ṣunʻihi idh ṣanaʻa, wa-abdaʻa fīmā abdaʻa wa-ikhtaraʻa, khalaqa al-samāʼ min ghayr ʻamadin tarawnahā, wa-al-falaka ʻalá ʻamūd al-qudrah al-Rabbānīyah rafaʻa, khalaq al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-bayān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt bi-al-maʻrifah lil-ʻulūm wa-tabyīn al-mushkilāt min al-mazmūr wa-al-maʻlūm ..."
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: In decorative paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); dark brown leather on spine. Paper label with call number on front cover.
Decoration: Rubrication in black, red, and green ink, on variously colored paper.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Nabīyihi wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-kafá, wa-sallama ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Katabahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn al-Adīb al-Ḥalabī, ḥāmidan wa-muṣallīyan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Bi-tārīkh niṣf shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 950 [28 July 1543]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu."

On folio 48b: A dated birth statement: "Wulida al-najl al-mubārak Ibrāhīm rābiʻ ʻashar shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 951 [15 June 1544] aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā, wa-anshaʼahu nushūʼan ṣāliḥan."

record.title: 880-02 ʻUqūd al-jumān fī manāqib al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī [sic] ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf al-Dimashqī al-Ṣāliḥī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1056 (A.D. 1646).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻulamāʼ warathat al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ikhtāra minhum al-aʼimmah al-mujtahidīn fī furūʻ al-sharīʻah al-awliyāʼ, fa-man aḥabbahum kullahum fa-qad fāza wa-dakhala fī zumrat al-atqiyāʼ, wa-man intaqaṣa aḥadan minhum fa-qad ẓalama nafsahu, wa-huwa min al-aghbiyāʼ ... wa-sammaytu hādhā al-kitāb 'ʻUqūd al-jumān fī manāqib al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān' ..."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb ʻUqūd al-jumān fī manāqib al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf al-Dimashqī al-Ṣāliḥī al-Shāfiʻī nazīl al-Barqūqīyah bi-ṣaḥrāʼ al-Qāhirah, khārij Bāb al-Naṣr, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih. Āmīn."
On the lower edge: Partial title "ʻUqūd al-jumān fī manāqib al-Nuʻmān lil-Shāmī."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in black and red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated on every fifth leaf.

Author's colophon (folio 256b): "Qāla muʼallifuhu ... Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf al-Dimashqī al-Ṣāliḥī al-Shāfiʻī al-Qādirī nazīl al-Barqūqīyah bi-ṣaḥrāʼ al-Qāhirah, khārij Bāb al-Naṣr ... Faraghtu min taʼlīfihi fī awākhir shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat tisʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [8 December 1532], aḥsana Allāh taʻālá ʻāqibatahā ilá khayr wa-salāmah. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhihi al-nuskhah qabla ṣalāt al-Jumʻah, tāsiʻ ʻishray Jumādá al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat sitt wa-khamsīn baʻda tamām al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [13 July 1646], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-salām, ʻalá yad Sharaf al-Dīn ibn Shaykh al-Islām Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, wa-yassara la-hu taḥṣīl al-kurrāsayn al-awwalayn min hādhā al-kitāb, fa-innahu mā wuffiqa ʻalayhimā wa-lā raʼāhumā, innamā kataba min awwal al-kurrās al-thālith ilá ākhir al-kitāb (On the right margin: Wa-qad faʻala dhālika, fassarahumā la-hu, wa-katabahumā bi-khaṭṭihi, wa-bihimā intahat al-kitāb), bi-jāh Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Farāʼid wa-al-qalāʼid : manuscript / taʼlīf Abī [ʻAlī] al-Ḥasan [ibn] ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ... al-maʻrūf bi-al-Ahwāzī.
record.note: The colophon date, A.H. 623 (A.D. 1226), is forged, but the manuscript was copied in the 13th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻAlī al-Kabīr, al-Qawī al-Qadīr, al-ʻAlīm al-Khabīr, al-Samīʻ al-Baṣīr, munshiʼ kull shayʼ wa-mubdīhi, wa-mubdī kull ḥayy wa-muʻīdih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna aḥaqq mā naṭaqa bi-hi al-lisān, wa-aʻraba ʻanhu al-bayān, wa-inṭawá ʻalayhi kitāb, wa-intahá ilayhi khiṭāb, mā zāda fī suddat al-baṣīrah, wa-ʻāda bi-ṣiḥḥat al-sarīrah, wa-ṭaraqa ṭarāʼiq al-ʻadl, wa-bayyana ḥaqāʼiq al-faḍl, wa-ṣāra tadhkiratan lil-akhyār, wa-mazjaratan lil-ashrār ..."

On folio 1a: Statements attributing the book to two other authors, as follows: 1. "al-Qalāʼid wa-al-farāʼid. Kitāb al-Farāʼid wa-al-qalāʼid, taʼlīf Abī Manṣūr ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Ismāʻīl al-Thaʻālibī al-Nīsābūrī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi raḥmatan wāsiʻah. Min Kutubkhānah-ʼi Ḥamīdīyah fī Asitānah." 2. "Taʼlīf Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaghānī al-maʻrūf bi-al-Ahwāzī, wazīr Malik al-Ṣaghānīyāt, katabahu li-khizānat al-Amīr al-kabīr al-mujāhid ʻImād al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās al-Hakkārī. Kadhā fī Madrasat Alālahlī."
Alternate title: al-Qalāʼid wa-al-farāʼid.
Ascribed also to ʻAbd al-Malik al-Thaʻālibī.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī. Leaves 1-10 supplied by a modern hand.
Binding: In red leather-covered cardboard with green paper front and back cover, Type III (without flap).
Decoration: Rubrication in black, red, green, and purple.
Foliation on every fifth leaf.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb, wa-billāh al-tawfīq wa-al-taḥqīq. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-fātiḥ jamīʻ al-maghāliq, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn, ʻadad waraq al-ashjār, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan ālihi al-jiyād, wa-aṣḥābihi al-qādah al-ghurr al-amjād, fa-niʻma al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-āl, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-dhālika fī ghurrat Ramaḍān, nahār al-Jumʻah, fī maḥrūsat Dimashq, sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn wa-sitttimiʼah [4 September 1226]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu."
On the lower left corner of folio 37a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Qalāʼid wa-al-farāʼid li-Abī Manṣūr al-Thaʻālibī wa-nuskhatuhu fī Kutubkhāh-ʼi Ḥamīdīyah."
On folio 37b: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose, in different hands.

record.title: 880-02 Radʻ al-muwaswisīn wa-ikhbāruhum bi-annahum fī ṭāʻat al-Laʻīn : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Ibn Qudāmah al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā bi-niʻmatihi, wa-sharrafanā bi-Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-bi-risālatihi, wa-waffaqanā lil-iqtidāʼ bi-hi wa-al-tamassuk bi-sunnatihi, wa-manna ʻalaynā bi-ittibāʻihi alladhī jaʻalahu ʻalaman ʻalá maḥabbatihi wa-maghfiratihi, wa-sababan li-kitābat raḥmatihi wa-ḥuṣūl hidāyatihi ..."
Incipit same as in Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) 2518.
With: 1 other title: Nūr al-iqtibās, waṣīyat al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallama li-Ibn ʻAbbās / by ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn Rajab.
Script: Fairly modern (18th century) naskhī in black and red.
Binding: Paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); red leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil on every fifth leaf.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Nūr al-iqtibās : waṣīyat al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam li-Ibn ʻAbbās : manuscript / lil-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Rajab al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1119 (A.D. 1707).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, ḥamdan kathīran ṭayyiban mubārakan fīhi, kamā yuḥibbu wa-yarḍá, wa-kamā yanbaghī li-karam wajhihi wa-ʻizz jalālihi, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Kharraja al-Imām Aḥmad min Ḥadīth Ḥanash al-Ṣanʻānī ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, qāl: Kuntu radīf al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fa-qāla Yā ghulām, aw Yā ghulayyim, alā uʻlimuka kalimātin yanfaʻuka Allāh bihinna, fa-qultu balá ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); red leather on spine.
With: 1 other title: Radʻ al-muwaswisīn wa-ikhbāruhum bi-annahum fī ṭāʻat al-Laʻīn / by Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad Ibn Qudāmah.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliation in modern pencil on every fifth leaf.
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose.

Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma hādhā al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-nammaqahu li-nafsihi, bi-yadihi al-fāniyah, al-faqīr al-fānī, Rajab ibn Muḥammad al-ʻImrānī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-muḥibbīhi, wa-ikhwānihi, wa-aʻāda ʻalayhi wa-ʻalyhim min barakat Ṣāḥib al-Ḥadīth, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn, wa-barakat muʼallif hādhā al-kitāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, sādis shahr Shawwāl, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-tisʻat ʻashar min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [31 December 1707], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍala al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 Thabt al-asānīd wa-al-ijāzāt : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1227 (A.D. 1812).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal al-ākhir al-nāfiʻ, al-muqaddim al-muʼakhkhir al-jāmiʻ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr Abū Muḥammad Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khaṭīr: Hādhihi jumalun min asānīd asātīdh al-anām mashāyikh al-Islām alladhīna ijtamaʻnā bihim wa-ludhnā bi-janāḥihim, laʻalla Allāh yukrimunā lahum wa-yunīlanā manālahum, innahu jawwādun karīm, raʼūfun raḥīm. Fa-min ajillāʼihim ... Shaykhunā al-Imām Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ṣaʻīdī al-ʻAdwī al-Mālikī ..."
For Muḥammad al-Dasūqī see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 737 (Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Tamma sanat 1200 [1785/1786]. Tamma naqluhu 7 Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1227 [19 May 1812], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr Ḥasan Abī al-Surūr."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Mujtabá fī maʻrifat asmāʼ man dhakarahum al-Bukhārī bi-al-ansāb aw al-alqāb aw al-kuná : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Kafarī al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimashqī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām al-atammān al-akmalān ʻalá Sayyid al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-khayr al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-āl kullin, wa-sāʼir al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan al-Ṣaḥābah ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻan al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsānin ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi waraqāt adhkuru fīhā, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, asmāʼ man dhakarahum al-Imām Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī fī Jāmiʻihi al-Ṣaḥīḥ bi-al-kunyah min al-rijāl wa-al-nisāʼ ..."
For the author see Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) 1200; Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 159.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Mujtabā fī maʻrifat asmāʼ man dhakarahum al-Bukhārī bi-al-ansāb aw al-alqāb aw al-kuná, lil-Fāḍil Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Kafarī al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimashqī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-al-Kafarī nisbah li-Kafr Sūs, qaryah min qurá al-Shām, wa-laʻalla aṣluhu kāna minhā. Wa-al-kitāb bi-khaṭṭ muʼallifihi, raḥimahu Allāh."
On folio 1a: "al-Kafr Sūsī. Kafr Sūsah qaryah fī Ghūṭat Dimashq, bi-al-buʻd ʻan Dimashq sāʻah wāḥidah."
At the head of folio 1b: "Asmāʼ man dhakarahum al-Bukhārī fī Jāmiʻihi al-Ṣaḥīḥ min al-rijāl wa-al-nisāʼ."
Script: Hurried naskhī, in red and black.
At the head of folio 44b: "Mūsá al-Kafrī, nisbah ilá qaryah min qurá Dimashq al-Shām, tusammá Kafr Sūs, fa-laʻallahu kāna minhā, raḥimahu Allāh."
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated using Arabic numbers in black ink.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā tayassara jamʻuhu wa-al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalayhi, wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam. Anhāhu jamʻan wa-kitābatan, hādhihi al-marrah al-sādisah, wa-ʻalayhā istaqarra al-ḥāl, al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Kafrī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu, bi-Dimashq al-maḥrūsah, ʻammarahā Allāh wa-sāʼir bilād al-Muslimīn, wa-dhālika fī ṣabīḥat yawm al-Aḥad, thānī shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat arbaʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-thamānimiʼah [9 September 1421]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh taʻālá wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadī lawlā an hadānā Allāh."

record.title: Khams rasāʾil / min kalām al-shaykh Abī al-ʻAlāʾ Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Sulaymān al-Tanūkhī. -- [12--?].
record.note: Calligraphic 13th century naskhī, fully vocalized.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Tahdhīb al-nukat : manuscript / Athīr al-Dīn al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar al-Abharī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 692 (A.D. 1293).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Tahdhīb al-nukat: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh al-munʻim bi-hidāyatihi, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Khayr Khalqih, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ʻitratih, fa-innā nūridu fī hādhā al-kitāb jumal (?) kāfiyah min al-ʻulūm al-naẓarīyah, wa-nuthbitu (?) fīhi mā ʻaraḍ min al-jadalīyīn min al-zalal, wa-nuḍīfu ilayhi al-ṭarāʼiq (?) allatī istakhrajnāhā bi-afkārinā al-mutawāliyah, wa-nusammīhi 'Tahdhīb al-nukat', wa-nurattibuhu ʻalá thalāthat aqsām ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 464; S I, p. 839.

Kâtip Çelebi. Kashf al-ẓunūn ʻan asāmī al-kutub wa-al-funūn, makes the work a Muhadhdhab of al-nukat fī ʻilm al-jadal of Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-Shirāzī (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 387; S I, p. 669); but the introduction to this manuscript, as far as preserved, makes no mention of him.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Foliation in black ink using Arabic numbers.
On folio 1a: "Tahdhīb al-nukat fī ʻilm al-jadal wa-al-khilāf. Wa-yalīhi sharḥān ʻalá al-Fuṣūl al-Nasafīyah fī ʻilm al-jadal wa-al-khilāf lil-Nasafī."
With: 2 other titles. 1. Sharḥān mukhtalifān lil-Fuṣūl al-Nasafīyah. 2. Risālah fī ibṭāl al-dawr wa-al-tasalsul.
Decoration: Rubricated.

ʻIddat min al-mughālaṭāt li-Mawlānā Najm al-Dīn al-Kātibī, starts as follows: "Hādhihi ʻIddat min al-mughālaṭāt li-Mawlānā Najm al-Dīn al-Kātibī. al-Ūlá fī bayān al-dhukūrah wājibah fī māl al-ṣabī. Wa-taqrīruhu an naqūl: Kullamā wajabat al-dhukūrah fī māl al-bāligh wa-fī māl al-ṣabī wa-jabat fī māl al-bāligh." And ends with: "... Fa-inqasamat al-ṣināʻah al-kullīyah thamāniyat ajzāʼ, wa-ṣārat al-qiyāsāt bi-ḥasb al-mawādd khamsat aṣnāf, wa-ḥaṣalat min kull ṣinf ṣināʻah, wa-hiya khams ṣināʻāt juzʼīyah. Wa-al-ṣināʻah al-burhānīyah tanqasimu ilá mā tuʻrafu bi-hi al-mufradāt, wa-huwa al-juzʼ ilá mā tuʻrafu bi-hi al-murakkabāt wa-huwa nisab al-burhān."

Colophon of Tahdhīb al-nukat: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir kalāminā fī hādhā al-kitāb, fa-inna al-qadr alladhī awradnāhu kāfin lil-dhakī fī inshāʼ al-nukat fī ayy masʼalah min al-masāʼil al-khilāfīyah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Waqaʻa al-farāgh minhu ʻalá yaday al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ʻafwa al-Ṣamad Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Faḍlī, yawm al-Jumʻah, salkh shahr Allāh al-mubārak Jumādá al-Ūlá, li-sanat ithná wa-tisʻīn wa-sittimiʼah [15 May 1293]."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥān mukhtalifān lil-Fuṣūl al-Nasafīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of the first commentary: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwān illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Matn. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-lāzim ʻalá al-munāẓir taḥrīr al-mabāḥth wa-taqdīm al-ishārah ilayhā ka-taḥqīq li-masāʼilihā al-awāʼil, wa-taqrīr al-aqwāl qabla al-dalāʼil, wa-dhālika bi-ṭarīq al-ḥikāyah, fa-lā dakhla ʻalayhā. Sharḥuhu: Ay baʻda mā dhakarnā, wa-huwa al-ḥamd lillāh taʻālá wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi, fa-al-lāzim ʻalá al-munāẓir taḥrīr al-mabāḥth ..."

Incipit of the second commentary (folio 137b): "al-Mutimmah al-Nuʻmānīyah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Burhānīyah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmadu Allāh ʻalá mā khaṣṣanā bi-karāmat kashf al-ḥaqāʼiq, wa-mayyazanā bi-saʻādat idrāk al-daqāʼiq, wa-aḥyā ḍamāʼiranā bi-rashaḥāt al-fikar, wa-zakká khawāṭiranā bi-wāridāt al-taʼmmul wa-al-naẓar, wa-jaʻala al-ikhtilāf bayna al-ʻulamāʼ raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah kitābun ʻadīm al-naẓīr fī fann al-naẓar, mafqūd al-mathīl fīmā taqaddam min al-zamān wa-mā taʼakhkhar, ṣaghīrun bi-ḥasbi al-ṣūrah wa-al-ḥajm, kabīrun min ḥaythu al-maʻná ka-al-najm ..."

Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) 5167 is a commentary by al-Nuʻmān al-Khuwārizmī on al-Fuṣūl, different from Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 467.
A different commentary in Arabic MSS 11 (leaf 10), with same quotations, although again titled Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah.
Script: Fair 13th century hands, the first in red and black, the second in black only.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Foliation in black ink using Arabic numbers.
With: 2 other titles: 1. Tahdhīb al-nukat / by Athīr al-Dīn al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar al-Abharī. 2. Risālah fī ibṭāl al-dawr wa-al-tasalsul.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon of the first commentary. No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... fa-ʻadam mā huwa al-wāqiʻ fī al-wāqiʻ ʻalá mā dhakarnā min al-taqdīr yakūnu muntafiyan ayḍan li-intifāʼ lāzimihi fa-yataḥaqqaq wuqūʻ mā huwa al-wāqiʻ fī al-wāqiʻ, wa-huwa ʻadam wujūb al-kaffārah bi-al-akl wa-al-shurb ʻalá al-mutafarrid ʻalá mā dhakarnā min al-taqdīr, wa-huwa taqdīr wujūb al-kaffārah ʻalá al-mutafarrid bi-al-difāʻ, wa-huwa al-maṭlūb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Colophon of the second commentary "al-Mutimmah al-Nuʻmānīyah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Burhānīyah". No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... fa-yalzamu al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalá dhālika al-taqdīr wa-annahu muḥāl, fa-ʻulima bi-anna mā huwa al-thābit fī al-wāqiʻ idhā lam yakun thābitan ʻalá al-taqdīr yalzm ijtimāʻ al-naqīḍayn, immā fī al-wāqiʻ aw ʻalá dhālika al-taqdīr, wa-al-lāzim muntafin li-istiḥālatihi, fa-yanbaghī al-malzūm kadhālika, wa-huwa al-maṭlūb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah fī ibṭāl al-dawr wa-al-tasalsul : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 702 (A.D. 1303).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-billāh al-ʻawn wa-al-ʻiṣmah wa-al-tawfīq. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan yakhuṣṣuhu min al-asrār wa-lā tuḥīṭu bi-hi al-afkār, wa-ashkuruhu shukran, niʻamuhu min al-anwār, wa-lā tudrikuhu al-abṣār, wa-asʼaluhu an yuṣalliya ʻalá Muḥammad sayyid al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi sādat al-kibār. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna fī al-mabāḥth al-kalāmīyah dāʼir wa-al-tasalsul ʻalá ʻaqibayhi dāʼir, fa-yuḥtāju ilayhimā lil-khāʼiḍ fī al-kalām taḥqīqan lil-marām ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Foliation in black ink using Arabic numbers.
On folio 188a: "Risālah fī ibṭāl al-dawr wa-al-tasalsul".
With: 2 other titles: 1. Tahdhīb al-nukat / by Athīr al-Dīn al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar al-Abharī. 2. Sharḥān mukhtalifān lil-Fuṣūl al-Nasafīyah.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tammat al-Risālah fī ibṭāl al-dawr wa-al-tasalsul fī shahr Allāh al-Aṣamm [Rajab], li-sanat ithnay wa-sabʻimiʼah al-Hilālīyah [February/March 1303], [erasure], ḥarrarahā Masʻūd ibn Maḥmūd ibn Masʻūd, al-muʻarraf bi-Saʻd Faqīh Masʻūd al-Samarqandī."

record.title: 880-02 Thabt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1175 (A.D. 1762).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr al-wāthiq bi-Rabbihi al-Qawī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī: Ḥamdan li-man ajāza al-anām fī majāzāt al-iḥsān, wa-aqarra aʻyunahum bi-masānīd al-faḍl wa-al-imtinān ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī al-Shaykh al-fāḍil, ḥāwī al-kamālāt wa-al-fawāḍil, al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻUbādah al-Barrī al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī an ujīzahu, fa-ajaztuhu bi-mā ajāzanī bi-hi al-Shaykh al-Imām Sayyidī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Hashtūkī wa-al-ʻAllāmah al-muḥaqqiq wa-al-fahhāmah al-ruḥalah al-mudaqqiq Sayyidī ʻAbd Allāh al-Kunkusī ..."
On folio 1a: A tripple plea to Kubaykij (Kabīkaj): "Iḥbis Yā Kubaykij. Iḥbis Yā Kubaykij. Iḥbis Yā Kubaykij."
For the author see Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 822.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Foliated in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title: Thabt / by Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī.

Colophon: "Tammat fī yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, tamām naqlī lahā, li-khams layālin baqīna min Shaʻbān, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1175 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [21 March 1762], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad kātibihā li-nafsihi, asīr dhanbihi, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻUbādah al-Barrī al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī."

record.title: 880-02 Thabt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1176 (A.D. 1763).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara fī samāʼ al-saʻādah budūr al-falāḥ, wa-jaʻala anwārahā muqtabasah min shams al-nubūwah, fa-tamma lahā fī abrāj al-qurb mazīd al-najāḥ, fa-min thamma ḥāfaẓū ʻalá al-asānīd fī al-ʻulūm, lāsīyamā al-Aḥādīth al-ṣiḥāḥ, wa-limā qīla annahā min al-dīn, wa-annahā lil-ʻālimīn silāḥ ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 323; S II, p. 445; Hitti, P. Descriptive catalog of the Garrett Collection, 881.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Foliated in modern pencil.
With: 1 other title: Thabt / by Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā yawm al-khams min Shaʻbān, sanat 1176 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [19 February 1763], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-salām. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Wadīk fī al-dīk : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Preceded by 1 leaf of miscellaneous poems.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad allaf al-Ḥāfiẓ Abū Nuʻaym al-Iṣfahānī juzʼah fī faḍl al-dīk, wa-hādhā juzʼun fīhi al-ifādah, mā fī dhālika al-juzʼ wa-ziyādah, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-maqṣad wa-khātimah. al-Muqaddimah. al-Dīk bi-al-kasr, wa-jamʻuhu duyūk wa-adyāk wa-diyakah ka-qiradah, wa-kunyatuhu Abū Ḥassān, wa-Abū Ḥammād, wa-Abū Sulaymān, wa-Abū ʻUqbah ..."
The colophon does not look like A.H. 1149, but the date occurs on leaf 36 recto clearly, and the coincidence of the weekday confirms it. 18th Muḥarram 1149 (May 29, 1736) did fall on Tuesday.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Wadīk fī al-dīk lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, maʻa mā bi-hi min al-rasāʼil la-hu ayḍan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, awwalan wa-ākhiran, dunyā wa-ukhrá. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Index of the ten other titles in the codex, as follows: "Wa-yalīhi al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd, lil-Suyūṭī. Wa-yalīhi Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl, la-hu ayḍan. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl, la-hu. Wa-yalīhi Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ, la-hu. Wa-yalīhi Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl, la-hu. Wa-yalīhi Nuzhat al-nadīm, la-hu ayḍan. Wa-yalīhi al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab, lil-marḥūm Yūsuf al-Wakīl. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid, la-hu ayḍan. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā, la-hu. Wa-yalīhi al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh, lil-Ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī, wa-huwa ākhiruhā."

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Text framed in red; headings and markings in red.
Colophon: "Ākhir al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh minhu fī yawm al-Thulāth, thāmin ʻashar al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, iftitāḥ sanat 1149 (?) [Tuesday, 29 May 1736]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Wa-hādhā ayḍan Kitāb al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwt al-asānīd, lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Saʼalanī sāʼilun: Hal rawá al-Imām Abū Ḥanīfah ʻan al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá shayʼan, fa-qultu la-hu naʻam, fī ḥifẓī annahu rawá ʻanhu Ḥadīthayn, wa-waʻdtuhu an ukhrijahumā la-hu, fa-katabtu hādhā al-juzʼ fī dhālika, wa-naḥwahu mimmā waqaʻa min al-Aḥādīth fī isnādihi, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd' ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilayhi al-kitāb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yā ʻAẓīm al-minnah Hab li-kātibihi al-Jannah."

record.title: 880-02 Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Qāla, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Rabbanā ātinā min ladunika raḥmatan, wa-hayyiʼ lanā min amrinā rashadan. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Imām Aḥmad ibn Ḥanbal fī Kitāb al-Zuhd la-hu ... Qāla Ṭāwūs inna al-mawtá yuftanūn fī qubūrihim sabʻan ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Colophon: "Hādhā ākhir al-mansūkh min aṣlihi al-mawjūd. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Rasūl Allāh. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī ʻinda muṭālaʻatī li-Tadhkirat al-Imām Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn Khalīl ibn Aybak al-Ṣafadī raʼaytuhu awrada fīhā ʻiddat maqāṭīʻ min naẓmihi fī waṣf al-hilāl, fa-jarradtuhā fī hādhā al-juzʼ, wa-ḍamamtu ilayhā ʻiddat maqāṭīʻ li-ghayrihi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Rashf al-zulāl fī waṣf al-hilāl', thumma balaghanī anna al-Ṣalāḥ al-Ṣafadī nafsahu allafa fī dhālika kitāban ḍakhman wa-sammāh bi-hādhā al-ism, fa-ʻadaltu ʻan tilka al-tasmiyah, wa-sammaytu taʼlīfī hādhā 'Raṣf al-laʼāl' ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
With: 10 other titles.

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Tammat wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Rawá al-Ḥāfiẓ Abū Muḥammad al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Khallāl fī kitābihi al-Thuqalāʼ ʻan Abī Hurayrah annahu kāna idhā istathqala al-rajul qāla Allāhumma ighfir lanā wa-la-hu wa-ariḥnā minhu ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1149 (A.D. 1736).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-hiya fī aḥad wa-ʻishrīn ʻāliman, tazawwaja kull wāḥid minhum imaraʼah, wa-waṣafa kullun minhum laylatahu mūriyan bi-alfāẓ fannih. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Ḥaká Abū al-Durr Nafīs ʻan Abī Idrīs, qāla kharajnā yawma ʻīd ilá masjid baʻīd, wa-naḥnu shībah mutaqāribūn, wa-ʻuṣbah fī al-sinn mutajādhabūn ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Nuzhat al-nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir al-maqāmah, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-wāfaqa [al-farāgh] min kitābat hādhā al-majmūʻ al-mubārak, fī yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, 15 shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1149, alf wa-miʼah tisʻah wa-arbaʻūn, min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [25 June 1736], ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm, wa-ʻalá al-anbiyāʼ jamīʻan al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-nadīm : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhihi Nuzhat al-nadīm lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad raʼaytu fī tarjamat al-Fāḍil Abī al-Faḍl Aḥmad ibn Abī Ṭāhir Ṭayfūr al-Marūrūdhī annahu ṣannafa kitāban fī al-iʻtidhār ʻan ḍarṭat Wahb, wa-hiya mashhūrah, wa-lam aqif ʻalayhi, illā annī raʼaytu risālah fī dhālika mansūbah ilá Wahbin nafsihi, wa-hiya ḥasanah laṭīfah, fa-aradtu ualakhkhiṣuhā hunā wa-aḍummu ilayhā laṭāʼif min namaṭihā. Qāla Wahb ibn Sulaymān ibn Wahb kātib Amīr al-Muʼminīn wa-ʻāmil Dīwān al-Barīd, ṣāḥib al-ḍarṭah fī Majlis al-Wazīr ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Yaḥyá ibn Khāqān ..."

Incipit of the additions "Nawādir al-ḍurāṭ" of Ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī: "Qāla al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Yūsuf ibn al-Wakīl, ʻafá ʻanhu al-Jalīl: Qad ʻathartu min nawādir al-ḍurāṭ ʻalá mā yūjadu fī al-asfāṭ faḍlan ʻan al-asqāṭ, fa-aḥbabtu an aḍummahā ilá hādhā al-kitāb ḥattá yastaghniya bi-hi mālikuhu ʻan murājaʻat kutub al-ādāb, fa-aqūlu: Qāla al-Tanūkhī fī kitābihi Nushwān al-muḥāḍarah ..."
For Yūsuf ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 414.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon of Nuzhat al-Nadīm: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-fī al-Tadhkirah al-Ḥamdūnīyah: Kāna al-Mutawakkil ʻalá birkat ṣad yaṣīdu al-samak, wa-ʻindahu ʻUbādah al-Mukhannath, fa-taḥarraka al-Mutawakkil fa-ḍaraṭa, fa-qāla li-ʻUbādah uktumhā ʻalayya, fa-innaka in dhakartahā ḍarabtu ʻunuqaka, wa-dakhala al-Fatḥ fa-qāla Mā ṣidtum, fa-qāla ʻUbādah mā ṣidnā shayʼan, wa-alladhī kāna hunā ayḍan infalata."
Colophon of the additions "Nawādir al-ḍurāṭ" of Ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā zādahu al-marḥūm Yūsuf al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab, jamʻ al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Yūsuf Afandī al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī, raḥimahu Allāh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-qanāʻah min ajzal al-mawāhib. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-makhṣūṣ bi-afḍal al-manāqib, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, akram man qāda al-najāʼib ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī man yajibu ʻalayya ijābat suʼālihi wa-taballugh maqāṣidihi wa-āmalih, an ajmaʻa la-hu min nawādir Ashʻab al-mashhūrah wa-ḥikāyātihi allatī aḍḥat fī al-kutub masṭūrah ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 414.
For Ashʻab see Ibn Khallikān, tr. de Slane, IV, 217, note 3.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. Nuzhat al-Nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 8. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Qāla jāmiʻuhu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Jalīl Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī, ʻafā ʻanhu al-Qawī: Hādhā mā yassarahu Allāh taʻālá min Nawādir Ashʻab, allatī hiya fī al-nawādir ka-al-ṭirāz al-mudhahhab, wa-lam alu juhdan fī jamʻihi wa-al-tanqīb ʻalayhi fī maẓānnihi li-ʻizzat wujūd al-adab wa-iqfār rabʻihi, ḥattá kaʼannahu lam yakun shayʼan madhkūran, wa-kāna amr Allāh qadaran maqdūran. Tammat al-risālah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Wa-hādhā Kitāb Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid, jamʻ al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Qadīr Yūsuf al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-raḥimahu. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻda ḥamdi Allāh alladhī sharrafa nawʻ al-insān ʻalá sāʼir al-ḥayawān, wa-khaṣṣa baʻḍahu bi-ḥusn al-sīrah, wa-baʻḍahu bi-ḥusn al-ṣūrah, wa-baʻḍahu bi-faṣāḥat al-lisān ... fa-innaka amartanī ... an ajmaʻa laka min akhbār Muzabbid ... wa-min nawādirihi ... wa-mujūnihi ... fa-qābaltu amraka bi-al-imtithāl ... wa-lammā tamma jamʻ hādhā al-kitāb ... sammaytuhu Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 414.
For Muzabbid see al-Kutubī, M. Fawāt al-wafayāt, II, 303.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. Nuzhat al-Nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 8. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min nawādir Muzabbid, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah."

record.title: 880-02 Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Wa-hādhā al-kitāb yusammá 'Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā' jamʻ al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Yūsuf al-Wakīl al-Mīlawī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh dhī al-mawāhib, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man ṭabbaqat daʻwatuhu al-mashāriq wa-al-maghārib ... Fa-hādhā kitābun sammaytuhu 'Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā', jamaʻtu fīhi mā waqaftu ʻalayhi min akhbārihi fī kutub al-muʼallifīn alladhīna iʻtanaw bi-akhbār al-mughaffalīn li-yakūna maslātan lil-ḥazīn, fa-aqūlu wa-billāh astaʻīn ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
