With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. Nuzhat al-Nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 8. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh / by al-Suyūṭī.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Ilá hunā tamma mā intakhabtuhu min akhbār Juḥā mimmā waqaʻa ʻalayhi ikhtiyārī wa-irtaḍāhu naqdī min al-kutub al-mawjūdah ʻindī. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied about 1736.

Incipit: "Wa-hādhihi risālah tusammá 'al-Fāshūsh fī ḥukm Qarāqūsh' lil-Ḥāfiẓ Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad suʼiltu fī darsī bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Ṭūlūnī fī awākhir al-Muḥarram, sanat tisʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [19 November 1493] ʻan al-Amīr Bahāʼ al-Dīn Qarāqūsh, wa-hal la-hu aṣlun fī al-tārīkh am lā, wa-hal mā yuʻzá ilayhi min al-ḥikāyāt al-muḍḥikah la-hā aṣl am lā, fa-jamaʻtu hādhihi al-awrāq fī tilka al-laylah wa-ḥarrartuhā fī sāʻah qalīlah, wa-kadhā aṣl wujūdihi ..."
Attributed in some sources to Ibn Mammātī (Asʻad ibn al-Muhadhdhab, 1149-1209); probably a different work.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).

With: 10 other titles by al-Suyūtī and others, as follows: 1. al-Wadīk fī al-dīk / by al-Suyūṭī. 2. al-Fānīd fī ḥalāwat al-asānīd / by al-Suyūṭī. 3. Bard al-ẓilāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 4. Raṣf al-laʼāl fī waṣf al-hilāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 5. Itḥāf al-nubalāʼ bi-akhbār al-thuqalāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī. 6. Rashf al-zulāl fī al-siḥr al-ḥalāl / by al-Suyūṭī. 7. Nuzhat al-Nadīm / by al-Suyūṭī. 8. al-Ṭirāz al-mudhahhab fī nawādir Ashʻab / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 9. Itḥāf al-mutawaddid bi-nawādir Muzabbid / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl). 10. Irshād man naḥā ilá nawādir Juḥā / by al-Mīlāwī (Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Wakīl).
Decoration: Rubricated.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Durar al-manẓūmah min al-nukat al-mafhūmah : manuscript / li-Shaykhinā ... Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥijāzī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥijāzī al-Shāfiʻī, abqāhu Allāh fī khayr wa-ʻāfiyah. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manaḥa ahl al-maqāmāt rafīʻ al-darajāt, wa-khaṣṣa dhawī al-balāghāt bi-afṣaḥ al-lughāt ... wa-wasamtuhu bi-al-Durar al-manẓūmah min al-nukat al-mafhūmah ..."
Script: Good modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); gilded frame embossed on cover and flap. Abbreviated title written on the bottom edge "al-Durar al-manẓūmah".
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣāwī baladan wa-al-Mālikī madhhaban, sāʼilan min Allāh al-ʻAẓīm an yastura taʼaththumahu wa-yaḥuṭṭa awzārahu bi-ḥurmat man ḥajja al-Bayt aw zārahu, wa-an yuḥaqqiqa fī kamāl faḍlihi amalahu, wa-an yakhtuma fī al-dārayn bi-khayrin ʻamalahu, wa-an yafʻala dhālika bi-wālidaynā wa-ashyākhinā wa-ikhwāninā wa-aḥibbā[ʼinā] wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Minḥah fī al-sabḥah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1183 (A.D. 1769).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ṭāla al-suʼāl ʻan al-sabḥah, hal lahā aṣl fī al-Sunnah, fa-jamaʻtu fīhā hādhā al-juzʼ tatabbuʻan fīhi mā warada fīhā min al-Aḥādīth wa-al-āthār, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the edges and the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 3 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. Sihām al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah. 2. al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf. 3. Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-sāʻah.

On title page a dated death statement: "Tuwuffiya Shaykh al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá, Shaykh Muḥammad [erasure], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, yawm al-Thulāth, thāmin ʻashar Jumād al-Akhīr, sanat 177 [1177 Hijrīyah = 14 December 1763], wa-tuwuffiya ghāsiluhu alladhī tamakkana min ghaslihi bi-ijāzat al-fuqarāʼ, Shaykh Muḥammad Abū Nāzil bi-Ziftá, baynahu wa-bayna al-Shaykh thamāniyat ayyām, raḥimahum Allāh taʻālá."
On title page: Miscellaneous poems.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Sanat 183 [1183 Hijrīyah = 1769/1770]. al-Faqīr ʻĀmir al-Nuwayhī."

record.title: 880-02 Sihām al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1183 (A.D. 1769).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

The text starts with the following categories of prayers that are answered (folios 4b-5a), as follows: "Kitāb Sahm al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah, taʼlīf al-Ḥāfiẓ al-mujtahid, al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi, fī bayān mā taḍammanahu hādhā al-kitāb min al-tarājim lil-daʻawāt al-mujābah, wa-hiya hādhihi al-manẓūmah, al-musāfir, al-wālid ʻalá al-walad, al-imām al-ʻādil, al-akh bi-ẓahr al-ghayb, al-walad lil-wālidayn, al-dhākirīn lillāh kathīran, al-ḥājj, al-ghāzī, al-marīḍ, al-muḥrim, al-mubtalī, mukthir al-duʻāʼ fī al-rakhāʼ al-muʻadd, al-mufraj ʻanhu, al-shaykh al-madad (?), al-muḥsan ilayhi lil-muḥsin, ḥāmil al-Qurʼān, al-thābit ʻinda al-gharīmah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Incipit (folio 5a): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā yakhību murājīhi wa-lā yaridu ʻalayhi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, al-firqah al-zākiyah. Hādhā juzʼun fī al-adʻiyah al-mujābah, immā li-waṣf fī al-dāʻī yustabānu, aw faḍlin fī al-waqt wa-al-makān, aw sharafin fī al-duʻāʼ, wa-waradat bi-hi al-Aḥādīth al-ḥisān, sammaytuhu 'Sihām al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah' ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the edges and the spine of the cover and the flap.
With: 3 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. al-Minḥah fī al-sabḥah. 2. al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf. 3. Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-sāʻah.
Decoration: Rubricated.

The colophon date [1]173 must be an error, since the first few leaves form part of the same quire with the preceding work, which is dated 1183. The next work is also dated 1183. Also, the date of the day (6 Jumādá al-Thānī) does not correspond to "Tuesday".

Colophon (folio 12b): "Tammat hādhihi al-daʻawāt al-mustajābāt bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-awrāq fī yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, sādis shahr Jumādá al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 173 [1173, i.e., 1183 of the Hijrah = 7 October 1769]. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bimā fī al-ḍamāʼir. Tamm. ʻĀmir al-Nuwayhī." Included in the last words of the colophon a death statement of a certain "ʻAbd al-Karīm": "Wa-māta ʻAbd al-Karīm yawm tārīkhihi."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1183 (A.D. 1769).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf lil-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah al-Ḥāfiẓ al-mujtahid al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu, wa-nafaʻa bi-hi al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad kathura al-suʼāl ʻan al-Ḥadīth al-mushtahir ʻalá alsinat al-nās anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lā yamkuthu fī qabrihi alf sanah, wa-anā ajabtu bi-annahu bāṭilun lā aṣla la-hu ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the edges and the spine of the cover and the flap.
With: 3 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. al-Minḥah fī al-sabḥah. 2. Sihām al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah. 3. Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-sāʻah.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah, min shahr Jumād al-Ākhir, min shuhūr sanat 183 [1183 of the Hijrah = 6 October 1769], ʻalá yad ʻĀmir al-Nuwayhī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhā wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-Sāʻah : manuscript / al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1183 (A.D. 1769).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
C. Landberg attributed the authorship to al-Suyūṭī.

Incipit of 'Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-Sāʻah': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ al-abwāb wa-musabbib al-asbāb li-man āmana bi-hi wa-tāb. Wa-baʻd, hādhihi 'Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-Sāʻah', mithl khurūj al-Dajjāl wa-al-Dābbah, wa-Ṭulūʻ al-Shams min maghribihā, ayyuhā aqdam, wa-kam tamkuthu wāqifatan thumma taʻūdu ilá maghribihā, wa-kayfa kayfīyat al-ṭulūʻ ..."

Incipit of 'Ḥikāyāt al-Awliyāʼ': "Ḥikāyah. Qāla al-Shaykh fī al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah: Kāna al-Shaykh Abū ʻImrān Mūsá al-Sidrānī min al-abdāl, wa-ẓaharat ʻanhu asrār gharībah ʻajībah, wa-ḥālāt ʻajībah, wa-kāna sabab ijitimāʻī bi-hi annī qaʻdtu baʻda Ṣalāt al-Maghrib bi-Ishbīliyah fī ḥayāt al-Shaykh Abī Madyan, wa-tamannaytu annī law ijtamaʻtu bi-hi, wa-al-Shaykh fī Bijāyah, masīrat khams wa-arbaʻīn yawman, fa-lammā ṣallaytu al-Maghrib dakhala ʻalayya Abū ʻImrān wa-sallam, fa-ajlastuhu ilá jānibī wa-qultu la-hu min ayna jiʼta, qāla min ʻind al-Shaykh Abī Madyan min Bijāyah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the edges and the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 3 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. al-Minḥah fī al-sabḥah. 2. Sihām al-iṣābah fī al-daʻawāt al-mujābah. 3. al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf.

Colophon of 'Masʼalah fī al-āyāt allatī taẓharu qabla al-Sāʻah': "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tamma hādhā al-kitāb yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, yawm al-ḥādī ʻashar [probably ʻishrīn] min shahr Jumādá al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 183 [1183 of the Hijrah = 22 October 1769]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Katabahu ʻĀmir al-Nuwayhī baladan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban."

Colophon of 'Ḥikāyāt al-Awliyāʼ': "Tamma al-kitābu wa-takāmalat // niʻamu al-surūri li-ṣāḥibih. Wa-ʻafá al-Ilāhu bi-jūdihi // wa-bi-faḍlihi ʻan kātibih. Wa-ḥukiya ʻan baʻḍ al-awliyāʼ annahu waqafa ʻalá raʼs biʼr, wa-qad ʻaṭisha, wa-lam yakun la-hu ḥabl wa-lā rakwah, fa-qāla la-in lam tasqinī la-aghḍaban. Fa-fāḍa al-māʼ ʻalá wajh al-biʼr fa-shariba. Nuktah. al-Ghawth huwa markaz al-aqṭāb, wa-huwa min alladhīna waṣafahum Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī Ḥadīthihi 'Law aqsama ʻalá Allāh la-abarruhu'. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻUqūd al-jawharīyah bi-al-juyūd al-mashrafīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Bishbīshī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1101 (A.D. 1689).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir Yā Karīm. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ilá Rabbihi al-Ghanī, Aḥmad al-Bishbīshī, ʻafá Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻallama bi-al-qalam ʻallama al-insān mā lam yaʻlam, wa-jaʻalahu samīʻan baṣīran ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innahu qad warada ʻalayya suʼālāt anīqah wa-ishārāt daqīqah min Ḥaḍrat al-Wazīr al-muʻaẓẓam wa-al-Mushīr al-mufakhkham ... Mawlānā al-Wazīr ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Bāshā ... wa-sammaytuhā 'al-ʻUqūd al-jawharīyah bi-al-juyūd al-mashrafīyah' ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with geometric design.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Foliated in modern pencil on every fifth leaf.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā taʻlīqahu ʻalá hādhihi al-asʼilah, wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-bāṭinan wa-ẓāhiran, ḥamdan kathīran ṭayyiban mubārakan fīhi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá khayr khalqihi, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihā yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, thāmin shahr Ṣafar, sanat miʼah wa-wāḥid [1101 of the Hijrah = 21 November 1689], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Khalīl al-Ḥanafī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-man kutiba la-hu, wa-li-man tasabbaba fī taḥṣīlihā, wa-li-wālidīhim, wa-li-mashāyikhihim, wa-muḥibbīhim, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. In tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // tabqá ʻinda al-nāsi fī ʻayni al-malā. Lā tuʻāyir man bi-hi ʻaybun wa-qul // jalla man lā ʻayba fīhi wa-ʻalā."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 987 (A.D. 1579).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutaṣarrif qabla ʻilal al-taṣrīf, al-mutaʻarrif qabla ālat al-taʻrīf, alladhī allafa al-ashyāʼ aḥsana taʼlīf, wa-ḥammala al-insān amānat al-taklīf, wa-sharrafa al-ʻilm wa-ahlahu akmal al-tashrīf ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 554.
Script: Good Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap).
Decoration: Rubricated.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā wafq thulāthī", a magic square (3x3), harmonizing numbers with the Arabic alphabet, used for astrology, divination, fortune-telling, etc.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min zabrihi yawm al-Sabt, sādis shahr Rajab al-aṣabb, sanat 987 [8 September 1579] min Hijrat Muḥammad Nabīyinā, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá yad mālikihi, al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jannābī (?), ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻan wālidayhi, wa-ʻan mashāyikhihi fī al-dīn, wa-ʻan jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Nāḍij Ibn Qalāqis : manuscript / lil-adīb ... Ibn Nubātah al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1289 (A.D. 1873).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh musaddid sihām al-fikr li-aghrāḍihā, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ghuyūth al-madḥ wa-riyāḍihā, fa-innī ṭālaʻtu shiʻr al-adīb al-bāriʻ Abī al-Fatḥ Naṣr Allāh ibn Qalāqis, raḥimahu Allāh, fa-ṭālaʻtu al-fann al-gharīb, wa-futiḥa ʻalayya bi-taʼmmul alfāẓihi, fa-talawtu 'Naṣrun min Allāh wa-fatḥun qarīb', bayda annī wajadtu la-hu ḥasanātin tubhir al-ʻuqūl faḍlā wa-sayyiʼātin yakādu bi-dhikrihā Ibn Qalāqis yuqlá ..."
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi jumlah muntakhabah musammāh bi-'Nāḍij Ibn Qalāqis' lil-adīb al-labīb al-arīb Ibn Nubātah al-Miṣrī, raḥimahumā Allāh. M."
Script: Good naskhī, in red, blue, and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-dīwān bi-ʻawn al-Mannān. Katabahu bi-yadihi al-fāniyah Aḥmad al-Ghamrāwī (?), li-akhīhi fī Allāh al-arīb al-fāḍil al-kāmil Ḥaḍrat [... ... ... ...], ʻafā Allāh ʻanhumā, wa-ghafara lahumā wa-li-wālidayhimā, wa-aṭāla ʻumrahumā, wa-aḥsana ʻamalahumā. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh minhu fī 14 min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1289 [12 February 1873]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nāhijīn nahj kamālihi. M."

record.title: 880-02 Naẓm Faṣīḥ Thaʻlab : manuscript / lil-Imām Ibn al-Muraḥḥal.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Nabīyinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad. Hādhā Naẓm Faṣīḥ Thaʻlab lil-Imām Ibn al-Muraḥḥal, raḥimahu Allāh. Ḥamdu al-Ilāhi wājibun li-dhātihi // wa-shukruhu ʻalá ʻulā hibātihi. Naḥmaduhu subḥānahu wa-nashkuruh // wa-min dhunūbin salafat nastaghfiruh ... Wa-baʻdu hādhā mā jará fī khāṭirī // min ghayri raʼyi nādibin aw āmiri. An anẓima al-Faṣīḥa fī sulūki // min rajazin muhadhdhabin masbūki. Wa-baʻḍa mā lā budda min tafsīrihi // wa-sharḥihu wa-al-qawli fī taqdīrihi ..."
For the author see al-Suyūṭī, Ḥusn al-maḥāḍarah, lithograph (1860?), I, 191.
Script: Good modern (ca. 1800) Maghribī hand, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound (loose leaves).
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-hāhunā tamma al-Faṣīḥu wa-kamal // wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá nayli al-amal. Naẓẓamahu mālikuhu al-faqīru // li-ʻafwi man li-amrihi yaṣīru. Fa-jāʼa fī urjūzatin khafīfah // li-man yarūmu ḥifẓahā ṭarīfah. Hadhdhaba fīhā qawlahu wa-waṭṭaʼah // li-ajli dhā laqqabahā al-Muwaṭṭaʼah. Fa-ismaḥ la-hu wa-idʻu la-hu bi-al-raḥmah // yā nāẓiran fīhā ruziqta al-ʻiṣmah."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall Hidāyat al-ḥikmah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Written in A.H. 819 (A.D. 1416).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbanā ātinā min ladunika raḥmatan wa-hayyiʼ lanā min amrinā rashadan, hidāyatuka Rabbanā fī al-riwāyah wa-al-dirāyah, wa-kifāyatuka fī al-bidāyah wa-al-nihāyah, Yā dhā al-ḥikmah al-bālighah wa-al-niʻmah al-sābighah, naḥmaduka ʻalá wujūb wujūdika, wa-nashkuruka ʻalá ʻumūm fayḍika wa-jūdika ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn al-Sharīf al-Ḥusaynī ... innī lammā ḥaṣṣaltu qirāʼat qismay al-ṭabīʻī wa-al-Ilāhī min Kitāb al-Hidāyah al-Athīrīyah, wa-talaqqaftu ʻalayhi min fawāʼid ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 210 (son of al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī).

Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S I, p. 840 lists a commentary by Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Ḥusaynī, "Urenkel al-Jurjānī's," presumably not the same (manuscript dated 821/1476).
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Ḥall Hidāyat al-ḥikmah li-Ibn al-Sayyid, quddisa sirruhumā."
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in Arabic and Persian, in poetry and prose.
Script: Small cursive naskhī.
Binding: In modern cardboard cover.

Author's colophon: "... Wa-anā aqūlu man arāda al-irtiqāʼ ilá dhurwat al-taḥqīq fī al-ʻilm wa-al-sharaf fa-ʻalayhi bi-taṣānīf Ḥaḍrat al-Ustādh, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz. Laqad tamma taḥrīr al-qawāʻid wa-taqrīr al-fawāʼid min kitāb al-Hidāyah al-Athīrīyah fī awākhir Rajab al-murjib sanat tisʻ ʻashrah wa-thamānimiʼah [2 October 1416], ʻāma harajin wa-maraj. Wa-anā al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī, aṣlaḥ Allāh bālahu."

Under the author's colophon: "Tammat al-risālah al-musammá bi-Ḥall al-Hidāyah bi-hidāyat al-Hādī, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muhtadīn bi-hidāyatih. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Min Kitāb al-Durr al-manẓūm : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Uqlīshī.
record.note: al-Dasūqī's autograph, copied ca. 1800.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jalla ʻan al-sharīk wa-al-mathīl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-kāmil al-nabīl ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥikāyāt laṭīfah, wa-nawādir nafīsah sharīfah, iṣṭafaytuhā min al-muʼallafāt ʻinda al-muṭālaʻah, li-takūna lī tasliyatan ladá al-mudhākarah wa-al-murājaʻah ... Fa-min Kitāb al-Durr al-manẓūm lil-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Iqlīlasī fī al-Ḥikam, wa-qad jaʻalahu ʻasharat fuṣūl, fa-min al-faṣl al-awwal fī al-kalimah al-wāḥidah, ʻan Abī Hurayrah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 2 other titles: 1. al-Qawl al-mubīn fī al-radd ʻan al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī. 2. Natāʼij al-fikr fī ādāb al-dhikr / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi ʻalá yad afqar al-nās wa-aḥwajihim ilá Khāliq al-Anfās, Muḥammad al-Dasūqī ʻArafah, aʻlá Allāh fī al-dārayn ghurafah."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Qawl al-mubīn fī al-radd ʻan al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn : manuscript / Taʼlīf ... ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ... Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī la-hu mā fī al-samāwāt wa-mā fī al-arḍ, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd fī al-ākhirah, wa-Huwa al-ḥakīm al-khabīr ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah laṭīfah ḍammantuhā jumlah min nuṣūṣ al-Shaykh al-kāmil al-rāsikh murabbī al-ʻārifīn al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn al-ʻArabī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, al-mufṣiḥah bi-barāʼatihi min al-qawl bi-qidam al-ʻālam wa-bi-al-ḥulūl aw al-ittiḥād ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations.
With: 2 other titles: 1. al-Durr al-munẓūm fī mā yuzīlu al-ghumūm wa-al-humūm / by Aḥmad ibn Maʻadd ibn al-Uqlīshī. 2. Natāʼij al-fikr fī ādāb al-dhikr / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadiya lawlā an hadānā Allāh. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi, wa-al-ṣaḥb ajmaʻīn."

record.title: 880-02 Natāʼij al-fikr fī ādāb al-dhikr : manuscript / lil-Imām al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
record.note: Copied by Muḥammad al-Dasūqī, ca. 1800.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-tawakkul, wa-ilayhi al-maṣīr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-dhākirīn al-madhkūrīn bi-khayr, kafānā Allāh wa-īyāhum kull ḍarar wa-ḍayr ʻan qadr al-madd fī kalimat al-tawḥīd. Fa-ḥāṣiluhu anna al-madd fī kalimat Lā, wa-hiya adāt al-nafī allatī baʻda hamzat Ilāh, lā yajūzu fī al-afṣaḥ naqṣuhu ʻan thalāth ḥarakāt wa-tajūzu al-ziyādah fīhi ilá sitt ḥarakāt, wa-mā bayna hādhayn al-ḥaddayn amrun wāsiʻ ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 738.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 2 other titles: 1. al-Durr al-munẓūm fī mā yuzīlu al-ghumūm wa-al-humūm / by Aḥmad ibn Maʻadd ibn al-Uqlīshī. 2. al-Qawl al-mubīn fī al-radd ʻan al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn / by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī

Colophon: "Kutibat wa-khutimat ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá khāliq al-anfās Muḥammad al-Dasūqī ʻArafah, aʻlá Allāh fī al-Dārayn ghurafah. Āmīn. Bi-jāh al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá wa-ālihi ahl al-wafā. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḥāwī fī al-fiqh : al-juzʼ al-thānī [wa-]al-khāmis [wa-]al-ʻāshir [wa-]al-thānī wa-al-ʻishrūn [wa-]al-thālith wa-al-ʻishrūn [wa-]al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrūn [wa-]al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrūn : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb al-Baṣrī al-Māwardī.
record.note: Volumes II and X copied in A.H. 620 (A.D. 1223); volumes XXII, XXVII and XXIX copied about the same year; volumes V and XXIII copied somewhat later. Other volumes wanting.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb ṣifat al-māʼ alladhī yanjasu wa-al-māʼ alladhī lā yanjasu. Qāla al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu akhbaranā al-Walīd ibn Kathīr al-Makhzūmī ʻan Muḥammad ibn ʻAbbād ibn Jaʻfar ʻan ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar ʻan abīhi anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāla idhā kāna al-māʼ qullatayn lam yaḥmil najasan aw qāla khabathan, wa-hādhā ṣaḥīḥ, wa-lil-najāsah idhā waqaʻat fī al-māʼ ḥālāt ..."
Script: Cursive, largely unpointed naskhī, except for volumes V and XXIII which are in two younger and more regular hands.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); covers embossed with central medallion; covers much damaged.
Colophon: "Najaza ... fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir [- Dhī al-Qaʻdah] min sanat ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah [May-December 1223] ... [Katabahu al-Ḥaḍramī] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Manāqib al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-Qāyātī wa-manāqib mashāyikhih : manuscript / lil-Shaykh Khalīfah al-Ṣafatī khaṭīb al-Masjid al-Ḥusaynī bi-al-Qāhirah al-Muʻizzīyah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1277 (A.D. 1861).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, al-humām al-kāmil, wa-al-niḥrīr al-fāḍil, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Khalīfah al-Ṣafatī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh wa-abqāh, wa-ballaghahu mā yatamannāh. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥa ṣudūr aḥbābihi bi-anwār al-maʻārif, wa-saqāhum min ṣāfī maḥabbatihi bi-kuʼūs al-laṭāʼif ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jumalun tashtamil ʻalá baʻḍ aḥwāl al-Imām ... Ustādhinā al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ... fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 976.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); red leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhā, ḥafiẓahu Allāh, wa-qad kāna ibtidāʼuhā wa-al-farāgh minhā fī 17 sabʻat ʻashar yawman khalat min Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1259, tisʻah wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [7 December 1843]. Wa-qad tammat kitābatuhā ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAlī Muḥammad al-Khuḍayrī al-Asyūṭī, baʻda ṣalāt la-Jumʻah, min al-yawm al-muwāfiq li-tisʻ baqīna min Rajab, sanat 1277 [1 February 1861]. M."

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ Rubb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Maqqarīyah : manuscript / jamʻ ... Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Sandūbī ibn ʻAlī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1112 (A.D. 1700).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa min māʼ al-ḥayāh insānan, wa-jaʻalahu li-ʻayn hādhā al-zamān insānan ... Wa-baʻd ... intadaba ... al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Maqqarī thumma al-Maghribī ilá naẓm al-qaṣīdah allatī iftataḥa bi-hā tārīkhahu wa-kitābahu ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-qaṣīdah al-Maqqarīyah ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); brown leather on spine.
Known also as: Rubb al-barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Maqqarīyah (cf. Landberg MSS 71).
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Najaza al-sharḥ al-mubārak fī yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, thāni ʻasharay shahr Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-ithnatay ʻashrah [4 December 1700], ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-rājī min Allāh taʻālá al-amn mimmā yakhāfu, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Khallāf, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-wālidayhi, wa-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-ikhwānihi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Ṣadḥ al-ḥamām fī madḥ Khayr al-Anām : manuscript / li-Shaykhinā ... al-Shamsī Muḥammad al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Ṣāliḥī al-Dimashqī.
record.note: Copied some time after A.H. [10]11 (A.D. 1602 or 1603).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man naẓama jawāhir ḥikmatih fī aslāk al-kāʼināt, wa-raqama bi-aqlām qudratih dalāʼil tawḥīdih ʻalá ṣafaḥāt al-mumkināt, yā man aʻrabat ʻan al-thanāʼ ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ʻawārifihi alsun al-khuṭabāʼ wa-al-shuʻarāʼ, fa-kallat al-alsun wa-bi-al-ʻajz iʻtarafat ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard; Type III (without flap); dark brown leather on spine and the edges.
On folio 1a: "Ṣadḥ al-ḥamām fī madḥ Khayr al-Anām, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-salām."
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi dībājat dīwān al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Shaykhinā al-Shamsī Muḥammad ibn al-Ṣāliḥī al-Dimashqī."
On folio 1a: A quotation from al-Ṣāghānī and al-Faḍīl ibn ʻIyāḍ.

At the head of folio 4a: "Li-Shaykhinā al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah ... al-Shamsī Muḥammad al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Ṣāliḥī al-Dimashqī, yamdaḥuhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayh wa-sallam, min 'baḥr al-silsilah', wa-min khaṭṭihi naqaltuhā, wa-kadhā jamīʻ mā la-hu hunā, kull dhālika min khaṭṭihi, wa-dhālika bi-Miṣr al-maḥrūsah, fī sanat sabʻ baʻda al-alf [1007 = 1598/1599]. al-Faqīr Zayn al-Dīn."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Yaqūlu kātib al-ḥurūf al-faqīr Zayn al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥalabī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Shuʻayfī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu: Hādhihi al-nuskhah naqaltuhā min khaṭṭ al-nāẓim bi-Miṣr al-maḥmīyah, wa-hiya aṣaḥḥ nusakh al-dīwān, li-annahā ākhir nuskhah istaqarra ḥāl al-nāẓim ʻalayhā, wa-dhālika li-annī lammā ʻudtu min Makkah al-Musharrafah sanat iḥdá ʻashrah [1011 = 1602/1603] ʻazamtu ʻalá al-iqāmah bi-Dimashq al-Shām, thumma ʻaraḍa lī tawajjuh ilá waṭanī Ḥalab al-Shahbāʼ ... Katabahu Zayn al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥalabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Qādirī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbah wa-satara ʻuyūbahu. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
record.note: Holograph, written in A.H. 1179 (A.D. 1765).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma laka al-ḥamd ʻalá mā ʻallamtanā min al-ādāb wa-alqamtanā min sulūk ṭarīq al-ṣawāb, wa-nasʼaluka al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyika al-munazzah fī maḥāsinihi ʻan al-munāẓir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ghufrān Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān ... Hādhihi ḥawāshin sharīfah wa-taqyīdāt munīfah waḍaʻtuhā ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah lil-muḥaqqiq Mullā Ḥanafī, ḍammantuhā min afhām al-aʻlām mā yaqarru bi-hi al-nāẓir, wa-awdaʻtuhā min bayān al-fikr mā yanshariḥu la-hu al-khāṭir ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 288.
On folio 1a: "al-Ṣabbān ʻalá Ādāb al-baḥth."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Sharḥ Adāb al-baḥth / by Ḥasan ʻUthmān al-Qaysī. 2. Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Ādāb al-baḥth / by al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār. 3. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ Risālat al-ādāb / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dalajī.

Colophon: "Tamma tabyīḍ hadhihi al-ḥawāshī al-sharīfah ʻalá yad muʼallifihā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, anʻma Allāh ʻalayhimā bi-ruḍwān, laylat al-Jumʻah, li-laylatin baqiyat min Ṣafar, sanat 1179 [16 August 1765]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ ʻalá Risālat al-ʻAllāmah ʻAḍud al-Dīn fī ādāb al-baḥth : manuscript / ʻalá yad ... Ḥasan ʻUthmān al-Qaysī.
record.note: Holograph (?), written in A.H. 1187 (A.D. 1773).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh mukhāṭaban tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓ al-maḥmūd awwalan ḥāḍiran wa-mushāhidan, thumma yaḥmaduhu, wa-istabāna minhu wajh taqdīm qawlihi laka ʻalá al-ḥamd, wa-in kāna al-muqām li-kawnihi muqām al-ḥamd yaqtaḍī taqdīmahu, wa-yaṣiḥḥu an yakūna al-taqdīm lil-taʻẓīm wa-al-sharaf, wa-an yakūna li-taʼkīd al-ikhtiṣāṣ ..."
C. Landberg conjectured that al-Qaysī might be the author.
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān. 2. Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Ādāb al-baḥth / by al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār. 3. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ Risālat al-ādāb / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dalajī.
On folio 16a: "Hādhā Sharḥ ʻalá Risālat al-ʻAllāmah ʻAḍud al-Dīn fī ādāb al-baḥth, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."
On folio 16a: Two quotations by a certain "Minshāwī" on "al-Ḥamd".

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-risālah bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Ḥasan ʻUthmān al-Qaysī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-al-Muslimīn. Taḥrīran fī yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, tāsiʻ yawm shahr Rajab, sanat 1187, sabʻah wa-thamānīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [26 September 1773]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Adāb al-baḥth : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1254 (A.D. 1838).
On folio 25a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-ʻAṭṭār ʻalá Sharḥ Ādāb al-baḥth. Tamm."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Yā man lā nāqiḍ limā ḥakam, wa-lā māniʻ limā qasam, asʼaluka al-tawfīq li-aʻdal al-ṭarīq, wa-al-iʻānah ʻalá al-ibānah ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār ... inna sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad al-Ḥanafī al-Tibrīzī al-manshaʼ al-Bukhārī al-wafāh ʻalá al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah al-muʼallafah fī ʻilm ādāb al-baḥth mimmā raghiba fīhi kull fāḍil ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 720.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.
Decoration: Rubricated.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān. 2. Sharḥ Adāb al-baḥth / by Ḥasan ʻUthmān al-Qaysī. 3. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ Risālat al-ādāb / by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dalajī.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak li-tisʻat ayyām maḍat min min shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 1254, arbaʻah wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [27 November 1838] min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Tamm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." To the left of the colophon: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá nuskhat al-muʼallif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Dalajī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dalajī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1188 (A.D. 1774 or 1775).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Aḥmaduka Allāhumma ḥamda al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādāb sharīʻatika, al-muntaẓimīn fī silk ulī al-qurb min khāṣṣatika ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāh, Muḥammad al-Dalajī, ballaghahu Allāh munāh: Hādhihi Ḥawāshī tataḍammanu īḍāḥ Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Mawlá Ḥanafī ʻalá Risālat al-ādāb lil-Mawlá ʻAḍud al-Dīn ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 319; S II, p. 440.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: Loose, in paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); brown leather on the spine of cover and flap.

With: 3 other titles: 1. Ḥawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ādāb al-ʻAḍudīyah / by Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān. 2. Sharḥ Adāb al-baḥth / by Ḥasan ʻUthmān al-Qaysī. 3. Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Adāb al-baḥth / by Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kalām, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl al-inʻām, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā yawm al-Jumʻah, ʻalá yad Muḥammad ʻUbādah, sanat 1188 [1774/1775]. M.M."

record.title: 880-03 al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ : juzʼ min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-karīm li-Abī Ḥayyān : manuscript.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 748 (A.D. 1348).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Tafsīr Sūrat al-Zukhruf. Makkīyah. Wa-qāla Muqātil illā āyah minhā, wa-hiya qawluh Wa-sal man arsalnā, ilá ākhirihā ..."
Title from: Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, fully vocalized.
Binding: Loose, in brown leather, Type II (with flap); in deteriorated slipcase; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Other volumes wanting.
On the flap of the slipcase: "Hādhā juzw min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm li-Abī Ḥayyān, taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān."
On folio 1a: "Iḥbis Yā Kubaykij (Kabīkaj) al-araḍah."

Colophon: "Nuqilat hādhihi al-mujalladah min nuskhatin nusikhat min musawwadat al-muṣannif alladhī bi-khaṭṭihi, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-mustaghfir min dhanbihi, al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭabīb, thāmin shahr Shawwāl al-mubārak, sanat thamān wa-arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [19 January 1348], ḥāmidan lillāh taʻālá wa-muṣalliyan ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, wa-ālihi, wa-musalliman." Under the colophon (in a different hand): "Qūbilat fī nuskhah muqābalah bi-nuskhat al-Muṣḥaf bi-qadr al-imkān min ghayr ziyādah wa-lā nuqṣān fī ʻashr layālin khalat min Dhī al-Qaʻdah sanat thamān wa... wa-sabʻimiʼah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-ʻumr fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd wa-al-sumr : manuscript / lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad allafa jamāʻah min al-udabāʼ fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd, fa-allafa Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Khalaf ibn al-Hirzibān Kitāb al-Sūdān wa-faḍḍalahum ʻalá al-bīḍān, wa-lā astakthiru hādhā ʻalayhi, fa-innahu allafa Kitāb Tafḍīl al-kilāb ʻalá kathīrin mimman labisa al-thiyāb, fa-idhā faḍḍala al-kilāb ʻalá banī Ādam lam yakthur ʻalayhi an yufaḍḍila al-sūdān ʻalá al-bīḍān ..."
Script: Fair modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); green leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Nuzhat al-ʻumr fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd wa-al-sumr, lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn." To the left (in a different hand): "Wa-yalīhi 'al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah'. Wa-yalīhi 'Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib'. al-Jamīʻ lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī."
With: 2 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah. 2. Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb Nuzhat al-ʻumr fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd wa-al-sumr, wa-al-ḥamd lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran sarmadā."

record.title: 880-03 al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah : manuscript / lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-mujtahid al-waqt, Jalāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-ʻulūmihi wa-barakatihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Masʼalah: Mā qawlukum fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah, hal huwa sunnah maʼthūrah ʻan al-Shāriʻ, am lā, wa-hal al-Aḥādīth al-wāridah fī dhālik thābitah am lā, ka-Ḥadīth Umm Salamah alladhī akhrajahu Ibn Mājah ..."
On folio 18a: "Kitāb al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātihi. Āmīn."
Script: Fair modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); green leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 2 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. Nuzhat al-ʻumr fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd wa-al-sumr. 2. Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah, wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama kathīran."

record.title: 880-02 Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib : manuscript / li-ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-al-zamān al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Hādhā juzʼun sammaytuhu 'Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib'. Akhraja al-Bukhārī wa-Muslim ʻan Ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl Khālifū al-Mushrikīn waffirū al-liḥá wa-iḥfū al-shawārib. Qāla fī al-Nihāyah Iḥfāʼ al-shawārib an tubāligha fī qaṣṣihā ..."
On folio 31a: "Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī qaṣṣ al-shārib, li-ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-al-zamān al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn."
Script: Fair modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); green leather on spine.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 2 other titles by al-Suyūṭī: 1. Nuzhat al-ʻumr fī al-tafḍīl bayna al-bīḍ wa-al-sūd wa-al-sumr. 2. al-Akhbār al-maʼthūrah fī al-iṭṭilāʼ bi-al-nūrah.

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam." Under it: "Mudhnibun khaṭṭahu ʻasá // daʻwatan ghayr khāʼibah. Raḥima Allāhu qāʼilan // raḥima Allāhu kātibah."

record.title: 880-02 Faʻaltu wa-afʻaltu bi-maʻnan wāḥid : manuscript / li-Sahl ibn Muḥammad al-maʻrūf bi-Abī Ḥātim al-Sijistānī yarwīhi ʻan al-Aṣmaʻī.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in 1891.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Hādhā Kitāb Faʻala wa-afʻala. Qāla Abū Ḥātim Sahl ibn Muḥammad al-Sijistānī: Hādhā bāb faʻaltu wa-afʻaltu bi-maʻnan wāḥid, ʻan ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Qurayb al-Aṣmaʻī, saʼaltuhu ʻanhu ḥarfan ḥarfan. Qāla yaqūlu akthar al-ʻArab kanantu al-durrah wa-al-jāriyah, wa-kulla shayʼin, fī maʻná al-ṣawn, wa-aknantu al-ḥadīth wa-al-shayʼ fī nafsī idhā akhfaytuhu, wa-huwa mukann, wa-anā mukinn, wa-fī al-Qurʼān, qawl Allāh ʻazza wa-jalla: Kaannahum luʼluʼun maknūn, min kanantu ..."
Script: Good modern naskhī.
Binding: Unbound; loose leaves.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh kathīran. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, ʻalá yad al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad Ṣafī al-Dīn, sanat 975 [1567/1568]. Nuqila min nuskhatin maḥfūẓah bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Miṣrīyah, numrah 234 Majāmiʻ."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī bayān ḥaqīqat al-mithāl wa-al-khayāl al-muṭlaq wa-al-muqayyad ... : manuscript / Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Mutawajjihan ilá jinābihi mutaḍarriʻan ghāyat al-taḍarruʻ ʻalá bābihi, yā man khaṣṣanā bi-maʻrifat ḥaqīqat al-mithāl al-dāll ʻalá kamāl ʻaẓamatihi wa-qudratihi, li-naʻtabira bi-hi iʻtibāran ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī ... Hādhihi Risālah fī bayān ḥaqīqat al-mithāl wa-al-khayāl al-muṭlaq wa-al-muqayyad wa-kayfīyat marātib maqāmāt al-ruʼyā wa-darajāt al-khalq fī idrāk al-ʻulūm wa-al-maʻānī min al-ʻālam al-ʻulwī wa-aṭwār al-khayāl wa-al-mithāl wa-al-arwāḥ wa-al-aʻyān wa-ghayrihā intakhabtuhā min kalām al-farīqayn min muḥaqqiqī al-Ṣūfīyah iʻānatan lil-sālikīn wa-tabṣirah lil-ṭālibīn ..."
A marginal note on leaf 2 recto asserts that the author himself was not a Sufi, though he composed this work on Sufism; there is, however, "no harm in that".
Script: Modern (ca. 1800) calligraphic naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
On the preliminary leaf: "Risālah fī ḥaqīqat al-mithāl wa-al-khayāl al-muṭlaq wa-Risālah fī aḥkām al-dukhān."

On the left margin of folio 2a: "Iʻlam inna al-muʼallif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, laysa min al-Ṣūfīyah wa-lā min alladhīna yastaḥsinūn aqwālahum, kamā yūhimu taʼlīfuhu hādhihi al-risālah fī hādhā al-ʻilm, bal huwa fī dhālika ittabaʻa al-aslāf alladhina ṣannafū kutuban fī al-ʻulūm al-ḥikmīyah, wa-lā ḍayra fī dhālika, wa-lā tasūʼanna al-ẓann fī ḥaqqihi bi-annahu min jumlatihim, wa-ijtanib ʻanhu, fa-inna baʻḍa al-ẓanni ithm."
With: 1 other title: Risālah fī maṣṣ al-dukhān / by Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī.

Colophon: "Li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā aradnā īrādahu fī hādhihi al-risālah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā dhawī [dhī] al-nubūwah wa-al-risālah, Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-qisṭ wa-al-ʻadālah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-bādhilīn anfusahum bi-al-nuṣrah wa-al-iʻānah. Allāhumma afiḍ ʻalaynā min barakātihim wa-islik binā masālik karāmātihim M.M.M. Balagha muqābalatan min nuskhat al-muʼallif."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī maṣṣ al-dukhān : manuscript / Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bayyana li-ʻibādihi al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-jaʻala banahumā shubuhātin tawaqqafa fīhā dhū al-baṣāʼir wa-al-afhām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kathura al-qīl wa-al-qāl bayna ahl al-faḍl wa-al-kamāl fī maṣṣ al-dukhān al-maʻrūf bayna al-nisāʼ wa-al-rijāl ... hal huwa ḥalālun am ḥarām am mubāḥ, fa-ajāb ʻanhu baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ bi-annahu ḥalāl, wa-baʻḍuhum bi-annahu mubāḥ, wa-baʻḍuhum bi-annahu ḥarām, wa-kull wāḥid minhum ṣannafū fīhi risālah, wa-awradū fīhā dalāʼil ʻalá maṭlūbihim ... Wa-anā ... Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī ... aqūlu ..."
Script: Modern (ca. 1800) calligraphic naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap).
With: 1 other title: Risālah fī bayān ḥaqīqat al-mithāl wa-al-khayāl al-muṭlaq wa-al-muqayyad ... / Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Karkūkī.

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalli ʻalá Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn, al-sayyidīn al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-qul Allāhumma afiḍ ʻalaynā min barakātihim, wa-islik binā masālika karāmātihim, bi-raḥmatika yā arḥam al-rāḥimīn. M.M.M. Balagha muqābalatuhu min nuskhat al-muʼallif."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ abyāt al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / li-Waḥyīʹzādah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Khawdun yughaṭṭī al-farʻu minhā al-muʼtazara // law ʻuṣira minhā al-bānu wa-al-misku inʻaṣar. Qawluhu khawd, ay, jāriyah nāʻimat al-badan, wa-al-jamʻ khūd, wa-yughaṭṭī, ay, yastur, wa-al-farʻ, ay, al-shaʻr al-tāmm, wa-al-muʼtazar min al-izār, yuqālu azzartuhu taʼzīran fa-taʼazzara wa-ittazara, wa-ʻuṣira aṣluhu ʻuṣra bi-kasr al-ṣād ... takhfīfan, wa-al-bān nawʻun min al-shajar yuttakhadhu min ḥabbihi duhnun ṭayyib al-rāʼiḥah. Wa-al-iʻarāb ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) cursive Turkish hand.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and flap.
On the verso of the preliminary leaf: "Sharḥ abyāt". "Sharḥ abyāt Miftāḥ li-Waḥyī Zādah. 27 N [Shaʻbān?], laylah-i Panjshanbah, sanat 1233 [2 July 1818]

On folio 1a: "Yawm al-Ākhir huwa Yawm al-Qiyāmah, summiya bi-hi li-kawnihi ākhir al-ayyām. Sharḥ miftāḥ lil-Saʻdīyayn.". "Sharḥ abyāt Sharḥ Miftāḥ." "Sharḥ abyāt ... ..." "Sharḥ abyāt Miftāḥ li-Waḥyīʹzādah."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with the commentary on the verse: "Wa-in dāma hādhā al-ʻayshu Yā Rabbi hākadhā // taraktu ṣlāta al-khamsi ghayr malūmi. Wa-ghayra malūm, ay, bilā lawm. al-Wāw lil-ʻaṭf, wa-in lil-sharṭ, wa-dāma fiʻl sharṭ, wa-hādhā ism shaʼn fāʻil li-fiʻlihi dāma, wa-al-ʻaysh ṣifah li-hādhā, wa-Yā Rabbi munādá muḍāf ilá yāʼ al-mutakallim, ḥadhafa al-yāʼ iktifāʼan bi-al-kasr, wa-hākadhā al-shaʼn ilá kawn al-shāʻir bi-lā qamīṣ wa-lā jubbah, wa-manṣūbah ʻalá al-maḥll ʻalá annahu mafʻūl li-fiʻlihi li-dāma, wa-taraktu fiʻl wa-fāʻil jazāʼ lil-sharṭ, wa-ṣalāta mafʻūl wa-muḍāf ilá al-khams, wa-ghayr ḥāl min fāʻil taraktu wa-muḍāf ilá malūm. Wa-al-maʻná wāḍiḥ. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Musnad al-Imām al-Aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam Sayyidinā Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān ibn Thābit al-Kūfī : manuscript / jamʻ al-Shaykh ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad ibn Khusraw al-Balkhī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Copied in Medina in A.H. 1239 (A.D. 1824).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Akhbaranā al-Shaykhān al-Faqīhān al-Imāmān ʻImād al-Dīn Abū al-Muẓaffar ʻAbd al-Khāliq ibn Qarwan(?) ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jawharī al-Hamdānī wa-Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū al-Qāsim Maḥmūd ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad al-Ghaznawī riwāyat al-Shaykh al-Faqīh Ẓahīr al-Dīn Abī Saʻīd Shuʻayb ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Daldak al-Saqsīnī ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Musnad al-Imām al-Aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam Sayyidinā Abīḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān ibn Thābit al-Kūfī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi, jamʻ al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad ibn Khusraw al-Balkhī al-Ḥanafī, raḥimahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakatih. Āmīn."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah musammá bi-Musnad al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abū Ḥanīfah fī Ḥaram al-Sharīf al-Madīnah al-Munawwarah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalawāt wa-akmal al-taḥīyāt, ʻalá yad al-ḍaʻīf al-naḥīf, al-swad al-wajh, aqall khalq Allāh, ʻAbd al-Ṣamad walad Mullā ʻAbd al-Aḥad Durrānī, Sulaymānī al-aṣl Harawī al-waṭan, fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, sitt wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat 1239 [25 May 1824], ghafara Allāh mālikahu wa-kātibahu, wa-li-wālidayhimā, wa-li-ikhwānihimā min al-Muslimīn, wa-al-nāẓir fīhi, wa-lil-mustafīd min maʻānīhi, wa-li-man wajada ʻayban aw khalalan wa-aṣlaḥahu, wa-li-man yadʻū bihim. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfī fī al-naẓm al-shāfī. Al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Muẓhir al-Dīn Abī Muḥammad Maḥmūd ibn Abī al-ʻAbbās ibn Arsalān al-Khuwārizmī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: The first 8 leaves and the last 2 leaves supplied by two later hands, and the colophon date, A.H. 807 (A.D. 1404), appears to refer to the second of the two, the bulk of the text being in a much older hand.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Kitāb al-Jināyāt. Bāb Taḥrīm al-qatl wa-man yajibu ʻalayhi al-qiṣāṣ. Qatl al-ādamī al-maʻṣūm ʻamdan bi-ghayr ḥaqq ḥarām, wa-al-aṣl fī taḥrīmihi al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-al-ijmāʻ. Ammā al-Kitāb, fa-qawluhu taʻālá Wa-lā taqtulū al-nafs allatī ḥarrama Allāh illā bi-al-ḥaqq. Wa-ammā al-Sunnah fa-mā ruwiya ʻan ʻUthmān ibn ʻAffān anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāla Lā yaḥillu damu imriʼin Muslim illā bi-iḥdá thalāth kufr baʻda īmān wa-zinā baʻda iḥṣān wa-qatlu nafsin bi-ghayri nafs ..."
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Volumes 1, 2 and 3 wanting.

On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ min al-Kāfī fī al-naẓm al-shāfī, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Muẓhir al-Dīn Abī Muḥammad Maḥmaūd ibn Abī al-ʻAbbās ibn Arslān al-Khuwārizmī al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻan jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
Colophon: "Najaza al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ min al-Kāfī lil-Khuwārizmī, wa-bi-tamāmihi tamma al-kitāb, wa-dhālika fī al-sādis min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat sabʻ [wa] thamānimiʼah [21 September 1404]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Aymān al-ʻArab wa-ṭalāqihā fī al-Jāhilīyah : manuscript / ṣanʻat Abī Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Najīramī.
record.note: Copied in 1892 from a manuscript in the Khedivial library, Cairo (Majāmīʻ 234).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Najīramī al-Kātib: Kānat al-ʻArab fī al-Jāhilīyah ʻalá madhāhib, fa-kāna muʻẓamuhum man yadīnu Allāh, taʻālá dhikruhu, wa-yatamassaku bi-irth min millat Ibrāhīm, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-yaḥijju wa-yataʼallahu, wa-yuʻaẓẓimu al-Ḥaram wa-al-ashhur al-ḥurum wa-yaḍaʻu fīhā awzār al-ḥarb, wa-in ẓafara bi-ʻadūwihi fīhā lam yamsashu bi-sūʼ, wa-kānū fī dhālika akhyāfan, fa-kāna minhum man yastaḥillu fī al-Ḥaram al-muḥill wa-al-muḥrim, wa-minhum man yuḥrim ʻan al-muḥil wa-al-muḥrim ..."
On leaf 1 recto: "Copié par Samir, fini 3 janv. 1892 ... Collationné avec moi ... Landberg".
On folio 1 recto: "Nuqila min majmūʻah maḥfūẓah bi-al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah numrah 234 majāmiʻ."
Some marginalia.
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: Unbound. Loose leaves.
Colophon: "Ākhir Aymān al-ʻArab. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá khīratihi min khalqihi, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-laqīṭ min al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Maktūm ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sulaym al-Qaysī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān wa-jaʻalahu ḥujjatan, wa-awḍaḥa bi-hi lil-muʼminīn ilá al-ḥaqq maḥajjatan, wa-aẓhara bi-āyātihi nūran, wa-kānū min ẓulam al-ḍalāl fī lujjah, aḥmaduhu ḥamda man ittabaʻa nahjah, wa-rafaḍa al-bāṭila harajahu wa-marajah, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-ḥujjah ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun yashtamilu ʻalá dhikr mā fī kitāb Shaykhinā al-Ustādh al-ʻālim al-abraʻ al-ḥāfiẓ, shaykh al-nuḥāh, Athīr al-Dīn Abī Ḥayyān Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥayyān al-Nafazī al-Andalusī, nazīl al-Qāhirah ... fī tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm, al-Musammá bi-al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ ..."
Script: Hasty naskhī, sparsely pointed, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion; covers heavily deteriorated.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon of volume 1: "Kamula al-sifr al-awwal min Kitāb al-Durr al-laqīṭ min al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, wa-sallama taslīman. Katabahu Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Maktūm ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sulaym al-Qaysī al-Dimashqī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

Colophon of volume 2: "Tamma al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Durr al-laqīṭ min al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Katabahu multaqiṭuhu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī ʻafwahu wa-maghfiratah, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ibn Maktūm ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sulaym al-Qaysī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. H."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Man ghāba ʻanhu al-muṭrib : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad al-Thaʻālibī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī abdaʻa fī ṣunʻihi idh ṣanaʻ, wa-abdaʻa fīmā abdaʻa wa-ikhtaraʻ, khalaqa al-samāʼ min ghayri ʻamadin tarawnaha, wa-al-falaka ʻalá ʻamūd al-qudrah rafaʻa, khalaq al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-bayān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt bi-al-maʻrifah lil-ʻulūm wa-tabyīn al-mushkilāt min al-marmūz wa-al-maʻlūm ... wa-tarjamtuhu bi-Kitāb Man ghāba ʻanhu al-muṭrib ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Nabīyihi wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Nathr al-durar. Al-Faṣl al-thānī : manuscript / li-Abī Saʻd Manṣūr ibn al-Ḥusayn.
record.note: Copied in the 13th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi anʻamta fa-zid. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazzanā bi-al-Islām wa-anṭaqanā bi-afṣaḥ al-kalām, wa-anqadhanā min ẓulmat al-shirk wa-ḥayrat al-shakk bi-Muḥammad Nabīyihi khayr al-anām wa-ʻitratihi al-aʻlām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim ṣalātan yastaḥiqquhā bi-faḍlihi wa-karāmatih, wa-yastaḥiqqūnahā bi-qurbāhu wa-wilādatih ..."

C. Landberg states that this is the second half of the work; it is really only the second part, out of seven (cf. Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin, 8329).
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type III (without flap); dark brown leather on spine.
Other parts wanting.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On the flyleaf: 1. "al-Faṣl al-thānī min Kitāb Nathr al-durar, raḥima Allāh muʼallifahu. Āmīn." 2. "Fī kalimāt al-Khulafāʼ al-thalāthah wa-ghayrihim min al-aṣḥāb ruḍwān Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn". 3. "Fī al-muḥāḍarāt li-Abī Saʻīd Manṣūr ibn al-Ḥusayn al-mutawaffá sanat 421 arbaʻ mujalladāt. Ashqá [man] katab." 4. "Min Kitāb al-Mushtarik waḍʻan wa-al-mukhtalif ṣuqʻan li-Abī ʻAbd Allāh Yāqūt al-Ḥamawī, Ābah bulaydah bayna Hamadān wa-al-Rayy, wa-ilayhā yunsabu Abū Saʻīd Manṣūr ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ābī, ṣāḥib Kitāb Nathr al-durar wa-Tārīkh al-Rayy, Wazīr Majd al-Dawlah ibn Fakhr al-Dawlah ibn Rukn al-Dawlah ibn Buwayh, wa-akhūhu Abū Manṣūr Muḥammad kāna wazīran li-malik Ṭabaristān. Intahá mā wajdtuhu fī al-kitāb al-madhkūr." 5. "Istaṣḥabahu al-faqīr [...?] sanat 214."
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh Kitāb Nathr al-durar."

record.title: 880-02 al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ fī sharḥ al-Wasīṭ. Al-Juzʼ al-tāsiʻ wa-al-sādis ʻashar : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Qamūlī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume 9: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... li-anna al-awwal lam yastaqirr bi-iftirāq wa-lā taḥāyur, wa-farraqa bayna al-taḥāyur wa-al-bayʻ bi-annahumā idhā ikhtāra al-imḍāʼ fa-qad raḍiya kullun minhumā bi-iqrār milk ṣāḥibihi ʻalá mā intaqala ilayhi, wa-idhā tabāyaʻā thāniyan fa-kullun minhumā lam yarḍa bi-istiqrār milk ṣāḥibihi ʻalá mā intaqala ilayhi fa-lam yastaqirr al-milk fa-ṣāra milkahumā mukhtalifan ..."

Incipit of volume 16: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... al-maḥkūm bi-mawtihi min akhīhi al-mayyit qablahu ilá warathatihi al-mafqūd al-maḥkūm bi-mawtihi min zawjatihi wa-awlādihi in kānat la-hu zawjah wa-awlād, fa-hādhā tawjīh al-kalām, wa-al-qawl bi-annahu idhā qaḍá al-qāḍī bi-mawtihi yuqaddaru ka-annahu lam yakun mawjūdan, ḥāluhu mawt al-qarīb al-ḥāḍir, wa-yuṣraf al-naṣīb al-mawqūf li-ajl al-ghāʼibīn ilá warathat al-qarīb al-mayyit al-ḥāḍir ..."
For what appears to be another volume of this set see Landberg MSS 53a.
Other volumes wanting.
Considerably worm-eaten.
Script: Fair naskhī in black and red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion; flaps missing; covers heavily deteriorated.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon of volume 9: "Tamma al-Juzʼ al-tāsiʻ bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-dhālik taʼlīf al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Qamūlī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-dhālik Sharḥ al-Wasīṭ min al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ. Yatlūhu fī al-Juzʼ al-ʻāshir al-qism al-thānī Bayʻuhu mimman huwa ʻalayhi, wa-yusammá istibdālan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

Colophon of volume 16: "Najaza al-Juzʼ al-mubārak al-sādis ʻashar [bi-ḥamd] Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, taṣnīf al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Ṣadr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥarbī (?) al-Qamūlī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannata maʼwāh, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Tamma al-juzʼ min al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ fī sharḥ al-Wasīṭ. Yatlūhu fī al-juzʼ al-sābiʻ ʻashar furūʻ min Kitāb al-Waṣāyā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Muḥallá. Al-Sifr al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Saʻīd ibn Ḥazm.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 738 (A.D. 1337).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Qāla ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Saʻīd ibn Ḥazm, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn ... wa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yamnaḥanā al-ʻiṣmah min kull khaṭaʼ wa-zalal wa-yuwaffiqanā lil-ṣawāb fī kull qawlin wa-ʻamal. Āmīn. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, waffaqanā Allāh wa-īyakum li-ṭāʻatihi, fa-innakum zaʻamtum an naʻmala lil-masāʼil al-mukhtalifah allatī jamaʻnāhā fī kitābinā al-marsūm bi-al-Muḥallá sharḥan yakhtaṣiruhu ..."
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central gilded medallion.
Other volume(s) wanting.

Colophon: "Kamula al-Sifr al-awwal min Kitāb al-Muḥallá, yatlūhu Masʼalat awqāt al-ṣalāh. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu al-thāmin wa-al-ʻishrūn min Ṣafar, sanat thamān wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [3 October 1337], aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā. Wa-katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Khalīl ibn Sayf al-Dīn al-Ḥajjī al-maʻrūf wāliduhu bi-Salaḥdār al-Amīr Badr al-Dīn Baktūt al-Qaramānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-taraḥḥama ʻalá kātibihi, wa-ʻalá wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Risālat al-ghufrān : manuscript / li-Abī al-ʻAlāʼ al-Maʻarrī al-Tanūkhī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1274 (A.D. 1858).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qad ʻalim al-Jabru alladhī nusiba ilayhi Jubraʼīlu, wa-huwa fī kull al-khayrāti Sabīlu, anna fī maskanī ḥamāṭatan, mā kānat qaṭṭu afāniyatan, wa-lā al-nākizatu bihā ghāniyatan, tuthmiru min mawaddat Mawlāya al-Shaykh al-jalīl, kabata Allāh ʻadūwahu, wa-adām rawāḥahu ilá al-faḍli wa-ghudūwahu, mā law ḥamalathu al-ʻādiyah min al-shajar ladanat ilá al-arḍ ghuṣūnuhā ..."
Script: Small naskhī in black and pruple.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb li-ʻAlī ibn Manṣūr al-Ḥalabī al-Adīb, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh, wa-aʻāda ʻalá al-Muslimīn min ṣāliḥ mā tamannāh. Āmīn." Under it: "Bal hādhihi Risālat al-ghufrān li-Abī al-ʻAlāʼ al-Maʻarrī al-Tanūkhī allatī allafahā jawāban li-ʻAlī ibn Manṣūr Qāḍī Ḥalab ʻan risālatihi al-maʻrūfah bi-Risālat Ibn al-Qāriḥ allatī arsalahā ilayhi qablu. Wa-katabahu muḥaqqiquhu al-ḥaqīr, imām al-ʻilm bi-al-Ḥaramayn, wa-khādimuhu bi-al-Mashriqayn wa-al-Maghribayn, Muḥammad Maḥmūd al-Turkuzī al-Shinqīṭī al-Madanī thumma al-Makkī, Niṣf Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat 1309 [16 January 1892]." Under it: "Waṣaddaqa ʻalá hādhā al-Shaykh ʻUmar al-Suwaydī ay al-Kunt Landbirj." On the left margin: "Wa-tarjamat ʻAlī ibn Manṣūr masṭūrah fī 'Irshād al-alibbāʼ fī ṭabaqāt al-udabāʼ' li-Yāqūt al-Ḥamawī."

Colophon: "Najazat al-Risālah, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Intahá tilka al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, wa-uṣallī wa-usallim ʻalá al-Nabī al-Awwāb, al-nāṭiq bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ataraḍḍá ʻan ālihi al-aḥbāb, wa-aṣḥābihi al-anjāb, ilá Yawm al-Maʼāb, ʻalá yad rājī raḥmat al-Ḥayy alladhī lā yamūt, ʻAlī Kankūt, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-aḥabbatihi, wa-lil-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, bi-niʻmatihi tatimmu al-ṣāliḥāt. Taḥrīran fī ḥādī ʻashar shahr al-Qaʻdah, sanat 274 wa-alf [23 June 1858]."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Bushrá al-labīb bi-dhikrá al-Ḥabīb : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Fatḥ al-Dīn Abū al-Fatḥ Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Sayyid al-Nās al-Yaʻmurī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1272 (A.D. 1856).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, al-ḥāfiẓ al-nassābah, Fatḥ al-Dīn Abū al-Fatḥ Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Sayyid al-Nās al-Yaʻmur[ī], nafaʻa Allāh bi-barakatihi: Baʻda ḥamd Allāh taʻālá ʻalá jamīʻ al-ālāʼ wa-jazīl al-naʻmāʼ bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi, al-wāridah fī al-anbāʼ al-ṣādirah bi-ḥusn al-thanāʼ limā manaḥa min basṭ al-ḥibāʼ, wa-fataḥa min bathth al-ʻaṭāʼ, wa-sharraʻa min nahj al-wafāʼ ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Intahá al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻalá yad rājī raḥmat al-Ḥayy alladhī lā yamūt, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Katkūt, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, rābiʻ yawm khalā min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, ikhtitām sanat 1272, ithnayn wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn min baʻd al-alf [6 Aughust 1856] min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-sharrafa wa-ʻaẓẓam, wa-majjada wa-karam, wa-Allāh subḥānahu wa-taʻālá aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Zāhir fī maʻānī al-kalām alladhī yastaʻmiluhu al-nās : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim al-Zajjājī.
record.note: Beginning missing; also lacunae between leaves 8 and 9, 14 and 15, 15 and 16.
Copied in A.H. 1309 (A.D. 1892) from a copy in the Khedivial library, Cairo.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... rujūʻan, wa-lil-masʼalah ajwibah takthīran li-dhālika, wa-innamā yarjiʻu jamīʻuhu ilá shayʼ wāḥid, wa-in tabāyant alfāẓ al-ʻulamāʼ fīhi, fa-nabbahtu ʻalá dhālik, wa-araytu kayfa rujūʻihi ilá aṣlin wāḥid, wa-wajdtu fīhi ayḍan mawāḍiʻ qad dhakarahā min al-naḥw wa-ʻilalihi, wa-min al-taṣārīf ʻalá madhāhib al-Kūfīyīn, fa-dhakartuhā ʻalá madhāhib al-Baṣrīyīn, wa-dalaltu ʻalá ṣiḥḥat madhhabihim dūna madhhab al-Kūfīyīn ..."
Also known as: Mukhtaṣar al-Zāhir (Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur).
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Headings in red and green; key words in red.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad, khātim anbiyāʼihi wa-rusulih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, wa-dhālika fī al-thāmin wa-al-ʻishrīn min Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 620, ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah [1 November 1223], wa-hādhā al-tārīkh al-madhkūr tārīkh al-nuskhah allatī nuqilat minhā hādhihi al-nuskhah, wa-ṣāra muqābalat hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá al-aṣlīyah wa-taṣḥīḥuhā bighāyat al-diqqah ʻalá ḥasb al-ṭāqah, aʻāna Allāh mujaddidahā ʻalá itmāmihā. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā li-ʻashrin baqīna min Jumādá al-Thāniyah, sanat 1309, tisʻ wa-thalāthimiʼah wa-alf [21 January 1892] min Hijrat man ḥāza al-majd wa-al-sharaf, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, wa-askananā wa-īyāhum aʻlā al-ghuraf, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khūjah, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Tamma al-kitābu takāmalat // niʻamu al-surūri li-ṣāḥibih. Wa-ʻafā al-Ilāhu bi-faḍlihi // wa-bi-mannihi ʻan kātibih." Under the coliphon: Red round stamp: "Rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Ṣamad ʻabduhu Muḥammad Aḥmad."

record.title: 880-02 al-Imtāʻ bi-aḥkām al-samāʻ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Kamāl al-Dīn Abī al-Faḍl Jaʻfar ibn Thaʻlab al-Udfuwī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied from a copy made in A.H. 1177 (A.D. 1763 or 1764).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bi-ḥamdihi tatayassaru khafīyāt al-umūr, wa-bi-dhikrihi taṭmaʼinnu al-qulūb ... aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-asmāʻ wa-mattaʻanā bi-hi min al-abṣār ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aḥkām al-samāʻ qad waqaʻa al-nizāʻ fīhi fī sālif al-aʻṣār, wa-tabāyanat fīhi aqwāl ʻulamāʼ al-amṣār, fa-min qāʼilin bi-al-karāhah wa-yaqtaṣir ʻalá hādhā al-miqdār, wa-min mufriṭin intahá ilá ḥadd al-manʻ wa-al-inkār, wa-min mufarriṭin jaʻalahu mimmā yūrithu al-naʻīm fī Dār al-Qarār ..."
Script: Fair 19th century naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Imtāʻ fī aḥkām al-samāʻ, wa-furigha min kitābatihi qubayla ẓuhr yawm al-Khamīs, ʻashrat ayyām Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat thalāthimiʼah wa-wāḥid [1301 = 8 February 1884], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutawakkil ilá Rabbihi, al-murtajī ghufrān dhanbihi, al-mushtakī min qaswat qalbihi, al-ṭāmiʻ fī ḥuṣūl qurbihi, al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Jād al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī. Allāhumma ighfir la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī kitābatihi, wa-li-man ṣallaḥa khalalan, wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Min Hijrat al-Nabī, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-mansūkh min nuskhah qadīmah sanat sabʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [1763/1764] min Hijrat al-Nabī, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. M."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Karīm al-nudamāʼ wa-nadīm al-kuramāʼ : manuscript / taṣnīf ... ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Saljūkī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. al-Bāb al-awwal. Fī faḍl al-Basmalah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī basaṭa barakāt birrihi barran wa-baḥran, wa-madda mīm māʼidat khayrihi, sarrahu mn akhlaṣa la-hu fī amrihi sirran wa-jahran, wa-madda mīm māʼidat khayrihi li-man ʻāda ʻan ʻudhrihi wa-khashiya makr alladhī rafaʻa al-samāʼ wa-samkahā, wa-ajrá biḥār al-arḍ wa-qāta samakahā, wa-lam yansa waḥshan sakana qafran ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 1004.
Ms. Gotha (Pertsch 845) of another work by the same author was copied in A.H. 1075 (A.D. 1664). The writing and paper of this manuscript, however, seem much older.

On folio 1a: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Kitāb Karīm al-nudamāʼ wa-nadīm al-kuramāʼ, taṣnīf aqall ʻibād Allāh taʻālá ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Saljūkī al-quṭr al-Suhrawardī al-khirqah, ʻafā Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, yaḥtawī ʻalá khamsat ʻashar bāban: al-Bāb al-awwal Fī faḍl al-basmalah. al-Bāb al-thānī Fī faḍl al-ḥamdu lillāh. al-Bāb al-Thālith Fī faḍl lā ilāha illā Allāh. al-Bāb al-rābiʻ Fī faḍl al-ʻArsh. al-Bāb al-khāmis Fī faḍl mawlid Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-sādis Fī ṣifātihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-sābiʻ Fī faḍl Ahl al-Bayt. al-Bāb al-thāmin. Fī faḍl Abī Bakr wa-ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā. al-Bāb al-tāsiʻ Fī al-ikhlāṣ. al-Bāb al-ʻāshir Fī faḍl ummatihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-ḥādī ʻashar Fī qawlihi ʻUlamāʼ ummatī ka-anbiyāʼ Banī Isrāʼīl. al-Bāb al-thānī ʻashar Fī faḍl al-ḥajj. al-Bāb al-thālith ʻashar Fī dhikr al-Qiyāmah. al-Bāb al-rābiʻ ʻashar Fī ṣifat al-Nār. al-Bāb al-khāmis ʻashar Fī ṣifat al-Jannah."
Script: Fair naskhī, cursive hand.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly at the beginning of "al-Bāb al-thālith (Chapter three): Fī faḍl lā ilāha illā Allāh", as follows: "... al-khāfiḍ al-rāfiʻ, al-muʻizz li-man kāna fī ḥirzihi, al-mudhill li-man nāzaʻahu fī ʻizzihi, al-samīʻ al-baṣīr bilā aḥdāq wa-lā masāmiʻ, al-ḥakam al-ʻadl, fa-al-wayl li-man khālafahu fī al-ḥukm aw yukhādiʻ, al-laṭīf bi-qudratihi, al-khabīr bi-khalīqatih, fa-lā yakhfá ʻalayhi al-dharr fī al-barr, wa-al-naml fī al-raml fī aḍyaq al-mawāḍiʻ, al-ʻaẓīm alladhī yusabbiḥuhu al-falak bimā fīhi min al-kawākib al-ghawārib ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Uns al-munqaṭiʻīn : manuscript / al-Muʻāfá ibn Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Abī al-Fatḥ ibn Abī Sinān al-Mawṣilī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1271 (A.D. 1855).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabiyīn. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Abī al-Fatḥ ibn Abī Lamsān al-Mawṣilī, ghafara Allāh la-hu: Istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá thalāthimiʼat Ḥadīth ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-thalāth miʼat ḥikāyah ʻan al-ṣāliḥīn, yatbaʻuhā abyāt min al-shiʻr maḥdhūfat al-asānīd ṭalaban lil-ikhtiṣār ..."
Script: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion. Cover deteriorated.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Uns al-muntaṭiʻīn [al-munqaṭiʻīn] taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻĀlim Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Abī al-Fatḥ ibn Abī Lamsān, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Āmīn."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, al-khāmis ʻashar min shahr Shawwāl alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-iḥdá wa-sabʻīn [1 July 1855]. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. ʻAlá yad faqīrin yusammá ʻAlīyan, wa-bi-Abī Yūsuf yukanná, wa-li-Malīḥin yunsabu, wa-lil-Shāfiʻī yadhhabu."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb ʻUyūn al-athar fī funūn al-maghāzī wa-al-shamāʼil wa-al-siyar : manuscript / lil-Shaykh ... Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sayyid al-Nās al-Yaʻmurī.
record.note: The colophon date, A.H. 1121 (A.D. 1709 or 1710), is evidently spurious, and the manuscript was presumably copied about 1800.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mujallī maḥāsin al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah bi-durar akhbārihā, wa-mujlī mayāmin al-Sīrah al-Nabawīyah ʻan ghurar āthārihā, wa-muʼayyid man iqtabasa nūr hidāyatihi min mishkāt anwārihā, wa-musaddid min iltamasa ʻizz ḥimāyatihi min azraq sinānihā wa-abyaḍ battārihā, wa-musahhil ṭarīq al-Jannah li-man iltamasa mustaqīm ṣirāṭihā wa-ihtadá bi-ḍiyāʼ manārihā ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon (in a different hand): "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tamma al-kitāb ʻUyūn al-athar fī funūn al-maghāzī wa-al-shamāʼil wa-al-siyar, fī sanat 1121 [1709/1710]."

record.title: 880-02 Tarājim jamāʻah min mshāyikh al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Rajab ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Salāmī : manuscript / intaqāhā waladuhu Zayn al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn Rajab.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Hādhihi Tarājim jamāʻah min mshāyikh al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Rajab ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Salāmī alladhī rawá ʻanhum, naqaltuhum min Muʻjamihi. Sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah. Abū Bakr ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Mundhurī thumma al-Miṣrī al-Shāfiʻī Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ṣannāj ..."
Possibly a holograph.
Script: Fair 14th century naskhī, with few diacritical points, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
On folio 1a: "Wafayāt wa-tarājim fuḍalāʼ wa-ʻulamāʼ li-Ibn Rajab."
At the bottom edge: "Wafayāt Ibn Rajab."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-qad massanā al-khawfu al-shadīdu wa-yā turá // yufāriqu ʻannā sāʻatan bi-inziʻājihi. Fa-yā Rabbi mā narjū siwāka fa-hab lanā // bi-luṭfika amnan ʻājilan bi-infirājihi. Qāla fa-laṭufa Allāh wa-farraja wa-lahu al-ḥamd."

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-nabīh fī sharḥ al-Tanbīh. Al-Mujallad al-thānī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad ibn Jamāʻah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bāb mā yufsidu al-ṣalāh wa-mā lā yufsiduhā. al-Ifsād ḍidd al-iṣlāḥ, wa-fasada idhā halaka wa-ikhtalla, wa-al-fasād wa-al-buṭlān mutarādifān ʻindanā fī masāʼil al-ḥajj wa-al-kitābah wa-al-khulʻ wa-al-ṣadāq, fa-innahā taftariqān ʻindanā, wa-satudhkaru, in shāʼa Allāh, fī mawāḍiʻihā ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 72.
Script: Cursive hand, with very few diacritical points.
Binding: Loose, in dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion. Flap missing. Binding deteriorated, exposing manuscript waste.
Volumes I, III, IV and V wanting.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Qāla al-Māwardī: Wa-lā yajūzu la-hu ʻaqduhā, wa-lā idhā khaṭaba lahum wa-fī al-waqt ittisāʻ an yuṣalliya al-ẓuhr, bal yuṣallī al-Jumʻah, wa-dhahaba Ibn [...] ilá an al-khuṭbah allatī faʻalahā qad baṭulat, wa-yajibu ʻalayhi istiʼnāf al-khuṭbah ... bi-al-jamʻ idhā baqiya al-waqt, li-anna al-khuṭbatayan ... ṣalātay al-jamʻ aw rakʻah wa-rakʻatay al-ṣalāh ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Luʼluʼ al-manthūr fī naṣīḥat wulāt al-umūr : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Samhūdī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1269 (A.D. 1853).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
