Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-dāʼirah, wa-anāra bi-nūrihi al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā kāna maḥjūb, wa-jalā ʻarāyis al-wujūd fī mirāt al-shuhūd, fa-man fahim al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb, wa-waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādihi fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih fa-fāza min nayl al-murād bi-mā sabaqa la-hu fī al-maktūb ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā majmūʻun laṭīf jamaʻtuhu min kutub mutaʻaddidah ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Luʼluʼ al-manthūr fī naṣīḥat wulāt al-umūr', wa-jaʻaltuhu mushtamilan ʻalá naṣāʼiḥ wa-ādab tadhkiratan li-ulī al-albāb ʻamalan bi-mā jāʼa fī al-Kitāb ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 223.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min kitābat 'al-Luʼluʼ al-manthūr fī naṣīḥat wulāt al-umūr', wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran. Tamma hādhā al-kitāb 20 Rajab al-ḥarām alladhī huwa min shuhūr ʻām sanat 1269, tisʻah wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [29 April 1853] min Hijrat man la-hu al-faḍl wa-al-sharaf."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Baʻlabakkīyah : manuscript / min muṣannafāt ... Taqī al-Dīn ... Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah al-Ḥarrānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Baʻlabakkīyah, min muṣannafāt Sayyidinā wa-Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah Taqī al-Dīn muftī al-firaq, muʼayyid al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah, Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah al-Ḥarrānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. M. M." "Wa-yalīhi jumlat rasāʼil dākhil hādhihi al-majmūʻah, taʼlīf al-ʻAllāmah al-mushār ilayhi, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn. M."
On folio 1a: "Jumlat awrāq hādhihi al-majmūʻah ʻadad 280. Minhā kurrās ʻadad 28, thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn kurrās." "Wa-jumlat al-rasāʼl ʻadad 6."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim ḥujjat al-Islām, barakat al-anām, nāṣir al-Sunnah wa-qāmiʻ al-bidʻah, Taqī al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm ibn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Taymīyah al-Ḥarrānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Faṣl fī bayān anna al-Qurʼān kalām Allāh, laysa shayʼun minhu kalāman li-ghayrihi, lā Jibrīl wa-lā Muḥammad, wa-lā ghayrihimā ..."
Script: Fair modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose. In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Some marginalia.
With: 2 other titles by Ibn Taymīyah: 1. Qāʻidah fī ziyārat Bayt al-Maqdis. 2. Rasāʼil.

Colophon. No colophon: Text ends as follows: "Wa-Allāh yahdī man yashāʼ ilá ṣirāṭin mustaqīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Qāʻidah fī ziyārat Bayt al-Maqdis : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Aḥmad ibn Taymīyah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh naḥmaduhu, wa-nastaʻīnuhu, wa-nastahdīhi, wa-nastatghfiruhu, wa-naʻūdhu billāh min shurūr anfusinā wa-min sayyiʼāti aʻmālinā ... Faṣl fī Ziyārat Bayt al-Maqdis. Thabat fī al-Ṣaḥīḥayn ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāla: Lā tushaddu al-riḥāl illā ilá thalāthat masājid al-Masjid al-Ḥarām wa-al-Masjid al-Aqṣá wa-Masjidī ..."
Script: Fair modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose. In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 2 other titles by Ibn Taymīyah: 1. Kitāb al-Baʻlabakkīyah. 2. Rasāʼil.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Nabīyinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh."

record.title: 880-02 Rasāʼil : manuscript / li-Shaykh al-Islām Ibn Taymīyah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Rasālah li-Shaykh al-Islām Ibn Taymīyah, raḥimahu Allāh, fī Tafsīr āyāt ashkalat ḥattá lā yūjadu fī ṭāʼifah min kutub al-tafsīr fīhā qawlan ṣawāban, bal lā yūjadu fīhā illā mā huwa khaṭaʼn. Minhā qawluhu taʻālá Wa-mā yushʻirukum annahā idhā jāʼat lā yuʼminūn wa-nuqallibu afʼidatahum wa-abṣārahum kamā lam yuʼminū bi-hi awwala marratin wa-nadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim yaʻmahūn ..."
Script: Several modern (18th century) hands, in red and black.
Binding: Loose. In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
With: 2 other titles by Ibn Taymīyah: 1. Kitāb al-Baʻlabakkīyah. 2. Qāʻidah fī ziyārat Bayt al-Maqdis.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Fāʼidah. Qāla ṣāḥib al-ʻIqd al-farīd: Wa-kāna Muʻāwiyah yaqūlu innī la-ānafu an yakūna fī al-arḍ jahlun lā yasaʻuhu ḥilmī, wa-dhanbun lā yasaʻuhu ʻafwī, wa-ḥājatun lā yasaʻuhā jūdī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh dhī al-ikrām wa-al-ijlāl. Intahá bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."

record.title: Kitāb al-ukar / [Theodosius]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, with diagrams.
With autograph ex-libris of Ḥasan al-ʻAṭṭār.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: al-Kurah wa-al-usṭuwānah / [Archimedes]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century) cursive hand, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: Kitāb al-masākin / [Theodosius]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) cursive hand, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: al-Kurah al-mutaḥarrikah / [Autolycus]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) cursive hand, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: al-Ayyām wa-al-layālī / [Theodosius]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) cursive hand, in red and black, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: Maʾkhūdhāt / [Archimedes]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) cursive hand, in red and black, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: al-Mafrūḍāt / li-Thābit ibn Qurrah al-Ḥarrānī al-Ṣābī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) cursive hand, in red and black, with diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 6 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Fawāʼid majmūʻah fī dhikr taʻrīfāt mutaʻalliqah bi-al-ḥajj al-sharīf : manuscript / jamaʻahā ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Usṭuwānī.
record.note: Copied in 1847.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

On folio 1a: "Mā jamaʻahu al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-mutashaffiʻ bi-al-Nabī al-ʻAdnānī, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan ibn Aḥmad al-Usṭuwānī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-barakātihi, wa-ghafara lanā wa-la-hu, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīnu ʻalá dhālika. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdahu. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi 'Fawāʼid majmūʻah fī dhikr taʻrīfāt mutaʻalliqah bi-al-ḥajj al-sharīf' wa-baʻḍ amākin bi-Makkah al-Musharrafah wa-al-Madīnah al-Munawwarah, wa-mā yunāsibu dhālika, manqūlatan min al-kutub al-madhkūrah fī ṭayy hādhihi al-awrāq, jamaʻahā aqall ʻibādihi, al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Usṭuwānī, ghafara Allāh taʻālá la-hu, bi-jāh al-Nabī al-ʻAdnānī, rājiyan min Allāh al-qabūl, fa-innahu akram masʼūl."
Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) 7983 has the author's father, al-Ḥasan ibn al-Usṭuwānī, who died in 1652.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
With: 1 other title: inbāʼ al-adhkiyāʼ fī ḥayāt al-anbiyāʼ / by al-Suyūṭī.
On folio 167a-168a: A poem (on the stations along the Ḥajj road from Damascus) by "al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥibb al-Dīn al-Dimashqī, nāẓiman manāzil al-ḥajj al-sharīf min Dimashq ..."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (folio 168a): "Wa-qad tamma jamīʻ al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi ʻalá yad aḥqar ʻibād Allāh al-muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Bannā al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh taʻālá la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man aḥsana wa-asāʼa ʻalayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. Innahu Huwa al-Ghafūr al-Raḥīm. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, fī sittat ʻashar yawman min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, aḥad shuhūr sanat 1263, thalāth wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [5 April 1847] min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb Inbāʼ al-adhkiyāʼ fī ḥayāt al-anbiyāʼ : manuscript / lil-marḥūm ... Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1263 (A.D. 1847).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Waqaʻa al-suʼāl: Qad ishtuhira anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥayyun fī qabrih, wa-warada annahu, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, qāla 'Mā min aḥadin yusallimu ʻalayya illā radda Allāh ʻalayya rūḥī ḥattá arudda ʻalayhi al-salām, fa-ẓāhiruhu mufāraqat al-rūḥ la-hu fī baʻḍ al-awqāt, fa-kayfa al-jamʻ, wa-huwa suʼālun ḥasan yaḥtāju ilá al-naẓar wa-al-taʼammul. Fa-aqūlu: Ḥayāt al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī qabrihi, huwa wa-sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ, ʻalayhim al-salām, maʻlūmah ʻindanā ʻilman qaṭʻīyan, limā qāma ʻindanā min al-adillah fī dhālika, wa-tawātarat bi-hi al-akhbār ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
With: 1 other title: Fawāʼid majmūʻah fī dhikr taʻrīfāt mutaʻalliqah bi-al-ḥajj al-sharīf / by Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Usṭuwānī.
On folio 167a-168a: A poem (on the stations along the Ḥajj road from Damascus) by "al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥibb al-Dīn al-Dimashqī, nāẓiman manāzil al-ḥajj al-sharīf min Dimashq ..."
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon (folio 166a): "Tamma Kitāb Inbāʼ al-adhkiyāʼ fī ḥayāt al-anbiyāʼ lil-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn."

Colophon (folio 168a): "Wa-qad tamma jamīʻ al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi ʻalá yad aḥqar ʻibād Allāh al-muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Bannā al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh taʻālá la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man aḥsana wa-asāʼa ʻalayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. Innahu Huwa al-Ghafūr al-Raḥīm. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, fī sittat ʻashar yawman min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, aḥad shuhūr sanat 1263, thalāth wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [5 April 1847] min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Bahjat al-nāẓirīn wa-āyāt al-mustadillīn. Al-Niṣf al-awwal : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1150 (A.D. 1737).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Naḥmadu man sharaḥa ṣudūranā wa-nawwara qulūbanā lil-naẓar fī ʻajāʼib al-malakūt, wa-nuwaḥḥidu man tawaḥḥada fī mulkihi fa-awjada al-ʻālam wa-jaʻala awwalahu ījād nūr Sayyid Banī Ādam, wa-khalaqa al-mawt wa-al-ḥayāh, wa-lā yalḥaquhu al-ʻadam wa-al-mawt ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Other volume(s) wanting.

Text ends with: "... Wa-yuʼayyidu al-jumhūr qawluhu taʻālá Idhā rujjati al-arḍu rajjan, ay rajafat wa-zalzalat wa-ḥarikat taḥrīkan ḥattá yanhadima kull bināʼ ʻalá wajhihā. Qāla al-mufassirūn tartajju kamā yartajju al-ṣabī fī al-mahd ḥattá yanhadima kull mā ʻalayhā, wa-yankasira kull shayʼ ʻalayhā min al-jibāl. Qāla al-Thaʻlabī takūnu ka-al-safīnah al-mawsūqah fī al-baḥr taḍribuhā al-amwāj wa-tuqlubuhā al-riyāḥ. Wa-minhā qawluhu taʻālá Yawma tarjufu al-arḍu, ilá ākhir al-āyah."
Colophon: "Tamma al-niṣf al-awwal min al-kitāb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-dhālika fī 20 Rajab, sanat 1150 Hijrīyah [13 November 1737]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-laʼālī fī sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Nūbī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1195 (A.D. 1781).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥayy al-qadīr, al-qadīm bi-dhātihi wa-ṣifātih, al-samīʻ al-baṣīr, al-ʻalīm bi-al-juzʼīyāt wa-al-kullīyāt min sāʼir maṣnūʻātih, al-mutakallim bi-kalāmin qadīm, al-faʻʻāl limā yurīdu, lā muʻaqqib li-ḥikmihi wa-irādātih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ilá Mawlāhu Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Nūbī ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Ḍawʼ al-laʼālī fī sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī' ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black; leaf 1 supplied in a later hand.
Binding: In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi al-khāmis ʻashar (al-yawm), min al-thāmin (al-shahr), min al-sittah wa-al-thalāthīn (al-sanah), min al-ḥādī ʻashar [1036 of the Hijrah = 1 May 1627] ʻalá yad muʼallifihi al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah wa-al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, Mawlānā al-Qāḍī Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn al-Marḥūm al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Nūbī al-Shāfiʻī, kāna Allāh la-hu fī al-sirr wa-al-ʻalan, fīmā ẓahara wa-baṭan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M."

Copyist's colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, sādis Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat khamsah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [30 April 1781], ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá, li-Ḥaḍrat al-Jināb al-mukarram Ḥasan Afandī Hayātim Kātib Ṣaghīr Jamalliyān, ʻāmalah Allāh bi-khafī luṭfih."

record.title: 880-02 al-Irshād wa-al-taṭrīz : manuscript / taʼlīf ... ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī al-Yamanī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 736 (A.D. 1335).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallama taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻaqala al-ʻuqūl ʻan idrāk dhātih, wa-abdā lahā mā ḥayyarahā min jalāl jamāl ṣifātih, fa-sabaḥat fī baḥr al-ḥayrah, wa-sabbaḥat al-Malik al-Quddūs alladhī aḥyā bi-dhikrihi qulūb awliyāʼihi, wa-nawwarahā bi-nūr maʻrifatihi, wa-gharasa fī riyāḍ arḍihā ashjār al-ashjān, fa-athmarat ḥabba maḥabbatihi ..."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Irshād wa-al-taṭrīz fī faḍl Allāh taʻālá wa-faḍl dhikrihi wa-tilāwat Kitābihi al-ʻazīz, wa-faḍl al-awliyāʼ wa-al-nāsikīn, wa-al-fuqarāʼ wa-al-masākīn, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-muḥaqqiqīn, al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-Rabbānī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī al-Yamanī, raḥimahu Allāh."

On folio 126a: "Hādhā juzʼun fī al-manāqib al-ʻalīyah muḥallā bi-al-ashʻār wa-al-maḥāsin al-raḍīyah fī madḥ al-Muṣṭafá wa-madḥ al-Ṣūfīyah, mushtamil ʻalá al-arbaʻ al-qaṣāʼid al-shajīyah al-mushaʼāt fī al-safrah al-Yamanīyah, wa-ʻalá kalām manthūr muṭarraz bi-manẓūm fīhi qaṣīdatān musammātān Mafākhir al-farīqayn, hudāt al-ṭarīqayn al-Ṣūfīyah al-ʻārifīn wa-al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, wa-qaṣīdah sābiʻah musammāh al-Iʻtirāf bi-al-iflās wa-madḥ jawāhir al-qawm al-nifās, makhtūm bi-īḍāḥ jawāhir al-alfāẓ allatī rubbamā yaqaʻu fīhā inkār wa-iʻtirāḍ, katabahu min naẓmihi al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Karīm, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī al-Shāfiʻī, nazīl al-Ḥaramayn al-Sharīfayn, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-ballaghahu min al-khayr kull maḥbūb, wa-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi wa-āl baytihi wa-dhurrīyātihi wa-al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt. Āmīn. Tamm."

On leaf 155 verso is an autograph ijāzah by the author, dated A.H. 741: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Hādhihi al-ijāzah bi-khaṭṭ al-Shaykh al-muʼallif al-Yāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Samiʻa ʻallaya hādhā al-juzʼ jamāʻah min al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-fuqarāʼ wa-ghayrihim. Wa-qad athbattu asmāʼ baʻḍihim fī hādhā al-mawḍiʻ, wa-li-baʻḍihim fawāt, wa-qad ajaztu riwāyatuhu bi-al-sharṭ al-muʻtabar li-kull man samiʻahu aw shayʼan minhu ʻalayya aw ʻalá man samiʻahu aw shayʼan minhu ʻalayya. Wa-kāna al-samāʻ al-madhkūr fī al-Ḥaram al-Sharīf, tujāha al-Kaʻbah al-Musharrafah. Ṣaḥḥa dhālika wa-thabata. Wa-kataba muʼallifuhu al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuhu, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu, wa-laṭufa bi-hi, bi-tārīkh Salkh Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [25 May 1341]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose. In red leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion and decorative frame.
Several leaves supplied by a later hand.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (folio 124b): "Tamma al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Irshād wa-al-taṭrīz lil-Imām al-Yāfiʻī. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak yawm al-Ithnayn, li-khams ʻashrah laylah min shahr al-Muḥarram (?), aḥad shuhūr sanat 736, sitt wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [12 September 1335] ... ... ..."
Colophon (folio 155b): "Tamma al-juzʼ al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-mannihi wa-tawfīqihi wa-ʻawnihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

record.title: 880-02 Tārīkh Miṣr wa-al-Nīl wa-khabar man malakahā min ibtidāʼ al-zamān : manuscript / lil-ʻAllāmah Nūḥ Afandī al-Ṭahshawārī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bi-ismika Allāhumma, yā man kull shayʼ ʻindahu bi-miqdār, yā man abraza al-siḥnah al-jāmiʻah jawāmiʻ al-āthār, al-munṭawīyah ʻalá badāʼiʻ al-asrār fī ʻilm al-infiṭār, yā man jaʻala afkār al-mulūk mulūk al-afkār, wa-khaṣṣa al-fiṭar al-salīmah bi-natāʼij al-hidāyah wa-bulūgh al-awṭār, fa-kaʼannamā hiya li-ṣafāʼ jawharihā mishkāt anwār ..."
Script: Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "Wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-02 Maqāmāt : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Armanāzī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-adab miftāḥan li-sharḥ al-ṣudūr, wa-anāl dhawīhi ʻawālī al-rutab bi-manāl al-saʻādah wa-al-ḥubūr, fa-Huwa alladhī yulhimu man arād nawābigh al-kalim, wa-ʻallam al-insān fa-lā yastawī man jahila wa-man ʻalim ... Wa-baʻd ... wa-inna al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad al-Armanāzī yaqūlu: Qad waḍaʻtu fī hādhihi al-awrāq min al-alfāẓ mā raqqa wa-rāq, wa-jaʻaltuhā ka-al-maqāmāt, wa-in kānat lā tudhkaru ʻalá al-iṭlāq, wa-wasamtuhā lil-mazīd bi-'al-Maqāmāt al-Armanāzīyah', wa-amlaytuhā ʻalá lisān Kāsib ibn Kassāb kaylā takhluwa min al-intisāb ..."
Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin) has a Muḥammad al-Armanāwī.
Script: Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
On the upper edge: "Maqāmāt al-Armanāzī".
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Maqāmāt al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad al-Armanāzī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-astaghfiru Allāh mimmā awdaʻtuhā, fa-innahā waqāʼiʻ iḍṭurra al-amru ilá dhikrihā." Taḥtahā "Bi-thaman 25."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with "al-Maqālah al-tāsiʻah wa-al-arbaʻūn" (i.e. al-Maqālah al-khamsūn), as follows: "... Wa-sa-yaʻlamu alladhīn ẓalamū ayya munqalabin yanqalibūn. Wa-hunāka yatabayyanu al-rābiḥ wa-al-maghbūn, fa-ayna man samiʻ wa-ittabaʻ, wa-ayna man ʻalá al-khayr jubila wa-ṭubiʻ, qad ṭawat al-kharsāʼ al-aḥāsin wa-ghayyarat minhum al-maḥāsin, wa-baqiyat al-ḥuthālah, wa-fawqa al-lubāb al-nukhālah, fa-hayhāt an yudrika al-ākhir mā adraka al-awwal, idh lam yabqa man sābaqa ilá al-kamāl wa-ʻawwal, dhahaba alladhīna yuʻāshu fī aknāfihim, wa-baqiya alladhīna ḥayātuhum lā tanfaʻ, wa-min aghrab mā qīl 'Ṭabībun yudāwī al-nās wa-huwa ʻalīl."

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān shiʻr Abī Dhuʼayb : manuscript / riwāyat Abī Saʻīd al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Sukkarī wa-sharḥuh.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1309 (A.D. 1892).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
On folio 1a: "Dīwān shiʻr Abī Dhuʼayb, riwāyat Abī Saʻīd al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Sukkarī wa-sharḥuhu, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. M."

On folio 1a: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá waḥdahu. Hādhā al-kitāb bughyat al-ḥabr al-humām, ṣāḥib al-ṭuraf al-ʻArabīyah, al-safīr al-maʻrūf fī Jazīrat al-ʻArab bi-al-Shaykh ʻUmar al-Suwaydī [Landberg, Carlo, 1848-1924], nafaʻa Allāh bi-ʻilmihi, muhdá ilayhi. Wa-katabahu Imām al-ʻilm bi-al-Ḥaramayn, wa-khādimuhu bi-al-Mashriqayn wa-al-Maghribayn, Muḥammad Maḥmūd al-Turkuzī al-Shinqīṭī al-Madanī al-Makkī, luṭifa bi-hi. Niṣf Rajab, sanat 1309 [14 February 1892]."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Saʻīd al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Sukkarī akhbaranā Abū al-Faḍl al-Riyāshī al-ʻAbbās ibn al-Faraj ʻan al-Aṣmaʻī ʻan ʻUmārah ibn Abī Ṭurfah, wa-akhbaranī Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb ʻan Ibn al-Aʻrābī wa-Abī ʻAmr al-Shaybānī wa-Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ʻan ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jumaḥī, qālū: Halaka li-Abī Dhuʼayb ... banūn khamsah fī ʻām wāḥid, aṣābahum al-ṭāʻūn, wa-kānū hājarū ilá Miṣr ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma shiʻr Abī Dhuʼayb al-Hudhalī maʻa sharḥih fī yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq thamāniyat ayyām maḍat min shahr Rajab, sanat 1309, alf wa-thalāthimiʼah wa-tisʻ Hijrīyah [7 February 1892], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-azká al-taḥīyah. M."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-mutaʼammil wa-murshid al-mutaʼahhil : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1153 (A.D. 1740).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Nuzhat al-mutaʼammil wa-murshid al-mutaʼahhil, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-Sharaf al-Munāwī, al-Faqīh al-Muḥaddith, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn, Āmīn."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa min al-māʼ basharan, fa-jaʻalahu nasaban wa-ṣihran ... Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā raʼaytu nasāʼ hādhā al-zamān yatazayyanna bi-zīyi al-fāḥishāt wa-yamshīna fī al-aswāq, wa-hādhā lil-dīn ka-al-muḥāribāt, wa-yakshifna wujūhahunna wa-aydīhinna ʻinda al-nās li-tamīla ilayhinna al-nufūs bi-al-wiswās, wa-yalʻabna fī al-walāʼim maʻa al-shubbān, fa-yastaḥiqqanna bi-dhālika al-ghaḍab min al-Raḥmān, wa-yakhrujna ilá al-ḥammāmāt bi-anwāʻ al-zīnah wa-al-tabkhīr ... fa-aradtu an ubayyina al-ḥāl ... wa-sammaytu hādhā al-kitāb Nuzhat al-mutaʼammil wa-murshid al-mutaʼahhil ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Loose. In paper covered, Type II (with flap); dark brown cover on the spine of the cover and flap. Cover deteriorated exposing manuscript waste.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi nahār al-Khamīs al-mubārak, ākhir shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, min shuhūr sanat 1153 [26 May 1740] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Tamm."

After the colophon a poem in nineteen verses on the characteristics of women for those wishing to marry. Starts with: "Wa-khayru al-nisā lil-rāghibīn jamīlatun // wadūdun walūdun khayr naʻtin wa-manbiti ..." and ends with: "... Ṣalātan wa-taslīman yadūmān dāʼiman // bi-ghayri inqiḍāʼin laḥẓatan baʻda laḥẓati."

record.title: 880-03 al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī tārīkh al-Balad al-Amīn : manuscript. Al-Rubʻ al-thālith [wa-]al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ / taʼlīf ... Muḥammad ibn ... Aḥmad ... al-Fāsī.
record.note: Volume III copied in A.H. 867 (A.D. 1463); volume IV in modern (19th century) hand.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume III: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Ḥarf al-ʻAyn. ʻĀbis mawlá Ḥuwayṭib ibn ʻAbd al-ʻUzzá, qīla innahu min al-sābiqīn mimman ʻudhdhiba fī Allāh, dhakarahu hākadhā al-Dhahabī, wa-dhakarahu al-Kāshighrī, wa-qāla ruwiya ʻan Ibn al-Kalbī anna Allāh anzala qawlahu Min al-nāsi man yashrī nafsahu ibtighāʼa marḍāt Allāh, fīhi wa-fī jamāʻatin lammā ʻadhdhabahum al-Mushrikūn ʻinda Islāmihim ..."

Incipit of volume IV: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Ḥarf al-Ghayn. Ghālib ibn ʻĪsá ibn Abī Yūsuf al-Anṣārī Abū al-Tammām al-Andalusī, kataba ʻanhu al-Salafī anbaʼanā li-Abī al-ʻAlāʼ al-Maʻarrī ʻanhu fī al-Maḥrūsah sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-arbaʻimiʼah, wa-dhakara annahu jāwara bi-Makkah sinīn kathīrah baʻda an jāwaza al-sittīn ..."
Script: Volume III: fair naskhī, in red and black. Volume IV: modern calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Volume III: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion. Binding deteriorated.
Binding: Volume IV: In modern library binding.
Volumes I and II wanting.

On folio 1a of volume III the following endowment statement: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Waqafa Mawlānā al-Maqām al-Sharīf al-Sulṭān al-Malik al-Ashraf Abū al-Naṣr Qāyitbāy, ʻazza naṣruhu, hādhā al-juzʼ al-mubārak, wa-mā qablahu wa-mā baʻdahu, min al-ʻIqd al-thamīn, waqfan ṣaḥīḥan sharʻīyan, ʻalá ṭalabat al-ʻilm al-sharīf, li-yantafiʻū bi-hi, wa-jaʻala maqarrahu bi-Madrasatihi allatī anshaʼahā bi-al-Ṣaḥrāʼ, wa-sharaṭ an lā yakhruja min al-Madrasah al-madhkūrah illā bi-rahnin yūthaqu bi-hi, Fa-man baddalahu baʻda mā samiʻahu fa-innamā ithmuhu ʻalá alladhīna yubaddilūnahu. Inna Allāha samīʻun ʻalīm. Qad shuhida bi-tārīkh al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thalāth wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [15 September 1488]. Shahid ʻalá Mawlānā al-Maqām al-Sharīf bi-dhālika Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Mālikī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi. Shahid ʻalá Mawlānā al-Maqām al-Sharīf ʻAbd al-Razzāq ibn Aḥmad al-Baqlī. Shahid ʻalá al-Maqām al-Sharīf bi-dhālika Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Fayyūmī al-Azharī. Shahida ʻalá al-Maqām al-Sharīf bi-dhālika Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥusaynī al-Aḥmadī."
The endowment statement "Waqf" is written at the head of some leaves of volume III: "Waqf al-Malik al-Ashraf Qāyitbāy [Qāʼit Bāy, Sultan of Egypt and Syria, -1496]."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon of volume III: "Tamma al-Juzʼ al-thālith min Kitāb al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī tārīkh al-Balad al-Amīn, taʼlīf al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥāfiẓ al-muʼarrikh, qāḍī al-Muslimīn, Taqī al-Dīn, Abī al-Ṭayyib Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, aqḍá al-quḍāh, Shihāb al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥasanī al-Fāsī al-Makkī al-Mālikī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān. Āmīn. Fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, sādis ʻashar Rajab al-fard, sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamāni miʼah [15 April 1463]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-āli Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman. Ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl." On the left side of the colophon: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan bi-aṣlihi ḥasba al-ṭāqah fa-ṣaḥḥa in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá."

Colophon of volume IV: "Najaza al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ, wa-bi-tamāmihi tamma Kitāb al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī tārīkh al-Balad al-Amīn, taʼlīf al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥāfiẓ al-muʼarrikh, qāḍī al-Muslimīn, Taqī al-Dīn Abī al-Ṭayyib Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah aqḍá al-quḍāh, Shihāb al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥasanī al-Fāsī al-Makkī al-Mālikī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān. Āmīn. Fī yawm al-Jumʻah, thānī Shaʻbān, sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamāni miʼah [1 May 1463], wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá niʻamih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-āli Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman."

At the end of the colophon of volume IV the following "Ijāzah": "Samiʻa min lafẓī jamīʻ hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa muqābal maʻī bi-nuskhatī allatī naqaltuhā min nuskhat al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, Walad Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá, fī sittah wa-khamsīn majlisan, awwaluhā yawm al-Sabt, thālith Shaʻbān, wa-ākhiruhā yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ ḥādī ʻashar Shawwāl, kull dhālika min sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamāni miʼah [2 May 1463-8 July 1463], bi-ziyādat Dār al-Nadwah min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām, wa-akhbartuhu bi-riwāyatī li-hādhā al-kitāb ʻan muʼallifihi, ijāzata mushāfahah, wa-akhbartu la-hu riwāyatahu, wa-jamīʻ mā yajūzu riwāyatuhu, wa-talaffaẓtu la-hu bi-dhālika. Wa-kataba Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Fahd al-Qāsimī al-Makkī al-Umawī, alhamahu Allāh rushdahu wa-anjaḥa qaṣdahu. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-03 Mujmal al-lughah : manuscript / li-Aḥmad ibn Fāris al-Qazwīnī.
record.note: Copied in the 12th century.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit. The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... al-Uḥāḥ al-ʻaṭash, wa-al-uḥāḥ al-ghayẓ, wa-Uḥayḥah ism jabal. Wa-yuqāl fī ḥikāyat al-suʻāl aḥḥa aḥḥan, qāla Yakādu min tanaḥnuḥin wa-aḥḥin. al-Akh maʻrūf, wa-huwa mukhaffaf, wa-min al-ʻArab man yuthaqqiluhu, wa-al-ukhaykhah daqīq yuḍrabu bi-hi al-laban wa-yuʼkalu. Wa-yuqālu inna akh kalimah tuqālu ʻinda al-kurh lil-shayʼ, wa-anshada: Wa-kāna waṣlu al-ghāniyāti akhan. al-Udd al-qūwah, wa-huwa al-ādu ayḍan, wa-al-idd al-amr al-ʻaẓīm. Qāla Allāh, jalla wa-ʻazza: Laqad jiʼtum shayʼan iddan ..."
The title as given is found in the heading of each letter; Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, has: al-Mujmal fī al-lughah.
Other volume(s) wanting.
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, fully vocalized.
Binding: Modern library binding.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly as follows: "... wa-al-ṣarm al-ṭāʼifah min al-qawm yanzilūna bi-ibilihim nāḥiyatan min al-māʼ, fa-hum ahl ṣarm, wa-al-sayf al-ṣārim al-māḍī, wa-al-rajul mithluhu, nāqah muṣarramah ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Kitāb Marāḥ al-arwāḥ : manuscript / lil-ʻAynī.
record.note: If the colophon is original, and not copied from another manuscript, this is the author's autograph, written in A.H. 783 (A.D. 1381).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
At the head of folio 1a (in a different hand): "Sharḥ al-Marāḥ fī al-ṣarf lil-ʻAynī."

Incipit. The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... lil-nakirah, naḥwa marartu bi-rajulin ḍaraba wa-ḍāribin, wa-ʻalá al-fatḥ li-annahu akh al-sukūn, li-anna al-fatḥah juzʼ al-alif. Aqūlu lammā faragha min bayān abwāb al-afʻāl wa-al-mulḥaqāt wa-ghayrihā sharaʻa fī bayān abniyat kull wāḥid minhā. Tamm. al-Faṣl maṣdar, lākinnahu juʻila hāhunā bi-maʻná ism al-fāʻil, aʻnī al-fāṣil wa-al-fāriq, yuqālu faṣaltu bayna al-shayʼayn idhā farraqtu baynahumā, wa-fī al-iṣṭilāḥ al-faṣl huwa al-ḥājiz bayna al-ḥukmayn ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 52.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-qad faraghtu min taswīdihi wa-tanmīqihi bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-tawfīqihi fī al-ʻishr al-awwal min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [June 1381] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah al-Muṣṭafawīyah, wa-anā ibn iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn sanah, mubtadiʼan ʻinda kamāl al-ʻishrīn fī hādhā al-ṭarīq, mutawakkilan ʻalá Allāh, wa-hādhihi azminat al-tawfīq, fa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yajmaʻanā bi-al-khayr wa-al-saʻādah, wa-yaḥshuranā fī zumrat al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-ṣāliḥīn Yawm al-Qiyāmah, bi-maḥrūsat ʻUrbān ḥamāhā Allāh taʻālá min al-āfāt wa-al-ʻāhāt, innahu khayr madʻū wa-akram masʼūl wa-ajdar bi-al-nawl wa-al-qabūl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣallá [Allāh] ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-salāmuhu. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl ... Āmīn."
On folio 81b: An ownership statement: "Wa-qad salaka hādhā al-kitāb ʻan yad al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-naḥīf ʻUthmān ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh lahumā."
On folio 82b: An ownership statement: "Malakahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Mukhallalātī."

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Naqāʼiḍ : manuscript / Abū ʻUbaydah ... Maʻmar ibn al-Muthanná al-Taymī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū ʻUbaydah, wa-ismuhu Maʻmar ibn al-Muthanná al-Taymī man (?) Kāna al-sabab alladhī hāja al-tahājī bana Jarīr ibn ʻAṣīyah [ʻAṭīyah] ibn Ḥudhayfah al-Khaṭafá, wa-luqqiba bi-al-Khaṭafá li-qawlihi fī urjūzatin la-hu: Kallafanī qalbī wa-mādhā kallafā // Hawāzinīyātin ḥalalna Gharnafā ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Naqāʼiḍ ʻan Abī ʻUbaydah bi-akhbārihi wa-tafsīrihi, wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, 21 Rabīʻ Awwal, sanat 1297 sabʻah wa-tisʻīn [wa-miʼatayn wa-alf] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [3 March 1880], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-Mutaʻāl fī madḥ al-niʻāl : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Aḥmad al-Maqqarī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1297 (A.D. 1880).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām ... Sayyidī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maqqarī al-Mālikī al-Tilimsānī al-aṣl wa-al-mawlid, al-Fāsī al-dār, nazīl al-Qāhirah al-maḥrūsah ... Naḥmaduka Allāhumma an jaʻaltanā min ummat khayr man labisa al-naʻlayn, wa-samā ʻalá ahl al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ al-aʻlayn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ... Hādhā Kitāb Fatḥ al-Mutaʻāl ḍammantuhu wa-ṣf al-niʻāl ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black, with diagrams.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated with dagrams.

Author's colophon: "Qāla hādhā wa-katabahu bi-khaṭṭihi ... Muʼllifuhu al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maqqarī al-Maghribī al-Mālikī ... fī yawm al-Thulāth, muntaṣaf Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thalāth wa-thalāthīn wa-alf [2 July 1624] bi-Ṭaybah al-Munawwarah ... Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, ghāyat Ramaḍān, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn 97 sabʻah wa-tisʻīn [2 September 1880], ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-mutawakkil ʻalá Rabbihi, al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qammāsh al-Mālikī al-Ushmūnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man kāna sababan fī nasākhat hādhā al-kitāb, wa-li-man qaraʼa wa-ṣallaḥa khalalan, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, [wa-al-muʼminīn] wa-al-muʼmināt. Āmīn Āmīn Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamm."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣiḥāḥ : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn wa-al-hidāyah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh shukran ʻalá nawālih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammadin wa-ālih. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī qad awdaʻtu fī hādhā al-kitāb mā ṣaḥḥa ʻindī min hādhihi al-lughah allatī sharrafa Allāh manzilatahā, wa-jaʻala ʻilm al-dīn wa-al-dunyā manūṭan bi-maʻrifatihā, ʻalá tartībin lam usbaq ilayhi, wa-tahdhībin lam ughlab ʻalayhi, fī thamāniyatin wa-ʻishrīn bāban, wa-kull bāb minhā thamāniyah wa-ʻishrūn faṣlan, ʻalá ʻadad ḥurūf al-muʻjam, wa-tarattubuhā an lā yuhmala min al-abwāb jinsun min al-fuṣūl ..."
On leaf 1 recto is an autograph ex-libris by Quṭb al-Dīn Maḥmūd ibn Masʻūd al-Shīrāzī (cf. Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, S II, p. 296).
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, fully vocalized. Leaves 4-5, 175-76 supplied by a later hand, and leaf 1 restored by the same hand.
Binding: Loose. In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark red leather on the spine of cover and flap.

Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal min al-Ṣiḥāḥ lil-Jawharī bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣiḥāḥ : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī.
record.note: Incipit. The beginning is missing. Text starts in the middle of the root "qarafa", as sollows: "... mithl maqrif al-ṣamghah wa-huwa mawḍiʻ al-qarf ay al-qishr, wa-huwa shabīh bi-qawlihim tarakahu ʻalá mithl laylat al-ṣadr, wa-fulānun yaqrifu li-ʻiyālihi ay yaktasib, wa-al-iqrāf al-iktisāb, qaraftuhu bi-al-shayʼ fa-iqtarafa bi-hi, qāla al-Aṣmaʻī baʻīrun muqtaraf ay mushtará ḥadīthan, wa-al-qaraf bi-al-taḥrīk mudānāt al-maraḍ, yuqālu akhshá ʻalyka al-qaraf ..."
Script: Fairly old (16th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Nayala. Nāla khayran yanālu naylan ay aṣāba, wa-aṣluhu nayala yanyalu, mithl taʻiba yatʻabu, wa-anālahu ghayruhu, wa-al-amr fīhi nal, bi-fatḥ al-nūn, wa-idhā akhbarta ʻan nafisika kasaratahu, wa-al-Nīl, bi-al-kasr, fayḍu Miṣr, wa-Nāyilah ism imraʼah, wa-Nāyilah ism ṣanam li-Quraysh. Faṣl al-Wāw. Wa-ʼala, al-Mawʼil al-maljaʼ, wa-kadhālika al-Mawʼalah, mithāl ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣiḥāḥ : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 677 (A.D. 1278). Leaves 103-138 in a modern (19th century) hand.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
At the head of folio 1a: "al-Mujallad al-rābiʻ min al-Ṣiḥāḥ lil-Jawharī."
At the head of the incipit: "... bi-sihāmin, wa-Yalyal mawḍiʻ, qāla Jarīr: Naẓarat ilayka bi-mithli ʻaynay mughzilin // qaṭaʻat ḥabāʼilahā bi-aʻlá Yalyali."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Aʻin. Bāb al-Mīm min Kitāb al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah. Faṣl al-Alif. Atama. al-Atūm al-mufḍāh, wa-aṣluhu fī al-siqāʼ tanfatiqu kharzatān fa-taṣīrān wāḥidah. Wa-qāla: Yā ibna nakhāsiyatin atūmi. Wa-al-maʼtam ʻinda al-ʻArab al-nisāʼ tajtamiʻna fī al-khayr wa-al-sharr. Qāla Abū ʻAṭāʼ al-Sindī: ʻAshīyata qāma al-nāʼiḥāt wa-shuqqiqat // juyūbun bi-aydī maʼtamin wa-khudūdu, ay, bi-aydī nisāʼ ..."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, fully vocalized.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); red leather on the spine of the cover and flap.

Colophon: "Tamma Bāb al-Mīm min Kitāb al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Thumma yaʼtī Bāb al-Nūn, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá. Muḥarraran fī salkh Jumādá al-Awwal, min sanat Sabʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-sittimiʼah [26 October 1278]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣiḥāḥ : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī.
record.note: The second part copied in A.H. 531 (A.D. 1137), the first probably some time later.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Ḥāʼ min Kitāb al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah Faṣl al-Alif. Aḥaḥa. Aḥḥa al-rajulu yaʼuḥḥu aḥḥaan saʻala, qāla al-rājiz Yakādu min tanaḥnuḥin wa-aḥḥin, wa-al-uḥāḥ bi-al-ḍamma al-ʻaṭash, wa-al-uḥāḥ wa-al-uḥayḥah al-ghayẓ wa-ḥazāzat al-ghamm, wa-Uḥayḥah ibn al-Julāḥ ism rajul, muṣaghghar ..."
On the bottom edge: "Min Ṣiḥāḥ al-Jawharī kutibat fī sanat iḥdá wa-thalāthīn wa-khamsimiʼah min al-Hijrah [1136/1137]."
On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-thānī min al-Ṣiḥāḥ lil-Imām Abī Naṣr [Ismāʻīl] ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."

On folio 326b: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-sādis ʻashar min al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah lil-Jawharī, min qismat ʻishrīn. Yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh, fī alladhī yalīhi Faṣl al-Sīn min Bāb al-Nūn 'snana'. Furigha min naskhihi li-tisʻ baqīna min Rajab, sanat iḥdá wa-thalāthīn wa-khamsimiʼah [21 April 1137]."
Script: Two good naskhī hands, the second in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.
Colophon: (folio 326b): "Furigha min naskhihi li-tisʻ baqīna min Rajab, sanat iḥdá wa-thalāthīn wa-khamsimiʼah [21 April 1137]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣiḥāḥ : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 553 (A.D. 1158).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (al-Juzʼ 6). The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... wa-al-taqarrush ... wa-taqarrashū ay tajammaʻū wa-al-qarsh ... ʻan Abī ʻUbayd wa-al-muqarrashah al-sanah al-maḥl wa-taqārashat al-rimāḥ ay tadākhalat fī al-ḥarb, wa-aqrasha iqrāshan ay saʻá wa-waqaʻa fīhi dakkan ..."

Incipit (al-Juzʼ 10). The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... wa-yujmaʻu furqān wa-hādhā al-jamʻ qad yakūnu lahumā jamīʻan, mithl baṭn wa-buṭnān wa-ḥamal wa-ḥumlān, wa-anashada Abū Zayd: Tarfudu baʻda al-ṣaffi fī furqāni, qāla wa-al-ṣaff an tuḥlaba fī maḥlabayn aw thalāthah ..."

Incipit (al-Juzʼ 11): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi maʻūnataka. Faṣl al-Dhāl. Dhaʼala. al-Dhaʼalān al-mshy al-khafīf. Dhaʼalat al-nāqah tadhʼalu dhaʼlan wa-dhaʼalānan. Wa-anshada Abū Zayd: Marrat bi-aʻlá al-Saḥarayni tadhʼalu. Qāla Abū ʻUbayd wa-minhu summiya al-dhiʼbu dhuʼālah, wa-hiya maʻrifah, yuqālu khashsha dhuʼālata bi-al-ḥibālah. Qāla Ibn al-Sikkīt dhaʼlān al-dhiʼb yujmaʻu ʻalá dhaʼālīl bi-al-lām ..."

Incipit (al-Juzʼ 12): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi maʻūnataka. Faṣl al-Jīm. Jathama. Jathama al-ṭāʼir, ay talabbada bi-al-arḍ yajthumu wa-yajthimu juthūman, wa-kadhālika al-insān. Qāla al-rājiz: Idhā al-rijālu jathamū ʻalá al-rukab. Wa-yuqālu rajulun juthamah wa-jaththāmah lil-naʼūm alladhī lā yusāfiru, wa-al-mujaththamah al-maṣbūrah, illā annahā fī al-ṭayr khāṣṣatan wa-al-arānib wa-ashbāh dhālika, tajthumu thumma turmá ḥattá tuqtala, wa-qad nuhiya ʻan dhālika ..."

On folio 1a (al-Juzʼ 11): "al-Juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar min Kitāb Tāj al-lughah wa-ṣiḥāḥ al-ʻArabīyah, taṣnīf al-Shaykh Abī Naṣr Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī al-Fārābī, raḥimahu Allāh, riwāyat al-Shaykh Abī Muḥammad Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad al-Nīsābūrī."

On folio 1a (al-Juzʼ 12): "al-Juzʼ al-thānī ʻashar min Kitāb Tāj al-lughah wa-ṣiḥāḥ al-ʻArabīyah, taṣnīf al-Shaykh Abī Naṣr Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī al-Fārābī, riwāyat al-Shaykh Abī Muḥammad Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad al-Nīsābūrī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhimā wa-ruḍwānuh."
Script: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, fully vocalized.
Binding: Unbound. Loose leaves.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (al-Juzʼ 6): "Tamma al-Juzʼ al-sādis min Kitāb Tāj al-lughah wa-ṣiḥāḥ al-ʻArabīyah bi-ṭawl Allāh wa-maʻūnatih. Yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh, fī al-juzʼ al-sābiʻ Bāb al-Ṣād 'ajaṣa'. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī al-yawm al-ḥādī ʻashar min Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat thalāth wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah [19 April 1158]. Katabahu mālikuhu li-nafsihi, Mūsá ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Musāfir ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Dūrī al-Shāfiʻī, min nuskhatin bi-khaṭṭ al-Shaykh Abī al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar al-Saʻdī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Qaṭṭāʻ al-Lughawī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-huwa yaḥmudu Allāh, jalla jalāluhu, ʻalá niʻamihi, wa-yuṣallī ʻalá Muḥammad khātim anbiyāʼihi wa-rusulihi, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-yusallimu taslīman."

Colophon (al-Juzʼ 10): "Tamma al-Juzʼ al-ʻāshir min Kitāb Tāj al-lughah wa-ṣiḥāḥ al-ʻArabīyah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-maʻūnatih. Yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh, fī al-juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar Faṣl al-Dhāl, dhaʼala, al-dhuʼlān al-mashī al-khafīf. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-thulāthāʼ, al-khāmis ʻashar min Rajab, sanat thalāth wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah [19 August 1158]. Wa-kataba Mūsá ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Musāfir ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Dūrī al-Shāfiʻī li-nafsihi, min nuskhah bi-khaṭṭ al-Shaykh Abī al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar al-Saʻdī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Qaṭṭāʻ al-Lughawī, raḥimah Allāh, ḥāmidan lillāh, jallat qudratuhu, wa-muṣallīyan ʻalá Muḥammad khātim anbiyāʼihi wa-rusulihi, wa-musalliman ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi taslīman."

Colophon (al-Juzʼ 11): ""Tamma al-Juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻāshir min Kitāb Tāj al-lughah wa-ṣiḥāḥ al-ʻArabīyah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-maʻūnatih. Yatlūhu, in shāʼa Allāh, fī al-thānī ʻashar Faṣl al-Jīm, jathama, jathama al-ṭāʼir. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-thulāthāʼ, al-thālith ʻashar min Shaʻbān, sanat thalāth wa-khamsīn wa-khamsimiʼah [16 September 1158]. Wa-kataba Mūsá ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Dūrī al-Shāfiʻī li-nafsihi, min nuskhah bi-khaṭṭ al-Shaykh Abī al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar al-Saʻdī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Qaṭṭāʻ al-Lughawī, raḥimah Allāh, ḥāmidan lillāh taʻālá, wa-muṣallīyan ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad ṣafwatuhu min khalqihi, wa-musalliman ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi taslīman."

Colophon (al-Juzʼ 12). No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Wanama. Wanīmu al-dhubāb salḥuhu. Wa-anshada al-Aṣmaʻī: Laqad wanama al-dhubāb ʻalayhi ḥattá // kaanna wanīmahu nuqaṭu al-madādi. Wahama. Wahimtu fī al-ḥisāb bi-al-kasr awhamu wahman idhā ghaliṭtu fīhi wa-sahawtu, wa-wahamtu fī al-shayʼ bi-al-fatḥ ahimu wahman idhā dhahaba wahmuka ..."

record.title: Reports of conferences between the administration and missions of the Territory of Papua and New Guinea, 1946-1961 (inclusive) [microform].
record.note: Conference name varies: 1946, Conference between representatives of the Administration and Missions on educational, health, agricultural and other aspects of native welfare and development ; 1949, Conference of the Missions in the Territory and the Administration ; 1952, Conference of the Christian Missions in the Territory and the Administration ; 1959, 1961, Conference between the Missions of the Territory and the Administration.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal-al-rābiʻ : manuscript / Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi Yassir mushkilanā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala li-kull ummah shirʻatan wa-minhājan, wa-khaṣṣa hādhihi al-ummah bi-awḍaḥihā aḥkāman wa-ḥijājan, wa-hadāhum ilá mā ātharahum bi-hi ʻalá man siwāhum min tamhīd al-uṣūl wa-al-furūʻ wa-taḥrīr al-mutūn wa-al-shurūḥ li-yustantaja minhā al-ʻawīṣāt istintājan ... Wa-baʻd, fa-innahu ṭāla mā yakhṭuru lī an atabarraka bi-khidmat shayʼin min kutub al-Faqīh ... Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá al-Nawawī ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Nūr al-wahhāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj [nuskhah Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj] ..."
The title is given as: al-Nūr al-wahhāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj in the incipit of volume I and the correction Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj is written in the margin.
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In brown and red leather, volumes 2-4, Type II (with flap); covers deteriorated.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (volume 1): "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-juzʼ al-mubārak yawm al-Jumʻah, fī shahr Shawwāl, sanat thalāth wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [December/January 1740/1741] baʻda al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá sākinihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Colophon (volume 4): "Tamma al-sharḥ al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, wa-dhālika yawm al-Ithnayn, ghurrat shahr Ramaḍān, sanat sittā [sittah] wa-khamsīn wa-alf wa-miʼah [21 October 1743] baʻda al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyā [al-Nabawīyah], ʻalá musharrifihā al-salām, ʻalá yad al-faqīr, aḥwaj al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat Rabbihi ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Biqāʻī ibn Murād."

record.title: 880-03 Tārīkh madīnat Dimashq : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAsākir.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1095 (A.D. 1684).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Akhbaranā Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Jabbār ibn Muḥammad wa-Abū al-Maʻālī Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl qālā anā Abū Bakr al-Bayhaqī nā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khalīl al-Mālitī Ḥ wa-akhbaranā Abū Bakr al-Qāsim ibn al-Samarqandī anā Abū al-Qāsim ibn Masʻadah anā Ḥamzah ibn Yūsuf qālā anā Abū Aḥmad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAdī al-Ḥāfiẓ qāla samiʻtu Manṣūr ibn Ismāʻīl al-Faqīh wa-Yaḥyá ibn Zakarīyā yaqūlān samiʻnā Abā ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Nasāʼī yaqūlu ..."
Script: Good naskhī, volume 1 in red and black.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (volume 1., page 190a): "Ākhir al-juzʼ al-ʻāshir baʻda al-sittimiʼah min al-farʻ wa-huwa ākhir al-mujallad (?) wa-al-sittīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-juzʼ yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah, tāsiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat khamsah wa-tisʻīn wa-alf [5 April 1684], ʻalá yad kātibihi, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-ghafara la-hu, wa-li-qārīhi, wa-kātibihi, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Colophon (volume 2.): No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... kāna naqsh khātamihi al-qūwah lillāh, akhbaranā Abū al-ʻIzz Aḥmad ibn ʻUbayd Allāh al-Sulamī anabaʼanā Abū Yaʻlá ibn al-Farrāʼ anbaʼanā Abū al-Qāsim Ismāʻīl ibn Saʻīd ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad ibn Muʼayyad al-Muʻaddil anā Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Qāsim ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Maṭlab fī sharḥ al-Wasīṭ. Al-Juzʼ al-ʻāshir : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Rifʻah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālih. Qāla Kitāb Ṣalāt al-ʻĪdayn. Wa-hiya sunnah muwattarah (?) ʻalá man yalzamuhu ḥuḍūr al-Jumʻah, wa-al-aṣl fīhi al-ijmāʻ wa-al-fiʻl al-mutawātir min Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-qawluhu taʻālá Fa-ṣalli li-Rabbika wa-inḥar, qīla arāda bi-hi ṣalāt ʻīd al-naḥr, wa-dhahaba al-Iṣṭakhrī ilá annahā min furūḍ al-kifāyāt, wa-ṭarada dhālika fī jamīʻ al-shaʻāʼir ..."
The title al-Maṭlab lil-Qamūlī is given in the waqf-deed on leaf 1 recto (dated A.H. 797 [A.D. 1395]); Aḥmad al-Qamūlī presumably having completed Ibn al-Rifʻah's unfinished work.
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, II, 133.
For the handwriting cf. Landberg MSS 283.
C. Landberg compared this manuscript with Landberg MSS 283 (al-Qamūlī's al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ, on the same subject) and found the text to be different.
Script: Fair naskhī.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion; cover deteriorated, only the front cover having been preserved.

Colophon: "Ākhir al-juzw al-ʻāshir, yatlūhu fī awwal al-juzʼ baʻdahu, qāla, raḥimahu Allāh Kitāb al-Zakāh. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, wa-ṣalawātuhu wa-salāmuhu al-akmalān al-atammān ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, khayr khalqihi, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tawassuṭ bayna al-Shāfiʻī wa-al-Muzanī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Abī Aḥmad ibn al-Qāṣṣ.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning missing. Text starts with: "... al-taṣarruf wa-ghayyara qablahu fa-fī ittifāq al-jamīʻ ʻalá anna jamīʻ dhālika muḥarram wa-in naṣṣa Allāh ʻazza wa-jalla ʻalá al-qatl ʻulim anna al-naṣṣ ʻalá al-qatl innamā khuṣṣa bi-al-dhikr li-annahu muʻẓam al-maqṣad minhu lā ʻalá ibāḥat ghayrihi, wa-idhā kān dhālika kadhālika dakhala fīhi mā kāna mamlūkan aw ghayr mamlūk bi-ẓāhir al-āyah, wa-qad yathbutu lil-shayʼ ḥurmah tamnaʻu minhu min wajh ..."
For the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 180.
Script: Good 14th century naskhī, wholly unpointed.
Binding: Loose. In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion; cover heavily damaged with many wormholes.

Colophon: "Ākhir Kitāb al-Tawassuṭ alladhī amlāhu bi-Miṣr. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi wa-sallama taslīman. Nuqila min nuskhatin saqīmatin jiddan wa-ʻūriḍa bi-hā."

record.title: 880-02 Ikhtilāf al-Aʼimmah al-arbaʻah wa-ittifāquhum : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Hubayrah.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1291 (A.D. 1874).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn ... Wa-lammā intahá al-tadwīn bi-al-fiqh ʻalá arbaʻah ... wa-li-kull wāḥid min al-ummah ittibāʻ man shāʼ minhum, wa-hum Abū Ḥanīfah, wa-Mālik, wa-al-Shāfiʻī, wa-Aḥmad, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum, raʼaytu an ajʻala mā adhkuruhu min ijmāʻ mushīran bi-hi ilá ijmāʻ hādhihi al-arbaʻah, wa-mā adhkuruhu min khilāf mushīran bi-hi ilá al-khilāf baynahum ..."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Ikhtilāf al-Aʼimmah al-arbaʻah wa-ittifāqihim, lil-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-Wazīr Ibn Hubayrah, taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Wa-yusammá ayḍan Kitāb al-Raḥmah fī ikhtilāf al-Aʼimmah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, wa-kāna dhālika fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, sābiʻ ʻashar shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat sitt wa-khamsīn wa-thamānimiʼah [8 December 1452] min nuskhatin dhakara kātibuhā annahu katabahā fī al-Ḥaram al-Sharīf tujāha al-Kaʻbah al-Musharrafah, fī mustahall Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat iḥdá wa-khamsīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [17 May 1350]. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Arbaʻ al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq thalāthat ʻashar yawman maḍat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1291, wāḥid wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [30 April 1874] min Hijratihi, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad kātibihi afqar al-wará wa-aḥwajihim ilá ghafr al-masāwī, al-Shāfiʻī Yūsuf Razīn al-Dīn al-Nabāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-aḥbābihi, wa-li-man naẓara fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah, wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Muthīr al-gharām li-ziyārat al-Khalīl : manuscript / Abū al-Fidāʼ Isḥāq ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tadmurī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Muthīr al-gharām li-ziyārat al-Khalīl ʻalá Nabīyinā wa-ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-fīhi al-Ṭibb al-Nabawī."
On folio 1a: Two birth statements, dated Sunday, 7 Ramaḍān, 948 (4 January 1542); and Friday 17 Shawwāl, 952 (1 January 1546)
On folio 1b-2a: Table of contents for the 27 chapters of the manuscript.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir wa-Aʻin. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Abū al-Fidāʼ Isḥāq ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad al-Tadmurī al-Shāfiʻī, Khatị̄b Maqām Sayyidinā al-Khalīl, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ... Allāha aḥmadu an jaʻalanā min jīrān Nabīyihi Ibrāhīm al-Khalīl, wa-ʻammanā bi-barakātihi ... Ammā baʻd ... saʼalanī sāʼil ... an ajmaʻa juzʼan laṭīfan min al-tafāsīr allatī yuʻtamadu ʻalayhā wa-al-tawārīkh allatī yurkanu ilayhā ... fī mawlid Sayyidinā Khalīl al-Raḥmān wa-awlādihi al-sādah al-kirām ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, ca. 1500. Leaf 71 supplied in a later hand.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark brown leather on the spine of the cover and the flap.

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā awradnāhu fī hādhā al-maqām, wa-naḥmadu Allāh ʻalá al-itmām wa-nashkuruhu ʻalá mazīd al-inʻām, wa-an yaʻuffa ʻannā bi-karamihi, wa-yasturanā bi-ḥilmihi, innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam."

record.title: Kitāb al-wajīz fī al-fiqh / [al-Ghazzālī]. -- 1114.
record.note: On leaf 230 recto is an ijāzah by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, presumably the author's son; the owner's note under it, implying that the ijāzah is by the author himself, is patently mistaken. Another ijāzah on leaf 230 verso is also dated A.H. 507.
Hasty naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Wajīz. Al-Niṣf al-akhīr : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn al-Bahāʼ al-Baghdādī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 893 (A.D. 1488).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

C. Landberg gave the author's name (from Shadharāt al-dhahab) as Alāʼ al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Baghdādī al-Ḥanbalī, d. A.H. 899, and the title as Fatḥ al-malik al-ʻazīz bi-sharḥ al-Wajīz (confusion with al-Rāfiʻī's commentary; cf. Berlin catalog (Ahlwardt, W. Verzeichniss der arabischen Handschriften der Königlichen Bibliothek zu Berlin), 4470). The explicit gives the author's name, and the date of completion, A.H. 887.
On folio 1a: "Numrah 8. al-Akhīr min Sharḥ al-Wajīz. Aẓunnuhu lil-Zarkashī."
On folio 1a: A plea to "KāKam" the paper protector.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Bāb al-Khulʻ. Yuqālu khalaʻa imraʼatahu khalʻan wa-khālaʻahā wa-ukhtuliʻat minhu fa-hiya khāliʻun, wa-aṣluhu min khalʻ al-thawb, li-anna al-marʼah tankhaliʻu min libās zawjihā. Qāla Allāh taʻālá Hunna libāsun lakum wa-antum libāsun lahunna. Wa-huwa ʻibārah ʻan firāq imraʼatihi bi-ʻiwaḍ, bi-alfāẓin makhṣūṣah, wa-fāʼidatuhu takhlīṣuhā min al-zawj ʻalá wajhin lā rajʻah la-hu ʻalayhā illā bi-riḍāhā ..."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In paper covered cardboard, Type II (with flap); dark brown leather on the spine; cover embossed with central medallion; cover deteriorated; flap missing.
First half wanting.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi nahār al-Khamīs, rābiʻ shahr Shawwāl, min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah [20 September 1488], aḥsana Allāh taqaḍḍīhā, ʻalá yad afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá ʻafw Rabbihi wa-ghufrānih, Mūsá ibn Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Kinānī al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

To the left of the colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu, taqabbala Allāh minhu, wāfaqa al-farāgh yawm al-Jumʻah, ḥādī ʻashar min shahr al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah [11 March 1482], ʻalá yad jāmiʻihi, aḍʻaf ʻibād Allāh, ʻAlī ibn al-Bahāʼ al-Baghdādī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu, wa-ghafara li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-min khaṭṭihi naqaltu."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ishārāt fī maʻrifat al-ziyārāt : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Harawī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1089 (A.D. 1678).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Harawī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqihi Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sharrafa wa-karram. Ammā baʻd, fa-innahu saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān al-ṣāliḥīn wa-al-khillān al-nāṣiḥīn an adhkura mā zurtuhu min al-ziyārāt, wa-mā shāhadtuhu min al-ʻajāʼib wa-al-abniyah wa-al-ʻimārāt, wa-mā raʼaytuhu min al-aṣnām wa-al-āthār wa-al-ṭillasmāt fī al-rabʻ al-maskūn wa-al-quṭr al-maʻmūr ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black. Leaves 41-46 supplied in a modern hand.
Binding: Unbound.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 1 other title: Rawḍat al-sāʼiḥīn fī ziyārāt qubūr al-ṣāliḥīn / Sirāj al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Muballiṭ.
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mimmā manna Allāh taʻālá bi-hi ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr Ḥusayn Aḥmad Ḥusayn Bāshā al-Qaṣabjī al-Shāfiʻī ghufira la-hu."
Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn."

Colophon of "Rawḍat al-sāʼiḥīn fī ziyārāt qubūr al-ṣāliḥīn" (folio 58b): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, khāmis ʻishrīn Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1089 [17 May 1678], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Aḥmad al-Maghribī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-sāʼiḥīn fī ziyārāt qubūr al-ṣāliḥīn : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Sirāj al-Dīn ʻUmar al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Muballiṭ.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1089 (A.D. 1678).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihih al-ṭāhirīn wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān al-muḥibbīn li-ziyārat al-ṣāliḥīn an adhkura la-hu bi-hādhihi al-kurrāsah mā tayassara mimman dufina bi-al-Qarāfatayn, fa-ajabtuhu, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title: al-Ishārāt fī maʻrifat al-ziyārāt / ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Harawī.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Rawḍat al-sāʼiḥīn fī ziyārāt qubūr al-ṣāliḥīn, taʼlīf al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi Sirāj al-Dīn ʻUmar al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Muballiṭ al-Zāʼir, taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn."

Colophon(folio 58b): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, khāmis ʻishrīn Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1089 [17 May 1678], ʻalá yad al-faqīr Aḥmad al-Maghribī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhal al-ṣāfī wa-al-mustawfī baʻda al-Wāfī. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal wa-al-thānī : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Abī al-Maḥāsin Yūsuf ibn ... Taghrībirdī al-Atābikī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-mustaʻān. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mudabbir al-duhūr wa-mudawwir al-aʻmār wa-al-shuhūr, muẓhir āthār qudratihi ʻalá ṣafāyiḥ ṣaḥāʼif al-ayyām, wa-mubdī asrār ḥikmatihi fīmā yajrī min ḥarakāt al-anām, qallabahum fī aṭwārihā duwalan, wa-khālafa baynahum iʻtiqādan wa-qawlan wa-ʻamalan ... Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Manhal al-ṣāfī wa-al-mustawfī baʻda al-Wāfī' ..."
Script: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.

On folio 1a of volume 1: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min al-Manhal al-ṣāfī wa-al-mustawfī baʻda al-Wāfī, bi-al-tamām. Aṣluhu mansūkh min Kutubkhānat al-marḥūm ʻĀrif Ḥikmat Bik bi-al-Madīnah al-Munawwarah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-hādhihi al-nuskhah manqūlah min al-Kutubkhānah al-Khudaywīyah al-Miṣrīyah."

On folio 1a of volume 2: "al-Juzʼ al-thānī min al-Manhal al-ṣāfī wa-al-mustawfī baʻda al-Wāfī, taʼlīf al-Janāb al-ʻālī al-mawlawī al-amīrī al-kabīrī al-aṣīlī al-ʻarīqī al-fāḍilī al-kāmilī al-raʼīsī al-awḥadī al-jamālī Yūsuf ibn al-Maqarr al-marḥūm al-Atābik Taghrī Birdī kāfil al-Mamālik al-Shāmīyah wa-al-Ḥalabīyah, aʻazzahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḥima salafahu. Āmīn."
Colophon of volume 1: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal min al-nuskhah bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl."
Colophon of volume 2: "Fa-qad tamma al-jild al-awwal [al-thānī (?)] bi-ḥamd Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Bassāmah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Malik ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbdūn [sic] al-Ḥaḍramī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1029 (A.D. 1620).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-kātib al-adīb ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbdūn [Badrūn] al-Khaḍramī [al-Ḥaḍramī], raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī afāḍa ʻalá alsinatinā māʼīyat al-bayān, wa-rāḍa lanā jumūḥahu fa-ʻudnāhu salis al-ʻinān, wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá jamīʻ al-umam bi-al-lisān al-ʻArabī alladhī huwa afṣaḥ lisān ..."
On the author see Brockelmann, C. Geschichte der arabischen Litteratur, I, 340; S I, p. 579.

On folio 131b: A reader's note: "Naẓara fī hādhā al-kitāb wa-daʻā li-mālikih bi-ʻulū al-jināb, afqar al-wará li-ʻafw Rabbihi al-Karīm, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Razzāq ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Ḥanafī madhhaban wa-al-Kaylānī nasaban, raḥim Allāh imraʼan daʻā la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi bi-al-maghfirah, innahu ahlan li-dhālika. Fī Rajab al-fard, sanat 1115 [November/December 1703]."
Script: Good naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon (folio 129a): "Tammat al-qaṣīdah bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi baʻda al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn, bi-qalam al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-ʻAlī, ʻabduhu Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn Saʻīd al-Bujaylī (?) al-Uwālī (?) baladan, ghafara Allāh [la-hu] wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-kāffat al-muʼminīn. Wa-kāna dhālika ghurūb nahār yawm al-Sabt muṣbiḥan bi-laylat al-Aḥad, ʻinda adhān al-maghrib, bi-al-yawm al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn, min shahr Rajab al-murjib (?) al-ḥarām, aḥad shuhūr al-sanah al-tāsiʻah wa-al-ʻishrīn baʻda tamām al-alf [26 June 1620], ʻalá muhājirihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir fī qawāʻid al-fiqh wa-ḍawābiṭih : manuscript / taṣnīf ... Tāj al-Dīn Abī Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ... ʻAlī al-Subkī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 816 (A.D. 1413). Leaves 247 verso-275 verso copied (in a different hand) in A.H. 851 (A.D. 1447/1448).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jalla ʻan al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir, wa-dalla ʻalá ṭuruq al-hudá bi-al-aqwāl al-ṣaḥīḥah wa-al-wujūh al-naḍāʼir, wa-ḥalla lanā bi-al-naẓar fī āthār salafinā ʻuqad al-mushkilāt, wa-fī al-dhāhibīn al-awwalīn min al-qurūn lanā baṣāʼir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻulūm wa-in kānat tataʻāẓamu sharafan ... fa-lā marīyata anna al-fiqh wāsiṭat ʻiqdihā wa-rābiṭat ḥallihā wa-ʻaqdihā ..."

On folio 1a: Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir fī qawāʻid al-fiqh wa-ḍawābiṭih, taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-mubarr Shaykh al-Islām Tāj al-Dīn Abī Naṣr ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Shaykh al-Islām khātimat al-mujtahidīn Abī al-Ḥasan Taqī al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Subkī al-Shāfiʻī al-Qāḍī bi-Dimashq wa-al-Khaṭīb bi-Jāmiʻihā ka-wālidihi, taghammadahumā Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih wa-bawwaʼahumā fasīḥ jinānih."
At the head of folio 1a: A plea to "Kākam" the paper protector.

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: 1. "Min niʻam Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr ilayhi Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-ʻArabī (?), ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Sanat 1121 [1709/1710]." 2. "Min niʻam Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr ilayhi Ṣāliḥ ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Munayyir, ghafar Allāh la-hu wa-lil-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah. Āmīn. Fī 16 Jumād al-Awwal, sanat 1221 [1 August 1806]."
On the bottom edge: "al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir li-Ibn al-Subkī."
Script: Hasty naskhī in black and red; leaves 1-5 supplied (with lacuna) by a later hand.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Author's colophon (folio 247a): "Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥimahu Allāh: Najaza al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi, fī al-sābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat thamān wa-sittīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [29 November 1366], ʻalá yad muʼallifihi ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn al-Subkī, wa-kāna najāzuhu bi-Dār al-Khaṭābah bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Umawī bi-Dimashq, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu wa-ʻan sāʼir al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
Colophon (Folio 247b): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, khāmis ʻashar Ṣafar, sanat sittata ʻashar wa-thamānī miʼah [26 May 1413] aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā."
On the right margin of folio 247b: A collation statement: "Balagha muqābalatan wa-taḥrīran ḥasba al-ṭāqah fī sanat 851 [1447/1448]."

record.title: 880-02 Yanābīʻ al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Asfarāyīnī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awjaba ʻalá ʻibādihi anwāʻ al-ʻibādāt wa-aṣnāf al-ṭāʻāt, wa-faraḍ ʻalayhim al-aʻmāl al-ṣāliḥāt, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-al-awqāt al-muʻayyanāt bi-qawlihi Aqīmū al-ṣalāta wa-ātū al-zakāta, wa-ayyāman maʻdūdāt, wa-al-ḥajj ashhur maʻlūmāt, li-nayl al-saʻādāt wa-al-wuṣūl ilá al-kamālāt ..."
Copied in A.H. 1290 (A.D. 1873).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: In dark red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻalá yad kātibihā Khalīl ibn al-marḥūm Ibrāhīm al-ʻAjūz fī yawm al-Arbuʻ al-mubārak, fī sabʻat ayyām khalat min shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1290 [28 November 1873]. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

record.title: 880-02 al-Muʻtaṣar min al-Mukhtaṣar : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Mūsá al-Malaṭī.
record.note: Copied in Aleppo in A.H. 785 (A.D. 1383).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit. The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... wa-ʻan Abū Mūsá al-Ashʻarī qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Inna al-Imām yasjudu qablakum wa-yarfaʻu qablakum fa-tilka bi-tilka, wa-ʻan ʻUmar Idhā rafaʻa aḥadukum raʼsahu wa-al-Imām sājid fa-li-yasjud, fa-idhā rafaʻa al-Imām raʼsahu fa-li-yamkuth qadra mā rafaʻ, wa-ʻan Ibn Masʻūd Lā tubādirū aʼimmatikum bi-al-rukūʻ wa-al-sujūd, wa-idhā rafaʻa aḥadukum raʼsahu qabla al-imām fa-li-yaḍaʻ raʼsahu thumma yamkuth bi-qadri mā rafaʻa qablahu ..."
On leaf 236 verso is an autograph ijāzah by the author, dated in A.H. 785 (A.D. 1383).
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.

At the end of the "Ijāzah" on folio 236 verso: "... muʼallifuhu Yūsuf ibn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī, fī niṣf Shawwāl, sanat khams wa-thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [19 December 1383] ḥāmidan wa-shākiran wa-mustaghfiran wa-muṣalliyan wa-musalliman."
Decoration: Rubricated.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī ʻajuz Rajab al-fard, min shuhūr sanat khams wa-thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [6 October 1383] bi-al-Madrasah ... bi-Ḥalab al-maḥrūsah, ṣānahā Allāh taʻālá maʻa jamīʻ bilād al-Islām. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Ifk wa-Ḥadīth ʻUbādah ibn al-Ṣāmit wa-Ḥadīth al-Isrāʼ : manuscript / li-Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah al-Azdī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 732 (A.D. 1332).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of "Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Ifk" (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah al-Azdī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara bi-muqtaḍá al-Tanzīl man qad ikhtārahu fī azalihi lil-khīrah min barīyatihi, wa-akhmala bi-iqāmat ḥudūdihi ḥāla man dannasa bi-ʻushb ḥawḍ lisānihi thawba man ṭahharathu al-qudrah al-Rabbānīyah ẓāhirah wa-janānah ..."

Incipit of "Sharḥ Ḥadīth ʻUbādah ibn al-Ṣāmit" (folio 31b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa min samāʼ lafẓ khayr barīyatihi shumūsan wa-aqmāran fa-lā muḥāqa fīhā wa-lā ufūl, fa-nawwar bihā arḍ qulūb man iṣṭafāhā li-atbāʻihi wa-jalāhā ..."

Incipit of "Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Isrāʼ" (folio 60b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara min sirr qudratihi bi-kharq ʻādātihi fī khalqihi bi-mashy Khātimi Rasūlihi [Rusulihi] bi-ḥaqīqat dhātihi kamā naṣṣa ʻalayhi bi-ṣādiq lafẓihi man kharaq sabʻ samāwātihi wa-mā shāʼ min ḥujub qudratihi ..."
Script: Good naskhī.
Binding: In maroon leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap with gilded frame and embossed embossed decorations.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Ḥadīth al-Ifk bi-sharḥihi taʼlīf al-Shaykh Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah al-Azdī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu."
At the head of folio 1a: "Majmūʻah. Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Ifk li-Ibn Abī Jamrah. Wa-Sharḥ Ḥadīth ʻUbādah ibn al-Ṣāmit li-Ibn Abī Jamrah. Wa-Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Isrāʼ li-Ibn Abī Jamrah."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: 1. "Tamallakahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá Ismāʻīl al-Nabulusī al-Ḥanafī fī tāsiʻ ʻishrīn shahr Shawwāl, sanat 1053 [10 January 1644]. 2. "al-Ḥamdu wa-al-minnah lillāh. Dakhala fī milk al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ... ghafara Allāh taʻālá lahum. Āmīn." And two illegible stamps of ʻAbd al-Wahhāb (?).

Colophon of "Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Ifk" (folio 30a): "Kamula Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Ifk, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, wa-dhālika bi-muwāfaqat yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, al-ʻāshir min shahr Rajab al-aṣamm, sanat ithnayn wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻi miʼah [15 April 1332], raḥima Allāh li-man daʻā li-kātibihi bi-al-luṭf wa-al-iqālah wa-al-ʻāfiyah min miḥan al-dārayn, wa-razaqahu ladhdhat al-ṭāʻah wa-taqabbalahā minhu, wa-kadhālika yafʻalu li-man daʻā la-hu wa-āmana. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdihi, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn." Under the colophon a collation statement (in Maghribī script): "Balaghat al-muqābalah min nuskhat muʼallifihi, raḥimahu Allāh wa-nafaʻa bi-hi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi [wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam]."

Colophon of Sharḥ Ḥadīth ʻUbādah ibn al-Ṣāmit (folio 59a): "Faragha min naskhihi aqall al-ʻabīd al-faqīr al-miskīn al-muʻtarif bi-al-taqṣīr, Ṣāliḥ ibn Ayyūb ibn Ṣāliḥ, aṣlaḥa Allāh taʻālá la-hu shaʼnahu wa-sāʼir al-Muslimīn, wa-ghafara li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-tawfīq limā yarḍá, wa-dhālika yawm al-Khamīs, sādis ʻishrīn Rajab, sanat ithnayn wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [1 May 1332]."

Colophon of Sharḥ Ḥadīth al-Isrāʼ (folio 103a): "Wa-faragha min naskhihi al-faqīr al-miskīn al-muḍṭarr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Karīm, aqall al-ʻabīd, Ṣāliḥ ibn Ayyūb ibn Ṣāliḥ, ghafara Allāh li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-tawfīq lil-ṭāʻah, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Bi-tārīkh yawm al-Ithnayn al-ḥādī ʻashar min shahr Shawwāl, sanat ithnayn wa-thalāthīn wa-sabʻimiʼah [14 July 1332]." On the left margin of the colophon a collation statement: "Qūbila ʻalá nuskhat al-muʼallif, raḥimahu Allāh wa-nafaʻa bi-hi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi."

On the bottom margin of folio 103a: A reader's statement: "Anhāhu qirāʼatan ... ... ... fī al-Jāmiʻ al-Umawī, fī arbaʻ (?) majālis, ākhiruhum nahār ... ... ... shahr Rajab, sanat thalāthah wa-tisʻ (?) ... al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Qadīr ... ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī al-Dimashqī al-Muḥaddith, al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Kayyālī, laṭufa Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-al-Muslimīn."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī gharīb al-lughah : manuscript / li-Ibn al-Anbārī.
record.note: Copied in 1744.
Title given in incipit as: al-Gharīb min al-lughah.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim al-Anbārī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī al-Gharīb min al-lughah: Yā muddaʻī ʻilma al-gharībi wa-al-qarīḍi wa-al-mathal. Qāla Abū ʻUbayd: al-Qarīḍ huwa al-qaṣīd min al-shiʻr khāṣṣatan dūna al-rajaz. ʻAjjil jawābī mā al-qarīḥu wa-al-shaqīḥu wa-al-alal. al-Qarīḥ al-malīḥ wa-qīla al-ʻajīb, wa-al-shaqīḥ al-qabīḥ, wa-al-alal al-barīq ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
On folio 1a: "Risālah fī gharīb al-lughah li-Ibn al-Anbārī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-yalīhā risālah ukhrá Bāb fīmā yuktabu bi-al-Ḍād wa-al-Ẓāʼ."
With: 1 other title: Bāb maʻrifat mā yuktabu bi-al-Ḍād wa-al-Ẓāʼ.

Text ends with: "... Wa-mā al-qulīnu wa-al-barīnu wa-al-tabīnu wa-al-shughul. al-Qulīn jamʻ qullah, wa-huwa ʻūdun yalʻabu bi-hi al-ṣibyān, wa-al-barīn jamʻu burrah, wa-hiya khashabah takūnu fī anf al-baʻīr, wa-al-tabīn jamʻ tabān, wa-al-shughul al-mashghūl."
Colophon: "Tamma wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá ʻammā yaṣifūn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M."

record.title: 880-03 Maʻrifat mā yuktabu bi-al-Ḍād wa-al-Ẓāʼ maʻan wa-al-farq baynahumā fī al-khaṭṭ wa-al-hijāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim Saʻd ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Zanjānī.
record.note: Copied in A.H. 1157 (A.D. 1744).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻĀlim al-zāhid Abū al-Qāsim Saʻd ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Rayḥānī (?), raḥimahu Allāh: Hādhā Bāb maʻrifat mā yuktabu bi-al-Ḍād wa-al-Ẓāʼ maʻan wa-al-farq baynahumā fī al-khaṭṭ wa-al-hijāʼ idhā kānā ʻalá bināʼin wāḥid wa-ṣūratin wāḥidah fī al-lafẓ wa-li-kull wāḥid minhumā maʻnan yukhālifu maʻná ṣāḥibihi fī kalām al-ʻArab, wa-kānā yashtabihān ʻalá man lā yaʻlamu fa-yaẓunnuhuma li-maʻnan wāḥid fa-lā yufarriqu baynahumā wa-yaḍaʻuhumā fī ghayr mawḍiʻihimā ..."
Script: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Binding: Modern library binding.
Decoration: Rubricated.
With: 1 other title: Risālah fī gharīb al-lughah / Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim ibn al-Anbārī.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb fī ṣadr nahār al-Ithnayn min shahr Shawwāl, sanat sabʻah wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [9 November 1744]."

record.title: 880-02 Kifāyat al-nabīh fī sharḥ al-Tanbīh. Al-Juzʼ al-thānī wa-al-rābiʻ : manuscript / taʼlīf ... Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ... al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Copied in Cairo in A.H. 705-706 (A.D. 1305-1307).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume II: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir Yā Karīm, innaka ʻalá kull shayʼin qadīr. Bāb al-Sharṭ fī al-ṭalāq. Man ṣaḥḥa minhu al-ṭalāq ay bi-ṭalāq al-istiqlāl ṣaḥḥa minhu an yuʻalliqa al-ṭalāq ay alladhī yamlikuhu ʻalá sharṭ, wa-man lam yaṣiḥḥ minhu al-ṭalāq lam yaṣiḥḥ an yuʻalliqa al-ṭalāq ʻalá sharṭ, wa-idhā ʻallaqa al-ṭalāq ʻalá sharṭ waqaʻa ʻinda wujūd al-sharṭ ay istimrār al-zawjīyah wa-lā yaqaʻu qabla wujūdih ..."

Incipit of volume IV: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma Yassir Yā Karīm wa-tammim bi-khayr. Bāb fī al-yamīn wa-al-daʻāwá. Idhā iddaʻá (?) rajulun (?) ʻalá rajulin ḥaqqan fa-ankara al-muddaʻá ʻalayhi wa-lam yakun lil-muddaʻī bayyinah, fa-in kāna dhālika (?) fī ghayr al-dam, ḥalafa al-muddaʻá ʻalayhi limā ruwiya. Abū Dāwūd ... ... ... wa-huwa ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Abī Mulaykah qāla kataba ilá Ibn ʻAbbās anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qaḍá bi-al-yamīn ʻalá al-muddaʻá ʻalayhi, wa-akhrajahu al-Bukhārī wa-Muslim ..."

On folio 1a of volume II: "al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Kitāb al-Nikāḥ min Kitāb Kifāyat al-nabīh fī sharḥ al-Tanbīh, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Rifʻah al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, aḥsana Allāh ʻuqbāh wa-amtaʻa al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl baqāh."

On folio 1a of volume II: A collation statement: "Qūbila hādhā al-juzʼ bi-kāmilihi ʻalá nuskhat al-muṣannif bi-khaṭṭihi bi-yadihi ḥasba al-ṭāqah wa-al-imkān fa-ṣaḥḥa, wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah wa-al-shukr ʻalá dhālika, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ mā asbagha min niʻamihi wa-minanihi ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamahu wa-yukāfī mazīdahu. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran wa-bāṭinan wa-ẓāhiran."

On folio 1a of volume IV: "al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ min al-Jināyāt, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah, farīd dahrihi wa-waḥīd ʻaṣrihi, Najm al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Rifʻah, amtaʻa Allāh bi-ṭūl baqāʼihi bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi."
