Colophon: "Min kitābat al-faqīr ... Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ḥanafī ... wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī yawm al-Khamīs thānī shahr al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat thamān wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah ... balagha muqābalatan ʻalá nuskhat muʼallifihi ..."

Translation of the colophon: "In the handwriting of the poor ... Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ḥanafī ... the copy was completed on Thursday, the second day of the sacred month of al-Ḥijjah, of the year 888 [of the Hijrah = 10 January 1484] ... collated with the copy of its author."

record.title: 880-03 al-Iqtiṣād fī al-iʻtiqād / ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Jammāʻīlī. -- 1515.
record.note: Principles of faith.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-kamāl wa-al-baqāʼ wa-al-ʻizz wa-al-kibriyāʼ ..."
Fair naskhī.

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh laylat al-Aḥad, ʻishā al-ākhirah, rābiʻat Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, ʻalá yad ... Mūsá ibn Aḥmad ibn Mūsá ibn Sālim ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sālim al-Ḥamāwī al-Maqdisī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Shudhūr al-dhahab / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām. -- [15--?].
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Beginning missing.
Compared with the matn in Salisbury MSS 11 (beginning of leaf 1 recto corresponds to leaf 13 verso); cf. also the list of chapter headings in Berlin catalog 6733.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-nāẓirīn fī taʼrīkh man waliya Miṣr min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-salāṭīn / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Karmī. -- 1845.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ... Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-bāqī wa-kull man ʻalayhā fānin ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-tārīkh yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak [no month given!], sanat iḥdá wa-sittīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf ... bi-qalam ... Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Yaḥyá ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Yūsuf wālid al-Shaykh Marʻī al-muʼallif li-hādhā al-kitāb ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this history was completed on blessed Tuesday [no month given!], of the year 1261 [of the Hijrah = 1845] ... by the pen of ... Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Yaḥyá ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Yūsuf, father of al-Shaykh Marʻī, the author of this book ..."

record.title: Jawāhir al-alfāẓ / Muḥammad Fakhr al-Dīn Aḥmad. -- 1489.
record.note: Good Persian taʻlīq, in black, blue, and gold; ʻunwān in gold and blue on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, velvet covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: Haft wādī / Farīd al-Dīn ʻAṭṭār. -- 1489.
record.note: Wrongly entitled as: Intikhāb Manṭiq al-ṭayr.
Good nastaʻlīq, in black, blue, and gold; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 85 vreso.
Islamic binding, velvet covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān al-Shaykh al-ʻAydarūs. -- [15--?].
record.note: Calligraphic Yemenite naskhī, fairly old (16th century?), in red, green, and black.
The original hand covers leaves 1-34 only, the rest in several later hands, only part of the text apparently belonging to al-ʻAydarūs.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah ilá Hārūn al-Rashīd / Mālik ibn Anas. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥaddathanā al-Shaykh Abū al-Ḥasan Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Tarjumān shaykh al-Ṣūfīyah Shaʼāman wa-Ḥijāzan ..."
Modern (19th century) naskhī, in black and blue.

record.title: 880-02 Ijāzah / Sulaymān ibn al-sayyid Aḥmad al-Būraqrī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Holograph.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā yuʻrafu kunhuhu bi-al-afkār ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad istajāza minnī ... al-Sayyid ʻUmar ibn Ḥasan al-ʻAlāʼī, wa-huwa qaraʼa ʻalayya farāʼiḍ ..."
Modern (19th century) nastaʻlīq.
Signed at end: al-Ḥaqīr al-faqīr al-Sayyid Sulaymān ibn al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Būraqrī (?).

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawḍ al-ḥayāh / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-ʻĀmidī al-Samarqandī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Title given on leaf 1 also as: Kitāb kashf ḍamīr madīnat al-ikhtibār bi-mafātīḥ aqfāl al-asrār and Ṭibb al-insān min nafsih.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, al-munazzih ʻan dhawāt al-andād dhātahu ..."
Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb kashf ḍamīr madīnat al-ikhtibār bi-mafātīḥ aqfāl al-asrār wa-yusammá ayḍan Ḥawḍ al-ḥayāh, wa-yusammá ayḍan Ṭibb al-insān min nafsih, wa-Allāh aʻlam."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah fī asmāʼ al-Nabī. -- [18--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma Ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-fātiḥ limā ughliq wa-al-khātim limā sabaq ... qāla ... Mālik ibn Anas ... asmāʼ al-Nabī ... al-asmāʼ jamʻ ism ..."
Coarse modern (19th century) Maghribī hand.

record.title: 880-02 Sulwān al-muṭāʻ fī ʻudwān al-atbāʻ / Muḥammad ibn Abī Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ẓafar. -- [14--?].
record.note: For the varying incipits of the two recensions cf. Gotha catalog 2688-89; Berlin catalog 8750-51 is of the 2d recension.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Muḥammad ibn Abī Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ẓafar ... Inna shukra Allāh, subḥānuhu, la-asná al-malābis al-fākhirah ..."
Old (15th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Mafātīḥ al-uṣūl / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭabāṭabāʼī. -- 1825.
record.note: The title, as above, is written on the front-edges and on label pasted on spine.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Bāb mafātīḥ al-kitāb. Qāla Allāh, tabāraka wa-taʻālá: Mā arsalnā min rasūlin illā bi-lisāni qawmih ..."
Fair Persian naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in black.

Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh ... wa-ʻalá yad aqall al-khalīqah ibn marḥamat Panāhi Muḥammad Shafīʻ Rūyinzī ʻAbbās ... fī yawm al-Khamīs bist hashtum shahr-i Jumādá al-Thānī, sanat miʼatān wa-arbaʻūn wa[!] baʻd al-alf ... 1240."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the praise of God ... by the hand of the least of creation, ʻAbbās son of the late Muḥammad Shafīʻ Rūyinzī ... on Thursday, the twenty-eighth day of the month of Jumādá al-Thānī of the year 1240 [of the Hijrah = 17 February 1825]."

record.title: 880-02 Ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah / Ibn Kamāl Pāshā. -- [17--?].
record.note: Includes (leaves 2 recto-verso) the Risālah fī ṭabaqāt al-fuqahāʼ (Berlin catalog 9994; Brockelmann, II, 453; S II, p. 672).
Berlin catalog 10026 is a work ascribed to ʻAbd Allāh al-Suwaydī, with same incipit, and other quotations almost identical, but with only 6 ṭabaqāt listed (as against 7 in this manuscript).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā al-kitāb mukhtaṣar fī Ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah, dhakartu fīhi al-mashāhīr min al-aʼimmah alladhīna naqalū ʻilm al-sharīʻah ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) cursive hand, in red and black.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-istiḥsān / taṣnīf al-shaykh ... Badīʻ al-Dīn al-Qazwīnī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Title on leaf 29 recto, in a later hand: Kitāb mukaffirāt lil-Imām al-Aʻẓam.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-istiḥsān, jumiʻat fīhi kalimāt tajrī ʻalá al-alsinah al-ʻāmmah tūjibu kufr qāʼilihā, taṣnīf al-Shaykh ... Badīʻ al-Dīn al-Qazwīnī ... yashtamilu ʻalá abwāb, al-awwal fī bayān muqaddimah yuḥtāju ilayhā ..."
Good fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red, blue, and black.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān al-adīb al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Dunawshirī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Collected poems.

The dates A.H. 1003-1014 (A.D. 1595-1605) are mentioned in the text. Ahlwardt 10136 (2) has a copyist Shihāb al-Dīn al-Dunawsharī al-Ghamrī, writing in A.H. 999 - possibly the same man (Ahlwardt does not vocalize the surname).
A city Dunaysir is listed by Yāqūt.
Incipit: "Hādhihi qiṭʻah min dīwān al-adīb al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh Dunawshirī ..."
Coarse modern (18th century?) hand, in red and black.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhal al-mawrūd sharḥ qaṣīdat Ibn Masʻūd / ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī. -- 1855-1857.
record.note: For Talkhīṣ al-ʻaqīdah see Brockelmann, II, 282.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī zayyana al-albāb bi-al-ādāb ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi fī [sabʻata ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Awwal sanata alf wa-miʼatayn ithnayn wa-sabʻīn -] al-thānī min shahr Shaʻbān sanata thalāthah wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah [!] wa-alf ... ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-ʻĀʼidī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on the 17th of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1272 [of the Hijrah = 27 November 1855 -] the 2nd of the month of Shaʻbān of the year 1173 [!] [1273 (?) of the Hijrah = 28 March 1857] ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-ʻĀʼidī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Hidāyat al-ʻawāmm / Yaḥyá al-Badawī al-Mālikī. -- 1829.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bismillāhi fī awwali kalāmī // lillāhi al-ḥamdu wa-bi-hi nastaʻīnu ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Tammat Hidāyat al-ʻawāmm ... fī yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, sittat ayyām khalat min shahr al-Qaʻdah ... sanat 1244, ʻalá yad kātibihā wa-mālikihā ... Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar manṣūr ʻUmar Badawī al-Mālikī madhhaban al-ʻAdwī baladan ... [in a later hand] Hādhihi al-manẓūmah lil-Shaykh Yaḥyá al-Badawī al-Mālikī ... wa-sammāhā Hidāyat al-ʻawāmm ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Hidāyat al-ʻawāmm was completed ... on blessed Saturday, six days having passed from the month of al-Qaʻdah ... of the year 1244 [of the Hijrah = 10 May 1829], by the hand of its copyist and owner ... Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar manṣūr ʻUmar Badawī al-Mālikī madhhaban al-ʻAdwī baladan ... [in a later hand]. This treatise in verse is by al-Shaykh Yaḥyá al-Badawī al-Mālikī ... and he called it Hidāyat al-ʻawāmm ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Qāmūs al-muḥīṭ / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī. -- 1761.
record.note: Arabic dictionary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anṭaqa al-bulaghāʼ bi-al-lughá fī al-bawādī ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... bi-yad kātibihi ... al-Khalīfī Muḥammad ʻAlī ... 29 fī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, khitām sanat 1174 ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... al-Khalīfī Muḥammad ʻAlī ... on the 29th of sacred al-Ḥijjah, the end of the year 1174 [of the Hijrah = 1 August 1761] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Imḥāḍ al-sabr fī idḥāḍ al-jabr / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq al-Ḥajjājī. -- 1883 or 1884.
record.note: Title on leaf 1 recto: Sharḥ abyāt al-wālid fī al-radd ʻalá al-Jabrīyah al-musammá Imḥāḍ al-sabr fī idḥāḍ al-Jabr. In pencil on fly-leaf, in a later hand: taʼlīf al-shaykh ʻAlī al-Qūṣī.
Does "al-wālid" mean that the poem was written by the author's father? From the preface it would seem that the author composed the poem itself as well.
For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 907.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Yaqūlu ... ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq al-Ḥajjājī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī naṣaba fī mafāwiz maʻrifatihi aʻlām al-mursalīn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Sanat 1301."
Translation of the colophon: "Year 1301 [of the Hijrah = 1883/1884]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣiḥāḥ / Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād al-Jawharī. -- 1481.
record.note: Arabic dictionary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh shukran ʻalá nawālih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-innī qad awdaʻtu hādhā al-kitāb mā ṣaḥḥa ʻindī min hādhihi al-lughah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwāns in gold and colors at the beginning of each volume.
Islamic bindings, in brown, with flap; in paper-covered slip-cases.

Colophon: "Faraghtu min taswīd hādhihi al-awrāq khāmis ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, li-sanat sitt wa-thamānīn wa-thamānimiʼah fī Kāzirūn ... wa-anā al-kātib Suʻād Yatār ibn Khālid ibn Maḥmūd al-Murshidī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "I completed drafting these papers on the fifteenth of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 886 [of the Hijrah = 22 June 1481] in Kāzirūn ... I, the copyist, Suʻād Yatār ibn Khālid ibn Maḥmūd al-Murshidī ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Qāmūs al-muḥīṭ / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī. -- 1544.
record.note: Arabic dictionary.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh munṭiq al-bulaghāʼ bi-al-lughá fī al-bawādī ..."
Fair naskhī, in gold, blue, red and black.
ʻUnwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 recto and 628 verso.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap; in slip-case.
Colophon: "Wa-katabahu li-nafsihi ... Muḥammad ibn Ṭarāhī [?] ... Kāna tamāmuhu fī ʻāshir Shaʻbān, sant 951."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied for himself by ... Muḥammad ibn Ṭarāhī [?] ... It was completed on the tenth of Shaʻbān, of the year 951 [of the Hijrah = 6 November 1544]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣurāḥ min al-Ṣiḥāḥ / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar al-Qurashī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻajaza ʻan waṣfihi al-wāṣifūn ..."
Fairly old (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Faraghtu min saṭr hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yawm Aḥad."
Translation of the colophon: "I completed the writing of this copy ... on a Sunday."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻrīfāt / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Alā lā ālā alā ālā al-Ilāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī. -- [before 1825].
record.note: Copied before 1825.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī ... Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī ʻamma ʻibādahu bi-waẓāʼif al-ʻawārif ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 3 verso.

Note on leaf 1 verso: "Ce volume a été copié sur un manuscrit faisant partie de la collection vendue en 1825 par M. Rousseau à l'Empereur de Russie. Il a été collationné et corrigé par moi. J'ai mis en marge mes conjectures, quand le texte m'a paru avoir besoin de correction. Ce 18 octobre 1825. Le Bon Silvestre de Sacy." De Sacy has also written the "Table du contenu de ce livre" (79-83).
Colophon: "Katabahu ... Abū al-Muqīm Muḥammad Faḍlī al-Salsarī ibn al-Shaykh Bakr al-Ḥājj al-Rabbāgh ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Abū al-Muqīm Muḥammad Faḍlī al-Salsarī ibn al-Shaykh Bakr al-Ḥājj al-Rabbāgh ..."

record.title: 880-02 Kurrāsah fī madḥ ʻAlī al-Ṭālib / inshāʼ ... Muḥammad al-Duwaykī. -- 1758.
record.note: Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rasama al-niʻam ʻalá ṣafaḥāt shukrih bi-bawāʻith karamih ..."
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi kurrāsat madḥ nafīs fī Janāb al-Khaṭṭāṭ ... wa-al-saṭṭār ... Munlā ʻAlī Afandī al-Baghdādī al-maʻrūf bi-al-Ṭālib, inshāʼ ... Muḥammad al-Duwaykī, min banī sukkān Dimashq ... ḥurrira fī awāʼil Dhī al-Qaʻdah 1171 [7 July 1758]."

record.title: Imtiḥān al-adhkiyāʼ / Muḥammad al-Birkawī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Incipit same as in Paris 4120.
Fairly modern (17th century?) cursive hand; leaves 1 and 164-165 supplied by later hands.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: Tahdhīb al-aḥkām / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ṭūsī. -- 1641.
record.note: Several colophons (leaves 109 recto, 203 recto, 308 recto, 348 recto, 454 recto). The one on leaf 308 is dated A.H. 1051.
Two fair hands, one a Persian naskhī, in red and black, the other a nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in black.

record.title: 880-03 al-Iʻrāb ʻan qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām. -- [17--].
record.note: Treatise on inflection.
According to Salisbury's catalog, this is a copy of MS 1271 of the Bibliothèque du Roi.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām ... Hādhihi fawāʼid jalīlah fī qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Good 18th century naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in colors on leaf 1 recto.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: Sukkardān al-ʻushshāq wa-manāzih al-asmāʻ wa-al-āmāq / al-amīr Uways. -- [16--?].
record.note: Title, as above, occurs in the text, leaf 3 verso; the title, in a later hand, on leaf 1 recto as Kitāb al-sukkardān li-Ibn Abī Ḥajalah, is an obvious error.
For Ibn Abī Ḥajalah's Sukkardān al-sulṭān see Berlin catalog 8377 and Brockelmann, II, 13.
Fairly modern (17th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: Kitāb al-arbaʻīn fī irshād al-sāʾirīn / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭāʾī. -- 1332.
record.note: Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: 880-02 Laṭāʼif al-iʻrāb / Ḥājjī Bābā ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ʻUthmān al-Ṭūsawī. -- [17--].
record.note: According to Salisbury's catalog, this is a copy of MS 1271 of the Bibliothèque du Roi.
The incipit calls the author Ḥājjī Bābā ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ʻUthmān al-Ṭūsawī. Compared with Paris 4150.
For the author see: Brockelmann, II, 223; S II, p. 312 (this ms. spells al-Ṭūsawī).
Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī juʻiltu mustarīḥan fī ẓill al-Sulṭān ... alladhī jaʻalahu Allāh mughīthan li-kāffat al-Muslimīn ..."
Good 18th century naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in colors on leaf 25 recto.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: [Majmūʻat ashʻār]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Several modern (19th century) hands.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: Maqāmah / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Badrī. -- [18--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, II, 294.
Modern (19th century) naskhī.

record.title: 880-02 Mulḥat al-iʻrāb / Abū al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī. -- [before 1816].
record.note: Copyist taken from Salisbury's and de Sacy's catalogs; for his date of death see: Brockelmann, II, 479.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī ... Aqūlu baʻda iftitāḥi al-qawli // bi-ḥamdi dhī al-ṭawli al-shadīdi al-ḥawli ..."
Calligraphic 19th century naskhī, in red and black.
Paged as p. 1-311 (61, 67-69, 255 omitted).

record.title: Jawāmiʻ al-jāmiʻ fī tafsīr al-Qurʼān / al-Faḍl ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ṭabarsī. -- 1648.
record.note: Alternate title: Jāmiʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī tafsīr al-Qurʼān.
Hasty nastaʻlīq.
Islamic binding, in red.

record.title: 880-03 Shudhūr al-dhahab / Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī. -- ca. 1826.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī ... Awwal mā aqūlu innī aḥmadu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-Akram ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Balagha muqābalatan ... fī yawm al-Aḥad, sittah wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Rajab, sanat 1241 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The collation was completed ... on Sunday, the twenty-sixth of the month of Rajab, of the year 1241 [of the Hijrah = 6 March 1826] ..."

record.title: [Risālah fī al-sharīʻah al-wājibah al-ittibāʻ]. -- 1881.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Unmūdhaj / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ardabīlī. -- 1674 or 1675.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻArabīyah miftāḥ al-bayān ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; preface (1v-2r) in nastaʻliq.
ʻUnwān in colors on leaf 2 verso.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tārīkh sanat 1085."
Translation of the colophon: "Dated in the year 1085 [of the Hijrah = 1674/1675] ..."

record.title: Anīsat al-majālis / Muḥammad ibn Zayn al-Ḥamawī. -- 1706.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: Sharḥ Qaṣīdat mā ladhdhat al-ʻaysh / Muḥammad ibn ʻAllān. -- 1655.
record.note: Compared with Berlin catalog 3407 (where the author's name is given as Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻAllān [Brockelmann, I, 438]).
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah wa-al-tadhkirah fī ʻilm al-Ḥadīth / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Atharī. -- 1590.
record.note: Title on leaf 85 recto: Alfīyah al-ḥadīth lil-Farāqī [sic].
For the author see: Brockelmann, II, 65.
Listed as no. 29 in Salisbury's catalog.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī Rabbihi al-muqtadirī // ʻAbdu al-Raḥīmi ibn al-Ḥusayni al-Atharī. Min baʻdi ḥamdi Allāhi dhī al-ālāʼ // ʻalá imtinānin jalla ʻan iḥṣāʼi ..."
Fair naskhī.
With: 1 other title.

Colophon: "Kutibat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... wa-tammat ... ṣabīḥata nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, ḥādī ʻashar shahr Jumādá al-Ākhirah, ʻāma thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ... ʻalá yad mālikihā ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥusaynī (?) al-Ḥiṣnī (?) al-Shāfiʻī al-Qādirī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was written ... and completed ... on the morning of Tuesday, the eleventh of the month of Jumādá al-Ākhirah, of the year 998 [of the Hijrah = 17 April 1590] ... by the hand of its owner ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥusaynī (?) al-Ḥiṣnī (?) al-Shāfiʻī al-Qādirī ..."

record.title: Taḥbīr ghāyat al-suʾl fī tafsīr āyat Āmana al-Rasūl / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-mudarris al-Ḥanafī al-Madanī. -- [16--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, II, 205.
The title Taḥbīr āyat al-suʾl on leaf 13 recto is obviously an error.
Fairly modern (17th century) naskhī, in red and black.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: [Majmūʻat aḥādīth]. -- [15--?].
record.note: The date A.H. 1146 (A.D. 1733 or 34) is written in a later hand on leaf 21 verso.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī. -- 1763.
record.note: The authorship seems uncertain. The title on leaf 1 recto, in a later hand, identifies the author as Zayn al-Dīn Muḥammad Jibrīl (17th cent., cf. Brockelmann), but the incipit and explicit of Jibrīl's commentary in Berlin catalog 6684 are entirely different. The incipit of al-Ghayṭī's shorter commentary in Berlin catalog 6681 is the same, but the explicit is somewhat different; on the other hand, the longer commentary, Berlin catalog 6680, has the same incipit, but is incomplete at end. Muḥammad al-Faraḍī's commentary (Berlin catalog 6688, Hitti 437) seems to have the same incipit, but the explicit is different. The same incipit appears in Gotha 295-297, which are listed by Brockelmann (S II, p. 333) under both al-Ghayṭī and al-Faraḍī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma lā sahla illā mā jaʻaltahu sahlan ... Qāla al-Ājurrūmī ... al-Kalām huw al-lafẓ al-murakkab al-mufīd bi-al-waḍʻ. al-Kalām la-hu maʻnayān, maʻná fī al-lughah, wa-maʻná fī al-iṣṭilāḥ ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; leaves 24-25 supplied by a 19th century hand.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrūn khalat min shahr Ṣafar, sanat sabʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, 1177, ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was completed on Tuesday, twenty-seven days having passed from the month of Ṣafar, of the year 1177 [of the Hijrah = 6 September 1763], by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl ..."

record.title: al-Miṣbāḥ al-munīr fī sharḥ al-Ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-bashīr al-nadhīr / Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad al-Bulqīnī. -- 1604.
record.note: Same text as Berlin catalog 3922.

Ahlwardt (Berlin catalog) and Brockelmann (II, 333) do not know whether the author was Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad or Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad al-Bulqīnī; but Brockelmann, S II, p. 461 gives his name as Shihāb al-Dīn, and the Yale manuscript has Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad (which is presumably an error).
Fair naskhī.
With: 4 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 Mughnī al-labīb ʻan kutub al-aʻārīb / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām. -- 1564.
record.note: Arabic grammar.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá ifḍālih ... fa-inna awlạ mā yaqtariḥuhu al-qarāʼiḥ wa-aʻlá mā tajnaḥu ilá taḥṣīlih al-jawāniḥ mā tayassara bi-hi Kitāb Allāh al-Munzal ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tamma ... ʻalá yaday ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Nāṣir ibn Jābir al-Ṭufaylī ... fī wasṭ nahār al-Thulāthāʼ min ʻāshūr al-Muḥarram, sanat ithnayn wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Nāṣir ibn Jābir al-Ṭufaylī ... at noontime, on Tuesday of the "ʻāshūr" of Muḥarram, of the year 972 [of the Hijrah = 25 August 1564] ..."

record.title: [Manāqib al-imām Abī Ḥanīfah]. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: [Risālah fī al-ʻazāʾim]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Fair modern (19th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Magic figure on leaf 5 recto.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ shawāhid al-Qaṭr / Muḥammad Amīn ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Shaykh Ismāʻīl al-Shāfiʻī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahadat ʻalá sharḥ waḥdānīyatihi al-maṣnūʻāt ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad Amīn ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Shaykh Ismāʻīl al-Shāfiʻī ... Hādhihi tawḍīḥāt ... ʻalá Sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.

record.title: al-Kashf al-ghuyūbī / Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān al-Shurnūbī. -- 1691.
record.note: Explicit same as in Tübingen catalog 232, and (with slight variations) Berlin catalog 3371.
For incipit see Arabic MSS 228.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap, front cover missing.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: Nafaḥāt al-qurb wa-al-ittiṣāl bi-ithbāt al-taṣarruf li-awliyāʾ Allāh taʻālá wa-al-karāmah baʻda al-intiqāl / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥamawī. -- 1688.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap, front cover missing.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Mujīb al-nidá ilá sharḥ Qaṭr al-nadá / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Fākihī. -- 1699.
record.note: Incipit matches Gotha 331.
For the author see: Brockelmann, II, 380; S II, p. 512.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-rāfiʻ man inkhafaḍa li-ʻizzihi wa-sulṭānih ..."
Coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yawm al-Khamīs ... fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī ... sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-iḥdá ʻashar, ʻalá yad [copyist's name defaced] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Thursday ... in the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī ... of the year 1111 [of the Hijrah = 1 October 1699], by the hand of [copyist's name defaced] ..."

record.title: Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-mukhtaṣar / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ḥafīd al-Taftāzānī. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, II, 218.
Fairly modern (18th century?) coarse cursive naskhī.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Ḍawʼ al-Miṣbāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Isfarāyīnī. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see: Brockelmann, S I, p. 520.
Incipit: "Qawluhu: Ammā baʻda ḥamdī [ḥamd Allāh]. Ammā kalimah fīhā maʻná al-sharṭ, fa-li-dhālika kānat al-fāʼ lāzimah la-hā ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered.

record.title: al-Shifāʾ fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá al-Yaḥṣubī. -- [before 1393].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in gold, red, and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, front cover missing.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iftitāḥ fī sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Aswad. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see: Brockelmann, S II, p. 312.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ al-Furqān, wa-khalaq min al-turāt [al-turāb ṣaḥḥ] al-insān ..."
Fair modern (18th century?) nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered.
Colophon: "Tamma ... fī waqt al-ḍuḥā, ʻan yad ... Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the morning, by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Fawāʼid al-Ḍiyāʼīyah / Jāmī. -- [17--?].
record.note: The colophon at the end, dated A.H. 897 (A.D. 1492), is that of the author himself.
Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu li-walīyihi wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutaʼaddibīn bi-ādābih ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) nastaʻliq, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 2 verso.
Islamic binding covered with green silk, with flap, in red leather slip-case.

record.title: 880-02 Baḥth al-maṭālib wa-ḥathth al-ṭālib / Jirmānūs Farḥāt. -- 1827.
record.note: Arabic grammar.
Incipit: "Bismi al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds al-Ilāh al-Wāḥid ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṣlaḥa bi-kalimatihi al-anfus al-mukhtallah ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma sanat 1827."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed in the year 1827."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kāfiyah / ʻUthmān ibn ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥājib. -- 1552.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad bi-al-waḍʻ, <wa-hiya kalimah>, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 al-Miṣbāḥ fī al-naḥw / Nāṣir ibn ʻAbd al-Sayyid al-Muṭarrizī. -- 1552.
record.note: Treatise on syntax.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh dhī al-inʻāmi jāʻil al-naḥw fī al-kalām ka-al-milḥ fī al-ṭaʻām ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAwāmil al-Miʼah / ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī. -- 1552.
record.note: Alternate title: Miʼat ʻāmil.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻawāmil fī al-naḥw ʻalá mā allafahu al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jurjānī ... miʼat ʻāmil ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.

Colophon: "Hādhihi al-kitāb, ay, qad tamma hādhihi, fī al-waqt, fī Madrasat Ḥaḍrat Ayyūb Anṣārī ... ʻan yad al-faqīr Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad, fī shahr Jumādá al-Ūlá ... sanat tisʻ wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was completed, in its time, at Madrasat Ḥaḍrat Ayyūb Anṣārī ... by the hand of the poor Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad, during the month of Jumādá al-Ūlá ... of the year 959 [of the Hijrah = May/June 1552] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-taṣrīf. -- [15--?].
record.note: Treatise on inflection.
Presumably not identical with Ibn Mālik's Ījāz al-taʻrif fī ʻilm al-taṣrīf - cf. Escurial, I. no. 86, pt. 3 (different incipit, and apparently a larger work).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ism al-mujarrad min al-zawāʼid immā thulāthī ka-fils wa-faras ... wa-immā rubāʻī ka-Jaʻfar wa-dirham ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Oriental binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Lāmiyat al-afʻāl / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik. -- [15--?].
record.note: For the incipit cf. Berlin catalog 6661.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Badr al-Dīn ibn ... Jamāl al-Dīn ... ibn Mālik: Hādhihi awrāq tashtamilu ʻalá qaṣīdat al-zayy [wālidī, ṣaḥḥ] fī abniyat al-afʻāl. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi lā abghī bi-hi badalā ..."
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Najaza ʻalá yad ... Maʻtūq al-Sumaysāṭī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the hand of ... Maʻtūq al-Sumaysāṭī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Adab al-kātib / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah al-Dīnawarī. -- 1696.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah al-Dīnawarī ... Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidih, wa-al-thanāʼ ʻalayhi bi-mā Huwa ahluhu ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: Tamma ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Salmūnī, fī ʻashray shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir ... sanat 1108 ... "

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Salmūnī, on the twentieth of the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir ... of the year 1108 [of the Hijrah = 16 November 1696] ... "

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī. -- [17--].
record.note: Corpus of traditions.
The de Sacy catalog erroneously states that this manuscript contains only the first half of the work.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Akhbaranā al-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abū Zurʻah Aḥmad ... ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn ... al-ʻIrāqī al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Fairly modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṣaḥīḥ / Muslim ibn al-Ḥajjāj al-Qushayrī. -- 1785.
record.note: Corpus of traditions.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-innaka, yarḥamuka Allāh, bi-tawfīqi khāliqika, dhakarta annka hamamta bi-al-faḥṣ ʻan taʻrīf jumlat al-akhbār al-maʼthūrah ʻan Rasūl Allāh ..."
Fair Maghribī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Kamula al-kitāb ... ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Amʻāshī thumma al-Ghāzī, ṣubḥata yawm al-Khamīs, fī al-rābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Qaʻdah, ʻāma tisʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed ... by the hand of ... Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Amʻāshī thumma al-Ghāzī, on the morning of Thursday, 24 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1199 [of the Hijrah = 28 September 1785] ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ : [al-juzʼ al-thānī] / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Buyūʻ, wa-qawl Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall: Wa-aḥalla Allāh al-bayʻ wa-ḥarrama al-ribā ..."
Modern (18th century?) coarse naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic bindings, in brown, with flaps.
Colophon: "Intahá niṣf al-Bukhārī fī nuskhat Shaykhinā ʻAdawī, raḥimahu Allāh, ʻalá yad ... ʻAlī al-Rayyis al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī ..."
Translation of the colophon: "Half of al-Bukhārī, of the copy of our Shaykh, ʻAdawī, may God have mercy upon him, was completed by the hand of ... ʻAlī al-Rayyis al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Majmaʻ al-gharāʼib wa-manbaʻ al-raghāʼib : [al-juzʼ al-awwal] / Abū al-Ḥusayn ʻAbd al-Ghāfir ibn Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAbd al-Ghāfir al-Fārisī. -- [14--?].
record.note: Incipit: "Qāla al-Shaykh ... Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAbd al-Ghāfir ibn Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAbd al-Ghāfir al-Fārisī kināyatan, qāla: al-Ḥamdu lillāh musabbib al-asbāb, mufattiḥ al-abwāb ..."
Fair old (15th century?) naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Taysīr fī al-qirāʼāt al-sabʻ / Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān al-Muqriʼ al-Dānī. -- 1468.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Imām Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān al-muqriʼ al-Dānī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutafarrid bi-al-dawām, al-mutaṭawwil bi-al-inʻām ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
Colophon: "Ḥarrarahu al-faqīr ... Yaḥyá Ḥājjī al-Khurāsānī, fī tārīkh ghurrat Ṣafar, sanat 873, fī baldat Ḥalab."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor ... Yaḥyá Ḥājjī al-Khurāsānī, dated the beginnig of Ṣafar, sanat 873 [of the Hijrah = 30 August 1468], in the city of Ḥalab [Aleppo, Syria]."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- 1829.
record.note: Fair Maghribī, in red, yellow and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

Colophon: "Kamula al-Muṣḥaf ... ʻalá yad kātibihi ... Maḥmūd ibn al-Jaydān [?] ibn al-Kharūf ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaḥrāwī nasaban ... wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Arbaʻah, fī shahr ... Jumād al-Thāni, baʻdamā maḍat minhu arbaʻat ayyām, ʻām 1245, khamsah wa-arbaʻīn min al-qarn al-thālith ʻashar ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The Muṣḥaf was completed ... by the hand of its copyist ... Maḥmūd ibn al-Jaydān [?] ibn al-Kharūf ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaḥrāwī nasaban ... completed on Wednesday, in the month of Jumād al-Thāni, four days having passed from it, in the year 1245, of the thirteenth century [of the Hijrah = 1 December 1829] ..."

record.title: 880-01 al-Qurʼān. -- [17--?].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) naskhī.
ʻUnwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso and 2 recto.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah. -- 1492.
record.note: For the author see: Brockelmann, S II, p. 300.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh taʻālá bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah Saʻd ... Hādhihi ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min naskhihi nahār al-Jumʻah, waqt al-ḍaḥwah al-kubrá, khāmis ʻasharī [khāmis ʻishrīn (?)] shahr Allāh, al-Muḥarram ... sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed at noon, on Friday, the fifteenth [the twenty-fifth (?)] of the month of God, al-Muḥarram ... of the year 898 [of the Hijrah = 25th November 1492] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī. -- 1638 or 1639.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 2 other titles.
"Qad faragha al-kitāb al-musammá al-Multaqá ... tārīkh sanatihi [?] 100048 [1048]."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of the book titled al-Multaqá was completed ... dated in the year 100048 [1048 of the Hijrah = 1638/1639]."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfah-ʼi Shāhidī. -- [16--?].
record.note: Listed as no. 84 in Salisbury's catalog.
Incipit: "Bi-nām-i Khāliq va Ḥayy va tuvānā qadīm va qādir va bīnā va dānā ..."
Fairly modern (17th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; leaves 215-223 in a cursive hand.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 224 verso.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Shamāʼil al-Nabī wa-ādābuh / Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī. -- 1760.
record.note: For Sawrah, Brockelmann has Sahl.
Listed as no. 26 in Salisbury's catalog.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādih ... Qāla ... Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sawrah al-Tirmidhī ... Bāb mā jāʼa fī khuluq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
With: 2 other titles.
Colophon: "Sanat 1173, Rajab 2, laylat al-Thulāthāʼ."
Translation of the colophon: "On the night of Tuesday, 2 Rajab, the year 1173 [of the Hijrah = 19 February 1760]."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī. -- 1669.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ... fa-farḍ al-ṭahārah ghasl al-aʻḍāʼ al-thalāthah ..."
Fair nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
"Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yawm Thulāthāʼ, waqta al-ẓuhr, fī shahr Shawwāl 10, fī sanat tisʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-alf fī Qalʻat [...?], min yad ... ʻUthmān al-Imām."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Tuesday, at noon, 10 Shawwāl, of the year 1079 [13 March 1669] ... at Qalʻat [...?], by the hand of ... ʻUthmān al-Imām."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-safarah ilá ḥaḍrat al-bararah / Ibn al-ʻArabī. -- 1669.
record.note: A Sufi tract.
Compared with Berlin catalog 2926(3) - divided into 10 chapters, instead of twelve here, but the headings are the same, and 12 is probably more correct.
Listed as no. 42 in Salisbury's catalog.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anṭaqa kull shayʼ li-tasbīḥih ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah murattabah ʻala ʻasharat abwāb wa-fuṣūl, musammāh bi-Tuḥfat al-safarah ilá ḥaḍrat al-bararah. al-Bāb al-awwal fī al-tawbah ..."
Fair nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "... fī yawm al-Aḥad, fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah 25, fī Qalʻat [...?], sanat 1079."
Translation of the colophon: "... on Sunday, 25 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1079 [of the Hijrah = 26 May 1669], at Qalʻat [...?]."

record.title: Athmār al-ḥadāʾiq / ʻAbd Allāh al-Chulūṣī. -- [before 1858 or 59].
record.note: Good 19th century nastaʻlīq, in red and black; ʻunwāns in gold and colors on leaves 1 verso, 7 verso, and in blue only on leaf 18 verso.
Written on variously colored paper.
Islamic binding, in brownish black.

record.title: 880-02 Lubb al-Iḥyāʼ / al-Ghazzālī. -- 1616.
record.note: Incipit: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadiya ... Iʻlam inna hādhā al-kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá arbaʻat aqsām: al-Qism al-awwal fī al-ʻibādāt ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Wa-katabahā ... Muḥammad Zamān al-Ḥusaynī, sanat 1025."
Translation of the colophon: "It was copied by ... Muḥammad Zamān al-Ḥusayni, the year 1025 [of the Hijrah = 1616/1617]."

record.title: Wardat al-malīḥ fī sharḥ Burdat al-madīḥ / Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá al-Mudurnawī. -- 1738.
record.note: Good small naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Dhakhīrat al-mulūk / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Hamadhānī. -- 1617.
record.note: Listed as no. 82 in Salisbury's catalog.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ḥamd-i bisyār wa-sanā-yi bī-shumār Ḥaḍrat-i Mālik al-Mulkī Rā ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 46 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "Tamma kitāb Dhakhīrat al-mulū[k fī aḥad] shuhūr sant alf wa-sitt wa-ʻishrīn, ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad Zamān [al-Ḥusaynī]."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of Dhakhīrat al-mulū[k] was completed [in one] of the months of the year 1026 [of the Hijrah = 1617], by the hand of ... Muḥammad Zamān [al-Ḥusaynī]."

record.title: Maqālah wajīzah fī al-amrāḍ / Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā al-Rāzī. -- [before 1843].
record.note: Modern (18th century?) coarse naskhī.

record.title: 880-02 Tanwīr al-ḥalak fī imkān ruʼyat al-Nabī wa-al-malak / al-Suyūṭī. -- 1658.
record.note: Compared with Berlin catalog 4276: explicit differs.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kathura al-suʼāl ʻan ruʼyat arbāb al-aḥwāl lil-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-yaqẓah ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: al-Sumūṭ al-dhahabīyah al-ḥāwiyah lil-Durar al-bahīyah / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Shawkānī. -- 1856.
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 819.
Fair Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawhar al-munaẓẓam fī ziyārat al-qabr al-mukarram / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī. -- 1658.
record.note: Title, as given on leaf 17 recto: al-Durr al-munaẓẓam fī ziyārat al-qabr al-mukarram.
Listed as no. 37 in Salisbury's catalog.
In the colphon a line of text seems to have been omitted, so that the author's colophon and the scribe's colophon are mixed up.
Compared with Berlin catalog 4052: the work was composed in A.H. 956 (A.D. 1549).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Naḥmaduka Allāhumma an ahhaltanā ʻalá mā nubbiʼnā min al-taqṣīr ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
With: 1 other title.
Colophon: "[Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah] yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, awākhir shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1068 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "[This copy was completed] on blessed Thursday, at the end of the month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1068 [of the Hijrah = 26 September 1658] ..."

record.title: [Majmūʻah]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Coarse modern (19th century) hand.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: Rawḍat al-manāẓir fī ʻilm al-awāʾil wa-al-awākhir : khātimah / Ibn al-Shiḥnah. -- 1589.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Mafātīḥ al-jinān wa-maṣābīḥ al-janān / Yaʻqūb ibn ʻAlī al-Banbānī. -- 1828 or 1829.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Ḥamdan li-man manna ʻalá ʻibādihi niʻmat al-Islām wa-jaʻalahu shirʻatan wa-minhājan ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
The scribe possibly meant to write: "Iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn shahr [al-Ḥijjah]. al-Khaṭṭ yabqá zamānan fī al-kitāb, ilkh."

Colophon: "Qad tamma al-taʼlīf ... ʻalá yad ... Ibrāhīm [crossed over] Ḥamzah ʻalá ... Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhā al-kitāb yawm al-Rābiʻah, waqt al-ḍuḥá, iḥdá ithnay shahr [!] ... sanat 1244."

Translation of the colophon: "The composition was completed ... by the hand of ... Ibrāhīm [crossed over] Ḥamzah on ... The drafting of this book was completed in the early morning, on Wednesday, 21 [!] of the month ... the year 1244 [of the Hijrah = 24 June 1829]."

record.title: Ḥikāyah gharībah. -- 1845.
record.note: Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.

record.title: Rukn al-dīn. -- 1677.
record.note: The 2d faṣl begins on leaf 7 recto, with title clearly readable. The 4th faṣl begins on leaf 99 recto, again with title repeated.
Thin, not very clear, Yemenite naskhī, in red, yellow, green, brown, and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: Asāmī muʾallafāt Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī. -- 1736.
record.note: The composition date given in the colophon (as A.H. 763) is an obvious error.
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: Aqḍiyat Rasūl Allāh / Muḥammad ibn Faraḥ ibn Ṭallāʻ. -- 1679.
record.note: The colophon states further that the prototype manuscript, dated A.H. 739, was copied near the time of the author.
The author's dates, A.H. 577-663, are given on leaf 1 recto.
Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Silk al-niẓām li-Jawāhir al-kalām / Ibrāhīm ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥalabī. -- 1763.
record.note: Brockelmann gives an incorrect description of this work, and lists it under al-Ījī's ʻAqāʼid; he wrongly identifies the author with Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī, who died in 1549, which is patently wrong, since the author's colophon is dated A.H. 1152 (A.D. 1739 or 40), and this manuscript was copied while the author was still alive. Al-Baghdādī Dhayl Kashf al-ẓunūn, II, 23, makes the same mistake, although he gives the correct incipit.
For the incipit of the matn of al-ʻAqāʼid (different from the matn in this manuscript) see: Berlin catalog, 1999; Buhar, 99(3).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyadanā fī mawāqif tawṣīdihi [tawḥīdihi, ṣaḥḥ] bi-iqāmat al-ḥujaj ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

Colophon: "Wa-hunā qad inqaṭaʻat maṭāyā al-aqlām ʻalá yad ... Muḥammad Hibat Allāh al-Ḥitājī ... fī awākhir Ṣafar al-Khayr, sanat 1177, sabʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, wa-qad naqaltuhā min musawwadat ... muʼallifihi, dāma baqāʼuhu ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Here the mounts of the pens stopped in the hand of ... Muḥammad Hibat Allāh al-Ḥitājī ... at the end of Ṣafar al-Khayr, of the year 1177 [of the Hijrah = 8 September 1763]. I have transcribed it from the copy ... of its author, may his life continue ..."

record.title: Rawḍ al-ādāb / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥijāzī. -- [15--?].
record.note: The author's name and the title are written in a later hand on leaf 40 recto.
Heading of faṣls (as listed by Brockelmann): 4). Fī al-nathrīyāt (leaf 20 recto); 5) Fī al-ḥikāyāt (leaf 51 verso).
Leaves probably in part out of order.
Fairly old (16th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: Jawharat al-tawḥīd / Ibrāhīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī. -- 1660.
record.note: Good naskhī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAwārif al-maʻārif / ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Suhrawardī. -- 1710.
record.note: A Sufi tract.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻaẓīm shaʼnuhu, al-qawī sulṭānuhu, al-ẓāhir iḥsānuhu ..."
Fair nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī yawm al-Jumʻah, al-Shawwāl al-mukarram, sanat ithnay ʻishrīn wa-alf miʼah, 1022 [sic!]."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... on Friday, in honored Shawwāl, of the year 1022 [sic!] 1122 [of the Hijrah = 28 November, 1710]."

record.title: Iḍāʾat al-dujunnah / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maqqarī. -- 1660.
record.note: Good naskhī, in red and black.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat rasāʼil Durzīyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red, green and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: al-Tuḥfah al-ẓarīfah min kull nukat laṭīfah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Berlin catalog's incipit of the 1st (3d in this copy) chapter is however different from that of this copy's.
Leaves numbered 1-14, 36-58, 60-73, 75.
Good naskhī, in red and black, fairly modern (18th century?).
Loose in Islamic binding, paper covered.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat rasāʼil Durzīyah. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) calligraphic naskhī, in red, yellow, green and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Possible autograph of Eli Smith.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat rasāʼil Durzīyah. -- 1821.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red, green and black.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb al-mukarram nahār al-Aḥad, fī al-ʻashr al-thānī min shahr Ṣafar ... sanat 1237 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this noble book was completed on Sunday, in the second ten of the month of Ṣafar ... the year 1237 [of the Hijrah = 11 November 1821] ..."

record.title: Tahdhīb al-aḥkām / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ṭūsī. -- 1624-1649.
record.note: The volume contains more of the text than Landberg MSS 26a.
Several Persian naskhī hands, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻat rasāʼil Durzīyah. -- [18--].
record.note: Modern (19th century) cursive naskhī, in red and black.
Copied by the corrector of the Mission press in Beirut.
Bookplate and possible autograph of Cornelius Van Alen Van Dyck.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Muʻallaqāt / Abū ʻAbd Allāh [ibn ʻAlī] ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Zawzanī. -- [ca. 1810].
record.note: Interleaved with 84 leaves, containing copious annotations by Silvestre de Sacy.
For the author see: Brockelmann, I, 288.
Mīkhāʼīl Ṣabbāgh's dates are 1784-1816 (Brockelmann, II, 479).

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Imām ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh [ibn ʻAlī] ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Zawzanī ... Hādhā sharḥ al-qaṣāʼid al-sabʻ amlaytuhu ʻalá ḥadd al-ījāz wa-al-ikhtiṣār ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: al-Baḥr al-muḥīṭ fī sharḥ al-Wasīṭ : al-thālith / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qamūlī. -- [before 1327].
record.note: Fair naskhī.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, flap and back missing.

record.title: al-Takmilah fī sharḥ al-Minhāj / Muḥammad ibn Bahādur al-Zarkashī. -- 1479.
record.note: Also known as: Tawḍīḥ al-Minhāj (Brockelmann).
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, front cover missing.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Ḥamāsah / Abū ʻAlī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Marzūqī. -- [ca. 1820].
record.note: Copied about 1820.

Note on leaf 1 recto: "Copie incomplète du Hamasa par Merzouki, que feu M. [Claudius James] Rich faisoit faire pour moi à Bagdad, et qui n'a pas été terminée à cause de son décès [October 5, 1820]. S. de Sacy."
For the author see: Brockelmann, S I, p. 502.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil Abū ʻAlī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Marzūqī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī tafsīr kitāb al-Ḥamāsah: al-Ḥamāsah al-shajāʻah, wa-al-fiʻl minhu ḥamisa ..."
Good naskhī.

record.title: [Majmūʻat ashʻār]. -- [after 1858 or 59].
record.note: Fair modern hands.
Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-sirr al-ghāmiḍ fī sharḥ Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ / ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl al-Nābulusī. -- 1813.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma kamā anʻamta fa-zid bi-faḍlika wa-jūdika. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa khazāʼin al-ḥaqāʼiq al-Ilāhīyah bi-mafātīḥ al-ʻināyah wa-al-tawfīq ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.

Colophon: "Wa-qāla kātibuhu: Kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi nahār al-Aḥad, al-ḥādī wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Jumādá al-Thāniyah ... sanat 1228, thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn baʻda al-miʼatayn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "Its copyist said: The copy was completed on Sunday, the twenty-first of the month of Jumādá al-Thāniyah, of the year 1228 [of the Hijrah = 21 June 1813]."

record.title: Risālah [fī al-radd ʻalá al-Hāshimī] / ʻAbd al-Masīḥ ibn Isḥāq al-Kindī. -- [before 1874].
record.note: Fair modern hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Muntahá al-ṭalab min ashʻār al-ʻArab : al-juzʼ al-thālith wa-al-khāmis / Muḥammad ibn al-Mubārak ibn Maymūn. -- 1463.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-qāla ʻAmr ibn Barrāqah al-Hamdānī: Taqūlu Sulaymá lā taʻarraḍ li-talfatin ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black, fully vocalized.
Islamic bindings, in red, with flaps.
With autograph ex-libris of Ibrāhīm al-Biqāʻī.

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh minhu tāsiʻ ʻashar Jumādá al-Ākhirah [ -- sādis ʻashar shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah], sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamān miʼah ... ʻalá yad ... ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Manẓarāwī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on 19 Jumādá al-Ākhirah [ -- 16 Dhī al-Ḥijjah], of the year 867 [of the Hijrah = 20 March -- 10 September, 1463] ... by the hand of ... ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Manẓarāwī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghayth al-musjam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam : al-juzʼ al-awwal / [Ṣalāḥ] al-Dīn Khalīl ibn Aybak al-Ṣafadī. -- 1491.
record.note: For the incipit see: Berlin catalog, 7660.
Verse-numbers according to Van der Sloot's edition of the Lāmīyah, 1769.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Qāla [Ṣalāḥ] al-Dīn Khalīl ibn Aybak al-Ṣafadī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥ [ṣad]ra [man] taʼaddab, wa-rafaʻa qadr man taʼahhala lil-ʻilm wa-taʼahhab ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi fī al-ḥādī wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rajab al-fard, ʻām sitt wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānī miʼah ..."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on 21 Rajab al-fard, of the year 896 [of the Hijrah = 8th June 1491] ..."

record.title: [Majmūʻat ashʻār]. -- 1742.
record.note: Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

record.title: Kanz al-ʻibād fī sharḥ al-Awrād / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ghūrī. -- [16--?].
record.note: In the incipit, the 2d word of the title is vocalized al-ʻubbād.
Fairly old (17th century?) Persian calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghayth al-musjam fī sharḥ Lāmīyat al-ʻAjam : al-juzʼ al-thānī / Khalīl ibn Aybak al-Ṣafadī. -- 1571.
record.note: Verse-numbers according to Van der Sloot's edition of the Lāmīyah, 1769.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah ... Laʻalla ilmāmatan bi-al-Jazʻi thāniyatan ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Astronomical diagrams.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhat hādhā al-juzʼ masā yawm al-Jumʻah, awāʼil Jumādá al-Thānī, sanat tisʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, bi-qaryat Ḥafsarjah, tābiʻ Qaḍāʼ Ḥārim, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī al-Shāfiʻī, al-nāʼib bi-al-qaḍāʼ al-madhkūr ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this part was completed on Friday evening, the beginnings of Jumādá al-Thānī, of the year 979 [of the Hijrah = 5 November 1571], in the village of Ḥafsarjah, in the District of Ḥārim [Syria], by the Hand of the poor Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī al-Shāfiʻī, the deputy in the aforementioned District ..."

record.title: [Taʾrīkh Miṣr]. -- [18--?].
record.note: Modern hasty naskhī. Written in the 19th century.

record.title: 880-02 Sāniḥāt dumá al-qaṣr fī muṭāraḥāt banī al-ʻaṣr / Darwīsh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭāluwī. -- 1649.
record.note: The title has been altered by a forger on leaf 3 recto to: Kharīdah al-qaṣr wa-jarīdah ahl al-ʻaṣr [lil-Kātib al-Iṣfahānī] and the same incorrect title has been written by him on leaf 1 recto and at the foot of the colophon.
Neither Scheidius nor Silvestre de Sacy discovered the forgery.
Incorrectly entered in L. Nemoy's printed catalog (no. 394) under the forged title.
Compared with Landberg MSS 132 (Catalogue, no. 477).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Allāhumma yā mujrī rukhāʼ ṭibāʻ al-insān mustannatan fī ṭarāʼiq al-bayān ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in brown.
On leaf preceding leaf 1: "Ex Oriente accepit E. Scheidius 1767."

Colophon: "ʻAmmat al-Sāniḥāt [altered to: al-Sāmiḥāt] bi-ʻawn Bāsiṭ al-araḍīn wa-Rāfiʻ al-samāwāt, nahār al-Aḥad, tāsiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat tisʻ wa-khamsīn wa-alf, wa-qad raqama ṭirsahā li-nafsihi ... ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Muḥammad al-Mirzānātī ḥasaban al-Adhamī nasaban ..."

Translation of the colophon: "al-Sāniḥāt [altered to al-Sāmiḥāt] have spread by the help of the Stretcher of the lands and the Uplifter of the heavens, on Sunday, 19 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1059 [of the Hijrah = 2 May 1649]. The codex was written ... by ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Muḥammad al-Mirzānātī ḥasaban al-Adhamī nasaban ... for himself ..."

record.title: Risālah fī tarjīḥ taqlīd Abī Ḥanīfah ʻalá taqlīd ghayrihi min al-aʼimmah / Akmal al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd al-Bābartī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān / Abū al-Ṭayyib Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Mutanabbī. -- [17--?].
record.note: Collected poems.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū al-Ṭayyib Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Mutanabbī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-mawliduhu bi-al-Kūfah fī Kindah ..."
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 verso.

record.title: 880-02 Dīwān / Abū al-Ṭayyib Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Mutanabbī. -- [14--?].
record.note: Collected poems.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Shaʼāmīyāt al-Ṣabawīyāt. Qāla Abū al-Ṭayyib Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Mutanabbī fī ṣibāh: Ablá al-hawá asafan yawma al-nawá badanī ..."
Old (15th century?) naskhī; several leaves supplied in a much later hand.
Islamic binding, in brown.
An English note on a fly-leaf mentions "Aleppo, 1843" and the price "100 piasters". An ex-libris on another fly-leaf is dated A.H. 1132 (A.D. 1719 or 20).

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kamārī al-Zazzī. -- 1340.
record.note: For Kamārā, Zazz and Jarbādhkān see Yāqūt.
In the incipit the second surname is spelled al-Dazī.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻArabīyah miftāḥ āyātih wa-mishrāḥ laṭāʼifih ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.
Colophon: "Tammat ... ʻalá yad ... Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jarbādhaqānī ... fī muntaṣaf Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat iḥdá wa-arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... by the hand of ... Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jarbādhaqānī ... in the middle of the sacred Muḥarram, of the year 741 [of the Hijrah = 19 July 1340]."

record.title: al-Qaṣīdah al-Ḥimyarīyah / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Kalāʻī al-Ḥimyarī. -- 1709.
record.note: The colophon on leaf 1 recto presumably forms the conclusion of a work that was bound before this work.
Coarse Yemenite naskhī.

record.title: Lubāb al-iʻrāb / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī. -- 1811.
record.note: Coarse naskhī, in red and black.

record.title: Taʾrīkh al-khamīs / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Diyārbakrī. -- [before 1732 or 33].
record.note: For al-Muraysīʻ see al-Ṭabarī, index (same incipit in Gotha catalog 1799). Cf. also Berlin catalog, 9467.
The 7th mawṭin of the 3d rukn begins on leaf 57 recto; the 9th on leaf 127 verso.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, front cover and flap wanting.
Other volumes wanting.

record.title: 880-02 al-Tadhkirah / Jibrāʼīl Farḥāt al-Lubnānī al-Ḥalabī al-Mārūnī. -- [1833].
record.note: Incipit: "Bi-ism al-Āb wa-al-Ibn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Quds ilāh wāḥid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Jibrāʼīl Farḥāt al-Lubnānī al-Ḥalabī al-Mārūnī: Inna hādhihi nubdhah sammaytuhā al-Tadhkirah, qad ikhtartuhā min dīwānī ..."
Good modern naskhī, in red and black.
The date "18 XI/[18]33" is written on lining paper.

record.title: Nuzūl al-ghayth / Badr al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ... al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Damāmīnī. -- 1613.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-03 al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Barīyah / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī. -- [15--?].
record.note: Also known as: Qaṣīdat al-burdah.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Amin tadhakkuri jīrānin bi-Dhī Salami // mazajta damʻan jará min muqlatin bi-dami ..."
Incipit of the paraphrase (takhmīs): "Mā bālu qalbika lā yanfakku dhā alami ..."
For the identification of the paraphrase see: Berlin catalog, 7811; Gotha, 2282.
Fairly old (16th century?) calligraphic large naskhī, in red, green and black.

Full-page ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto, a smaller one on leaf 28 recto. A large strip of gold-leaf is pasted at the top of leaf 28 recto, presumably preparatory to the making of another ʻunwān.

record.title: Taḥkīm al-ʻuqūl / ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Āqbars. -- 1614.
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, S I, p. 631 (where he is called Nūr al-Dīn).
Fair naskhī, in red, green, and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
With: 1 other title.

record.title: 880-02 Fākihat al-khulafāʼ wa-mufākahat al-ẓurafāʼ / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻArabshāh. -- [before 1816].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat al-kāʼināt bi-wujūdih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Interleaved with 245 leaves, 1-56 containing copious annotations by Silvestre de Sacy.

record.title: 880-02 Maqāmāt / Badīʻ al-Zamān al-Hamadhānī. -- 1206.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Billāh taʻālá astaftiḥu, wa-bi-ifḍālihi astanjiḥu ... al-Maqāmah al-ūl[á]. Qāl: Ḥaddathanā ʻĪsá ibn Hishām qāl: Dakhaltu al-Baṣrah wa-anā min sinnī fī fatāʼ ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb ... fī ākhir shahr al-Muḥarram, al-maftaḥ min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-sittimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed at the end of the month of al-Muḥarram, the beginning of the months of the year 603 [of the Hijrah = 13 September 1206]."

record.title: al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ / al-Bukhārī. -- 1348.
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī.
Several leaves supplied by later hands (lacunae between leaves 232 and 233 and elsewhere).
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown.

record.title: al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ / al-Bukhārī. -- [before 1479].
record.note: Good naskhī, in red and black, generously vocalized.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.

record.title: al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ / al-Bukhārī. -- [before 1470].
record.note: Calligraphic naskhī, in red and black; large ʻunwān in gold and colors on first page of each volume.
Islamic bindings, in brown, with flaps, the flap of volume 2 wanting.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Risālah al-Zaydūnīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Nubātah. -- 1553.
record.note: The proper title of the work is: Sarḥ al-ʻuyūn fī sharḥ Risālat Ibn Zaydūn.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā yajibu al-ḥamdu illā lah ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black. First and last (colophon) leaves supplied by a later hand.
With autograph note by Rifāʻah Bak al-Ṭahṭāwī: "Li-Saʻādat Misyū al-Bārūn Disāsī min ṭaraf al-faqīr Rifāʻah".
Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah ḍaḥwat al-Ithnayn, li-tisʻ ʻashar yawman khalat min shahr al-Muḥarram, min shuhūr sanat tisʻimiʼah wa-sittīn ..."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this epistle was completed on Monday morning, nineteen days having passed from the month of al-Muḥarram, of the year 960 [of the Hijrah = 15 January 1553] ..."

record.title: [Ijāzāt] / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ibrāhīm al-Khayr al-Buyūtī. -- 1827-1829.
record.note: Fair nastaʻlīq, in red and black.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-maʻārif / Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah al-Kātib. -- [ca. 1800].
record.note: Universal history.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ... Qāla Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim ibn Qutaybah al-Kātib: Jamaʻtu fīhi min al-maʻārif bi-al-ḥaqq ʻalá man unʻima ʻalayhi bi-sharaf al-manzilah ..."
Modern (ca. 1800) naskhī, in red and black.
ʻUnwān in colors on leaf 1 verso.

record.title: Risālah fī tafsīr qawlihi Wa-aʻiddū lahum mā istaṭaʻtum min quwwatin / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Ibrāhīm al-Qāzānī. -- 1830 or 31.
record.note: Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iʻlām bi-aʻlām Bayt Allāh al-ḥarām / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Nahrawālī. -- 1590.
record.note: History of Mecca.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-Masjid al-Ḥarām amnan wa-mathābatan lil-nās ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black.
Full-page ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto, a smaller one on leaf 1 verso.

Colophon: "ʻAlá yad ... Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad al-Ghamrī waṭanan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban ... Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, rābiʻ ʻasharah li-shahr Shawwāl, sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."

Translation of the colophon: "By the hand of ... Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad al-Ghamrī watanan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban ... The copy was completed on Wednesday, the 14th day of the month of Shawwāl, of the year 998 [of the Hijrah = 16 August 1590]."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-nāẓirīn fī taʼrīkh man waliya Miṣr min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-salāṭīn / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī. -- 1769.
record.note: History of Egypt.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ... Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Ḥanbalī al-Maqdisī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-bāqī wa-kull man ʻalayhā fānin ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Cololphon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīq hādhā al-tārīkh al-ʻaẓīm bi-Miṣr, yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, khams wa-ʻishrūn min Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-mubārakah, sanat 1182 ..."
Translation of the colophon: "This great history was completed in Egypt, on blessed Tuesday, the 25th of blessed Dhū al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1182 [of the Hijrah = 2 May 1769] ..."

record.title: Majmaʻ tafārīq al-kalimāt fī takhāluf al-mafhūm bayna tawāfuq al-ʻibārāt. -- 1838.
record.note: In a later hand on leaf 12 verso: Risālat masāʾil al-furūq madhkūrah kadhā qāla al-Sayyid al-Sharīf wa-Ḥasan Jalabī.
On al-Sayyid al-Sharīf [al-Jurjānī] and Hasan Çelebi see Brockelmann, II, 216, 229.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil / al-Suyūṭī. -- [17--].
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal fa-laysa la-hu ākhir ..."
Fair modern (18th century) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: al-Kāshif ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-sunan / al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭībī. -- [17--?].
record.note: For the author see Brockelmann, S II, p. 67.
For the possibility that the work was left unfinished see Berlin catalog 1293, but India Office Manuscript 157 contains the final volume of the commentary itself.
Fairly modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered.
With: 2 other titles.

record.title: 880-03 ʻAjāʼib al-maqdūr fī nawāʼib Tīmūr / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻArabshāh. -- 1579.
record.note: The "great chess-game" is diagrammed on leaf 209 verso; the Uigur alphabet is given on leaf 216.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻalá minwāl irādatihi wa-tadbīrihi tunsaju maqāṭiʻ al-umūr ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black; leaf 1 in nastaʻliq.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah ... fī yawm Yakshanbah, arbaʻ ʻashar Rajab al-murjib, sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed ... on Sunday, the 14th of the awesome month of Rajab, of the year 987 [of the Hijrah = 16 September 1579]."

record.title: al-Durr al-aʻlā fī taṣḥīḥ al-imlāʼ. -- [18--?].
record.note: The example of abbreviated date on leaf 12 recto is 3d Muḥarram A.H. 1292, perhaps indicating date of copying.
Modern (19th century) calligraphic naskhī.

record.title: 880-03 al-Masālik wa-al-mamālik / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī. -- [before 1816].
record.note: Compared with de Slane's edition of this portion of the work.
Incipit: "Dhikr al-mashhūr min al-mudun wa-al-qurá fī al-ṭarīq min Miṣr ilá Barqah wa-al-maghrib kullihi wa-gharāʼibihā ..."
Good naskhī, in red and black; written on rectos of leaves only.

record.title: al-Nafḥah al-nadīyah fī tawālī ayyām al-ashhur al-ʻArabīyah wa-al-Rūmīyah wa-al-Fārisīyah / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Imām. -- [18--?].
record.note: 19th century Yemenite naskhī, in red and black.
With diagrams.
Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: al-Iqnāʻ li-ṭālib al-intifāʻ / Mūsá ibn Aḥmad al-Hajāwī. -- 1745.
record.note: The title and author are given on leaf 1 recto with a note that this manuscript was collated with a manuscript copied from the author's autograph.

The work is not identical, as wrongly called by Brockelmann, S II, p. 447, with the same author's abridgment of al-Muqniʻ of ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qudāmah (Berlin catalog, 4504; Hitti, 1845). The Mukhtaṣar al-Muqniʻ is a much smaller work.
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Loose in Islamic binding, in brown, with flap.

record.title: al-Gharīb al-muṣannaf / Abū ʻUbayd al-Qāsim ibn Sallām. -- [10--?].
record.note: This is not part of Landberg MSS 116.

Found on the shelves in Beinecke, inlaid in paper-pad, with note by C. Torrey: "Handle with care! Note that the paper-block (pad) at the bottom of this box contains a very fragile leaf from one of the oldest Arabic manuscripts in the Landberg collection, the Gharīb al-muṣannaf of Ibn Sallām -- put here for temporary safe-keeping. C.C.T." The box referred to was not seen by L. Nemoy.
Old (11th century?) Maghribī hand, in red and black.

record.title: 880-03 Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qazwīnī. -- 1468.
record.note: For the author see: Brockelmann, II, 22.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻam wa-ʻallama min al-bayān mā lam naʻlam ..."
Calligraphic naskhī, in gold and black.
Full-page ʻunwān in gold and colors on leaf 1 recto, a smaller one on leaf 1 verso.
Islamic binding, in red, with flap.
Colophon: "Katabahu ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Marāghī, fī awāʼil Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat thalāth wa-sabʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by ... Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Marāghī, in the beginning of Jumādá al-Awwal, of the year 873 [of the Hijrah = 26 November 1468]

record.title: 880-03 Taḥrīr al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Quṭb al-Taḥtānī. -- 1627 or 1628.
record.note: For the author see: Brockelmann, S II, p. 293.
The explicit is not the same as in Berlin catalog, 5258.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Inna abhá durar tunẓamu bi-banān al-bayān wa-azhar zahr tuntharu fī ardān al-adhhān ..."
Fair nastaʻliq, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... sanat 1037."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the year 1037 [of the Hijrah = 1627/1628]."

record.title: 880-02 Īsāghūjī / al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī. -- [ca. 1624 or 1625].
record.note: Manual of logic.
The date given is that of the following commentary (63 verso-89).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmadu Allāh ʻalá tawfīqih wa-nasʼaluhu ʻalá hidāyat ṭarīqih ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Īsāghūjī / Ḥusām al-Dīn al-Ḥasan al-Kātī. -- 1624 or 1625.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib wujūduhu, al-mumtaniʻ naẓīruhu, al-mumkin siwāhu wa-ghayruhu ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... sanat 1034."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the year 1034 [of the Hijrah = 1624/1625]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥawāshī lil-mubtadiʼīn / Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bardaʻī. -- [ca. 1624 or 1625].
record.note: The date given is that of the preceding commentary of al-Kātī (63 verso-89).
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man ḥamduhu aḥsan kull al-maqūl, wa-shukruhu ashraf mā yakhtalij fī al-ʻuqūl ..."
Fair naskhī.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iʻrāb ʻan qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām. -- 1624 or 1625.
record.note: Treatise on inflection.
Listed as no. 9, part 1, in Salisbury's catalog.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh ... Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām ... Hādhihi fawāʼid jalīlah fī qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Fair nastaʻliq.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.
Colophon: "Tammat ... fī shahr Bilighirād, fī waqt al-ẓuhar, sanat 1034."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed ... in the city of Bilighrād [Belgrade (?), Serbia (?)], at noontime, in the year 1034 [of the Hijrah = 1624/1625]."

record.title: 880-02 Muwaṣṣil al-ṭullāb ilá qawāʻid al-iʻrāb / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī. -- 1625 or 1626.
record.note: Listed as no. 9, part 2, in Salisbury's catalog.
For the author see: Brockelmann, II, 27; S II, p. 22.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim li-ḥamdihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá qawāʻid al-iʻrāb ..."
Fair naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper-covered, with flap.
With: 5 other titles.
Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-itmām ʻalá yad ... Ḥusayn ibn Ḥazm, fī shahr Bilighirād, fī tārīkh sanat khams wa-thalāthīn wa-alf."
